text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Yesu Kristo enye Abraham kple Fia David ƒe dzidzimevi , eƒe dzidzime lae nye esi .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Abraham dzi Isak , Isak dzi Yakɔb eye Yakɔb dzi Yuda kple nɔviawo .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Yuda dzi Perez kple Zera ame siawo dadae nye Temar , Hezrɔn fofoe nye Perez , Hezrɔn ha ̃ dzi Ram ,

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Ram dzi Aminadab , Aminadab dzi Nahesɔn , Nahesɔn dzi Salmo ,

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Salmo ha ̃ dzi Boaz ame si dadae nye Rahab . Boaz dzi Obed , eye Obed dadae nye Rut , Obed dzi Yese .

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Yese dzi Fia David , David dzi Salomo , Salomo dadae nye Batseba ame si nye Uria srɔ ̃ kpɔ ,

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Salomo dzi Rehoboam , Rehoboam dzi Abiya , eye Abiya ha ̃ dzi Asa ,

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asa dzi Yehosafat , Yehosafat dzi Yoram , Yoram dzi Uzia ,

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Uzia dzi Yotam , Yotam dzi Ahaz , Ahaz dzi Hezekia ,

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Hezekia dzi Manase , Manase dzi Amɔn , Amɔn dzi Yosia ,

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Yosia dzi Yekonia kple nɔviawo . Wodzi ame siawo le esime woɖe aboyo Israel dukɔa yi Babilonia .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Esi aboyomenɔlawo trɔ gbɔ va aƒe la , Yekonia dzi Sealtiel , Sealtiel dzi Zerubabel ,

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Zerubabel ha ̃ dzi Abihud , Abihud dzi Eliakim , eye Eliakim dzi Azɔ ,

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Azɔ dzi Zadɔk , Zadɔk dzi Akim , Akim dzi Elihud ,

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Elihud dzi Eleaza , Eleaza dzi Matan , Matan ha ̃ dzi Yakɔb ,

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: eye Yakɔb dzi Yosef . Yosef sia nye Maria Yesu Kristo dadaa srɔ ̃

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Dzidzimeawo kata ̃ , tso Abraham dzi va se ɖe Fia David dzi ƒe xexle ̃ me le wuiene , eye tso Fia David ŋɔli va se ɖe esi woɖe aboyo Israel la le dzidzime wuiene , nenema ke tso aboyomenɔŋɔli va se ɖe Yesu dzidzi ha ̃ le dzidzime wuiene .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yesu ƒe dzidzi va yi ale : Wodo ŋugbe na Yosef be woatsɔ Yesu dadaa Maria nɛ wo ̀ aɖe . Ke togbɔ be menya ŋutsu o ha ̃ la , Maria fɔ fu xoxo to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la dzi .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Azɔ Yosef ame si wodo eƒe ŋugbe na la nye ame ɖɔʋu aɖe , eya ta eɖoe be yeagbe Maria le bebeme , elabena medi be yeado ŋukpee le dutoƒo o .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nu siawo ŋu bum la , mawudɔla aɖe ɖe eɖokui fiae le drɔ ̃ eƒe , yɔe gblɔ nɛ be , “ Yosef , David vi , me ̃ gahe ɖe megbe le srɔ ̃ wo Maria ŋu o , kplɔe wo ̀ ava nɔ gbɔwo ̀ . Elabena vi si le dɔme nɛ la , Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la mee wo ̀ tso .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Adzi ŋutsuvi eye na ̃ na ŋkɔe be Yesu , esi gɔmee nye ‘ Đela ’ , elabena eyae aɖe eƒe dukɔmeviwo tso woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Esiawo kata ̃ ava eme be woawu Aƒetɔ ƒe nya si wo ̀ gblɔ ɖi to nyagblɔɖila dzi nu bena ,

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: ‘ Miɖo to miase nya sia , ɖetugbi dzadzɛ la afɔ fu adzi ŋutsuvi . Woana ŋkɔe be , ‘ Imanuel ’ si gɔmee nye , ‘ Mawu li kpli mi ́ . ’ ”

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Esi Yosef nyɔ la , ewɔ ɖe mawudɔla la ƒe gbe dzi , eye wo ̀ yi ɖakplɔ Maria va eƒe aƒe mee abe srɔ ̃ a ene .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Ke Yosef mede asi eŋu o va se ɖe esime wo ̀ dzi via ŋutsuvi la eye wo ̀ na ŋkɔe be “ Yesu . ”

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Wodzi Yesu le Betlehem le Yudea , le Fia Herodes ŋɔli . Le ɣemaɣi la , ɣletivimenunyala aɖewo tso ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo va Yerusalem , eye wonɔ amewo biam bena ,

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: ” Afi kae Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia yeye si wodzi la le ? Mi ́ ekpɔ eƒe ɣletivi le ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo ke ale mieva be míasubɔe . ”

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Esi Fia Herodes se nya sia la dzika tso eya kple Yerusalem dua me nɔlawo kata ̃ ƒo .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Le esia ta Fia Herodes yɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo kata ̃ ƒo ƒui eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Đe nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ afi si wole Mesia la dzi ge le la na mi ́ da ɖia ? ”

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̃ , wogblɔ be woadzi Mesia la le Betlehem . ” Nyagblɔɖila Mika ŋlɔe da ɖi be ,

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: ” O , wo ̀ Betlehem du sue la , menye Yudatɔwo ƒe du sue maxɔŋkɔ aɖe ko ne ̀ nye o , ke boŋ e ̀ xɔ ŋkɔ ŋutɔ , elabena wo ̀ mee Fia si le nye dukɔ Israel dzi ɖu ge la ado tso . ”

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Herodes dɔ ame ɖo ɖe ɣletivimenunyala siawo dzaa bena woava kpɔ ye . Esi wova la ebia wo be woagblɔ ɣeyiɣi si tututu wokpɔ ɣletivi la zi gba ̃ tɔ la na ye eye wogblɔe nɛ . Ale wo ̀ dɔ wo kple gbedeasi sia bena ,

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: “ Miyi Betlehem ne miadi ɖevi la , eye ne mieke ɖe eŋu la , mitrɔ va gblɔe nam bena nye ha ̃ mayi aɖasubɔe ! ”

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Esi wowu takpekpea nu la , ɣletivimenunyalawo gayi woƒe mɔzɔzɔ dzi . Kasia ɣletivi la gadze wo ŋgɔ heyi ɖatɔ ɖe Betlehem dua tame tututu .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Nyateƒe , dzi dzɔ wo ŋutɔ , ŋutɔ .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Woge ɖe aƒe si me Maria kple ɖevia nɔ me eye woyi ɖadze klo ɖe egbɔ enumake hede ta agu nɛ . Woʋu nu le woƒe nunanawo nu , eye wotsɔ sika , kotoklobo kple lifi nɛ .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Emegbe wotrɔ dze aƒe mɔ dzi te ̃ e eye womegato Yerusalem yi ɖagblɔ nya aɖeke na Herodes o , elabena Mawu xlɔ ̃ nu wo le drɔ ̃ eƒe bena woato mɔ bubu ayi aƒe .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Esi ɣletivimenunyalawo dzo vɔ la , mawudɔla aɖe ɖe eɖokui fia Yosef le drɔ ̃ eƒe . Egblɔ nɛ bena , “ Tso kpla ne na ̃ si kple ɖevia kpakple dadaa ayi Egipte , eye na ̃ nɔ afi ma va se ɖe esime magblɔ na wo ̀ be na ̃ trɔ gbɔ . Elabena Fia Herodes le nu sia nu si wo ̀ ate ŋui la wɔ ge bena yeawu ɖevia . ”

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Le za ̃ ma me ke Yosef si kple ɖevia kpakple dadaa yi Egipte ,

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: eye wonɔ afi ma va se ɖe esime Fia Herodes ku . Nu sia wu nyagblɔɖi sia nu be , “ Egiptee meyɔ vinye la tsoe . ”

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Herodes kpɔe be ɣletivimenunyalawo flu ye . Dɔme vee ale gbegbe be wo ̀ dɔ asrafowo ɖo ɖe Betlehem kple eƒe nutomewo me be woaɖawu ŋutsuvi siwo kata ̃ xɔ ƒe eve kple esiwo mexɔ nenema haɖe o . Herodes wɔ esia elabena ɣletivimenunyalawo gblɔ nɛ be yewokpɔ ɣletivi la anye ƒe evee nye ma .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Herodes ƒe tamesese ̃ nu si wo ̀ wɔ la wu Yeremia ƒe nyagblɔɖi siawo nu bena ,

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: ” Vevesese ƒe ɣli ɖi tso Rama nutowo me , avifafa kple nublanuiɣli ɖi bobobo ; Rahel nɔ avi dzi hehehe le viawo ta eye naneke mate ŋu afa akɔ nɛ o , elabena viawo kata ̃ tsi yi nu . ”

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Esi Herodes ku la , mawudɔla aɖe va ɖe eɖokui fia Yosef le drɔ ̃ eƒe le Egipte . Egblɔ nɛ be ,

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: ” Tso na ̃ kplɔ ɖevia kple dadaa trɔ yi Israel , elabena ame siwo le ɖevia ƒe agbe yome tim la ku ! ”

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Ale Yosef tso enumake eye wo ̀ kplɔ Yesu kple dadaa trɔ yi Israel .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Ke esi wo ̀ se be Arkelao nɔ dzi ɖum le Yudea ɖe fofoa Herodes teƒe la evɔ ̃ na afi ma yiyi . Woɖee fiae ha ̃ le drɔ ̃ eƒe eya ta eyi Galilea nutome ,

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: ale woyi ɖanɔ Nazaret . Esia wu nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nya sia nu be , “ Woayɔe be Nazaretitɔ . ”

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela dze mawunya gbɔgblɔ gɔme le Yudea gbedzi . Nyati si dzi wo ̀ tu eƒe mawunyawo ɖo lae nye be ,

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: ” Midzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ , mitrɔ ɖe Mawu ŋuti elabena dziƒofiaɖuƒe la gogo vɔ . ”

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Nyagblɔɖila Yesaya gblɔ dɔ si ƒomevi wɔ ge Yohanes le la da ɖi ƒe alafa nanewo va yi , egblɔ be , “ Mese ɣli aɖe tso gbedzi wo ̀ le ɖiɖim bena , ‘ Midzra mɔ ɖo ɖi na Aƒetɔ la eye mido mɔ siwo dzi to ge wo ̀ le la woadzɔ . ’ ”

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Wolɔ ̃ Yohanes ƒe awu si wo ̀ do la kple kposɔfu eye wo ̀ tsɔ la ̃ gbale ̃ lidziblaka tsɔ bla awua dzii , eƒe nuɖuɖue nye ʋetsuviwo kple gbemenyitsi .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Ame geɖewo tso Yerusalem eye bubuwo ha ̃ tso Yɔdan tɔsisi la ƒe gowo dzi kple Yudea nuto me godoo va afi si Yohanes nɔ mawunya gblɔm le la be yewoaɖo toe .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Esi ameawo ʋu woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me la , ede tsi ta na wo le Yɔdan tɔsisi la me .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Ke esi Yohanes kpɔe be Farisitɔwo kple Zadukitɔ geɖewo ha ̃ va be wo ̀ ade mawutsi ta na yewo la , eka mo na wo gblɔ bena , “ Mi dawo ƒe dzidzimeviwo ! Ame kae gblɔ na mi be miate ŋu asi le Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoe kple tohehe si gbɔna la nu ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Miɖee fia to miaƒe agbe nyui nɔnɔ me be mietrɔ dzime vava ̃

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Migabui eye mianɔ gbɔgblɔm na mia ɖokuiwo be ‘ mi ́ a fofoe nye Abraham ’ o . Mele egblɔm na mi be Mawu ate ŋu ana kpe siawo natrɔ zu viwo na Abraham .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Le gaƒoƒo sia me ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , Mawu le klalo bena yeahe to na ame siwo kata ̃ tsi tre ɖe eƒe ɖoɖowo kple sewo ŋu . Mawu ala ̃ ame siawo akɔ ɖi abe ati siwo metse ku o ene eye woafli wo ade dzo me .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Nye la metsɔ tsi le mawutsi dem ta na mi ame siwo dzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ la , gake ame aɖe gbɔna , esi de ŋgɔ wum sa ̃ a ame sia de ŋgɔ ale gbegbe be nyemedze bena manye eƒe subɔvi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . Eya atsɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la kple dzo ade tsi ta na mi .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Ama ame dzɔdzɔewo ɖa tso ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo gbɔ , ke ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo la , atsrɔ ̃ wo kple dzo mavɔ eye wo ̀ adzra ame dzɔdzɔewo ɖo ɖi na agbe mavɔ la . ”

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi me la , Yesu ha ̃ tso le Galilea va Yɔdan tɔsisi la to be Yohanes nade mawutsi ta na ye .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Gake Yohanes medi be yeade tsi la ta nɛ o ke boŋ egblɔ nɛ bena , “ Medze be nye made tsi ta na wo ̀ o . Nye boŋ wo ̀ le be na ̃ de tsi ta na . ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Meɖe kuku de tsia ta nam ko , elabena ele nam be mawɔ nu siwo kata ̃ woɖo da ɖi . ” Ale Yohanes lɔ ̃ de tsia ta nɛ .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Esi wo ̀ de mawutsi ta nɛ vɔ eye wo ̀ nɔ go dom le tsia me la , dziƒo nu ʋu eye Yesu kpɔ Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ , le akpakpa ƒe nɔnɔme me , wo ̀ nɔ ɖiɖim ɖe edzi .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me tututu la , gbe aɖe ɖi tso dziƒo bena , “ Ame siae nye Vinye , si gbɔ nyemelɔ ̃ a nu le o , ame si ƒe nu dzea ŋunye . ”

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la kplɔ Yesu yi gbedzii bena Abosam natee akpɔ .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Yesu tsi nu dɔ le afi sia ŋkeke blaene kple za ̃ blaene , eye emegbe dɔ wui vevie ŋutɔ .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Esi Abosam kpɔ esia la , eva tee kpɔ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nenye wo ̀ e nye Mawu Vi la vava ̃ la , ɖe gbe na kpe siawo be woatrɔ zu abolo na wo ̀ na ̃ ɖu . ”

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Woŋlɔe ɖi be , ‘ Menye abolo ɖeɖe ko ŋu ame nanɔ agbe ɖo o , ke boŋ nya sia nya si Mawu gblɔ la ŋutie . ”

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Azɔ Abosam kplɔe yi Yerusalem du kɔkɔe la me eye wo ̀ tsɔe ɖo gbedoxɔ ƒe tame ke ,

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: hegblɔ nɛ bena , “ Be na ̃ fia be Mawu Vi ne ̀ nye la , ti kpo tso afi sia ne na ̃ dze anyigba elabena , mawunya gblɔ bena , ‘ Mawu adɔ eƒe dɔlawo ɖa bena woaxe wo ̀ le yame be ma ̃ tsɔ wo ̀ afɔ axla ̃ ɖe kpe aɖeke o .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ nɛ bena , “ Woŋlɔ da ɖi ha ̃ be me ̀ gate Aƒetɔ wo ̀ Mawu kpɔ o . ”

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Le esia megbe la , Abosam kplɔ Yesu yi to kɔkɔ aɖe ƒe tsɔ ̃ eƒe ke eye wo ̀ ɖe xexe sia me ƒe dukɔwo kata ̃ kple woƒe atsyɔ ̃ nuwo kata ̃ fiae .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Egblɔ nɛ be , “ Matsɔ nu siawo kata ̃ na wo ̀ nenye be ne ̀ dze klo de ta agu nam pɛ ko . ”

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Yesu blu ɖe Abosam ta bena , “ Satana , te ɖa le gbɔnye , me ̀ se mawunya gblɔ bena , ‘ Aƒetɔ wo ̀ Mawu la ko na ̃ subɔ , eya ko wo ̀ le be na ̃ ɖo toe oa ? ’ ” "

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Ale Abosam gble ̃ e ɖi hedzo , eye mawudɔlawo va egbɔ va subɔe .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Esi Yesu se be wole ́ Yohanes de gaxɔ me la , edzo le Yudea yi wo de le Nazaret si le Galilea ,

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: ke egadzo le afi sia ha ̃ va Kapernaum si te ɖe Galilea ƒua ŋu le Zebulon kple Naftali nutomewo me .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Yesu ƒe afi sia vava wu nya si Yesaya gblɔ da ɖi nu bena , "

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: ” Mi Zebulon kple Naftali , mi anyigba siwo le ƒuta , kpakple anyigba siwo le Yɔdan tɔsisi la godo va se ɖe Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ƒe Galilea ,

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: miawoe nye ame siwo nɔ viviti me tsa ̃ gake fifia la , kekeli ga ̃ aɖe kle ̃ na mi . Mi ame siwo nɔ ku ƒe anyigba dzi , kekeli kle ̃ na mi . ”

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Tso esia dzi la , Yesu de asi gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe me be , “ Midzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ne miatrɔ ɖe Mawu ŋu , elabena dziƒofiaɖuƒe la te tu aƒe vɔ ! ”

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu nɔ tsa ɖim le Galilea ƒua nu la , ekpɔ nɔvi eve aɖewo . Woawoe nye Simɔn , si wogayɔna ha ̃ be Petro kple nɔvia Andrea . Wonɔ asabu dam elabena ɖɔkplɔlawoe wonye .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Yesu yɔ wo gblɔ na wo be , “ Miva dze yonyeme ne mawɔ mi amewo ɖelawo . ”

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Petro kple nɔvia Andrea ɖe asi le asabu la ŋu enumake hekplɔ Yesu ɖo .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Esi wogazɔ yi ŋgɔ vie ko la , Yesu kpɔ nɔviŋutsu eve siwo ŋkɔwoe nye Yakobo kple Yohanes kpakple wo fofo Zebedeo le ʋu me nɔ woƒe ɖɔ vuvuwo sam . Yesu yɔ nɔviŋutsu eveawo ha ̃ be woava dze ye yome .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Yakobo kple Yohanes gble ̃ ʋu la kple wo fofo ɖi hedze Yesu yome enumake .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Yesu tsa le Galilea nutome la kata ̃ me nɔ nu fiam le Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒewo eye afi sia afi si wo ̀ yi ko la eɖea gbeƒa ̃ dziƒofiaɖuƒe ƒe nyanyui la . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , eyɔ dɔ , dɔ ƒomevi vovovo le ́ lawo .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Nukunu ga ̃ geɖe siwo wɔm wo ̀ nɔ la kaka de teƒewo kata ̃ va se ɖe keke Galilea ƒe mlɔe nu ke . Ale dɔnɔwo tso keke Siria ke ha ̃ tɔ ɖɔɖɔɖɔ va egbɔ be wo ̀ ada gbe le yewo ŋu . Eyɔ dɔ dɔ ɖe sia ɖe le ́ lawo , eɖanye la ̃ mevee , tsukuku , la ̃ metutu , kpeŋui , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ nɔ ame me o , eda dɔ siawo kata ̃ .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ dze eyome , eye afi sia afi si wo ̀ to ko la wonɔ eyome kplikplikpli . Ame siawo tso Galilea nutoa me , Yerusalem , Dekapoli kple Yudea godoo , ɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ tso keke Yɔdan tɔsisia ƒe go evelia dzi ke .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi amehawo ganɔ ƒu ƒom ɖe Yesu ŋu la , elia togbɛ aɖe eye wo ̀ nɔ anyi ɖe edzi .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ha ̃ va nɔ egbɔ . Azɔ efia nu wo le afi ma hegblɔ na wo bena , “

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo da ahe le gbɔgbɔ me la , elabena wotsɔ dziƒofiaɖuƒe la na mi .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo ha ̃ le konyi fam la , elabena woafa akɔ na mi !

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo faa tu , miawoe anyi anyigba la ƒe dome .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo wum dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe dɔ kple tsikɔ le la , elabena miawoe aɖi ƒo .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo le nublanui kpɔm na amewo la , elabena miawo woakpɔ nublanui na .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo dza le miaƒe dzi me , elabena miawoe akpɔ Mawu .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , ame siwo le ́ a avu la elabena miawoe woayɔ be Mawu viwo .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi ame siwo yome woti le dzɔdzɔenyenye ta , elabena woawo tɔe nye dziƒofiaɖuƒe la .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: ” Dzi nedzɔ mi nenye be amewo dzu mi , ti mia yome , da alakpa ɖe mia si hegblɔ nya vɔ ̃ bubuwo ɖe mia ŋuti le tanye .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Mikpɔ dzidzɔ eye miatso aseye ! Elabena fetu ga ̃ aɖe le mia lalam le dziƒo . Miɖo ŋku edzi be , nenema ke woti nyagblɔɖila siwo nɔ anyi le blema la yomee

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: ” Miawoe nye anyigba ƒe dze . Ke ne miebu miaƒe dzenyenye la nu ka woagate ŋu awɔ kpli mi ? Ŋudɔwɔnu aɖeke maganɔ mia ŋu o , ɖe ko watsɔ mi aƒu gbe , aɖo afɔ mia dzi .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: Miawoe nye xexeame ƒe kekeli . Womate ŋu aɣla du si le todzi la o .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Ame aɖeke medraa akaɖi tsɔ dea afianu te o , ke boŋ ɖe akaɖiti dzi be wo ̀ akle ̃ na aƒea me nɔla ɖe sia ɖe .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Nenema ke mina miaƒe akaɖiwo nakle ̃ le amewo gbɔ , be woakpɔ miaƒe dɔ nyui wɔwɔ eye woakafu mia Fofo si le dzifo .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: ” Mise eme nyuie be , menye ɖe meva bena mate fli ɖe Mose ƒe seawo kple nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nuxlɔ ̃ amenyawo me o . Gbeɖe , menye nu siawo wɔ gee meva o , ke boŋ ɖe meva be mawu seawo nu eye mafia woƒe nyateƒenyenye .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Mele nyateƒea gblɔm na mi bena , zi ale si dziƒo kple anyigba li la , ŋɔŋlɔ suetɔ kekeake alo nu suetɔ si wotsɔ nuŋlɔti ŋlɔe la , mabu le sea me o va se ɖe esime woawu nu sia nu nu .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Eya ta ne ame aɖe da se siawo ƒe suetɔ kekeake dzi , eye wo ̀ fia amewo ha ̃ be woada edzi la , eyae anye suetɔ kekeake le dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me . Ke ame siwo fia Mawu ƒe seawo eye wowɔna ɖe wo dzi la , woayɔ wo be ga ̃ le dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mele nu xlɔ ̃ m mi be ne miaƒe dzɔdzɔnyenye meƒo Farisitɔwo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe sefialawo tɔ ta sa ̃ a o la , miawo ha ̃ miate ŋu age ɖe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me gbeɖe o !

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: ” Miese be wogblɔ na blematɔwo be , ‘ me ̀ gawu ame o eye ame si awu ame la adze na ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ . ’

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Ke nye la mele egblɔm na mi be , ame si ado dɔmedzoe ɖe nɔvia ŋu la woakplɔe ayi ʋɔnui . Nenema ke ame si agblɔ na nɔvia be , ‘ Me ̀ nyo na naneke o ’ la , woahee va Sanhedrin la ƒe ŋkume . Ke ne ame aɖe agblɔ be , ‘ E ̀ dzɔ la ̃ ! ’ la ayi dzo mavɔ ʋeme .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: ” Ne e ̀ le gbedoxɔ me le vɔsamlekpui ŋgɔ le vɔ sam na Mawu eye ne ̀ ɖo ŋku edzi be dzre aɖe le mi kple nɔviwo aɖe dome la ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: gble ̃ wo ̀ vɔsanu la ɖe vɔsamlekpui la ŋgɔ ne na ̃ yi a ̃ ɖe kuku na nɔviwo ̀ sia , eye na ̃ dzra mi kplii dome ɖo hafi na ̃ va sa vɔ na Mawu .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: Wɔ ɖeka kple wo ̀ futɔ si kplɔ wo ̀ yina ʋɔnui kaba esi miegale mɔa dzi ko . Ne menye nenema o la , atsɔ wo ̀ ade asi na ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la , ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la ha ̃ atsɔ wo ̀ ade asi na asrafomega ̃ eye woade wo ̀ gaxɔ me .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , womaɖe asi le ŋuwo ̀ o , va se ɖe esime na ̃ xe fe ɖe sia ɖe si ne ̀ nyi eye pesewa afa ̃ ha ̃ masusɔ o .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: ” Miese wogblɔ be , ‘ megawɔ ahasi o . ’

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Gake nye ya mele egblɔm na mi bena , ne ŋutsu aɖe kpɔ nyɔnu aɖe eye wo ̀ dzroe la , ewɔ ahasi kplii xoxo le eƒe dzime .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Nenye wo ̀ ŋku ɖusimetɔe nana be ne ̀ wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la , hoe ne na ̃ tsɔe aƒu gbe . Elabena enyo na wo ̀ be na ̃ bu wo ̀ ŋutinuwo dometɔ ɖeka wu be woatsɔ wo ̀ ame bliboa aƒu gbe ɖe dzo mavɔ me .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Nenema ke ne wo ̀ nuɖusie nana be ne ̀ wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la , la ̃ e ne na ̃ tsɔ aƒu gbe . Elabena enyo be na ̃ bu wo ̀ ŋutinuwo dometɔ ɖeka wu be woatsɔ wo ̀ ame bliboa aƒu gbe ɖe dzo mavɔ me .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: ” Wogblɔ ha ̃ be , ‘ Ne ŋutsu aɖe di be yeagbe ye srɔ ̃ la , nena srɔ ̃ gbegbale ̃ e . ’

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Ke nye la mele egblɔm na mi bena , nenye be nyɔnu aɖe mewɔ ahasi o , gake srɔ ̃ a gbee wo ̀ yi ɖaɖe ŋutsu bubu la ekema ŋutsu lae na wo ̀ wɔ ahasi . Eye ŋutsu si agaɖe nenem nyɔnu sia ha ̃ wɔ ahasi .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: ” Miese wogagblɔ na blematɔwo be , ‘ me ̀ gada le atam si ne ̀ ka la dzi o , ke boŋ , wɔ ɖe wo ̀ atam siwo ne ̀ ka na Aƒetɔ la dzi .

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: Gake nye ya , mele egblɔm na mi be : migata nu kura o ! elabena ne e ̀ gblɔ be meta ‘ Dziƒo ’ la , e ̀ dze agɔ , elabena dziƒoe nye Mawu ƒe nɔƒe .

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: Eye ne , e ̀ ta ‘ Anyigba ’ la , e ̀ dze agɔ ake elabena anyigbae nye eƒe afɔɖodzinu . Nenema ke migagblɔ be meta ‘ Yerusalem ’ ha ̃ o ! Elabena Yerusalem enye Fia ga ̃ la ƒe du .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Me ̀ gagblɔ be meta ‘ Nye ta ’ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o , elabena ma ̃ te ŋu atrɔ wo ̀ ɖakui ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ wo ̀ afu alo anyɔ o .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Kpuie ko la mina miaƒe “ E ̃ ” nanye E ̃ ” , “ O ” nanye “ O ’ nu sia nu si miagblɔ wu esia la tso vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la gbɔ .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: ” Miese wogblɔ be , ‘ Ŋku ɖe ŋku teƒe eye aɖu ɖe aɖu teƒe . ’

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Ke nye ya mele egblɔ na mi be : Migaɖo vɔ ̃ , vɔ ̃ teƒe o ! Nenye be ame aɖe ƒo tome na wo ̀ la trɔ tome evelia ha ̃ nɛ be wo ̀ aƒo .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Ne ame aɖe akplɔ wo ̀ ayi ʋɔnui be yeaxɔ wo ̀ awutewui la , na woaxɔ wo ̀ dziwui ha ̃ kpe ɖe eŋu .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Ne ame aɖe azi dziwo ̀ be na ̃ zɔ mɔ kple ye kilomita ɖeka la , zɔ kplii kilomita eve .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Na nu ame si le nu biam wo ̀ eye me ̀ gatrɔ megbe de ame si le didim be yeado nu le asiwo ̀ la o .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: ” Miese wogblɔ bena , ‘ Lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi eye na ̃ le fu wo ̀ ketɔ . ’

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Ke nye la mele egblɔm na mi bena , milɔ ̃ miaƒe futɔwo eye mido gbe ɖa ɖe ame siwo tia mia yome la ta !

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Be mianye mia Fofo si le dziƒo la ƒe viwo , ame si naa eƒe ɣe dzena na ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple ame nyuiwo eye wo ̀ dɔa tsi be wo ̀ adza ɖe ame dzɔdzɔewo kple ame madzɔmadzɔwo siaa dzi .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Ne mielɔ ̃ a ame siwo lɔ ̃ a mi ɖeɖe ko la , wɔwui kae miewɔ ? . Đe nudzɔlawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mewɔna nenema oa : ?

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Ne miedoa gbe na mia nɔviwo ɖeɖe ko la , wɔwui ka wɔm miele wu ame bubuwo ? Đe Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mewɔna nenema oa ?

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Eya ta mizu blibo abe ale si mia Fofo si le dziƒo la le bliboe ene .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: ” Mikpɔ nyuie be miagawɔ miaƒe ‘ dzɔdzɔenyenyedɔwo ’ le amewo ŋkume be woakpɔ o . Ne miewɔe nenema la , miaxɔ fetu aɖeke tso mia Fofo si le dziƒo la gbɔ o .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: ” Eya ta ne miena nu ame dahe aɖe la , migaɖe gbeƒa ̃ e kple kpe ̃ abe ale si alakpatɔwo wɔnae le woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo kple mɔtatawo dzi be amewo nakafu yewo ene o . Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , woxɔ woƒe fetu la kata ̃ xoxo .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Ke ne miena nu ame dahe aɖe la , migana miaƒe miabɔ nanya nu si wɔm miaƒe ɖusibɔ le la o ,

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: ale be miaƒe nunana nanye bebemenu . Ekema mia Fofo si kpɔa nu si wowɔna le bebeme la natu fe na mi

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: ” Ne miele gbe dom ɖa la , migawɔ abe alakpatɔwo ene o , elabena wolɔ ̃ a gbedodoɖa le tsitrenu le ƒuƒoƒewo kple mɔtatawo ƒe dzogoewo dzi be amewo nakpɔ yewo . Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be woxɔ woƒe fetu la kata ̃ xoxo .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Ne e ̀ be yeado gbe ɖa la , yi ɖe wo ̀ xɔme na ̃ tu ʋɔa eye na ̃ do gbe ɖa na Fofowo ̀ , ame si womekpɔna o ekema Fofowo ̀ , ame si kpɔa nu si wowɔna le bebeme la , atu fe na wo ̀ .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: Ne miele gbe dom ɖa la migagblɔ nyawo taŋtaŋ abe Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ene o ; elabena wobuna be yewoaxɔ yewo ƒe ŋuɖoɖo le nya geɖewo gbɔgblɔ ta .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Miganɔ abe woawo ene o , elabena mia Fofo nya nu siwo hia ̃ a mi gɔ ̃ hafi miebianɛ .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: ” Ale miado gbe ɖae nye si , ‘ Mi ́ a Fofo , si le dziƒo , woade bubu wo ̀ ŋkɔ ŋuti ,

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: wo ̀ fiaɖuƒe neva , woawɔ wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ nu le anyigba dzi abe ale si wowɔnɛ le dziƒo ene .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Na nuɖuɖu si mi ́ aɖu egbe la mi .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Tsɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke mi ́ abe ale si mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ etsɔnɛ ke na ame siwo daa vo ɖe mi ́ a ŋuti la ene .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Me ̀ gakplɔ mi ́ yi tetekpɔ me o , ke boŋ ɖe mi ́ tso vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la sime . ’

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: Elabena ne mietsɔ vo siwo amewo da ɖe mia ŋuti ke wo la , ekema mia Fofo si le dziƒo ha ̃ , atsɔ ake miawo ha ̃ .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Ke ne mietsɔ amewo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo o la mia Fofo ha ̃ matsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake mi o .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Ne mietsi nu dɔ la , migayɔ mo lilili abe ale si alakpanuwɔlawo wɔna ene o . Ame siawo yɔa mo lilili , be amewo nakpɔ be yewole nutsitsidɔ me . Mele egblɔm na mi nyateƒetɔe be ame siawo xɔ woƒe fetu blibo la xoxo .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Ke ne miawo mietsi nu dɔ la , midzra mia ɖokui ɖo nyuie abe ɖe miele naneke wɔm o ene ,

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: ale be ame aɖeke naganya be mietsi nu dɔ o , negbe mia Fofo si womekpɔna o gake eya kpɔa nu sia nu si wowɔ le bebeme la eye axe fe na mi

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: ” Migadzra miaƒe kesinɔnuwo ɖo ɖe anyigba dzi afi si agbagblaʋui kple ɣebiale ́ le gble ̃ a nu le eye fiafitɔwo gbaa ʋɔ hefia nu le la o .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Ke boŋ midzra miaƒe kesinɔnuwo ɖo ɖe dziƒo afi si agbagblaʋui kple ɣebiale ́ le megble ̃ a nu le eye fiafitɔwo megbaa ʋɔ hefia nu lena o .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: ” Elabena afi si miaƒe kesinɔnuwo le la , afi ma kee miaƒe dzi ha ̃ anɔ

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: Ŋkue nye akaɖi na ame blibo la , eya ta ne wo ̀ ŋku dzi kɔ la , wo ̀ ame blibo la a ̃ yɔ fu ̃ u kple kekeli .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Ke ne wo ̀ ŋku dzi mekɔ o la , wo ̀ ame blibo la , a ̃ yɔ fu ̃ u kple viviti ekema ne kekeli si le mewo ̀ trɔ zu viviti la , ale ke gbegbe viviti la ase ̃ ŋui !

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: ” Ame aɖeke mate ŋu asubɔ aƒetɔ eve o ; ale ́ fu ɖeka eye wo ̀ alɔ ̃ evelia , alo aku ɖe ɖeka ŋu vevie eye wo ̀ agbe nu le evelia gbɔ . Ma ̃ te ŋu asubɔ Mawu kple Ga siaa o

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: ” Eya ta mele egblɔm na mi bena , migatsi dzimaɖeɖi le miaƒe agbe ŋuti , nu si miaɖu alo miano ŋu o ; alo le miaƒe ŋutila ̃ ŋuti , nu si miata ŋu o . Đe miaƒe agbe mexɔ asi wu nuɖuɖu eye miaƒe ŋutila ̃ mexɔ asi wu nutata oa ?

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Mikpɔ dziƒoxeviwo ɖa , womeƒa ̃ a nu alo ŋea nu alo ƒoa nu nu ƒu ɖe avawo me o . Ke mia Fofo si le dziƒo la naa nuɖuɖu wo . Đe mi amegbetɔwo miexɔ asi sa ̃ a wu dziƒoxeviwo oa ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Mia dometɔ kae ate ŋu ato dzitsitsi me atsɔ gaƒoƒo ɖeka pɛ akpe ɖe eƒe agbe ŋu ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: ” Ekema nu ka ŋutie mietsia dzi ɖe nutata ŋu ? Mikpɔ ale si dzogbenyawo le gbedzi tsinae ɖa . Womewɔa dɔ alo trea ɖeti o .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Ke mele egblɔm na mi be Salomo le eƒe atsyɔ ̃ ɖoɖo me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mede wo dometɔ aɖeke nu le atsyɔ ̃ ɖoɖo me o .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Ke nenye be Mawu ɖoa atsyɔ ̃ na gbe le gbedzi , gbe si nɔa anyi egbe , eye wotsɔnɛ ƒua gbe ɖe dzo me etsɔ la , ɖe mata nu na mi sa ̃ a wu gbe siawo oa , O mi xɔse ʋee tɔwo ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Eya ta migatsi dzi anɔ biabiam be , ‘ Nu ka mi ́ aɖu ? ’ alo ‘ Nu ka miano ? ’ alo , ‘ Nu kae mi ́ ata o ? ’

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Elabena Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo tia nenem nu siawo kata ̃ yome , ke mia Fofo si le dziƒo nyae be nenem nu siawo hia ̃ a mi .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Ke midi eƒe fiaɖuƒe la kple eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye gba ̃ gbiagba ̃ eye woatsɔ nu siawo kata ̃ ha ̃ akpe ɖe eŋuti na mi .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Eya ta migatsi dzi ɖe etsɔ si gbɔna la ŋu o elabena etsɔ si gbɔna la atsi dzi ɖe eɖokui ŋu ; elabena kuxi sɔ gbɔ le ŋkeke sia ŋkeke me xoxo . ”

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: ” Me ̀ gadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame bubuwo o , ne menye nenema o la , woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo ̀ ha ̃ .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Elabena ale si ne ̀ drɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu ame bubuwoe la , nenema tututue woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo ̀ ha ̃ e eye dzidzenu si ŋudɔ ne ̀ wɔ la , dzidzenu ma ke ŋudɔe woawɔ atsɔ adzidze nui na wo ̀ ha ̃ .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: ” Nu ka tae ne ̀ kpɔa ati fefe si ge ɖe nɔviwo ̀ ƒe ŋku dzi gake me ̀ kpɔa atikpo si le wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ ŋku dzi la ya o ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Ale ke wɔ na ̃ gblɔ na nɔviwo ̀ be , ‘ Na maɖe ati fefe le wo ̀ ŋku dzi , ’ le esime atikpo le wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ ŋku dzi ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Wo ̀ , alakpanuwɔla , ɖe atikpo le wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ ŋku dzi gba ̃ ekema a ̃ kpɔ nu nyuie ale be na ̃ te ŋu aɖe ati fefe si le nɔviwo ̀ ƒe ŋku dzi .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: ” Migatsɔ miaƒe nu kɔkɔewo na avuwo o eye migatsɔ miaƒe dzonu xɔasiwo ƒu gbe na hawo o . Ne menye nenema o la , woanya aʋuzi le wo dzi , atrɔ ɖe mia ŋu eye woavuvu mi . ”

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: Mibia nu eye woana mi ; midi nu eye miakpɔe ; miƒo ʋɔa eye woaʋui na mi .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Elabena ame sia ame si biaa nu la , wonanɛ ; ame sia ame si dia nu la , ekpɔnɛ eya ta ne mieƒo ʋɔa ko la , woaʋui na mi .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: ” Mia dometɔ kae li nenye be viaŋutsu bia aboloe la , wo ̀ atsɔ kpe anɛ ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Alo nenye be ebia tɔmela ̃ e la wo ̀ atsɔ da anɛ ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Ke nenye be mi ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo mienya ale si miana nu nyui mia viwo la , ɖe mia Fofo si le dziƒo la , mana nu nyuiwo ame siwo bianɛ geɖe wu oa ?

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: Le nu sia nu me la , nu siwo ke miedina be amewo nawɔ na mi la , miwɔ nenema ke na ame bubuwo ha ̃ elabena esiae nye Se la kple nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nufiafia ƒe taƒonya

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: ” Mige ɖe eme to agbo xaxɛ la me . Elabena agbo la keke , mɔ la ha ̃ le gbadza esi kplɔa ame yina ɖe tsɔtsrɔ ̃ me eye ame geɖewoe le eme tom le gegem ɖe eme .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: Ke agbo si le xaxɛ , mɔ la ha ̃ le bie la , kplɔa amewo yina ɖe agbe me eye ame ʋe aɖewo koe kpɔa mɔ sia . ”

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: ” Mikpɔ nyuie le aʋatso nyagblɔɖilawo ŋuti . Wovaa mia gbɔ abe ale ̃ wo ene , ke le ememe la , wonye amega ̃ xi nyanyrawo .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Woƒe kutsetse miatsɔ adze si woe . Đe woate ŋu agbe waintsetse le aŋɔka dzi alo gbotsetse le ŋuti dzia ?

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Nenema ke ati nyui sia ati nyui tsea ku nyui , ke ati manyomanyo tsea ku gbegble ̃ .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Ati nyui mate ŋu atse ku gbegble ̃ o , eye ati manyomanyo mate ŋu atse ku nyui o .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Ati sia ati si metsea ku nyui o la , wola ̃ nɛ dea dzo me .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Eya ta woƒe kutsetse miatsɔ adze si woe .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ” Menye ame sia ame si le yɔyem be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , Aƒetɔ ’ la ayi dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me o negbe ame siwo le Fofonye si le dziƒo la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu wɔm la koe .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Ame geɖewo agblɔ nam le ŋkeke ma dzi be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , Aƒetɔ , ɖe menye wo ̀ ŋkɔ mee mi ́ egblɔ nya ɖi le , mi ́ enya gbɔgbɔ ʋɔ ̃ wo do goe le , eye mi ́ ewɔ nukunu geɖewo le oa ? ’

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Ekema maɖo eŋu na wo be , ‘ Nyemenya mi o , mite ɖa le gbɔnye , mi nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔlawo ! ’ ”

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: ” Ame siwo kata ̃ sea nye nyawo eye wowɔna ɖe wo dzi la le abe ame si nya nu , tu eƒe xɔ ɖe agakpe sese ̃ dzi ene .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Togbɔ be tsi dza sesi ̃ e , tɔwo ɖɔ eye ahom tu ha ̃ la , xɔa meʋa ̃ o , elabena woɖo egɔme anyi ɖe agakpe sese ̃ dzi .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Gake ame siwo sea nye nyawo ke wometsɔa ɖeke le wo me o la sɔ kple ŋutsu movitɔ si tu eƒe xɔ ɖe ke me .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Azɔ esi tsi dza , tɔwo ɖɔ , eye ahom tu , lɔ xɔ sia ɖe eme ko la , emu dze anyi gbloo ” .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Esi Yesu wu nya siawo gbɔgblɔ nu la , ameha la ƒe nu ku le eƒe nufiafia la ta ,

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: elabena efia nu wo abe ame si si tɔnyenye le ene ke menye abe woƒe sefialawo ene o .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Esi Yesu ɖi tso togbɛa dzi gbɔna la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe kplɔe ɖo hoo .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Kasia anyidzela aɖe zɔ te ̃ va dze klo ɖe ekɔme , eye wo ̀ de ta agu nɛ heɖe kuku nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ne e ̀ lɔ ̃ la , yɔ dɔm ne ŋutinye nakɔ . ”

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Enumake Yesu ka asi ŋutsua ŋu gblɔnɛ bena , “ E ̃ , melɔ ̃ . Ŋutiwo ̀ nekɔ . ” Ale anyidɔ la bu le eŋuti enumake .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Yesu yi dzi gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Me ̀ gatɔ be yeaƒo nu na ame aɖeke o , ke boŋ dze mɔ enumake na ̃ yi Osɔfowo gbɔ be woado wo ̀ akpɔ , eye ne e ̀ yina la tsɔ nunana si Mose ƒe se bia tso anyidɔle ́ la siwo ƒe ŋuti kɔ si la ɖe asi . Esia afia amewo kata ̃ be e ̀ kpɔ dɔyɔyɔ vava ̃ . ”

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Esi Yesu va ɖo Kapernaum la , Roma srafowo ƒe amega ̃ aɖe va egbɔ va ɖe kuku nɛ vevie be wo ̀ akpe ɖe ye ŋu .

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: Egblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ , nye dɔla le la ̃ metutudɔ le ́ m , emlɔ anyi ɖe aƒeme eye wo ̀ le vevesese ga ̃ aɖe me . ”

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Enyo , megbɔna be mada gbe le wo ̀ dɔnɔ la ŋu na wo ̀ . ”

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Ke aʋafia la ya gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Aƒetɔ , nyemedze be na ̃ va nye aƒeme o , eye mehia ̃ be na ̃ va ha ̃ o . Boŋ la , gblɔ nya ɖeka ko eye nye dɔla la ƒe la ̃ me ase ̃ .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Elabena nye ha ̃ mele kpɔkplɔ te eye asrafowo le nye ha ̃ tenye . Mete ŋu gblɔna na ame sia be , ‘ Heyi ’ , eye wo ̀ yina , alo mete ŋu gblɔna na ame kemɛ be , ‘ Va , ’ eye wo ̀ vana . Nenema ke megblɔna na nye subɔvi be , ‘ Wɔ nu si kple ekemɛ ’ eye wo ̀ wɔnɛ .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Yesu ƒe nu ku le aʋafia la ƒe nyawo ŋuti , azɔ etrɔ ɖe ameha la ŋu gblɔ bena , “ Le nyateƒe me la , nyemekpɔ xɔse sia tɔgbi le Israelnyigba dzi kpɔ o .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi bena , ame geɖewo atso xexeame ƒe dzogoe eneawo kata ̃ dzi age ɖe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me , eye woanɔ anyi kple Abraham , Isak kpakple Yakɔb .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ke Israelvi geɖewo , ame siwo wodzra Fiaɖuƒea ɖo ɖi na ya la , woatsɔ wo aƒu gbe ɖe viviti tsiɖitsiɖi la me , afi si avifafa kple aɖukliɖuɖu lanɔ . ”

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Yesu gatrɔ ɖe Romasrafowo ƒe amega ̃ , ŋu azɔ hegblɔ nɛ bena , “ Heyi aƒe me , nu si ne ̀ xɔ se be ate ŋu ava eme la , va eme xoxo . ” " Le ɣeyiɣi si me Yesu nɔ nya siawo gblɔm la , dɔla la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va Petro ƒeme la , ekpɔ Petro lɔ ̃ xo wo ̀ nɔ anyimlɔƒe le ŋudza sese ̃ aɖe le ́ m .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Yesu ka asi eƒe asi ŋu eye eƒe la ̃ me se ̃ enumake . Ale wo ̀ tso yi ɖaɖa nu va ɖo wo kɔme .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Gbe ma gbe ƒe fie ̃ la , wokplɔ ame geɖe siwo gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nɔ fu ɖem na la va Yesu gbɔe , eye ne wo ̀ gblɔ nya ɖeka ko la gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo doa go le ameawo me hesina dzona . Ale dɔnɔwo kata ̃ ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Esia wu nyagblɔɖila Yesaya ƒe nyawo nu be , " “ Etsɔ mi ́ aƒe vevesesewo eye wo ̀ de ta mi ́ aƒe dɔle ́ lewo te . ”

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Esi Yesu va kpɔe bena ame geɖewo ŋutɔ wu ganɔ ye gbɔ vam la , edɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woadi ʋu aɖe vɛ ne yewoatsɔ atso ƒu lae ayi eƒe go evelia dzi .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Hafi wo ̀ aɖe nu le nya sia me la , Yudatɔwo ƒe agbale ̃ fiala aɖe va egbɔ va gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Nufiala , nye la makplɔ wo ̀ ɖo ayi afi sia afi si na ̃ yi la . ”

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Abeiwo la do le wo si wonɔa eme , xeviwo la atɔ le wo si wonɔa eme , gake nye Mesia la , teƒe aɖeke meli maziɔ ta ɖo o . ”

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Ame bubu aɖe si nye eyomedzelawo dometɔ ɖeka la ha ̃ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ɖe mɔ nam mayi aɖaɖi fofonye hafi atrɔ va nɔ yowo ̀ me . ”

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na ame sia ha ̃ bena , “ Dze yonyeme fifia eye na ̃ ɖe asi le ame siwo ku le gbɔgbɔ me la ŋu be woaɖi woƒe ame kukuwo . ”

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Azɔ ege ɖe ʋu aɖe me eye eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dze mɔ ɖo ta ƒua ƒe go evelia dzi .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Kasia , ahom dziŋɔ aɖe de asi tutu me , eye ƒutsotsoewo de asi ŋeŋe me ɖe ʋua me . Le ɣeyiɣi sia kata ̃ me la , Yesu ŋutɔ ya nɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm bɔkɔɔ .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo te ɖe eŋu enumake . Woʋuʋui sesi ̃ e eye , wogblɔ nɛ kple ɣli bena , “ Aƒetɔ , ɖe mi ́ ! Mi ́ ele nyɔnyrɔm ! ”

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ O , mi xɔseʋetɔwo ! Nu ka wɔ miele dzodzom nyanyanya kple vɔvɔ ̃ ale ? ” Azɔ etsi tre eye wo ̀ blu ɖe ahom la ta . Ya sese ̃ la tɔ enumake eye ɖoɖoe zi toŋtoŋtoŋ le ƒua dzi .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒe nu ku ŋutɔ ale wogblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Ame ka gɔ ̃ e nye esia , be yaƒoƒo kple ƒu ha ̃ ɖoa toe maha ̃ ? ”

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Esi wova ɖi go ɖe ƒua ƒe go kemɛ dzi le Gadaratɔwo ƒe anyigba me la ame eve siwo me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo xɔ aƒe ɖo la ƒu du va kpee . Ame eve siawo ƒe nɔƒe enye ameɖibɔ aɖe si le afi ma la me . Ne gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo ɖo mo na wo la wowɔa nu baɖa , baɖawo ale be ame aɖeke megatea ŋu toa afi ma lɔƒo o .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Esi wokpɔ Yesu la wode asi ɣlidodo me be , “ Nu ka dim wo ̀ Mawu Vi ne ̀ le le mi ́ a gbɔ . Đe ne ̀ va be yeawɔ fu mi ́ hafi ɣeyiɣia naɖoa ? ”

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi me la aƒehawo ƒe ha ga ̃ aɖe nɔ nu ɖum le afi ma lɔƒo .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Ale gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo ɖe kuku na Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ne e ̀ nya mi ́ do goe le ame siawo me la na mi ́ ayi aɖage ɖe ha mawo me . ”

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Meɖe mɔ na mi , eya ta mido le ameawo me kaba ! ” Ale gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo do go le ame eveawo me yi ɖage ɖe hawo me , enumake hawo kata ̃ woƒu du sesi ̃ e yi ɖage ɖe atsiaƒu si le afi ma la me doo eye wono tsi ku .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Hakplɔlawo ŋutɔ le ́ du tsɔ sesi ̃ e yi du si te ɖe afi ma ŋu la me eye wogblɔ nu si dzɔ la na dua me tɔwo .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Ale le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko megbe la , dua me tɔwo kata ̃ do bibibi va ƒo zi ɖe Yesu ŋu . Esi wokpɔe la , woɖe kuku nɛ vevie be wo ̀ adzo le yewo ƒe anyigba me .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Yesu gatrɔ ge ɖe ʋua me eye wo ̀ tso ƒua va Kapernaum , si nye wo de du me .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Eɖo afi ma eteƒe medidi hafi ame aɖewo kɔ ŋutsu aɖe si le la ̃ metutudɔ le ́ m la ɖe aba dzi vɛ o . Yesu kpɔ be ameawo ƒe xɔse de to ŋutɔ eya ta egblɔ na dɔnɔa be , “ Vinye , wo ̀ dzi nedze eme elabena wotsɔ wo ̀ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo ̀ . ”

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe agbale ̃ fiala aɖewo siwo nɔ afi ma se nya siwo do le Yesu nu la gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Nu ka ! Ame sia gblɔ busunya . ”

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Yesu nya nu si nɔ woƒe susu me eya ta wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Nu ka tae miele nu baɖa siawo ƒomevi susum ɖo ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: Mibu eŋuti kpɔ be kae le bɔbɔe wu , be woagblɔ na ame sia be , “ Wotsɔ wo ̀ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo ̀ , ” alo woagblɔ nɛ be , “ Tsi tre na ̃ zɔ azɔli ? ”

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Ke azɔ mafia mi bena ŋuse ̃ le nye Mesia la si le anyigba sia dzi be matsɔ nu vɔ ̃ wo ake eye mada gbe le ame sia ŋu atsɔ aɖe ŋuse ̃ sia fia mi . ” Esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya sia vɔ la etrɔ ɖe dɔnɔ la gbɔ gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Tsi tre na ̃ ŋlɔ wo ̀ aba ne na ̃ zɔ ayi aƒeme ! ” "

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Amea tsi tre enumake eye wo ̀ fɔ eƒe nuwo heyi aƒe me .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Nyateƒe , vɔvɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe dze ameha bliboa dzi elabena Yesu wɔ nukunu sia le woawo ŋutɔ ŋkume wokpɔ eye wokafu Mawu be wo ̀ na ŋuse ̃ triakɔ sia tɔgbi amegbetɔ !

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ tsa ɖim le dua me la , eva ke ɖe dugadzɔla aɖe si woyɔna be Mateo la ŋu wo ̀ nɔ afi si wodzɔa duga lena . Yesu yɔe gblɔ nɛ bena , " “ Va dze yonyeme ne na ̃ zu nye nusrɔ ̃ la . ” " Mateo tso enumake eye wo ̀ dze Yesu yome .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Gbe ma gbe fie ̃ la , Mateo kpe Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woava ɖu nu le ye gbɔ . Dugadzɔlawo kple ame baɖa bubuwo ha ̃ nɔ amekpekpeawo dome .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Farisitɔwo kpɔ esia ale wobia Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena , " “ Nu ka ta miaƒe nufiala dea ha kple ame tovowo abe esiawo ene ? ”

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Yesu se nya la eye wo ̀ ɖo eŋu na wo gblɔ be , “ Ame siwo mele dɔ le ́ m o la mehia ̃ atikewɔla o , ke boŋ ame siwo le dɔ le ́ m lae hia ̃ e . ”

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ke miyi miasrɔ ̃ nu si gblɔm mawunya sia le , ‘ Nublanuikpɔkpɔe medi ke menye vɔsa o . Nyemeva be mayɔ ame dzɔdzɔewo o ke boŋ nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo . ”

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va Yesu gbɔ va biae bena , “ Nu ka ta wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo metsia nu dɔna abe ale si mi ́ kple Farisitɔwo mi ́ ewɔna ene o ? ”

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Yesu ha ̃ bia wo bena , “ Đe wo ̀ le be ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la xɔlɔ ̃ wo nanɔ konyi fam , atsi nu adɔ le esime wo ̀ le wo gbɔa ? Ɣeyiɣi li gbɔna esime woakplɔe adzoe le wo gbɔ . Eye le ɣemaɣi me la woagbe nuɖuɖu a ̃ tsi nu adɔ .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: ” Womate ŋu atsɔ avɔnuɖeɖi yeye aka avɔ vuvu o , ne wowɔe alea la , avɔ yeye la aho ɖa le teƒea eye teƒe si vuvu la akeke ɖe edzi wu .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Nenema ke womekɔa aha yeye ha ̃ ɖe la ̃ gbale ̃ golo xoxo me o . Ne wowɔ esia la , aha yeyea ƒe ŋuse ̃ awɔe be la ̃ gbale ̃ golo la awo eye ahaa kple goe la kata ̃ dome agble ̃ . La ̃ gbale ̃ golo yeye ko me woate ŋu akɔ aha yeye ɖo . Ekema aha la kple la ̃ gbale ̃ golo la kata ̃ woanɔ dedie . ”

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Le esime Yesu nɔ nya siawo gblɔm la , Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe ƒe amega ̃ aɖe va egbɔ va dze klo ɖe eŋkume hede ta agu nɛ . Egblɔ na Yesu bena , “ Vinye nyɔnuvi ku fifi laa gake mexɔe se be a ̃ te ŋu ana wo ̀ agagbɔ agbe nenye be e ̀ va ka asi eŋu ko . ”

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dze mɔ ɖo ta amega ̃ la ƒeme enumake .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Esime wonɔ mɔa dzi la , nyɔnu aɖe si nɔ ʋusisidɔ le ́ m ƒe wuieve sɔŋ la va ka asi eƒe awu to ,

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: elabena egblɔ le eɖokui me bena , “ Nenye be meka asi eƒe awu to teti ko la nye la ̃ me ase ̃ . ”

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe eŋu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Vinyɔnuvi wo ̀ dzi nedze eme ! Wo ̀ xɔse la da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ . ” Tso gbe ma gbe ko la nyɔnua ƒe dɔa vɔ nɛ keŋ .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Esi Yesu va ɖo amega ̃ la ƒeme la , ekpɔ be amewo nɔ avi fam hoo eye wonɔ kuteƒehawo ha ̃ dzim .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Yesu gblɔ bena , “ Mina ame siawo kata ̃ nado go le xɔa me , elabena ɖevia meku o , alɔ ̃ ko dɔm wo ̀ le . ” " Ame siwo se nya sia la , ɖu fewu le eŋu eye ɖewo ha ̃ koe .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Wonya ameha la do goe mlɔeba . Yesu yi afi si wotsɔ ɖevia mlɔe eye wo ̀ le ́ eƒe alɔnu . Nyɔnuvia nyɔ enumake , eti kpo ɖi le aba la dzi eye eƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Nukunu sia kaka ɖe nutome blibo la kata ̃ me le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko megbe .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Le esime Yesu do go le aƒea me yina la , ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ eve kplɔe ɖo henɔ ɣli dom bena , " “ O , Fia David Vi la , kpɔ nublanui na mi ́ . ”

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Wokplɔe ɖo yi aƒe si me wo ̀ ge ɖo , tete Yesu trɔ ɖe wo ŋu bia wo bena , “ Miexɔe se be mate ŋu aʋu ŋku na mia ? ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̃ , Aƒetɔ ”

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Ale Yesu tɔ asi woƒe ŋkuwo hegblɔ bena , “ Ava eme na mi abe alesi miexɔe se ene . ”

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Enumake woƒe ŋkuwo ʋu eye wode asi nukpɔkpɔ me nyuie . Yesu de se na wo vevie bena womegagblɔ nu si yewɔ na wo la na ame aɖeke o . "

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Ke ameawo mewɔ ɖe Yesu ƒe didi dzi o ke boŋ esi wodo ɖe ablɔ dzi ko la , wokaka nu si wo ̀ wɔ na wo la eye eƒe ŋkɔ ɖi hoo le du bliboa me .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ dzodzom le afi ma la , wokplɔ ŋutsu aɖe si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ nɔ eye metea ŋu ƒoa nu o la , vɛ nɛ .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Yesu nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la do goe le amea me eye wo ̀ de asi nuƒoƒo me enumake . Nu sia wɔ nuku na ameha la ŋutɔ ale wogblɔ na wo nɔewo be , womekpɔ esia tɔgbi kpɔ le Israel o .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Ke Farisitɔwo ya gblɔ bena , " “ Nu si ta wo ̀ te ŋu nyaa gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ woe nye be , Satana si nye gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ƒe fia la le eya ŋutɔ me . ”

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Yesu tsa le kɔƒe kple du siwo le nuto ma me la me kpe ɖo , enɔ mawunya gblɔm le Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒewo eye wo ̀ nɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem Fiaɖuƒe la ƒe nyanyui la ha ̃ . Eye afi sia afi si wo ̀ yi la , eda gbe le dɔ vovovo le ́ lawo ŋu .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Ameawo ƒe nu wɔ nublanui nɛ ŋutɔ elabena nu geɖewo nɔ fu ɖem na wo ke womenya nu si woawɔ o . Đe ko wonɔ abe ale ̃ ha si kplɔla meli na o la ene .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Yesu gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Agblemenukuawo sɔ gbɔ ŋutɔ gake dɔwɔlawo mesɔ gbɔ kura o !

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Eya ta mibia agbletɔa be wo ̀ adɔ dɔwɔla geɖewo ɖa be woawɔ dɔ le eƒe agblewo me . ”

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Yesu yɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ƒo ƒui eye wo ̀ na ŋuse ̃ wo bena woanya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le amewo me eye woada dɔ sia dɔ ƒomevi .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ƒe ŋkɔwoe nye : Simɔn , ame si woyɔna ha ̃ be Petro , Andrea , Petro nɔvi , Yakobo kple nɔvia Yohanes , ame siwo nye Zebedeo viwo ,

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Filipo , Bartolomeo , Toma , Mateo , nudzɔla , Yakobo , Alfeo vi , Tadeo ,

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Simɔn , ame si nye Zelote dunyaheha sese ̃ aɖe me nɔla , kple Yuda Iskariɔt , ame si va dee asi .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Yesu dɔ wo kple gbedeasi sia bena , “ Migayi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo kple Samariatɔwo gbɔ o ,

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: ke boŋ miyi Israelvi siwo nye Mawu ƒe ale ̃ bubuwo ko gbɔ .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Miyi miagblɔ na wo be , dziƒofiaɖuƒe la va ɖo vɔ .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Mida gbe le dɔnɔwo ŋu , migbɔ agbe ame kukuwo , mina anyidzelawo ŋuti nakɔ , eye minya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo do goe le amewo me . Mina nu amewo faa abe ale si wona mi ene !

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: ” Migatsɔ ga aɖeke ɖe asi le miaƒe mɔzɔzɔ me o ,

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: migatsɔ mɔzɔkotoku kple awu bubuwo ha ̃ ɖe asi o , eye migatsɔ afɔkpa alo atizɔti teti ha ̃ o , elabena ame siwo ŋu miakpe ɖo la woawo ha ̃ akpɔ mia dzi .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Nenye be miege ɖe du alo kɔƒe aɖe me la , midi mawuvɔ ̃ la aɖe mianɔ eƒe aƒeme va se ɖe esime miadzo ayi du bubu me .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Nenye be miege ɖe aƒe aɖe me la , mido gbe na ameawo eye miabia dzeƒe ɖokuibɔbɔtɔe .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Nenye be aƒea me tɔwo nye mawuvɔ ̃ lawo vava ̃ la , miyra wo , ke ne womele nenema o la migayra wo o .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Ne du aɖe me tɔwo alo aƒe aɖe me tɔwo mexɔ mi o eye womeɖo to mi o la , miʋuʋu miaƒe afɔke ɖe teƒea ne miadzo .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , anɔ bɔbɔe na Sodom kple Gomoratɔwo le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la tsɔ wu ame siawo ƒomevi ”

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: Mele mia dɔm abe ale ̃ wo ene ɖo ɖe amegaxi nyanyra ̃ wo dome . Midze aye abe dawo ene eye midza abe akpakpawo ene .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Mikpɔ mia ɖokuiwo dzi nyuie le amewo ŋuti ! Elabena woale ́ mi adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu mi eye woaƒo mi le woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: E ̃ , le tanye la , woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu mi le fiawo kple mɔmefiawo ŋkume . Ke esia anye mɔnukpɔkpɔ na mi bena miagblɔ nyanyui la na wo , kple xexeame kata ̃ .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: ” Nenye be wole ́ mi , kplɔ mi yi ʋɔnui la , migatsi dzi le nu si miagblɔ ŋuti o , elabena woade nya si tututu wo ̀ le be miagblɔ la susu me na mi le ɣeyiɣi ma me .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Elabena menye mia ŋutɔwoe aƒo nu o , ke boŋ mia Fofo si le dziƒo la ƒe Gbɔgbɔe le nu ƒo ge to mia dzi .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: ” Mele egblɔm na mi bena , nɔvi ahe nɔvi ade ku me , eye vi fofo ade ye ŋutɔ via asi . Đeviwo atsi tre ɖe woawo ŋutɔ dzilawo ŋuti eye woahe wo ade ku me .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Ame sia ame ale ́ fu mi elabena mienye tɔnyewo . Ke mia dometɔ siwo anɔ tsitre sesi ̃ e va se ɖe nuwuwua la akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: ” Nenye be woti mia yome le du aɖe me la misi yi du bubu me ! Nye Mesia la , matrɔ agbɔ hafi miawu tsatsa le Israel duwo kata ̃ me nu .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Minyae be sukuvi menyaa nu wua eƒe nufiala o . Nenema ke subɔla mewua eƒe aƒetɔ o .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Ne nya aɖe dzɔ ɖe nufiala aɖe dzi la eƒe sukuvi la ha ̃ dzie nye ma wo ̀ dzɔ ɖo . Nenema ke ne nya aɖe dzɔ ɖe Aƒetɔ aɖe dzi la , eƒe subɔvi ha ̃ le eme . Eye esi wo ̀ nye be woyɔ Nye , Aƒea dzi kpɔla be Satana ɖe , aleke woayɔ miawoe

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Migavɔ ̃ ame siwo ado ŋɔdzi na mi la o . Elabena ŋkeke li gbɔna esi dzi woƒe adzame ɖoɖo vɔ ̃ wo adze le gagla ̃ gbe eye ame sia ame akpɔ nyateƒe la adze sii .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
