text2: ” Nya siwo gblɔm mele na mi le bebeme la migblɔ wo kple ɣli le gagla ̃ gbe . Ne mede gbe to me na mi la , miɖe gbeƒa ̃ e .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: ” Migavɔ ̃ na ame siwo ate ŋu awu miaƒe ŋutila ̃ ke womate ŋu awu miaƒe gbɔgbɔ o la gbeɖe o ! Mivɔ ̃ Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ ame si si ŋuse ̃ le be wo ̀ awu ŋutila ̃ kple gbɔgbɔ la siaa le dzomavɔ me .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: Nenie enye atsutsrɔe ɖeka ƒe home ? Menye pesewa ɖeka pɛ ye oa ? Ke wo dometɔ ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ meli si ta mia Fofo la mekpɔna o .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Miaƒe taɖa kata ̃ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ƒe xexle ̃ me le nyanya me na Mawu .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Eya ta migatsi dzi ɖe naneke ŋu o , miawo la miexɔ asi na Mawu tsɔ wu atsutsrɔewo . ” Ame sia ame si aʋu menye le dutoƒo la , nye ha ̃ maʋu eme le Fofo la gbɔ le dziƒo .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ke ne ame aɖe gbe nu le gbɔnye le dutoƒo la , nye ha ̃ magbe nu le egbɔ le Fofonye gbɔ le dziƒo .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: ” Migabu xaa bena meva be mahe ŋutifafa va anyigba dzi o . Nyemeva be mahe ŋutifafa vɛ o ke boŋ yie metsɔ vɛ ,

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: elabena meva be mana , ŋutsu natso ɖe fofoa ŋu , vinyɔnu natso ɖe dadaa ŋu eye lɔ ̃ xoyɔvi natso ɖe lɔ ̃ xoa ŋu .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Ame ƒe futɔwo anye eya ŋutɔ ƒe aƒemetɔwo . ’

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Nenye be mielɔ ̃ mia dadawo kple mia fofowo tsɔ wum la ekema miedze be mianye tɔnyewo o , nenema ke ne mielɔ ̃ mia vinyɔnuwo kple mia viŋutsuwo tsɔ wum la , miedze be mianye tɔnyewo o .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Ne ame aɖe gbe metsɔ eƒe atitsoga dze yonyeme o la eya ha ̃ medze anye tɔnye o .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: ” Nenye be ame aɖe ku ɖe eƒe agbe ŋuti vevie la , abui ke ne ame aɖe tsɔ eƒe agbe na ɖe tanye la , akpɔe le nuwuwua .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: ” Ne ame aɖe xɔ mi nyuie la nyee wo ̀ xɔ . Eye ne ame aɖe xɔm la exɔ Mawu si dɔm ɖa .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Nenye be miexɔ nyagblɔɖila aɖe be enye Mawu ƒe ame la , woana fetu si ƒomevi woana nyagblɔɖila la ke miawo ha ̃ , eye nenye be miexɔ ame nyui siwo vɔ ̃ a Mawu le wo ̀ ƒe dzadzɛnyenye ta la woana fetu si woana woawo ha ̃ mi .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Ne ame aɖe ana tsi fafɛ kplu ɖeka ame gblɔe siawo dometɔ ɖeka , be enye nye nusrɔ ̃ la ta la , mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , eƒe fetu matsi eŋu o . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Esi wo ̀ de se na nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo alea vɔ megbe la , Yesu ŋutɔ dze mɔ nɔ mawunya gblɔm le duwo me nɔ yiyim , abe ale si wo ̀ ɖoe da ɖi ene .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela , ame si nɔ gaxɔ me le ɣeyiɣi siawo me la se nukunu gbogbo siwo kata ̃ Mesia la nɔ wɔwɔm . Le esia ta edɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo ɖe Yesu gbɔ be woabiae be ,

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: ” Wo ̀ tututue nye ame si ƒe vava mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm na loo alo ame bubu aɖe gali gbɔna ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Wova bia nya sia Yesu eye wo ̀ ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Mitrɔ yi Yohanes gbɔ ne miagblɔ nukunu siwo kata ̃ mewɔ miekpɔ la nɛ .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Migblɔ nɛ be , meʋu ŋku na ŋkunɔwo , mena be tekunɔwo alo bafawo le azɔli zɔm , anyidzelawo ŋuti kɔ eye tokunɔwo le nu sem , nenema ke mena be ame kukuwo le agbe gbɔm , migblɔ ale si mele nyanyui la gblɔm na ame dahewoe la ha ̃ nɛ .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Migblɔ nya sia ha ̃ nɛ be , ‘ Woayra ame siwo xɔa dzinye sena ɖikeke manɔmee . ’ ”

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Esi Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ dzodzom la , Yesu dze nuƒoƒo na ameha la tso Yohanes ŋu gɔme be , “ ‘ Nu ka miedo go yi gbedzi be miakpɔ ? Aƒla si ya le ƒoƒoma ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Ne mele eme nenema o la , nu kae miedo go be miakpɔ ? Ame si do awu nyuiwoa ? Ao , ame siwo do awu nyuiwo la le fiasa ̃ wo me .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Ekema nu kae miedo go ɖakpɔ ? Nyagblɔɖila aɖea ? E ̃ , gake mele egblɔm na mi be ewu nyagblɔɖila gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Elabena Yohanes enye ame si ŋu woŋlɔ ɖi le be , ‘ Madɔ nye dɔla ɖe ŋgɔwo ̀ , ame si adzra wo ̀ mɔ ɖo hafi na ̃ va . ’

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: ” Enye nyateƒe be , le amegbetɔƒomea kata ̃ dome la , ame aɖeke mede ŋgɔ wu Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela o . Ke megale egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi ha ̃ be , ame suetɔ kekeake si le dziƒofiaɖuƒea me la kɔ wu eya amea !

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Tso Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ƒe ŋkekewo me va se ɖe fifia la , dziƒoƒiaɖuƒe la le ŋgɔ yim ŋuse ̃ tɔe eye ŋkumesese ̃ tɔwoe le eham .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Elabena se la , kple nyagblɔɖilawo kata ̃ va se ɖe Yohanes dzi gblɔe ̃ da ɖi ,

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: eye ne miedi be yewoaxɔ nya siwo gblɔm mele la , ekema minyae be , Yohanes enye Eliya , ame si nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ be ava do ŋgɔ .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ne ame aɖe le klalo be yease nu la , nesee azɔ !

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: ” Aleke magblɔ tso dukɔ sia ŋuti ? Ame siawo le abe ɖevi siwo le fefem hele gbɔgblɔm na wo nɔewo be ,

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: ‘ Mi ́ edzi dzidzɔhawo na mi gake miekpɔ dzidzɔ o , eya ta mi ́ edzi kuhawo gake miefa konyi ha ̃ o ! ’

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela menoa wain teti ha ̃ o , eye wo ̀ tsia nu dɔna zi geɖe , gake miegblɔ be , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le eme .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Ke nye Mesia la , meɖua nu , noa nu , eye miawo ke miegblɔ tso ŋunye be , nutsuɖula kple ahatsunolae wo ̀ nye , eye wo ̀ dea ha kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ! “ Ke Mawu ƒe nunya tsoa afia na eɖokui to eƒe nuwɔnawo me . ”

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Azɔ Yesu he nya ɖe du siwo me wo ̀ wɔ eƒe nukunu geɖewo le la ŋu elabena wogbe be yewomaxɔ Mawu dzi se o .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Egblɔ le wo ŋu be , “ Baba na mi , Korazin kple Betsaida ! Elabena ɖe wo ̀ nye Tiro kple Sidɔn siwo nye du vɔ ̃ ɖiwo la mee mewɔ nukunu siwo mewɔ le miaƒe ablɔwo me le la , ne du mawo me tɔwo tsɔ ɖokuibɔbɔ kple vevesese dzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ xoxo .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la anɔ bɔbɔe na Sidɔn kple Tiro le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la tsɔ wu mi !

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Eye wo ̀ Kapernaum , togbɔ be wode bubu ga ̃ aɖe ŋuwo ̀ ha ̃ la , a ̃ yi dzomavɔ la me , elabena nenye Sodom ye mewɔ nukunu klitsu siwo mewɔ le mewo ̀ le la , ne wometsrɔ ̃ dua o ke boŋ anɔ anyi va se ɖe egbe .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , anɔ bɔbɔe na Sodom le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la tsɔ wu wo ̀ . ”

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me , Yesu do gbe ɖa bena , “ O Fofonye , dziƒo kple anyigba ƒe Aƒetɔ , meda akpe na wo ̀ bena ne ̀ ɣla nyateƒe la ɖe ame siwo bu wo ɖokuiwo nunyala ga ̃ woe , ke ne ̀ ɖe nu siawo fia ɖevi suewo .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: E ̃ , Fofo meda akpe be edze ŋuwo ̀ be na ̃ wɔe nenema ! ”

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Egblɔ yi edzi be , “ Fofonye tsɔ nu siwo kata ̃ nye nyateƒe la de asi nam . Fofo , la koe nya ame si ƒomevi Vi la nye , eye Vi la kple ame siwo Vi la ɖee fia la koe nya Fofo la . ” Agbagbadzelawo kpekpe .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Mite va gbɔnye mi ame siwo ŋu ɖeɖi te eye agba le mia wum la eye nye la mana miadzudzɔ .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Mitsɔ nye kɔkuti la ɖo mia ɖokui dzi eye miasrɔ ̃ nu le gbɔnye , elabena mefa , mebɔbɔ ɖokuinye ɖe anyi le dzime , eye miaƒe luʋɔwo agbɔ ɖe eme .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Elabena nye kɔkuti la tsɔtsɔ le bɔbɔe eye nye agba la le wodzoe . ”

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo zɔ to bligble aɖewo me yina afi aɖe . Gbe ma gbe nye Sabat ŋkeke . Dɔ nɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo wum ɣemaɣi eya ta woŋe bli aɖewo eye wokle ̃ wo heɖu .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Farisitɔ aɖewo kpɔ wo eye wohe nya ɖe Yesu ŋu gblɔ bena , “ Wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo le sea dzi dam . Elabena wole nu ŋem le Sabat ŋkeke dzi . ”

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Ke Yesu bia wo be , “ Miexle ̃ nu si Fia David kple eŋutimewo wɔ esi dɔ wu wo la oa ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Eya kple eŋutimewo yi gbedoxɔ me , eye woɖu abolo tɔxɛ si wo ̀ le be Osɔfowo ko naɖu la .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Miexle ̃ e le Mose ƒe segbale ̃ a me kpɔ be Osɔfo siwo le dɔ wɔm le gbedoxɔ me la kpɔ mɔ awɔ dɔ le Sabat ŋkekea dzi oa ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , ame aɖe le afi sia si de ŋgɔ boo wu gbedoxɔ sia !

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Mawunya aɖe gblɔ be , ‘ Nublanuikpɔkpɔ dim mele tso mia gbɔ ke menye miaƒe vɔsawo o . ’ Ne ɖe miese mawunya sia gɔme la anye ne miahe nya ɖe ame siwo medze agɔ o la ŋu o .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Elabena Amegbetɔ Vi la , nye Aƒetɔ na Sabat ŋkekea gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Le esia megbe la , eyi Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: eye wo ̀ kpɔ ame aɖe si titi le ́ asi na le afi ma . Farisitɔ siwo nɔ afi ma la biae enumake bena , “ Ele sea nu be woada gbe le ame ŋu le Sabat ŋkekea dzia ? ” Wonɔ mɔ kpɔm be aɖo eŋu be “ E ” , ale be yewoale ́ e .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Ke Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Nenye be wo ̀ ale ̃ ge ɖe vudo me le Sabat ŋkeke dzi ɖe ma ̃ ɖee le eme oa ? A ̀ ɖee le eme godoo !

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Ke ɖe amegbetɔ ƒe agbe mele vevie tsɔ wu ale ̃ tɔ oa ? Eya ta enyo vava ̃ be woawɔ dɔ nyui le Sabat ŋkekea dzi . ”

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Azɔ egblɔ na ame si titi le ́ asi na bena , “ Dzɔ wo ̀ asi ” , eye esi wo ̀ dzɔe la , eƒe asi gaɖɔ ɖo abe evelia ene .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Le nu si Yesu wɔ ta la , Farisitɔwo yɔ takpekpe kpata aɖe bena yewoawɔ ɖoɖo ɖe ale si yewoawɔ ale ́ e awu ŋuti .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Yesu nya susu vɔ ̃ si ɖom Farisitɔawo nɔ eya ta edzo le ƒuƒoƒea , ke ame geɖewo kplɔe ɖo hoo eye wo ̀ da gbe le dɔnɔ siwo kata ̃ le wo dome la ŋu .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Ke exlɔ ̃ nu wo vevie be womegagblɔ nukunu siwo wɔm yele la na amewo o .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Esia wu Yesaya ƒe nya si wo ̀ gblɔ ɖi tso eŋuti nu bena ,

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: “ Nye kɔ na ̃ kpɔ nye Dɔla la ɖa , kpɔ ame sia ɖa , eyae nye nye Ametiatia la . Eyae nye nye Lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ , si ŋu nye luʋɔ kpɔa dzidzɔ le . Made nye Gbɔgbɔ eme eye wo ̀ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu dukɔwo .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Mewɔa dzre alo doa ɣli o , eye me ̀ le eƒe gbe se ge le ablɔwo dzi ha ̃ o !

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Mewɔa fu ame gblɔewo alo tsia woƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ suetɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ nu o . Le eƒe dziɖuɖu mlɔetɔ me la , atsi dzrehehe ɖe sia ɖe nu .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Eye eƒe ŋkɔ anye xexeame kata ̃ ƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ . ”

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Azɔ wokplɔ ame aɖe , si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le , eye wo ̀ nye ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ kple aɖetututɔ la va Yesu gbɔe eye wo ̀ da gbe le eŋu ale be wo ̀ te ŋu nɔ nu ƒom henɔ nu kpɔm nyuie ha ̃ .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Nukunu sia wɔ moya na ameha la ale gbegbe be wodo ɣli gblɔ be , “ Alo ame siae nye David Vi la ? ”

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Esi Farisitɔwo se nukunu si Yesu wɔ la wogblɔ le wo ɖokuiwo me be , “ Ame sia tea ŋu nyaa gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le amewo me to Belzebub si nye gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ƒe fia la ƒe ŋuse ̃ me . ”

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Yesu nya nu si gblɔm wonɔ eya ta eɖo ŋu na wo bena , “ Fiaɖuƒe si ma ɖe akpa eve eye wotsi tre ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu la azu aƒedo . Eye du alo aƒe si ma hetsi tre ɖe ye ŋutɔ ɖokui ŋu la agba ̃ .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Nenye be Satana gale Satana nyam le amewo me la , ekema eya ha ̃ tsi tre ɖe eya ŋutɔ ɖokui ŋu . Ale ke lawɔ eƒe fiaɖuƒe la anɔ te maha ̃ ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Ne miele gbɔgblɔm be mele gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyam kple Satana ƒe ŋuse ̃ ɖe , ŋuse ̃ kae miaƒe amewo ya za ̃ na ne wole gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyam ? Miaƒe amewo boŋ neɖo nya si mietsɔ ɖe ŋutinye la ŋu na mi .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Nenye be Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔe metsɔ le gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyami la , ekema minyae be mawufiaɖuƒe la va ɖo mia dome .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Nenye be ame aɖe di be yeagba ̃ satana ƒe fiaɖuƒe la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ ale ́ satana abla ɖe ka me gba ̃ . Eye mɔ sia dzi koe wo ̀ ate ŋu ato anya eƒe gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le amewo me .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Misee be ame si mele dzinye o la tsi tre ɖe ŋunye , eye ame si meƒoa ƒu nuwo kplim o la eyae kanɛ hle ̃ na . Nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ɖe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ŋu

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Eya ŋuti mele egblɔm na mi be woatsɔ nu vɔ ̃ sia nu vɔ ̃ kple busunya sia busunya ake amewo , ke busunya ɖe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ŋu ya la womatsɔe ake o .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ne ame aɖe agblɔ nya ɖe Amegbetɔvi la ŋuti la woatsɔe akee , ke ne ame aɖe agblɔ nya ɖe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ŋuti la womatsɔe akee le agbe sia kple agbe si le vava ge la me o . Wotsɔa ati ɖe sia ɖe ƒe kutsetse tsɔna dzea sii . Ati nyui la , ku nyui wo ̀ tsena eye ati manyomanyo ha ̃ tsea ku manyomanyo .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Mi , da ƒe dzidzimeviwo ! Aleke mi ame vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo miate ŋu agblɔ nya nyui aɖe ? Elabena nya sia nya si ame gblɔna la tso eƒe dzi me .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Ame nyui ƒe nuƒo fiana be nu nyui wɔwɔ yɔ eƒe dzi me . Ke ame vɔ ̃ ɖi ya ƒe dzi me yɔna fu ̃ kple nu vɔ ̃ , eye eƒe nuƒo ɖea vɔ ̃ ɖivɔ ̃ ɖinyenye sia fiana .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ana akɔnta le nya vlo ɖe sia ɖe si ado tso eƒe nu me la ŋu le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Eya ta minyae bena nya si ado tso miaƒe nume fifia lae afia afi si mianɔ le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la eye eyae woatsɔ atso afia na mi loo , alo woatsɔ abu fɔ mi . ’ ”

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Tete Yudatɔwo ƒe agbale ̃ fialawo kple Farisitɔ aɖewo bia tso esi be , “ Nufiala , mi ́ edi dzesi kple nukunu aɖe tso gbɔwo ̀ . ”

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Dzidzime vɔ ̃ ɖi , wɔahasi le dzesi kple nukunu dim . Ke ɖeke meli wu nyagblɔɖila Yona ƒe dzesi la o .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Elabena ale si Yona nɔ tɔmela ̃ ga ̃ la ƒe dɔme ŋkeke etɔ ̃ kple za ̃ etɔ ̃ ene la , nenema ke nye Amegbetɔ Vi la ha ̃ manɔ anyigba ƒe tume ŋkeke etɔ ̃ kple za ̃ etɔ ̃ .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la , Ninivetɔwo atsi tre ɖe dukɔ sia ŋuti eye woabu fɔ mi . Elabena esi Yona gblɔ mawunya na wo la wotrɔ dzime , ɖe asi le woƒe nu tovowo wɔwɔ ŋu hetrɔ ɖe Mawu gbɔ . Ke azɔ la , ame aɖe le mia dome si de ŋgɔ wu Yona boo gake miegbe be yewomaxɔ edzi ase o .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Fianyɔnu si tso Sheba la atsi tre ɖe dukɔ sia ŋu le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe eye wo ̀ abu fɔe , elabena exa ɖe Salomo ƒe nunya ta tso didiƒe ke va egbɔ bena yease eƒe nufiamenyawo , ke azɔ ame aɖe si kɔ wu Salomo la le mia dome .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Ne gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ aɖe do go le ame aɖe me la , eyina gbedzi afi si wo ̀ tsana le ɣeyiɣi aɖe sinu nɔa sitsoƒe dim , ke ne mekpɔ ɖeke o la ,

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: ekema egblɔna be , ‘ Matrɔ agayi aƒe si me medo le la boŋ ’ Ne etrɔ va la ekpɔna be aƒea me ɖi gbɔlo , wokplɔ eme nyuie eye nu sia nu le ɖoɖo nu .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Ekema gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la yina ɖayɔa gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ adre bubu siwo vlo wu eya ŋutɔ , eye wogena ɖe aƒea me nɔa afi ma . Esia wɔnɛ be amea ƒe nɔnɔme vɔ ̃ ɖina wu tsa ̃ tɔ . Alea tututue wo ̀ anɔ na dzidzime vɔ ̃ ɖi siae . ”

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Esi Yesu ganɔ nu ƒom na ameha la , dadaa kple nɔviaŋutsuwo nɔ aƒea godo eye wonɔ didim be yewoaƒo nu kplii .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Ame aɖe gblɔe nɛ be , “ Dawo ̀ kple nɔviwo ̀ ŋutsuwo le egodo le didim be yewoaƒo nu kpli wo ̀ . ”

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Yesu bia amea be , “ Ame kae nye danye eye ame kawoe nye nɔvinyeŋutsuwo ? ”

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Azɔ edo asi ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ gblɔ bena , “ Mikpɔ ame siawo ɖa ! Woawoe nye danye kple nɔvinyeŋutsuwo . ”

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Eyi edzi be , “ Ame si le Fofonye si le dziƒo la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu wɔm lae nye danye , nɔvinyeŋutsu kple nɔvinyenyɔnu . ”

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Gbe ma gbe Yesu do go tso aƒea me yi ɖanɔ anyi ɖe ƒua nu .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe gaƒo ƒu ɖe eŋu ale gbegbe be ege ɖe ʋu aɖe me eye wo ̀ yi ɖe ƒua dzi vie bɔbɔ nɔ anyi ke ameha la tɔ ɖe ƒua ta .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Egblɔ nya geɖewo na wo to lododo me be , “ Agbledela aɖe yi nuku wu ge .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nukua wum la , ɖewo ge ɖe mɔ to eye xeviwo va fɔ wo mi .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Đewo ha ̃ ge ɖe kpenyigba dzi afi si ke sue aɖe ko nɔ , nuku siawo tsi vlɔvlɔvlɔ ,

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: gake esi ŋdɔ ʋu ɖe wo dzi la , woyrɔ eye woku elabena woƒe kewo mede to o .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Nuku bubuwo ge ɖe ŋu me , eye ŋu vu tsyɔ wo dzi woku .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Ke nuku aɖewo ha ̃ ge ɖe anyigba nyuitɔ la dzi , eye womie tsi hetse ku geɖewo , ɖewo tse blaetɔ ̃ , bubuwo tse blaade eye ɖewo ha ̃ tse alafa .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ne tosenu li na mi la , mise nya siawo . ”

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ va biae bena , “ Nu ka ta ɣesiaɣi ko ne ̀ nɔa nu fiam amewo to Lododo me ɖo ? ”

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Eɖe eme na wo bena Mi nusrɔ ̃ lawo koe wona mɔnukpɔkpɔ be mianya nu si dziƒofiaɖuƒe la nye , ke womena mɔnukpɔkpɔ sia ame bubuwo o .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Ame si si nu le la , eyae woana nui ale be nu si le esi la nasɔ gbɔ ɖe dzi , ke ame si si nu mele o la , sue si le esi ha ̃ la woaxɔe le esi wo ̀ atsi asi ƒuƒlu

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Nu sia tae metsɔa lododo fia a nu amewoe ɖo be , tɔgbɔ be woanɔ nua kpɔm ha ̃ la womakpɔe adze sii o , eye woanɔ esem gake womase egɔme o .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: ” Nya sia wu nyagblɔɖila Yesaya ƒe nyagblɔɖi sia nu bena , ‘ Wosea nya , ke womesea egɔme o , wokpɔa nu , ke womedzea si nu si wokpɔ la o !

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Elabena woƒe dziwo ku atri hedo kpeɖi , woƒe towo ha ̃ tri , eye woŋe aɖaba ƒu nu siwo wokpɔ la dzi ,

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: elabena womekpɔa nu alo sea nu gɔme ale be woagatrɔ ɖe Mawu ŋu eye mada gbe le wo ŋu o , ’ ke woyra miawo ya ƒe ŋkuwo kple towo , elabena wokpɔa nu eye wodzea sii , wosea nya eye wosea egɔme .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Mawuvɔ ̃ la geɖewo kple nyagblɔɖila geɖewo di vevie bena yewoakpɔ nu siwo kpɔm miele eye yewoase nya siwo sem miele gake womete ŋui o .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: ” Lo si medo tso nukuwula ŋuti la ƒe gɔmeɖeɖee nye si !

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Anyigba alo mɔto afi si nuku aɖewo ge ɖo la , nye ame aɖe ƒe dzi . Ame sia sea nyanyui la tso mawufiaɖuƒe la ŋuti gake mesea egɔme o , ale Satana vana eye woɖea nyanyui la le eƒe dzi me .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Kpenyigba lae nye ame si sea nyanyui la eye eƒe dzi xɔnɛ kple dzidzɔ ,

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: gake dzi sia meli ke o , ale be mawunya la meƒoa ke ɖe to o , ale le ɣeyiɣi ʋee aɖe ko megbe nenye be fukpekpe kple yometiti va la , eƒe xɔse nu tsina eye wo ̀ dea megbe .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Anyigba si dzi yɔ kple ŋuve lae nye ame si sea mawunya la gake dzitsitsi ɖe xexemenuwo kple kesinɔnuwo ŋu hea eƒe susu ɖa tso mawunya la gbɔ , eya ta metsea ku aɖeke na Mawu o .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Anyigba nyui lae nye ame si ƒe dzi sea mawunya la eye wo ̀ sea egɔme , eye eya ha ̃ yina ɖakplɔa ame blaetɔ ̃ , blaade alo alafa ɖeka bubu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ vana dziƒofiaɖuƒea mee . ”

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Lo bubu si Yesu gado ha ̃ e nye esi , “ Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la le abe ame si ƒa ̃ bli ɖe eƒe agble me ene .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: ke esi wo ̀ mlɔ anyi le za ̃ me la , eƒe futɔ va ƒa ̃ gbeku vɔ ̃ wo ɖe bliawo dome .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Esi bliawo de asi tsitsi me la , gbeku vɔ ̃ awo ha ̃ tsi kpli wo .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Agblea dzi kpɔlawo va agbletɔ la gbɔ va biae be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , alo menye nuku nyui ne ̀ ƒa ̃ ɖe wo ̀ abɔ me oa ? Afi ka gbeku vɔ ̃ siawo tso ?

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: ” Agbletɔ la ɖo eŋu na wo bena , ‘ Futɔ aɖe kokokoe wɔ nenem nu sia . ’ “ Agbledzikpɔlawo biae bena , ‘ Ekema miho gbeku vɔ ̃ awo ƒu gbe maha ̃ ? ’

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: ” Eɖo eŋu na wo bena , ‘ Gbeɖe , migawɔe o , ne miebe yewoaho gbeku vɔ ̃ awo la , miaho blia ha ̃ .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Eya ta mina wo kata ̃ natsi aduadu va se ɖe nuŋeɣi , ekema mana nuŋelawo naho gbekuawo atɔ dzo wo , eye woatsɔ bli la akɔ ɖe nye ava me ! ’ ”

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Lo bubu si wo ̀ gado na wo lae nye esi : “ Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la le abe ʋuti ƒe ku si nye atikutsetse suetɔ kekeake si wodo ɖe anyigba tume ene .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Togbɔ be enye atiku suetɔ wu le atikuwo dome ha ̃ la , ne etsi la , eva zua ati ga ̃ si ƒoa atiwo kata ̃ ta , eye xeviwo va wɔa atɔ ɖe eme hekpɔa gbɔdzɔe . ”

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Yesu yi edzi kple lododo bubu be : “ Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la ɖi nyɔnu si le yevubolo wɔm . Ekua yevubolowɔ la ɖe sinu eye wo ̀ tsɔa nuʋa ̃ nu dea eme henyamanɛ va se ɖe esime yevubolomɔ la hona . ”

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Yesu wɔa lododo ŋutidɔ zi geɖe nenye be wo ̀ le nu ƒom na amewo , ne ele nu ƒom na wo la , edoa lo ɖeka teti na wo kokoko .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Elabena wogblɔ nya ɖi bena , “ Maƒo nu to lododowo me eye maɖe nu ɣaɣla siwo li tso gɔmedzedzea me ke la gɔme . ”

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Azɔ egble ̃ ameha la ɖe kpɔa godo eye wo ̀ ge ɖe aƒea me . Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ gblɔ bena , “ Đe lo si ne ̀ do tso bligble kple gbeku vɔ ̃ wo ŋuti me na mi ”

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Egblɔ na wo bena , “ Enyo , maɖe egɔme na mi . Nyee nye agbledela si ƒa ̃ bli ɖe nye agble me .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Agble lae nye xexeame , eye bli lae nye ame si le mawufiaɖuƒe la me , ke gbeku vɔ ̃ ɖia woe nye dzimaxesetɔwo .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Futɔ si ƒa ̃ gbeku vɔ ̃ wo ɖe blia me lae nye Satana , nuŋeɣi lae nye xexeame ƒe nuwuwu , eye nuŋelawoe nye mawudɔlawo .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: ” Le lododo sia me la , woɖe gbeku vɔ ̃ ɖiawo ɖe aga eye wotɔ dzo wo , nenema ke wo ̀ anɔ le xexeame ƒe nuwuwu .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Madɔ nye dɔlawo ɖa eye woaƒo ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple nuɖianuwo kata ̃ nu ƒu , aɖe wo ɖa le mawufiaɖuƒe la me ,

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: woatsɔ wo aƒu gbe ɖe kpodzo me eye woafia kolikoli . Afi sia avifafa kple aɖukliɖuɖu ade dzi le bobobo .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ke ame dzɔdzɔewo akle ̃ abe ɣe ene le wo Fofo ƒe Fiaɖuƒe la me . Ame si tosenu li na la nese nya siawo . ”

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Dziƒofiaɖuƒea le abe kesinɔnu aɖe si ŋu ame aɖe va ke ɖo le anyigba aɖe me ene . Eye le dzidzɔ si wo ̀ kpɔ le kesinɔnu sia ŋuti ta la , edzra nu sia nu si le esi bena yeakpɔ ga atsɔ a ƒle anyigba sia kple kesinɔnua kata ̃ .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: ” Megale egblɔm na mi be , dziƒofiaɖuƒe la ɖi dzonusitsala si le dzonu nyuiwo dim be yeaƒle adzra .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Eva kpɔ dzonu aɖe si xɔ asi ŋutɔ eya ta eyi ɖadzra nu siwo kata ̃ le esi la eye wo ̀ ƒle dzonu sia .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la gasɔ kple tɔƒodela aɖe si da asabu ɖe tɔme , eye wo ̀ ɖe la ̃ vovovowo , ɖuɖuawo kple maɖumaɖuawo siaa .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Esi wo ̀ he asabua va gotae la , enɔ anyi tia la ̃ ɖuɖuawo ɖe afi ɖeka , ke esiwo womeɖuna o la , etsɔ wo ƒu gbe .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Alea tututu wo ̀ anɔ le xexeame ƒe nuwuwu ha ̃ , mawudɔlawo ava ma ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo ɖa tso ame dzɔdzɔewo gbɔ

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: woatsɔ ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo aƒu gbe ɖe dzo mavɔ me , afi si avifafa kple aɖukliɖuɖu geɖe anɔ . ”

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Azɔ ebia nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Miese nya siawo gɔmea ? ” Woɖo eŋu be : “ E ̃ , miese wo gɔme . ”

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Ale wo ̀ ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Eya ta sefiala ɖe sia ɖe si wofia nui tso dziƒofiaɖuƒe la ŋuti la , le abe aƒetɔ aɖe si ɖe eƒe kesinɔnu yeye kple xoxoa siaa do goe tso eƒe nudzraɖoƒe ene . ”

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Esi Yesu wu lo siawo dodo nu la , edzo le afi ma ,

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: etrɔ yi fofoawo de , eye wo ̀ fia nu le woƒe ƒuƒoƒe , ke ewɔ nuku na wo ŋutɔ . Wobia be , “ Afi ka ame sia xɔ nunya kple nukunu ga ̃ siwo wɔm wo ̀ le tsoe maha ̃ ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Đe menye esiae nye atikpala la ƒe viŋutsu oa ? Đe menye dadaa ŋkɔe nye Maria eye nɔviaŋutsuwoe nye Yakobo , Yosef , Simɔn kple Yuda oa ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Đe nɔvianyɔnuwo kata ̃ mele mi ́ a dome oa ? Ekema afi ka gɔ ̃ e ŋutsu sia kpɔ nu siawo kata ̃ tsoe ? ”

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Ale wokpɔ nuɖiaɖia le eŋu . Ke Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Wodea bubu nyagblɔɖila ŋu le afi sia afi negbe le eya ŋutɔ ƒe dume kple eya ŋutɔ ƒe aƒeme ko . ”

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Ale mewɔ nukunu geɖewo le afi ma o le woƒe dzimaxɔse ta .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Fia Herodes se Yesu ŋkɔ

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: ale wo ̀ gblɔ na eƒe amewo bena , “ Edze ƒa ̃ be Yohanes Mawutsidetanamelae gagbɔ agbe , eya tae wo ̀ te ŋu le nukunu geɖe siawo wɔm . ”

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Azɔ la Herodes na wole ́ Yohanes eye woblae de gaxɔme , le Herodia nɔvia Filipo srɔ ̃ ta ,

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: elabena Yohanes he nya ɖe Herodes ŋu be menyo be wo ̀ axɔ nɔvia Filipo srɔ ̃ aɖe o .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Herodes di be yeawu Yohanes gake enɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m be ʋunyaʋunya ava dzɔ elabena amewo kata ̃ xɔe se be Yohanes nye nyagblɔɖila .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Herodes nɔ dzigbe ŋkeke ɖum , eye Herodia ƒe vinyɔnuvi va ɖu ɣe le amekpekpeawo ŋkume . Eƒe ɣeɖuɖu nyakpɔ na Herodes ŋutɔ ,

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: eya ta edo ŋugbe be yeana nu sia nu si nyɔnuvi la abia ye lae .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Nyɔnuvia bia dada nu si wo ̀ abia . Dada gblɔ nɛ be nebia Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ƒe ta . Ale wo ̀ va do ɖe fia gbɔ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mele Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ƒe ta dim le agba me . ”

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Nya sia te ɖe Fia la dzi ŋutɔ , gake le atam si wo ̀ ka ta la , medi be yeaɖu ŋukpe le eƒe amekpekpeawo ŋkume o , ale wo ̀ ɖe gbe be woatso ta le Yohanes nu atsɔ vɛ .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Ale woyi ɖatso ta le Yohanes nu le gaxɔ me ,

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: tsɔ de agba me tsɔ vɛ na nyɔnuvia eye wo ̀ tsɔe yi na dadaa .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo se nya la eye woyi ɖaxɔ eƒe kukua heyi ɖaɖi . Emegbe woyi ɖaka nya la ta na Yesu

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Esi Yesu se nya sia la eya ɖeka ge ɖe ʋu aɖe me dzo le afi ma eye wo ̀ yi ɖaɣla eɖokui ɖe teƒe tsoabo aɖe . Ke ameawo kpɔ afi si wo ̀ ɖo tae , eya ta wo dometɔ geɖewo tso kɔƒe vovovowo me to afɔ ti eyome .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Ale esi wo ̀ trɔ va ƒua ta la ekpɔ be ame gbogbo aɖewo nɔ ye lalam . Woƒe nu wɔ nublanui nɛ ŋutɔ eya ta wo ̀ da gbe le dɔnɔ siwo le wo dome la ŋu .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Esi za ̃ nɔ dodom la eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ va gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Afi sia la gbedzie , naneke meli ame naɖu o , evɔ la , fie ̃ nuɖuɣi va yi xoxo , eya ta ɖe asi le ameha la ŋu ne woayi kɔƒe siwo te ɖe afi sia ŋu la me aɖaƒle nuɖuɖu . ”

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Mehia ̃ bena woayi aɖaƒle nuɖuɖu o , miawo midi nuɖuɖu na wo woaɖu ! ”

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo do ɣli gblɔ bena , “ Nuka , abolo atɔ ̃ kple tɔmela ̃ eve pɛ koe le mi ́ a si le afi sia ! ”

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Mitsɔ wo vɛ . ”

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Azɔ ebia tso ameha la si be woabɔbɔ nɔ anyi ɖe gbea dzi . Ale wo ̀ tsɔ abolo atɔ ̃ kple tɔmela ̃ evea , eye wo ̀ wu mo dzi hedo gbe ɖa ɖe edzi , emegbe eŋe wo me tsɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena woama na ameawo .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Ame sia ame ɖu nu ɖi ƒo nyuie . Eye esi woƒo nuɖuɖu wuwlui mamlɛawo nu ƒu la woyɔ kusi wuieve sɔŋ .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Ame siwo ɖu nua la ƒe xexle ̃ me nɔ ŋutsu akpe atɔ ̃ , nyɔnuwo kple ɖeviwo mele eme o .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Le esia megbe la Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena woage ɖe ʋua me atso ƒua , ke ye la yeanɔ anyi ado mɔ ameha la woayi aƒeme .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Esi wo ̀ do mɔ ameawo wodzo vɔ la , eya ɖeka yi togbɛawo dzi be yeado gbe ɖa . Enɔ afi ma hafi za ̃ do ,

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: ke afi si tɔdziʋu la ɖo la didi tso gota gbɔ eye ƒutsotsoewo nɔ enyamam elabena ya nɔ ƒoƒom henɔ ʋu la kpem .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Anɔ abe fɔŋli ga ene me lɔƒo ene la , Yesu zɔ ƒua dzi yina wo gbɔ .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Esi nusrɔ ̃ lawo kpɔe wo ̀ nɔ ƒua dzi zɔm la , ŋɔ dzi wo , tete wodo ɣli kple vɔvɔ ̃ be , “ Ŋɔlie . ”

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Yesu ƒo nu na wo enumake eye wo ̀ de dzi ƒo na wo gblɔ bena , “ Nyee , migavɔ ̃ o miaƒe dzi nedze eme . ”

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Petro gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Aƒetɔ , nenye wo ̀ e tututu la , na nye ha ̃ mazɔ tsia dzi ava gbɔwo ̀ . ”

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Enyo , zɔ va . ” Ale Petro ɖi ɖe tsia me le ʋua xa eye wo ̀ zɔ tsia dzi ɖo ta Yesu gbɔ .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Ke esi wo ̀ nye kɔ kpɔ ale si ƒutsotsoeawo nɔ nyanyra ̃ m la , vɔvɔ ̃ ɖoe eye wo ̀ de asi to yiyi me . Ale wo ̀ do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Aƒetɔ , ɖem ! ”

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Yesu do asi ɖa enumake eye wo ̀ hee ɖe go . Azɔ egblɔ nɛ bena , “ O , wo ̀ xɔseʋeetɔ , nu ka tae ne ̀ ke ɖi maha ̃ ? ”

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Esi ame eveawo ge ɖe ʋua me ko la , yaa tɔ te zi ɖeka .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la mamlɛawo ƒe nu ku eye woƒe mo wɔ yaa , ale wogblɔ nɛ bena , “ Mawu Vie ne ̀ nye vava ̃ ! ”

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Azɔ wova ɖi go ɖe Genezaretnyigba dzi .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Woƒe vava ɖi hoo le dua kata ̃ me . Amewo nɔ tsatsam nɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem be amewo nakplɔ woƒe dɔnɔwo vɛ wo ̀ ada gbe le wo ŋu .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Dɔnɔ aɖewo va ɖe kuku na Yesu be yewoaka asi eƒe awu to ko , eye ame siwo kata ̃ ka asi eƒe awu to la kpɔ dɔyɔyɔ .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Farisitɔ aɖewo kple agbale ̃ fialawo ha ̃ tso Yerusalem va bena yewoale ́ nya aɖewo kpɔ kple Yesu .

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: Wobiae bena , “ Nu ka tae wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo mewɔna ɖe mi ́ Yudatɔwo ƒe blema kɔnuwo dzi o ? Womewɔ kɔnu si mi ́ ewɔna heklɔa asi le ɖoɖo tɔxɛ aɖe nu hafi ɖua nu o . ”

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Miawo ha ̃ nu ka tae miaƒe kɔnuwo tsi tre ɖe Mawu ƒe sewo ŋuti ɖo ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Le kpɔɖeŋu me , Mawu ƒe se gblɔ bena , ‘ Bu fofowo ̀ kple dawo ̀ , ame si tsi tre ɖe edzilawo ŋuti la ku kee wo ̀ aku . ’

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Ke miawo miegblɔ bena , ne ame aɖe gblɔ na fofoa alo dadaa be , ‘ Nu si ke matsɔ akpe ɖe ŋutiwo ̀ e la , metsɔe wɔ adzɔgbeɖeɖe ƒe nunanae na Mawu ,

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: megahia ̃ be wo ̀ atsɔe “ ade bubu fofoa ŋuti o . ” Ale miegbe Mawu ƒe nya dzi wɔwɔ be miale ́ miawo ŋutɔ ƒe nuɖoanyiwo me ɖe asi .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Mi alakpanuwɔlawo ! Yesaya gblɔe ɖi nyuie le mia ŋuti bena ,

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Ame siawo le buyem kple woƒe nuyiwo , gake woƒe dziwo te ɖa xaa tso gbɔnye .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Viɖe aɖeke mele woƒe subɔsubɔ ŋuti o , elabena wofiaa woawo ŋutɔ ƒe se siwo wowɔ la eye woɖe asi le Mawu ƒe sewo ŋuti . ’ ”

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Yesu yɔ ameha la eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo bena , “ Miɖo to nya si gblɔ ge mala be miase egɔme nyuie .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Menye nu si ne ̀ ɖuna lae wɔa wo ̀ ame makɔmakɔ o ! Ke boŋ nu si ne ̀ buna kple nu si ne ̀ gblɔna lae . ”

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo va biae be , “ E ̀ nya be nya si ne ̀ gblɔ la ve dɔme na Farisitɔwo ŋutɔa ? ”

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Ati sia ati si Fofonye si le dziƒo la medo o la , woahoe kple ke .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Miɖe asi le wo ŋuti ! Mɔfiala ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo wonye . Ne ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ le ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ kplɔm la , wo kpakple eve la woayi aɖadze agame . ”

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Petro biae be wo ̀ aɖe nu si wo ̀ wɔnɛ be menye nu si ame ɖuna lae nana wo ̀ zua ame makɔmakɔ o la me na yewo .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Yesu biae bena , “ Ke miawo ha ̃ miese nya sia gɔme oa ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Mienyae bena nu si ame ɖuna la toa eƒe dɔkaviwo me eye wo ̀ denɛ le nugodo oa ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Nya vloe doa go tso egblɔla ƒe dzi me eye wo ̀ ƒoa ɖi amea .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Elabena ame ƒe dzi mee susu vɔ ̃ ɖiwo , hlɔ ̃ dodo , ahasiwɔwɔ , matrewɔwɔ , fififi , aʋatsokaka kple ameŋugbegble ̃ doa go tsona .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Nu siawoe ƒoa ɖi ame , ke ne me ̀ wɔ asikɔklɔ ƒe kɔnua hafi ɖu nu o la maƒo ɖi wo ̀ o ! ”

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Yesu dzo le nuto ma me eye wo ̀ zɔ mɔ kilometa blaenyi sɔŋ yi Tiro kple Sidɔn nutomewo me .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Kanaan nyɔnu aɖe si le afi ma va egbɔ va ɖe kuku nɛ vevie bena , “ O , Aƒetɔ , Fia David Vi , kpɔ nye nublanui ! Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ ge ɖe vinye nyɔnuvi me eye wo ̀ wɔa fui ɣesiaɣi . ”

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Ke Yesu meɖo nya aɖeke ŋu nɛ o , mekpe kpe dee ha ̃ o . Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va ƒoe ɖe enu kura be nenyae wo ̀ adzo . Wogblɔ bena , “ Gblɔ nɛ be nedzo , elabena eƒe ɣlidodo le tome vem na mi ́ . ”

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na nyɔnua be , “ Đe wodɔm be mava ɖe Yudatɔwo ɖeɖe ko . ”

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Ke nyɔnua te ɖe eŋu kpokploe hede ta agu nɛ gaɖe kuku nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ve nunye ko ! ”

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Menyo be maxɔ nuɖuɖu le ɖeviwo si atsɔ na avuwo o . ”

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , Aƒetɔ , ele eme nenema , gake avuvi siwo le kplɔ ̃ te la ɖua abolo wuwlui siwo gena ɖe anyigba tso woƒe aƒetɔ ƒe kplɔ ̃ dzi . ”

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Nyɔnu , wo ̀ xɔse lolo ŋutɔ ! Nu si dim ne ̀ le la neva eme na wo ̀ ” " eye enumake eƒe vinyɔnuvi la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Yesu trɔ yi Galilea ƒua nu azɔ eye wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ togbɛ aɖe si le afi ma lɔƒo la dzi .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe nye zi va ƒo ɖe edzi le afi sia . Wokplɔ dɔnɔ siwo nye la ̃ metututɔwo , ŋkunɔwo , aɖetututɔwo , nuwɔametɔwo kple dɔ bubu ƒomevi geɖe le ́ lawo vɛ nɛ eye wo ̀ yɔ dɔ wo kata ̃ .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Enye nu wɔnuku blibo ! Aɖetututɔwo nɔ nu ƒom kple dzidzɔ , ame siwo ƒe abɔ kple atawo menyo o gaɖo nɔnɔme nyui me , tekunɔwo alo bafawo nɔ kpo tim nɔ yiyim , eye ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo nɔ nu kpɔm nyuie ! Nyateƒe ameha ga ̃ la ƒe nu ku eye wokafu Israel ƒe Mawu la .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Azɔ Yesu yɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ gblɔ na wo bena , " “ Ame gbogbo siawo ƒe nu wɔ nublanui nam ŋutɔ . Ŋkeke etɔ ̃ e nye esia wole yonyeme eye nuɖuɖu ha ̃ vɔ le wo si . Nyemedi be maɖo wo ɖe aƒeme dɔmeɣee o , elabena ŋuzi atsɔ wo le mɔ dzi . ”

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Afi kae mi ́ akpɔ nuɖuɖu le , le dzogbe afi sia ana ame gbogbo siawo ? ”

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Yesu gabia wo bena , “ Abolo nenie susɔ ɖe mia si ? ” Woɖo eŋu be , “ Abolo adre ̃ kple la ̃ vi aɖe koe susɔ . ”

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na ameha la be woanɔ anyi ɖe anyigba ,

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: etsɔ abolo adre ̃ a kple tɔmela ̃ wo eye wo ̀ da akpe na Mawu ɖe wo ta , emegbe la , eŋe wo me kakɛkakɛ , hetsɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woama na ameawo .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Wo kata ̃ woɖu nu ɖi ƒo , eye nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒo ƒu abolo kakɛ siwo susɔ la ɖe kusi adre ̃ me , woyɔ fu ̃ .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Ame siwo ɖu nua la ƒe xexle ̃ me le ŋutsu akpe ene , nyɔnuwo kple ɖeviwo mele eme o .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Azɔ edo mɔ ameha la , eye wo ̀ ɖo ʋu la tso ƒua heyi Magadan nutomewo me .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Farisitɔwo kple Zadukitɔwo va bena yewoado Yesu kpɔ ; wobia tso esi be wo ̀ ana dzesi yewo tso dziƒo .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Miawo la nenye be fie ̃ ɖo la miegblɔna be , ‘ Yame akɔ elabena yame bia ̃ ’ ,

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: eye le ŋdi miegblɔna be , ‘ Egbe ahom atu elabena akpɔ ̃ ɖo eye yame bia ̃ . ’ Mienyaa ale si miaɖe dziƒo ƒe nɔnɔme gɔme , gake mietea ŋu dzea si ɣeyiɣiwo ƒe dzesiwo o .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Dzidzime vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔahasi sia le nukunu ƒe dzesi dim , ke womawɔ ɖeke na wo o negbe Yona ƒe dzesi la ko . ” " Ale Yesu gble ̃ wo ɖi eye wo ̀ dzo .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Wogatso ƒua yi ɖe go kemɛ dzi , ke nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo ŋku edzi le afi sia be yewomeƒle nuɖuɖu ɖe asi o .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Yesu xlɔ ̃ nu wo vevie ̃ gblɔ bena , " “ Mikpɔ nyuie le Zadukitɔwo kple Farisitɔwo ƒe amɔʋa ̃ nu ŋuti . ”

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo bu be nuɖuɖu si yewometsɔ ɖe asi o tae wo ̀ gblɔ nya siawo ɖo .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Ke Yesu ya nya nu si ŋuti bum wole ale wo ̀ gblɔ na wo bena , “ O ! Mi xɔse ʋeetɔwo ! Nu ka ta miele nu xam be yewometsɔ nuɖuɖu ɖe asi o ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Nu ka wɔ miate ŋu ase nu gɔme o ? Mieɖo ŋku edzi be menyi ame akpe atɔ ̃ kple abolo atɔ ̃ eye esi susɔ la yɔ kusiwo oa ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Esi menyi ame akpe ene ɖe , mieɖo ŋku edzi be abolo gbogbo aɖe gasusɔ oa ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Aleke wɔ miedze sii kpɔ bena menye nuɖuɖu ŋutie mele nu ƒom le o ? Megale egblɔm na mi be , “ Mikpɔ nyuie le Farisitɔwo kple Zadukitɔwo ƒe amɔʋanu ŋuti . ” "

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Ke azɔ la wose nu si wo ̀ wɔnɛ be amɔʋa ̃ nu la gɔme , eyae nye alakpanu siwo Farisitɔwo kple Zadukitɔwo nɔa fiafiam la .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va ɖo Kaisarea Filipi la , ebia eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena , " “ Ame kae amewo le gbɔgblɔm be menye ? ”

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ame aɖewo gblɔ be Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ne ̀ nye . Đewo be Eliyae ne ̀ nye bubuwo ha ̃ be Yeremia alo nyagblɔɖila xoxoawo dometɔ ɖekae ne ̀ nye . ”

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Azɔ ebia nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Ke miawo ya ɖe , ame kae miebu be menye ? ”

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Simɔn Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Kristo , Mesia la , kple Mawu gbagbe la ƒe Vi . ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Mawu neyra wo ̀ , Simɔn Yona vi . Elabena Fofonye si le dziƒo la ŋutɔe ɖe nu sia fia wo ̀ , ke menye amegbetɔ aɖeke gbɔe wo ̀ tso o .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Nye ha ̃ mele egblɔm na wo ̀ bena , Wo ̀ e nye Petro si gɔmee nye kpe eye nenem kpe gbadza sia dzie maɖo nye hame la anyi ɖo , eye tsie ̃ ƒe ƒe ŋuse ̃ wo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mate ŋu aɖu edzi o .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Matsɔ dziƒofiaɖuƒe la ƒe safuiwo na wo ̀ , ale be ʋɔ siwo na ̃ tu le anyigba dzi afii la woanɔ tutu le dziƒo , eye ʋɔ siwo na ̃ ʋu le anyigba dzi la woanɔ ʋuʋu le dziƒo . ” "

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Ke Yesu de se na nusrɔ ̃ lawo vevie bena womegagblɔe na ame aɖeke be yee nye Mesia la o .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Tso azɔ dzi heyi la , Yesu ƒoa nu na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo tso eƒe Yerusalem yiyi kple nu siwo adzɔ ɖe edzi le afi ma la ŋuti . Egblɔ na wo bena , le Yerusalem la , Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo , agbale ̃ fialawo kple dumega ̃ wo awɔ fu ye eye woawu ye gake le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la , yeafɔ ɖe tsitre .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Esi Yesu gblɔ nya sia vɔ la , Petro ɖe kpɔe , eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ bena , " “ Mawu neɖe agba sia ɖa le dziwo ̀ , nu siawo madzɔ ɖe dziwo ̀ gbeɖe o ! ”

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe Petro ŋuti gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Te ɖa le gbɔnye , Satana ! E ̀ le mɔ vɔ ̃ ɖi aɖe trem nam . E ̀ le nya sia gblɔm tso amegbetɔ ƒe nukpɔkpɔ nu , ke menye le ale si Mawu ɖoe la nu o . ”

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Le esia megbe la Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena , “ Ne ame aɖe di be yeadze yonyeme vava ̃ la , ekema negbe nu le eɖokui gbɔ ne wo ̀ atsɔ eƒe atitsoga adze yonyeme .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Elabena ame si lɔ ̃ a eƒe agbe eye wo ̀ tia eƒe agbe yome le ŋutila ̃ me la , abui ; ke ame si ɖe asi le eƒe agbe ŋu faa ɖe tanye la , akpɔ agbe mavɔ .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Viɖe kae wo ̀ anye na mi nenye be xexeame kata ̃ zu mia tɔ gake agbe mavɔ la bu ɖe mi ? Nu kae le xexe sia me si agasɔ kple agbe mavɔ ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Nye Amegbetɔ Vi la mava kple nye dɔlawo le Fofonye ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe me eye madrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame sia ame ɖe eƒe nuwɔnawo nu .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Eye mia dometɔ aɖewo siwo le tsitre ɖe afi sia la , anɔ agbe akpɔm mava kple nye Fiaɖuƒe la . ”

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Le ŋkeke ade megbe la Yesu kplɔ Petro , Yakobo kple nɔvia Yohanes ɖe asi woyi to kɔkɔ aɖe dzi . Teƒe sia zi ɖoɖoe nyuie .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Le toa dzi la , Yesu ƒe dzedzeme trɔ enumake . Eƒe mo de asi kekle ̃ me abe ɣe ene , eƒe awu fu tititi abe kekeli ene .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Kasia Mose kple Eliya va do ɖe egbɔ eye wonɔ dze ɖom kplii .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Petro gblɔ na Yesu bena , “ Aƒetɔ , enyo ŋutɔ be mi ́ ele afi sia ! Ne e ̀ lɔ ̃ la na mi ́ awɔ agbadɔ etɔ ̃ , ɖeka nanye tɔwo ̀ ɖeka nanye Mose tɔ , ɖeka nanye Eliya ha ̃ tɔ . ”

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nya sia gblɔm la alilikpo kekle ̃ aɖe va tsyɔ wo dzi eye gbe aɖe ɖi tso alilikpoa me gblɔ be , “ Ame siae nye Vinye si gbɔ nyemelɔ ̃ a nu le o , si dzea ŋunye . Miɖo to eya amea . ”

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Esi gbea nɔ ɖiɖim alea la , dzidzi ƒo nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo eye wotsyɔ mo anyi nɔ dzodzom nyanyanya .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Ke Yesu va wo gbɔ eye wo ̀ ka asi wo ŋu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Mitsi tre eye migavɔ ̃ o . ”

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Esi wofɔ mo dzi la , Yesu ɖeka ko wokpɔ .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Le esime wonɔ ɖiɖim tso toa dzi la , Yesu de se na wo vevie be womegagblɔ nu si teƒe wokpɔ la na ame aɖeke o , va se ɖe esime yeafɔ tso ame kukuwo dome hafi .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Nu ka tae Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfowo nɔa gbɔgblɔm godoo be ele be Eliya nagava hafi Mesia la nava ? ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ele eme nenema . Ele be Eliya nava aɖɔ nu sia nu ɖo hafi Mesia la nava .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Eye le nyateƒe me la , Eliya gatrɔ va xoxo , gake amewo mekpɔe dzesii o , eya ta ame geɖewo wɔ funyafunyae . Nenema kee Amegbetɔ Vi la ha ̃ akpe fui le woƒe asi me . ” "

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo kpɔe dze sii be Yohanes Mawutsitanamela ŋutie Yesu nɔ nu ƒom le .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Esi wova ɖo toa te la wokpɔ ameha ga ̃ aɖe wonɔ afi ma nɔ wo lalam . Enumake ŋutsu aɖe do tso ameha la dome va dze klo ɖe Yesu kɔme gblɔ bena , "

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: “ Aƒetɔ , kpɔ nublanui na vinye ŋutsuvi sia , ele kpeŋɔedɔ le ́ m , eye wo ̀ le fu kpem nublanuitɔe , ne kpeŋɔedɔa dze edzi ɣe aɖewo ɣi la , enana be wodzea dzo alo tsi me .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Mekplɔe vɛ na wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo gake womete ŋu da gbe le eŋu o . ”

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu gblɔ bena , “ O ! mi xɔse ʋee kple dzime sese ̃ tɔwo . Ɣekaɣie manɔ anyi kpli mi ase ɖo ? Mikplɔ ɖevi la vɛ nam ! ”

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Yesu blu ɖe gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la ta eye wo ̀ do go le ɖevia me ale be eƒe la ̃ me se enumake .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Le esia megbe la nusrɔ ̃ lawo va bia Yesu dzaa bena , “ Nu ka tae mi ́ awo mi ́ ete ŋu nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a do goe o ? ”

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Elabena xɔse ʋee aɖe koe le mia si . Ne miaƒe xɔse ɖe wo ̀ le abe bliku teti ene la anye ne miate ŋu agblɔ na to sia be , ‘ Ho tso afi sia ’ eye wo ̀ aho ayi teƒe bubu . Nanekewɔwɔ masese ̃ na mi o .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Ke miate ŋu anya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ siawo ƒomevi o negbe ɖe miado gbe ɖa , atsi nu dɔ ko hafi . ”

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Esi wogaƒo wo ɖokuiwo nu ƒu le Galilea la , Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Wole Amegbetɔ Vi la de ge asi na amewo ,

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: woawui , eye le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la woafɔe ɖe tsitre . ” " Esia na nusrɔ ̃ lawo yɔ fu ̃ u kple nuxaxa .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va ɖo Kapernaun la , gbedoxɔmenudzɔlawo , ame siwo xɔa dratsima eve le ame sia ame si la va Petro gbɔ eye wobiae bena , " “ Miaƒe Aƒetɔ menaa gbedoxɔme adzɔga oa ? ”

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Eɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ E ̃ , enanɛ , ” Ke esi Petro va ɖo aƒea me la , Yesue nye ame gba ̃ tɔ si ƒo nu . Ebia Petro be , “ Simon , ale ke ne ̀ susu ? Ame kawo sie anyigbadzifiawo xɔa adzɔga kple duga le , le dukɔmeviwo si loo , alo le ame bubuwo si ? ”

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Le ame bubuwo si . ” Yesu yi edzi gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Ekema mehia ̃ be dukɔme viwo naxe adzɔga o .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Gake be mi ́ adze abe agɔdzelawo ene o la , yi taa la to ne na ̃ da ƒu . Tsɔ la ̃ gba ̃ tɔ si na ̃ ɖe la , ke eƒe nume eye na ̃ kpɔ ga home aɖe si ade na mi ́ a kple wo ̀ ƒe gadzɔdzɔ la . Tsɔe ɖaxe nye kple wo ̀ ƒe Mawuxɔ me nudzɔdzɔ lae .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo va Yesu gbɔ va biae be , “ Ame kae nye ga ̃ tɔ le dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me ? ”

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Yesu yɔ ɖevi sue aɖe va eɖokui gbɔ eye wo ̀ tsɔe ɖo nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋkume .

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Azɔ egblɔ na wo be , “ Ne ame aɖe metsri nu vɔ ̃ eye wo ̀ trɔ ɖe Mawu ŋu hexɔ edzi se abe ɖeviwo ene o la mage ɖe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me o .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Eya ta ame si bɔbɔ eɖokui abe ɖevi sue sia ene la , eyae age ɖe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Eye mia dometɔ si axɔ ɖevi aɖe abe esia ene le nye ŋkɔ me la , nyee nye ma wo ̀ xɔ .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Ke nenye be mia dometɔ aɖe ana ɖevi sue siawo dometɔ aɖe nabu xɔse si le eme ɖe ŋunye la , anyo na ame ma wu ne woatsɔ kpe ga ̃ aɖe atsi ɖe kɔ nɛ atsɔe aƒu gbe ɖe atsiaƒu me eye wo ̀ ano tsi aku boŋ .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Babaa na xexeame le nu siwo naa amewo wɔa nu vɔ ̃ ta ! Nu siawo ava eme tsa ̃ , gake babaa na ame si dzi woato ava !

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Nenye wo ̀ asi alo afɔe nana be ne ̀ wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la , la ̃ e ɖa ne na ̃ tsɔe aƒu gbe . Anyo na wo ̀ be na ̃ yi dziƒo kple asi alo afɔ la ̃ lɛ wu be asi eve kple afɔ eve nanɔ asiwo ̀ eye woatsɔ wo ̀ aƒu gbe ɖe dzo mavɔ me .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Nenye be wo ̀ ŋkue nana be ne ̀ wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la , hoe le etome ƒu gbe . Anyo na wo ̀ be na ̃ yi dziƒo kple ŋku ɖeka tsɔ wu be ŋku eve nanɔ asiwo ̀ , ke na ̃ yi dzo mavɔ me .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ” Mikpɔ nyuie bena miagado vlo ɖevi sue siawo dometɔ aɖeke o elabena woƒe mawudɔlawo le Fofonye ŋkume le dziƒo ɣesiaɣi .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Amegbetɔ Vi la va be yeaɖe ame siwo bu .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: ” Nenye be ale ̃ alafa ɖeka le ame aɖe si eye ɖeka bu la ale ke wo ̀ awɔ ? Đe magble ̃ ale ̃ blaasieke - vɔ - asieke mamlɛawo ɖi ayi aɖadi ɖeka si bu le togbɛwo dzi oa ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Eye nenye be wo ̀ kpɔ ale ̃ a ɖe , makpɔ dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe ɖe eŋu tsɔ wu blaasieke - vɔ - asieke siwo le dedie le aƒe oa ?

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Nenema ke menye Fofonye ƒe didi be ɖevi sue siawo dometɔ ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ nabu o .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: ” Nenye be nɔviwo ̀ aɖe dze agɔ le dziwo ̀ la , yi egbɔ dzaa ne na ̃ ɖe nu si wo ̀ wɔ la fiae . Nenye be ese eɖokui gɔme eye wo ̀ ɖo to wo ̀ la , ekema e ̀ ɖe nɔviwo ̀ sia ƒe agbe .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Ke nenye be wo ̀ gbe meɖo to wo ̀ o la , kplɔ nɔviwo ̀ bubu ɖeka alo eve ɖe asi ne miayi egbɔ ake be ame siawo naɖu ɖasefo na wo ̀ .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Nenye be wo ̀ gbe esia ha ̃ la , tsɔ nya la yi na hamea , eye ne hamea tso afia na wo ̀ gake melɔ ̃ ɖe edzi o la , ekema woaɖee le hame .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi bena nu sia nu si miabla le anyigba dzi la , anɔ babla le dziƒo , eye nu sia nu si miatu le anyigba dzi la anɔ tutu le dziƒo .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: ” Mele egblɔm na mi ha ̃ be , ne mi ame eve miewɔ ɖeka le anyigba dzi bia nane Fofonye si le dziƒo la awɔe na mi .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Elabena afi si ame eve alo etɔ ̃ ƒo ƒu ɖo le nye ŋkɔ me la , manɔ wo dome .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Azɔ Petro te ɖe eŋu eye wo ̀ biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , zi nenie nɔvinye ada vo ɖe ŋutinye eye matsɔe akee ? Zi adrea ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Gbeɖe , menye zi adre o , ke boŋ zi blaadre ̃ teƒe adre . ”

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Azɔ Yesu do lo sia be , “ Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la sɔ kple fia aɖe si di be yeawɔ akɔnta kple eƒe dɔlawo .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
