text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ akɔnta la wɔm la , wokplɔ eƒe fenyila ɖeka vɛ , ame sia nyi fe sidi akpe akpewo le esi .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Fenyila la mate ŋu axe fea o , eya ta fia la ɖe gbe be woadzra ŋutsu sia srɔ ̃ , viawo kple woƒe nu sia nu atsɔ xe fe lae .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: ” Ke ŋutsua dze klo ɖe fia la kɔme ɖe kuku nɛ be , ‘ O , Aƒetɔ , meɖe kuku , gbɔ dzi ɖi nam vie , ne mava xe fea kata ̃ na wo ̀ emegbe . ’

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: ” Ŋutsua ƒe nu wɔ nublanui na fia la ale gbegbe be wo ̀ ɖe asi le eŋu eye wo ̀ tsɔ fe si wo ̀ nyi la ha ̃ kee .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Ke esi dɔla sia do go yina la , edo go ehavi dɔla bubu , ame si nyi sidi alafa aɖewo ko ƒe fe le esi . Eti kpo dze edzi hele ́ awu ɖe vɛ nɛ eye wo ̀ bia tso esi be , ‘ Xe fe si ne ̀ nyi le asinye la nam ! ’

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: ” Ŋutsu sia ha ̃ dze klo ɖe kuku nɛ be , ‘ Meɖe kuku , gbɔ dzi ɖi nam vie ekema maxe fe la kata ̃ na wo ̀ . ’

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: ” Gake ŋutsu vɔ ̃ ɖi sia gbe asiɖeɖe le fenyila la ŋuti eye wo ̀ na wole ́ e de mɔ va se ɖe esime wo ̀ axe fea kata ̃ nɛ .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: ” Ŋutsu nublanuitɔ sia ƒe xɔlɔ ̃ aɖe kpɔ nu si dzɔ eye wo ̀ yi ɖaka nya la ta na fia la .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Fia la yɔ ŋutsu vɔ ̃ ɖi si wo ̀ tsɔ fe kee la va egbɔ eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ bena , ‘ Wo ̀ dɔla vɔ ̃ ɖi tagbɔsese ̃ tɔ ! Nye ya metsɔ fe gbogbo si ne ̀ nyi le asinye la ke wo ̀ esi neɖe kuku nam .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Nu ka ta wo ̀ ha ̃ ma ̃ kpɔ nublanui na amewo abe ale si nye ha ̃ mekpɔ nublanui na wo ̀ ene o ? ’

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: ” Fia la do dɔmedzoe ɖe ŋutsu sia ŋu vevie eye wo ̀ na wodee gaxɔ me afi si fukpekpe le , be wo ̀ anɔ afi ma va se ɖe esime wo ̀ xe fe siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ nyi la , pesewa afa ̃ ha ̃ masusɔ o .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Alea tututu Fofonye si le dziƒo la ha ̃ awɔ na mi nenye be mietsɔ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke mia nɔewo tso miaƒe dzime o . ”

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Esi Yesu wu eƒe nuƒo sia nu la , edzo le Galilea eye wo ̀ tso Yɔdan tɔsisi la va Yudea .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe kplɔe ɖo eye wo ̀ da gbe le woƒe dɔnɔ geɖewo ŋu .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Farisitɔ aɖewo va egbɔ be yewoadoe kpɔ . Wobiae be , “ Ele se nu be ŋutsu nagbe srɔ ̃ a le susu ɖe sia ɖe ta ? ”

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Eɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Đe miexle ̃ e kpɔ be le gɔmedzedzea me la , Wɔla la wɔ wo atsu kple asii o maha ̃ ?

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: eya ta ŋutsu nagble ̃ fofoa kple dadaa ɖi ale ́ ɖe srɔ ̃ a ŋu ɖikaa , eye wo kple eve la woazu ŋutila ̃ ɖeka .

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Le esia ta womeganye ame eve o , ke boŋ ame ɖeka . Eya ta nu si ke Mawu bla la amegbetɔ aɖeke nagama eme o . ”

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Tete wobia Yesu be , “ Ekema nu ka ŋuti Mose de se be ŋutsu nana srɔ ̃ gbegbale ̃ srɔ ̃ a eye wo ̀ agbee , maha ̃ ? ”

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Mose ɖe mɔ na mi be miagbe mia srɔ ̃ wo elabena miaƒe dzime se ̃ , gake menɔ alea le gɔmedzedzea me o .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Eye mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , ame si gbe srɔ ̃ a eye menye ɖe ahasiwɔwɔ ta o ke boŋ le susu bubu aɖe ta eye wo ̀ yi ɖaɖe nyɔnu bubu la , wɔ ahasi . ”

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nenye be wo ̀ le alea la anyo wu be ame ŋutsu maɖe srɔ ̃ o . ”

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Menye ame sia amee ase nya sia gɔme o . Negbe ame siwo ŋu Mawu kpe ɖo la ko .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Elabena wodzi ame aɖewo wonye ame tatawo tso dzɔdzɔme , ame bubuwo la ame aɖewoe wɔ wo wozu nenema be womaɖe srɔ ̃ o . Ke ame aɖewo gbea srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe le dziƒofiaɖuƒe la ta . Ame si lɔ ̃ la , nexɔ nye nyawo . ”

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Dzila aɖewo kplɔ wo vi suewo va Yesu gbɔe be wo ̀ ada asi ɖe wo dzi eye wo ̀ ado gbe ɖa ɖe wo ta . Ke nusrɔ ̃ lawo blu ɖe dzilawo ta .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Gake Yesu gblɔ bena , “ Mina ɖevi suewo nava gbɔnye eye migaxe mɔ na wo o , elabena woawo tɔe nye dziƒofiaɖuƒe la . ” "

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Ale wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe asiwo da ɖe wo dzi eye wo ̀ yra wo hafi dzo .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Ame aɖe ha ̃ va Yesu gbɔ kple biabia sia bena , " “ Aƒetɔ nyui , nu kae mawɔ bena makpɔ agbe mavɔ ? ”

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ne e ̀ yɔm be Aƒetɔ nyui la ekema Mawue ma yɔm ne ̀ le , elabena ame ɖeka koe li esi woayɔ be ame nyui eye ame siae nye Mawu . Le wo ̀ biabia la ŋuti la mele egblɔm na wo ̀ be ate ŋu ayi dziƒo nenye be e ̀ wɔ ɖe Mawu ƒe seawo dzi . ”

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Ŋutsu la gabiae be , “ Se kawoe ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Woawoe nye , me ̀ gawu ame o , me ̀ gawɔ ahasi o , megafi fi o , me ̀ gada alakpa o ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: bu fofowo ̀ kple dawo ̀ , lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ene ! ”

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Đekakpui la gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Mewɔa se siawo dzi tso nye ɖevime ke , ke nu kae gasusɔ mawɔ ? ”

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Ne e ̀ di be yeazu ame dzɔdzɔe blibo la , yi na ̃ dzra nu sia nu si le asiwo ̀ la , eye na ̃ tsɔ ga la na ame dahewo , ekema kesinɔnuwo anɔ dziƒo na wo ̀ . Ne e ̀ wɔ esia vɔ la , va na ̃ dze yonyeme . ”

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Ke esi ɖekakpui la se nya sia la , edzo kple nuxaxa , elabena kesinɔnu geɖe nɔ esi .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu gblɔ na wo be , “ Nyateƒe , asese ̃ na kesinɔtɔwo ŋutɔ , bena woage ɖe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Megale egblɔm na mi be , anɔ bɔbɔe na kposɔ bena wo ̀ ato abui ƒe vo me tsɔ wu be kesinɔtɔ nage ɖe mawufiaɖuƒe la me . ”

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ke esi nusrɔ ̃ lawo se nya sia la , woƒe nu ku eye wobia be , “ Ke ame ka gɔ ̃ ate ŋu akpɔ ɖeɖe le xexe sia me ? ”

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesu kpɔ wo du ̃ eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Esia mele bɔbɔe le amegbetɔwo gome o , ke naneke mesese ̃ na na Mawu ya o . ”

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Petro gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Mi ́ awo la mi ́ egble ̃ nu sia nu ɖi hedze yowo ̀ me . Fetu kae miakpɔ ? ”

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nenye be Nye , Amegbetɔ Vi la , menɔ anyi ɖe nye fiazikpui dzi le nye fiaɖuƒe me le ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ me la , ekema miawo ha ̃ mianɔ fiazikpui wuieve dzi adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu Israel ƒe to wuieveawo .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Eye ame sia ame si gble ̃ eƒe aƒe , nɔvia ŋutsuwo , nɔvia nyɔnuwo , fofoa , dadaa , srɔ ̃ a , viawo alo eƒe nunɔamesiwo ɖi hedze yonyeme la , akpɔ wo ɖe edzi teƒe alafa ɖeka eye wo ̀ anyi agbe mavɔ ƒe dome .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Ke ame geɖe siwo nye gba ̃ tɔwo fifia la azu mlɔeawo eye amesiwo nye mlɔeawo la azu gba ̃ tɔwo . ”

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Lo bubu aɖe si Yesu do le dziƒofiaɖuƒe ŋu lae nye esi . “ Agbletɔ aɖe do go gbe ɖeka ŋdi aɖe be yeadi apaɖilawo woawɔ dɔ le yeƒe waingble me .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Eƒo asi kple apaɖilaawo eye wolɔ ̃ bena wo ̀ axe sidi wuieve na ame sia ame ŋkeke ɖeka . Ale dɔwɔlawo yi ɖadze dɔa gɔme .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: ” Le gaƒoƒo ʋee aɖewo megbe la , ekpɔ ame aɖewo le dɔdiƒe aɖe wonɔ dɔ dim .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Ekplɔ woawo ha ̃ yi eƒe agblea me , eye wo ̀ do ŋugbe na wo bena yeaxe ga home si dze la na wo ne ŋkekea wu nu .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Le ŋdɔ ga wuieve me la egaɖo ame bubuwo ha ̃ ɖe agblea me eye anɔ abe ga etɔ ̃ me ene la egaɖo ame bubuwo ha ̃ ɖa nenema ke .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: ” Ke esi fie ̃ ga atɔ ̃ ƒo la , egayi dua me eye wo ̀ gakpɔ ame aɖewo woli dɔ aɖeke mawɔe . Ebia wo bena , ‘ Nu ka tae mieli alea ko dɔ aɖeke mawɔe ŋkeke bliboa ? ’

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Ame aɖeke meva tsɔ mi ́ be mi ́ awɔ dɔ na ye o . ’ “ Agbletɔa gblɔ na wo be , ‘ Ekema miyi nye agble me eye miakpe ɖe ame siwo le dɔ wɔm le afi ma la ŋu . ’ ”

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Azɔ esi dɔwɔlawo ɖi bo la , agbletɔa yɔ eƒe gadzikpɔla be neva xe fe na dɔwɔlawo eye wo ̀ adze egɔme tso ame siwo wo ̀ ɖo ɖe agblea me mamlɛa la dzi .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Gadzikpɔla la yɔ ame siwo yi agblea me le ga atɔ ̃ me la vɛ eye wo ̀ xe ŋkeke ɖeka blibo ƒe fetu na wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Le esia ta esi wo ̀ yɔ ame siwo va gba ̃ la vɛ la , woawo nɔ bubum be yewoƒe fetu akɔ wu ame siwo va le ga atɔ ̃ me la tɔ . Gake kpao , ga home ma sinu ke ko wo ̀ xe na woawo ha ̃ . ”

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Ame gba ̃ tɔwo he nya ɖe agbletɔa ŋu vevie gblɔ bena ,

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: ‘ Ame siawo la gaƒoƒo ɖeka pɛ koe wowɔ dɔ , ke nu ka ta woxɔ fetu wo ̀ sɔ kple mi ́ ame siwo wɔ dɔ ŋkeke blibo la kata ̃ le ŋdɔ sese ̃ nu la tɔ ? ’ ”

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Agbletɔa gblɔ na wo be , ‘ Nɔviwo , nyemedze agɔ le mia dzi o ɖe menye miawo ŋutɔe lɔ ̃ bena ame sia ame axɔ sidi wuieve si nye ŋkeke ɖeka ƒe fetu oa ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Mexee na mi , eya ta mitsɔe miadzo . Nye ŋutɔe lɔ ̃ xe ga home ma ke na ame sia ame

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Đe wo ̀ tsi tre ɖe se ŋu be ame naxe ga home si dze eŋu la na nɔvia ? Đe wo ̀ le be miado dziku elabena mewɔ dɔmenyoa ? ’

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Esia tae gba ̃ tɔ azu mlɔetɔ eye mlɔetɔ azu gba ̃ tɔ . ”

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dze mɔ ɖo ta Yerusalem eye esi wole mɔa dzi la eɖe kpɔ nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ,

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: hegblɔ nu siwo ava dzɔ ɖe edzi nenye be woɖo Yerusalem la na wo . Egblɔ na wo be , “ Woadem asi na Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple sefialawo eye woatso kufia nam .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Woatsɔm ade asi na Roma dziɖuɖua eye amewo aɖu fewu le ŋunye . Woakla ̃ m ɖe atitsoga ŋu maku , gake le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la mafɔ . ”

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Eva eme be Zebedeo vi eveawo dadaa va Yesu gbɔ , dze klo ɖe ekɔme eye wo ̀ biae be wo ̀ awɔ dɔmenyo tɔxɛ aɖe na ye .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Yesu biae bena , “ Nu ka dim ne ̀ le be mawɔ na wo ̀ ? ” Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu be , “ Medi be na ̃ na be vinye ŋutsuvi eve siawo nanɔ fiazikpui eve dzi le wo ̀ ɖusi kple mia me le wo ̀ fiaɖuƒe la me . ”

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Me ̀ nya nu si biam ne ̀ le o ! ” Azɔ etrɔ ɖe Yakobo kple Yohanes ŋu eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Miawo ha ̃ miate ŋu anɔ te ɖe fu dziŋɔ si kpe ge mala kpuie la nua ? ” Woɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , mi ́ ate ŋui . ”

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Anɔ eme be miate ŋu akpe fu dziŋɔ si kpe ge mala gake le anyinɔnɔ ɖe nye ɖusi kple mia me gome me ya la , ŋuse ̃ mele asinye be matɔ asi ame siwo anɔ afi ma la dzi o . Fofonye ŋutɔ tia ame siwo anɔ teƒe siawo la da ɖi xoxo . ”

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Dɔme ve nusrɔ ̃ la ewo mamlɛawo ŋutɔ esi wose nu si Yakobo kple Yohanes yi ɖabia Yesu .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Ke Yesu yɔ wo kata ̃ ƒo ƒui ɖe eɖokui gbɔ , hegblɔ na wo be , “ Le dzimaxɔsetɔwo dome la , fiawo ɖua wo teviwo dzi kple asi sese ̃ , eye nenema ke dɔnunɔlawo ha ̃ ɖua fia ɖe wo teviwo dzii .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Nyemedi be nenem nu sia nanɔ miawo ha ̃ dome o . Ame si le mia dome si di be yeanye mia nunɔla la , eyae wo ̀ le be wo ̀ anye miaƒe subɔvi .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Eye ame si di be yeanye gba ̃ tɔ le mi kata ̃ dome la eyae wo ̀ le be wo ̀ anye miaƒe subɔla anɔ dɔ tsɔm na mi .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Ele be miaƒe nuwɔna nanɔ abe tɔnye ene , elabena Nye Amegbetɔ Vi la nyemeva be woasubɔm o , ke boŋ ɖe meva be masubɔ amewo , eye matsɔ nye agbe ana ɖe ame geɖewo ƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ta . ”

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo do go le Yeriko dua me dzo yina la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe kplɔ wo ɖo .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ eve nɔ anyi ɖe mɔ si dzi wo ̀ to va yina la to . Esi wose bena Yesu gbɔna mɔ ma dzi to ge ava yi la wode asi ɣlidodo me bobobo nɔ gbɔgblɔm be , “ Aƒetɔ , Fia David Vi , kpɔ nublanui na mi ́ ! ”

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Amewo blu ɖe wo ta be woazi ɖoɖoe , gake kpao , fifi kura gɔ ̃ woƒe gbe ganɔ dzi dem ɖe edzi wu .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Yesu tɔ eye wo ̀ yɔ wo vɛ hebia wo be , “ Nu kae miedi be mawɔ na mi ? ”

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ edi be mi ́ aƒe ŋkuwo naʋu mi ́ akpɔ nu . ”

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Woƒe nu wɔ nublanui na Yesu ŋutɔ , eya ta etɔ asi woƒe ŋkuwo . Ŋkuawo ʋu enumake eye ameawo de asi nukpɔkpɔ me . Ale woawo ha ̃ kplɔ Yesu ɖo kple dzidzɔ ga ̃ aɖe .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Esi wo ̀ susɔ vie Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo naɖo Yerusalem la , wova ɖo du aɖe si woyɔna be Betfage si le Amitoa ŋu la me . Le afi sia la , Yesu dɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la eve ɖo ɖe kɔƒe aɖe si le wo ŋgɔ la me .

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: Egblɔ na wo bena , “ Ne miege ɖe kɔƒea me ko la , miakpɔ tedzinɔ aɖe kple via le ka me . Mitu ka wo eye miakplɔ wo vɛ .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Ne ame aɖe bia gbe mi la , migblɔ nɛ ko be , ‘ Aƒetɔ lae le wo hia ̃ m , eye ne miegblɔ esia la womagabia nya aɖeke mi o . ”

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Wowɔ esia be woatsɔ wu nyagblɔɖi si wogblɔ da ɖi le blema ke nu bena ,

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: “ Migblɔ na Zion vinyɔnuvi la bena , Wo ̀ Fia gbɔna gbɔwo ̀ , edo tedzi kple tedzivi , si nye dɔwɔla ̃ ! ”

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la eveawo wɔ ɖe Yesu ƒe gbe dzi ,

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: eye woyi ɖakplɔ tedziawo vɛ nɛ . Azɔ wotsɔ woƒe awuwo ɖo tedziawo dzi eye Yesu bɔbɔnɔ wo dzi .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ame geɖewo ŋutɔ le ameha la dome tsɔ woƒe avɔwo kple awuwo ɖo ɖe mɔtata dzi le eŋgɔ , bubuwo ha ̃ ŋe deʋayawo kple atilɔwo ɖo ɖe eŋgɔ be wo ̀ azɔ wo dzi .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ameha la ƒe akpa aɖe dze eŋgɔ eye bubu ha ̃ kplɔe ɖo kplikplikpli nɔ ɣli dom bena , “ Hosana na Fia David Vi la , woayra ame si gbɔna le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ me , Hosana le dziƒo ʋi ̃ i ̃ ”

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Esi Yesu ge ɖe Yerusalem dua me la , zi ga ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ tɔ , ame sia ame kloe nɔ biabiam be , “ Ame kae nye ame sia maha ̃ ? ”

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Ame siwo nɔ Yesu ŋu la ɖo eŋu be , “ Eyae nye Yesu , nyagblɔɖila si tso Nazaret le Galilea . ”

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Azɔ Yesu yi gbedoxɔ la me , eye wo ̀ nya nudzralawo do goe , le teƒea . Etu afɔ gaɖɔlilawo ƒe kplɔ ̃ wo ƒu anyi , eye wo ̀ kaka akpakpadzralawo ƒe kplɔ ̃ wo ha ̃ .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Egblɔ na wo bena , “ Mawunya fia mi be nye gbedoxɔ anye gbedoɖaƒe , gake miawo la mietsɔe wɔ fiafitɔwo ƒe nɔƒee . ”

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nya ameawo vɔ la , ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo kple tekunɔwo va egbɔ eye wo ̀ da gbe le wo ŋu le gbedoxɔ la me .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Gake esi Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple sefialawo kpɔ nukunu dzɔtsu siwo wo ̀ wɔ eye wose ɖevi suetɔ kekeake ha ̃ wo ̀ nɔ ɣli dom bena , “ Hosana na Fia David Ƒe Vi la ” la , dɔme ve wo ŋutɔ .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Wobiae bena , “ E ̀ se nu si gblɔm ɖevi siawo lea ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ E ̃ , gake miexle ̃ e kpɔ be , ‘ E ̀ dzra kafukafu kple dodoɖedzi ɖe ɖeviwo kple vidzi ̃ wo ƒe nume ’ oa ? ” "

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Le esia megbe la etrɔ yi Betania eye wo ̀ tsi afi ma dɔ .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Le ŋufɔke esi Yesu fɔ gayina Yerusalem le ŋdi me la , dɔ wui le mɔa dzi .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Ekpɔ gboti alo kutsetseti aɖe le mɔa to ale wo ̀ zɔ ɖe edzi be yeakpɔ kutsetse aɖe le edzi agbe aɖu maha ̃ ? Ke esi wo ̀ va ɖo atia te la , aŋgbawo ko wo ̀ kpɔ le edzi . Yesu gblɔ na gboti la bena , " “ Tso egbe sia yina la , ma ̃ gatse ku gbeɖe o ! ” Enumake gboti la yrɔ ɖe tsitre nu .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Nu sia wɔ nuku na nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ , ale wobiae be , “ Nu kae na be gboti la yrɔ enumake ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Le nyateƒe me la ne xɔse vava ̃ le mia si eye ɖikeke mele mia me o la , miate ŋu awɔ nu siawo , eye nu siwo miawɔ la akɔ wu esiwo mewɔ kura gɔ ̃ . Miate ŋu agblɔ na to si kpɔm miele le afii kura gɔ ̃ be , ho na ̃ yi aɖadze atsiaƒu me , eye wo ̀ ava eme enumake .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Nu sia nu si miabia to gbedodoɖa kple xɔse me la woana mi . ”

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Yesu yi gbedoxɔ la me eye esi wo ̀ nɔ nu fiam la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo va egbɔ hebiae bena , “ Ŋuse ̃ kae ne ̀ kpɔ hafi le nu siawo wɔm eye ame kae na ŋuse ̃ sia wo ̀ ? ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nye ha ̃ mabia biabia ɖeka mi . Ne mieɖo eŋuti nam la , ekema nye ha ̃ magblɔ afi si mekpɔ ŋuse ̃ tsoe hafi le nu siawo wɔm la na mi .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Yohanes ƒe mawutsidede ta na ame ɖe , afi kae wo ̀ tso ? Dziƒoe wo ̀ tso loo alo amewo gbɔe wo ̀ tsoa ? ” Wodzro nya sia me le wo ɖokuiwo dome eye wogblɔ bena , “ Ne mi ́ egblɔ be , ‘ Tso dziƒo ’ la , abia mi ́ be , ‘ Ekema nu ka ŋutie miexɔ edzi se o ? ’

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Ke ne mi ́ egblɔ be , ‘ Tso amewo gbɔ ’ la , mi ́ ele vɔvɔ ̃ m na nu si ameawo lawɔ elabena wo kata ̃ xɔe se be Yohanes nye nyagblɔɖila . ”

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ale woɖo nya la ŋu na Yesu be , “ Mi ́ enya o . ” Tete Yesu ha ̃ gblɔ na wo be , “ Nye ha ̃ nyemagblɔ afi si mexɔ mɔɖeɖe tsoe hafi le nu siawo wɔm o . ”

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Azɔ Yesu yi edzi gblɔ bena , “ Ale ke miekpɔ tso nya si gbɔna la ŋuti ? Ŋutsu aɖe si si viŋutsu eve nɔ la gblɔ na tsitsitɔ be , ‘ Vinye yi na ̃ wɔ dɔ le agble me nam egbe . ’

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Đevia ɖo eŋu be , ‘ Nyemayi o . ’ Ke emegbe la etrɔ eƒe susu eye wo ̀ yi agblea me ɖawɔ dɔa .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Fofoa gblɔ na ɖevitɔ ha ̃ be , ‘ Yi na ̃ wɔ dɔ nam le agble me . ’ Đevi la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Papa mayi ’ Ke egbe meyi o .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Le ɖevi eve siawo dome ɖe , ame kae wɔ fofoa ƒe gbe dzi ? ” Azɔ Yesu ɖe lododoa gɔme na wo bena , “ Le nyateƒe me la , ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple gbolowo kura age ɖe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me hafi miawo miava yi .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Elabena Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela gblɔe na mi be midzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ eye miaku ɖe Mawu ŋu , gake mieɖo toe o , gake ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple gbolowo ɖo toe eye wodzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ . Ke nu si vɔ ̃ ɖi wu lae nye be esi miekpɔ be ame siawo dzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ha ̃ la , metso fu le la ̃ me na mi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be miawo ha ̃ miadzudzɔ o , ke boŋ miese ̃ dzime goŋgoŋgoŋ . ”

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Miɖo to miase lododo sia ɖa , Agbledela aɖe de waingble ga ̃ aɖe eye wo ̀ tɔ kpɔ ƒo xla ̃ e . Etu nɔƒe tɔxɛ na agblea ŋudzɔla eye wo ̀ tu wainfiaƒe ha ̃ . Azɔ etsɔ agblea de asi na agbledelawo be woawɔ dɔ le eme ale be yeama viɖe si ado tso eme la kpli wo . Le esia wɔwɔ vɔ megbe la , agbletɔ la ŋutɔ dzo yi du bubu aɖe me . ”

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Esi nuŋeɣi ɖo la , eɖo dɔlawo ɖe agblea dzi kpɔlawo gbɔ be woaxɔ yeƒe viɖe vɛ na ye .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Ke agbledzikpɔlawo dze ame dɔdɔawo dzi wu ɖeka , ƒo ɖeka vevie eye woƒu kpe e ̀ tɔ ̃ lia .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: ” Agbletɔ la gaɖo ameha ga ̃ bubu ɖa gake wowɔ fu woawo ha ̃ abe amedɔdɔ gba ̃ tɔwo ene .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Mlɔeba la , agbletɔ la dɔ via ŋutsu ɖa kple susu sia be woade bubu eya ŋu elabena enye via .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: ” Gake kpao , esi agbledzikpɔla siawo kpɔ ŋutsuvia wo ̀ gbɔna la , wogblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Ehe ̃ , ame siae le fofoa ƒe dome nyi ge ale be teƒe sia kata ̃ gbɔna etɔ zu ge , mi ́ a tɔwo mina mi ́ awui bena agble sia nazu mi ́ a tɔ ! ”

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Ale wohe agbletɔ la ƒe vi do goe le agblea me eye wowui .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Yesu yi edzi bia wo be , “ Nenye be agbletɔ la ŋutɔ gbɔ ɖe , nu kae miebu be awɔ agbledzikpɔla vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo ? ”

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ana woawu ame vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo eye wo ̀ axɔ agblea atsɔ na ame siwo awɔ eƒe gbe dzi la . ”

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Yesu gabia wo bena , “ Miexle ̃ le mawunya me kpɔ be , ‘ Kpe si xɔtulawo gbe be yewomaza ̃ o lae va zua dzogoedzikpe na xɔ la oa ? Esia menye nu wɔnuku aɖe si Aƒetɔ la wɔ oa ? ’

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: ” Nya si gblɔm mele na mi la gɔme kpuie koe nye be woaxɔ mawufiaɖuƒe la le mia si atsɔ na dukɔ bubu , si atsɔ viɖe si nye Mawu tɔ la vɛ nɛ .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Nyateƒe , nya sia ɖe wo ̀ le abe kpe ene , ame si akli kpe sia la , aŋe kluikluiklui eye ame si dzi kpe sia age adze la , agba gudugudu . ”

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Farisitɔwo kpɔe dze sii be yewoe nye agbledzikpɔla vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo ŋu Yesu ƒo nu le , le lododo la me eye yewo ŋutie wo ̀ le nya la gblɔm ɖo .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Le esia ta , wodi vevie be yewoawui , gake wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m be ne yewole ́ e la , ameha la atɔ zi elabena wonya be ameha la xɔe se be Yesu nye nyagblɔɖila .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Yesu gado lo bubu na ameha la gblɔ be ,

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: “ Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la le abe Fia aɖe si ɖo srɔ ̃ ɖekplɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe na via ene .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Wokpe ame geɖewo ɖe kplɔ ̃ sia ŋu eye esi nu sia nu sɔ gbe vɔ la , fia la ɖo dɔlawo ɖe ame kpekpeawo be woava elabena ɣeyiɣia ɖo be wɔnawo nadze egɔme , gake ame kpekpewo kata ̃ gbe womeva o .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Fia la gadɔ dɔla bubuwo ɖo ɖe ame kpekpeawo gbɔ kple gbedeasi sia be , ‘ Nu sia nu sɔ gbe vɔ , nuɖuɖua bi eya ta miva . Ame sia ame neɖe abla ne wo ̀ ava . ’ ”

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Ke esi ame kpekpeawo se nya sia la ɖeko woko nu eye wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe dzo yi nu si dze eŋu la wɔ ge , ɖeka yi eƒe agble me , eye bubu yi asigbe .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Ke ɖewo do dɔmedzoe ɖe dɔlawo ŋu ƒo wo vevie eye woɖi gbɔ ̃ ɖewo wu ɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Fia la do dɔmedzoe ale wo ̀ dɔ eƒe asrafowo woyi ɖawu hlɔ ̃ dola siawo eye wotɔ dzo woƒe du la wo ̀ bi keŋ .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Le esia megbe la fia la gblɔ na eƒe dɔlawo bena , ‘ Nu sia nu sɔ gbe na ŋkekea ɖuɖu gake ame siwo mekpe la , medze na bubu si mede wo ŋu o .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Eya ta miyi mɔtatawo dzi kple ablɔwo ƒe dzogoewo me , eye ame sia ame si miakpɔ ko la , mikpee va kplɔ ̃ a ŋuti . ’

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: ” Dɔlawo wɔ ɖe esia dzi , eye eteƒe medidi o wokplɔ amewo vɛ fu ̃ , ame nyuiwo kple ame baɖawo siaa , eye ale srɔ ̃ ɖekplɔ ̃ a ŋu yɔ fu ̃ kple amewo .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Esi fia la ŋutɔ va do be yeado gbe na ame kpekpeawo la , ekpɔ ame ɖeka le wo dome si medo srɔ ̃ ɖewu si wotsɔ nɛ be wo ̀ ado la o . ”

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Fia la biae be , ‘ Xɔ ̃ nye , ale ke wɔ medo srɔ ̃ ɖewu hafi va afi sia o ? ’ Ke ŋutsua ƒe nu tsi te elabena menya nya si tututu wo ̀ agblɔ o .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Fia la ɖe gbe na eŋutimewo bena ‘ Mibla eƒe asiwo kple afɔwo eye miatsɔe aƒu gbe ɖe blukɔ tsiɖitsiɖi me le xexe afi si avifafa kple aɖukliɖuɖu lanɔ . ’

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Elabena woyɔ ame geɖewo ke ame ʋee aɖewo koe nye ame siwo wotia . ”

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Farisitɔwo kpe ta eye wode ŋugble le ale si woawɔ atsɔ biabia aɖe atre mɔ na Yesu ale ́ e la ŋu .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Wodɔ woƒe nusrɔ ̃ la aɖewo kpe ɖe Herodia dunyahelawo ŋu eye wobiae be , “ Nufiala , mi ́ enyae be ame si de blibo lae ne ̀ nye , eye nefiaa Mawu ƒe mɔ le nyateƒe la nu . Amewo ƒe nyagbɔgblɔ meblea nuwo ̀ o elabena me ̀ tsɔa ɖeke le nu si wonye la me o .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Azɔ gblɔe na mi ́ , nu kae nye wo ̀ susu ? Ele eteƒe be woadzɔ duga na Kaisaro loo alo mele eteƒe o ? ”

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Ke Yesu nya nu vɔ ̃ ɖi si woɖo ɖe tame eya ta ebia wo be , “ Mi alakpanuwɔlawo ! Ame kae miedi bena yewoatre mɔ na kple miaƒe aye biabia sia ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Mitsɔ kɔba aɖe si wotsɔna xea dugae la vɛ nam makpɔ . ” Eye wotsɔ Roma ga ɖeka va fiae .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Azɔ ebia wo bena , “ Ame ka ƒe nɔnɔmetatae le ga sia dzi eye ame ka ƒe ŋkɔe le ete ? ”

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Kaisaro tɔe . ” Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Enyo , mitsɔ nu sia nu si nye Kaisaro tɔ la na Kaisaro eye miatsɔ nu sia nu si nye Mawu ha ̃ tɔ la na Mawu . ” "

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Esi wose eƒe ŋuɖoɖoa la , wotsi yaa elabena ewɔ nuku na wo ŋutɔ be wo ̀ ɖo nya la ŋu nyuie alea eya ta wogble ̃ e ɖi hedzo .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Gake le gbe ma gbe ke la , Zadukitɔ aɖewo ame siwo mexɔ se bena ame kukuwo atsi tre le nuwuwua o la va egbɔ va biae bena , ” "

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Aƒetɔ , Mose de se na mi ́ bena ne ŋutsu aɖe ɖe srɔ ̃ eye medzi vi hafi ku o la , nɔvia ŋutsu naɖe ahosia eye wo ̀ adzi vi kplii , ale be ɖeviawo nanyi ameyinugbea ƒe dome .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Azɔ nɔviŋutsu adre aɖewo nɔ mi ́ a dome , woƒe tsitsitɔ ɖe srɔ ̃ gake medzi vi kple nyɔnua hafi ku o , ale eyometɔ xɔ ahosia ɖe .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Gake eya ha ̃ medzi vi aɖeke kple nyɔnu sia hafi ku o , eye wo nɔvi etɔ ̃ lia xɔ ahosia ɖe gake kpao eya ha ̃ ku vi madzimadzii . Ale nɔviŋutsu adreawo kata ̃ ɖe nyɔnu sia kpɔ gake ɖeke medzi vi kplii o .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Mlɔeba la nyɔnua ŋutɔ ha ̃ va ku .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Biabia lae nye be , ame ka tɔ nyɔnu sia azu le tsitretsitsi ŋkekea dzi ? Elabena eɖe nɔvi adreawo kata ̃ kpɔ ! ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Miewɔ vodada ga ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ , elabena mienya mawunya kple Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ o .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Elabena le tsitretsitsi ŋkekea dzi srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe maganɔ anyi o ; amewo kata ̃ anɔ abe mawudɔla siwo le dziƒo ene .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: ke le ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi ŋuti la , mabia mi be , miexle ̃ mawunya kpɔ oa ? Mienyae bena miawoe Mawu nɔ nu ƒom na esi wo ̀ gblɔ be ,

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: ‘ Nyee nye Abraham , Isak kple Yakɔb ƒe Mawu ’ oa ? Eya ta minyae bena Mawu la , menye ame kukuwo ƒe Mawu wo ̀ nye o , ke boŋ ame gbagbewo ƒe Mawu wo ̀ nye . ” "

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Yesu ƒe ŋuɖoɖo la wɔ nuku na ameha la ŋutɔ .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Ke esi Farisitɔwo se be Yesu de ga nu na Zadukitɔwo la woƒo wo ɖokui nu ƒu .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Eye wo dometɔ ɖeka , ame si nye sefiala ga ̃ aɖe la tee kpɔ hebia be , " “

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: Nufiala , Se kae nye ga ̃ tɔ wu le Mose ƒe seawo dome ? ”

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Lɔ ̃ Aƒetɔ wo ̀ Mawu la kple wo ̀ dzi blibo , wo ̀ luʋɔ blibo kpakple wo ̀ susu kata ̃ .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Esiae nye se gba ̃ tɔ kple ga ̃ tɔ wu .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Esi gakplɔe ɖo lae nye be na ̃ lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe ale si ko ne ̀ lɔ ̃ wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ene .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Wotu se bubuawo kata ̃ kple nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nyawo ɖe se eve siawo dzi . ”

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Esia megbe la , Farisitɔwo va ƒo xla ̃ e ale wo ̀ bia wo bena , “

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Ale ke miekpɔ tso Mesia la ŋutɔ ŋu ? Ame ka vie wo ̀ nye ? ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ David vie ! ”

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Yesu gabia wo bena , “ Ne enye David vi la , nu ka ta esi Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la va David dzi wo ̀ nɔ nu ƒom la , eyɔ Mesia la be ‘ Aƒetɔ ’ ɖo ? Miakpɔe le mawunya me be , David gblɔ bena

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: ‘ Mawu gblɔ na nye Aƒetɔ bena , nɔ anyi ɖe nye nuɖusime va se ɖe esime matsɔ wo ̀ futɔwo awɔ wo ̀ afɔtenui . ’

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Esime David yɔ Mesia la be , ‘ Aƒetɔ ’ ɖe , ale ke wɔ wo ̀ ganye via ? ”

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Nyateƒe , biabia la lolo wu wo ale be womete ŋu ɖo eŋuti o . Le esia megbe la ame aɖeke medo dzi gabia nya aɖekee o .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Tete Yesu gblɔ na ameha la kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena ,

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: “ Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo nɔ Mose ƒe zi dzi .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Eya ta miɖo to wo eye miawɔ nu sia nu si wogblɔ na mi gake migawɔ nu si wowɔna la o , elabena woawo ŋutɔ mewɔna ɖe nu siwo fiam wole la dzi o .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Woblaa agba kpekpewo hetsɔna ɖoa amewo ƒe abɔta gake woawo ŋutɔ mele klalo be yewoatsɔ yewoƒe asibidɛ akpe ɖe ameawo ŋu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: ” Nu sia nu si wowɔna la , ɖe wowɔnɛ ko be yewoadze abe ame nyuiwo ene le gota . Woƒe mawunya kpukpui , ŋkuɖodzinu siwo wosana ɖe ŋgonu kple abɔ la kekena wua ame sia ame tɔ eye wodea dzesi tɔxɛ woƒe awuʋlayawo to be amewo nakpɔ be yewo nye ame kɔkɔewo .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Wolɔ ̃ a kplɔ ̃ ta nɔnɔ le nuɖuƒewo eye wolɔ ̃ a ŋgɔgbe zikpuiwo dzi nɔnɔ le woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Ne wole ablɔ dzi yina eye amewo le ŋkɔ dam ɖe wo dzi be , ‘ Nufiala ’ kple ‘ Aƒetɔ ’ la , evivia wo nu ŋutɔ .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Migana be ame aɖeke nada ŋkɔ siawo tɔgbi ɖe mia dzi o . Elabena Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ koe nye miaƒe Nufiala , eye le mia dome la , mi kata ̃ miesɔ abe nɔviwo ene .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Migayɔ ame aɖeke le anyigba dzi afi sia be Fofo o , elabena Mawu ɖeka si le dziƒo koe wo ̀ le be mi ́ ayɔ nenema .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Eye migana ha ̃ be woayɔ mi be Nufiala o , elabena Nufiala ɖeka koe li na mi , eyae nye Mesia la .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: ” Ne miebɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo eye miesubɔ ame bubuwo la , miaƒe ga ̃ nyenye adze wu le wo gbɔ . Ne ame aɖe di bena yeanye amega ̃ la , netsɔ eɖokui wɔ subɔlae boŋ .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ame siwo doa wo ɖokuiwo ɖe dzi la , woaɖiɖi wo ɖe anyi . Ke ame siwo bɔbɔa wo ɖokuiwo ɖe anyi la woado wo ɖe dzi .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: ” Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo , alakpanuwɔlawo ! Mietu dziƒofiaɖuƒe la ƒe agbo ɖe amewo nu . Miawo ŋutɔ miele eme yi ge o , eya ta mieɖe mɔ be ame siwo le agbagba dzem be woage ɖe eme la ha ̃ nayi eme o .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo , alakpanuwɔlawo ! Miekpɔ mɔ le ahosiwo ŋu , hexɔa woƒe aƒewo le wo si sese ̃ tɔe eye emegbe miebua doa gbe didiwo ɖa ! Le esia ta la miaƒe tohehe asese ̃ wu bubuawo tɔ !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo , alakpanuwɔlawo ! Mietsana le anyigbadzi kple atsiaƒuwo dzi , E ̃ , afi sia afi ko be miawɔ ame ɖeka wo ̀ azu Yudatɔ le xɔse me , eye ne ezui la , miewɔnɛ wo ̀ zua dzomavɔʋemevi zigbɔ zi eve wu miawo ŋutɔ .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: Babaa na mi , mi kplɔla ŋkugbagba ̃ tɔwo . ! Miegblɔna be , ‘ Ne ame aɖe yɔ gbedoxɔ ta nui la medze vɔ ̃ o , gake ne eyɔ sika si le gbedoxɔ me ta nui la , atam la blae ’

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Mi bometsila ŋkugbagba ̃ tɔwo ! Kae lolo wu , sika la alo gbedoxɔ si wɔ sika la gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be wo ̀ le dzadzɛa ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Miawo kee gblɔ be ame si ta vɔsamlekpuia la , ate ŋu ada le atam si wo ̀ ka la dzi faa , gake ne ame aɖe ta nunana si le vɔsamlekpuia dzi la , edze agɔ vevie nenye be wo ̀ da le ŋugbe si wo ̀ do la dzi .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Mi ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo ! Kae le vevie wu , nunana si le vɔsamlekpuia dzi loo alo vɔsamlekpuia ŋutɔ si nana be nunana ŋuti kɔna ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Nenye be mieta vɔsamlekpuia ekema mietae kple nu siwo kata ̃ le edzi ,

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: eye ne mieta gbedoxɔ la , ekema mietae kple Mawu ame si nɔa eme .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Nenye be mieta ‘ Dziƒo ’ la minyae be mieta Mawu ƒe Fiazikpui kple Mawu ame si nɔa edzi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ” Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo alakpanuwɔlawo ! Mienaa adrike , sikɔni kple tsyo ƒe ewoliawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ , gake miegble ̃ se la ƒe nu vevietɔ siwo nye afia nyui tsotso , nublanuikpɔkpɔ kple nuteƒewɔwɔ la ɖi . Ele be miawɔ ɖe esiawo ha ̃ dzi eye mele be miagbe ekemɛawo ha ̃ o .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Mi kplɔla ŋkugbagba ̃ tɔwo ! Mieɖea nudzodzoe suetɔ kekeake le miaƒe nunonowo me ƒua gbe , gake miehemia kposɔ ya .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo ! Mieklɔa kplu kple nuɖugba ŋuti , gake wo me yɔ fu ̃ u kple ŋukekle ̃ kpakple ɖokuitɔdidi .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Farisitɔ ŋkugbagba ̃ tɔwo ! Miklɔ kplu la kple nuɖugba la me gba ̃ ekema wo godo ha ̃ laɖi nyuie .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: ” Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo , alakpanuwɔlawo ! Đeko miele abe yɔdokpe siwo wosi akalo na la ene , esiwo dzena le gota nyuie , ke wo me yɔ fu ̃ u kple ame kukuwo ƒe ƒuwo kple numakɔmakɔ bubuwo .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Miawo ha ̃ , nenema kee miedze le gota le amewo gbɔ abe ame dzɔdzɔewo ene , gake miaƒe ememe yɔ fu ̃ u kple alakpanuwɔwɔ kpakple vɔɖivɔ ̃ ɖi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: ” Babaa na mi , mi Sefialawo kple Farisitɔwo , alakpanuwɔlawo ! Miewɔ ŋkuɖodzikpe na nyagblɔɖilawo eye mieɖo atsyɔ ̃ na ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe yɔdowo .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Eye miegblɔ bena , ‘ Ne ɖe mi ́ enɔ agbe le mi ́ a fofowo ŋɔli la , mi ́ awɔ ɖeka kpli wo le nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe ʋu kɔkɔɖi me o ’

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Ale mieɖi ɖase le miawo ŋutɔ ɖokui ŋu be mienye ame siwo wu nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe dzidzimeviwo .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Enyo ŋutɔ , azɔ miwu nu vɔ ̃ dɔ si gɔme mia fofowo dze la nu .

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: ” Mi dawo ! Dawo ƒe dzidzimeviwo ! Ale ke miawɔ asi le dzomavɔʋe ƒe fɔbubu nu ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: ” Eya ta mele nyagblɔɖilawo , nunyalawo kple nufiala siwo me Gbɔgbɔa yɔ fu ̃ la ha ̃ ɖom ɖe mi , ke miawo la , miawu wo dometɔ aɖewo alo akla ̃ wo ɖe atitsoga ŋu , miaƒo ɖewo le miaƒe ƒuƒoƒewo eye miati geɖewo ha ̃ ƒe agbe yome tso afii yi afi mɛ .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Ne miewɔ esiawo la ekema ame kɔkɔe siwo wowu tso keke Abel dzi va se ɖe Zakaria , Barakia vi si miewu le Vɔsamlekpui kple Kɔkɔeƒea dome le gbedoxɔa me la ƒe ʋu ava mia dzi .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: E ̃ , mele egblɔm na mi bena , tohehe siwo kata ̃ wodzra ɖo ɖi tso ɣemaɣi ke va se ɖe fifia la ava dzidzime sia dzi .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ” O , Yerusalem , Yerusalem , wo ̀ du si me tɔwo wu nyagblɔɖilawo eye woƒu kpe ame siwo Mawu ɖo ɖe wo ̀ ! Medi zi geɖe bena maƒo viwo ̀ wo nu ƒu abe ale si koklo ƒoa viawo nu ƒui ɖe eƒe aʋala ̃ wo te ene , gake wogbe womena mɔm o .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Azɔ woagble ̃ miaƒe aƒe ɖi na mi aƒedoe .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , miagakpɔm azɔ o , va se ɖe esime miagblɔ be woayra ame si gbɔna le Aƒetɔa ƒe ŋkɔ me . ”

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Yesu do go le gbedoxɔ la me , hezɔ dzo yina , ke eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo te ɖe eŋu heɖo ŋku nu dzi nɛ tso xɔ bubu siwo le gbedoxɔ me la ŋuti .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Miele nu siawo kata ̃ kpɔma ? Mele egblɔm na mi , le nyateƒe me , be womagble kpe ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ ɖe nɔvia dzi o , woagba ̃ nu sia nu aƒu anyi . ”

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Azɔ edzo yi ɖanɔ Amito la dzi . Nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ va biae bena , “ Aƒetɔ , ɣekaɣie nu siawo kata ̃ ava eme ? Dzesi kawoe afia wo ̀ vava zi evelia kple xexeame ƒe nuwuwu ? ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Minɔ ŋudzɔ , be ame aɖeke nagaflu mi o .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Elabena ame geɖewo lava le nye ŋkɔme agblɔ be , ‘ Nyee nye Kristo la ’ eye woaflu ame geɖewo .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ne miese be aʋa dzɔ le afi aɖe eye aʋaɣliwo le ɖiɖim la , migaɖi vo alo avɔ ̃ o , elabena esia mefia be nye vava alo nuwuwu la ɖo o , nu siawo adzɔ gake nuwuwua meɖo haɖe o .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi mawo me la dukɔ atsi tre ɖe dukɔ ŋu eye fiaɖuƒe atsi tre ɖe fiaɖuƒe ŋu . Dɔ ato le teƒe geɖewo fu ̃ , hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la anyigba aʋuʋu le teƒe geɖewo .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Nu siawo nye kpɔkplɔyiɖeme ko na nu dziŋɔ siwo gbɔna . ”

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi mawo me la , amewo ade mi asi na yometitiwo kple wuwu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi me la , ame geɖewo atra ɖa le xɔse la gbɔ , woade wo nɔviwo asi eye woale ́ fu wo nɔewo vevie ,

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Aʋatsonyagblɔɖilawo abɔ fu ̃ eye woatra ame geɖewo .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ axɔ aƒe ale gbegbe be , amehavi lɔlɔ ̃ nu atsi

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ke ame si anɔ te ase ɖe nuwuwu la , woaɖee .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Azɔ la , woagblɔ fiaɖuƒe la ƒe nyanyui sia le xexeame kata ̃ abe ɖaseɖiɖi na dukɔwo kata ̃ ene , ekema nuwuwua ava . ”

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Eya ta , ne miekpɔ ‘ ŋunyɔnu si hea gbegble ̃ vanae ’ le tsitre ɖe Kɔkɔeƒe la , esi ƒe nya wogblɔ to nyagblɔɖila Daniel dzi la , nu sia xle ̃ la nese egɔme ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: ekema na ̃ na ame siwo le Yudea la nasi ayi towo dzi .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ame si le eƒe xɔ tame la nagaɖi ayi naneke tsɔ ge le aƒea me o .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Eye ame si le agble me la ha ̃ nagayi aƒe me be yeatsɔ yeƒe awuʋlaya o . ”

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Baba na funɔwo kple ame siwo si vidzi ̃ wo le le ŋkeke mawo me .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Mido gbe ɖa be , miaƒe sisigbe nagadze vuvɔŋɔli alo sabat ŋkeke dzi o .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi me la , xaxa si ƒomevi medzɔ kpɔ tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedze va se ɖe fifia o eye magadzɔ kpɔ o la anɔ anyi . ”

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , ne womeɖe le nenem ŋkekeawo dzi o la , amegbetɔ ƒomea kata ̃ atsrɔ ̃ . Ke meka ɖe edzi na mi be , le Mawu ƒe ame tiatiawo ta la woato ŋkeke siawo ɖe eme .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: ” Nenye be ame aɖe agblɔ na mi be , ‘ Mesia la va ɖo eye wo ̀ le afii alo afi mɛ alo wokpɔe le afi aɖe la , migaxɔe se o .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Elabena aʋatso kristotɔwo kple aʋatso nyagblɔɖilawo ava do eye woawɔ nukunu ga ̃ wo si dzi Mawu ƒe ame tiatiawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ate ŋu axɔ ase .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Kpɔ ɖa , megblɔe na mi do ŋgɔ lo !

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: ” Eya ta ne ame aɖe gblɔ na mi be ele gbedzi afi aɖe la , me ̀ gaɖe fu na ɖokuiwo ̀ be yeayi aɖakpɔe ɖa o . Alo ne ame aɖe be ebe ɖe teƒe aɖe la , me ̀ gaxɔe se o !

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Abe ale si dzi kea dzo le ɣedzeƒe wokpɔnɛ le ɣetoɖoƒe ene la , nenema ke Nye , Mesia la , ƒe vava anɔ .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Minyae bena afi si nukuku le la afi mae akagawo nɔna . ”

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Le xaxa ŋkeke mawo megbe teti ko la , ‘ Za ̃ dokeli ado , ɣleti magaɖi o , ɣletiviwo age tso dziƒo eye dziƒoŋunuwo aʋuʋu kpekpekpe .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: ” Le ɣemaɣi me la , Amegbetɔvi la ƒe dzesi ado ɖe dziŋgɔli me eye anyigba dzi dukɔwo kata ̃ afa konyi . Tete woakpɔ Amegbetɔ Vi la wo ̀ anɔ alilikpo dzi aɖiɖi gbɔna le ŋuse ̃ kple ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ aɖe me .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Eye wo ̀ adɔ eƒe dɔlawo kple kpe ̃ ƒe ɖiɖi sesi ̃ e eye woayi aɖa ƒo ametitiawo nu ƒu tso ya eneawo dzi , tso dziƒo ƒe dzogoe sia dzi , yi ekemɛ dzi . ”

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Azɔ misrɔ ̃ nu tso gboti ŋu . Nenye be tsi ɖo eƒe alɔwo me eye aŋgbawo de asi dodo me la , ekema minyae be dzomeŋɔli ɖo vɔ .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Nenema ke ne miekpɔ be nu siawo kata ̃ de asi dzɔdzɔ me la , ekema minyae be nye vava tu aƒe kpokploe .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , dzidzime sia nu mava yi o , va se ɖe esime nu siawo kata ̃ va eme .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: ” Dziƒo kple anyigba nu ava yi gake nye nyawo anɔ anyi ɖaa .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Ame aɖeke menya ŋkeke alo gaƒoƒo si dzi nuwuwua ava o , mawudɔlawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ menyae o , Mawu Vi la ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ menyae o , negbe Fofonye ɖeka hɔ ̃ ko .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Abe ale si wo ̀ dzɔ le Noa ŋɔli ene la , nenema wo ̀ anɔ le Amegbetɔ Vi la ƒe vava ɣeyiɣi me .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Elabena le ŋkeke siwo do ŋgɔ na tsiɖɔɖɔ me la , ameawo nɔ nu ɖum , nɔ nu nom , nɔ srɔ ̃ ɖem eye wotsɔa ame nana be wo ̀ aɖe , va se ɖe ŋkeke si dzi Noa ge ɖe aɖakaʋu la me ,

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: eye womenya nu si gbɔna dzɔdzɔ ge o , va se ɖe esime tsiɖɔɖɔ la va eye wo ̀ kplɔ wo kata ̃ dzoe . Nenemae wo ̀ anɔ le Amegbetɔ Vi la ƒe vavaɣi .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: ” Ame eve anɔ agble me anɔ dɔ wɔm , woava kplɔ ɖeka dzoe agble ̃ ɖeka ɖi .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Nyɔnu eve anɔ bli tum le te dzi , woatsɔ ɖeka agble ̃ evelia ɖi . ”

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Eya ta minɔ ŋudzɔ elabena mienya gbe si gbe miaƒe Aƒetɔ la ava o .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: ” Ne ame aɖe medi be fiafitɔ neva fi yeƒe nuwo le za ̃ me o la , enɔa ŋudzɔ na fiafitɔ la ƒe vava ,

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: eya ta miawo ha ̃ minɔ ŋudzɔ be nyemava lili mi o . ”

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Minye dɔla nuteƒewɔlawo kple aɖaŋudzela siwo ate ŋu akpɔ nye aƒe dzi ana nuɖuɖu vinyewo ɖe ɣeyiɣi dzi pɛpɛpɛ gbe sia gbe .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Nenye be metrɔ gbɔ va kpɔ mi miele miaƒe dɔdeasi siawo wɔm anukwaretɔe la , mayra mi ŋutɔ .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Nuteƒewɔla siawo tɔgbie matsɔ ɖo nu siwo kata ̃ le asinye la nu . ”

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Gake ne miewɔ abe ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo ene hegblɔ na mia ɖokuiwo be , ‘ Nye Aƒetɔ mava fifia o , ’

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: ale be miede asi dɔla bubuawo ƒoƒo me hele nutsuɖuɖu kple ahamumu dzi la ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: miaƒe Aƒetɔ la ava do ɖe mia dzi kpata le ɣeyiɣi si miele mɔ kpɔm nɛ o la me ,

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: eye wo ̀ aƒo mi vevie . Emegbe la ana woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu mi kple alakpanuwɔlawo eye afi ma miafa avi , aɖu aɖukli ha ̃ le . ”

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: “ Miatsɔ ɖetugbi ewo aɖewo ƒe ŋutinya atsɔ asɔ kple dziƒofiaɖuƒe lae . Đetugbi ewo siawo tsɔ woƒe akaɖiwo ɖe asi be yewoayi aɖakpe ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ aɖe .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Wo dome ame atɔ ̃ nye abunetɔwo , eye ame atɔ ̃ ha ̃ nye nunyalawo .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Abunetɔwo tsɔ woƒe akaɖiwo ke wometsɔ ami kpe ɖe akaɖiawo ŋu o .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Ke nunyalawo ya tsɔ ami kpe ɖe woƒe akaɖiawo ŋuti . Eva dzɔ be ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ a tsi megbe ale alɔ ̃ de asi ɖetugbiawo tsɔtsɔ me eye womlɔ anyi dɔ alɔ ̃ .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Ke le za ̃ titina la ɣli ɖi be , ‘ Ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la va ɖo azɔ . Mido go va kpee hee ! ’

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Đetugbiawo kata ̃ fɔ eye wodzra woƒe akaɖiawo ɖo .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Tete abunetɔawo gblɔ na nunyalawo be ‘ mina miaƒe amia ƒe ɖe mi ́ ’ elabena mi ́ aƒe akaɖiwo le tsitsim .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: ” Gake woɖo eŋu na abunetɔawo be , ‘ Mi ́ a tɔ ha ̃ mesɔ gbɔ ade mia kple mi ́ awo nu o eya ta miyi ne miadze ɖe na mia ɖokuiwo . ’

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: ” Kaka woaɖe afɔ la , ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la va ɖo xoxo eye ame siwo nɔ klalo la yi srɔ ̃ ɖeƒea kplii , eye wotu agbo si le aƒea nu . ”

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Emegbe ɖetugbi abunetɔ atɔ ̃ awo va do ɖe agboa nu nɔ ɣli dom be . ‘ Aƒetɔ , ʋu agbo la na mi ́ ! ’

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: ” Aƒetɔ , la ɖo eŋu na wo bena , ‘ Midzo le afi ma miayi , elabena mietsi megbe ! ’

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: ” Eya ta minɔ ŋudzɔ eye miadzra ɖo elabena mienya ŋkeke alo gaƒoƒo si dzi matrɔ ava o . ”

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Dziƒofiaɖuƒe la gasɔ kple Aƒetɔ aɖe si ɖo be yeawɔ mɔzɔzɔ ayi anyigba bubu aɖe dzi . Hafi wo ̀ adzo la eyɔ eƒe dɔlawo hetsɔ ga home vovovo de asi na wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe be wo ̀ atsɔ nɔ asi tsamii va se ɖe esime yeagbɔ .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: ” Etsɔ sidi akpe atɔ ̃ na ame gba ̃ tɔ , tsɔ sidi akpe eve na ame evelia eye wo ̀ tsɔ sidi akpe ɖeka na eme etɔ ̃ lia . Ema ga la na wo ɖe woƒe ŋutete nu , eye le esia megbe la edzo yi mɔa dzi .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Ame si xɔ sidi akpe atɔ ̃ la de asi asitsatsa me kplii enumake eye eteƒe medidi hafi wo ̀ gakpɔ Sidi akpe atɔ ̃ ɖe gatia dzi o .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Ame si xɔ Sidi akpe eve ha ̃ tsa asi kple etɔ eye wo ̀ gakpɔ Sidi akpe eve bubu ɖe edzi .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: ” Ke ame si xɔ Sidi akpe ɖeka la ya yi ɖaɖe do eye wo ̀ tsɔ ga la ɣla ɖe eme be wo ̀ anɔ dedie .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: ” Aƒetɔ la trɔ gbɔ le ŋkeke geɖewo megbe , eye wo ̀ yɔ dɔlawo be woava na akɔnta tso ga siwo wo ̀ tsɔ na wo la ŋuti .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Ame si wo ̀ tsɔ Sidi akpe atɔ ̃ na la tsɔ sidi akpe ewo vɛ nɛ .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: ” Eƒe Aƒetɔ kafui ŋutɔ le eƒe dɔ nyui si wo ̀ wɔ la ta . Egblɔ na dɔla la bena , ‘ Wo ̀ , dɔla nyui , e ̀ wɔ nuteƒe ŋutɔ eya ta tso azɔ dzi la matsɔ dɔ geɖe ade wo ̀ dzikpɔkpɔ te . Va ne na ̃ kpɔ dzidzɔ kplim . ”

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Ame si xɔ Sidi akpe eve la ha ̃ va gblɔ na Aƒetɔa bena , ‘ Aƒetɔ , e ̀ tsɔ sidi akpe eve nam , gake megakpɔ sidi akpe eve bubu ɖe edzi . ’

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: ” Aƒetɔ la gblɔ nɛ kple dzidzɔ be , ‘ Dɔ nyui aɖee ma ne ̀ wɔ . Dɔla dzɔdzɔe kple nuteƒewɔlae ne ̀ nye . Esi ne ̀ ɖi anukware le ga home sue sia ŋudɔwɔwɔ me ta la , tso azɔ dzi la , matsɔ ga geɖe ade asi na wo ̀ . ’

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Ame si xɔ sidi akpe ɖeka ha ̃ va do eye wo ̀ do dzi gblɔ na Aƒetɔ la be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , menyae bena wo ̀ nya ɖe wo ̀ se , eŋea nu le afi si me ̀ ƒa ̃ nu ɖo o eye ne ̀ ƒoa nu ƒu le afi si me ̀ wu nu ɖo o ,

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: ale menɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m be ne mekpɔ viɖe aɖe ɖe ga la dzi la a ̃ xɔe le asinye bɔbɔe , eya ta metsɔ wo ̀ ga la ɣla eye esi ne ̀ va la mehee ɖe go . Eyae nye esi . ’ ”

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Aƒetɔ la ɖo eŋu nɛ kple dɔmedzoe be , ‘ Dɔla vɔ ̃ ɖi kple kuviatɔe ne ̀ nye ; esi ne ̀ nya be ame sese ̃ e menye eye meŋea nu le afi si nyemeƒa ̃ nu ɖo o eye meƒoa nu ƒu le afi si nyemewu nu ɖo o eye esi ne ̀ nyae ha ̃ be mele viɖe bia ge ɖe gaa dzi la ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: ele na wo ̀ be na ̃ tsɔ ga la da ɖe gadzraɖoƒe nam teti be wo ̀ ahe viɖe vi aɖe vɛ nam .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Mixɔ ga la le ame vɔ ̃ ɖi sia si eye miatsɔe na ame si si sidi akpe ewo le la .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Elabena ame si wɔ nu si wotsɔ nɛ ŋudɔ nyuie la , woagatsɔ nu geɖe akpee nɛ , nu nasɔ gbɔ ɖe esi fu ̃ . Ke ame si meɖia anukware o la , woaxɔ nu suetɔ kekeake si le esi la ha ̃ le esi .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Woatsɔ dɔla ɖigbɔ ̃ sia aƒu gbe ɖe viviti si do tsiɖitsiɖi la me , afi ma avifafa kple aɖukliɖuɖu anɔ .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: ‘ Ne nye Mesia la meva le nye ŋutikɔkɔe me kple mawudɔlawo kata ̃ la , ekema manɔ anyi ɖe nye ŋutikɔkɔe fiazikpui la dzi .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Ekema dukɔ siwo kata ̃ le xexeame alo ame siwo kata ̃ le xexeame la aƒo ƒu ɖe ŋkunyeme . Eye mama ameawo me ɖe akpa eve , abe ale si ale ̃ kplɔla ma ale ̃ wo ɖa tso gbɔ ̃ wo gbɔe ene .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Mada ale ̃ awo ɖe nye nuɖusime , eye gbɔ ̃ wo anɔ nye miame . ”

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Ekema Nye , Fia la , magblɔ na ame siwo le nye nuɖusime bena , ‘ Fofonye ƒe ame yayrawo , miyi ɖe Fiaɖuƒe si wo ̀ dzra ɖo ɖi na mi tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea me ke la me .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Elabena esi dɔ wum la , miena nuɖuɖum , tsikɔ wum eye miena tsim , medze mi abe amedzro ene eye miexɔm atuu ɖe miaƒe aƒewo me .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Awu menɔ ŋunye o gake mietsɔ awu nam medo . Medze dɔ mieva kpɔm ɖa . Menɔ gaxɔ me eye mieɖi tsa va gbɔnye . ”

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Ame dzɔdzɔewo abia be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , ɣekaɣie miekpɔ wo ̀ dɔ nɔ wuwo ̀ m eye mi ́ ena nuɖuɖu wo ̀ ? Alo tsi kɔ nɔ wuwo ̀ m mi ́ ena tsi wo ̀ ne ̀ no kpɔ ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Ɣekaɣie ne ̀ va dze mi ́ abe amedzro ene ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Eye gbe ka gbee mi ́ etsɔ awu na wo ̀ ne ̀ do kpɔ ? Ɣekaɣie wode wo ̀ mɔ alo ne ̀ dze dɔ eye mieva kpɔ wo ̀ ɖa ? ’

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: ” Eye nye Fia la maɖo eŋu na wo bena , ‘ Esi miewɔ nu siawo kata ̃ na nɔvinye sue siawo dometɔ aɖe ta la , nyee miewɔ wo na ! ’ ”

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Azɔ matrɔ ɖe ame siwo le nye miame la ŋu agblɔ na wo be , ‘ Mite ɖa le gbɔnye , mi ame siwo woƒo fi de . Miyi dzomavɔ si wodzra ɖo ɖi na Abosam kple eƒe dɔlawo la me .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Elabena esi dɔ wum la , miena nuɖuɖum o , tsikɔ wum miena tsim be mano o .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Meva dze mi abe amedzro ene gake miexɔm o , menɔ amama gake mietsɔ awu nam be mado o , medze dɔ gake mieva kpɔm ɖa o , wodem mɔ gake medzro mi be miava do gbe teti nam o . ’ ”

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Woawo ha ̃ aɖo eŋu nam be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , gbe ka gbe mi ́ ekpɔ wo ̀ bena , dɔ le wuwom , alo tsikɔ le wuwo ̀ m eye mi ́ ekpɔ gbɔwo ̀ o ? Ɣekaɣie ne ̀ dze mi ́ a gbɔ , ne ̀ le amama , ne ̀ dze dɔ alo ne ̀ le gaxɔ me eye mi ́ eva kpɔ wo ̀ ɖa alo kpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ o ?

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: ” Ale maɖo eŋu na wo bena , ‘ Esime miegbe be yewomawɔ nu siawo na nɔvinye sue siawo dometɔ ɖeka teti o la nyee nye ema miewɔ wo na o . ’

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: ” Ale ame siawo ayi ɖe fukpekpe mavɔ me . Ke ame dzɔdzɔewo ayi agbe mavɔ la me . ”

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Esi Yesu ƒo nu na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo le nya siawo ŋu vɔ la , egblɔ na wo ha ̃ be ,

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: “ Abe ale si ke mienya ene la , Ŋutitotoŋkeke la adze gɔme le ŋkeke eve megbe , eye woadem asi akla ̃ m ɖe ati ŋuti . ”

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi ma tututu me la , Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudea dumega ̃ bubuwo kpe ta ɖe Osɔfoga ̃ tɔ , Kayafa ƒeme ,

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: be yewoade ŋugble tso ale si woawɔ ale ́ Yesu le bebe me awui la ŋuti .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
