text2: Ke wo kata ̃ wolɔ ̃ ɖe edzi bena , “ Mi ́ awɔ nu sia gake menye le Ŋutitotoŋkekea dzi o , ne menye nenema o la zi atɔ le dukɔa me . ”

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Azɔ Yesu yi Betania eye wo ̀ dze Simɔn anyidɔle ́ la la ƒeme .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Esi wonɔ nu ɖum la , nyɔnu aɖe va aƒea me kple amiʋeʋi ̃ xɔasi aɖe eye wo ̀ ʋui tsɔ kɔ ɖe tame na Yesu .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Esia ve dɔme na nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ eye wogblɔ bena , “ Nu ka ta wo ̀ le be ame natsɔ ga aƒu gbe ɖe yame alea ? Enyo be wo ̀ awɔ esia ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Ate ŋu adzra ami sia , akpɔ ga home ga ̃ aɖe atsɔ na ame dahewo ɖe . ”

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Yesu nya nu si bum nusrɔ ̃ lawo le ale wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Migaɖe ɖeklemi kple nyɔnua o , elabena nu nyui wo ̀ nye wo ̀ wɔ nam .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ame dahewo li kpli mi gbe sia gbe , ke nye la nyemanɔ mia gbɔ tegbee o .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be nye ku gbɔna kpuie ta la , ekɔ amiʋeʋi ̃ la ɖe dzinye bena wo ̀ adzra nye ŋutila ̃ ɖo hena ɖiɖi .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Nyɔnu sia ƒe ŋkɔ mele bubu ge akpɔ o elabena woagblɔ nu si wo ̀ wɔ la afia le xexeame godoo afi sia afi si woagblɔ nyanyui la le ko . ”

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Le nyadzɔdzɔ sia megbe la , Yuda Iskariɔt , nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo dometɔ ɖeka , yi ɖe Osɔfoga ̃ wo gbɔ

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: eye wo ̀ bia bena , “ Ho nenie miaxe nam nenye be mede Yesu asi na mi ? ” " Enumake woxle ̃ klosaloga blaetɔ ̃ tsɔ de asi nɛ .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Tso gbe ma gbe dzi ko Yuda de asi mɔ si dzi wo ̀ ato ade Yesu asi na Osɔfoga ̃ wo la didi me .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Le ŋkeke gba ̃ tɔ si do ŋgɔ na abolo maʋa ̃ maʋa ̃ ɖuɖu ƒe ŋkekea dzi la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo te ɖe Yesu ŋu eye wobiae be , " “ Afi kae mi ́ ele ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la ɖu ge le ? ”

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ne miege ɖe dua me teti ko la , miado go ŋutsu aɖe , mi gblɔ nɛ bena , ‘ Mi ́ aƒe Nufiala ɖo mi ́ ɖe gbɔwo ̀ be mi ́ agblɔ na wo ̀ be , yeƒe ɣeyiɣi la ɖo azɔ eya ta ye kple yeƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo yewoava dze gbɔwo ̀ aɖu ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la . ’ ”

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo wɔ ɖe Yesu ƒe gbe dzi pɛpɛpɛ eye wodzra ɖo na ŋkekea ɖuɖu le afi ma .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Le fie ̃ me la , Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ kplɔ ̃ ŋu eye woɖu nu .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Ke esi wonɔ nua ɖum la , Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Mia dometɔ ɖeka adem asi be woawu . ”

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Nya sia ɖi ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ ale wole ́ blanui . Wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe tsi dzodzodzoe eye wobiae be , “ Aƒetɔ nyea ? Aƒetɔ nyea ? ”

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ame si de asi nuɖugba me kplim lae le dɔ sia wɔ ge .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Ele nam be maku abe ale si nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔe da ɖi xoxo ene . Gake baba na ame si adem asi . Le nyateƒe me la , nenye be womegaxa dzii o la anyo nɛ wu sa ̃ . ”

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Ke azɔ la , Yuda ha ̃ bia Yesu be , “ Nufiala , nyee le nu sia wɔ gea ? ” Ke Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nɔvi , wo ̀ tututue le dɔ sia wɔ ge . ”

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Esi wonɔ nua ɖum la , Yesu tsɔ abolo ɖe asi . Edo gbe ɖa ɖe aboloa ta eye wo ̀ mae na wo be woaɖu . Esi wo ̀ tsɔ aboloa na wo be woaɖu la , egblɔ be , “ Mixɔe ɖu . Esiae nye nye ŋutila ̃ . ”

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Emegbe la etsɔ wainkplu la ha ̃ ɖe asi , do gbe ɖa ɖe eta eye wo ̀ tsɔe na wo be woano . Egagblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Mi kata ̃ mixɔe no ,

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: esia nye nye ʋu si wotsɔ tre nubabla yeyea nui . Wokɔe ɖi be ame geɖe nakpɔ nu vɔ ̃ tsɔtsɔke to eme . ”

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Yesu yi edzi gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena , “ Medi be mianya nyuie bena , nyemegale wain sia no ge akpɔ o , va se ɖe esi me nye kple miawo miaganoe yeyee le fofonye ƒe Fiaɖuƒe la me . ”

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Esi Yesu ƒo nu vɔ la , wo kata ̃ wodzi ha ɖeka eye wodo go heɖo ta amiti to la dzi .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Azɔ Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Le egbe ƒe za ̃ sia me la , mi kata ̃ miakaka le ŋunye . Elabena woŋlɔe ɖe mawunya me bena , ‘ Mele ale ̃ kplɔla la wu ge eye ale ̃ awo kata ̃ akaka gbe ̃ e . ’

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Gake ne megagbɔ agbe la , mayi ɖe Galilea eye mado go mi le afi ma . ”

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Petro tɔ asi akɔ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ne ame sia ame ka hle ̃ le ŋuwo ̀ ha ̃ la , nye ya nyemadzo le gbɔwo ̀ gbeɖegbeɖe o . ”

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nɔvi , le nyateƒe me la , kasia ne koklo naku atɔ le fɔŋli me la , a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zi etɔ ̃ . ”

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Petro gaɖo eŋu kple kakaɖedzi be , “ Ke ɖeko maku hafi agbe nu le gbɔwo ̀ ” Azɔ nusrɔ ̃ la bubuawo kata ̃ ha ̃ gblɔ nenema .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Ke Yesu kplɔ wo yi ɖe abɔ aɖe si woyɔna be Getsemane la me eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be woabɔbɔ nɔ anyi alala ye vie . Esi wonɔ elalam la , ezɔ yi ŋgɔ vie be yeado gbe ɖa .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Ekplɔ Petro kple Zebedeo vi eveawo siwo nye Yohanes kple Yakobo la ɖe asi . Esi wova ɖo teƒea la eƒe la ̃ me gbɔdzɔ eye wo ̀ le ́ blanui .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Ale wo ̀ gblɔ na wo bena , “ Nye la ̃ me gbɔdzɔ ŋutɔ eye nye dzi le nu xam heyi ku me ke , eya ta minɔ afi sia eye mianɔ ŋudzɔ kplim . ”

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Yesu zɔ yi ŋgɔ vie , edze klo eye wo ̀ tsyɔ mo anyi . Azɔ edo gbe ɖa be , “ Fofonye , ne anɔ bɔbɔe la , ekema ɖe kplu sia ɖa le dzinye . Ke na be nu si ke nye wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ nu la nava eme ke menye nu si medi la o . ”

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Yesu trɔ va nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo gbɔ kasia , ekpɔ be wonɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm bɔkɔɔ . Eyɔ Petro eye wo ̀ biae se bena , “ Ke miate ŋu anɔ ŋu kplim gaƒoƒo ɖeka pɛ oa ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Minɔ ŋudzɔ eye mido gbe ɖa , ne menye nenema o la , tetekpɔ aɖu mia dzi . Elabena gbɔgbɔ la le lɔlɔ ̃ m gake ŋutila ̃ ya gbɔdzɔ . ”

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Yesu gagble ̃ nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo ɖi heyi ɖado gbe ɖa ake be , “ Fofo , nenye be ele be mano kplu sia kokoko la , ekema mawɔ wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ nu . ”

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Esi wo ̀ gatrɔ va la ekpɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo woganɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm ko elabena alɔ ̃ bla woƒe ŋkuwo .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Etrɔ le wo gbɔ gayi ɖado gbe ɖa zi etɔ ̃ lia .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Azɔ etrɔ va nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Miate ŋu adɔ alɔ ̃ azɔ faa eye miadzudzɔ mia ɖokuiwo . Gake nɔviwo , ɣeyiɣi la de be woadem asi na nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Mitso mi ́ adze mɔ . Mikpɔ ɖa , ame si le denye ge asi la enye ma gbɔna . ”

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nua ƒom la Yuda ame si nye nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo dometɔ ɖeka lae nye ekem le ŋgɔ na ameha ga ̃ aɖe eye wozɔ gbɔna . Ameha siawo nye amedɔdɔwo tso Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfowo kple dumega ̃ wo gbɔ , eye wole ́ yiwo kple kpowo ɖe asi gbɔna .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Yuda gblɔ na wo do ŋgɔ be ame si dim wole lae nye ame si yeado gbe na eye yeagbugbɔ nu na la .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Yuda zɔ te ̃ e yi ɖe Yesu gbɔ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Medo gbe na wo ̀ , Nufiala , ” eye wo ̀ gbugbɔ nu nɛ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nɔvi , yi wo ̀ dɔ si ta ne ̀ va ɖo la dzi . ” Kasia , amewo lu ̃ ɖe Yesu dzi eye wole ́ e .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Enumake Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka ɖe eƒe yi le aku me eye wo ̀ kpa to na Yudatɔwo ƒe osɔfoga ̃ ƒe subɔvi ɖeka .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Me ̀ gawɔ wo ̀ yi ŋudɔ o , tsɔe de aku me , elabena ame siwo wɔa yi ŋudɔ la , ha ̃ kpɔa ku le yi nu .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Alo me ̀ nya be mate ŋu abia Fofonye eye wo ̀ ana mawudɔla akpeakpewo mi ́ be woadzɔ mi ́ a ŋu oa ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Ke ne mewɔ nenema ɖe ale ke nya siwo woŋlɔ da ɖi le mawunya me siwo le dzɔdzɔm fifia ha ̃ la awɔ hafi ava eme ? ”

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Azɔ Yesu trɔ ɖe amehawo gbɔ ƒo nu na wo be , “ Nu vɔ ̃ wɔla kple hlɔ ̃ dola menye hafi mietsɔ yiwo kple kpowo ɖe asi va be yewoale ́ m ha ̃ ? Menɔ mia dome , gblɔ nya le miaƒe gbedoxɔ me gbe sia gbe , ke miete ŋu wɔ naneke o .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Nyateƒe nu siawo kata ̃ le dzɔdzɔm tututu abe ale si nyagblɔɖilawo ŋlɔe da ɖi le mawunya la me ene . ” " Ale eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo kata gble ́ e ɖi , hesi dzo .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Ameha la kplɔ Yesu yi ɖe Osɔfoga ̃ Kayafa ƒe aƒeme , afi si Yudatɔwo ƒe osɔfowo kata ̃ va ƒo ƒu ɖo la .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Petro ha ̃ dze ameawo yome ɖɔɖɔɖɔ va Osɔfoga ̃ wo ƒe aƒea me eye wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ asrafoawo dome be yeakpɔ nu si adzɔ ɖe Yesu dzi ɖa . "

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple dumega ̃ wo kpe ta ɖe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ƒega ̃ la henɔ vodada si dzi woatsi tre ɖo atso kufia nɛ la dim .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Gake womekpɔ ɖeke o , togbɔ be ame geɖewo lɔ ̃ ɖi aʋatsoɖase le eŋu ha ̃ .

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: Le nuwuwu la ame eve va gblɔ be , “ Ame sia gblɔ be , ‘ mate ŋu agba Mawu ƒe gbedoxɔ sia agatui le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ megbe . ’ ”

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Enumake Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ la tsi tre hebia Yesu be , “ Ale kee , nuɖeɖe aɖe le asiwo le nya sia ŋua ? ”

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Ke Yesu meke nu o . Osɔfoga ̃ la yi edzi gblɔ nɛ be , “ Meta Mawu gbagbe la , nenye wo ̀ e nye Mesia , Mawu Vi la la , ekema gblɔe mi ́ se fifia . ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Azɔ Yesu ɖo eŋu gblɔ be , “ E ̃ , nye tututue , eye madidi o la , miakpɔ nye Amegbetɔ Vi la mabɔbɔ nɔ Mawu Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la ƒe nuɖusime , eye matrɔ agbɔ va le dziƒo lilikpowo me . ”

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Eƒe nya sia tɔ dzi na Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ la ale wo ̀ ƒu asi akɔta gblɔ bena , “ Mise ɖa , ame sia gblɔ busunya , megahia ̃ be ame bubu aɖeke naɖi ɖase o , mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ese eƒe numegbe xoxo .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Nu kae nye miaƒe nyametsotso ? ” Ameha ga ̃ la do ɣli be , “ Edze na ku , ele be woawui ! ”

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Azɔ amewo ƒu du ɖe edzi , ɖe ta ɖe eŋu eye ɖewo tu kɔe to megbe hegblɔ nɛ be ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: “ Ne wo ̀ e nye Mesia la la , ekema tɔ asi ame si ƒo wo ̀ to megbe la dzi ne mi ́ akpɔ . ”

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ me la , Petro ganɔ amehawo dome le xexe . Nyɔnuvi dzaa aɖe te ɖe eŋu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Wo ̀ ha ̃ e ̀ nɔ Yesu Galileatɔ la yome . ”

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Ke Petro se ̃ nu le wo kata ̃ ŋkume , “ Nyemenya naneke le nu si gblɔm ne ̀ le la ŋu o . ”

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Emegbe la Petro do ɖe agboa nu eye nyɔnuvi bubu aɖe ha ̃ gakpɔ Petro le amehawo dome , eye wo ̀ gblɔ na ame siwo le afi ma be , “ Ame sia ha ̃ nɔ Yesu Nazaretitɔ ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dome . ”

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Azɔ Petro ka atam be , “ Nyemenya ŋutsu la le afi aɖeke kura kpɔ o ! ”

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Ke eteƒe medidi o la , ame siwo tsi tre ɖe afi ma la te ɖe Petro ŋu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nɔvi , mi ́ enya be Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka ne ̀ nye , wo ̀ nuƒo ha ̃ sɔ kple Galileatɔwo tɔ pɛpɛpɛ . ”

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Azɔ Petro do ɣli . Eka atam gblɔ be , “ Ne menya ame sia tututu la , ekema nane nedzɔ ɖe dzinye . ” Kasia Petro naɖe nu le nyaa me la , koklo ku atɔ ‘ kɔkɔliakɔe . ’

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Enumake Petro ɖo ŋku nya si Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Hafi koklo naku atɔ la a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zi etɔ ̃ ” la dzi . Ale wo ̀ trɔ dzo eye wo ̀ fa avi vevie .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Esi ŋu ke la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ bubuwo kpe ta be woade ŋugble ̃ le ale si woawɔ able Romatɔwo ƒe dziɖuɖua nu ne wo ̀ atso kufia na Yesu la ŋuti .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Emegbe la , wode gae eye wokplɔe yi na Pilato , Romatɔwo ƒe gɔvina .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Yuda , ame si de Yesu asi la kpɔ be wotso kufia nɛ . Eƒe susu trɔ eye wo ̀ vee vevie be wo ̀ wɔ esia . Eya ta egbugbɔ ga si wo ̀ xɔ le Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo si la yii na wo .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ elabena , mede ame maɖifɔ asi . ” Ke woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ nyae nye ema , ɖeke meka mi ́ o . ”

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Ale Yuda tsɔ ga la ƒu gbe ɖe anyigba le gbedoxɔ la me eye wo ̀ yi ɖade ka ve na eɖokui .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo va fɔ ga la le anyigba eye wogblɔ bena , “ Mi ́ ate ŋu atsɔ ga sia ade nudzɔɖaka la me o , elabena etsi tre ɖe mi ́ aƒe sewo ŋu be , mi ́ axɔ ga si woxe ɖe ame aɖe ƒe ku ta la . ”

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Mlɔeba la , woɖoe be yewoatsɔ ga la aƒle abɔ aɖe si le afi si zemelawo kaa anyi lena la eye yewoatrɔe woazu ameɖiƒe na amedzro siwo ku le Yerusalem .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Eya tae woyɔa ameɖiƒe sia be , “ Ʋubɔ ” va se ɖe egbe .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Esia wu nya si nyagblɔɖila Yeremia gblɔ da ɖi be , “ Wotsɔ klosalo ga blaetɔ ̃ , si woxɔ le Israelviwo gbɔ la ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: ƒle abɔe tso zemelawo si abe ale si Aƒetɔ la gblɔ nam ene , ” la nu .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Azɔ la Yesu tsi tre ɖe Pilato , Roma dziɖuɖua ƒe gɔvina ŋkume . Gɔvina la biae be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia la ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̃ , abe ale si mi ́ egblɔe ene ” .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo tsɔ nya geɖewo wɔ nutsotsoe ɖe Yesu ŋuti , gake eya zi ɖoɖoe kpoo . Meɖo nya ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ ŋu o .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Pilato gabiae be , “ Me ̀ le nya gbogbo siwo gblɔm wole ɖe ŋutiwo ̀ la sem oa ? ”

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Ke Yesu meɖo nya la ŋu nɛ o eye esia wɔ nuku na Pilato ŋutɔ .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Enye gɔvina la ƒe ɖoɖo be ne Ŋutitotoŋkeke la ɖo edzi ƒe sia ƒe la , yeaɖe asi le Yudatɔ gamenɔla si wodi la ŋuti .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Le ƒe sia me la , gamenɔla aɖe li , ame sia nye ame dovo , tagbɔsese ̃ tɔ aɖe . Eƒe ŋkɔe nye Baraba .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Esi ameha la ɖi anyi ɖe Pilato ƒe xɔxɔnu le ŋdi ma la , ebia wo be , “ Ame ka ŋutie maɖe asi le na mi ? Baraba loo alo Yesu , miaƒe Mesia la ? ”

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Elabena Pilato nya nyuie be ale si ame geɖewo dze Yesu yome la koe bia ̃ ŋu na Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo eya tae wole ́ e ɖo .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Ke esi wo ̀ bɔbɔ nɔ ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ zikpui la dzi la , srɔ ̃ a ɖo gbedeasi sia ɖee be , “ Me ̀ gaka asi ame dzɔdzɔe ma ŋuti o ; elabena etsɔ si va yi ƒe za ̃ la meku drɔ ̃ e dziŋɔ aɖe tso eŋuti . ”

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Azɔ la Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo ble ameha la nu be woabia be woaɖe asi le Baraba ŋuti na yewo eye woawu Yesu .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Eya ta esi gɔvina la gabia be , “ Ame eve siawo dometɔ ka ŋutie maɖe asi le na mi ? ” ameha la do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Baraba . ”

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato bia wo be , “ Ekema nu kae mawɔ kple Yesu , miaƒe Mesia la ? ” Wodo ɣli hoo be , “ Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti ”

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato gabia be , “ Nu ka tae miedi be mawɔ esia ɖo , eye vo kae wo ̀ da ? ” Ke woawo la ɣlia dodo dzi ko wonɔ be , “ Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti ! Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti ! ”

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Esi Pilato kpɔ be ameawo ɖo kplikpaa eye howɔwɔ ga ̃ aɖe le egɔme dzem la , edɔ be woaku tsi ɖe gagbɛ me vɛ na ye , ale wo ̀ klɔ asi le ameha la ŋkume gblɔ be , “ Ame nyui sia ƒe ʋu kɔkɔ ɖi la , metso gbɔnye o ; ke boŋ etso mia gbɔ ! ”

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Ameha la do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Eƒe ʋu kɔkɔ ɖi ƒe tohehe neva mi ́ kple mi ́ a viwo dzi faa ! ” "

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Ale Pilato ɖe asi le Baraba ŋuti na wo . Ena woƒo Yesu eye esi woƒoe vɔ la , eɖe asi le eŋu na Roma srafowo be woakplɔe yi aɖakla ̃ ɖe ati ŋu .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Gba ̃ la , asrafoawo kplɔe yi ɖe afi si aʋawɔnuwo nɔna eye asrafoha la kata ̃ va ƒo xla ̃ e .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Woɖe eƒe awu siwo wo ̀ do la le eŋuti eye wotsɔ awu dzi ̃ do nɛ

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: eye wotsɔ ŋu didi aɖewo wɔ fiakuku heɖɔ nɛ eye wotsɔ fiatikplɔ ha ̃ de eƒe ɖusisi me . Wova dzea klo ɖe eŋkume fewuɖutɔe eye wogblɔna be , " “ Mi ́ edo gbe na wo ̀ , Yudatɔwo ƒe fia . ”

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Azɔ la , wotu ta ɖe eŋuti eye woxɔ atikplɔ la le esi hetsɔ ƒo dzodome nɛ sesi ̃ e . "

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Esi wowu fewuɖuɖua nu la , woɖe awu dzi ̃ la le eŋuti eye wotsɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe awuwo do nɛ eye wokplɔe dzoe yina kakla ̃ ge ɖe ati ŋuti .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Esi woyina ekla ̃ ge ɖe atitsoga ŋuti la , wodo go ŋutsu aɖe si tso Kirene , le Afrika , eŋkɔe nye Simɔn , eye wozi edzi be wo ̀ atsɔ atitsoga la akpe Yesu .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Ale wova ɖo teƒe si woyɔna be Golgata , si gɔme nye “ Ametakoli Togbɛ . ”

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Asrafoawo tsɔ wain si me wode atikee la nɛ be wo ̀ ano gake esi wo ̀ ɖɔe kpɔ la , egbe enono . "

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Esi wokla ̃ e ɖe atitsoga ŋuti vɔ la , asrafoawo da akɔ ɖe eƒe awuwo dzi be woazu ame si ɖu dzi la tɔ .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Le esia megbe la , wobɔbɔ nɔ anyi ɖe afi ma henɔ eŋu dzɔm .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Woŋlɔ nu kla ̃ ɖe eƒe atitsoga la tame be , “ Ame sia nye Yesu , Yudatɔwo ƒe fia la . ”

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Ŋdi ma ke la , wokla ̃ adzodala eve ha ̃ ɖe ati ŋu le axawo kple eve dzi .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Ame siwo to teƒea va yina la dzui hegblɔ nya vlo geɖewo ɖe eŋuti . Woʋuʋua ta fewuɖutɔe be ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: “ Ke alee wo ̀ le ! A ̀ te ŋu agba ̃ gbedoxɔ la , agbugbɔ atui le ŋkeke atɔ ̃ megbe . Ma ̃ te ŋui oa ? Ne a ̃ te ŋui eye ne ̀ nye Mawu Vi tututu la , ɖe ɖokuiwo ̀ le atia ŋuti ! ”

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ bubu siwo le afi ma la ɖu fewu le eŋu be ,

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: “ Eɖe ame bubuwo gake mate ŋu aɖe eɖokui o ! Ke wo ̀ boŋue nye Yudatɔwo ƒe fia laa ? Nenye wo ̀ e la , ɖi le atitsoga la ŋuti , ekema mi ́ axɔ dziwo ̀ ase .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Ebe yexɔ Mawu dzi se ; Mawu neɖo kpe eƒe xɔse la dzi ne wo ̀ aɖee le atia ŋuti . Alo menye eyae gblɔ be , ‘ Mawu vi menye , ’ oa ? ” "

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Nenema ke adzodala siwo wokla ̃ ɖe ati ŋuti kpe ɖe eŋuti la ha ̃ dzui heɖe alɔme le eŋuti .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Le ŋdɔ ma la , za ̃ dokeli do ɖe anyigba la kata ̃ dzi gaƒoƒo etɔ ̃ sɔŋ , tso ŋdɔ ga wuieve va se ɖe ɣetrɔ ga etɔ ̃ me .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Le ɣetrɔ ga etɔ ̃ me la , Yesu do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , " “ Eli , Eli lama sabaktani ” , " esi gɔme enye , “ Nyee Mawu , nyee Mawu nu ka ŋuti ne ̀ gble ̃ m ɖi maha ̃ ? ”

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Nukpɔla siwo le afi ma la dometɔ aɖewo mese nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la gɔme nyuie o , eye wobu be Eliya yɔm wo ̀ le .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Ameawo dometɔ ɖeka si du ɖatsɔ aha tsitsi eye wo ̀ kɔe ɖe akutsa tɔxɛ aɖe me . Etɔ akutsa la ɖe ati nu eye wo ̀ tsɔe ɖo nu na Yesu .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Ke ame bubuwo gblɔ nɛ be , " “ Đe asi le eŋuti ne mi ́ akpɔe ɖa be Eliya ava ɖee le atia ŋuti ha ̃ . ”

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Yesu gado ɣli sesi ̃ e ake . Etsɔ eƒe gbɔgbɔ la na eye wo ̀ ku kpoo .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Eye kpɔ ɖa xɔmetsovɔ si wotsɔ xe Kɔkɔeƒewo ƒe Kɔkɔeƒe la ŋkumee le gbedoxɔ me la ma ɖe eve enumake tso tame va se ɖe egɔme eye anyigba ʋuʋu kpekpekpe ; agakpe ga ̃ wo ha ̃ gba ̃

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: eye yɔdowo nu ʋu eye nyɔnu kple ŋutsu siwo nye mawuvɔ ̃ lawo hafi ku la gagbɔ agbe .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Le Yesu ƒe tsitretsitsi megbe la , wodo le woƒe yɔdoawo me eye woyi ɖe Yerusalem , afi si woɖe wo ɖokuiwo fia ame geɖewo le .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Esi asrafo siwo kla ̃ e ɖe atia ŋuti kple woƒe amega ̃ wo kpɔ nu siwo va dzɔ kple ale si anyigba ʋuʋui la , ŋɔdzi kple vɔvɔ ̃ le ́ wo eye wogblɔ be , “ Ame sia nye Mawu Vi vava ̃ . ”

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Nyɔnu siwo kplɔe ɖo tso Galilea be yewoava kpɔ edzi le Yerusalem la , le nu siwo kata ̃ le dzɔdzɔm la kpɔm tso adzɔge .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Ame siawo dometɔ aɖewoe nye Maria Magdalatɔ , Maria Yakobo kple Yosef dada kple Yohanes kpakple Yakobo siwo nye Zebedeo ƒe viwo la dada .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Esi fie ̃ ɖo la , kesinɔtɔ aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Yosef , tso Arimatia , ame si nye Yesu yomedzelawo dometɔ ɖeka la ,

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: yi ɖe Pilato gbɔ hebia Yesu ƒe ŋutila ̃ kukua . Pilato ɖe gbe be woatsɔ Yesu ƒe ŋutila ̃ kukua nɛ .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Yosef xɔ ame kuku la eye wo ̀ tsɔ aklala yeye aɖe si fu tititi la xatsa ɖe eŋuti nyuie

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: eye wo ̀ tsɔe mlɔ yɔdo si eya ŋutɔ ɖe ɖe agakpewo dome la me hemli kpe ga ̃ aɖe tu yɔdo la nu .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Maria Magdalatɔ kple Maria evelia wonɔ anyi henɔ ale si woɖi Yesu kple afi si woɖii ɖo la kpɔm .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Le ŋufɔke , esi ŋutitoto ŋkeke la ƒe ŋkeke gba ̃ tɔ wu enu la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Farisitɔwo yi ɖe Pilato gbɔ

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: eye wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , alakpatɔ ma gblɔ kpɔ be , ‘ Matsi tre le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ megbe ’

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Eya ta mi ́ edi be na ̃ ɖe gbe ne woatre yɔdo la nu va se ɖe ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe ale be eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo mate ŋu ayi aɖafi eƒe ŋutila ̃ kukua ahable amewo be , etsi tre o . Nenye be nu sia va eme la , ekema nu si adzɔ fifia la , awu gba ̃ tɔ . ”

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Pilato ɖo nya la ŋu na wo be , “ Mikplɔ asrafo siawo yi ne woadzɔ yɔdo la ŋu nyuie ” .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Ale wotre yɔdo la nu hetsɔ asrafowo ɖo afi ma be woadzɔ eŋuti .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Le Kwasiɖagbe ƒe fɔŋli me la , Maria Magdalatɔ kple Maria evelia woyi ɖe yɔdo la to .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Kasia anyigba ʋuʋu sesi ̃ e ; elabena mawudɔla aɖe si tso Aƒetɔ la gbɔ la ɖi tso dziƒo va mli kpe ga ̃ la ɖa eye wo ̀ bɔbɔ nɔ anyi ɖe edzi .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Mawudɔla la ƒe mo le kekle ̃ m abe dzikedzo ene eye eƒe awuwo fu tititi abe ɖetifu ene .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Esi dzɔlawo kpɔe la , dzidzi ƒo wo eye womu dze anyi heku ƒenyi .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Mawudɔla la ƒo nu na nyɔnuawo gblɔ be , “ Migavɔ ̃ o , menya be Yesu si wokla ̃ ɖe ati ŋu la dim miele

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: gake mele afi sia o . Elabena etsi tre abe ale si wo ̀ gblɔ da ɖi ene . Miva kpɔ afi si wotsɔe mlɔe la ɖa .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Azɔ miɖe abla miayi aɖagblɔe na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , etsi tre tso ame kukuwo dome eye wo ̀ yina ɖe Galilea be miava kpe ye le afi ma . Mixɔ nye gbedeasi sia yi na wo . ”

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Nyɔnuawo si du dzo le yɔdoa to kple vɔvɔ ̃ kple dzidzɔ . Esi wole dua dzi yina ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo di ge la ,

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Yesu va kpe wo . Edo gbe na wo be , “ Ŋdi na mi ” eye wodze klo ɖe eƒe akɔme hele ́ eƒe afɔwo ɖe asi eye wosubɔe .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Migavɔ ̃ o ! Miyi miagblɔ na nɔvinyewo be woadze mɔ enumake ayi ɖe Galilea eye woado gom le afi ma . ”

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Esi nyɔnuawo le gegem ɖe dua me la , asrafo siwo nɔ yɔdoa ŋu dzɔm la ƒe ɖewo va Osɔfoga ̃ wo gbɔ hegblɔ nu si va dzɔ la na wo .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Esi Osɔfoga ̃ wo kpe ta kple dumega ̃ wo la wode aɖaŋu eye wotsɔ ga home ga ̃ aɖe na asrafoawo bena ;

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: “ Migblɔ be , ‘ Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va za ̃ me eye wofi eƒe kukua dzoe esi mi ́ enɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm ’ ”

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Takpekpe la do ŋugbe be , “ Nenye be gɔvina la se nya sia la , miatsi tre aʋli mia ta eye nu sia nu ayi dzi nyuie . ” "

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Ale asrafoawo xɔ ga la eye wogblɔ nu si woɖo na wo be woagblɔ la . Nya la kaka ɖe Yudatɔwo dome gbe ̃ e eye woxɔe se va se ɖe egbegbe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la wuiɖekɛawo ha ̃ dze Galilea mɔ dzi eye woyi ɖe to si dzi Yesu ɖo be yeado go wo le la dzi .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Afi sia wokpee le hesubɔe , ke wo dometɔ aɖewo meka ɖe edzi be Yesu ŋutɔe nye ema o .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Egblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , " “ Wotsɔ ŋuse ̃ si le dziƒo kple anyigba la kata ̃ de asi nam .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Eya ta miyi ɖawɔ amewo le dukɔ ɖe sia ɖe me woanye nye nusrɔ ̃ lawo ; miade mawutsi ta na wo le Fofo la , Vi la , kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe ŋkɔ me

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Miafia nu nusrɔ ̃ la yeye siawo be woawɔ ɖe se siwo kata ̃ mede na mi la dzi ; eye kakaɖedzi nenɔ mia si ɣesiaɣi be , meli kpli mi ɣesiaɣi va se ɖe xexeame ƒe nuwuwu . ”

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Yesu Kristo , si nye Đela kple Mawu Vi la , ƒe nyanyui la ƒe gɔmedzedzee nye esi .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖi le Yesaya ƒe agbale ̃ me ene be , “ Madɔ nye dɔla ɖe ŋgɔwo ̀ be wo ̀ adzra wo ̀ mɔ la ɖo ,

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: ame si ƒe gbe le ɖiɖim le gbea dzi be , ‘ Midzra Aƒetɔ la ƒe mɔ ɖo , miwɔ eƒe mɔtatawo woanɔ dzɔdzɔe nɛ . ’ ”

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Yohanes Mawutsidetanamelae nye dɔla sia . Enɔ gbedzi eye wo ̀ fia amewo be woadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ eye woade mawutsi ta na wo abe nugbegbe le woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo gbɔ ƒe dzesi ene . Ena wonya be ne wodzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ eye wode mawutsi ta na wo la , Mawu atsɔ woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake wo .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Ame geɖe ŋutɔ tso Yerusalem kple Yudea nutomewo me yi gbea dzi , be yewoakpɔ Yohanes eye yewoase gbedeasi si wo ̀ tsɔ vɛ . Esi ame siawo ʋu woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me nɛ vɔ la , ede mawutsi ta na wo le Yɔdan tɔsisia me .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Wotɔ awu si Yohanes do la kple kposɔfu eye wo ̀ tsɔ la ̃ gbale ̃ le ̃ dziblaka bla awua dzii . Eƒe nuɖuɖu koe nye ʋetsuviwo kple gbemenyitsi .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Egblɔ na eƒe nyaselawo be , “ Ame aɖe gbɔna kpuie esi de ŋgɔ wum sa ̃ a . Amea de ŋgɔ ale gbegbe be nyemedze be mabɔbɔ atu eƒe atokotaŋuka gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nye la tsi koe metsɔ de mawutsi ta na mii gake eya ade mawutsi ta na mi kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ! ”

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Ɣemaɣi la , Yesu tso Nazaret le Galilea va Yohanes gbɔ eye Yohanes de mawutsi ta nɛ le Yɔdan tɔsisia me .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ go dom tso tsia me la , ekpɔ be dziƒowo nu ʋu eye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe , si nɔ akpakpa ƒe nɔnɔme me la nɔ ɖiɖim ɖe edzi .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Gbe aɖe ha ̃ ɖi tso dziƒo be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ a si ŋu mekpɔa ŋudzedze blibo le . ” "

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Enumake Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la kplɔe yi gbedzi ;

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: enɔ gbea dzi ŋkeke blaene eye Abosam va tee kpɔ . Enɔ la ̃ wɔada ̃ wo dome ke mawudɔlawo va subɔe .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Esi Fia Herodes le ́ Yohanes de gaxɔ me vɔ megbe la , Yesu yi Galilea be yeagblɔ Mawu ƒe nyanyui la .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Eɖe gbeƒa ̃ be , " “ Ɣeyiɣi va ɖo mlɔeba ! Mawufiaɖuƒe la gogo ! Midzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ ne mianɔ agbe ɖe nyanyui la ƒe ɖoɖowo nu . ”

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu ɖi tsa to Galilea ƒuta va yina la , ekpɔ Simɔn kple nɔvia Andrea wonɔ asabu dam ɖe ƒua me elabena ɖɔkplɔlawoe wonye .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Yesu yɔ wo hegblɔ na wo be , “ Miva dze yonyeme ne mawɔ mi miazu amewo ɖelawo . ”

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Enumake wogble ̃ woƒe asabuwo ɖi hedze eyome .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Esi wozɔ ƒua ta yina se ̃ la , Yesu gakpɔ Zebedeo viŋutsuwo , Yakobo kple Yohanes ha ̃ wonɔ ʋu me nɔ woƒe ɖɔwo sam .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Eyɔ woawo ha ̃ be woadze ye yome , ale wogble ̃ wo fofo Zebedeo kple ɖɔkplɔviawo ɖi hekplɔ Yesu ɖo enumake .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Yesu kple ame siwo nɔ eŋu la va ɖo Kapernaum le Memleɖa si nye Yudatɔwo ƒe Sabat ŋkeke dzi . Woyi Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe eye Yesu fia nu amewo le afi ma .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Ame siwo nɔ ƒuƒoƒea la ƒe mo wɔ yaa le Yesu ƒe nufiafia ŋuti elabena efia nu wo kple tɔnyenye alo kakadedzi blibo . Le nyateƒe me la , ale si wo ̀ fia nui la to vovo sa ̃ a tso ale si ame bubuwo fianɛ la gbɔ .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Ame aɖe si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ nɔ la ha ̃ nɔ ƒuƒoƒea le ɣemaɣi me . Ame sia de asi ɣlidodo me be ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: “ Yesu Nazaretitɔ , nu ka tae ne ̀ le fu ɖem na mi ́ gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ? Đe ne ̀ va be yeatsrɔ ̃ mi ́ a ? Menya ame si ne ̀ nye , wo ̀ e nye Mawu Vi , Kɔkɔetɔ la . ”

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Yesu blu ɖe eta gblɔ be , “ Zi ɖoɖoe eye na ̃ do go le eme . ”

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Le Yesu ƒe nya nu la , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la do ɣli sesi ̃ e , tsɔ amea xla ̃ ɖe anyi ŋɔdzitɔe eye wo ̀ do go le eme .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Nuwɔna sia wɔ nuku na eteƒekpɔlawo ŋutɔ , eye woƒo nu le eŋu . "

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Nu si Yesu wɔ la na be eƒe ŋkɔ ɖi hoo le Galilea nutoa kata ̃ me le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe megbe .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Yesu kple eŋutimeawo do go le ƒuƒoƒea eye woyi Simɔn kple Andrea ƒeme ,

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Simɔn lɔ ̃ xo nɔ aba dzi nɔ ŋudza sese ̃ aɖe le ́ m hafi wode , ale wogblɔe na Yesu .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Yesu yi dɔnɔa ƒe aba gbɔ , ele ́ eƒe alɔnu eye wo ̀ nɔ alinu . Enumake ŋudza sese ̃ la do le edzi eye wo ̀ fɔ yi ɖaɖa nu na wo woɖu . "

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Esi ɣe nɔ to ɖom la , wokplɔ dɔ ƒomevi vovovo le ́ lawo kple ame siwo me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le la va egbɔ le aƒe si me wo ̀ nɔ la , be wo ̀ ada gbe le wo ŋu .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Kapernaum du bliboa kata ̃ kloe ha ̃ va ƒo ƒu ɖe teƒea be yewoakpɔ nu .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Yesu da gbe le dɔle ́ la geɖewo ŋu eye wo ̀ nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo do goe le ame aɖewo me fi ̃ e ma . Meɖe mɔ na gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo be woaƒo nu ya o , elabena wonya ame si wo ̀ nye .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Le fɔŋli la , Yesu ɖeka do go eye wo ̀ ɖe eɖokui ɖe aga be yeado gbe ɖa .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi aɖe megbe la , Simɔn kple ame bubuawo do go yi ɖadii .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Esi wokpɔe la , wogblɔ bena , “ Aƒetɔ , ame geɖe le diwo ̀ m . ”

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Ele be mi ́ ayi du bubuwo ha ̃ me , be magblɔ nye gbedeasi la na woawo ha ̃ elabena esia tae meva ɖo . ” "

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Ale wo ̀ zɔ mɔ tsa le Galilea nutomewo kata ̃ me , henɔ mawunya gblɔm le woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo eye wo ̀ nɔ ga ɖem ame siwo gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo de gae la ha ̃ .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Gbe ɖeka , anyidzela aɖe va dze klo ɖe Yesu ƒe akɔme eye wo ̀ ɖe kuku nɛ vevie be wo ̀ ada gbe le ye ŋu . Egblɔ na Yesu be , " “ Ne e ̀ lɔ ̃ la , na nye ŋuti nakɔ . ”

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Anyidzela la ƒe nu wɔ nublanui na Yesu ŋutɔ , eya ta wo ̀ ka asi eŋu hegblɔ nɛ be , “ Me ̀ lɔ ̃ , eya ta wo ̀ ŋuti nakɔ . ”

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Enumake anyidzela la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Yesu dɔe ɖa enumake kple sedede vevi sia be ,

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: “ Kpɔ egbɔ be me ̀ gblɔ nu sia na ame aɖeke o . Ke boŋ yi na ̃ tsɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ afia Osɔfo la eye na ̃ na vɔsanu siwo Mose ɖo ɖi na ameŋukɔkɔ abe ɖaseɖiɖi na wo ene . ”

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Gake esi ŋutsua dzo yina la , eɖe gbeƒa ̃ eƒe la ̃ mese ̃ kpɔkpɔ la na amewo le mɔa dzi . Le esia ta ameha ga ̃ aɖe nye zi ɖe Yesu dzi ale be megate ŋu yi du aɖeke me o , ke boŋ etsi gbea dzi . Ke le afi sia ha ̃ la , amewo tso teƒeteƒewo va egbɔ .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Le ŋkeke aɖewo megbe la , Yesu gatrɔ yi Kapernaum . Esi wo ̀ ɖo afi ma la , eƒe ŋkɔ ɖi hoo le du bliboa me le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko me .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Medidi kura hafi aƒe si me wo ̀ nɔ la yɔ fu ̃ kple amewo o . Aƒea me yɔ ale gbegbe be nɔƒe aɖeke kura meganɔ anyi o . Yesu de asi mawunyagbɔgblɔ me na ameha la .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Se ̃ la , ŋutsu ene aɖewo kɔ la ̃ metututɔ aɖe ɖe aba dzi gbɔna Yesu gbɔe .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Ke le amewo ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ ta la , womete ŋu ɖo egbɔ tututu o . Le esia ta woyi ɖaɖe do ɖe xɔ si me Yesu nɔ la tame eye woɖiɖi dɔnɔa ɖɔɖɔɖɔ hedro ɖe ekɔme .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Yesu kpɔ be ŋutsu eneawo xɔe se vevie be yeate ŋu akpe ɖe wo nɔvi la ŋu , eya ta egblɔ na dɔnɔa be , “ Vinye , wotsɔ wo ̀ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo ̀ ! ”

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Ke Yudatɔwo ƒe agbale ̃ fiala siwo nɔ afi ma la gblɔ be ,

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ Nu ka ! Ame sia gblɔ busunya ! Đe wo ̀ bu be Mawue yenyea ? Menya be Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ koe ate ŋu atsɔ nu vɔ ̃ wo ake oa ? ”

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Yesu nya nu si bum ameawo nɔ eya ta egblɔ na wo enumake be , “ Ale ke wɔ nuwɔna sia ɖe fu na miaƒe susuwo alea ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Kae bɔbɔ wu , be woagblɔ na la ̃ metututɔ la be , ‘ Wotsɔ wo ̀ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo ̀ ; loo alo woagblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Tsi tre , tsɔ wo ̀ aba ne na ̃ zɔ azɔli ̃ ’ ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Be miadze sii be wona ŋuse ̃ Amegbetɔ Vi la be wo ̀ atsɔ nu vɔ ̃ ake le anyigba dzi . ” Egblɔ na la ̃ metututɔ la be

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: “ Mele egblɔm na wo ̀ be tsi tre , tsɔ wo ̀ aba eye na ̃ yi aƒeme ! ”

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Ŋutsua tsi tre enumake . Efɔ eƒe aba la , eye wo ̀ zɔ to nukpɔlawo dome dzo . Nukpɔlawo kata ̃ ƒe nu ku . Wokafu Mawu , eye wogblɔ be , “ Mi ́ ekpɔ naneke teƒe alea kpɔ o ! ”

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Yesu gado go yi ƒuta eye wo ̀ fia nu ameha si kplɔe ɖo la .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ zɔ yina la eva ke ɖe Levi , Alfeo vi , ŋu wo ̀ nɔ anyi ɖe dugadzɔƒe . Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Va dze yonyeme ne na ̃ zu nye nusrɔ ̃ la . ” Levi tso enumake eye wo ̀ dze Yesu yome .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Le fie ̃ la , Levi kpe Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woava ɖu nu le ye ƒeme . Dugadzɔlawo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔla geɖewo ha ̃ nɔ ame siwo wo ̀ kpe la dome , elabena ame siawo ƒomevi ha ̃ nɔ Yesu yome .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Agbale ̃ fiala siwo tso Farisitɔwo dome la kpɔ Yesu wo ̀ nɔ nu ɖum kple dugadzɔlawo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ale wobia eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo fewuɖutɔe be , “ Nu ka ta miaƒe Aƒetɔ le nu ɖum kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔla siawo ? ”

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Yesu se nya siwo gblɔm wonɔ ale wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Menye la ̃ mesese ̃ tɔwoe hia ̃ gbedala o ke boŋ dɔnɔwoe . Menye ame dzɔdzɔewo tae meva ɖo o ke boŋ nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo tae be maxlɔ ̃ nu wo ne woadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ . ”

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo kple Farisitɔwo tsia nu dɔna ɣe aɖewo ɣi . Gbe ɖeka esi wogatsi nu dɔ alea la , ame aɖewo va Yesu gbɔ va bia nu si ta eya ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo metsia nu dɔna o .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Đe wo ̀ le be ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ xɔlɔ ̃ wo natsi nu adɔ agbe nuɖuɖu le eƒe srɔ ̃ ɖekplɔ ̃ ŋua ? Gbeɖe , zi ale si ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la le wo gbɔ ko la , womatsi nu adɔ o .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Gake ŋkeke aɖe li gbɔna esi wole ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la kplɔ ge le wo gbɔ , ale woatsi nu adɔ .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Menyo be woatsɔ avɔnuɖeɖi yeye aka avɔ vuvu o , elabena ne wowɔe alea la , avɔ yeye la aho ɖa le teƒea eye teƒe si vuvu la alolo ɖe edzi wu .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Womekɔa aha yeye ha ̃ ɖe la ̃ gbale ̃ golo xoxo me o elabena ne wowɔ esia la aha yeyea ƒe ŋuse ̃ ana be la ̃ gbale ̃ golo la awo eye ahaa kple la ̃ gbale ̃ golo la kata ̃ dome agble ̃ . La ̃ gbale ̃ golo yeye mee wo ̀ le be woakɔ aha yeye ɖo . ”

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Gbe ɖeka le Sabat dzi esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo zɔ to bligble aɖe me yina la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋe bli aɖewo heɖu .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Farisitɔ aɖewo kpɔ wo eye wogblɔ na Yesu be , “ Medze be wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo nawɔ nenem nu sia ƒomevi o ɖe . Etsi tre ɖe mi ́ aƒe sewo ŋu be woaŋe nu le Sabat ŋkekea dzi elabena esɔ kple dɔwɔwɔ le Sabat dzi . ”

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Eɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Đe miexle ̃ nu si David kple eŋumewo wɔ esi dɔ wu wo eye woxaxa kpɔ oa ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Esi Abiata nye Osɔfoga ̃ la , ɖe David mege ɖe Mawu ƒeme eye wo ̀ ɖu abolo kɔkɔe si wo ̀ le be Osɔfowo ɖeɖe ko naɖu la , eye wo ̀ na eŋume aɖewo ha ̃ woɖu oa ? ”

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Egblɔ yi edzi be , “ Sabat ŋkekea la , ɖe woɖoe anyi be wo ̀ aɖe vi na ame , menye be ame nazu kluvi na Sabat ŋkekea o .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Gawu la , ŋuse ̃ le nye Mesia la si ɖe Sabat ŋkekea dzi . ”

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Yesu gayi Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe le Kapernaum eye wo ̀ kpɔ ame aɖe si titi le ́ asi na le afi ma .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye Sabat ŋkeke dzie ta la , Yesu ƒe futɔwo nɔ ŋku le ́ m ɖe eŋu tsitotsito be ada gbe le amea ŋu maha ̃ eye ne wo ̀ wɔe la yewoatsɔ nya ɖe eŋu .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Yesu yɔ amea be neva tsi tre ɖe ameha la ŋkume .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Etrɔ ɖe eƒe futɔwo gbɔ hebia wo be , “ Enyo be woawɔ dɔmenyo le Sabat ŋkekewo dzia ? Alo enye ŋkeke si dzi woawɔ nu vevi ame loo alo atsrɔ ̃ amea ? ” Ameawo kata ̃ zi kpi eye womeɖo biabia siawo ƒe ɖeke ŋu nɛ o .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Yesu tsa ŋku le ameawo dzi dzikutɔe elabena eɖe fu na eƒe susu ŋutɔ be womesea veve ɖe wo nɔewo ti o . Azɔ egblɔ na amea be , “ Do wo ̀ asi ɖe ŋgɔ . ” " Amea wɔe eye enumake eƒe asi la ɖɔ ɖo .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Esi Farisitɔwo kpɔ esia la wotso enumake yi ɖawɔ ɖoɖo kple Herodia dunyaheha si de Roma dziɖuɖu dzi la le ale si woawɔ awu Yesu la ŋuti .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖe wo ɖokui ɖe aga heyi ƒua ta eye ameha ga ̃ aɖe dze wo yome tso Galilea .

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Esi wose nu siwo kata ̃ Yesu nɔ wɔwɔm ta la ame geɖe siwo tso Yudea , Yerusalem , Idumea kple nutome siwo le Yɔdan tɔsisia ƒe go kemɛ kpakple Tiro kple Sidɔn nutomewo ha ̃ va . "

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Yesu vɔ ̃ be ameawo ava mimi ye ɖo eya ta ebia tso eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo si be woadi ʋu aɖe ada ɖi ale be ne ameawo mimi ye ɖo fu ̃ akpa la yeage ɖe eme ado le wo dome

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: elabena eda gbe le dɔnɔ geɖewo ŋu gbe ma gbe ale gbegbe be , bubuwo ƒo zi ɖe eŋu fu ̃ henɔ didim be yewoaka asi eŋu ko .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Nenye be ame siwo me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le la kpɔ Yesu la , wodzea anyi ɖe eƒe ŋkume hedoa ɣli be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Mawu Vi la . ” "

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Gake Yesu dea se na wo vevie be woagana amewo nanya ame si yenye o .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Le nu siawo megbe la , Yesu yi to aɖe dzi eye wo ̀ bia tso ame siwo wo ̀ tia si be woava do go ye le afi ma eye ameawo yi .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Azɔ etia ame wuieve be woanye apostolowo , ame siwo anɔ eŋuti gbeawo tsyo gbe eye wo ̀ adɔ wo woayi aɖagblɔ mawunya ana amewo

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: eye wo ̀ na ŋuse ̃ wo be woanya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo do goe le amewo me . "

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Ame wuieve siwo wo ̀ tia la ƒe ŋkɔwoe nye : Simɔn , ame si wo ̀ na ŋkɔe be Petro

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Yakobo kple Yohanes , Zebedeo vi siwo Yesu na ŋkɔe be “ Dziɖegbe ƒe viwo , ”

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Andrea , Bartolomeo , Mateo , Toma , Yakobo , Alfeo vi , Tadeo , Simɔn , ame si nye Zelote dunyaheha sese ̃ aɖe me nɔla ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: kple Yuda Iskariot , ame si dee asi emegbe .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Esi Yesu trɔ yi aƒe si me wo ̀ dze la amehawo gade asi ƒuƒoƒo me ake , eye eteƒe medidi o , aƒea me yɔ kple amewo . Ameawo sɔgbɔ ale gbegbe be mekpɔ ɣeyiɣi ne wo ̀ aɖu nu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Esi eƒe ƒometɔwo se nya sia la , wova be yewoakplɔe ayi yewo gbɔe elabena wobu be eƒe tagbɔe da .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Gake Yudatɔwo ƒe agbale ̃ fiala siwo tso Yerusalem va afi ma la gblɔ be , “ Belzebul , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ƒe fia si le eme lae le fu ɖem nɛ . Esia ha ̃ tae gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ɖoa toe ɖo . ”

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Yesu yɔ ɖeklemiɖela siawo eye wo ̀ do lo nyanyɛ sia na wo be , “ Ale ke Satana agate ŋu atsi tre ɖe Satan ŋui ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Fiaɖuƒe si ma ɖe eve la , mate ŋu anɔ te o , agba ̃ godoo .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Aƒe si me mama kple dzrewɔwɔ le la ha ̃ mate ŋu anɔ te o .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Ne Satana tsi tre ɖe eya ŋutɔ ɖokui ŋu la , ekema mate ŋu anɔ te , o ke boŋ eƒe fiaɖuƒee wu nu .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , ame aɖeke mate ŋu age ɖe ŋuse ̃ tɔ ƒe aƒe me o eye wo ̀ alɔ eƒe nunɔamesiwo adzoe negbe ɖe ko wo ̀ abla ŋuse ̃ tɔ ma gba ̃ , ekema ate ŋu aha eƒe aƒemenuwo .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Mele nyateƒe la gblɔm na mi bena woatsɔ amewo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kple woƒe busunyawo kata ̃ ake wo .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Ke ame sia ame si agblɔ busunya ɖe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋu la , womatsɔe akee gbeɖe o . Ame sia wɔ nu vɔ ̃ mavɔ . ”

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya sia elebena ameawo nɔ gbɔgblɔm be gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ nɔ eya amea me .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Azɔ Yesu dada kple nɔviawo va aƒe si me wo ̀ nɔ la godo , eye wodɔ ame aɖe ɖa be wo ̀ ayɔe na wo .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe bɔbɔ nɔ egbɔ ƒo xla ̃ e eye wogblɔ nɛ be “ Dawo ̀ kple nɔviwo ̀ ŋutsuwo di be yewoakpɔ wo ̀ le aƒea godo . ”

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Yesu biae be , “ Ame kae nye danye ? Ame kawoe nye nɔvinyeŋutsuwo ? ”

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Etsa ŋku le ame siwo ƒo xla ̃ e la dome godoo eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Ame siawoe nye danye kple nɔvinyeŋutsuwo !

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Ame sia ame si wɔa Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu enye nɔvinyeŋutsu , nɔvinyenyɔnu kple danye . ”

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Eva eme be ame geɖewo gava ƒo ƒu ɖe Yesu ŋu le esime wo ̀ nɔ nu fiam le ƒuta . Le ameawo ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ ta la , ege ɖe ʋu aɖe me eye wo ̀ nɔ afi ma hafi nɔ nua fiam .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Efia nu geɖe amewo to lododo me .

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Miɖo to miasee , “ Agbledela aɖe yi nuku wu ge ɖe eƒe agble me .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Nuku siwo wo ̀ wu la ƒe ɖewo ge ɖe mɔto , eye xeviwo va fɔ wo mi .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Bubuwo ge ɖe kpenyigba dzi afi si anyi geɖe mele o . Nukua mie enumake , gake esi anyi mesɔ gbɔ o ta la

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: esi ŋdɔ ʋu la , eyrɔ , eye wo ̀ ku elabena eƒe ke mede to o .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Nuku bubuwo ge ɖe ŋuwo me eye esi wonɔ tsitsim la , ŋuawo vu tsyɔ wo dzi ale be womete ŋu tse ku aɖeke o .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ke nuku aɖewo ya ge ɖe anyigba nyui dzi eye wotse ku blaetɔ ̃ , ɖewo tse blaade eye ɖewo ha ̃ tse alafa . ”

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Azɔ Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Ame si tosenu li na la nesee . ”

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo kpakple nusrɔ ̃ lawo bubuwo ɖe wo ɖokuiwo ɖe aga . Nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae le afi sia be , “ Lo si ne ̀ do la gɔme ɖe ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Miawo la , wona mɔ mi be mianya mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe nuɣaɣlawo , ke woɣla esiawo ɖe ame siwo le fiaɖuƒe godo .

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: Miɖo ŋku edzi be , “ Togbɔ be wokpɔa nu eye wosea nu ha ̃ la , womele nu gɔme se ge alo atrɔ ɖe Mawu gbɔ , be wo ̀ atsɔ woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake wo o . ’ ”

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: “ Ke nenye be miawo ha ̃ miete ŋu se lododo bɔbɔe sia gɔme o ɖe , ale ke miawɔ ase esiwo mava do emegbe la gɔme ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: “ Agbledela si ŋu meƒo nu tsoe lae nye ame si gblɔa mawunya na amewo , eye wo ̀ dina be yeaƒa ku nyuiwo ɖe amewo ƒe agbemɔ dzi .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Mɔto afi si nuku aɖewo kaka ɖo lae nye ame siwo ƒe dziwo ku atri . Ne wose mawunya la , eye Satana va te wo kpɔ ko la , woŋlɔa nya la be enumake .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Kpenyigba si dzi nuku aɖewo ge ɖo lae nye ame siwo sea mawunya la eye woxɔnɛ kple dzidzɔ .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Gake abe nuku siwo miena ɖe anyigba ma ƒomevi dzi ene la woƒe kewo medea to o , eye togbɔ be wotsina vlɔvlɔ ha ̃ la , ne yometiti va ko la woyrɔna . ”

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Ŋunyigba si dzi nuku aɖewo ge ɖo lae nye ame siwo sea nyanyui la eye woxɔnɛ ɖe woƒe dziwo me .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Gake xexe sia me ƒe dzitsitsi ɖe kesinɔnuwo ŋu , hloloetsotso na dzidzedzekpɔkpɔ kple xexeame ƒe nudzroame geɖewo vana zua ŋu vuna tsyɔa Mawu ƒe nya si wose la dzi eye metsea ku aɖeke o .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: ” Azɔ anyigba nyui lae nye ame siwo xɔa Mawu ƒe nya la le nyateƒe me eye wo ̀ tsea ku geɖe na Mawu , zi blaetɔ ̃ , zi blaade alo zi gbɔ zi alafa ɖeka kura gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Yesu yi edzi bia nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Nenye be ame aɖe si akaɖi ɖe , ɖe wo ̀ tsɔa nu tsyɔa edzi be megakle ̃ oa ? Gbeɖe , ne wo ̀ wɔ esia la , ekema ame aɖeke mate ŋu akpɔ nu kple akaɖia alo awɔ eŋuti dɔ o . Ne wosi akaɖi la , akaɖiti dzie wodanɛ ɖo be wo ̀ akle ̃ na amewo eye wo ̀ anye ŋudɔwɔnu na wo .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: ” Nu siwo kata ̃ le ɣaɣla fifia la , ava dze le gagla ̃ gbe gbe ɖeka .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ne tosenu li na mi la , misee !

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Mikpɔ egbɔ be miewɔ ɖe nu siwo miese la dzi elabena ne miele esia wɔm la , ekema miase nu siwo kata ̃ mefia mi la gɔme .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Ame si si nu le la eyae woana nui , eye ame si si nu mele o la , woaxɔ sue si le esi la gɔ ̃ ha ̃ le esi . ”

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Lo bubu si fia ale si mawufiaɖuƒea le lae nye esi : ‘ Agbledela aɖe ƒa ̃ nuku ɖe eƒe abɔ me eye wo ̀ dzo ,

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: ke le ŋkeke aɖewo megbe la , nukua ŋutɔ tsi le eɖokui si eye agbledela mena kpekpeɖeŋu aɖeke o , elabena anyigba ŋutɔ nyo xoxo .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Gba ̃ la aŋgba fe ̃ wo do , emegbe la nukua ƒo se eye mlɔeba la etse ku .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Azɔ agbledela la yi agblea me eye wo ̀ xa nukua . ’ ”

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Yesu yi edzi bia wo be , “ Ale ke gɔ ̃ maɖe ale si mawufiaɖuƒe lii la afia mi . Lo ka tututue mate ŋu ado wo ̀ asɔ kplii ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Mawufiaɖuƒea le abe ʋuti ƒe ku si nye nuku suetɔ kekeake ene .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Togbɔ be ele alea ha ̃ la , ne woƒa ̃ e la etsina zua ati dzɔtsutɔwo dometɔ ɖeka eye wo ̀ ɖea alɔ legbe siwo me xeviwo wɔa atɔ ɖo hekpɔa gbɔɖeme le wo me . ” "

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Yesu wɔ lododo ƒomevi geɖe ŋuti dɔ hetsɔ fia nu amewo . Ewɔ esi sinu gɔme amewo ate ŋu ase la ŋuti dɔ .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , ne Yesu le nu fiam le dutoƒo la , lododo sɔŋ ko ŋuti dɔ wo ̀ wɔna ke emegbe ne eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖe vovo la , eɖea wo gɔme na wo .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Esi ɣe nɔ to ɖom la , Yesu gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , " “ Mina mi ́ atso ƒua ayi eƒe go evelia dzi . ”

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ge ɖe ʋu aɖe me eye wodze mɔ , hegble ̃ ameha la ɖe ƒua ta , ke ʋu bubuwo ha ̃ dze wo yome .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Esi wozɔ yina se ̃ la , ahom sese ̃ aɖe de asi tutu me . Esia wɔ be ƒutsotsoewo ŋe ɖe ʋua me ale gbegbe be wo ̀ susɔ vie ko ʋua nanyrɔ .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Togbɔ be esiawo kata ̃ nɔ edzi yim ha ̃ la , Yesu ya mlɔ suɖui bɔbɔe aɖe dzi le ʋua ta henɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm bɔkɔɔ . Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ʋuʋui sesi ̃ e wo ̀ nyɔ . Wobiae kple vɔvɔ ̃ be , “ Nufiala , me ̀ tsɔ ɖeke le eme be mi ́ ele nyɔnyrɔm oa ? ”

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Yesu blu ɖe ya la ta enumake eye wo ̀ ɖe gbe na ƒua ha ̃ be , “ Zi ɖoɖoe ! ” Ya sese ̃ la tɔ enumake eye ƒua zi ɖoɖoe toŋtoŋtoŋ .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Azɔ etrɔ ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu bia wo be , “ Nu ka ta mievɔ ̃ alea gbegbe ɖo ? Ekema va se ɖe fifi ̃ laa ha ̃ , miexɔ dzinye se oa ? ”

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Vɔvɔ ̃ ɖo nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ . Woƒe mo wɔ yaa eye wogblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Ame ka ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ e nye ame sia , be yawo kple ƒutsotsoewo ha ̃ ɖoa toe ? ”

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Wotso ƒu la eye woge ɖe Gadaratɔwo ƒe nuto me .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Esi Yesu ɖi go tso ʋua me la ŋutsu aɖe si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le do go tso yɔdoawo me va kpee .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Ame sia ƒe nɔƒe nye ameɖibɔ me eye ame aɖeke magate ŋu ablae o alo ade gakɔsɔkɔsɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ e o .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Elabena zi geɖe wodea gakɔsɔkɔsɔ eƒe asiwo kple afɔwo , ke etsona wo keŋkeŋ . Ame aɖeke mesese ̃ wui ale woale ́ e wo ̀ adze kɔ anyi o .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Le ŋkeke kple za ̃ me siaa la enɔa tsatsam le yɔdowo dome kple togbɛwo dzi nɔa ɣli dom henɔa eɖokui sim kple kpe ɖaɖɛwo .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Ame sia kpɔ Yesu xoxoxo esi wo ̀ nɔ tsia dzi gbɔna , eya ta esi wo ̀ ɖi go ko la , eƒu du va tui hedze klo ɖe eŋkume .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Edo ɣli kple gbe sesi ̃ e be , “ Nya ka le nye kple wo ̀ dome ? Wo ̀ Yesu , Mawu dziƒoʋi ̃ tɔ la ƒe Vi ? Le Mawu ta me ̀ gawɔ funyafunya aɖekem o . ”

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Elabena Yesu nɔ gbɔgblɔm nɛ bena , “ Do go le ŋutsu sia me , wo ̀ gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ ”

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Yesu bia gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a be , “ Ŋkɔwo ̀ ɖe ? ” Eye wo ̀ ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ŋkɔnye enye Legio alo Aʋakɔ , elabena mi ́ ame geɖewoe le ame sia me . ”

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Azɔ gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo ɖe kuku na Yesu vevie be wo ̀ aganya yewo ayi du didi aɖeke me o .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Eva eme be aƒehawo ƒe ha aɖe nɔ nu ɖum le togbɛ si te ɖe taa ŋu la dzi .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Mi ́ eɖe kuku nya mi ́ ɖo ɖe ha mawo me . ”
