text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Yesu na mɔ wo be woayi , eye gbɔgbɔ makɔmakɔ siawo do go le aɖaʋatɔa me enumake yi ɖage ɖe hawo me . Esia wɔe be hawo kata ̃ ƒu du sesi ̃ e , yi ɖanyrɔ ̃ wo ɖokuiwo ɖe ƒua me doo heno tsi ku .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Hakplɔviawo si dzo eye esi wonɔ yiyim la , wokaka nyaa ɖe duwo kple kɔƒewo me . Esia wɔe be ame sia ame yi be ye ŋutɔ yeakpɔ nu si dzɔ la .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Le esia ta eteƒe medidi o ko ameha ga ̃ aɖe va ƒo zi ɖe afi si Yesu le , gake esi wokpɔ aɖaʋatɔa wo ̀ do awu nyuie heɖo ame me nɔ anyi kpoo la , vɔvɔ ̃ ɖo wo kata ̃ .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Ame siwo va kpɔ nu si dzɔ ɖe gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ tɔa kple hawo dzi la ha ̃ gayi ɖagblɔe na ame bubuwo ,

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: ale amewo gava fu ̃ eye woɖe kuku na Yesu be wo ̀ adzo le yewo ƒe nutowo me ne yewoakpɔ vovo .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Le esia ta Yesu gagbugbɔ ge ɖe ʋua me be yeadzo . Tete ŋutsu si me wo ̀ nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le la ɖe kuku nɛ be yeayi kplii .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Gake egblɔ nɛ bena , “ Yi aƒe me le nɔviwo ̀ wo gbɔ , eye na ̃ gblɔ nu ga ̃ siwo Mawu wɔ na wo ̀ kple ale si wo ̀ kpɔ nublanui na wo ̀ la na wo . ” "

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Amea dze mɔ eye wo ̀ tsa le du ewo siwo le nutoa me la me henɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem nu ga ̃ siwo Yesu wɔ nɛ la na ame sia ame eye eƒe nya la wɔ nuku na ameawo ŋutɔ .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Esi Yesu va ɖi go ɖe ƒua ƒe go evelia dzi la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe ƒo zi ɖe eŋu .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe dzikpɔla aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Yairo la va dze klo ɖe ekɔme ,

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: eye wo ̀ ɖe kuku nɛ vevie be wo ̀ ava da gbe le ye vinyɔnuvi sue si dze dɔ la ŋu na ye . Egblɔ na Yesu be , " “ Vinye la ɖo kudo nu vɔ eya ta meɖe kuku va da asi ɖe edzi be wo ̀ agbɔ agbe . ”

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Yesu tso kpla dze eyome eye ameha ga ̃ aɖe kplɔ wo ɖo .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Nyɔnu aɖe nɔ ameawo dome si nɔ ʋusisidɔ le ́ m ƒe wuieve sɔŋ .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Nyɔnu sia kpe fu tsa le atikewɔla geɖewo dzi ƒe geɖewo eye wo ̀ gble ̃ ga geɖe ha ̃ be woada dɔa na ye gake mekpɔ dzidzedze o , dɔa ɖeko wo ̀ ganyra ɖe edzi nɛ boŋ .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Ese nukunu geɖe siwo Yesu wɔ , eya ta eʋli eɖokui to ameha la dome hezɔ va Yesu megbe eye wo ̀ ka asi eƒe awu ŋu .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Elabena exɔe se eye wo ̀ gblɔ le eɖokui me be , “ Nenye be mete ŋu ka asi eƒe awu ŋu teti ko la nye la ̃ me ase ̃ . ”

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Vava ̃ esi wo ̀ ka asi Yesu ƒe awu ŋu teti ko la ʋu si nɔ dodom le eŋu la tɔ enumake eye wo ̀ se le eɖokui me ha ̃ be yehaya .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Yesu se le eƒe la ̃ me enumake be dɔyɔyɔ ƒe ŋuse ̃ aɖe do le ye me , eya ta etrɔ kɔ hebia be , “ Ame kae ka asi nye awu ŋu ? ”

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Esi ame gbogbo siawo ƒo zi ɖe ŋuwo ̀ ɖe , ale ke wɔ ne ̀ gale biabiam be ame kae ka asi ŋuwo ̀ ? ”

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Gake Yesu ganɔ ŋku tsam kokoko be yeakpɔ ame si wɔ nenem nu sia .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Kasia nyɔnua do le ameawo dome kple vɔvɔ ̃ kple dzodzonyanyanya va dze klo ɖe Yesu ƒe afɔnu hegblɔ nu si wo ̀ wɔ la nɛ .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Vinyenyɔnu , wo ̀ xɔse da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ , heyi le ŋutifafa me , wo ̀ dɔle ́ le la vɔ keŋkeŋ . ”

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ nu ƒom na nyɔnu sia la amedɔdɔwo tso Yairo ƒeme va tui gblɔ nɛ be , “ Viwo ̀ la ku xoxoxo eya ta me ̀ gaxa ɖe fu na Nufiala la be neva aƒea me o . ”

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Yesu se nya siwo wova gblɔ na Yairo ale wo ̀ de dzi ƒo nɛ gblɔ be , “ Me ̀ gavɔ ̃ o , xɔ dzinye se ko . ”

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Azɔ Yesu tia Petro , Yakobo kple Yohanes ko be woakplɔ ye ɖo ayi ɖe aƒea me .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Esi wo ̀ va ɖo aƒea ƒe agbonu la , Yesu kpɔ be zitɔtɔ ga ̃ aɖe nɔ teƒea elabena amewo nɔ avi fam henɔ ɣli dom hoo .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Ege ɖe aƒea me eye wo ̀ ƒo nu na ameawo gblɔ be , “ Nu ka ƒe avi fafa kple howɔwɔe nye sia ? Đevia meku o , ke boŋ alɔ ̃ e wo ̀ dɔ ! ”

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Ameawo koe ʋuu , le nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la ta . Ke Yesu nya wo do goe le aƒea me . Azɔ ekplɔ ɖevia fofo , dada , kple nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo ɖe asi eye woge ɖe xɔ si me wotsɔ ɖevi la mlɔe la me .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Yesu le ́ ɖevia ƒe alɔnu eye wo ̀ do ɣli gblɔ nɛ be “ Talita kumi ” si gɔme enye be , nyɔnuvi sue mele egblɔm na wo ̀ be , tsi tre .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Nyɔnuvi la ti kpo tso aba la dzi eye wo ̀ zɔ azɔli . Nyɔnuvi la xɔ ƒe wuieve . Le nyateƒe me la , gbɔgblɔ bu ɖe edzilawo .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Ke Yesu de se na wo vevie ŋutɔ be womegagblɔ nu si dzɔ la na ame aɖeke o . Azɔ ebia tso wo si be woadi nane na ɖevia wo ̀ aɖu .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo le nuto ma me heyi Nazaret si nye wo dedu me .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Le Sabat ŋkeke dzi la eyi ƒuƒoƒe ɖafia nu eye ame geɖe siwo se eƒe nufiafia la ƒe nu ku . Wobia be , “ Afi ka ame sia xɔ nu siawo tsoe ? Nunya ka tɔgbi wonɛ be wo ̀ te ŋu le nukunu siawo wɔm !

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Alo menye ame sia nye atikpala la oa ? Menye Maria viŋutsu si nɔviawo nye Yakobo , Yosef , Yuda kple Simɔn siwo le mia dome eye nɔvianyɔnuwo ha ̃ le mia domee oa ? ” Esia na eƒe nu ku dzi na wo ŋutɔ .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Bubu menɔa nyagblɔɖila aɖeke ŋu le ye ŋutɔ dedu me kple eƒe amewo dome o . ” "

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Le ameawo ƒe dzimaxɔse ta , mete ŋu wɔ nukunu ga ̃ wo le wo dome o , asi ko wo ̀ da ɖe dɔle ́ la ʋee aɖewo dzi heyɔ dɔ wo .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Ewɔ nuku na Yesu ŋutɔ be wo detɔwo mexɔ edzi se o , ke edzo kpoo yi ɖatsa le kɔƒewo me nɔ nu fiam amewo . "

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Yesu yɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo eye wo ̀ dɔ wo eve eve hena ŋuse ̃ wo be woanya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo do goe le amewo me .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , womegatsɔ naneke ɖe asi o , negbe atizɔti ko , womegatsɔ nuɖuɖu , mɔzɔkotoku alo ga ha ̃ ɖe asi o .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Womegatsɔ afɔkpa eve alo awu eve teti ha ̃ o .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Midze aƒe ɖeka ko me le kɔƒe ɖe sia ɖe me , miganɔ tsatsam tso aƒeme yi aƒeme o .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Nenye be kɔƒe aɖe me tɔwo mexɔ mi alo ɖo to mi o la , miʋuʋu ke si le ́ ɖe afɔƒome na mi la ɖi eye miadzo . Esia fia be miegble ̃ teƒea ɖi be nu sia nu si adzɔ ɖe edzi la nadzɔ faa . ”

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo dze mɔ henɔ nu xlɔ ̃ m ame sia ame si wodo goe le mɔ dzi la be wo ̀ adzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Wonya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le amewo me eye wosi ami kɔkɔe ha ̃ na dɔnɔwo heda gbe le wo ŋu .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Fia Herodes va se Yesu ŋkɔ elabena , nukunu geɖe siwo kata ̃ wɔm wo ̀ nɔ la tsi nu na amewo wonɔ gbɔgblɔm le afi sia afi . Fia la bu be Yohanes Mawutsidetanamelae gagbɔ agbe esia tae amewo le gbɔgblɔm be , “ Yohanes Mawutsidetanamelae fɔ . Eya tae wo ̀ te ŋu le nukunu siawo wɔm ɖo . ”

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Ame aɖewo ha ̃ bu be Yesu enye Eliya nyagblɔɖila xoxoawo dometɔ ɖeka si gava dzɔ ; eye ɖewo ha ̃ bu be Yesu enye nyagblɔɖila yeye si si ŋuse ̃ le abe esiwo nɔ anyi va yi ene .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Gake Herodes ya gblɔ kple kakaɖedzi be , “ Yohanes ame si nu metso ta le la kokokoe fɔ tso yɔme . ”

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Herodes sia nye ame si dɔ asrafowo be woale ́ Yohanes de gaxɔ me . Ewɔ esia le Herodia nɔvia Filipo srɔ ̃ si wo ̀ xɔ ɖe ta .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Elabena Yohanes gblɔ na Herodes be , “ Se meɖe mɔ be na ̃ xɔ nɔviwo ̀ srɔ ̃ ɖe o . ”

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Le esia ta Herodia di vevie be woawu Yohanes , gake fia la meda asi ɖe ɖoɖo sia dzi o .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Elabena Herodes tsɔ bubu geɖe na Yohanes le eƒe ame ɖɔʋu kple ame kɔkɔe nyenye ta eya ta etsɔe de ye ŋutɔ ƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te . Nenye be Herodes kple Yohanes wole dze ɖom la , nya siwo Yohanes gblɔna la ɖea fu na Herodes ƒe susu ŋutɔ gake zi ge ɖe la , edina kokoko be yeaɖo dze kplii .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Mlɔeba la , Herodia va kpɔ mɔnu aɖe si dzi wo ̀ ato awu Yohanes . Herodes ƒe dzigbe ɖo eye wo ̀ ɖo kplɔ ̃ na eƒe kpeɖeŋutɔ ame siwo nye asrafo ƒe amega ̃ wo kple ame ŋkuta siwo tso Galilea la le fiasa ̃ la me .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Eva dzɔ be Herodia ƒe vinyɔnu va ɖu ɣe na amekpekpeawo . Ale si wo ̀ ɖu ɣeae la do dzidzɔ na ame sia ame ŋutɔ . Le esia ta fia la gblɔ na nyɔnuvia be , “ Bia nu sia nu si ne ̀ di tso asinye la eye mana wo ̀ . ”

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Eka atam nɛ be , “ Nu sia nu si na ̃ bia la matsɔe ana wo ̀ , nenye nye fiaɖuƒe ƒe afa ̃ ne ̀ bia ha ̃ mana wo ̀ . ”

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Nyɔnuvia yi dadaa gbɔ ɖagblɔ nya la nɛ . Dadaa gblɔ nɛ be , “ Yi na ̃ bia Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ƒe ta . ”

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Nyɔnuvia gaɖe abla va fia la gbɔ va gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mele Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela ƒe ta dim fifi laa , nenɔ agba me woatsɔ vɛ nam . ” "

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Nya sia ve fia la ŋutɔ , gake anye ŋukpe be wo ̀ ada le eƒe atam si wo ̀ ka la dzi le eƒe amekpekpeawo ŋkume .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Eya ta eɖo asrafo si le eŋu dzɔm la ɖa be wo ̀ ayi aɖatso ta le Yohanes nu atsɔ vɛ nɛ . Asrafo la yi ɖatso ta le Yohanes nu

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: hetsɔ de agbe me vɛ na nyɔnuvia eye wo ̀ tsɔe yi na dadaa .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Esi Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo se nu si dzɔ la , woyi ɖaxɔ eƒe kukua heyi ɖaɖi .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo trɔ tso woƒe mɔzɔzɔwo me gbɔ va eye wogblɔ nu siwo kata ̃ wowɔ , nya siwo kata ̃ wogblɔ , kple teƒe siwo kata ̃ wode la nɛ .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Yesu se nya siawo keŋ eye wo ̀ ɖo aɖaŋu na wo be , " “ Mina mi ́ adzo le amehawo dome vie aɖadi teƒe aɖe anɔ adzudzɔ se ̃ . ” Elabena ame geɖewo ŋutɔ nɔ wo gbɔ vam henɔ dzodzom ale wɔ be , ɣeyiɣi meli ne woaɖu nu o .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Eya ta wodzo le teƒe sia kple ʋu heyi teƒe aɖe si zi ɖoɖoe wu .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Gake ame geɖewo gakpɔ wo xoxo henya afi si yim wonɔ eya ta woƒu du dze ŋgɔ na wo zɔ ƒua nu yi ɖakpe wo esi woɖi go le ʋua me teti ko .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Ale abe ale si wo ̀ nɔna ɖaa ene la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe gava kpe Yesu le afi sia . Ameawo ƒe nu wɔ nublanui nɛ ŋutɔ , elabena wole abe aleha ̃ si kplɔla meli na o la ene . Efia nu geɖe siwo wo ̀ le be woanya la wo .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Le ɣetrɔ me la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va gblɔ nɛ be , “ Teƒe sia tso abo , evɔ za ̃ ha ̃ le dodom .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Eya ta gblɔ na ameawo be woayi kɔƒe kple agble siwo te ɖe afi sia la me aɖadi nuɖuɖu na wo ɖokuiwo . ”

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Gake Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Miawo mina nuɖuɖu wo . ” Nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Nu kae mi ́ ana wo ? Hafi woate ŋu ana nuɖuɖu ameha sia la , ehia ̃ ga home ga ̃ aɖe . ”

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Yesu bia wo be , “ Nuɖuɖu agbɔsɔsɔ ka sinue le mia si ? Miyi miakpɔe ɖa . ” Woyi gbɔ va gblɔ nɛ be , “ Abolo atɔ ̃ kple tɔmela ̃ meme eve koe li . ”

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be woana ameawo nanɔ anyi ɖe ƒuƒoƒowo me le gbe dama la dzi .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Ale ameawo nɔ anyi ɖe hatsotso alafa alafa kple blaatɔ ̃ wo me .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Azɔ Yesu tsɔ abolo atɔ ̃ la kple tɔmela ̃ meme evea eye wo ̀ wu mo dzi , heda akpe ɖe wo ta . Eŋe aboloawo me , eye wo ̀ tsɔ wo kple tɔmela ̃ wo na nusrɔ ̃ la ɖe sia ɖe be wo ̀ aɖo ameawo kɔme .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Ameawo ɖu nua ale gbegbe be woɖi ƒo wu ale si hia ̃ gɔ ̃ ,

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: eye esi nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒo ƒu abolo kple tɔmela ̃ kake siwo susɔ ɖe gbea dzi la woyɔ kusi wuieve .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Ke ŋutsu siwo ɖu nua la ƒe xexle ̃ me anɔ akpe atɔ ̃ .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Le nuɖuɖunana ameawo vɔ megbe teti ko la , Yesu ɖe gbe na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woage ɖe ʋua me akui tso ƒua ayi Betsaida afi si yeava tu wo le emegbe . Ebe ye ŋutɔ yeado megbe ado hedenyui na ameha la eye yeado mɔ wo woayi aƒeme .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu yi togbɛ aɖe dzi be yeado gbe ɖa .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Le za ̃ me esi nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo ƒua titina la ,

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Yesu ɖeka nɔ godzi kpɔ wo ɖa . Ekpɔ be ya sese ̃ si nɔ ƒoƒom la nɔ fu ɖem na wo ale gbegbe be ʋua kuku sese ̃ na wo ŋutɔ . Anɔ abe fɔŋli ga etɔ ̃ me ene la , Yesu zɔ ƒua dzi ɖo ta wo gbɔ . Ewɔ abe ɖe wo ̀ be yeazɔ to wo ŋu ene

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: gake wo kata ̃ wokpɔe wo ̀ nɔ zɔzɔm le ƒua dzi eya ta wodo vɔvɔ ̃ ɣli elabena wobu be ŋɔlie .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Gake eƒo nu gblɔ na wo enumake be , “ Miaƒe dzi nedze eme . Nyee , migavɔ ̃ o . ”

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Azɔ ege ɖe ʋua me eye yaƒoƒo la tɔ te . Nusrɔ ̃ lawo kata ƒe nu ku ŋutɔ

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: elabena va se ɖe fifia la , womese Yesu ƒe wɔnawo gɔme o , gawu la , womese nukunu ga ̃ si wo ̀ wɔ le ɣetrɔ ma ha ̃ gɔme o , elabena woƒe dzime se ̃ .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Wotso ƒua va do ɖe Genezaret eye wotɔ ʋua

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: hedo go le eme . Ame siwo nɔ afi ma la kpɔ Yesu dze sii enumake

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: eya ta wole ́ du tsɔ yi ɖagblɔe na ame siwo kata ̃ le nutomea me be , Yesu va ɖo . Ale amewo kɔ dɔnɔwo ɖe abawo dzi va egbɔ .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Afi sia afi si Yesu yi le kɔƒewo , duwo kple agblewo me la , wokɔa dɔnɔwo vaa asiwo kple mɔwo toe eye woɖea kuku nɛ be woaka asi eƒe awu pɛ ko ŋu . Le nyateƒe me la , ame ale si sinu ka asi eŋu ko la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Gbe ɖeka Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fiala aɖewo tso Yerusalem va Yesu gbɔ .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Ame siawo kpɔe be Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ la aɖewo meklɔa asi ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe kɔnu nu hafi ɖua nu o

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: elabena Yudatɔwo , vevietɔ Farisitɔwo ɖe woklɔa asi kple abɔ va se ɖe abɔkuglui nu ke abe ale si wo tɔgbuiwo wɔnɛ hafi ɖua nu ene .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ne wotso asime gbɔ la , ele be woawɔ kɔnu sia godoo hafi ade asi nuɖuɖu ŋu . Esia nye se siwo dzi wowɔna pɛpɛpɛ ƒe alafa nanewo la ƒe kpɔɖeŋu ɖeka . Kɔnu bubu si me wogale ́ ɖe asi lae nye nuɖazewo , ganuwo kple gagbawo kɔklɔ .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Ale Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fiala siawo va bia Yesu be , “ Nu ka tae wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo megawɔa mi ́ aƒe kɔnu xoxoawo o ? Womeklɔa asi ɖe kɔnua nu hafi ɖua nu o . ”

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nyateƒe ŋutɔe Yesaya to esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya ɖi tso mi alakpatɔ siawo ŋuti ; abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖi ene be , ‘ Ame siawo le buyem kple woƒe nuyiwo , ke woƒe dzi te ɖa xaa tso gbɔnye .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Woƒe subɔsubɔ nye dzodzro elabena woƒe nufiafiawo nye amewo ƒe sededewo ko . ’ ”

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Elabena miegbe nu le Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo vava ̃ wo gbɔ hewɔa mia ŋutɔwo ƒe ɖoɖowo dzi .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Đe mieɖoe koŋ le nu gbem le Mawu ƒe sewo gbɔ eye mietu afɔ wo dzi le miawo ŋutɔ ƒe ɖoɖowo ta .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: ” Le kpɔɖeŋu me , Mose de se si tso Mawu gbɔ la na mi be , ‘ Bu fofofwo ̀ kple dawo ̀ . ’ Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , ‘ Ame si agblɔ nya vloe ɖe fofoa alo dadaa ŋu la dze na ku . ’

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Gake miawo la miegblɔ be ame ate ŋu agblɔ na edzila si hia ̃ nane be , “ Taflatse nyemate ŋu akpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ o ! Elabena nu si wo ̀ le be matsɔ na wo ̀ la metsɔe na Mawu xoxo . ’

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: Mieɖea mɔ ha ̃ be wo ̀ awɔ nu si dze be wo ̀ awɔ na fofoa alo dadaa o .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Ale miegbe Mawu ƒe nya eye miewɔna ɖe miaƒe kɔ , siwo mieɖo anyi la dzi . Miaƒe wɔna geɖewo le alea . ”

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Azɔ Yesu yɔ ameha la be woava ɖo to ye . Egblɔ na wo be , “ Mi kata ̃ miɖo to nyuie , ne miase nya siawo gɔme ”

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Naneke meli si tsoa egodo gena ɖe ame me , si ate ŋu aƒo ɖi amea o , ke boŋ nu siwo doa go tso amea me la woawoe nye nu siwo ƒoa ɖii .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ame si to senu li na la nesee .

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Azɔ Yesu ge ɖe aƒe aɖe me be yeahe ɖa le amehawo gbɔ vie . Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va biae le afi sia be wo ̀ aɖe nya siwo wo ̀ gblɔ va yi la gɔme na yewo .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Yesu bia wo be “ Ekema miawo ha ̃ miese nya siawo gɔme oa ? Miate ŋu akpɔe dze sii be nu siwo mieɖuna la megble ̃ a nu le miaƒe luʋɔ ŋu oa ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Ne ame ɖu nu la meyina eƒe dzi me o . Ke boŋ etoa eƒe dɔkaviwo me . ” Egblɔ nya sia be yeafia be nuɖuɖu ɖe sia ɖe ŋuti kɔ .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Egagblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Nu si ŋu ame buna lae gble ̃ a nu le eŋu heƒoa ɖii .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Elabena ame ƒe dzi mee susu baɖa doa go tsona . Nu baɖawo abe , fi ̃ eŋufieŋui alo matrewɔwɔ , fififi , amewuwu , ahasiwɔwɔ

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: ŋubiabia ̃ , ŋutasese ̃ , amebeble , makɔmakɔnyenye , ŋuʋaʋa ̃ , ame ŋu gbegble ̃ , dada kple movinuwɔna bubuwo .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Nu vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo kata ̃ doa go tso miaƒe dziwo me eye woawoe nye nu siwo ƒoa ɖi mi ale be miedze be miage ɖe Mawu ŋkume o .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Yesu dzo le Galilea heyi Tiro kple Sidɔn nutomewo me . Edze agbagba be yeaɣla ye ɖokui gake mete ŋui o . Mekpɔ ɖo hafi eƒe vava ɖi hoo abe ale si wo ̀ nɔna ɖaa ene o .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Nyɔnu aɖe si ƒe vi gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ nɔ fu ɖem na la va egbɔ enumake . Nyɔnu sia se Yesu ŋkɔ eya ta eva dze klo ɖe eƒe afɔ nu

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: heɖe kuku be wo ̀ axɔ ye via le gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a si na ye . Nyɔnua nye Sirofoiniketɔ ame siwo Yudatɔwo buna Trɔ ̃ subɔlawoe la dometɔ ɖeka .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ele be ɖeviwo naɖi ƒo gba ̃ , gawu la menyo be woatsɔ ɖeviwo ƒe nuɖuɖu aƒu gbe ɖe avuwo gbɔ o . ”

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ esia nye nyateƒe , gake wotsɔa ɖeviwo ƒe nuɖuɖu wuwlui si susɔ la naa avuvi siwo le kplɔ ̃ te . ”

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Enyo , e ̀ ɖo nyaa ŋu nyuie ŋutɔ . Meda gbe le viwo ̀ nyɔnuvi sue la ŋu na wo ̀ . Heyi aƒe me , elabena gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la do go le eme . ” "

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Esi nyɔnu sia va ɖo aƒe me la , ekpɔ via nyɔnuvia wo ̀ mlɔ anyi ɖe aba dzi kpoo elabena gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a do go le eme .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Azɔ Yesu tso Tiro yi Sidɔn to Dekapoli alo Du Ewoawo me gatrɔ yi Galilea ƒua nu .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Wokplɔ tokunɔ aɖe si menya nuƒoƒo nyuie o la vɛ nɛ le afi sia eye ame sia ame ɖe kuku nɛ be wo ̀ ada asi ɖe edzi ayɔ dɔe .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Yesu kplɔ tokunɔ la dzoe le ameawo dome yi adzɔge eye wo ̀ ƒo eƒe asibiɖɛwo ɖe eƒe towo me . Azɔ eɖe ta hesi ɖe eƒe aɖe dzi .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Ewu mo dzi kpɔ dziƒo eye wo ̀ gbɔ fu ̃ heɖe gbe be , " “ Hefata ” si gɔme enye “ Ʋu . ”

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Enumake amea ƒe towo ʋu eye wo ̀ de asi nusese kple nuƒoƒo me nyuie ha ̃ .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Yesu de se na ameha la be womegana amewo nanya nu si yewɔ la o , gake zi ale si wo ̀ de se sia na wo la , zi nenema kee wokakaa nya la ,

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: elabena nuwɔna la wɔ nuku na wo . Ale nya sia tsi amewo nu wonɔ gbɔgblɔm ɖaa be , “ Nu sia nu si wo ̀ wɔna la nye nukunu . Ewɔnɛ be tokunɔ sea nu eye aɖetututɔ ha ̃ ƒoa nu eme kɔna ! ”

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe gaƒo ƒu ɖe Yesu ŋu le afi aɖe gbe ɖeka eye nuɖuɖu menɔ wo si woaɖu o . Yesu yɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be ,

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: “ Ame siawo ƒe nu wɔ nublanui nam ŋutɔ , elabena ŋkeke etɔ ̃ e nye esi wole afii eye naneke megale wo si woaɖu o .
column6: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: eye eƒe awu si wœdo la trå fu pampampam . Awu la fu ale gbegbe be , naneke mele xexeame ate Ωu awåe wœafu nenema o .
column6: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Azå Eliya kple Mose va do ∂ e Yesu gbå eye wode asi dze ∂ o ∂ o me kplii .
column6: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
column8: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Afi kae mi ́ akpɔ nuɖuɖu na ame gbogbo siawo le , le gbedzi afi sia ? ”

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Azå Eliya kple Mose va do ∂ e Yesu gbå eye wode asi dze ∂ o ∂ o me kplii .
column6: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
column8: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Afi kae mi ́ akpɔ nuɖuɖu na ame gbogbo siawo le , le gbedzi afi sia ? ”

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Ke Yesu ha ̃ bia wo be , “ Abolo nenie le mia si ? ” Woɖo eŋu be , “ Abolo adre . ”
column6: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
column8: Petro gblå na Yesu be , “ Nufiala , enyo na m ¡ be m ¡ anå afi sia . M ¡ na m ¡ atu agbadå etß , ∂ eka na wœ , ∂ eka na Mose , eye ∂ eka na Eliya . ”

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Azɔ Yesu gblɔ na ameawo be woanɔ anyi ɖe gbea dzi , etsɔ abolo adreawo , da akpe na Mawu ɖe wo ta , ŋe wo me kakɛ kakɛ hetsɔ wo na nusrɔ ̃ lawo eye wotsɔ wo ɖo ameawo ƒe akɔme .
column6: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Azɔ Yesu gblɔ na ameawo be woanɔ anyi ɖe gbea dzi , etsɔ abolo adreawo , da akpe na Mawu ɖe wo ta , ŋe wo me kakɛ kakɛ hetsɔ wo na nusrɔ ̃ lawo eye wotsɔ wo ɖo ameawo ƒe akɔme .
column6: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
column8: Egblå esia elabena menya nu si wœagblå o , wovß Ωutå .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Esi Petro nå nya siawo gblåm la , alilikpo a ∂ e va tsyå wo dzi eye wœxe ≈ e Ωkume . Gbe a ∂ e ∂ i tso alilikpoa me be , “ Esia nye vinye lålßa . Mi ∂ o to eya amea . ”
column6: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
column8: Wokpɔ la ̃ meme eve aɖewo ha ̃ eye Yesu da akpe ɖe woawo ha ̃ ta eye wo ̀ na be nusrɔ ̃ lawo ma wo na ameawo .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Yesu yi edzi gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Mia dometɔ aɖewo siwo le afi sia la anɔ agbe va se ɖe esime mawufiaɖuƒea nava le ŋuse ̃ ga ̃ aɖe me . ”

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Le ŋkeke ade megbe la , Yesu kplɔ Petro , Yakobo kple Yohanes yi to kɔkɔ aɖe tame . Ame aɖeke menɔ teƒe sia o . Esi woɖo afi ma teti ko la Yesu ƒe mo de asi kekle ̃ me kple ŋutikɔkɔe ,

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: eye eƒe awu si wo ̀ do la trɔ fu pampampam . Awu la fu ale gbegbe be , naneke mele xexeame ate ŋu awɔe wo ̀ afu nenema o .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Azɔ Eliya kple Mose va do ɖe Yesu gbɔ eye wode asi dzeɖoɖo me kplii .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Petro gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Nufiala , enyo na mi ́ be mi ́ anɔ afi sia . Mi ́ na mi ́ atu agbadɔ etɔ ̃ , ɖeka na wo ̀ , ɖeka na Mose , eye ɖeka na Eliya . ”

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Egblɔ esia elabena menya nu si wo ̀ agblɔ o , wovɔ ̃ ŋutɔ .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Esi Petro nɔ nya siawo gblɔm la , alilikpo aɖe va tsyɔ wo dzi eye wo ̀ xe ɣe ŋkume . Gbe aɖe ɖi tso alilikpoa me be , “ Esia nye vinye lɔlɔ ̃ a . Miɖo to eya amea . ”

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Kasia nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo megakpɔ ame aɖeke le wo gbɔ o negbe Yesu ɖeka ko , elabena Mose kple Eliya dzo .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Esi wonɔ ɖiɖim tso toa dzi gbɔna la , Yesu de se na nusrɔ ̃ lawo vevie be womegagblɔ nu si teƒe wokpɔ la na ame aɖeke o , negbe le yeƒe tsitretsitsi tso ame kukuwo dome megbe ko .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Ale nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɣla nya siawo ɖe woƒe dziwo me . Gake zi geɖe la , woƒoa nu le eŋu eye wobua tame vevie le nu si tututu Yesu wɔnɛ be , “ Tsitretsitsi tso ame kukuwo dome ” la nu .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo nɔa gbɔgblɔm ɖaa be , ele be Eliya natrɔ va hafi Mesia la nate ŋu ava . Nya sia me mekɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo o , eya ta wobia Yesu be wo ̀ aɖe eme na yewo .

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Le nyateƒe me la , Eliya va xoxo eye wo ̀ ɖɔ nuwo kata ̃ ɖo . Azɔ nu ka ta woŋlɔe ɖi le Amegbetɔvi la ŋu be akpe fu geɖe eye woagbe nu le egbɔ ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Ke mele gblɔm na mi be Eliya va eye wowɔ nu sia nu si wodi be yewoawɔ lae , abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖii la ene . ”

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Wova ɖo toa te eye wokpɔe be ameha ga ̃ aɖe ƒo xla ̃ nusrɔ ̃ la asieke mamlɛawo . Yudatɔwo ƒe agbale ̃ fialawo nɔ nuka hem kpli wo .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Esi ameha la kpɔ Yesu la , vɔvɔ ̃ le ́ wo ke woƒu du yi egbɔ be yewoaɖado gbe nɛ .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Yesu bia wo be , “ Nya ka tututu hem miele ? ”

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Ame ɖeka le ameawo dome do ɣli gblɔ be , “ Nufiala , meɖe kuku vinyee mekplɔ vɛ na wo ̀ be na ̃ da gbe le eŋu nam . Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ aɖe le eme si wɔe be mete ŋu ƒoa nu o .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Nyateƒe ne gbɔgbɔ baɖa sia dze edzi la , etsɔnɛ xla ̃ na ɖe anyi ŋɔdzitɔe eye futukpɔ dona le enu bɔbɔbɔ ; eɖua aɖukli eye eya ame bliboa ƒe la ̃ me liana sesi ̃ e . Meɖe kuku na wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woanya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ sia le eme gake womete ŋui o . ”

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu hegblɔ na wo be , “ Mi xɔse ʋeetɔ siawo , ŋkeke nenie wo ̀ le be manɔ anyi kpli mi hafi miaxɔ dzinye ase ? Ale ke gbegbe magbɔ dzi ɖi na mi ? Mikplɔ ɖevi la vɛ nam . ”

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Ale wokplɔ ɖevi la yii na Yesu . Gake kaka wo ̀ akpɔ Yesu ko la gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la xla ̃ e ɖe anyigba sesi ̃ e ; eƒo dablibɛ le anyigba eye futukpɔ ha ̃ nɔ dodom le enu .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Yesu bia ɖevia fofo be , “ Tso ɣekaɣi ke wo ̀ le dɔ sia le ́ m ? ” Fofoa ɖo eŋu be , “ Tso keke eƒe ɖevime ke ,

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ sia nana wo ̀ dzea dzo me alo tsi me eye wo ̀ di kokoko be yeawui . Ao ! Meɖe kuku kpɔ mi ́ aƒe nublanui , eye ne a ̃ te ŋui la , na ̃ wɔ nane tso eŋuti na mi ́ . ”

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Yesu gabiae be , “ Đe ne ̀ gblɔ be ne mate ŋuia ? Nu sia nu wɔwɔ le bɔbɔe ne e ̀ xɔe se ko . ”

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Fofoa ɖo eŋu enumake be , “ Xɔse le asinye . Ao , ve nunye be nye xɔse sia nadzi ɖe edzi ! ”

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Yesu kpɔ be ameha la nɔ dzidzim ɖe edzi eya ta eɖe gbe na gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la be , “ O , gbɔgbɔ maƒonu , tokunɔ gbɔgbɔ , meɖe gbe na wo ̀ be na ̃ do go le ɖevi sia me enumake eye me ̀ kpɔ mɔ agage ɖe eme azɔ o . ”

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la do ɣli sesi ̃ e , ganyama ɖevia nublanuitɔe eye wo ̀ do go le eme . Azɔ ɖevia fa miamiamia ɖe anyigba eye wo ̀ li kpoo abe ɖe wo ̀ ku ene . Ale ameawo kata ̃ gblɔ be , eku .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Ke Yesu le ́ eƒe alɔnu eye wo ̀ na wo ̀ tsi tre eye nukutɔe la eƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Azɔ esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖeɖe nɔ aƒe si me wodze la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Nu ka ta mi ́ awo mi ́ ete ŋu nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ ma do goe o ? ”

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nu siawo ƒomevi wɔwɔ hia ̃ gbedodoɖa kple nutsitsidɔ . ”

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo le nuto sia me eye woɖo ta Galilea nutoa me . Yesu dze agbagba vevie be amewo nagakpɔ ye o ,

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: elabena edi be yeakpɔ ɣeyiɣi geɖe afia nu eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo . Zi geɖe ne ele nu fiam wo la egblɔna na wo be , “ Nye Mesia la , woadem asi eye woawum . Gake le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ megbe la magatsi tre tso ame kukuwo dome . ”

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo mete ŋu se nya siawo gɔme o gake ale si woawɔ abia la ha ̃ zu dɔ elabena wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va ɖo Kapernaum . Esi wova ɖo aƒe si me wodze eye woƒe mo dze anyi vɔ la , Yesu bia nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Esi mi ́ enɔ mɔa dzi gbɔna ɖe , nya ka me dzrom mienɔ ? ”

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Nyateƒe , nya sia ŋuɖoɖo sese ̃ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo elabena nya si hem wonɔ la ku ɖe ame si nye wo kata ̃ ƒe ga ̃ tɔ la ŋu .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Yesu bɔbɔ nɔ anyi , eyɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ƒo ƒui eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Ame si di be yeanye mi kata ̃ ƒe ga ̃ tɔ la ele nɛ be wo ̀ anye suetɔ kekeake gba ̃ , e ̃ , ele be wo ̀ anye mi kata ̃ ƒe subɔla ! ”

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Azɔ ekplɔ ɖevi aɖe va wo titinae , kɔe ɖe eƒe abɔwo dome eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be ,

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: “ Ame si axɔ ɖevi aɖe abe esia ene le nye ŋkɔ me la , nyee ma wo ̀ xɔ , eye ame si axɔm la , menye nyee wo ̀ xɔ o , ke boŋ Fofonye si dɔm ɖa lae wo ̀ xɔ ! ”

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka si woyɔna be Yohanes la gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nufiala , mi ́ ekpɔ ame aɖe si tsɔ wo ̀ ŋkɔ nɔ gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyamii le amewo me . Ale mi ́ egbe nɛ be megawɔe o , elabena menye mi ́ a dometɔ ɖekae wo ̀ nye o . ”

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Migagbe nɛ o , elabena ame si le nukunu aɖe wɔm le nye ŋkɔ dzi la , mate ŋu anye futɔ o .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Ame si metsi tre ɖe mi ́ a ŋu o la , le mi ́ aƒe akpa dzi . ”

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Yesu yi edzi be , “ Ne ame aɖe na tsi kplu ɖeka mi elabena mienye tɔnyewo la , magblɔe na mi kple kakaɖedzi geɖe be , ame sia mabu fetu si wo ̀ axɔ la o .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: Gake ne ame aɖe awɔe be ɖevi sue siawo ƒomevi ɖeka abu xɔse si le eme ɖe ŋunye la , ne wotsi kpe ga ̃ aɖe ɖe kɔ nɛ tsɔe ƒu gbe ɖe ƒu me la , anyo nɛ wu sa ̃ . ”

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ne wo ̀ asi ɖia nu wo ̀ la , la ̃ e ɖa . Enyo na wo ̀ be na ̃ ge ɖe mawufiaɖuƒe la me kple asikpo wu be asi eve nanɔ ŋuwo ̀ na ̃ yi dzomavɔʋe la me , afi si dzo metsina le na o .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Afi si woƒe nya mekuna le na o , eye wometsia dzo ha ̃ lena le o .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ne wo ̀ afɔ ɖia nuwo la , la ̃ e ɖa . Enyo na wo ̀ be na ̃ ge ɖe agbe la me kple afɔkpo , wu esi afɔ eve nanɔ asiwo ̀ , eye woatsɔ wo ̀ aƒu gbe ɖe dzomavɔʋe la me .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Afi si woƒe nya mekuna le na o , eye dzo la ha ̃ metsina le na o .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Eye ne wo ̀ ŋku ɖia nu wo ̀ la , hoe le eme . Enyo na wo ̀ be na ̃ yi mawufiaɖuƒe la me kple ŋku ɖeka wu be na ̃ yi dzomavɔʋe la me kple ŋku eve .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Afi si woƒe nya mekuna le na o eye dzo la ha ̃ metsina le o ,

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: eye woatsɔ dzobibi ade dze ame sia me wo ̀ atee .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Yesu wu eƒe nuƒoa nu be , “ Dze nye nu vevi aɖe gake nenye be dze bu eƒe vivi la , womagate ŋu atsɔe ade naneke o , elabena meganyo na naneke o . Eya ta migabu vivi si le mia me la o ! Minɔ anyi kple amewo kata ̃ le ŋutifafa me . ”

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo le Kapernaum eye woyi anyigbe lɔƒo le Yudea nutowo kple nutome si le Yɔdan ƒe ɣedzeƒe lɔƒo la me . Abe ale si wo ̀ nɔna ɖaa ene la , amehawo va ƒo zi ɖe Yesu ŋu eye wo ̀ fia nu wo abe ale si wo ̀ wɔnɛ ene .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Farisitɔ aɖewo va egbɔ le afi sia be yewoadoe kpɔ be yewoale ́ e le nya aɖe me ha ̃ . Wobiae be , “ Woɖe mɔ na ŋutsu be wo ̀ agbe srɔ ̃ a ? ”

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Yesu trɔ bia wo be , “ Ale ke Mose gblɔ tso srɔ ̃ gbegbe ŋuti ? ”

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Ameawo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mose da asi ɖe srɔ ̃ gbegbe dzi eye nu si ko wo ̀ le be ame si di be yeagbe srɔ ̃ a nawɔe nye be wo ̀ aŋlɔ agbale ̃ na nyɔnua be yegbee . ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Le miaƒe dzimesese ̃ ŋuti tae Mose de se sia na mi ɖo . ”

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Ke tso nuwɔwɔ ƒe gɔmedzedzea me ke la , Mawu ‘ wɔ ŋutsu kple nyɔnu . ’

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: ‘ Le esia ta ŋutsu agble ̃ fofoa kple dadaa ɖi eye wo ̀ ale ́ ɖe srɔ ̃ nyɔnua ŋuti

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: eye wo kpakple eve woazu ŋutila ̃ ɖeka . Eya ta womeganye ame eve o ke boŋ wozu ɖeka .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Esia ta nu si ke Mawu bla la ame aɖeke nagama eme o . ”

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Le esia megbe , esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖeɖe wonɔ aƒe si me wodze la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo gado srɔ ̃ gbenya la ɖa ake .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Nenye be ŋutsu aɖe gbe srɔ ̃ a be yeaɖe bubu la , ewɔ ahasi ɖe nyɔnu sia ŋu .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Nenema ke ne nyɔnu aɖe ha ̃ gbe srɔ ̃ a eye wo ̀ yi ɖaɖe ŋutsu bubu la , eya ha ̃ wɔ ahasi . ”

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi dzila aɖewo kplɔ wo viwo va Yesu gbɔe be wo ̀ ayra wo la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo nya wo be womegaɖe fu na Aƒetɔ la o .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu kpɔ nu si nusrɔ ̃ lawo wɔ ɖe dzila siawo ŋu , eye medzɔ dzi nɛ kura o . Egblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Mina ɖeviwo nava gbɔnye , eye migaxe mɔ na wo kura o , elabena ame siawo ƒomevi tɔe nye mawufiaɖuƒe la !

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Megale gbe tem ɖe edzi na mi ake abe tsa ̃ ene be , ame si metsɔ eɖokui wɔ ɖevi le Mawu gbɔ o la , mate ŋu ayi eƒe fiaɖuƒea me gbeɖegbeɖe o . ” "

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Azɔ exɔ ɖeviawo ɖe eƒe abɔwo dome eye wo ̀ da asi ɖe wo dzi heyra wo .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzra ɖo vɔ be yewoadze mɔ ayi teƒe aɖe la , ɖekakpui aɖe nɔ du dzi sesi ̃ e va dze klo ɖe eŋkume , eye wo ̀ biae be , " “ Nufiala nyui , nu ka tututue wo ̀ le be mawɔ hafi ate ŋu anyi agbe mavɔ dome ? ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Yesu biae be , “ Nu ka tae ne ̀ yɔm be ame nyui ɖo ? Ame aɖeke menyo o , negbe Mawu ɖeka ko .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Azɔ le wo ̀ biabia la ŋuti la , e ̀ nya seawo xoxo . Woawoe nye be , me ̀ gawu ame o , me ̀ gawɔ ahasi o , me ̀ gafi fi o , me ̀ gada alakpa o , me ̀ gaba ame o , bu fofowo ̀ kple dawo ̀ . ”

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Ŋutsua gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Nufiala , tso nye ɖevime ke la nyemeɖo ŋku edzi be meda le se siawo ƒe ɖeke dzi kpɔ o . ”

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Đekakpuia ƒe nu nyo Yesu ŋu ŋutɔ ale wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nu vevi ɖeka susɔ si me ̀ wɔ o . Yi na ̃ lɔ wo ̀ nuwo kata ̃ yi ɖadzra eye na ̃ tsɔ ga la ana ame dahewo bena kesinɔnuwo nanɔ asiwo ̀ le dziƒo . Le esia megbe la , va na ̃ dze yonyeme . ”

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Đekakpuia yrɔ esi wo ̀ se nya siawo , eƒe mo da tu zi ɖeka eye wo ̀ dzo nublanuitɔe , elabena enye kesintɔ ga ̃ aɖe .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Esi wo ̀ dzo yina la Yesu kpɔ eyome se ̃ eye wo ̀ trɔ ɖe eƒe nusrɔlawo gbɔ gblɔ na wo be , “ Asese ̃ na kesinutɔwo ŋutɔ hafi woage ɖe mawufiaɖuƒe la me ! ”

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Nya siawo wɔ nuku na nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ . Yesu gagblɔ ake be , “ Vinyewo , asese ̃ na ame siwo ɖoa ŋu ɖe kesinɔnuwo ŋu la be woayi ɖe mawufiaɖuƒe la me !

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , anɔ bɔbɔe na kposɔ be wo ̀ ato abi ƒe vo me ado go tsɔ wu be kesinɔtɔ nage ɖe mawufiaɖuƒea me . ”

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Nya siawo gawɔ nuku na nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ . Ale wobiae be , “ Nenye be kesinɔtɔwo makpɔ ɖeɖe o ɖe , ke ame kae le xexe sia me si akpɔ ɖeɖe ? ”

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesu kpɔ wo du ̃ eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wó be , “ Esia mele bɔbɔe le amegbetɔwo gome o gake ele bɔbɔe le Mawu ya gome elabena naneke wɔwɔ mesese ̃ na Mawu o . ”

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Petro gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Mi ́ egble ̃ nu sia nu ɖi hedze yowo ̀ me . ”

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Mele kpe ɖom edzi na mi be , ame siwo kata ̃ gble ̃ woƒe aƒewo , nɔviŋutsuwo kple nɔvinyɔnuwo , fofowo kple dadawo , viwo kple anyigbawo kata ̃ ɖi le lɔlɔ ̃ nam ta , eye be yewoakaka mawunya ta la ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: woakpɔ woƒe aƒewo , nɔviŋutsuwo , nɔvinyɔnuwo , fofowo kple dadawo , viwo kple anyigbawo kata ̃ ɖe eteƒe zi geɖe kpakple yometiti le agbe sia me . “ Gake le agbe si gbɔna me la woakpɔ agbe mavɔ .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Ke ame geɖe siwo nye gba ̃ tɔwo le afi sia azu mlɔetɔwo le afi ma eye ame siwo nye mlɔetɔwo le afii la azu gba ̃ tɔwo le afi ma . ”

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Esi wonɔ mɔ dzi yina Yerusalem la , Yesu do ŋgɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo . Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒe mo wɔ yaa eye vɔvɔ ̃ ha ̃ ɖo wo . Yesu yɔ wo ɖe kpɔe eye wo ̀ gblɔ nu siwo kata ̃ ava dzɔ ɖe edzi ne woɖo Yerusalem la na wo :

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Ne mi ́ eɖo afi ma la , woale ́ Nye Mesia la akplɔ ayii na osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo . Ame siawo atso kufia nam , akplɔm ade asi na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo be woawum .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Woaɖu fewu le ŋunye vevie , aɖe ta ɖe ŋunye vlodotɔe , aƒom kple atam , eye woawum . Gake le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la , matsi tre tso ame kukuwo dome . ”

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Azɔ Yakobo kple Yohanes , Zebedeo viwo , va egbɔ va do dali ̃ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ edi be na ̃ wɔ dɔmenyo aɖe na mi ́ . ”

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Yesu bia wo be , “ Nu ka dɔmenyo ? ”

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ dzaa be , “ Mi ́ edi be mi ́ anɔ fiazikpui siwo te ɖe tɔwo ̀ ŋu tututu la dzi le wo ̀ fiaɖuƒe la me . Ame ɖeka nanɔ wo ̀ ɖusime eye ame evelia nanɔ wo ̀ miame . ”

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Mienya nu si biam miele o . Miate ŋu ano nu tso fukpekpe ƒe kplu veve si no ge mala la me eye miate ŋu anɔ te ɖe fukpekpe ƒe tsideta si de ge wole nam la ha ̃ nua ? ”

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̃ , mi ́ ate ŋui . ” Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Anɔ eme be miate ŋu ano nu tso kplu veve si me mele nu no ge le me eye miate ŋu axɔ tsideta veve si xɔ ge mala ,

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: gake ŋuse ̃ mele asinye be maɖo mi zi siwo te ɖe tɔnye ŋu la dzi o , elabena wodzra wo ɖo ɖi na ame siwo wotia da ɖi la ko . ”

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la ewo mamlɛawo se nu si Yakobo kple Yohanes yi ɖabia Yesu ale wodo dɔmedzoe ɖe wo ŋu vevie .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Le esia ta Yesu yɔ wo va egbɔe hegblɔ na wo bena , “ Abe ale si mienya ene la , anyigbadzifiawo kple amega ̃ wo ɖua aƒetɔ ɖe wo teviwo dzi kple ŋuse ̃ .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Gake meganɔ nenema le miawo ya dome o . Ame si di be yeanye ga ̃ tɔ le mia dome la ele nɛ be wo ̀ anye mi kata ̃ ƒe subɔla .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Eye ame si di be yeanye amewo kata ̃ ƒe tatɔ la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ anye woƒe kluvi .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Elabena , Nye , Mesia la , nyemeva afi sia be ame aɖeke nasubɔm o , ke boŋ be masubɔ amewo eye be matsɔ nye agbe na ɖe ame geɖewo ƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ta . ”

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Azɔ wova ɖo Yerixo . Emegbe esi woto dua me yina la , amewo nye zi bibibi kplɔ wo ɖo . Ŋkunɔ aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Bartimeo , Timeo ƒe vi la , nɔ anyi ɖe mɔto , le esime Yesu nɔ eme tsom va yina .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Esi Bartimeo se be Yesu si tso Nazaret la , va ɖo ye gbɔ tututu la , edo ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Yesu , David Vi , kpɔ nublanui nam ! ”

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ame siwo kplɔ Yesu ɖo la dometɔ aɖewo blu ɖe eta sesi ̃ e be , “ Do to kaba . ” Gake ɣlia dodo dzi ko wo ̀ nɔ sesi ̃ e wu tsa ̃ be , “ Ao , David Vi lee , kpɔ nublanui nam . ”

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Esi Yesu se eŋkɔ la , etɔ ɖe mɔƒoa me hegblɔ be , “ Migblɔ nɛ be neva afii . ” Ale woyi be yewoakplɔ ŋkunɔa vɛ . Wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ la , dzɔgbenyui le ŋuwo ̀ ŋutɔ , Yesu le yɔwo ̀ m , tso mi ́ dzo . ”

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Eɖe eƒe awu xoxo si le eŋu la ƒu gbe eye wo ̀ ɖe abla dzidzɔtɔe va do ɖe Yesu gbɔ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Yesu biae be , “ Nu ka ne ̀ di be mawɔ na wo ̀ ? ” Ŋkunɔ la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ O , Nufiala , medi vevie be makpɔ nu . ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be “ Enyo , ava me na wo ̀ . Wo ̀ xɔse da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ . ” Ŋkunɔ la ƒe ŋkuwo ʋu enumake eye wo ̀ de asi nukpɔkpɔ me . Ale wo ̀ dze Yesu yome kple dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Esi wogogo Betfage kple Betania le Yerusalem gbɔ eye wova ɖo Amito la gbɔ la , Yesu dɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la eve be woado ŋgɔ na yewo .

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Miyi kɔƒe si le mia ŋgɔ la me . Ne miege ɖe eme teti ko la , miakpɔ tedzivi si womedo kpɔ o la le ka me . Mitui ne miakplɔe vɛ .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ne ame aɖe bia mi be nu ka tae miele ka ɖemii ha ̃ la , migblɔ nɛ ko be , ‘ Aƒetɔ lae le ehia ̃ m eye agatrɔe vɛ kpuie . ’ ”

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la eveawo dze mɔ eye wokpɔ tedzivi la le kame le aƒe aɖe godo . Esi wonɔ ka tumii la ,

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: ame aɖewo siwo nɔ tsi tre ɖe afi ma la bia wo be , “ Nu ka tae miele ka tum tedzivia ? ”

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Wogblɔ nya siwo Yesu be woagblɔ la , eye ameawo ɖe mɔ na wo .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Ale wokplɔ tedzivi la vɛ na Yesu eye nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo woƒe awuwo ɖe edzi be wo ̀ adoe .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ame geɖe siwo ha ̃ nɔ ameha la dome la ɖo woƒe awuwo ɖe mɔƒoa me le eŋgɔ be wo ̀ azɔ edzi eye ɖewo ha ̃ ŋe atilɔwo ɖo ɖe mɔƒoa me nɛ fu ̃ .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Eya ŋutɔ nɔ titina , ame aɖewo nɔ eŋgɔ eye ɖewo ha ̃ nɔ eyome eye wo kata ̃ wonɔ ɣli dom dzidzɔtɔe be , “ Hosana , woayra ame si gbɔna le Aƒetɔ la ŋkɔ me .

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Woayra Mawu be wo ̀ trɔ Mi ́ a Fofo David ƒe fiaɖuƒe la vɛ na mi ́ . Hosana le dziƒo ʋi ̃ . ” "

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Ale wo ̀ ge ɖe Yerusalem dua me eye wo ̀ yi gbedoxɔ la me . Etsa ŋku godoo le teƒea , le ́ ŋku ɖe nu sia nu ŋu tsitotsito eye wo ̀ trɔ dzo yi Betania kple nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo elabena za ̃ nɔ dodom .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Le ŋufɔke ŋdi esi wotrɔ tso Betania gbɔna la , dɔ wu Yesu le mɔa dzi .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Ekpɔ gboti aɖe le eŋgɔ . Ati sia da ama ŋutɔ ale wo ̀ zɔ ɖe edzi be yeakpɔ kutsetse aɖe le edzi ha ̃ . Gake aŋgbawo koe nɔ atia dzi elabena eƒe kutseɣi meɖo o .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Yesu ƒo fi de atia be , " “ Ame aɖeke magaɖu wo ̀ kutsetse aɖeke kpɔ o tso fifia yi mavɔ me . ” " Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ha ̃ se nya si wo ̀ gblɔ .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Esi wova ɖo Yerusalem la , eyi gbedoxɔa me ake eye wo ̀ de asi nudzralawo kple nuƒlelawo nyanya me do goe . Emu gaɖɔlilawo ƒe kplɔ ̃ wo ƒu anyi , ekaka akpakpadzralawo ha ̃ ƒe agbadɔwo ,

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: eye meɖe mɔ be ame aɖeke natsɔ naneke kura ato gbedoxɔa me o .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Egblɔ na ameawo bena , " “ Woŋlɔ ɖe mawunya me be , “ Nye gbedoxɔ anye gbedoɖaƒe na dukɔwo kata ̃ . Gake miawo mietsɔe wɔ adzoblasuwo ƒe nɔƒee . ” "

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Esi Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe kplɔla bubuwo se nu si Yesu wɔ la , wode aɖaŋu le ale si woawɔ awui la ŋuti . Ke nane ɖe fu na woƒe susu . Eyae nye be , ame geɖewo kpɔ dzidzɔ ŋutɔ le Yesu ƒe nufiafia ŋuti , ale be ʋunyaʋunya ate ŋu adzɔ nenye be wote nu sia wɔwɔ kpɔ .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Abe ale si wowɔna ɖaa ene la , Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo do go le dua me le fie ̃ me lɔƒo .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Le ŋufɔke ŋdi la , wova to ati si Yesu ƒo fi de la ŋuti eye wokpɔ be ati blibo la yrɔ su ̃ u .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Kasia Petro ɖo ŋku nya si Yesu gblɔ na ati la dzi , eye wo ̀ do ɣli gblɔ be , " “ Kpɔ ɖa , Nufiala ! Ati si ne ̀ ƒo fi de la yrɔ ! ”

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Mawudzixɔse nanɔ mia si . ”

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: ” Nyateƒenya wo ̀ nye be , nenye ame aɖe agblɔ na to sia be ‘ Yi , natsɔ ɖokuiwo ƒu gbe ɖe atsiaƒu me ’ eye ɖikeke aɖeke mele eƒe dzi me o , ke wo ̀ xɔe se be nu si yegblɔ ava me la , woawɔe nɛ .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Eya ta mele egblɔm na mi , nu sia nu si miabia to gbedodoɖa me la mixɔe se be miaxɔe , eye woaka mia si ha ̃ .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Gake ne miebe yewoado gbe ɖa la , mitsɔ ame siwo ƒe nyawo le dɔme na mi la ke wo gba ̃ bena mia fofo si le dziƒo ha ̃ , natsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake mi . ”

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: ” Ke ne mietsɔ ke amewo o la , mia Fofo ha ̃ matsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake mi o . ”

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Wova ɖo Yerusalem ake eye esi wonɔ tsa ɖim le gbedoxɔa me la Osɔfogawo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ bubuwo va tui hebiae be ,

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: “ Ŋuse ̃ ka tututue le asiwo ̀ ne ̀ tsɔ le nu siawo wɔm , eye ame kae na ŋuse ̃ sia wo ̀ ? ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Hafi maɖo nya sia ŋu na mi la , miawo ha ̃ miɖo nye biabia ɖeka sia ŋu nam .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Yohanes ƒe mawutsidetaname ɖe ame ka gbɔ wo ̀ tso , Mawu gbɔe wo ̀ tso loo alo amewo gbɔe wo ̀ tsoa ? Miɖo eŋu nam ! ”

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Wodzro nya sia me le wo ɖokuiwo dome eye wogblɔ be , “ Ne mi ́ eɖo eŋu be Mawu gbɔe la , agblɔ be , ‘ Enyo , nu ka tae mi ́ exɔe o ɖo ? ’

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Gake ne mi ́ egblɔ be menye Mawu gbɔe wo ̀ tso o la , ke mi ́ egblɔ nya aɖe , esi ana be ʋunyaʋunya adzɔ . Elabena amewo kata ̃ xɔe se vevie be Yohanes nye nyagblɔɖila . ”

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Eya ta wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Mi ́ ate ŋu aɖo eŋu na wo ̀ o . Mi ́ enya o . ” Yesu ha ̃ gblɔ na wo be , “ Ekema nye ha ̃ nyemagblɔ ŋuse ̃ si metsɔ le nu siawo wɔmii la na mi o . ”

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Lo siwo Yesu do na amehawo le ɣemaɣi la ƒe ɖewo nye esi , “ Ame aɖe de waingble ga ̃ aɖe eye wo ̀ ɖo gli ƒo xla ̃ e , Etu wainfiaƒe ha ̃ . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , etu gbetakpɔxɔ aɖe afi si ame anɔ , adzɔ agblea ŋu ɣesiaɣi . Azɔ etsɔ agblea de agbledzinɔla aɖewo sime be woakpɔ edzi ale wo ̀ dzo yi du didi aɖe me .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Le nuŋeɣi la , agbletɔ la dɔ eƒe subɔvi ɖeka ɖa be wo ̀ axɔ agblemenukua ƒe akpa si nye ye tɔ gome la vɛ na ye .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Gake agblea dzi nɔlawo ƒo amedɔdɔa , eye wotrɔe ɖo ɖa asi ƒuƒlu .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: ” Agbletɔa gaɖo ame bubu ɖa , gake woƒo eya ha ̃ vevie de abi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ta nɛ hedo ŋukpee .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Ame si wo ̀ gaɖo ɖa la wowu eya gɔ ̃ . Tso esia dzi woƒo amedɔdɔ siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ ɖo ɖa la nublanuimakpɔtɔe eye wowu ɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . Wonɔ esia dzi ʋuu va se ɖe

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: esime wo ̀ susɔ ame ɖeka pɛ ko , eyae nye via ɖeka hɔ ̃ si wo ̀ lɔ ̃ na vevie . Mlɔeba la nu gloe eye wo ̀ ɖo eya ha ̃ ɖa , kple susu be woana bubui elabena enye ye vi .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: ” Gake esi agblea dzi kpɔlawo kpɔe wo ̀ gbɔna ko la , wogblɔ be , “ Ame siae anyi agble sia ƒe dome le fofoa ƒe ku megbe . Mina mi ́ awui kaba , be agble ga ̃ sia nazu mi ́ a tɔ ! ”

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Ale wole ́ e hewui eye wotsɔ eƒe kukua ƒu gbe ɖe agblea godo .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: ” Nu kae miebu be agblea tɔ awɔ ne ese nya sia ? Ava kple dɔmedzoe ava wu ame vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo kata ̃ eye wo ̀ atsɔ agblea de ame bubuwo ƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Miɖo ŋku edzi be miexle ̃ le mawunya me kpɔ be , ‘ Kpe si xɔtulawo gbe la , eyae va zua dzogoedzikpe si nye kpe vevitɔ wu le xɔtukpeawo dome oa ? ’

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Esia nye Aƒetɔ la ƒe nuwɔwɔ eye wo ̀ nye nukunu le mi ́ a ŋkume . ” "

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe kplɔlawo nɔ didim vevie be yewoale ́ e le afi ma kokoko elabena wonya be yewo ŋue wo ̀ do loa tsoe . Ke womete ŋui enumake o , elabena wovɔ ̃ na ameha la . Ale wogble ̃ e ɖi hedzo .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Emegbe la , wodɔ Farisitɔwo kple Herodia dunyahehametɔ aɖewo ɖa be woadzro nya me kplii ale be woatsɔ eƒe nuƒo ale ́ e .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Ameawo va gblɔ na Yesu amenubletɔe be , " “ Nufiala , mi ́ enya be e ̀ gblɔa nyateƒe la vɔvɔ ̃ manɔmetɔe ! Amewo ƒe susuwo kple didiwo meblea nuwo ̀ o . Ke boŋ e ̀ fia Mawu ƒe mɔwo amewo le nyateƒe me . Azɔ gblɔ nu si ne ̀ bu la na mi ́ . ” Enyo be woadzɔ ga na Kaisaro loo alo menyo oa ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Đe mi ́ adzɔe loo alo ɖe mi ́ adzɔe oa ? Ke Yesu dze si alakpanuwɔwɔ eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Nu ka ta miele agbagba dzem be miatre mɔ nam ? Mitsɔ Roma ga si woɖua la ɖeka nam makpɔ . ”

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Tete wotsɔ ga la nɛ eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Ame ka ƒe nɔnɔmetata kple nuŋɔŋlɔe le edzi ? ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Kaisaro tɔe . ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Yesu yi edzi be , “ Enyo , nu si nye Kaisaro tɔ la mitsɔe na Kaisaro . Nu si nye Mawu tɔ la mitsɔe na Mawu ! ” " Nyaŋuɖoɖo sia tɔtɔ ameawo ŋutɔ , eye womeganya nya si woagblɔ o .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Se ̃ la , Zadukitɔwo ha ̃ va do . Ame siawo nye hatsotso aɖe siwo mexɔ ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi dzi se o la me tɔwo . Wobia Yesu be , "

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: “ Nufiala , ele Mose ƒe sewo me be ne ŋutsu aɖe ku vimadzimadzii la , eƒe tsɛ naɖe ahosia adzi viwo ɖe foa kukua ƒe ŋkɔ me .
