text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Azɔ nɔviŋutsu adre aɖewo nɔ anyi . Tsitsitɔ ɖe srɔ ̃ eye wo ̀ ku vimadzii .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Ale ame si dzɔ ɖe ameyinugbea yome la ɖe ahosia eya ha ̃ ku vimadzii . Nɔvia si kplɔ eya ha ̃ ɖo la ɖe ahosia , gake kpao , eya ha ̃ medzi vi aɖeke kplii hafi ku o .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ale nɔviŋutsu adreawo ku vi aɖeke madzimadzii eye nyɔnua ha ̃ va ku mlɔeba .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Fifia nu si mi ́ edi be mi ́ anya enye be , le tsitretsitsi ŋkekea dzi ɖe , ame kae anye nyɔnu sia srɔ ̃ a elabena wo ame adrea kata ̃ ɖee kpɔ ? ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nu si le fu ɖem na mi enye be mienya mawunya , alo Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ o .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Elabena ne nɔviŋutsu adre siawo kple nyɔnua wofɔ tso ame kukuwo dome la , womagaɖe srɔ ̃ o , srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe maganɔ anyi o . Woanɔ ko abe mawudɔlawo ene .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: ” Ne miedi be yewoanya be enye nyateƒe be ame kukuwo atsi tre la , ekema miɖo ŋku nu si miexle ̃ tso ale si Mose kpɔ ŋuve bibi la ŋu kpɔ dzi . Mawu gblɔ na Mose le afi ma be , ‘ Nyee nye Abraham ƒe Mawu , nyee nye Isak kple Yakɔb ƒe Mawu . ’

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: ” Mawu gblɔ na Mose be , togbɔ be ame siawo ku ƒe alafa nanewoe nye si va yi ha ̃ la , wogale agbe kokoko . Đe mele eme nenema o la , Mawu magblɔ be , ‘ Menye ame kukuwo ƒe Mawue menye o ! ’ Miewɔ vodada ga ̃ ŋutɔ . Miese nya sia gɔme o . ”

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Agbale ̃ fialawo dometɔ ɖeka si nɔ tsitre ɖe afi ma nɔ to ɖom la kpɔe be , Yesu ɖo nyaa ŋu nyuie eya ta ete ɖe eŋu biae be , “ Se kae nye vevitɔ wu le seawo kata ̃ dome ? ”

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Se siae nye esi gblɔ be , ‘ Israel , see ! Aƒetɔ mi ́ a Mawu la , Aƒetɔ ɖeka hɔ ̃ ko wo ̀ nye .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Eya ta lɔ ̃ Aƒetɔ , wo ̀ Mawu la kple wo ̀ dzi blibo , wo ̀ luʋɔ blibo kple wo ̀ tamesusu blibo kpakple wo ̀ ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ . ’ ”

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: ” Se eveliae nye be , ‘ Lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe ale si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ a ɖokuiwo ̀ e ene . ’ Le nyateƒe me , Se bubu aɖeke megali si lolo wu esiawo o . ”

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Agbale ̃ fiala la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , e ̀ to nyateƒe esi ne ̀ gblɔ be Mawu ɖeka koe li , bubu aɖeke megali o .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Eye menyae ha ̃ be ele vevie be ame nalɔ ̃ eya ɖeka kple eƒe dzi , gɔmesese , kple ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ . Ele be woalɔ ame wu be woasa vɔwo , numevɔwo kple vɔsa bubuwo . ”

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Esi Yesu kpɔ be eɖo nya la ŋu nunyatɔe la , egblɔ nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ la me ̀ didi tso mawufiaɖuƒe la gbɔ o . ” Le esia megbe la ame aɖeke megate ŋu bia nya aɖeke o .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Emegbe esi Yesu nɔ nu fiam amewo le gbedoxɔa ƒe xɔxɔnu la , ebia ameawo be , “ Nu ka tae miaƒe agbale ̃ fialawo gblɔna be ele be Mesia la natso Fia David ƒe ƒome me kokoko ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Elabena David ŋutɔ gblɔ le esime Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la nɔ nu ƒom to edzi be , ‘ Mawu gblɔ na nye Aƒetɔ be nɔ anyi ɖe nye ɖusime va se ɖe esime mawɔ wo ̀ futɔwo wo ̀ afɔɖodzinui . ’

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Esi David ŋutɔ yɔe be Aƒetɔ ɖe , ale ke wɔ wo ̀ aganye Via ? ” Nyameɖeɖe sia do dzidzɔ na eselawo ŋutɔ ale wogbugbɔ ƒu to anyi ɖe Yesu ƒe nufiafia ŋu henɔ to ɖom kple dzidzɔ .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Nu bubu siwo Yesu fia ameawo le ɣeyiɣi sia me la woe nye esi : Egblɔ be , “ Mikpɔ nyuie le agbale ̃ fiala alakpatɔ siawo ŋuti . Elabena wolɔ ̃ a awuʋlayawo dodo abe agbale ̃ nyala ga ̃ wo kple kesinɔtɔwo ene eye wodina be amewo kata ̃ nabɔbɔ ado gbe na yewo ne yewo le zɔzɔm le ablɔwo dzi .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Ame siawo lɔ ̃ a teƒe kɔkɔwo nɔnɔ le ƒuƒoƒewo eye wodia kplɔ ̃ ta nɔnɔ vevie le kplɔ ̃ ɖoƒewo .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Ame siawo xɔa ahosiwo ƒe aƒewo le wo si eye wodoa kpɔkpɔ wo ɖokuiwo to gbe didiwo dodoɖa me . Ame siawo tɔgbi axɔ tohehe sese ̃ tɔ . ”

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Azɔ Yesu yi nudzɔɖaka si le gbedoxɔ la me gbɔ eye wo ̀ nɔ anyi henɔ gadzɔlawo kpɔm du ̃ . Ame siwo nye kesinɔtɔwo la va da ga home ga ̃ wo ɖe nudzɔɖaka la me dadatɔe .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Ahosi dahe ha ̃ va eye wo ̀ da pesewa eve ɖe nudzɔnua me .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Yesu yɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔe eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Ne wotsɔ gatɔ siawo kata ̃ ƒe ga si wona la ƒo ƒui la , le nyateƒe me , ahosi dahe sia ƒe pesewa evea xɔ asi wu wo kata ̃ tɔ .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Elabena ame siawo kpɔ ga fu ̃ ŋutɔ gake nu vi aɖe koe wona . Gake ahosi dahe sia ya va na ga si kata ̃ le esi . ”

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Esime Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ go dom tso gbedoxɔa me gbe ma gbe la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nufiala , kpɔ ale si xɔ siawo nyakpɔe la ɖa . Kpɔ ale si wotsɔ kpe ga ̃ vovovowo ɖo gliawoe la ɖa . ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ E ̀ kpɔ xɔ siawoa ? Mele egblɔm na mi be , wole wo gba ̃ ge gudugudu ale gbegbe be , kpe ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ masusɔ ɖe nɔvia dzi o . ”

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Azɔ eyi ɖanɔ anyi ɖe Amitoa dzi afi si dze ŋgɔ bali si le toa kple Yerusalem dome . Petro , Yakobo , Yohanes kple Andrea koe nɔ egbɔ le afi sia . Ame siawo biae be ,

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: “ Nu siwo ne ̀ be wole dzɔdzɔ ge ɖe gbedoxɔa dzi ɖe ɣekaɣie woadzɔ ? Mi ́ akpɔ dzesi aɖe do ŋgɔ si ana mi ́ anya be nu siawo le dzɔdzɔ gea ? ”

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Migana ame aɖeke nable mi be miatra mɔ o .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Ame geɖewo ava agblɔ na mi be yewoe nye miaƒe Mesia la , eye woakplɔ mi atra mɔe .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Ne miese aʋawɔwɔwo kple aʋaɣliwo la , ŋɔ megadzi mi o . Ele be nu siawo tɔgbi nava eme gake nuwuwu la meɖo haɖe o . ”

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: ” Dukɔwo aho aʋa ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu , anyigba aʋuʋu le teƒe geɖewo eye gawu la , dɔ ato le teƒe aɖewo , gake esiawo kata ̃ anye kpɔkplɔyiɖeme na fukpekpe ga ̃ siwo le vava ge la ko . ” Yesu yi edzi be ,

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: “ Miawo minɔ ŋudzɔ vevie , elabena woahe mi ayi ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ƒewo eye woaƒo mi le ƒuƒoƒewo . Woahe mi ayi gɔvinawo kple fiawo gbɔe le nye ŋkɔ la ta ke migblɔ nyanyui la na wo . Woahe nya ɖe mia ŋu le gɔvinawo kple fiawo ŋkume , be mienye yonyemedzelawo ta . Gake mele egblɔm na mi bena esiae nye munɔkpɔkpɔ nyuitɔ be miagblɔ nyanyui la na wo .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Elabena ele be dukɔ ɖe sia ɖe nase nyanyui la hafi nuwuwu ŋkekea naɖo .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nenye be wole ́ mi yi ʋɔnui la , migatsi dzi kura le nya siwo miatsɔ aʋli mia ɖokuiwo tae la ŋu o . Migblɔ nya sia nya si Mawu de nu na mi la ko , elabena menye mia ŋutɔwoe le nu ƒo ge o , ke boŋ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe lae . ”

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Yesu yi edzi be , “ Le ɣeyiɣi siawo me la , nɔvi ŋutɔ kura ahe nɔvia de ku me . Fofowo ade woawo ŋutɔ viwo asi , eye viwo ha ̃ ade woawo ŋutɔ fofowo asi be woawu .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ke miawo la , ame sia ame ale ́ fu mi elabena mienye tɔnyewo . Gake meka ɖe edzi na mi be , ame siwo kata ̃ ado dzi va se ɖe nuwuwua eye womagbe nu le gbɔnye o la akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: “ Nenye be miekpɔ ‘ ŋunyɔnu si hea aƒedo ’ vanɛ wo ̀ le tsitre ɖe gbedoxɔa me , afi si mele be wo ̀ anɔ o , abe ale si nyagblɔɖila Daniel gblɔe enela , nɔvi nuxle ̃ la , se egɔme . Mele egblɔm na wo be , si enumake ne a ̃ te ŋui . Ame siwo le Yudea la nasi ayi gbewo dzi .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ame si le eƒe xɔta la nagaɖi va anyi alo age ɖe eƒe xɔme be yeatsɔ naneke o .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Ame si le agble me la nagatrɔ va tsɔ eƒe awu o .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: “ Le nyateƒe me la , baba na ame siwo fɔ fu le ŋkeke mawo me , kple ame siwo si vi nonowo le .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Mido gbe ɖa vevie be miaƒe sisiɣi nagadze vuvɔŋɔli me o .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Elabena ŋkeke mawo anye ŋkeke siwo ƒomevi medzɔ kpɔ tso keke ɣeyiɣi si me Mawu wɔ xexeame va se ɖe fifia o . Eye ŋkeke siawo ƒomevi magadzɔ kpɔ ha ̃ le ɣe aɖeke ɣi le esia megbe o .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Le nyateƒe me nenye be Mawu meto ŋkeke vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo ɖe eme o la , ame ɖeka pɛ teti ha ̃ masusɔ ɖe anyigba dzi o . Gake le eya ŋutɔ ƒe ame tiatiawo ta la , akpɔ nublanui ato ŋkekeawo ɖe eme .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: “ Nenye be ame aɖe gblɔ na mi be , ‘ Mesia lae nye esi alo eyae nye kemɛ la , migakpe kpe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ dee o .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Elabena alakpa Mesiawo kple alakpa nyagblɔɖila geɖewo ava . Woawɔ nukunuwo fu ̃ ale be ne woate ŋui la , woable Mawu viwo gɔ ̃ .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Eya ta mikpɔ nyuie ! Megblɔe na mi do ŋgɔ !

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: “ Le ŋkeke mawo me le xaxa ga ̃ ma megbe la , ‘ ɣe ado viviti eye ɣleti ha ̃ magaɖi o .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ɣletiviwo age tso dziƒo eye ŋuse ̃ siwo le dziƒo la aʋuʋu . ’

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: ” Le ɣemaɣi me la , amewo lakpɔ Amegbetɔvi la , wo ̀ ava le alili ̃ kpowo dzi kple ŋuse ̃ ga ̃ kpakple ŋutikɔkɔe .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Adɔ mawudɔlawo ɖa be woaƒo ame siwo kata ̃ nye etɔwo le xexe bliboa me la nu ƒu tso keke anyigba ƒe dzogoe eneawo dzi va se ɖe dziƒo nuwuwu ke .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: “ Mitsɔ gboti abe kpɔɖeŋu ene . Nenye be eƒe aŋgba fe ̃ wo ke eye aŋgbawo ŋutɔ de asi dodo me la ; ekema mienya enumake be , dzomeŋɔli ɖo .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Eya ta ne miekpɔ be nu siwo kata ̃ megblɔ la le dzɔdzɔm la , minyae be nye vava zi evelia te tu aƒe , eye nye afɔ le miaƒe agbowo nu .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , dzidzime sia nu mele yiyi ge , va se ɖe esime nu siawo kata ̃ nava eme o .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Dziƒo kple anyigba nu ava yi , gake nye nyawo nu mele yiyi ge akpɔ o . ”

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: “ Ke ha ̃ la , ame aɖeke menya ŋkeke alo gaƒoƒo si tutu dzi nu siawo ava eme o . Mawudɔla siwo le dziƒo ha ̃ menyae o , nye ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha nyemenyae o , negbe Fofonye ko .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Esi mienya ɣeyiɣi sia o ta la minɔ ŋudzɔ aɖabaƒoƒo ɖe sia ɖe .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: ” Nye vava zi evelia asɔ kple ame aɖe si yi nugbe le anyigba didi aɖe dzi . Hafi wo ̀ ayi la ede dɔ asi na eƒe dɔwɔvi ɖe sia ɖe eye wo ̀ gblɔ na eƒe agbonudzɔla be wo ̀ anɔ ŋudzɔ na yeƒe tɔtrɔgbɔ .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Eya ta minɔ ŋɔdzɔ elabena mienya ɣeyiɣi si aƒea tɔ atrɔ agbɔ o , eɖanye fie ̃ alo za ̃ titina alo koklo ƒe atɔkuɣi alo ŋdi kanyaa o .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Ale be ne eva kpata la makpɔ mi mianɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm o .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Nu si megblɔ na mi la , eya ke mele gbɔgblɔm na ame sia me be , ‘ Minɔ ŋudzɔ ! ’ ”

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Azɔ esusɔ ŋkeke eve pɛ ko ne Ŋutitoto kple Abolo maʋamaʋa ̃ ƒe ŋkekenyui la naɖo , eye Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo ganɔ ayemɔ si dzi woato ale ́ Yesu eye woawui le bebeme la dim .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Ke wogblɔ be , “ Mi ́ ate ŋu awui le ŋkeke nyuia dzi o , ne mi ́ ewɔe la , ʋunyaʋunya adzɔ . ”

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Yesu ya le Betania , le Simɔn kpodɔle ́ la la ƒeme . Esi wonɔ fie ̃ nu ɖum la , nyɔnu aɖe tsɔ ami ʋeʋi ̃ xɔasi aɖe si le goe nyui aɖe me la vɛ . Eʋu nu le ami ʋeʋi ̃ la nu eye nukutɔe la , etrɔ wo kata ̃ kɔ ɖe Yesu ƒe tame .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Ame siwo nɔ kplɔa ŋu la dometɔ aɖewo bia wo nɔewo kple dziku be , “ Nu ka ŋutie wo ̀ gble ̃ ami xɔasi sia ɖo ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Woate ŋu adzrae wo ̀ axɔ asi wu agbatedɔwɔla ƒe ƒe ɖeka ƒe fetu eye woatsɔ ga la ama na ame dahewo . ” Ale woka mo na nyɔnua vevie .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Miɖe asi le eŋu . Nu ka ŋutie miele fu ɖem nɛ ? Nu nyui aɖee wo ̀ nye wo ̀ wɔ nam .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Ame dahewo le mia dome gbeawotsyogbe , eye miate ŋu ana kpekpeɖeŋu wo ɣesiaɣi si mielɔ ̃ . Ke nye la , nyemanɔ mia dome ɖaa o . ”

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: ” Nyɔnu sia wɔ nu si wo ̀ ate ŋui la nam . Esi ami na nye ŋutila ̃ si ɖi ge wole le ŋkeke kpui aɖewo megbe la do ŋgɔ .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be dɔ nyui si nyɔnu sia wɔ la mabu akpɔ o , afi sia afi si woagblɔ mawunya le , le xexe sia me godoo la , woagblɔ nu nyui si wo ̀ wɔ afia eye woakafui . ” "

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Yuda Iskariɔt ame si nye eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka la do go dzaa yi Osɔfoga ̃ wo gbɔ be yeawɔ babla kpli wo le ale si wo ̀ ade Yesu asi na wo be woawu la ŋu .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Esi Osɔfoga ̃ wo se nu si ta wo ̀ va wo gbɔ ɖo la , dzi dzɔ wo menye fefe o , ale wodo ga home aɖe ŋugbe nɛ . Le esia ta Yuda Iskariɔt de asi teƒe kple gaƒoƒo nyuitɔ si me wo ̀ ade Yesu asi la didi me .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Le ŋutitotoŋkekenyui ƒe ŋkeke gba ̃ tɔ si dzi woawu ale ̃ viwo le la , Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ eye wobia afi si wo ̀ di be yewoaɖu ŋutitotole ̃ vi la le .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Edɔ nusrɔ ̃ la eve ɖo ɖe Yerusalem be woawɔ dzadzraɖo ɖe ŋkekea ɖuɖu ŋu . Egblɔ na wo be , " “ Ne miege ɖe dua me le yiyim la , miado go ŋutsu aɖe wo ̀ le ́ tsize ɖe ta .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: mikplɔ ame sia ɖo eye miage ɖe aƒe si me wo ̀ ge ɖo la me . Migblɔ na aƒea tɔ be , ‘ Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔe dɔ mi ́ ɖa be mi ́ ava kpɔ xɔ si me ne ̀ dzra ɖo ɖi na mi ́ be mi ́ aɖu ŋutitotoŋkekenyuia le fie ̃ sia ! ’

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Aƒetɔ la akplɔ mi ayi dziƒoxɔa dzii eye wo ̀ afia xɔ ga ̃ aɖe si me wodzra ɖo la mi . Miɖo kplɔ ̃ ɖe afi ma hena mi ́ aƒe ŋutitotoŋkekea ɖuɖu fie ̃ sia . ” "

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la eveawo yi Yerusalem dua me eye wokpɔ be nu sia nu si Yesu gblɔ na wo la va eme tututu ale wowɔ ŋkekea ƒe nuɖuɖu ɖoɖo da ɖi .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Le fie ̃ me la , Yesu va ɖo kple nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Le esime wonɔ anyi ɖe klpɔ ̃ a ŋu nɔ nua ɖum la , Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , " “ Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , mia dometɔ ɖeka si le nu ɖum kplim fifia la adem asi . ”

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Nya sia wɔ nublanui na wo kata ̃ eye wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe bia Yesu ɖeka , ɖekae be , “ Nyee nye ame si le de wo ̀ ge asia ? ”

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Mi ame wuieve siwo le nu ɖum kplim fifia la dometɔ ɖekae le nu sia wɔ ge .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Ele be maku abe ale si nyagblɔɖilawo ɖe gbeƒa ̃ e xoxo va yi ene . Gake baba na ame si adem asi la . Le nyateƒe me nenye be womegaxa dzii o la anyo nɛ wu . ”

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Esi wonɔ nua ɖum la , Yesu tsɔ abolo ɖe asi , da akpe ɖe eta eye wo ̀ ŋe eme hetsɔe na nusrɔ ̃ lawo gblɔ bena , “ Mixɔe ɖu , esiae nye nye ŋutila ̃ . ”

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Tete wo ̀ tsɔ kplu la heda akpe ɖe eta eye wo ̀ tsɔe na wo eye wo kata ̃ no le enu .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Yesu gblɔ kpe ɖe eŋuti be , “ Esiae nye nye ʋu , nubabla la ƒe ʋu , esi wokɔ ɖe anyi ɖe ame geɖewo ta .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , nyemagano naneke tso wain ƒe kutsetse me o va se ɖe gbe ma gbe esime manoe yeyee le mawufiaɖuƒe la me . ”

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Le esia megbe la wodzi ha da akpe na Mawu eye wodo go yi Amito la dzi .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo le afi sia be , “ Mi kata ̃ , miele nu gbe ge le gbɔnye , elabena Mawu gblɔ to nyagblɔɖilawo dzi be , ‘ Mele ale ̃ kplɔla la ƒo ge , eye ale ̃ viawo aka gbe ̃ . ’

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Gake ne wofɔm ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la , madze mia ŋgɔ ayi Galilea afi si mado go mi le . ”

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ne ame sia ame gble ̃ wo ̀ ɖi ha ̃ la , nye ya nyemagble ̃ wo ̀ ɖi gbeɖe o ! ”

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Petro , mele egblɔm na wo ̀ be , hafi koklo naku atɔ zi eve etsɔ fɔŋli la , a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zi etɔ ̃ . ”

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Petro gblɔ kple ɣli be , “ Gbeɖe , nyemagble ̃ wo ̀ ɖi akpɔ o . Ne ehia ̃ be maku kpli wo ̀ kura gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , malɔ ̃ aku faa . ” " Nusrɔ ̃ la mamlɛawo ha ̃ ɖe adzɔgbe nenema ke .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Azɔ wova ɖo teƒe si woyɔna be Getsemane Bɔ la me . Egblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , " “ Minɔ afi sia ne mayi aɖado gbe ɖa . ”

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Ekplɔ Petro , Yakobo kple Yohanes ya ɖe asi . Le gaƒoƒo sia me la , vevesese heliheli ̃ kple xaxa yɔ eme .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Egblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo be , “ Nuxaxa te ɖe nye luʋɔ dzi ale gbegbe be ɖe ko wo ̀ wɔ abe ɖe mele kukum ene . Minɔ afii mianɔ ŋudzɔ kplim . ”

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Azɔ la , ezɔ yi ŋgɔ vie ɖatsyɔ mo anyi eye wo ̀ do gbe ɖa bia be , ne ele bɔbɔe la , gaƒoƒo la nato ye ŋu ayi .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Egblɔ be , “ Aba , Fofo , nu sia nu wɔwɔ le bɔbɔe na wo ̀ eya ta na kplu sia nato nunye ayi . Ke menye nu si nye la , medi o , ke boŋ wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ nu nava eme . ”

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Le esia megbe la , etrɔ yi nusrɔ ̃ la etɔ ̃ awo gbɔ eye wo ̀ va ke ɖe wo ŋu wonɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm . Yesu yɔ Petro gblɔ be , “ Alɔ ̃ dɔm mielea ? Ekema miate ŋu anɔ ŋudzɔ kplim gaƒoƒo ɖeka pɛ teti ha ̃ oa ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Minɔ ŋudzɔ eye miado gbe ɖa be miagage ɖe tetekpɔ me o . Gbɔgbɔ la le lɔlɔ ̃ m gake ŋutila ̃ ya gbɔdzɔ . ”

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Yesu gatrɔ yi teƒea eye wo ̀ gado gbe ɖa vevie , hegagbugbɔ nu siwo wo ̀ bia tsa ̃ la bia .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Emegbe egatrɔ yi nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ ake gake woganɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm elabena ɖeɖi te wo ŋu ŋutɔ . Womenya nya si woagblɔ nɛ esi wo ̀ va kpɔ wo ha ̃ o .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Etrɔ gbɔ va wo gbɔ zi etɔ ̃ lia eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Miegale alɔ ̃ dɔdɔ dzi le ɖiɖim ɖe emea ? Esɔ gbɔ azɔ ! Gaƒoƒo la de . Kpɔ ɖa , wode Amegbetɔvi la asi na nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Mitsi tre ! Mina mi ́ dzo ! Aha ̃ , ame si dem asi la , eyae nye esi ! ”

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Esi Yesu ganɔ nu ƒom la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo dometɔ ɖeka si woyɔna be Yuda Iskariɔt kple ameha ga ̃ aɖe siwo le ́ yiwo kple kpowo ɖe asi henɔ nyanyram ŋutɔ la va do . Ame siawoe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ bubuwo dɔ be woayi aɖale ́ Yesu vɛ .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Hafi woava ɖo teƒea la , Yuda Iskariɔt gblɔ na wo do ŋgɔ be , “ Ame si ŋu mate ɖe agbugbɔ nu na la , eyae , mile ́ e ne miakplɔe ayii . ”

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Esi ameha la va ɖo teƒea teti ko la , Yuda Iskariɔt zɔ ɖe Yesu dzi hedo ɣli yɔe be , “ Nufiala , ” eye wo ̀ gbugbɔ nu nɛ .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Ameha la dze Yesu dzi hele ́ e sesi ̃ e .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Gake ame aɖe he eƒe yi ɖe go eye wo ̀ kpa Osɔfoga ̃ la ƒe dɔla ƒe to ɖeka wo ̀ ge va dze anyigba .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Yesu bia ele ́ lawo be “ Adzodala vɔ ̃ ɖi aɖee menye hafi mietsɔ yiwo kple kpowo ɖe asi va be yewoale ́ ma ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Menɔ gbedoxɔ la ƒe xɔxɔnu gbe sia gbe nɔ nu fiam . Ke esia va , eme be woawu Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la nu . ” "

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Le esime nya siawo kata ̃ nɔ dzɔdzɔm la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo kata ̃ si dzo .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Đekakpui aɖe si ta aklala biɖibiɖi ko la nɔ Yesu yome . Esi amele ́ lawo te kpɔ be yewoale ́ e la ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: esi amama hegble ̃ eƒe avɔ la ɖi .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Wokplɔ Yesu yi Osɔfoga ̃ ƒeme afi si Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ bubuwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo va ɖi anyi ɖi le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko me . "

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Petro nɔ adzɔge ʋi ̃ i le Yesu yome . Esi wo ̀ va ɖo Osɔfoga ̃ la ƒeme la , eto nuxa dzaa ge ɖe aƒea me eye wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ anyi ɖe subɔvi siwo do dzo nɔ ƒuƒum la dome kpoo .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Yudatɔwo ƒe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la ga ̃ wo nɔ nutsotso aɖewo dim le Yesu ŋu be yewoatsɔ abu fɔe eye yewoatso kufia nɛ . Gake womete ŋu kpɔ nutsotso aɖeke o .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Ame geɖewo va ɖi alakpaɖasewo gake nya siwo kata ̃ wogblɔ la mesɔ o . Ame sia ame ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi to vovo tso nɔvia tɔ gbɔ .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Mlɔeba la , ame aɖewo da alakpa ɖe esi be ,

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: “ Mi ́ ese wo ̀ gblɔ be ; ‘ Magba ̃ gbedoxɔ sia si amegbetɔwo tu la eye matu bubu si manye amegbetɔwo ƒe asinudɔwɔwɔ o la le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ megbe . ’ ”

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Togbɔ be wogblɔ alea ha ̃ amewo ƒe nutsotsowo to vovo ake .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Mlɔeba la , Osɔfoga ̃ tsi tre bia Yesu le ʋɔnua ŋkume be , “ Đe ne ̀ le gbegbem be yemaɖo nutsotso gbogbo siwo wotsɔ ɖe ŋuwo ̀ la ƒe ɖeke ŋu oa ? Nya aɖeke mele asiwo ̀ na ̃ tsɔ aʋli ɖokuiwo ̀ tae oa ? ”

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Yesu meke nu o , ke boŋ ezi kpi kpoo . Osɔfoga ̃ la gabiae be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Mesia , si nye Yayratɔ la Via ? ”

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nyee , tso azɔ dzi miakpɔ Amegbetɔvi la , wo ̀ anɔ anyi ɖe Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la ƒe nuɖusime eye wo ̀ anɔ alili ̃ kpowo dzi atso dziƒo ava . ”

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Ŋuɖoɖo sia do dziku na Osɔfoga ̃ la ale gbegbe be wo ̀ dze eƒe awu si wo ̀ do la hegblɔ be ; “ Đe wo ̀ hia be mi ́ agadi ɖasefowo ɖe eŋua ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Gbeɖe , miekpɔ afiatsotso xoxo elabena miawo ŋutɔ miese busunya si wo ̀ gblɔ . Azɔ nu kae nye miaƒe afiatsotso ? ” Wo kata ̃ wodo ɣli gblɔ be “ Edze na ku . ”

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Azɔ ame aɖewo tu ta ɖe mo nɛ ƒia , ɖewo tsɔ nu bla mo nɛ eye ɖewo ha ̃ tu kɔe sesi ̃ e hegblɔ be , “ Gblɔ nya ɖi . Ame kae ƒo wo ̀ ? ” " Eŋudzɔlawo ha ̃ ƒoe .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Petro nɔ aƒea ƒe gbadzaƒe . Đetugbivi aɖe si nye Osɔfoga ̃ la ƒe subɔvi ɖeka la kpɔ Petro dze sii le esime wo ̀ nɔ dzo ƒum .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Đetugbivia te ɖe Petro ŋu le ́ ŋku ɖe eŋu nyuie eye wo ̀ do ɣli be , " “ Wo ̀ ha ̃ Yesu si tso Nazaret la ƒe yomedzelawo dometɔ ɖeka ne ̀ nye . ”

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Ke Petro se ̃ nu gblɔ bena , “ Nyemenya alo se nu si gblɔm ne ̀ le la gɔme o . ” Ale wo ̀ tso heyi ɖanɔ agbo la ƒe mɔnu . Tete koklo ku atɔ .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Subɔvi la ƒe ŋku ganɔ Petro ŋu kokoko . Ekpɔ afi si wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ la eye wo ̀ yɔ ame bubuwo hegblɔ na wo be , “ Mebe ame sia la Yesu yomenɔlawo dometɔ ɖeka wo ̀ nye . ”

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Petro ɖe ko wo ̀ gase ̃ nu ake be yemenya Yesu o ! Ke ame siwo tsi tre ɖe dzoa gbɔ la ha ̃ de asi gbɔgblɔ me na Petro be , “ Vava ̃ , wo ̀ ha ̃ wo dometɔ ɖekae ne ̀ nye elabena Galileae ne ̀ tso ! ”

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Petro ta nu gblɔ be , “ Le nyateƒe me la , nyemenya ame si ŋuti miele nu ƒom le gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . ”

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Kasia koklo ku atɔ zi evelia . Enumake Petro ɖo ŋku Yesu ƒe nya siawo dzi bena , “ Hafi koklo naku atɔ zi eve la a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zi etɔ ̃ . ” Esia na be eƒe dzi gba ̃ eye wo ̀ fa avi hehehe .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Le ŋufɔke ŋdi kanya la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo , dumega ̃ wo , agbale ̃ fialawo kple ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ lawo kpe ta be yewoade ŋugble le nu si yewoawɔ la ŋu . Woɖoe be yewoabla Yesu aɖoe ɖe Pilato , ame si nye Romatɔwo ƒe gɔvina si nɔ Yudea dzi ɖum le ɣemaɣi me la gbɔ .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Esi Yesu va ɖo Pilato gbɔ la , Pilato biae be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nyee nye Fia la tututu abe ale si ne ̀ gblɔ ene . ”

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Le afi sia la Osɔfoga ̃ wo tso enu be ewɔ nu vɔ ̃ geɖewo .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Pilato gabiae be , “ Nu ka ta me ̀ di be yeaɖo nya aɖeke ŋu o ? Nya gbogbo siwo kata ̃ wotsɔ ɖe ŋuwo ̀ la , nye nyateƒea ? ” "

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Gake Yesu meke nu eve ha ̃ o . Esia wɔ nuku na Pilato ŋutɔ .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Azɔ nu ɖeka aɖe si Pilato wɔna ɖaa le Ŋutitotoŋkekea dzi lae nye be , eɖea asi le Yudatɔ gamenɔla ɖeka si amewo lɔ ̃ be wo ̀ aɖe asi le la ŋuti .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Le ŋkeke mawo me la , gamenɔla siawo dometɔ ɖeka enye Baraba ame si kple ame bubuwo wu amewo le howɔwɔ ga ̃ aɖe si wowɔ va yi la me .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Azɔ amewo ƒo ƒu eye wobia tso Pilato si be wo ̀ aɖe asi le gamenɔlawo ɖeka ŋu na yewo abe ale si wo ̀ wɔnɛ ɖaa ene .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato bia wo be , " “ Miedi be maɖe asi le Yudatɔwo ƒe fia la ŋu na mia ? ”

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Le esime wo ̀ nya nyuie be ŋuʋaʋa ̃ ta koe Osɔfoga ̃ wo tsɔ Yesu de asi nɛ ɖo .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Ke Osɔfoga ̃ wo ƒoe ɖe ameawo nu be woabia be woaɖe asi le Baraba boŋ ŋu ke menye Yesu o .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato bia wo be , “ Esi miebe maɖe asi le Baraba ŋu ɖe , nu kae miebe mawɔ kple ame si mieyɔna be miaƒe Fia ? ”

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Ameawo kata ̃ do ɣli be , “ Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu ! ”

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Pilato gabia wo be , “ Makla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu be ale ke ? Nu vɔ ̃ kae wo ̀ wɔ si dze na ku ? ” Ke ameawo gado ɣli sesi ̃ e wu tsa ̃ be , “ Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu ! ”

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Azɔ Pilato vɔ ̃ be ameha la ava wɔ ʋunyaʋunya eye be wo ̀ adze wo ŋu ta la , eɖe asi le Baraba ŋu na wo . Ke eɖe gbe be woaƒo Yesu kple atam . Le esia megbe la , ekplɔe de asi na ameawo be woayi aɖakla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu le woƒe didi nu .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Romasrafowo kplɔe yi asrafowo nɔƒee le fiasa ̃ la me eye woyɔ asrafo siwo kata ̃ dzɔa Fiasa ̃ la ŋu la ƒo ƒui .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Wodo awu dzi ̃ nɛ eye wotsɔ ŋu wɔ kuku heɖɔ nɛ .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Azɔ wode asi fewuɖuɖu le eŋu me . Wovana egbɔ doa gbe nɛ hegblɔna be , “ Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia nenɔ anyi tegbee ! ”

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Amewo tsɔ ameƒoti ƒo tame nɛ . Đewo ɖe ta ɖe mo nɛ eye ɖewo bua dze klo be yewo le esubɔm .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Esi wowɔ funyafunyae ʋuu wo ̀ ti wo la , woɖe awu dzi ̃ la le eŋu hetsɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe awuwo do nɛ eye wokplɔe dzoe be yewoakla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Le mɔa dzi la , wodo go Simɔn Kirenetɔ wo ̀ gbɔna dua me , eye wozi edzi be wo ̀ akpe ɖe Yesu ŋu atsɔ eƒe atitsoga la . Simɔn siae nye Aleksandro kple Rufo fofo .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ale wokplɔ Yesu va teƒe aɖe si woyɔna be Golgata , si gɔmee nye ametakoliƒe .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Le afi sia wotsɔ gbe siwo vena la tsaka wain tsitsi hekpe nɛ , gake menoe o .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Eye wokla ̃ e ɖe atitsoga ŋu . Ame siwo kla ̃ e la da akɔ ɖe eƒe awuwo dzi be woakpɔ esi ame sia ame naxɔ .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Anɔ abe ŋdi ga asieke me ene esi wokla ̃ e ɖe atitsoga ŋu .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Woŋlɔ vɔ ̃ si wo ̀ wɔ ta wokla ̃ e ɖe atia ŋu la ɖe ʋuƒo kakɛ aɖe dzi kla ̃ ɖe atitsoga la tame . Nu si woŋlɔ ̃ ɖe ʋuƒoa dzi enye “ Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia . ”

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Le ŋdi ma ke la wokla ̃ adzodala vɔ ̃ ɖi eve aɖewo ha ̃ ɖe eƒe axa eveawo dzi .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Ale wowu ale si mawunya gblɔ da ɖi la nu be . “ Wobui ɖe ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo dome . ”

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Ame siwo va nɔ eŋu tom la ɖea alɔme le eŋu eye woʋuʋua ta hekonɛ . Đewo ha ̃ doa ɣli gblɔna nɛ fewuɖutɔe be , “ Ehe ̃ ! Kpɔ ale si wo ̀ va zu na wo ̀ e ɖa ! Wo ̀ e be yeate ŋu agba ̃ gbedoxɔ la , agagbugbɔ atui le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ megbe . Nenye be ŋuse ̃ le asiwo ̀ na ̃ te ŋu awɔ nukunu ga ̃ siawo la ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: ɖe ɖokuiwo ha ̃ le atitsoga la ŋue ! ”

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fiala siwo nɔ tsitre ɖe teƒea ha ̃ nɔ alɔme ɖem le Yesu ŋu . Wogblɔ be , “ Ame sia te ŋu ɖe ame bubuwo tso tetekpɔwo kple fuwo me , gake mate ŋu aɖe ye ŋutɔ ɖokui o ! ”

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Wodo ɣli yɔe le atitisoga la ŋu be , “ Hei , kpɔ ɖa , wo ̀ Mesia ! Wo ̀ Israel ƒe Fia ! Đi le atitsoga la ŋu ekema mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ axɔ dziwo ̀ ase ! ” " Adzodala eve siwo wokla ̃ ɖe atitsogawo ŋu kplii gɔ ̃ ha ̃ dzui .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Le ŋdɔ ga wuieve me lɔƒo la , za ̃ do keli do ɖe anyigba blibo la dzi va se ɖe keke ɣetrɔ ga etɔ ̃ me .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Yesu do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , " “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabaktani ? ” si gɔmee nye , “ Nye Mawu , Nye Mawu , nu ka tae ne ̀ gble ̃ m ɖi ? ”

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Esi ame siwo nɔ tsitre ɖe afi ma se esia la , wogblɔ be , “ Kpɔ ɖa , ele Eliya yɔm . ”

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Le esia ta wo dometɔ ɖeka ƒu du yi ɖaku wain tsitsi eye wo ̀ kɔe ɖe ƒumekutsa me , tɔe ɖe ati nu hetsɔ ɖo nu na Yesu be wo ̀ ano hegblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Miɖe asi le eŋu azɔ ne mi ́ akpɔe ɖa be Eliya ava ɖee le atia ŋuti ha ̃ . ”

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Se ̃ la , Yesu gado ɣli sesi ̃ e ake eye wo ̀ ku .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Le gaƒoƒo sia me tututu la , xɔmetsovɔ si wotsɔ xe kɔkɔeƒewo ƒe kɔkɔeƒea ŋkume le gbedoxɔ la me la , ma ̃ eme ɖe eve tso dzi va se ɖe anyime ke .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Esi Romasrafo si nɔ Yesu ŋu dzɔm kpɔ ale si Yesu kui la , egblɔ kple seselela ̃ me geɖe be , “ Ame sia la Mawu Vi wo ̀ nye vava ̃ ! ”

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Nyɔnu aɖewo ha ̃ va teƒea eye wonɔ adzɔge nɔ nu siwo nɔ dzɔdzɔm la kpɔm . Ame siawo nye Maria Magdalatɔ , Maria si nye Yakobo suetɔ kple Yose dada kpakple Salome .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ame siawo kple Galilea nyɔnu bubu siwo nye eyomenɔla siwo subɔnɛ ne eva Galilea la , ha ̃ dze eyome va Yerusalem .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Nu siawo kata ̃ dzɔ ŋkeke ɖeka do ŋgɔ na Sabat ŋkekea . Le ɣetrɔ me lɔƒo la ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Yosef tso Arimatia ame si nye Yudatɔwo ƒe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la ga ̃ wo dometɔ ɖeka si ŋu bubu le la , va Yerusalem . Ame sia ha ̃ nɔ mɔ kpɔm na mawufiaɖuƒea ƒe vava kple dzimaɖeɖi geɖe . Eyi Pilato gbɔ kple dzideƒo hebia be wo ̀ aɖe asi le Yesu ƒe kukua ŋu na ye .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Pilato mexɔe se be Yesu ku le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko megbe o . Eya ta eyɔ Roma srafowo ƒe amega ̃ si ƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te nyawo nɔ la eye wo ̀ biae be Yesu ku vava ̃ ha ̃ ?

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Asrafomega ̃ la ɖo kpe edzi na Pilato be eku . Ale Pilato ɖe mɔ na Yosef be wo ̀ axɔ ame kukua aɖaɖi .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Yosef ƒle aklala biɖibiɖi ga ̃ aɖe eye woɖe Yesu kukua le atitsoga la ŋu . Exatsa aklala la ɖe eŋuti eye wo ̀ tsɔe ɖamlɔ yɔdo , si woɖe ɖe agakpe me la me , hemli kpe ga ̃ aɖe ɖo yɔdoa nu .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Maria Magdalatɔ kple Maria Yesu dada ha ̃ nɔ afi ma kpɔ afi si wo ̀ ɖi Yesu ɖo .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Le fie ̃ , esi Sabat ŋkekea wu enu la , Maria Magdalatɔ , Salome kple Maria Yakobo dada woyi ɖaƒle amiʋeʋi ̃ si wosina na ame kuku be wo ̀ agavo kaba o la da ɖi .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Le ŋufɔke ŋdi kanyaa la , ame siawo fɔ tsɔ amiawo ɖe asi dze mɔ ɖo ta Yesu ƒe yɔdo to .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Esi wole mɔa dzi yina la , wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Ame kae amli kpe ga ̃ si le yɔdo la nu la ɖa ? ”

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Gake nukutɔe esi wova ɖo teƒea la , wokpɔ be womli kpe si wotsɔ tu yɔdoa nu la da ɖe adzɔge eye yɔdoa le ʋuʋu .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Woge ɖe yɔdoa me eye wokpɔ ɖekapkui aɖe wo ̀ nɔ awu ɣi tititi me nɔ anyi ɖe yɔdoa ƒe ɖusime . Le nyateƒe me la , vɔvɔ ̃ ɖo nyɔnuawo ale gbegbe be woku ɖe tsitre nu .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Gake mawudɔla la gblɔ na wo be , “ Migavɔ ̃ o . Menye Yesu Nazaretitɔ si wokla ̃ ɖe ati ŋu la dim miele oa ? Mele afi sia o , egbɔ agbe eye wo ̀ tsi tre . Mikpɔ afi si wotsɔ eƒe ŋutila ̃ mlɔe ɖa .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Azɔ miyi miagblɔ nya sia na Petro kple nusrɔ ̃ la bubuawo be , ‘ Yesu dze mia ŋgɔ yina ɖe Galilea . Miakpɔe le afi ma abe ale si wo ̀ gblɔe na mi hafi ku ene . ’ ” "

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Nyɔnuawo si do go le yɔdoa me kple vɔvɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe . Wovɔ ̃ ale gbegbe be womagate ŋu aƒo nu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Kwasiɖa ƒe ŋdi kanyae Yesu gbɔ agbe eye ame gba ̃ tɔ si kpɔe lae nye Maria Magdalatɔ , ame si me wo ̀ nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ adre do goe le .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Eyi ɖake ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu woƒo ƒu ɖe teƒe ɖeka henɔ konyi fam . Woƒe ŋkuwo kata ̃ yɔ kple aɖatsi .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Egblɔ na wo kple ɣli be , yekpɔ Yesu wo ̀ gbɔ agbe tso ku me ! Gake nusrɔ ̃ lawo mexɔ nya sia dzi se o . " "

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Le gbe ma gbe ke ƒe ɣeyiɣi bubu me la , Yesu ɖe eɖokui fia ŋutsu eve siwo nɔ mɔ zɔm tso Yerusalem yina teƒe aɖe .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Esi wova kpɔe dze sii mlɔeba be Yesue la , woɖe abla trɔ yi Yerusalem ɖagblɔe na ame bubuwo , gake ame aɖeke mexɔ woƒe nya dzi se o .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Azɔ le ɣe bubu ɣi la , Yesu ɖe eɖokui fia nusrɔ ̃ la wuiɖekɛawo le esime wonɔ teƒe ɖeka nɔ nu ɖum . Ehe nya ɖe wo ŋu vevie le woƒe dzimaxɔse ta . Evee ŋutɔ be togbɔ be amewo kpɔe agbagbe va gblɔ na wo ha ̃ la , wogbe be yewomaxɔe ase o .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Azɔ egblɔ na wo be , " “ Fifia la , miyi ɖe xexe bliboa me eye miagblɔ nyanyui la na ame sia ame le afi sia afi .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Ame siwo axɔ nyanyui la eye woade mawutsi ta na wo la , woakpɔ ɖeɖe . Ke ame siwo anye kɔlialiatɔ siwo ase ̃ to , agbe nyanyui la xɔxɔ la woabu fɔ wo .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: ” Dzesi siawo akplɔ ame siwo axɔe se la ɖo : le nye ŋkɔ me woanya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ado goe . Woaƒo nu kple aɖe yeyewo .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Woale ́ dawo kple woƒe asiwo eye ne wono aɖi vɔ ̃ ɖi ha ̃ la , masi wo o . Woada woƒe asiwo ɖe dɔnɔwo dzi eye woƒe la ̃ me lase ̃ .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Esi Yesu wu nya siawo nu la , gbɔgbɔ la tsɔe dzoe yi dziƒoe eye wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ anyi ɖe Mawu ƒe nuɖusime .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo gbe henɔ mawunya gblɔm na amewo tso teƒe yi teƒe , Aƒetɔ la nɔ kpli wo eye wo ̀ ɖo kpe eƒe nya la dzi to dzesi siwo kplɔ eƒe nyawo ɖo la me .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Ame geɖewo ŋlɔ nu tso nu siwo va eme le mi ́ a dome , la ŋu ,

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: ame siwo tu woƒe ŋutinyawo ɖe nyadzɔdzɔ siwo woxɔ tso ame siwo nye nuteƒekpɔlawo le gɔmedzedzea me la gbɔ eye wonye dɔlawo na nya la .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Eya ta enyo nye ha ̃ ŋu , le esi medzro nuwo me tsitotsito tso gɔmedzedzea me ke , be magbugbɔ aŋlɔe ɖe ɖoɖo nu na wo ̀ , nye bubutɔ Teofil

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: bena wo ̀ agbugbɔ aɖo kpe edzi na wo ̀ be nu siwo kata ̃ wofia wo ̀ lae nye nyateƒea .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Nye ŋutinya la ƒe gɔmedzedze ku ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfo aɖe si woyɔna be Zakaria , ame si nɔ agbe le ɣeyiɣi si me Herodes nye fia le Yudea la ŋu . Woma Osɔfo siwo wɔa dɔ le gbedoxɔa me la ɖe ha vovovowo me eye Zakaria nye ha si woyɔna be ‘ Abiya ’ la me tɔwo dometɔ ɖeka . Zakaria srɔ ̃ Elizabet ha ̃ tso Osɔfowo ƒe ƒome me eye wo ̀ nye Arɔn ƒe dzidzimevi .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Wo kple evea nye dzɔdzɔetɔwo le Mawu ŋkume eye wole ́ Aƒetɔ la ƒe sededewo kple ɖoɖowo me ɖe asi kpɔtsɔtsɔ manɔŋutɔe .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Gake vi ɖeka teti ha ̃ menɔ wo si o , elabena Elizabet nye konɔ eye wo ame evea kata ̃ ha ̃ tsi ŋutɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Eva eme be Zakaria ƒe hatsotso le nunɔdɔ wɔm le kɔnua nu le Mawu ƒe ŋkume ,

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: eye le nunɔdɔ ƒe kɔnua nu la , wodzidze nu eye wotia Zakaria be wo ̀ awɔ subɔsubɔdɔ le Aƒetɔ la ƒe gbedoxɔa me eye wo ̀ ado dzudzɔ .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Esi dzudzɔdoɣi ɖo la , ameha si va be woasubɔ la nɔ xexe nɔ gbe dom ɖa .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Zakaria nɔ kɔkɔeƒea , kasia mawudɔla aɖe va do ɖe edzi zi ɖeka ; eye wo ̀ nɔ tsi tre ɖe vɔsamlekpuia ƒe nuɖusime .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Zakaria vɔ ̃ ŋutɔ ale wo ̀ de asi dzodzo me nyanyanya .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Gake mawudɔla la gblɔ nɛ be , “ Me ̀ gavɔ ̃ o , Zakaria ! Elabena meva be magblɔ na wo ̀ be Mawu se wo ̀ gbedodoɖa . Srɔ ̃ wo Elizabet le viŋutsuvi dzi ge na wo ̀ , eye na ̃ na ŋkɔe be Yohanes .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Mi ame evea miakpɔ dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe le eƒe dzidzi ta eye ame geɖewo ha ̃ atso aseye kpli mi .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Elabena ɖevi la anye ga ̃ le woƒe ŋkume . Mano wain alo aha sese ̃ aɖeke o . Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ayɔ eme taŋtaŋtaŋ hafi woadzii gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ,

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: eye akplɔ Israelvi geɖewo va Mawu si nye woƒe Aƒetɔ la gbɔe .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Eya adze ŋgɔ na Aƒetɔ la , anɔ Eliya ƒe gbɔgbɔ kple ŋuse ̃ me be wo ̀ atrɔ fofowo ƒe dziwo ɖe wo viwo ŋu eye tomaɖolawo ɖe ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe nunya ŋu , be wo ̀ adzra ame siwo wodzra ɖo ɖi na Aƒetɔ la ɖo . ”

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Zakaria gblɔ na mawudɔla la be , “ Aleke mawɔ anya be esia ate ŋu ava eme , elabena metsi ŋutɔ eye srɔ ̃ nye ha ̃ ku nyaga ̃ . ”

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Mawudɔla la gblɔ nɛ kple kakaɖedzi be , “ Nyee nye Gabriel , si nɔa Mawu ŋkume ɣesiaɣi . Eyae dɔm ɖa be magblɔ dzidzɔnya sia na wo ̀ .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Gake esi me ̀ xɔ dzinye se o ta la , wo ̀ aɖe atu eye magate ŋu aƒo nu o , va se ɖe esime woadzi ɖevi sia . Elabena woŋlɔ ɖi be nye nyawo ava me pɛpɛpɛ nenye be ɣeyiɣi la ɖo . ”

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ me la , ameha si nɔ xexe la nɔ Zakaria lalam be wo ̀ ado go eye wo ̀ wɔ nuku na wo ŋutɔ be etsi xɔa me fu ̃ u nenema .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Esi wo ̀ do go mlɔeba la , mete ŋu ƒo nu na ame aɖeke o , ke ewɔ dzesi na wo esi fia be ekpɔ ŋutega alo ɖeɖefia aɖe le gbedoxɔ la me .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Zakaria tsi gbedoxɔ la me va se ɖe esime eƒe dɔwɔŋkeke mamlɛawo wu enu eye wo ̀ trɔ yi aƒe me .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe megbe la srɔ ̃ a Elizabet fɔ fu , eye wo ̀ yi ɖaɣla eɖokui ɣleti atɔ ̃ sɔŋ .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Elizabet gblɔ kple dzidzɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔme nyo ŋutɔ bena , wo ̀ ɖe kotsitsi ƒe ŋukpe ga ̃ sia ɖa le dzinye . ”

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Le Elizabet ƒe fufɔfɔ ƒe ɣleti adelia me la , Mawu dɔ mawudɔla Gabriel ɖo ɖe kɔƒe aɖe si woyɔna be Nazaret si le Galilea la me .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Ame si gbɔ wo ̀ dɔe ɖo la enye ɖetugbi dzadzɛ aɖe si woyɔna be Maria . Wodo Maria ŋugbe na David ƒe dzidzimevi aɖe si woyɔna be Yosef la be wo ̀ aɖe .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Gabriel va do ɖe Maria gbɔ le vo me eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ŋutifafa na wo ̀ ! Wo ̀ ɖetugbi si kpɔ amenuveve ! Aƒetɔ la li kpli wo ̀ . ”

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Maria ɖi vo eye eƒe susu ɖe fu nɛ ŋutɔ ; edze agbagba bu tame le nu si tututu mawudɔla la wɔnɛ la ŋu .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Mawudɔla la yi edzi gblɔ nɛ be , “ Maria me ̀ gavɔ ̃ kura o , elabena Mawu ɖoe be yeayra wo ̀ nukutɔe !

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: E ̀ le fu fɔ ge adzi ŋutsuvi , eye na ̃ na ŋkɔe be ‘ Yesu . ’

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Anye ame xɔŋkɔ aɖe eye woayɔe be Mawu Dziƒoʋi ̃ tɔ la ƒe Vi . Aƒetɔ Mawu la atsɔ tɔgbuia David ƒe fiazikpui la nɛ .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Ale wo ̀ aɖu fia ɖe Israel dzi eye eƒe Fiaɖuƒe mawu nu akpɔo . ”

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Maria bia mawudɔla la be , “ Aleke mawɔ adzi vi esi nyemenya ŋutsu kpɔ o . ”

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Mawudɔla la ɖo eŋu be , “ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ava dziwo ̀ , eye Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ ayɔ mewo ̀ ; eya ta ɖevi si na ̃ dzi la , anɔ Kɔkɔe eye wo ̀ anye Mawu Vi .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Gawu la anɔ abe ɣleti adee nye si va yi ene la , Wo ̀ ƒometɔ Elizabet ame si woyɔna be ‘ konɔ ’ la fɔ fu le eƒe nyaga ̃ kuku me .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Elabena ŋugbe ɖe sia ɖe si Mawu do la , ava me pɛpɛpɛ . ”

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Maria gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔlae menye eye nu sia nu si wo ̀ di tso asinye lae mawɔ . Nu sia nu si ne ̀ gblɔ la neva eme . ” " Le esia megbe la , mawudɔla la gabu le eŋkume .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Le ŋkeke siawo me la , Maria tsi tre eye wo ̀ ɖe abla yi Yudea du aɖe me

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: afi si wo ̀ ge ɖe Zakaria ƒeme eye wo ̀ do gbe na Elizabet le .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Esi Elizabet se Maria wo ̀ do gbe nɛ ko la , vidzi ̃ si le dɔme nɛ la ʋa ̃ kple dzidzɔ eye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ Elizabet me fu ̃ u .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Elizabet do dzidzɔɣli eye wo ̀ gblɔ na Maria be , " “ Mawu ve nuwo ̀ le nyɔnuwo kata ̃ dome , eye wo ̀ ɖoe be viwo ̀ la naxɔ eƒe yayra ga ̃ tɔ kekeake .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Bubu kae nye ga ̃ si ne ̀ de ŋunye , be wo ̀ si nye Aƒetɔ la dada na ̃ va kpɔm ɖa !

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Esi ne ̀ va do gbe nam teti ko la , vinye la ʋã le dɔme nam le dzidzɔ ta .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: E ̀ xɔe se be Mawu awɔ ɖe ale si wo ̀ gblɔ la dzi , esia tae wo ̀ yra wo ̀ alea gbegbe ɖo . ”

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Maria ɖo eŋu na Elizabet be , “ O , nye luʋɔ le Aƒetɔ la kafum ale gbegbe .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Eye mele dzidzɔ kpɔm le Mawu , nye xɔla la , ŋuti .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Elabena ekpɔ nye , eƒe subɔvi sia ƒe ame gblɔe nyenye , eye tso azɔ dzi yina la woayɔm be Mawu ƒe ame yayra tso dzidzime yi dzidzime . ”

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Elabena Ŋuse ̃ tɔ la wɔ nu ga ̃ wo nam . Kɔkɔe nye eƒe ŋkɔ .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Eƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ li na ame siwo vɔ ̃ nɛ tso dzidzime yi dzidzime .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: ” Ewɔ nu dzɔatsuwo kple eƒe alɔ eye wo ̀ kaka ame siwo dana le woƒe tamesusuwo me .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Eɖe fiawo ɖa le woƒe zi dzi ke edo ame siwo bɔbɔ wo ɖokuiwo ɖe anyi la ɖe dzi .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Etsɔ nu nyuiwo ɖi ƒo na dɔwuitɔwo , ke edo mɔ kesinɔtɔwo asigbɔloe .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Ekpe ɖe eƒe dɔla Israel ŋu eye wo ̀ ɖo ŋku eƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ na wo dzi

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: be wo ̀ akpɔ nublanui na Abraham kple eƒe dzidzimeviwo tegbee , abe ale si wo ̀ do ŋugbee na mi ́ a fofowo ene . ” "

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Maria nɔ Elizabet gbɔ abe dzinu etɔ ̃ ene hafi trɔ yi aƒe .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Elizabet ƒe vidziɣi va ɖo eye wo ̀ dzi ŋutsuvi . "

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Nya sia kaka ɖe eƒe aƒelikawo kple ƒometɔwo dome kaba ŋutɔ , ame sia ame se ale si Aƒetɔ la nyo dɔme na Elizabet eye wo kata ̃ kpɔ dzidzɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Esi ɖevia xɔ ŋkeke enyi la , ƒometɔwo kple xɔlɔ ̃ wo va kpe be yewoawɔ aʋatsotsokɔnu alo ŋkeke enyi ƒe kɔnu la . Amewo kata ̃ bu be woatsɔ fofoa ŋkɔ Zakaria nɛ ,

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: gake Elizabet gblɔ be , “ Gbeɖe , woana ŋkɔe be Yohanes . ”

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Amewo do ɣli be , “ Nu ka ? Ame aɖeke mele wo ̀ ƒome bliboa me si woyɔna nenema o . ”

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Ale womia asi ɖevia fofo , eye wobiae to asidzesiwɔwɔ me be wo ̀ ayɔ ŋkɔ si woatsɔ na ɖevia .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Zakaria na wotsɔ agbale ̃ kakɛ aɖe vɛ nɛ eye nukutɔe la , eŋlɔ ɖe edzi be : “ Eŋkɔe nye YOHANES . ”

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Enumake Zakaria ƒe nu ʋu eye wo ̀ gadze nuƒoƒo gɔme abe tsa ̃ ene . Ekafu Mawu kple dzidzɔ geɖe .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Nyadzɔdzɔ bliboa wɔ nuku na woƒe aƒelikawo ŋutɔ eye wo ̀ kaka ɖe du siwo le Yudea togbɛ dzi la kata ̃ me .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Ame sia ame si se nya sia la bua tame le eŋu ɣeɣiyi didi aɖe eye wo ̀ biaa eɖokui be , “ Ame ka ƒomevi ɖevi sia atsi ava zu ? ” Elabena le nyateƒe me la , Aƒetɔ la ƒe asi le edzi le mɔ tɔxɛ aɖe nu .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ fofoa Zakaria me eye wo ̀ gblɔ nya siawo ɖi be , “

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Woakafu Aƒetɔ , Israel ƒe Mawu la elabena eva eye wo ̀ ɖe eƒe dukɔ .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Eɖo ɖeɖe ƒe ŋuse ̃ anyi na mi ́ le eƒe dɔla , David , ƒe aƒe me

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: abe ale si wo ̀ gblɔe to eƒe nyagblɔɖila kɔkɔewo dzi le blema ene ,

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: be yeaɖe mi ́ tso mi ́ aƒe futɔwo kple ame siwo le ́ fu mi ́ la ƒe asime ,

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: ne wo ̀ akpɔ nublanui na mi ́ a fofowo eye wo ̀ aɖo ŋku eƒe nubabla kɔkɔe

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: kple atam si wo ̀ ka na mi ́ a fofo Abraham la dzi ,

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: be yeaɖe mi ́ tso mi ́ aƒe futɔwo sime ne mi ́ asubɔe vɔvɔ ̃ manɔmetɔe

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: le eŋkume le kɔkɔenyenye kple dzɔdzɔenyenye me le mi ́ aƒe ŋkekewo kata ̃ me .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Ke wo ̀ , vinye , woayɔ wo ̀ be Dziƒoʋi ̃ tɔ la ƒe nyagblɔɖila elabena a ̃ dze Aƒetɔ la ŋgɔ be na ̃ dzra mɔ ɖo ɖi nɛ ,

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: ne na ̃ tsɔ xɔxɔ ƒe sidzedze na eƒe dukɔ to woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ƒe tsɔtsɔke me ,

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: le mi ́ aƒe Mawu la ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ sɔgbɔ la ta , to esia dzi ɣedzedze nyui la ava na mi ́ tso dziƒo ,

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: ne wo ̀ akle ̃ na ame siwo le viviti me kple ku ƒe vɔvɔli ̃ te , ne wo ̀ ada mi ́ aƒe afɔwo ɖe ŋutifafa ƒe mɔ dzi . ”

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Đevi la tsi eye wose ̃ ŋu le gbɔgbɔ me . Enɔ gbedzi va se ɖe esime woɖee fia Israel blibo la le gagla ̃ gbe .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo me la , Kaisaro Augusto , ame si nye fia le Roma dukɔa nu la de se be woaxle ̃ ame siwo kata ̃ le fiaɖuƒea me .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Kirenio nye gɔvina le Siria le ɣemaɣi .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Wodi tso ame sia ame si be wo ̀ ayi eya ŋutɔ ƒe dedu me be woaŋlɔ eŋkɔ le afi ma .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be Yosef tso fiaƒome me ta la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ ayi Betlehem le Yudea afi si nye Fia David ƒe dedu me . Le esia ta wo ̀ dze mɔ tso Nazaret si le Galilea la me .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Ekplɔ Maria , ame si ŋugbe wodo nɛ , gake fu nɔ eƒo le ɣemaɣi me la ɖe asi .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Esi woɖo Betlehem la , Maria ƒe ŋkeke de be wo ̀ adzi vi ,

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: ale wo ̀ dzi ŋutsuvi si nye eƒe vi gba ̃ tɔ . Exatsa ɖevia ɖe abadzivɔ me eye wo ̀ tsɔe mlɔ la ̃ wo ƒe nuɖunu me , elabena womekpɔ dzeƒe le amedzrodzeƒe si le kɔƒea me la o .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Gbe ma gbe la , ale ̃ kplɔla aɖewo nɔ gbedzi le kɔƒea gbɔ nɔ woƒe ale ̃ wo ŋu dzɔm .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Kasia mawudɔla aɖe va do ɖe wo dome kpoyii , eye teƒe si wotsi tre ɖo la kle ̃ kple Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe . Nyateƒe wovɔ ̃ ŋutɔ ,

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: gake mawudɔla la de dzi ƒo na wo gblɔ be , “ Migavɔ ̃ o ! Dzidzɔnya ga ̃ tɔ kekeake si miese kpɔ o lae meva be magblɔ na mi kple ame bubuwo siaa !

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: E ̃ , le nyateƒe me la , wodzi Mesia , Aƒetɔ kple Đela la na mi ́ fie ̃ sia le Betlehem .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Ale si miawɔ akpɔe dze sii enye be , miakpɔ ɖevi aɖe si woxatsa abadzivɔ ɖe eŋu eye wotsɔe mlɔ la ̃ wo ƒe nuɖunu me . ”

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Kasia mawudɔla bubu geɖewo va kpe ɖe ɖeka ma ŋu eye wonɔ Mawu kafum le gbɔgblɔm be :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: “ Woakafu Mawu si le dziƒo ʋi ̃ i eye ŋutifafa ava anyigba dzi ; anɔ anyi kple ame siwo kata ̃ wɔa eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu . ”

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Esi mawudɔlawo ƒe aʋakɔ ga ̃ sia trɔ dzo yi dziƒo la , ale ̃ kplɔlawo gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Mina mi ́ ayi Betlehem aɖakpɔ nukunu ga ̃ si dzɔ , si Aƒetɔ la na mi ́ enya la ɖa . ”

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Ale ̃ kplɔlawo ɖe abla yi kɔƒea me eye woyi afi si Yosef kple Maria nɔ . Wokpɔ vidzi ̃ a ha ̃ , wotsɔe mlɔ la ̃ wo ƒe nuɖunu me vava ̃ .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Ale ̃ kplɔlawo gblɔ nu siwo kata ̃ dzɔ la kple nya siwo kata ̃ mawudɔla la gblɔ na wo le ɖevia ŋu la na ame sia ame .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Woƒe nya la wɔ nuku na ame siwo kata ̃ see la ŋutɔ .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Ke Maria ya ɣla nya siawo kata ̃ ɖe eƒe dzime eye wo ̀ bua wo ŋu zi geɖe .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Ale ale ̃ kplɔlawo gatrɔ yi woƒe ale ̃ wo gbɔ le gbea dzi , eye wokafu Mawu be mawudɔlawo va kpɔ yewo ɖa eye gawu la wokpɔ vidzi ̃ la , abe ale si wo ̀ gblɔ na wo la ene .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Esi vidzi ̃ a xɔ ŋkeke enyi la wowɔ aʋatsotsokɔnu alo ŋkeke enyi ƒe kɔnu nɛ eye wona ŋkɔe be Yesu . Esia nye ŋkɔ si mawudɔla la gblɔ da ɖi be woatsɔ nɛ hafi wofɔ eƒe fu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Le Mose ƒe seawo nu la , ele na Maria be wo ̀ ayi gbedoxɔ me le Yerusalem aɖana nu abe eɖokui ŋu kɔklɔ le vidzidzi vɔ megbe ƒe kɔnu ene . Esi ŋkeke sia ɖo edzi la , dzila eveawo kɔ vidzi ̃ la yi Yerusalem be woatsɔe ɖo Mawu ƒe ŋkume .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Elabena le Mose ƒe seawo nu la , Mawu gblɔ be , “ Nenye be ame aɖe ƒe vi gba ̃ tɔ nye ŋutsuvi la , ele be wo ̀ atsɔe ade asi na Aƒetɔ la . ”

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Yesu dzilawo na nunana si wo ̀ le be woana le ŋutiklɔɣi la . Sea gblɔ be ele be woana akpakpa eve alo ahɔnɛ sue eve eye esiae wona .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Yerusalem ŋutsu aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Simeon la ha ̃ nɔ gbedoxɔ la me gbe ma gbe . Ame sia nye ame ɖɔʋu aɖe si vɔ ̃ a Mawu ŋutɔ . Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ eme fu ̃ u eye wo ̀ nɔ mɔ kpɔm na Mesia la ƒe vava gbe sia gbe .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ɖee fiae be maku akpɔ o , va se ɖe esime wo ̀ kpɔ Mawu ƒe fia si wo ̀ si ami na la .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la zi edzi be wo ̀ ayi gbedoxɔ la me gbe ma gbe . Esi Maria kple Yosef wova be yewoatsɔ Yesu ɖevi la aɖo Mawu ŋkume la ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Simeon nɔ afi ma xoxo eye wo ̀ xɔ ɖevi la ɖe eƒe abɔwo me henɔ Mawu kafum gblɔ be :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Aƒetɔ , azɔ a ̃ te ŋu ado mɔ wo ̀ dɔla faa elabena mekpɔe abe ale si ne ̀ do ŋugbee nam la ene .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Elabena nye ŋkuwo kpɔ wo ̀ ɖeɖe

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: si ne ̀ dzra ɖo le dukɔwo kata ̃ ƒe ŋkume .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Eyae nye akaɖi si akle ̃ na dukɔwo eye wo ̀ anye ŋutikɔkɔe na Israel wo ̀ dukɔ ha ̃ ! ”

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Maria kple Yosef ƒe nu ku eye woƒe mo wɔ yaa le nu siwo kata ̃ gblɔm Simeon nɔ le Yesu ŋu ta .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
