text2: Simeon yra wo eye wo ̀ gblɔ be : “ Woɖo ɖevi sia anyi na ame geɖewo ƒe anyidzedze kple dodoɖedzi le Israel , eye abe dzesi si ŋu woagblɔ nya ɖo ,

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: ale be ame geɖewo aɖe woƒe susuwo ɖe go afia , ke wo ̀ la yi aƒo ɖe wo ̀ luʋɔ le eta . ”

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Nyɔnunyagblɔɖila aɖe si woyɔna be Ana ha ̃ nɔ gbedoxɔ la me gbe ma gbe . Enye Fanuel si tso Yuda ƒe ƒome si woyɔna be Aser me la ƒe vi . Srɔ ̃ a ku le egbɔ esi woɖe wo nɔewo le ƒe adre ko megbe

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: eye wo ̀ nɔ anyi abe ahosi ene ƒe blaenyi - vɔ - ene sɔŋ . Nyɔnu sia medzona le gbedoxɔ la me gbeɖe o . Enɔa afi sia za ̃ kple keli nɔa Mawu subɔm henɔa gbedodoɖa kple nutsitsidɔ dzi atraɖii . "

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Nyɔnu sia zɔ va do ɖe Maria kple Yosef gbɔ esime Simeon nɔ nu ƒom na wo eye wo ̀ de asi akpedada me na Mawu . Azɔ eyi ɖaɖe gbeƒa ̃ Mesia la na ame siwo kata ̃ nɔ mɔ kpɔm na Yerusalem ƒe ɖeɖe la .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Esi Yesu dzilawo wu nu siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ le be woawɔ le Yerusalem abe ale si sea bia tso wo si ene nu la , wotrɔ va aƒe le Nazaret si le Galilea .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Đevi la tsi le afi sia le nunya , ŋuse ̃ kple sidzedze me . Ame sia ame nya bena , eƒe nunya kɔ sa ̃ eye Mawu kɔ eƒe yayra ɖe edzi fu ̃ . "

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Yesu dzilawo yia Yerusalem ƒe sia ƒe hena Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la ɖuɖu .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Esi Yesu xɔ ƒe wuieve la , woyi ŋkekea ɖuƒe le kɔnyinyi la nu .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Esi aza ̃ la wu enu la , dzilawo dze mɔ trɔ yina Nazaret . Gake Yesu ya tsi Yerusalem . Edzilawo zɔ mɔ ŋkeke ɖeka gake womedii o ,

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: elabena wobu be eya kple woƒe ƒometɔwo kple xɔlɔ ̃ bubuwo do megbe . Ke esi fie ̃ ɖo eye womekpɔe o la , wode asi edidi me le woƒe ƒometɔwo kple ame nyanyɛwo dome .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Wodii ʋuu gake womekpɔe o , ale wotrɔ yi Yerusalem be yewoadii le afi ma .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Wodii le afi ma ŋkeke etɔ ̃ hafi va ke ɖe eŋu , wo ̀ nɔ gbedoxɔ la me le sefiala ga ̃ wo dome nɔ biabia goglowo me dzrom kplii wo .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Amewo kata ̃ ƒe nu ku le eƒe nunya kple nugɔmesese ta .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Edzilawo menya nu si woagblɔ esi wokpɔe la o . Mlɔeba la , dada gblɔ nɛ be , “ Vinye , nu ka ta ne ̀ wɔ nu sia ƒomevi ɖe mi ́ a ŋu ɖo ? Mi ́ kple fofowo ̀ mi ́ etsi dzodzodzoe nɔ diwo ̀ m le afi sia afi . ”

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Yesu ɖevi la ɖo eŋu be , “ Nu ka ta wo ̀ le be miadim ɖo ? Mienya bena ele be manɔ gbedoxɔ la me afi si nye Fofonye ƒeme oa ? ”

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Edzilawo mese nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la gɔme o .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Ale Yesu trɔ yi Nazaret kpli wo eye wo ̀ naa bubu edzilawo nyuie ŋutɔ . Ke dadaa tsɔ nya siawo kata ̃ ɣla ɖe eƒe dzime .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Yesu tsi ɖe edzi eye nunya ha ̃ nɔ tagbɔ nɛ . Eye Mawu kple amewo siaa lɔ ̃ e vevie .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Le Kaisaro Tibero ƒe fiaɖuɖu ƒe ƒe wuiatɔ ̃ lia me , esi Pontio Pilato nye gɔvina le Yudea eye Herodes nye dziɖula le Galilea , eye nɔvia Filipo ha ̃ nye dziɖula le Uturea kple Trakonitis , eye Lisania ha ̃ nɔ Abilene dzi ɖum

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: le esime Anas kple Kayafa wonye Osɔfoga ̃ wo la , Mawu ƒe nya va Yohanes , ame si nye Zakaria vi la gbɔ le gbedzi .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Yohanes nɔ tsatsam tso teƒe yi teƒe le Yɔdan tɔsisi la ƒe go eveawo dzi nɔ mawunya gblɔm be amewo nede tsi ta ; ne wo ̀ afia bena woɖe asi le nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ŋu eye woadze Mawu yome ale be woatsɔ woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake wo .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Le nyagblɔɖila Yesaya ƒe nya nu la Yohanes enye gbe si le ɣli dom tso gbedzi be : “ Miɖe mɔ na Aƒetɔ la be wo ̀ azɔ edzi ! Mikeke mɔ xaxɛwo ɖe edzi hafi wo ̀ ava !

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Migba ̃ towo woazu sɔsɔeƒewo ! Mixe ʋe siwo le baliwo me ! Miwɔ mɔ gɔglɔ ̃ wo woadzɔ ! Miwɔ mɔ tsakliwo zɔzrɔ ̃ e !

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Ekema ame sia ame akpɔ Đela si Mawu ɖo ɖa la . ”

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Yohanes gblɔ mawunya na ame siwo vaa egbɔ be wo ̀ ade mawutsi ta na yewo be , “ Ame kae xlɔ ̃ nu mi dawo ƒe dzidzimeviwo be miasi le Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoe si gbɔna la nu ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Gba ̃ la , miyi ne miaɖee fia be yewotrɔ dzime to agbe nyui nɔnɔ me . Migabu be nya vɔ ̃ aɖeke madzɔ ɖe mia dzi elabena mienye Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwo ta o . Esia ɖeɖe menye naneke o elabena Mawu ate ŋu ana viwo ado go tso kpe siwo le dzogbe le afi sia me woanye Abraham viwo .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Woɖo ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ ƒe fia la miaƒe kewo dzi eye wo ̀ le klalo be wo ̀ ala ̃ mi aƒu anyi . E ̃ , le nyateƒe me la , ati sia ati si metse ku nyui o la , woala ̃ e ƒu anyi eye woatsɔe ade dzo me . ”

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Ameha la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nu kae ne ̀ di tso mi ́ a si be mi ́ awɔ ? ”

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Yohanes ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nenye be awu eve le ame aɖe si la , netsɔ ɖeka na nɔvia ame dahe . Ame si si nuɖuɖu sɔ gbɔ ɖo la , netsɔ ɖe na ame siwo wum dɔ le la . ”

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Dugadzɔla siwo nye amebala vɔ ̃ ɖiwo la gɔ ̃ ha ̃ va do ɖe egbɔ be wo ̀ ade mawutsi ta ne yewo . Wobia be , “ Nufiala nu ka mi ́ awɔ ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Yohanes ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Mito nyateƒe le miaƒe dugadzɔdzɔ me . Mikpɔ nyuie be miagadzɔ ga le ame aɖeke si wu ale si Roma dziɖuɖua ɖo na mi la o . ”

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Asrafo aɖewo siwo le afi ma la biae be , “ Mi ́ awo ya ɖe alekee mi ́ awɔ ? ” Yohanes ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Migaxɔ ga le amewo si akpasese ̃ tɔe o . Ne mienya be ame aɖe mewɔ nane o la , migahe nya ɖe eŋu alakpatɔe o . Fetu si miexɔna la ha ̃ nedze mia ŋu ! ”

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Ame sia ame kloe nɔ mɔ kpɔm be Mesia la ava kpuie le ŋkeke mawo me ale be wotsi dzi vevie be yewoanya nenye be Yohanes enye amea loo alo menye eyae o ? Biabia sia koe nɔ nu na ame sia ame eye wonɔ nu ƒom le eŋu le afi sia afi .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Yohanes ɖo wo ƒe biabia la ŋu hegblɔ na wo be , “ Nye la tsi metsɔ le tsi dem ta na amewoe , gake ame aɖe gbɔna kpuie , ame si si ŋuse ̃ le wum boo , le nyateƒe me la , nyemedze ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be manye eƒe subɔvi o . Eya ade mawutsi ta na mi kple dzo kpakple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Ame sia ama atsa la ɖa tso blia gbɔ , atɔ dzo atsa la kple dzomavɔ la eye wo ̀ adzra blia ɖo ɖe eƒe avawo me . ” "

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Yohanes xlɔ ̃ nu amewo vevie kple nya siawo le esime wo ̀ nɔ nyanyui la gblɔm na wo .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Yohanes he nya ɖe Herodes si nye dziɖula nɔ Galilea ŋu le dutoƒo elabena exɔ nɔvia srɔ ̃ Heroɖia ɖe . Hekpe ɖe nu vɔ ̃ bubu geɖe siwo ha ̃ wo ̀ wɔ ŋu .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Gawu la Herodes le ́ Yohanes ha ̃ de gaxɔ me .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Yesu ŋutɔ ha ̃ va ge ɖe ame siwo Yohanes nɔ mawutsi dem ta na la dome . Yohanes de mawutsi ta nɛ , eye esi Yesu nɔ gbe dom ɖa la , dziƒowo nu ʋu ,

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: eye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ɖiɖi ɖe edzi le akpakpa ƒe nɔnɔme me eye gbe aɖe ɖi tso dziƒo bena , " “ Wo ̀ e nye vinye si melɔ ̃ na vevie ŋutɔ . E ̃ , wo ̀ e doa dzidzɔ nam . ”

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Yesu xɔ abe ƒe blaetɔ ̃ ene hafi dze mawunyagbɔgblɔ gɔme le dutoƒo . Amewo nya Yesu abe Yosef ƒe vi ene . Yosef fofoe nye Heli ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Heli fofoe nye Matat , Matat fofoe nye Levi , Levi fofoe nye Melki , Melki fofoe nye Yanai , Yanai fofoe nye Yosef ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: Yosef fofoe nye Matatias , Matatias fofoe nye Amos , Amos fofoe nye Nahum , Nahum fofoe nye Esli , Esli fofoe nye Nagai ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nagai fofoe nye Mat , Mat fofoe nye Matatias , Matatias fofoe nye Semein , Semein fofoe nye Yosek , Yosek fofoe nye Yoda , Yoda fofoe nye Yoana .

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Yoana fofoe nye Resa , Resa fofoe nye Zerubabel , Zerubabel fofoe nye Sealtiel , Sealtiel fofoe nye Neri .

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Neri fofoe nye Melki , Melki fofoe nye Adi , Adi fofoe nye Kosam , Kosam fofoe nye Elmadam ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Elmadam fofoe nye Er , Er fofoe nye Yosua , Yosua fofoe nye Elieza , Elieza fofoe nye Yorim , Yorim fofoe nye Matat , Matat fofoe nye Levi ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Levi fofoe nye Simeon , Simeon fofoe nye Yuda , Yuda fofoe nye Yosef , Yosef fofoe nye Yonam ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Yonam fofoe nye Eliakim , Eliakim fofoe nye Melea , Melea fofoe nye Mena , Mena fofoe nye Matata , Matata fofoe nye Natan , Natan fofoe nye David ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: David fofoe nye Yese , Yese fofoe nye Obed , Obed fofoe nye Boaz , Boaz fofoe nye Salmon ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Salmon fofoe nye Naxeson , Naxeson fofoe nye Aminadab , Aminadab fofoe nye Admin , Admin fofoe nye Arni , Arni fofoe nye Hezrɔn , Hezrɔn fofoe nye Perez . Perez fofoe nye Yuda ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Yuda fofoe nye Yakɔb , Yakɔb fofoe nye Isak , Isak fofoe nye Abraham , Abraham fofoe nye Tera , Tera fofoe nye Nahɔ ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Nahɔ fofoe nye Serug , Serug fofoe nye Reu , Reu fofoe nye Peleg , Peleg fofoe nye Eber , Eber fofoe nye Sela ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Sela fofoe nye Kainam , Kainan fofoe nye Arfaxad , Arfaxad fofoe nye Sem , Sem fofoe nye Noa , Noa fofoe nye Lamek ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Lamek fofoe nye Metusela , Metusela fofoe nye Enɔk , Enɔk fofoe nye Yared , Yared fofoe nye Mahalalil .

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Mahalalil fofoe nye Set , Set fofoe nye Adam , Adam fofoe nye MAWU .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Azɔ Yesu si me Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ fu ̃ u la dzo le Yɔdan tɔsisia to eye Gbɔgbɔ la kplɔe yi ɖe Yudea ƒe gbedadaƒo afi aɖe .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Enɔ afi ma ŋkeke blaene eye Satana va tee kpɔ le ŋkeke siawo kata ̃ me . Meɖu naneke le ŋkeke siawo kata ̃ me o , ale dɔ wui vevie .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Satana gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nenye be Mawu vie ne ̀ nye tututu la , ekema ɖe gbe na kpe siawo be woatrɔ zu abolo . ”

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Woŋlɔ ɖe Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔea me be , Menye nuɖuɖu ɖeɖe koe le vevie na amegbetɔ o . ”

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Satana kplɔe yi teƒe kɔkɔ aɖee eye wo ̀ ɖe xexeame fiaɖuƒe kata ̃ fiae le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko me

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: eye wo ̀ gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Dukɔ nyui siawo kata ̃ kple woƒe ŋutikɔkɔewo nye tɔnye eye mate ŋu atsɔe na ame sia ame si melɔ ̃ .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Eya ta ne e ̀ dze klo subɔm ko la , matsɔ wo na wo ̀ . ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Abe ale si woŋlɔ ɖe Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔea mee ene la , Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ ko wo ̀ le be mi ́ asubɔ . ”

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Azɔ Satana gakplɔe yi Yerusalem eye wo ̀ tsɔe ɖo gbedoxɔ la ƒe kɔkɔƒe kekeake . Egblɔ nɛ be , “ Nenye Mawu vie ne ̀ nye vava ̃ la , ti kpo tso afi sia .

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Elabena Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ bena , ‘ Ade se na eƒe dɔlawo le ŋutiwo ̀ be woakpɔ tawo ̀ nyuie

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: woatsɔwo ̀ ɖe woƒe asiwo me ale be matsɔ wo ̀ afɔ axla ̃ ɖe kpe aɖeke o . ’ ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ be , ‘ Megate Mawu wo ̀ Aƒetɔ la kpɔ tamemabutɔe o . ’ ” "

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Esi Satana wu tetekpɔwo kata ̃ nu la , egble ̃ Yesu ɖi dzo le egbɔ hena ɣeyiɣi bubu .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe ŋuse ̃ yɔ Yesu me fu ̃ u azɔ ale wo ̀ trɔ yi Galilea . Eteƒe medidi o la amewo nyae le nutome sia me kpe ɖo .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Le mawunya deto siwo wo ̀ gblɔna le woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo ta la , ame sia ame kafu nɛ ŋutɔ . "

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Eva Nazaret , afi si wo ̀ nɔ le eƒe ɖevime eye wo ̀ yi woƒe ƒuƒoƒe le Sabat ŋkekea dzi . Esi wo ̀ tso be yeaxle ̃ mawunya la ,

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: wotsɔ nyagblɔɖila Yesaya ƒe agbale ̃ nɛ be wo ̀ axle ̃ . Eʋu teƒe si woŋlɔ ɖo be ,

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: “ Aƒetɔ la ƒe Gbɔgbɔ le dzinye eya ta wosi ami nam ɖo , edɔm ɖa bena magblɔ nyanyui la na ame dahewo , edɔm ɖa bena maɖe gbeƒa ̃ be woaɖe ga aboyomenɔlawo eye ŋkunɔwo ƒe ŋkuwo aʋu . Ame siwo wote ɖe anyi la , ado le wo teɖanyilawo sime ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: eye maɖe gbeƒa ̃ Aƒetɔ la ƒe ƒe nyui la . ”

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ xle ̃ nya siawo vɔ la , etu agbale ̃ a tsɔe na ame si tsɔe nɛ la eye eya ŋutɔ yi ɖanɔ anyi . Ke ame siwo kata ̃ nɔ ƒuƒoƒea la fɔ ŋku ɖe edzi ga ̃ a .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ na ameawo be , “ Mawunya sia va eme le egbe ŋkeke sia dzi . ”

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ nɔ xɔa me la kafui eye woƒe mo wɔ yaa le mawunya deto siwo wo ̀ gblɔ la ta . Wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Nya kae nye sia ? Alo menye Yosef vie oa ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Đewohi ̃ miaɖo ŋku lododo sia dzi be , ‘ Gbedala , da gbe le wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ŋu ’ esi gɔmee nye be , ‘ Nu ka ta me ̀ wɔ nukunuwo le wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ dedu me abe ale si ne ̀ wɔe le Kapernaum ene o ? ’

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Magblɔ na mi kple kakaɖedzi blibo be , bubu menɔa nyagblɔɖila aɖeke ŋu le eya ŋutɔ ƒe dedu me o .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , ahosi geɖewo nɔ Israel le Eliya ŋɔli , esi wotu dziƒo nu ƒe etɔ ̃ kple afa ̃ eye dɔwuame sese ̃ aɖe va anyigba blibo la dzi .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Gake womeɖo Eliya ɖe wo dometɔ aɖeke gbɔ o , ke boŋ woɖoe ɖe ahosi aɖe si tso Zarefat le Sidon nutome la gbɔ .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Mibu nyagblɔɖila Elisa ame si da gbe le Naaman si nye Siriatɔ la ŋu kpɔ . Togbɔ be kpodɔle ́ la geɖewo ha ̃ nɔ Israel siwo hia ̃ gbedada vevie ha ̃ , Elisa meda gbe le woawo ŋu o , negbe Naaman Siriatɔ la ko . ”

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Yesu ƒe nya siawo ve dɔme na ameawo ŋutɔ .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Woƒe dziwo ho ɖe eŋu ale wotso hetutu asi ʋume nɛ do goe le xɔa me . Wokplɔe yi togbɛ si dzi wotu dua ɖo la ƒe kɔkɔeƒe be yewoatutui tso teƒe sia wo ̀ ayi aɖadze aga me .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Gake ezɔ to amehawo dome kɔ ̃ ɔ hedzo le wo gbɔ .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Yesu trɔ yi Kapernaum si nye du aɖe si le Galilea nutome la me eye le afi sia egblɔ mawunya na amewo le Sabat ŋkeke ɖe sia ɖe dzi le wo ƒe ƒuƒoƒewo .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Eƒe nyagbɔgblɔwo wɔ nuku na ameawo kata ̃ le afi sia ha ̃ , elabena eƒo nu abe ame si nya nyateƒe la ene , eye megblɔa ame bubuwo ƒe susu o .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu nɔ mawunya gblɔm le ƒuƒoƒea la , ŋutsu aɖe si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ aɖe le la de asi ɣlidodo me ɖe eta be ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: “ Ago gbɔ ! Wo ̀ Yesu Nazaretitɔ , nya aɖeke mele mi ́ kpli wo ̀ dome o . Đe ne ̀ va be yeatsrɔ ̃ mi ́ . Menya ame si ne ̀ nye , Mawu ƒe Vi Kɔkɔe lae ne ̀ nye . ”

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Yesu tso nya la le enu be , “ Zi ɖoɖoe ! ” Azɔ egblɔ na gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la be , “ Do go le ame sia me ! ” Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la tsɔ ŋutsua xla ̃ ɖe anyi ŋɔdzitɔe , ameha la ƒo zi ɖe eŋu henɔ ekpɔm . Ke gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la do go le amea me eye megawɔ nuvevi aɖekee o .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Esia wɔ nuku na ameawo ŋutɔ ale wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Ŋuse ̃ ka ƒomevie le ame sia ƒe nyawo ŋu ale be gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ ŋutɔwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ɖoa toe ? ” "

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Nukunu si Yesu wɔ la kaka ɖe nutomea kata ̃ me le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko me .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Esi Yesu do go le ƒuƒoƒea gbe ma gbe la , eyi Simɔn ƒeme , eye wo ̀ ke ɖe Simɔn lɔ ̃ xo ŋu wo ̀ nɔ ŋudza sese ̃ aɖe le ́ m . Ame sia ame kloe va ɖe kuku na Yesu gblɔ be , " “ Mi ́ eɖe kuku na wo ̀ , da gbe le eŋu . ”

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Yesu yi ɖatsi tre ɖe dɔnɔa ƒe aba gbɔ eye wo ̀ ɖe gbe na dɔle ́ lea be wo ̀ aɖe asi le eŋu . Dzoxɔxɔ sese ̃ si nɔ nyɔnua ƒe la ̃ me la nu bɔbɔ enumake eye eƒe la ̃ me se ̃ . Ale wo ̀ tsi tre heyi ɖaɖa nu na wo .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Le ɣetrɔ miaa la , kɔƒea me tɔwo kata ̃ kplɔ ame siwo kata ̃ nɔ dɔ vovovowo le ́ m le woƒe aƒewo me la vɛ na Yesu eye wo ̀ da asi ɖe wo kata ̃ dzi heyɔ dɔ wo .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ tɔ aɖewo ha ̃ nɔ ameawo dome , ke Yesu ɖe gbe na gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ siawo be woado go le ameawo me eye wodo go le eƒe nya nu henɔ ɣli dom be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Mawu Vi la . ” Esi Yesu kpɔ be gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nya be yee nye Kristo la , eɖe gbe na wo be woazi ɖoɖoe .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Le ŋkeke evea gbe ƒe ŋdi kanyaa la , efɔ yi ɖe gbe dzi . Ameha la dii vevie le teƒe geɖewo eye esi wova ke ɖe eŋu mlɔeba la , woɖe kuku nɛ be megadzo o , ke boŋ wo ̀ anɔ yewo gbɔ le Kapernaum .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Ke Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ele be magblɔ mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe nyanyui la na ame bubuwo ha ̃ elabena esia tae wodɔm ɖa . ”

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Ale wo ̀ dzo henɔ tsatsam le Yudea nutomewo kata ̃ me kpe ɖo , nɔ mawunya gblɔm na amewo le woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu nɔ nu fiam le Genesaret ta to la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe va ƒo zi ɖe eŋu be yewoase Mawu ƒe nya la .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Yesu kpɔ ʋu eve siwo me ame aɖeke menɔ o la le ta la to . Đɔkplɔlawo nɔ woƒe ɖɔwo kpalam le tsia me .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Yesu yi ɖage ɖe ʋua ɖeka me eye wo ̀ gblɔ na Simɔn , ame si tɔ nye ʋua , be woakui ayi tsia dzi vie bena yeanɔ eme afia nu ameha la tso afi ma .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Esi wo ̀ wu nuƒoa nu la , egblɔ na Simɔn be , “ Azɔ miyi tsia ƒe gogloa ƒe ke ne miada ɖɔ ɖe afi ma ekema mia ɖe la ̃ fu ̃ u . ”

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Simɔn ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Amega ̃ , egbe za ̃ bliboa kata ̃ mi ́ eda ɖɔ ʋuu gake mi ́ eɖe naneke o gake esi ne ̀ gblɔe ko la , mi ́ agatee akpɔ . ”

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Wogada ɖɔ la ake , ke azɔ la , woɖe la ̃ ale gbegbe be woƒe ɖɔwo koe de asi vuvu me !

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Ale Simɔn kple nɔvia wodo ɣli yɔ wo nɔvi siwo nɔ ʋu bubu me le tsia dzi la be wo ̀ ava kpe ɖe yewo ŋu . Woɖe la ̃ fu ̃ u wo ̀ yɔ ʋu eveawo ale gbegbe be ʋuawo di be yewoanyrɔ ̃ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Simɔn Petro kpɔ nu si va dzɔ la , eya ta wo ̀ dze klo ɖe Yesu kɔme hegblɔ be , “ O , Aƒetɔ , meɖe kuku dzo le mi ́ a gbɔ elabena nye nu vɔ ̃ wo sɔ gbɔ ŋutɔ eye nyemedze be mate ɖe ŋuwo ̀ o . ”

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Elabena la ̃ geɖe si woɖe la wɔ nuku na Petro kple eƒe dɔwɔhatiwo .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Nenema kee nye Yakobo kple Yohanes ame siwo nye Zebedeo viwo eye woganye Simɔn ƒe dɔwɔhatiwo ha ̃ . Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Migavɔ ̃ o . Tso azɔ dzi heyina la , miazu amewo ƒe luʋɔwo ɖelawo ! ” "

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Esi wova ɖi go teti ko la , wogble ̀ woƒe nuwo kata ̃ ɖe afi ma hedze Yesu yome .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la Yesu kpɔ kpotɔ aɖe le kɔƒe aɖe si me wo ̀ ɖi tsa de la . Esi kpotɔ sia kpɔ Yesu ko la , edze klo tsyɔ mo anyi heɖe kuku nɛ vevie be wo ̀ ada gbe le ye ŋu . Egblɔ be , " “ Aƒetɔ , ne e ̀ lɔ ̃ la , na be ŋutinye nakɔ . ”

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Yesu tɔ asi ŋutsua hegblɔ be , “ E ̃ , melɔ ̃ . Eya ta ŋuwo ̀ nekɔ fifi laa . ” Ŋutsua ŋuti kɔ enumake eye dɔ la vɔ le eŋu .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Azɔ Yesu de se nɛ be megagblɔe na ame aɖeke o , ke boŋ neyi Yudatɔwo ƒe osɔfo gbɔ . Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Yi na ̃ na vɔsanu si ame siwo haya tso kpodɔle ́ le me la nana le Mose ƒe sea nu . Esia afia ame sia ame be e ̀ kpɔ dɔyɔyɔ vava ̃ . ” "

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Nya sia kaka ɖe teƒe geɖewo xoxo eye ame geɖewo ŋutɔ ƒo zi ɖe eŋu be yewoase eƒe mawunya eye wo ̀ ada gbe ha ̃ le yewo ŋu .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Gake zi geɖe la , edia ɣeyiɣi aɖe dona le wo dome dzaa yia gbedzi afi aɖe ɖadoa gbe ɖa .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu nɔ nu fiam la , Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo va teƒea va nɔ to ɖomii . Ame siawo tso du siwo kata ̃ le Galilea , Yudea kple Yerusalem me . Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔyɔŋuse ̃ va edzi be wo ̀ ada gbe le wo ŋu . "

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Kasia , ame aɖewoe nye si kɔ la ̃ metututɔ aɖe ɖe aba dzi va doe . Wodze agbagba ɖe sia ɖe be yewoato ameha la dome akɔe yi Yesu gbɔe ,

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: gake womete ŋui o , le ameha la ta . Le esia ta wolia xɔa eye woɖe do ɖe etame , heɖiɖi la ̃ metututɔ la ɖe Yesu kɔme tututu .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Esi Yesu kpɔ woƒe xɔse la , egblɔ na dɔnɔa be , “ Ŋutsu , wotsɔ wo ̀ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo ̀ . ”

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fiala siwo nɔ ameawo dome la bia wo nɔewo be , “ Ame ka ƒomevi tututu ame sia buna be yenye ? Egblɔ busunya ! Elabena ame kae ate ŋu atsɔ nu vɔ ̃ ake tsɔ wu Mawu ? ”

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Yesu nya nu si ŋu bum wonɔ eya ta eɖo ŋu na wo be , “ Nu kae nye busunya ? Đe nu vɔ ̃ tsɔtsɔke se ̃ wu gbedada le ame ŋua ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: Nye si nye Mesia la ŋuse ̃ le asinye le anyigba sia dzi be matsɔ nu vɔ ̃ wo ake eya ta maɖe ŋuse ̃ sia

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: afia mi kɔtɛe to gbedada le ŋutsu sia ŋu me . ” Ale wo ̀ gblɔ na la ̃ metututɔ la be , “ Tsi tre na ̃ ŋlɔ wo ̀ aba na ̃ yi aƒe me . ”

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Ame sia ame ke ŋku ɖi be yeakpɔ nu , kasia ŋutsua tsi tre ɖe eƒe afɔ eveawo dzi , ŋlɔ eƒe aba eye wo ̀ ɖo ta aƒe me henɔ Mawu kafum bobobo .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ nɔ afi ma la ƒe mo wɔ yaa eye vɔvɔ ̃ ɖo wo , wokafu Mawu nɔ gbɔgblɔm be , “ Mi ́ ekpɔ nu madzɔkpɔ aɖe egbe . ”

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Esi Yesu dzo le du sia me yina la , ekpɔ nudzɔla aɖe si ame sia ame nya nyuie le eƒe amebaba ta . Nudzɔla sia ŋkɔe nye Levi eye wo ̀ nɔ anyi ɖe agbadɔ aɖe te nɔ nu dzɔm . Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Va dze yonyeme ne na ̃ zu nye nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka . ”

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Ale Levi gble ̀ nu sia nu ɖi eye wo ̀ tso enumake hedze eyome .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Eteƒe medidi o , Levi ɖo kplɔ ̃ na Yesu eye wo ̀ kpe etɔ nudzɔla bubuwo ha ̃ ɖe kplɔ ̃ sia ŋu .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo kpɔ kpɔtsɔtsɔ le Yesu ƒe nuwɔna sia ŋu eye wohe nya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo vevie be Yesu ɖu nu kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Dɔnɔwoe hi ̃ a na gbedada menye lãmesese ̃ tɔwo o .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Đe meva be maɖe nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo tso woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔwo me , ke menye be magble ̃ ɣeyiɣi ɖe ame siwo be yewonye ame dzɔdzɔewo la ŋu o . ”

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Ameawo gayi edzi bia Yesu be , “ nu ka tae eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo metsia nu dɔna hedoa gbe ɖa abe ale si Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo kple Faristɔwo wɔnɛ ene , o ke boŋ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ya la nuɖuɖu kple nunono dzi ko wonɔna gbe sia gbe ha ̃ ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Ke Yesu bia wo be , “ Ne ame aɖe le dzidzɔ kpɔm ɖe , agbe nuɖuɖua ? Ne wokpe amewo be woava do dzidzɔ ɖe srɔ ̃ ɖelawo ŋu ɖe , ɖe amekpekpe siawo agbe nuɖuɖu le esime srɔ ̃ tɔ la ŋutɔ le nuɖukplɔ ̃ a ŋu kpli wo ha ̃ ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Gake ɣeyiɣi li gbɔna esi woava kplɔ srɔ ̃ tɔ la adzoe le ameawo gbɔ eye ne edzɔ alea la , nuɖuɖu magadzro wo o . ”

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Azɔ Yesu do lo sia na wo be , “ Ame aɖeke metsɔa avɔnuɖeɖi yeye kaa avɔ xoxo si vuvu lae o . Ne wotsɔ avɔnuɖeɖi yeye ka avɔ xoxo si vuvu la , menyakpɔna o ; gawu la enana be avɔa ƒe teƒe si woka la gavuvuna ɖe edzi wu tsa ̃ .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Nenema ke , womekɔa aha yeye ɖe la ̃ gbale ̃ golo xoxo me o ; ne wowɔ esia la , aha yeye la ƒe ŋuse ̃ ana be la ̃ gbale ̃ golo xoxo la awo eye aha la kata ̃ akɔ ɖe anyigba .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Ke boŋ la ̃ gbale ̃ golo yeye mee wo ̀ dze be woakɔ aha yeye ɖo .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Nenema kee , ame aɖeke menoa aha tsitsi vɔ teti ko ganoa yeyetɔ tɔtɔnɛ o , elabena wogblɔna godoo be , ‘ Mɔ xoxotɔwo nyo wu . ’ ”

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Gbe ɖeka le Sabat ŋkekea dzi esi Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo zɔ to bligble aɖewo ̀ me va yina la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋe bli aɖewo kle ̃ tsro le wo ŋu henɔ ɖuɖum .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Farisitɔ aɖewo nɔ afi ma kpɔ wo eye wogblɔ na Yesu be , “ Nu si wɔm wo ̀ nusarɔ ̃ lawo le , le bli ŋem le Sabat dzi la tsi tre ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe se ŋu . ”

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Miexle ̃ a mawunya oa ? Alo miexle ̃ nu tso nu si Fia David wɔ esi dɔ wu eya kple eŋutimewo ŋu oa ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Eyi ɖe gbedoxɔ la me eye wo ̀ tsɔ abolo tɔxɛ si wotsɔ ɖo Mawu ŋkume la eye eya kple etɔwo mae heɖu , togbɔ be ame aɖeke mekpɔ mɔ aɖu abolo sia o , negbe Osɔfowo ko . ”

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Yesu gblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Nye Mesia la , mekpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe Sabat ŋkekea dzi . ”

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Le Sabat bubu gbe esi wo ̀ nɔ nu fiam le ƒuƒoƒe la , ekpɔ ame aɖe si titi le ́ asi na la le afi ma .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye Sabat ŋkeke dzie ta la , agbale ̃ fialawo kple Farisitɔwo li ̃ ŋku ɖe edzi ga ̃ a henɔ ekpɔm be ada gbe le amea ŋu le ŋkekea dzi ha ̃ . Wonɔ ŋku le ́ m ɖe eŋu elabena wodi be wo ̀ awɔ vodada aɖe be yewoatsɔ nya ɖe eŋu .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Yesu nya nu si bum ame siawo nɔ xoxoxo , gake egblɔ na ŋutsua be , “ Va nɔ afii bena ame sia ame nakpɔ wo ̀ . ” Ŋutsua wɔ abe ale si wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ ene .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Azɔ Yesu trɔ ɖe Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo gbɔ eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Biabia aɖe le asinye na mi . Enyo be woawɔ nyui le Sabat ŋkekea dzi loo alo woawɔ vɔ ̃ a ? Enyo be woaxɔ ame ɖe agbe loo alo woawuia ? ”

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Etsa ŋku le wo kata ̃ dzi ɖeka , ɖeka eye wo ̀ gblɔ na ŋutsua be , “ Azɔ dzɔ wo ̀ asi . ” Edzɔ asia , kasia eƒe asi gaɖɔ ɖo .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Nuwɔna sia do dziku na Yesu ƒe futɔwo ŋutɔ . Wode asi ɖoɖowɔwɔ me le ale si woawɔ awui la ŋuti

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Le nu siawo megbe la , Yesu yi to aɖe dzi gbe ɖeka be yeado gbe ɖa . Edo gbe ɖa za ̃ blibo kata ̃ .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Esi ŋu ke la , eyɔ eyomenɔlawo kata ̃ ƒo ƒui eye wo ̀ tia ame wuieve le wo dome bena woanye yeƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo . Ame siawoe woyɔ be Apostolowo .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Ameawo ƒe ŋkɔwoe nye , Simɔn , ame si wo ̀ na ŋkɔe be Petro , Andrea Simɔn nɔviŋutsu , Yakobo , Yohanes , Filipo , Bartolomeo ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Mateo , Toma , Yakobo Alfeo vi , Simɔn , ame si nye Zelote dunyaheha sese ̃ aɖe me nɔla ;

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Yuda , Yakobo vi kple Yuda Iskariɔt , ame si de Yesu asi emegbe .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Esi woɖì tso toa dzi la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo kple eyomenɔlawo va ƒo ƒu ɖe Yesu ŋuti le gbadzaƒe aɖe . Ameha ga ̃ aɖe ha ̃ va ɖe to ɖe wo , amewo tso Yudea nutomewo me kata ̃ kple Yerusalem . Đewo tso keke Sidɔn kple Tiro ƒutaduwo me ke

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: va be yewoaɖo toe alo be wo ̀ ada gbe le yewo ŋu . Gbe ma gbe la enya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ geɖewo le amewo me .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Ame geɖewo ŋutɔ nɔ didim be yewoaka asi eŋu , elabena ne dɔnɔ aɖe wɔ esia ko la , ehayana enumake .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Azɔ etrɔ ɖe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ hegblɔ na wo be , “ Dzidzɔ ga ̃ ŋutɔ le mi , ame siwo nye ame dahewo la lalam elabena miawo tɔe nye mawufiaɖuƒe la .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Dzidzɔ ga ̃ ŋutɔ le mi , ame siwo wum dɔ le la lalam elabena miawoe aɖi ƒo . Dzidzɔ ga ̃ ŋutɔ le mi , ame siwo le avi fam fifia la lalam elabena ɣeyiɣi gbɔna esi miava ko nu .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: Dzidzɔ ga ̃ ŋutɔ le mia lalam , ne amewo le ́ fu mi , ɖe mi le woƒe hame , eye wodzu mi , heƒo ɖi miaƒe ŋkɔ ɖe tanye !

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi , eye mitso aseye , elabena fetu nyui le mia lalam le dziƒo . Alea tututue wo fofowo wɔ ɖe nyagblɔɖila siwo do ŋgɔ na mi la ha ̃ ŋuti . ”

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: ” Ao , babaa na kesinɔtɔwo , elabena wokpɔ dzidzɔ le anyigba sia dzi xoxo .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: Wokpɔ la ̃ me eye nu le wo si ŋutɔ fifia gake dɔwuame sese ̃ aɖe le ŋgɔ na wo gbɔna .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: Woƒe nukoko ɖe yame fifia ava zu konyifafa na wo . Babaa na ame siwo ŋu amewo aƒo nu nyui le , elabena nenema kee wo fofowo wɔ na aʋatsonyagblɔɖilawo .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: Azɔ mi kata ̃ misee . Milɔ ̃ miaƒe futɔwo eye miawɔ nyui na ame siwo le ́ fu mi la .

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Mido gbe ɖa ɖe ame siwo ƒo fi de mi la ta be woakpɔ dzidzɔ , eye midi Mawu ƒe yayra na ame siwo wɔa fu mi .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: ” Nenye be ame aɖe ƒo wo ̀ to ɖeka me la , trɔ evelia ha ̃ nɛ wo ̀ aƒo ! Nenye be ame aɖe bia be na ̃ tsɔ wo ̀ dziwui na ye la , tsɔ wo ̀ awutewui ha ̃ nɛ .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Ne nu le asiwo ̀ eye ame aɖe bia wo ̀ la , nae eye me ̀ gabia be netrɔe vɛ na ye o .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Ale si tututu ne ̀ dina be amewo newɔ na ye la , wo ̀ ha ̃ wɔ na wo nenema .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: ” Ne mielɔ ̃ miaƒe lɔ ̃ lawo ɖeɖe ko ɖe , miebui be miewɔ nanea ? Ame siwo mevɔ ̃ a Mawu o la ha ̃ lɔ ̃ a wo xɔlɔ ̃ wo .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Ne miewɔa dɔmenyo na ame siwo wɔa dɔmenyo na mi ko ɖe , akpedada kae li na mi ? Nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ wɔna nenema !

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Ne miedoa ga na ame siwo ko ate ŋu akpɔe axe na mi emegbe ɖe , nu nyui kae wo ̀ nye miewɔ ? Nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔla akuakuawo ha ̃ doa nu na wo tɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔlawo bena yewoaxɔ nenema ke emegbe . ”

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: ” Milɔ ̃ miaƒe ketɔwo , eye miwɔ dɔmenyo na wo . Mido nu na wo , eye migakpɔ mɔ alo atsi dzi ɖe exɔxɔ ŋu o . Ne miewɔ esia la , ekema miaƒe fetu asɔ gbɔ le dziƒo , eye mianye Mawu viwo , elabena Eya ŋutɔ nyoa dɔme na akpemadalawo kple tagbɔ sese ̃ tɔwo .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: ” Midze agbagba vevie be miakpɔ nublanui na amewo abe ale si mia Fofo wɔnɛ ene .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: Migadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu alo aɖe ɖeklemi ame aɖeke o , ne menye nenema o la , anɔ na miawo ha ̃ nenema . Mitsɔ ke amewo eye woatsɔ ake miawo ha ̃ .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Mina nu eye woana nu miawo ha ̃ . Nu siwo kata ̃ miena la , woatrɔe vɛ na mi woasɔ gbɔ agba ̃ go sa ̃ a wu esi sinu miena eye woatsɔe aɖo akɔ na mi . Dzidzenu si mietsɔ dzidze nui na amewo la , eya kee woatsɔ dzidze nui na miawo ha ̃ . ”

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Yesu yi edzi do lo sia na wo be , “ Đe ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ ate ŋu akplɔ ŋkuagba ̃ tɔa ? Đe wo kple eve la mage adze do me oa ?

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ vi mewua eƒe nufiala o . Ke ame sia ame si xɔ hehe nyuitɔ la anɔ ko abe eƒe nufiala ene .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: “ Aleke wɔ ne ̀ wɔa alakpanu dina be yeaɖe ati fefee si le nɔviwo ̀ ƒe ŋku dzi la ɖa , evɔ atikpo ga ̃ aɖe le wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ ŋku dzi ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ale ke wɔ na ̃ gblɔ na nɔviwo ̀ be , ‘ Nɔvi , na maɖe ati fefee si le wo ̀ ŋku dzi la ɖa na wo ̀ , esi mate ŋu akpɔ ga ̃ si le wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ ŋkuwo dzi aɖe o ? Alakpanuwɔla ! Đe atikpo si le wo ̀ ŋku dzi la ɖa gba ̃ , ekema ɖewohi ̃ a ̃ te ŋu akpɔ nu nyuie ale be na ̃ te ŋu aɖe nɔviwo ̀ ƒe ati fefee la ɖa nɛ .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: “ Ati nyui aɖeke mate ŋu atse ku manyomanyo o , eye ati manyomanyo mate ŋu atse ku nyui o .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Ku si ati aɖe tsena lae wotsɔna dzea si ati si ƒomevi wo ̀ nye lae .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Ame ɖɔʋu la , nu nyui wɔwɔ doa go tso eƒe dzi dzadzɛ me eye ame maɖɔʋu la , nu vɔ ̃ koe doa go tso eƒe dzi vɔ ̃ ɖi la me . Elabena , nu si le ame aɖe ƒe dzi me lae doa go tsoa eƒe nu me .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: “ Nu ka tae mieyɔam be Aƒetɔ esi miewɔa nye gbe dzi o ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Mafia nu si ame sia ame si vaa gbɔnye , sea nye nya eye wo ̀ wɔa edzi la ɖi la mi .

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Eɖi ame aɖe si tu xɔ , eɖe do goglo eye wo ̀ ɖo gɔmeɖokpe nyuie ɖe kpe gbadza dzi , ke esi tɔ ɖɔ eye tsi ɖe xɔa la , mete ŋu mui o , elabena wotui nyuie .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: “ Ke ame siwo sea nye nya eye womewɔna ɖe edzi o la , le abe ame aɖe si tu eƒe xɔ ɖe anyigba eye meɖo gɔmeɖokpe nɛ o la ene . Esi tsi dza ɖɔ ɖe eŋu la , xɔ sia mu gbloo , hegba ̃ gudugudu . ”

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Esi Yesu wu eƒe mawunyagbɔgblɔ la nu la , etrɔ yi Kapernaum dua me .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Romatɔwo ƒe aʋafia ga ̃ si nɔ du ma me la ƒe dɔla si gbɔ melɔ ̃ a nu lena o la dze dɔ vevie , eye wo ̀ ɖo kudo nu .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Aʋafia la se Yesu ŋkɔ eya ta edɔ Yudatɔ ame ŋkuta aɖewo ɖe egbɔ be woaɖe kuku nɛ be wo ̀ ava da gbe le dɔla sia ŋu na ye .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Ameawo yi Yesu gbɔ heɖe kuku nɛ vevie be wo ̀ ava kpe ɖe aʋafia la ŋu . Wona wo ̀ nya be aʋafia sia nye ame nyui aɖe ŋutɔ .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Wogblɔ na Yesu be , “ Nenye be wo ̀ hi ̃ a be na ̃ kpe ɖe ame aɖe ŋu la , ŋutsu sia ŋue wo ̀ le be na ̃ kpe ɖo , elabena elɔ ̃ a mi Yudatɔwo ale gbegbe be eya ŋutɔ tsɔ eƒe ga tsɔ tu ƒuƒoƒe na mi ́ . ”

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Yesu tso kpla kplɔ wo ɖo . Gake hafi wo ̀ aɖo aƒea me la , aʋafia la dɔ exɔlɔ ̃ aɖewo ɖa be woagblɔ na Yesu be , “ Aƒetɔ , me ̀ gaɖe fu na ɖokuiwo ̀ be na ̃ va nye aƒe me o , elabena nye medze na bubu sia tɔgbi o .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Eye nye medze be mava kpe wo ̀ ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . Gblɔ nya si wo ̀ le be na ̃ gblɔ la ɖo ɖa tso afi si ne ̀ le ekema nye dɔla ƒe la ̃ me ase ̃ .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Elabena nye ŋutɔ ha ̃ ame aɖe tee mele eye amewo ha ̃ le tenye , meɖea gbe na tenyeviwo be , ‘ miyi afii ’ eye woyina , ‘ miva afii ’ eye wovana , megblɔna na nye dɔla be ‘ wɔ esi kple ekemɛ ’ , eye wo ̀ wɔnɛ . ”

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Nya siawo wɔ nuku na Yesu ŋutɔ . Etrɔ ɖe ameha la ŋu gblɔ be , “ Nyateƒe , le Israel kata ̃ la , nyemekpɔ ame aɖeke si si xɔse le abe ame sia tɔ ene kpɔ o . ” "

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Esi aʋafia la xɔlɔ ̃ wo yi aƒe me la , wokpɔ dɔla si nɔ dɔ le ́ m la wo ̀ haya eye eƒe la ̃ me se ̃ abe tsa ̃ ene .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo yi du aɖe si woyɔna be Nain la me , eye abe ale si wo ̀ nɔna ɖaa ene la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe gakplɔe ɖo henɔ eŋu kplikplikpli .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Esi wo ̀ susɔ vie woaɖo dua ƒe agbo nu la , wokpɔ ame aɖewo woyina ameɖiƒe . Đekakpui si ku woyina ɖiɖi ge la nye vi ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ si nɔ dadaa si nye ahosi la si . Esia wɔe be ame geɖewo ŋutɔ kplɔ ahosia ɖo henɔ konyi fam kplii .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Esi Aƒetɔ la kpɔ ahosia la , eƒe nu wɔ nublanui nɛ ŋutɔ eya ta egblɔ nɛ be , " “ Me ̀ gafa avi o ! ”

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Yesu te ɖe amekukuɖaka la ŋu eye wo ̀ tɔ asii , enumake ame siwo tsɔ aɖaka la tɔ ɖe tsitre . Azɔ egblɔ na ame kukua be , “ Đekakpui , Tsi tre . ”

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Enumake ɖekakpui la fɔ henɔ alinu eye wo ̀ de asi nuƒoƒo me na ame siwo nɔ egbɔ la ; ale Yesu kplɔe de asi na dadaa .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Vɔvɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe ɖo ameawo eye wodo ɣli kafu Mawu gblɔ be , “ Nyagblɔɖila ga ̃ aɖe le mi ́ a dome vava ̃ . Mi ́ ekpɔ Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe asi wo ̀ wɔ dɔ le egbe ŋkeke sia dzi . ” "

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Nukunu si Yesu wɔ gbe ma gbe la kaka ɖe Yudea bliboa kata ̃ kple nutome siwo ƒo xla ̃ Yudea la me .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo se nu siwo kata ̃ wɔm Yesu nɔ eye woyi ɖagblɔe na Yohanes .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Ale Yohanes dɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la eve ɖo ɖe Yesu gbɔ be woabiae be , " “ Wo ̀ e nye Mesia la vava ̃ loo alo mi ́ ganɔ mɔ kpɔm na ame bubua ? ”

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Esi nusrɔ ̃ la eveawo va egbɔ la , wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Yohanes , Mawutsidetanamelae dɔ mi ́ ɖo ɖe gbɔwo ̀ be miabia wo ̀ be , ‘ Wo ̀ e nye ame si gbɔna loo , alo ɖe mi ́ akpɔ mɔ na ame bubu aɖea ? ’ ”

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Le gaƒoƒo ma tututu dzi la , eda gbe le dɔle ́ la geɖewo kple fukpelawo kpakple ame siwo me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le la ŋu , eye wo ̀ ʋu ŋku na ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ geɖewo .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Eya ta eɖo ŋu na amedɔdɔawo be , “ Miheyi ɖagblɔ nu si miekpɔ kple nu si miese la fia Yohanes bena , Ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo le nu kpɔm , tekunɔwo le azɔli zɔm , eye anyidzelawo ŋuti le kɔkɔm , tokunɔwo le nu sem , ame kukuwo le tsitre tsim , eye wole nyanyui la gblɔm na ame dahewo .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Migblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Ame siwo xɔ dzinye se la , woayra wo . ’ ”

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Le amedɔdɔwo ƒe dzodzo vɔ megbe la , Yesu ƒo nu na ameha la le Yohanes ŋuti . Ebia wo be , “ Ame kae nye ame si mieyi ɖakpɔ le Yuda gbegbea ? Đe miekpɔe abe ame aɖe si yaƒoƒo vitɔ kekeake ha ̃ ʋuʋuna sesi ̃ ea .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Ne menye nenema o la , ekema nu kae mieyi ɖakpɔ ? Ame si do awu nyuiwoea ? Ao , ame siwo doa awu xɔasiwo eye wonɔa agbe kɔkɔ la , fiasa ̃ wo mee wokpɔa wo lena .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Ekema ame ka ƒomevi tututue mieyi be yewoakpɔ ? Nyagblɔɖilaa ? Vava ̃ miekpɔe ! Le nyateƒe me la , ame si miekpɔ la wu nyagblɔɖila gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Eyae nye ame si ŋu woƒo nu tsoe le mawunya me be , ‘ Mikpɔ ɖa ! Mele nye dɔla dɔ ge ɖa wo ̀ ava do ŋgɔ na wo ̀ , ata mɔ le ŋgɔwo ̀ . ’

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Ame aɖeke mede ŋgɔ wu Yohanes le amegbetɔwo dome o , gake ame si nye suetɔ wu le mawufiaɖuƒea me la de ŋgɔ wui . ”

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ se Yohanes ƒe mawunyagbɔgblɔ kpɔ dometɔ aɖewo siwo nye ame baɖawo kekeake la kpɔ ŋudzedze le Mawu ƒe ɖoɖowo ŋu eye wona Yohanes de mawutsi ta na wo .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo koe gbe be yewomaxɔ ɖoɖo si Mawu wɔ na yewo la o . Ale wogbe be Yohanes made mawutsi ta na yewo o .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Azɔ Yesu bia wo be , “ Aleke magblɔ tso dzidzime sia tɔgbi ŋu ? Nu ka ŋu matsɔ wo asɔ ɖo ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Wole abe ɖevi siwo ƒo ƒu ɖe asime nɔ fefem la ene . Ame siwo gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , ‘ Mi ́ eku dzidzɔha na mi , ke mieɖu ɣe o eye mi ́ edzi konyifahawo na mi , ke miefa avi ha ̃ o . ’

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela tsia nu dɔna , eye menoa wain o , ke miegblɔ be , ‘ Ame sia dze aɖaʋa . ’

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Amegbetɔvi la va , eɖua nu eye wonoa nu , ke miegblɔ bena , ‘ Ame sia la nutsuɖula kple ahatsunolae eye wo ̀ nye nudzɔlawo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo xɔlɔ ̃ .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Miebuna be miaƒe nuwɔnawo dze , ke Mawu ƒe nuwɔnawoe nye nyateƒe le ame siwo xɔa edzi sena la gbɔ . ”

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Eva me be Farisitɔ aɖe kpe Yesu be wo ̀ ava ɖu nu kple ye . Esi wonɔ kplɔ ̃ a ŋu la ,

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: nyɔnu gbolowɔla aɖe si se be Yesu nɔ afi ma la yi ɖatsɔ ami ʋeʋi ̃ xɔasi aɖe ɖe asi .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Ege ɖe aƒea me eye wo ̀ yi ɖadze klo ɖe Yesu ƒe afɔ nu eye wo ̀ fa aɖatsi kɔ ɖe eƒe afɔwo dzi va se ɖe esime afɔawo ƒo tsi nyuie . Eya megbe la , etsɔ eƒe taɖa tutu Yesu ƒe afɔwoe . Azɔ egbugbɔ afɔawo eye wo ̀ ʋu nu le ami ʋeʋi ̃ la nu hesi na wo .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Farisitɔ si kpe Yesu la kpɔ nu si nɔ edzi yim eye esi wo ̀ dze si ame si ƒomevi nyɔnu sia nye ta la , egblɔ le eɖokui me be , “ Esia fia be Yesu menye nyagblɔɖila aɖeke o , elabena nenye be Mawue dɔe vava ̃ la , anya ame si ƒomevi nyɔnu sia nye . ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Yesu nya nu si bum Farisitɔ la nɔ eya ta eyɔe be , “ Simɔn , nya aɖe le asinye medi be magblɔ na wo ̀ . ” Simɔn gblɔ nɛ be , “ Enyo , Nufiala , gblɔe mase . ”

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Yesu gblɔ ŋutinya sia nɛ be , “ Ŋutsu aɖe do ga sidi akpe ewo na ame aɖe eye wo ̀ do sidi akpe ɖeka na ame bubu .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Wo dometɔ aɖeke mete ŋu xe fea o , ale wo ̀ tsɔ ga la ke wo ame evea . Ame kae ne ̀ bu be alɔ ̃ gadola sia ƒe nya gbɔ wu ? ”

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Simɔn ɖo eŋu be , “ Mebu be ame si wo ̀ tsɔ ga home ga ̃ tɔ kee lae alɔ ̃ e wu . ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Pɛ , e ̀ ɖo nyaa ŋu nyuie ŋutɔ . ”

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Azɔ Yesu trɔ ɖe nyɔnua ŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ na Simɔn be , “ Ekpɔ nyɔnu si dze klo ɖe afi sia ? Esi meva aƒewo ̀ me la , me ̀ na tsim be maklɔ ɖi le nye afɔwo ŋu o , ke nyɔnu sia klɔ wo kple eƒe aɖatsiwo eye wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe taɖa tutu woe .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Le mi ́ a de kɔnu nu la , ne mi ́ ebe mi ́ ado gbe na ame aɖe la , mi ́ egbugbɔa nu nɛ . Wo ̀ la , me ̀ wɔe nam o , gake nyɔnu sia gbugbɔ nye afɔwo zi geɖe tso esi meva afi sia .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Enye nudzeame be na ̃ na amim masi ɖe ta gake me ̀ nam o , ke eya tsɔ ami xɔasi sia si ɖe nye afɔwo .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Le esia ta la , see be , wotsɔ eƒe nu vɔ ̃ geɖe siwo wo ̀ wɔ la kee , elabena elɔ ̃ m ŋutɔ , ke ame si wotsɔ nu vɔ ̃ ʋee aɖe ko kee la , ɖea lɔlɔ ̃ ʋee aɖe ko fiana . ”

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na nyɔnua azɔ be , “ Wotsɔ wo ̀ nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo ̀ . ”

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Ame siwo nɔ klpɔ ̃ a ŋu kplii la gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Ame ka ƒomevie ame sia buna be yenye ale be wo ̀ le yiyim le amewo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo tsɔm le wo kem ? ”

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ na nyɔnua be , “ Wo ̀ xɔse ɖe wo ̀ , heyi le ŋutifafa me . ”

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu kplɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖe asi eye wode asi tsatsa me le du kple kɔƒe siwo le Galilea nutomewo me la me nɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe vava .

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Nyɔnu aɖe si me wo ̀ nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le kple esiwo ŋu wo ̀ da gbe le la kplɔ wo ɖo . Wo dometɔ aɖewoe nye Maria Magdalatɔ , ame si me wo ̀ nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ adre le ,

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: Yohana , Kuza srɔ ̃ , Kuza sia nye Fia Herodes ƒe fiasa ̃ bliboa dzikpɔla , Susana kple ame bubu geɖe siwo tsɔ woawo ŋutɔ ƒe ga kple nuɖuɖu nɔ Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzi kpɔmii .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi ame geɖe gaƒo ƒu ɖe Yesu ŋu be yewoase eƒe nyawo , eye bubuwo ha ̃ ganɔ mɔ dzi gbɔna tso du bubuwo me la , edo lo sia na wo be :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: “ Agbledela aɖe yi eƒe agble me be yeaƒa ̃ nuku . Esi wo ̀ nɔ nukuawo wum la , ɖewo ge ɖe mɔƒome eye amewo va zɔ wo dzi . Xeviwo ha ̃ va fɔ ɖewo mi .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Nuku aɖewo ha ̃ ge ɖe kpenyigba dzi . Nuku siawo de asi miemie me gake wova yrɔ elabena woƒe kewo mete ŋu yi tome ʋii afi si woakpɔ tsi le o .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Bubuwo ge ɖe ŋugbewo me eye womie kple ŋuawo gake ŋuawo va vu tsyɔ wo dzi eye wotsrɔ ̃ .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Nuku bubuwo ya ge ɖe anyigba nyui dzi , ale wotsi , tse ku alafa nanewo wu esi agbledela la wu . ” Esi wo ̀ gblɔ ŋutinya sia vɔ la , egblɔ be , “ Ame si ƒe towo sea nu la , newɔ wo ŋutidɔ fifia . ”

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va egbɔ be wo ̀ aɖe lododo la , gɔme na yewo .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Ke egblɔ na wo be , “ Miawo la , wona nunya mi be miase mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe nu ɣaɣlawo gɔme , ke hena ame bubuwo la , meƒoa nu na wo le lododowo me ale be , ‘ Ne wokpɔ nu la , womadze sii o , ne wose nu ha ̃ la , womase egɔme o . ’ ”

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Lododo la gɔmee nye si , nuku lae nye Mawu ƒe nya si wo ̀ tsɔ vɛ na amegbetɔwo .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Mɔƒome afi si nuku aɖewo ge ɖo lae nye ame siwo ƒe dziwo ku atri . Ame siawo ƒomevi sea Mawu ƒe nya gake abosam vana eye wo ̀ ɖea nya la le woƒe dzime ale be wometea ŋu xɔa edzi sena be woakpɔ ɖeɖe o .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Esiwo ge ɖe kpenyigba dzi lae nye ame siwo nu mawunya sese vivina gake womexɔnɛ ɖe woƒe dziwo me be wo ̀ atsi o . Wonya be nya la nye nyateƒe eye woxɔa edzi se ha ̃ ɖe kple ɖee hena ɣeyiɣi aɖe . Ke ne yometiti ƒe ya xɔdzo la ƒo ɖe wo ko la , woɖenɛ le dzime .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Nuku si ge ɖe ŋu me lae nye ame siwo sea mawunya eye woxɔnɛ sena , gake agbe sia me ƒe fuɖenamewo , kesinɔnuwo , aglotutu , dzidzɔkpɔkpɔwo kple ŋutila ̃ ƒe dzidzɔdonamenuwo vuna tsyɔa nya la dzi le woƒe dziwo me , ale be wometea ŋu kpena ɖe ame ɖeka pɛ teti ha ̃ ŋu be wo ̀ axɔ nyanyui la dzi se o . ”

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: ” Ke anyigba nyui lae nye ame siwo ƒe dziwo me kɔ . Ame siawo sea Mawu ƒe nya la hewɔa edzi ha ̃ pɛpɛpɛ . Wokakana nya la na ame bubuwo ha ̃ eye woawo ha ̃ xɔnɛ sena . ”

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: Ɣe bubu ɣi la , Yesu bia ameawo be , “ Ame kae se kpɔ be ame aɖe si akaɖi eye wo ̀ tsɔ nu tsyɔ edzi be megakle ̃ o . Gbeɖe , akaɖi la , akaɖiti dzie wodanɛ ɖo be wo ̀ akle ̃ be amewo nakpɔ nu .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Esia fia be gbe ɖeka la , woahe nu sia nu si le amewo ƒe dzi me la ɖe gagla ̃ gbe be ame sia ame nakpɔ .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: Le esia ta mikpɔ nyuie le nu siwo miesena la ŋu , elabena ame si si nu le la , eyae woagana nui , eye ame si si nu mele o la , woaxɔ esi wo ̀ bu be ele ye si la ha ̃ le esi . ”

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Gbe ɖeka Yesu nɔviawo kple dadaa wova be yewoakpɔe ɖa . Le ɣemaɣi me la enɔ nu fiam amewo le aƒe aɖe me . Ameawo sɔ gbɔ ale gbegbe be dadaa kple nɔviawo mete ŋu ge ɖe aƒea me le egbɔ o . Ame aɖe va gblɔe na Yesu be dadaa kple nɔviawo le edim be yewoakpɔ .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Esi Yesu se be ye dada kple ye nɔviwo le xexe le ye dim la ,

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: egblɔ bena , “ Danye kple nɔvinyewoe nye ame siwo kata ̃ sea mawunya la eye wowɔna ɖe edzi ha ̃ . ”

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Gbe bubu gbe esi eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ ʋu aɖe me le ƒua dzi la , Yesu bia tso nusrɔ ̃ lawo si be woaku ʋua yi ƒua ƒe go evelia dzi .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Esi wonɔ ƒua dzi yina la , Yesu mlɔ anyi be yeadɔ alɔ ̃ vie . Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , ya sese ̃ aɖe de asi ƒoƒo me eye wova zu ahom dziŋɔ aɖe , eye woƒe agbe ɖo xaxa ga ̃ aɖe me .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖe abla va Yesu gbɔ heʋuʋui eye wo ̀ nyɔ . Wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , Aƒetɔ , mi ́ ele nyɔnyrɔ ̃ m ! ” Ale Yesu fɔ eye wo ̀ blu ɖe ahom la ta . Enumake ɖoɖoe ga ̃ aɖe zi eye ahom la dzudzɔ . Ya la kple ƒutsotsoeawo dze kɔ anyi kpoo .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Azɔ ebia eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Afi ka mi ́ aƒe xɔse le ? ” Wo kata ̃ ƒe mo wɔ yaa eye vɔvɔ ̃ le ́ wo . Đeko wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Ame kae nye ame sia , bena ya kple ƒutsotsoewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ɖoa toe ? ”

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Wova ɖi go ɖe Garasenenyigba si le Galilea ƒua godo la dzi .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Esi wonɔ go dom tso ʋua me ko la , ŋutsu aɖe si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le ƒe geɖe la si du tso Gadara dua me va kpe Yesu . Nɔƒe aɖeke mele ame sia si abe aƒe me ene o . Agado siwo me woɖi ame kukuwo ɖo la me wo ̀ mlɔna henɔa amama .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Esi wo ̀ kpɔ Yesu teti ko la etsɔ eɖokui xla ̃ ɖe anyigba le eŋgɔ henɔ ɣli dom be , “ Nu ka dim ne ̀ le le gbɔnye wo ̀ Yesu , Mawu Dziƒoʋi ̃ tɔ la ƒe Vi . Meɖe kuku na wo ̀ , me ̀ gawɔ funyafunyam o ! ”

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Egblɔ nya sia elabena Yesu de asi gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la nyanya me le eme xoxo . Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ sia xɔ amea me ale gbegbe be ne woblae kple gakɔsɔkɔsɔ ha ̃ la , etsoa kɔsɔkɔsɔa bɔbɔe hesina ɖoa gbe .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Yesu bia gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a be , “ Ŋkɔwo ̀ ɖe ? ” Eɖo eŋu nɛ be ; “ Ŋkɔnyee ̀ nye Akpeakpewo elabena miesɔ gbɔ . ”

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo ɖe kuku na Yesu vevie be meganya yewo de Do Globo si seɖoƒe meli na o la me o .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Aƒehawo ƒe ha ga ̃ aɖe nɔ nu ɖum le to si te ɖe wo ŋu la kɔgo le ɣeyiɣi sia me eye gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo ɖe kuku na Yesu be nena yewoayi aɖage ɖe wo me . Ale Yesu na mɔ wo .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo do go le amea me yi ɖage ɖe haawo me . Enumake haawo kata ̃ ƒu du sesi ̃ e tso toa kɔgo yi ɖadze ƒu me doo heno tsi ku .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Hakplɔlawo le ́ du tsɔ sesi ̃ e tu ta du siwo te ɖe afi ma la me eye esi wonɔ yiyim la , wonɔ nu si dzɔ la gblɔm na amewo .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Eteƒe medidi o , ameha ga ̃ aɖe va do be yewoakpɔ nu kple yewo ŋutɔ ƒe ŋkuwo . Wokpɔ ame si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo nɔ kpɔ la , eƒe mo kɔ eye wo ̀ do awu hebɔbɔ nɔ Yesu ƒe afɔnu kpoo , esia wɔe be vɔvɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe ɖo ameawo kata ̃ .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Ame siwo kpɔ ale si Yesu da gbe le gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ tɔ la ŋui la gblɔe na wo tɔ bubuawo .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Ameawo vɔ ̃ ale gbegbe be woɖe kuku na Yesu be wo ̀ adzo le yewo gbɔ kpoo ; ale Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ge ɖe ʋua me eye wotso ƒu la heyi go evelia dzi .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Hafi wo ̀ adzo la ame si me wo ̀ nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ awo le la ɖe kuku nɛ vevie be yeayi kplii . Ke Yesu gbe gblɔ nɛ be ,

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: “ Trɔ na ̃ yi wo ̀ ƒometɔwo gbɔ eye na ̃ gblɔ nu ga ̃ si Mawu wɔ na wo ̀ la na wo . ” " Ale ŋutsu sia dze mɔ nɔ tsatsam le dua me henɔ nukunu ga ̃ si Yesu wɔ nɛ la gblɔm na ameawo .
