text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Ame siwo nɔ ƒu la ƒe akpa si wova ɖi go ɖo la xɔe atuu elabena wonɔ mɔ kpɔm na eƒe vava xoxoxo .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Azɔ ŋutsu aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Yairo si nye Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe dzikpɔlawo dometɔ ɖeka la va Yesu gbɔ dze klo ɖe eƒe afɔnu heɖe kuku nɛ vevie be nekplɔ ye ɖo yi aƒe me

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: elabena vinyɔnuvi ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ si le ye si , si xɔ ƒe wuieve la le kudɔ ƒom . Yesu dze eyome enumake gake ameha la mimii ɖo . "

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Nyɔnu aɖe nɔ afi ma ame si le ʋusisidɔ le ́ m ƒe wuieve sɔŋ , gake ame aɖeke mete ŋu yɔ dɔe o .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Nyɔnu sia va te ɖe eŋu le emegbe eye wo ̀ ka asi eƒe awuʋlaya to , enumake eƒe ʋusisidɔ la tɔ .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Ke Yesu trɔ bia be , “ Ame kae ka asi ŋunye ” Ame aɖeke melɔ ̃ be yee o . Ke Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ ameha la mimi wo ̀ ɖo , eye wote ɖe ŋuwo ̀ kpokploe , ale ke wɔ na ̃ bia be ame kae ka asi ŋunye ha ̃ ? ”

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Gbeɖe , ame aɖe ɖoe koŋ ka asi ŋunye , elabena ŋuse ̃ si le menye la ƒe ɖe do le menye . ”

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Nyɔnu si wɔ nenem nu sia la kpɔe be nu si yewɔ la le nyanya na Yesu eya ta etsɔ vɔvɔ ̃ kple dzodzo nyanyanya va dze klo ɖe eŋkume hegblɔ nu si ta wo ̀ ka asi eŋu kple ale si wo ̀ kpɔ dɔyɔyɔ enumake la nɛ .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Vinyɔnu , wo ̀ xɔse da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ . Heyi le ŋutifafa me . ”

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Le esime Yesu nɔ nu ƒom na nyɔnua la , ame aɖe tso Yairo ƒeme va do kple nya sia bena via nyɔnuvi sue la ku . Amedɔdɔa gblɔ na Yairo bena , “ Viwo la ku xoxo eya ta viɖe aɖeke mele eme be na ̃ gaɖe fu na Nufiala la o . ”

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Esi Yesu se nya si amea tsɔ vɛ la , egblɔ na ɖevia fofo be , “ Me ̀ gavɔ ̃ o ! Wo ̀ ya xɔ dzinye se ko , ekema viwo ̀ a agagbɔ agbe . ”

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Esi woɖo aƒea me la , Yesu de se be ame aɖeke nagage ɖe xɔ si me ɖevia le kple ye o , negbe Petro , Yohanes , Yakobo , kple ɖevia fofo kple dadaa ko .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Aƒea me ŋutɔ yɔ fu ̃ u kple konyifala siwo nɔ avi fam . Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Midzudzɔ avia . Đevia meku o , alɔ ̃ ko dɔm wo ̀ le ! ”

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Nya sia ɖi kokoe na ameawo , elabena wonya nyuie be ɖevia ku .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Azɔ Yesu zɔ ɖe ɖevia dzi le xɔa me eye wo ̀ le ́ eƒe alɔnu heyɔe gblɔ be , “ Vinye tsi tre ”

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Agbe gaɖo ɖevia me enumake eye wo ̀ tsi tre kpla . Yesu gblɔ na ameawo be , “ Mina nanee wo ̀ aɖu ! ”

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Dzi dzɔ ɖevia dzilawo ŋutɔ . Ke Yesu de se na wo vevie be womegagblɔ nu si dzɔ la na ame aɖeke o .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Gbe ɖeka Yesu yɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ƒo ƒui eye wo ̀ na ŋuse ̃ wo be woanya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo do goe le ameawo me eye woada gbe le dɔ ƒomevi vovovowo le ́ lawo ŋu .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Le esia megbe la , edɔ wo ɖa be woagblɔ mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe vavanya na ame sia ame eye woayɔ dɔ dɔle ́ le ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Ede se na wo be , “ Migatsɔ atizɔti teti ha ̃ ɖe asi o .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Ne mieɖo du aɖe me la , midze aƒe ɖeka ko me . ”

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Nenye be amewo mexɔ mi le du aɖe me o la , ekema miʋuʋu ke si le miaƒe afɔwo ŋuti la ɖi hena ɖaseɖiɖi le dua ŋuti . ” "

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Ale nusrɔ ̃ lawo dze mɔ nɔ tsatsam le du kple kɔƒewo me , henɔ nyanyui la kakam eye wonɔ gbe dam le dɔnɔwo ha ̃ ŋu .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Esi Herodes , si nye gɔvina la , se nukunu siwo wɔm Yesu nɔ la , etsi dzimaɖeɖi eye eƒe susu ha ̃ ɖe fu nɛ ŋutɔ elabena ese ame aɖewo nɔ gbɔgblɔm be , " “ Yohanes Mawutsidetanamelae gagbɔ agbe . ”

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Ame bubuwo ha ̃ nɔ gbɔgblɔm be , “ Eliya alo nyagblɔɖila xoxoawo dometɔ ɖekae fɔ tso ame kukuwo dome . ” Nya siawo ƒomevi nɔ ɖiɖim le anyigba blibo la dzi .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Le esia ta Herodes gblɔ na eɖokui be ; “ Nye ŋutɔe tso ta le Yohanes nu , ke ame kae nye sia esi ŋu mele nya wɔnuku siawo sem tsoe ? ” " Ale wo ̀ di vevie be yeakpɔ Yesu .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Apostoloawo trɔ gbɔ va gblɔ ale si wode dɔ si gbe wo ̀ ɖo wo ɖo la na Yesu . Emegbe la Yesu kplɔ wo dzoe dzaa yi Betsaida dua me .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Gake ame geɖewo nya afi si yim wonɔ xoxoxo eya ta wokplɔ wo ɖo . Exɔ wo alɔ eve eye wo ̀ gade asi nufiafia wo me tso mawufiaɖuƒe la ŋu eye wo ̀ yɔ dɔ dɔnɔwo ha ̃ le wo dome .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Le ɣetrɔ miaa la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo va ƒoe ɖe enu be , " “ Na mɔ ameawo be woayi kɔƒewo kple agble siwo te ɖe afi sia la me aɖadi nuɖuɖu kple dɔƒe na wo ɖokuiwo , elabena naneke mele teƒe tsoabo sia woaƒle aɖu o . ”

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo ̀ be , “ Miawoe wo ̀ le be miadi nuɖuɖu na wo woaɖu . ” Woawo ha ̃ gagblɔ nɛ be , “ Aleke mi ́ awɔ ana nu wo woaɖu esi wo ̀ nye be abolo atɔ ̃ kple tɔmela ̃ eve koe le miawo ŋutɔ si , alo ɖe ne ̀ di be miayi aɖaƒle nuɖuɖu na ame gbogbo siawoa ? ”

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Wogblɔ esia elabena ameha la ƒe xexle ̃ me ade akpe atɔ ̃ . Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Migblɔ na ameawo be woanɔ anyi ɖe hatsotsowo me ; ame abe blaatɔ ̃ lɔƒo ene nenɔ hatsotso ɖeka me ”

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: ale ameha la nɔ anyi nenema .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Azɔ Yesu tsɔ abolo atɔ ̃ kple tɔmela ̃ evea eye wo ̀ wu mo dzi ɖe dziƒo heda akpe ɖe wo ta . Eŋe wo me kakɛkakɛ eye wo ̀ tsɔ wo na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woatsɔ wo aɖo ameawo ƒe akɔme .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Ame sia ame ɖu nu ɖi ƒo eye le nua ɖuɖu vɔ megbe la , wofɔ kakɛ siwo susɔ la de kusi wuieve sɔŋ me .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , esi Yesu nɔ gbe dom ɖa la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ egbɔ eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Ame kae amehawo gblɔna be menye ? ”

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ame aɖewo be wo ̀ e nye Yohanes Mawutsidenatamela la , bubuwo be Eliya , eye ɖewo ha ̃ gblɔ be blemanyagblɔɖilawo dometɔ ɖeka si gbɔ agbe lae ne ̀ nye . ”

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Yesu bia wo be “ Miawo ya ɖe ame kae miebu be menye ? ” Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Mawu ƒe Kristo la ! ”

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Ke ede se na wo vevie bena womegagblɔ nya sia na ame aɖeke o .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Eyi dzi gblɔ na wo be , “ Ele be nye Mesia la makpe fu geɖe . Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo agbe nu le gbɔnye . Woawum , ke magagbɔ agbe le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe . ”

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Ame si di bena yeanɔ yonyeme la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ aɖe asi le xexe sia me nyawo ŋu atsɔ eƒe atsitsoga gbe sia gbe eye wo ̀ anɔ ŋunye ɖaa .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Ame si tsɔ eƒe agbe ɖo anyi ɖe tanye la ; aɖee boŋ , ke ame si adi vevie be yeaɖe yeƒe agbe la abui . ”

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Viɖe ka ame akpɔ ne nu siwo kata ̃ le xexe sia me la zu etɔ ke to esia me la , wo ̀ abu eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbe ? ”

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ nye ŋutɔ kple nye nyawo le ŋu kpem na fifia la , woaɖo ŋku edzi be , ne nye Amegbetɔvi la , metrɔ va le bubu ga ̃ si Fofonye anam la me , eye mawudɔla kɔkɔewo ƒo xlam la , ekema nye ha ̃ makpe ŋu le nenem me siawo ŋu .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Enye nyateƒe matrɔmatrɔ be mia dometɔ aɖewo siwo le tsi tre ɖe afi sia la maku akpɔ o , va se ɖe esime miaƒe ŋkuwo akpɔ mawufiaɖuƒe la ! ”

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Le ŋkeke enyi megbe la , Yesu kplɔ Petro , Yakobo kple Yohanes ɖe asi woyi togbɛ aɖe dzi afi si wo ̀ ɖo be yeado gbe ɖa le .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ gbe dom ɖa la , eƒe mo de asi kekle ̃ me . Eƒe awuwo fu tititi henɔ dzo dam miamiamia .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Ŋutsu eve , Mose kple Eliya ,

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: do kple ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ aɖe henɔ nu ƒom kple Yesu . Woƒo nu tso eƒe dzodzo si ava va eme kpuie le Yerusalem la ŋu .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Petro kple nɔviawo nɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm bɔkɔɔ . Esi wonyɔ la wokpɔ be kekle ̃ kple ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ aɖe ƒo xla ̃ Yesu eye ŋutsu eve le tsitre ɖe egbɔ .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Esi ŋutsu eveawo nɔ dzodzom le Yesu gbɔ la , Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , enyo be mi ́ eva afi sia . Na mi ́ atu agbadɔ etɔ ̃ , ɖeka na wo ̀ , ɖeka na Mose eye ɖeka na Eliya . ” Evɔ Petro menya nya si gblɔm wo ̀ nɔ o .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nya siawo gblɔm la , alili ̃ kpo kekle ̃ aɖe va tsyɔ wo dzi , eye vɔvɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe le ́ wo .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Gbe aɖe ɖi tso alilikpo la me be , “ Ame sia nye Vinye , si metia la , mi ́ ɖo toe ! ” "

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Esi gbea ɖi vɔ ko la , Yesu ɖeɖe koe susɔ ɖe teƒea kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo . Nusrɔ ̃ la siawo mekɔ nu le nu si teƒe wokpɔ la dzi na ame aɖeke o , hena ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Le ŋufɔke esi woɖi tso togbɛa dzi gbɔna la , ameha ga ̃ aɖe va kpe Yesu .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Ŋutsu aɖe si nɔ wo dome la , kɔ gbe dzi gblɔ nɛ be , " “ Nufiala , ŋutsuvi si le afi sia la koe nye vi le asinye .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Ke gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ aɖe dzea edzi enuenu esi wɔnɛ be wo ̀ doa ɣli sesi ̃ e . Etsɔnɛ xla ̃ na ɖe anyi sesi ̃ e ale be futukpɔ dona le enu bɔbɔbɔ . Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ sia ɖea fu nɛ ɣesiaɣi kloe eye menana wo ̀ kpɔa vovo kura o .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Meɖe kuku na wo ̀ nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woanyae le eme gake womete ŋui o . ”

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Yesu xɔ edzi gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ O mi dzidzime maxɔse kple dzidzime totro kpaɖikpaɖi . Ɣekaɣi manɔ mia gbɔ eye mado dzi ahe mi ase ɖo ? Kplɔ viwo ̀ ŋutsuvi la va afii . ”

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Esi ŋutsuvia gbɔna ɖe Yesu gbɔ la , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ la gaxla ̃ e ɖe anyigba sesi ̃ e eye wo ̀ nyamae ŋutɔ . Ke Yesu ɖe gbe na gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a be wo ̀ ado go le ɖevia me eye wo ̀ do le eme enumake ; ale Yesu da gbe le ɖevia ŋu hetsɔe na fofoa .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ame sia ame ƒe mo wɔ yaa le ale si Yesu ɖe Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ fiae la ta . Esi ameha la nɔ nu ƒom le nu wɔnuku siwo kata ̃ wɔm wo ̀ nɔ ŋu la , Yesu trɔ ɖe nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ , gblɔ na wo be ,

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: “ Miɖo to afii eye miale ́ nya si gblɔ ge mele na mi la ɖe ta me . Wole nye Mesia la de ge asi . ” "

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Gake nusrɔ ̃ lawo mese nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la gɔme o , elabena wotsyɔ nu woƒe susuwo dzi , gawu la wovɔ ̃ be yewoabia egɔme ase .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Azɔ ʋiʋli aɖe va ɖo nusrɔ ̃ lawo dome le ame si anye ga ̃ wu .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Ke Yesu nya nya si ʋlim nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ eya ta ekɔ ɖevi sue aɖe da ɖe eƒe axadzi .

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: Eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , " “ Ame si akpɔ ɖevi sue abe esia ƒomevi ene dzi la , ekema nye dzie ma wo ̀ kpɔ . Ke ame si le dzinye kpɔm la , Mawu si dɔm ɖa lae ma dzi kpɔm wo ̀ le . Ale si miekpɔa ame bubuwo dzii lae woakpɔ hafi anya miaƒe ga ̃ nyenye . ”

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ la Yohanes va egbɔ va gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ ekpɔ ame aɖe wo ̀ nɔ gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nya ̃ m le wo ̀ ŋkɔ me ale mi ́ egbe nɛ be megawɔe o elabena menye mi ́ a dometɔ ɖekae wo ̀ nye o . ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mele be miawɔ nenema o , elabena ame si metsi tre ɖe mia ŋu o la le mia dzi . ”

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Esi Yesu ƒe ɣeyiɣi si wo ̀ le be wo ̀ atrɔ ayi dziƒo nɔ aƒe tum la , eɖo ta me kplikpaa ɖo ta Yerusalem ,

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: eye le mɔa dzi la , edɔ amewo ɖo ɖe Samaria kɔƒe aɖe me be woaɖadi xɔ da ɖi na yeƒe vava .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Gake kɔƒea me tɔwo gbe be yewomana xɔ amedɔdɔawo o , esi wo ̀ nye Yerusalem woɖo yina ta .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Esi wova gblɔ nyaa na Yesu la , Yakobo kple Yohanes gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ aɖe gbe na dzo be wo ̀ atso dziƒo ava fi ̃ a wo oa ? ”

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Gake Yesu trɔ ɖe wo gbɔ eye wo ̀ gbe nya na wo gblɔ be , “ Alo ɖe mienya gbɔgbɔ si tɔgbi tɔ mienye o maha ? Elabena Amegbetɔvi la meva be yeatsrɔ ̃ amewo o , ke boŋ bena yeaɖe wo . ”

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Ale wodzo yi kɔƒe bubu me .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Esi wonɔ mɔa dzi nɔ yiyim la , ame aɖe va tu Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Medi be makplɔ wo ̀ ɖo ayi afi sia afi si nayi . ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nyae be , afi si maziɔ nye ta ɖo teti ha ̃ mele asinye o . Abeiwo la do le wo si wodɔa eme , xeviwo ha ̃ atɔ le wo si wodɔa eme , gake nye ame si nye Mesia la , dɔƒe aɖeke kura mele asinye le xexeame o . ”

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Egblɔ na ame bubu be , “ Dze yonyeme ! ” Ke ŋutsu la ɖo eŋu be , “ Aƒetɔ , na mayi aɖaɖi Fofonye gba ̃ hafi . ”

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Na ame siwo nye ame kukuwo la naɖi woƒe ame kukuwo , ke wo ̀ ya yi naɖe gbeƒa ̃ mawufiaɖuƒe la na amewo . ”

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Ame bubu aɖe si ha ̃ wo ̀ yɔ la gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , madze yowo ̀ me gake na mayi aɖakla nye ƒometɔwo gba ̃ hafi mava . ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ame si ɖea eƒe susu ɖa le dɔ si meɖo nɛ ŋu la , medze na mawufiaɖuƒe la me yiyi o . ”

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Azɔ Aƒetɔ Yesu tia nusrɔ ̃ la bubu blaadre - vɔ - eve eye wo ̀ dɔ wo eve , eve ɖo ɖe du kple kɔƒe siwo me eya ŋutɔ ɖo be yeava yi emegbe la me .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Nuŋeŋe la sɔ gbɔ , gake dɔwɔlawo mede ha o , eya ta miɖe kuku na nuŋeŋe la ƒe Aƒetɔ bena , woadɔ dɔwɔlawo aɖo ɖe eƒe nuŋeŋe la me .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Azɔ miheyi eye miɖo ŋku edzi be miele abe ale ̃ siwo wodɔ ɖo ɖe amega ̃ xiwo dome ene .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Migatsɔ ga aɖeke ɖe asi o , migatsɔ kotoku loo alo afɔkpa dodo bubu o . Migagble ̃ ɣeyiɣi le mɔ dzi anɔ gbe dom na amewo o ! ”

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Ne miege ɖe aƒe aɖe me la , miyra emetɔwo ,

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: nenye be wodze na yayra sia xɔxɔ la , ekema anɔ wo dzi ɖaa , ke ne womedze na yayra la o la , agatrɔ va mia gbɔ . ”

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Nenye be mieɖo kɔƒe aɖe me la , miganɔ tsatsam tso aƒe me yi aƒe me o , midze aƒe ɖeka ko me , eye miaɖu nu alo ano nu sia nu si wotsɔ ɖo mia kɔme la nu maƒomaƒoe . Nenye be wona nane mi la , migagbe exɔxɔ o elabena dɔwɔla ɖe sia ɖe dze na eƒe fetu . ”

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Nenye be miege ɖe du aɖe me eye dua me tɔwo xɔ mi nyuie la , ekema miɖu nu sia nu si wotsɔ ɖo miaƒe akɔme .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Mida gbe le dɔnɔ siwo le afi ma la ŋu eye miɖe gbeƒa ̃ na wo bena , ‘ Mawufiaɖuƒe la va ɖo mia dome vɔ azɔ . ’ ”

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Ne womexɔ mi le du aɖe me o la , mige ɖe dua ƒe ablɔwo dzi ne miagblɔ be ,

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: ‘ Mi ́ eʋuʋu miaƒe du ƒe ke si le ́ ɖe afɔwo ŋuti na mi ́ ɖi abe ɖaseɖiɖi ene . Ke minya nyuie be : Mawufiaɖuƒe la gogo .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Mele gbe tem ɖe edzi na mi be , nuwo anɔ bɔbɔe na Sodom wu du sia le Ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Baba na wo ̀ Korazin ! Baba na wo ̀ Betsaida ! Elabena ne Tiro kple Sidɔn duwo mee mewɔ nukunu siwo mewɔ le mia dome le la , anye ne ameawo trɔ dzime xoxoxo , ata akpanyakotoku abɔbɔ nɔ afi me .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , tohehe si woana Tiro kple Sidɔn la anɔ wodzoe wu esi woana mi le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbea .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Mi Kapernaumtɔwo ya ɖe , ɖe wole mia kɔ ge ɖe dzi ayi dziƒoea ? Gbeɖe , woaɖiɖi mi ɖe dzomavɔ la me . ”

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Egblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Ame siwo xɔ mi la nyee woxɔ . Ame siwo gbe mi la nyee wogbe eye ame siwo gbem la gbe Mawu ame si dɔm ɖa la . ”

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Esi nusrɔ ̃ la blaadre - vɔ - eveawo trɔ gbɔ la , wogblɔ nɛ dzidzɔtɔe be , “ Ne mi ́ eyɔ wo ̀ ŋkɔ ko la , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ɖoa to mi ́ . ”

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Nyateƒee , nye ŋutɔ mekpɔ Abosam wo ̀ ge tso dziƒo abe dzikedzo ene !

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Mena ŋuse ̃ mi be miaɖu Futɔ la ƒe ŋuse ̃ wo kata ̃ dzi , eye be miazɔ le dawo kple ahɔ ̃ wo dzi anya avuzi le wo dzi . Ke nuvevi aɖeke mawɔ mi o .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Gake migakpɔ dzidzɔ bena gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ɖo to mi o . Ke boŋ midzɔ dzi be woŋlɔ miaƒe ŋkɔwo ɖe dziƒonɔlawo dome . ”

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe yɔ eƒe dzime fu ̃ u kple dzidzɔ blibo eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Mekafu wo ̀ , O Fofo , Dzi kple anyigba ƒe Aƒetɔ , be ne ̀ ɣla nu siawo ɖa tso xexe sia me nunyalaga ̃ wo gbɔ eye ne ̀ ɖee fia ame siwo xɔ dziwo ̀ se abe ɖeviwo ene . Nyateƒe , Fofo akpe na wo ̀ elabena aleae ne ̀ di be wo ̀ anɔ .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: Nyee nye fofonye ƒe Amedɔdɔ le nu sia nu me . Ame aɖeke menya Vi la o , negbe Fofo la ko , eye ame aɖeke ha ̃ menya Fofo la o , negbe Vi la kple ame siwo wo ̀ lɔ ̃ ɖe eɖokui fia la ko . ”

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Azɔ etrɔ ɖe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo dzaa be , “ Wona mɔnukpɔkpɔ ga ̃ aɖe mi be miekpɔ nu siwo miekpɔ la .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Nyagblɔɖilawo kple fia siwo nɔ anyi tsa ̃ la di vevie be yewoanɔ anyi le ŋkeke siawo me eye yewoakpɔ eye yewoase nu siwo miekpɔ kple nu siwo miese la hafi ! ”

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Gbe ɖeka agbale ̃ fiala aɖe si nya Mose ƒe seawo nyuie ŋutɔ la va be yeado Yesu ƒe nyateƒetɔnyenye kpɔ . Ebiae be , “ Nu kae wo ̀ le be ame nawɔ be agbe mavɔ nasu esi ? ”

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aleke Mose ƒe sea gblɔ tso nu sia ŋuti ? ”

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Agbale ̃ fiala la ɖo eŋu be , “ Mose ƒe se la gblɔ be , ‘ Lɔ ̃ Aƒetɔ wo ̀ Mawu la kple wo ̀ dzi kple luʋɔ blibo , kpakple wo ̀ susu kple wo ̀ ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ ha ̃ , eye na ̃ lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ene . ’ ”

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ E ̀ ɖo eŋu nyuie ŋutɔ , heyi eye na ̃ wɔ esiawo kata ̃ , ekema agbe mavɔ la asu asiwo ̀ ! ”

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Ŋutsu sia di be yeatso afia na ye ɖokui elabena eya ŋutɔ melɔ ̃ a ame sia ame o , eya ta wo ̀ bia Yesu be , “ Ame kae nye hanyevi ? ”

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Yesu ɖo biabia sia ŋu nɛ kple lododo sia be , “ Ŋutsu aɖe si nɔ mɔ zɔm tso Yerusalem yina ɖe Yeriko la va ge ɖe adzodalawo sime . Adzodala siawo ƒoe nyuie eye woɖe ga kple eƒe awuwo le eŋu hegblee ɖe mɔa to wo ̀ nɔ kudɔ ƒom . ”

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Dzɔgbenyuitɔe la , Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfo aɖe va to afi ma yina . Esi wo ̀ kpɔ amea le mɔa to la , edze to eŋu yi ɖato mɔa ƒe akpa evelia eye wo ̀ dzo le egbɔ .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Levitɔ aɖe si nye ame siwo naa kpekpeɖeŋu le gbedoxɔ me la dometɔ aɖe ha ̃ va kpɔ amea wo ̀ mlɔ mɔa to gake eya ha ̃ tso eme dzo . ”

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Gake Samariatɔ , ame siwo womebuna ɖe naneke me o ha ̃ va yina eye esi wo ̀ kpɔ amea la , eƒe nu wɔ nublanui nɛ ŋutɔ .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Etɔ , dze klo ɖe egbɔ eye wo ̀ klɔ eƒe abiawo hetsɔ atike ɖo wo me . Emegbe ekɔe da ɖe eƒe tedzi dzi eye wo ̀ kplɔe ɖɔɖɔɖɔ va ɖo amedzrodzeƒe aɖe eye wo ̀ nɔ egbɔ za ̃ bliboa .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Esi ŋu ke la , Samariatɔ la tsɔ sidi akpe blaeve na amedzrodzeƒea dzikpɔla be wo ̀ atsɔ akpɔ amea dzii . Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , ‘ Nenye be nu si miegble ̃ ɖe eta sɔ gbɔ wu ga home si metsɔ na mi la , mava xe fea mamlea nenye be megatrɔ va afii ’ ” . Yesu bia agbale ̃ fiala la azɔ be ,

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: “ Le ame etɔ ̃ siawo dome ɖe , kae ne ̀ bu be enye havi na ame si dze adzodalawo sime ? ”

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Ŋutsu la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ame si kpɔ nublanui nɛ lae nye ehavi . ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Eɖo eŋu nyuie , heyi eye wo ̀ ha ̃ nawɔ nenema . ”

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ woƒe mɔzɔzɔa dzi ɖo ta Yerusalem eye wova ɖo kɔƒe aɖe me . Nyɔnu aɖe si woyɔna be Marta la xɔ wo ɖe eƒe aƒe me .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Marta nɔvi Maria va nɔ Yesu ƒe afɔnu le anyigba nɔ eƒe nyawo sem .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Ke Marta ya tsi dzodzodzoe nɔ nu ɖam na Yesu . Se ̃ e la , Marta te ɖe Yesu ŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ me ̀ kpɔe be medze be nɔvinye nanɔ anyi ɖe afi sia eye nye ɖeka manɔ dɔawo kata ̃ wɔm oa ? Gblɔ nɛ be neva kpe ɖe ŋunye . ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Gake Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ O , Marta , Marta , e ̀ le agbagba dzem le fu ɖem na ɖokuiwo ̀ le nu geɖewo ŋuti .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Ke nu ɖeka koe le vevie , eyae nye nu si Maria tia , eya womele exɔ ge le esi o . ”

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Gbe ɖeka Yesu nɔ gbe dom ɖa le teƒe aɖe . Esi wo ̀ wu nu la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka te ɖe eŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be . “ Aƒetɔ , fia gbedodoɖa aɖe mi ́ abe ale si Yohanes fia eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ene . ”

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Gbedodoɖa si Yesu fia wo lae nye esi . “ Mi ́ a Fofo , woade bubu wo ̀ ŋkɔ kɔkɔe la ŋu ɖaa , na wo ̀ Fiaɖuƒea nava kaba .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Na nuɖuɖu mi ́ gbe sia gbe ,

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: tsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke mi ́ le esi mietsɔ ame siwo da vo ɖe mi ́ a ŋuti la tɔwo kewo ta , eye megana be mi ́ age ɖe tetekpɔ me o . ”

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Tete egblɔ na wo be , “ Le kpɔɖeŋu me ne xɔ ̃ aɖe le mia dometɔ ɖeka si , eye wo ̀ yi xɔ ̃ a gbɔ zatitina hegblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Xɔ ̃ nye do abolo etɔ ̃ nam ,

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: elabena xɔ ̃ nye aɖe si le mɔ zɔm la va dzem eye naneke meli matsɔ nɛ wo ̀ aɖu o . ’

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: ” Ekema ame si le xɔ me la aɖo ŋu be , ‘ Megaɖe fu nam o . Mi ́ edo ʋɔa xoxo eye nye kple vinyewo mi ́ emlɔ anyi . Nyemate ŋu afɔ ava na naneke wo ̀ o . ’ ”

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi be , nenye be xɔ ̃ wo ̀ a mefɔ ʋu ʋɔa o , togbɔ be xɔ ̃ wo ̀ wo ̀ nye ha ̃ la , ne eƒo ʋɔa atraɖii la , afɔ ava tsɔ nu sia nu si dim ne ̀ le la na wo ̀ elabena e ̀ ku kutri bia nu si dim ne ̀ le la atraɖii .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Alea tututue wo ̀ nɔna le gbedodoɖa ha ̃ me . Ne miebia nu la , woana mi , ne miedi nu la , miakpɔe , eye ne mieƒo ʋɔa la , woaʋui na mi ɣesiaɣi .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Ame sia ame si bia nu la , xɔa nu si wo ̀ bia , ame siwo dia nu la kpɔnɛ eye woaʋu ʋɔa na ame sia ame si aƒoe la . ”

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Mi ame siwo nye vi fofowo ɖe , nenye be viwo ̀ , bia abolo wo ̀ ɖe , kpee na ̃ tsɔ nɛa ? Ne wo ̀ bia tɔmela ̃ ɖe , dala ̃ e na ̃ tsɔ nɛa ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Alo ne ebia koklozi ɖe , ahɔ ̃ e na ̃ tsɔ nɛa ? Gbeɖe miewɔa esia o !

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Azɔ nenye be mi ame siwo nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo mienaa nu si mia viwo bia mi wo la , ɖee mienya be mia Fofo si le dziƒo la anyo dɔme , ana Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ame siwo biae la oa ? ”

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Gbe ɖeka Yesu nya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ do goe le tokunɔ aɖe me eye amea de asi nuƒoƒo me enumake . Ame siwo nɔ afi ma la kpɔ dzidzɔ hetso aseye le nukunu sia ta .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Gake ame aɖewo nɔ ameawo dome siwo gblɔ be , “ Mewɔ nuku be ame sia le gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyam le amewo me o , elabena exɔ ŋuse ̃ tso Satana , si nye gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ƒe fia la gbɔ ! ”

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Ame bubuwo di tso esi be wo ̀ ana dzesi aɖewo nadze le yame si afia be eyae nye Mesia la vava ̃ .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Yesu dze si nu si nɔ ame siawo kata ̃ ƒe susu me eya ta egblɔ be , “ Ne dukɔ aɖe me tɔwo ma ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu hele aʋa wɔm la , dukɔa agbã , nenema ke nenye be aƒe aɖe me yɔ fu ̃ u kple dzre la , mate ŋu anɔ te o . ”

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Nenye be enye nyateƒe abe ale si miegblɔe be Satanae le dɔ wɔm le menye be menya eƒe gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ɖa la , aleke eƒe fiaɖuƒe anɔ tee ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Eye nenye be Satana ƒe ŋuse ̃ e le menye ɖe , nu kae le miawo ŋutɔ miaƒe amewo me ? Woawo ha ̃ tea ŋu nyaa gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo ɖa ? Alo miebu be esia fia kɔtee be Satana ƒe gbɔgbɔe le wo mea ? Mibia wo se kpɔ be miaƒe nya la nye nyateƒe maha ̃ ?

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Azɔ ne mele gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyam kple Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ la , ekema efia be mawufiaɖuƒe la va ɖo mia dome .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: Nenye be ŋuse ̃ tɔ aɖe kpla eƒe aʋawɔnuwo eye wole eƒe fiasa ̃ ŋu dzɔm la , eƒe nuwo anɔ dedie .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Gake ne ame si se ̃ ŋu wui va dze edzi eye wo ̀ xɔ ŋuse ̃ le esi la , axɔ eƒe aʋawɔnu siwo ŋu wo ̀ le ŋu ɖom ɖo le esi eye wo ̀ ama eƒe nunɔamesiwo .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: ” Ame si mele dzinye o la tsi tre ɖe ŋunye , eye ne ame aɖe mele kpekpem ɖe ŋunye o la , ele nye dɔ me gble ̃ m nam . ”

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: Nenye be wonya gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le ame aɖe me la , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ a nɔa tsatsam nɔa sitsoƒe dim le dzogbe kple teƒe teƒewo . Nenye be mekpɔ teƒe aɖeke o la , etrɔna yina ɖe ame si me wo ̀ do go le la me .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Ne wo ̀ kpɔ be wowɔ yeƒe nɔƒe xoxo la wo ̀ le dzadzɛ la ,

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: eyina ɖayɔa gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ adre bubu siwo vɔ ̃ ɖi wui la wogena ɖe amea me . Esia wɔnɛ be ame sia ƒe nɔnɔme gble ̃ na ɖe edzi wu tsa ̃ . ”

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ nya siawo gblɔm la , nyɔnu aɖe si nɔ ameawo dome la do ɣli be , “ Mawu neyra dawo ̀ ƒe ƒodo si me ne ̀ mlɔ kple no si ne ̀ no . ”

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Enyo gake woayra geɖe wu esia ame siwo sea mawunya la eye wowɔa edzi pɛpɛpɛ . ”

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Esi amehawo le ƒu ƒom ɖe edzi la Yesu gblɔ be , “ Esia nye dzidzime vɔ ̃ ɖi si le dzesi dim , gake womana dzesi aɖeke tsɔ wu Yona ƒe dzesi o .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Elabena ale si Yona nye dzesi na Ninivetɔwoe la , nenema ke Amegbetɔvi la anye dzesi na dzidzime siae . ”

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ŋkekea dzi la , Nyɔnufia si tso Seba la atsi tre afia asi dzidzime sia eye wo ̀ abu fɔ wo , elabena ezɔ mɔ tso didiƒe aɖe ke va be yease Salomon ƒe nufiamenyawo . Evɔ ame si de ŋgɔ wu Salomon sa ̃ a la le afii gake ame ʋee aɖewo koe ɖoa toe . ”

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ninivetɔwo kura gɔ ha ̃ abu fɔ dukɔ sia , elabena woawo la wotrɔ dzime esime Yona va gblɔ mawunya na wo , ke ame si kɔ wu Yona boo la le afii gake dukɔ sia gbe be yewomaɖo toe o . ”

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: Ame aɖeke mesia akaɖi tsɔna ɣlana ɖe nu te o , ke boŋ etsɔnɛ dana ɖe akaɖiti dzi bena wo ̀ akle ̃ na ame siwo kata ̃ le xɔa me .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Wo ̀ ŋkue nye akaɖi na wo ̀ ŋutila ̃ . Ne wo ̀ ŋku dzi kɔ la , wo ̀ ŋuti ha ̃ akɔ . Ke ne ŋku vɔ ̃ ɖi le asiwo ̀ la , mate ŋu akpɔ kekeli la o , elabena a ̃ tsi viviti me .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Eya ta mikpɔ nyuie bena miagaxe mɔ na kekeli la o .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Nenye be e ̀ kɔ le ɖokuiwo ̀ me eye viviti aɖeke mele mewo ̀ o la , ekema wo ̀ gota gome ha ̃ akle ̃ abe akaɖi kekle ̃ ga ̃ aɖee wosi ɖe mewo ̀ ene . ”

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Esi Yesu wu nya siawo gbɔgblɔ nu la , Farisitɔ aɖe kpee be wo ̀ ava ɖu nu le ye gbɔ , ale wo ̀ yi ɖe eme hebɔbɔ nɔ kplɔ ̃ a ŋu .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Ke esi Farisitɔ la kpɔ be Yesu meklɔ ŋui gba ̃ hafi be yeaɖu nu o la , eƒe mo wɔ yaa .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mi Farisitɔwo la , miewɔa nu le gota abe ɖe miedza ene , evɔ miaƒe dzime ya ƒoɖi kpekpekpe , ŋubiabia ̃ kpakple tamesese ̃ sɔŋ koe le mia me .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Mi movitɔwo ! Menye Mawue wɔ nu sia nu godo kple eme oa ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Dzadzɛnyenye nyuitɔe nye esi woɖe fia to dɔmenyowɔwɔ me . ”

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Gake mele egblɔm na mi Farisitɔwo ! Togbɔ be mieɖoa ŋku edzi tsɔna miaƒe nukpɔkpɔwo ƒe ewolia nana Mawu ha ̃ , miedrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu dzɔdzɔe o eye mieŋlɔna be be Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ li gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . Enyo be miatsɔ miaƒe nukpɔkpɔwo ƒe ewolia aɖo Mawu ŋkume , gake mele be miaŋlɔ nu vevi siawo be o .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: ” Baba na mi Farisitɔwo ! Elabena mielɔ ̃ a bubuteƒenɔnɔ le miaƒe ƒuƒoƒewo eye miedina be amewo nado gbe na yewo kple bubu tɔxɛ nenye be miezɔ to ablɔ dzi va yina .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la ʋunudɔdrɔ ̃ sese ̃ aɖe le mia lalam . Đeko miele abe yɔdo siwo dzi gbe vu tsyɔ ene . Amewo va toa mia dzi eye womenya nu dziŋɔ si dzi zɔm wole o . ”

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Agbale ̃ fialawo dometɔ ɖeka si ha ̃ nɔ ameawo dome la yɔe eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , le nya si ne ̀ gblɔ fifi laa me la , edo vlo miawo ha ̃ . ”

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Esia le me vava ̃ elabena nu dziŋɔ siawo le miawo ha ̃ lalam , elabena miedina be amewo nanɔ xɔse ƒe agbe ɖe ɖoɖo aɖewo nu , evɔ miawo ŋutɔwo la , mietenɛ kpɔ be yewoawɔ ɖe ɖoɖo siawo dzi o .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: Baba na mi ! Elabena ɖeko miele abe mia tɔgbui siwo wu nyagblɔɖila siwo nɔ anyi tsa ̃ va yi la ene .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Hlɔ ̃ dolawo ! Mieda asi ɖe nu si mia fofowo wɔ la dzi be enyo . Nenema ke ko miawo ha ̃ miawɔ . ”

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Nu si Mawu gblɔ tso mia ŋu la enye be , ‘ Maɖo nyagblɔɖilawo kple apostolowo ɖe mi . Ke miawu ɖewo eye mianya ɖewo de gbe . ’

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: ” Woatsɔ nya ɖe mi dzidzime sia ŋu be miawoe wu Mawu ƒe nyagblɔɖilawo tso keke xexe sia me ƒe gɔmedzedze ke .

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , woabu fɔ mi be miawoe wu ame siwo kata ̃ wowu tso Abel dzi va se ɖe Zakaria , ame si wowu le vɔsamlekpui kple kɔkɔeƒe la dome la dzi . Le nyateƒe me la , woatsɔ fɔbubu sia ada ɖe mia dzi . ”

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: Baba na mi Senyalawo elabena mieɣla nyateƒe la ɖe amewo . Esi miawo ŋutɔ miegbe nu le egbɔ ta la , miexea mɔ na ame bubuwo bena womakpɔ mɔ axɔ nyateƒe la dzi ase o . ”

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Esi wo ̀ do go tso afi ma la Farisitɔwo kple Agbale ̃ fialawo tsi tre ɖe eŋu vevie , eye wole biabia vovovowo biam

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: be woale ́ e le eƒe nuƒoƒo me .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ me la , ameha la dzi ɖe edzi akpeakpewo ale gbegbe be afɔɖoƒe meganɔ anyi o . Azɔ etrɔ ɖe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Mikpɔ nyuie le Farisitɔwo kple woƒe alakpanuwɔnawo ŋu . Wowɔa nu abe ame nyui ene evɔ wo vɔ ̃ ɖi ŋutɔ . Gake woƒe alakpanuwɔnawo ava dze go gbe ɖeka .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Ava dze go abe ale si nuʋa ̃ nu nana be abolowɔ hona ɖe dzi hlodzoo ene .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Nu sia nu si miegblɔ le viviti me la , woasee le kekeli me , eye nu si mietsɔ do dali ̃ le miaƒe xɔga ̃ wo me la , woaɖe gbeƒa ̃ e be ame sia ame nase . ”

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , migavɔ ̃ na ame siwo di be yewoawu mi o . Ŋutila ̃ la koe woate ŋu awu , ke womekpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe mi ́ aƒe luʋɔwo ya dzi o .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Gake magblɔ ame si wo ̀ le be miavɔ ̃ la na mi ; eyae nye Mawu ame si si ŋuse ̃ le be wo ̀ ate ŋu awu ame atsɔe aƒu gbe ɖe dzomavɔ me .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: ” Ho nenie akpakpa atɔ ̃ xɔna ? Menye sidi ʋee aɖe koe oa ? Woƒe home mede naneke kura o ɖe ? Gake Mawu meŋlɔa wo dometɔ ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ be o .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Mawu nya miaƒe taɖawo ƒe xexle ̃ me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . Migavɔ ̃ o , elabena miexɔ asi na Mawu sa ̃ a wu akpakpawo . ”

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: Medi be mana kakaɖedzi mi be , Nye , ame si tso Dziƒo la , made bubu mia ŋu le dutoƒo le mawudɔlawo ŋkume nenye be miawo ha ̃ mieʋu menye le anyigba sia dzi abe mia xɔlɔ ̃ ene .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Ke ame si ke gbe nu le gbɔnye le amewo gbɔ la , nye ha ̃ magbe nu le eya ha ̃ gbɔ le mawudɔlawo ƒe ŋkume .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: Nenye be ame aɖe ƒo nu vɔ ̃ ɖi le ŋunye la , ɖewohi ̃ woatsɔe akee , ke ame si agblɔ nya vɔ ̃ ɖi aɖe ɖe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋu la , womatsɔe akee gbeɖe o . ”

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: Nenye be wokplɔ mi va Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo kple woƒe ƒuƒoƒedzikpɔlawo ŋkume be yewoadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu mi la , migatsi dzi le nu si miagblɔ la ŋu o .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋutɔ ade nya si tututu miagblɔ la nu na mi ne ɣeyiɣia ɖo . ”

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Ame aɖe do ɣli tso ameawo dome gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , meɖe kuku na wo ̀ gblɔ na nɔvinyeŋutsua be wo ̀ ama fofonye ƒe nuwo me atsɔ tɔnye nam ? ”

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ŋutsu , ame kae ɖom miaƒe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ lae be matso nya sia ƒomevi me ?

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Kpɔ nyuie ! Me ̀ gatsi dzi be yeakpɔ nu si menye tɔwo ̀ o . ”

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Azɔ edo lo sia be , “ Agble nyui aɖe si wɔa nuku la nɔ gatɔ aɖe si .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Le nyateƒe me , eƒe nukuawo wɔ ale gbegbe be eƒe avawo kata ̃ yɔ fu ̃ u gba go eye megakpɔ nɔƒe na mamleawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . Ebu ta me le nu si wo ̀ awɔ la ŋu vevie ,

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: eye susu aɖe va nɛ mlɔeba . Edo ɣli gblɔ be , ‘ Menya nu si tututu mawɔ , magba ̃ nye ava xoxoawo eye matu esiwo lolo wu la ɖe wo teƒe ale be mate ŋu akpɔ nɔƒe na nye nukuawo kata ̃ .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Eye manɔ anyi agblɔ na ɖokuinye be , “ Nɔvi , e ̀ dzra nuɖuɖu geɖewo ɖo ɖi hena ƒe geɖe siwo gbɔna , eya ta xɔ gbɔgbɔ na ̃ ɖe dzi ɖe anyi , ɖu nu , nano nu eye na ̃ ɖu agbe nyuie . ”

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Gake Mawu gblɔ na kesinɔtɔ sia be , ‘ O , wo ̀ abunɛtɔ , egbe za ̃ sia me ke woaxɔ wo ̀ agbe le asiwo ̀ . Ke ame ka tɔ nu siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ dzra ɖo ɖi la azu ? ”

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be , ame sia ame si anye kesinɔtɔ le anyigba dzi , ke menye le dziƒo o la , abunɛtɔe . ”

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Migatsi dzi le nuɖuɖu kple nudodo alo avɔtata ŋu o ,

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: elabena nu vava ̃ wo le agbeme siwo hia ̃ boo tsɔ wu nuɖuɖu kple nutata .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Mikpɔ akpavia ̃ wo ɖa , womeƒa ̃ a nu o , womeŋea nu o , eye ava ɖeka ha ̃ mele wo si be woadzra nuɖuɖu ɖo ɖe eme o , gake wokpɔa woƒe gbe sia gbe nuɖuɖu , elabena Mawu ŋutɔ naa nuɖuɖu wo . Evɔ miawo la miele vevie na Mawu wu xeviwo kata ̃ !

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: ” Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , viɖe kae le dzimaɖeɖitsitsi me ? Nu nyui kae wo ̀ wɔna na ame ? Đe wo ̀ ate ŋu adzi wo ̀ agbemeŋkekewo ɖe edzi ŋkeke ɖeka ? Gbeɖe , esia mava eme o .

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Eye nenye be dzimaɖeɖi mate ŋu awɔ nu sue siwo megblɔ va yi o la , viɖe kae wo ̀ anye be miatsi dzimaɖeɖi ɖe nu ga ̃ wo ŋu ? ”

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Mikpɔ dzogbenyawo le baliwo me ɖa . Wometrea ɖeti alo lɔ ̃ a avɔ o , gake Salomo ame si nɔ atsyɔ ̃ ga ̃ me ha ̃ ƒe atsyɔ ̃ ɖoɖo mede seƒoƒo siawo tɔ nu kura o .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Nenye be Mawu taa avɔ na seƒoƒo siwo nɔa agbe ŋkeke ʋee aɖewo ko alea ɖe , miebu be mana avɔtata miawo ha ̃ oa ? , O mi dzimaxɔsetɔwo !

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Gawu la , migaɖe fu na mia ɖokuiwo le nuɖuɖu kple nunono ŋuti o , migana esia nakplɔ mi ade nuxaxa me o . Mawu ana wo mi .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Amegbetɔ siwo kata ̃ le xexeame la dagbana be yewoakpɔ gbe sia gbe nuɖuɖu , ke mia Fofo si le dziƒo nya miaƒe hiahia ̃ wo . "

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Ne mietsɔ dziƒofiaɖuƒea me yiyi wɔ miaƒe taɖodzinu gba ̃ tɔe la , Mawu ana nu siwo miehia ̃ gbe sia gbe la mi . ”

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: Eya ta migavɔ ̃ o , mi ale ̃ ha sue sia , elabena edzɔ dzi na mia Fofo si le dziƒo la ŋutɔ bena wo ̀ atsɔ dziƒofiaɖuƒe la na mi .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Midzra nu siwo le mia si eye miatsɔ ga la ana hia ̃ tɔwo , esia adzi miaƒe fetu si le dziƒo la ɖe edzi . Ne miedzra miaƒe kesinɔnuwo ɖo ɖe dziƒo , la fiafitɔ aɖeke mate ŋu afi wo o eye gbagbladza aɖeke ha ̃ mate ŋu aɖu wo o .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Afi si ne ̀ dzra wo ̀ kesinɔnuwo ɖo la , afi mae wo ̀ dzi kple wo ̀ susu bliboa nɔna . "

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: Midzra ɖo eye minɔ klalo na

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: miaƒe Aƒetɔ la ƒe tɔtrɔ gbɔ tso srɔ ̃ ɖekplɔ ̃ ɖoƒea . Ekema miate ŋu aʋu ʋɔa nɛ nenye be egbɔ va ƒoe .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ le klalo na eƒe gbɔgbɔ la , akpɔ dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe , elabena ana ame siawo anɔ kplɔ ̃ ŋu eye eya ŋutɔ ado subɔvi ƒe awu aɖo kplɔ ̃ ɖe woƒe akɔme be woaɖu nu .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Mienya ɣekaɣie wo ̀ ava o , ate ŋu ava le za ̃ ga asieke me loo alo za ̃ titina . Gake ne eva ɖo ko , dzi adzɔ eƒe dɔla siwo kata ̃ le klalo la . ”

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Ame sia ame anɔ klalo na eƒe vava nenye be wonya ga si me wo ̀ le vava ge . Đeko wo ̀ le abe ale si ame nanɔ ŋudzɔ na fiafitɔ ƒe vava nenye be enya ga si me tututu wo ̀ le vava ge ene .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Eya ta minɔ ŋudzɔ ɣeawo kata ̃ ɣi , elabena , Nye , Mesia la , mava le gaƒoƒo si me ame aɖeke manɔ mɔkpɔm nam o . ”

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Petro biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ awo ko ne ̀ le nya siawo gblɔm na loo alo ame sia ame . ”

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Aƒetɔ la ɖo ŋu nɛ be , “ Azɔ ame kae nye xɔnuvi nuteƒewɔla kple nunyala , ame si eƒe aƒetɔ atsɔ ɖo eƒe aƒemetɔwo nu be wo ̀ ana woƒe nuɖuɖu wo le enaɣi maha ̃ ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Eme anyo na dɔla ma ne eƒe aƒetɔ trɔ gbɔ va kpɔ be ewɔ eƒe dɔdeasia .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , aƒetɔ la atsɔe aɖo eƒe nuwo kata ̃ nu . ”

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Gake nenye be amea gblɔ le eƒe dzi me be , ‘ Nye aƒetɔ anɔ anyi ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe hafi agbɔ . ’ Eya ta wo ̀ de asi ame siwo wotsɔ de eƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te la ƒoƒo me , eye wo ̀ le aha mum la ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: eƒe aƒetɔ agbɔ le eƒe manyamanya me eye wo ̀ aɖee ɖa le nɔƒe kɔkɔ si wo ̀ dae ɖo eye wo ̀ adae ɖe ame mawɔnuteƒewo dome .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: Woahe to nɛ vevie ha ̃ elabena enya nu si wo ̀ le be wo ̀ awɔ gake egbe mewɔe o . ”

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Ame si menya be nane si wɔm yele la nye vɔ ̃ o la ƒe tohehe masese ̃ o . Ame si si wotsɔ nu geɖe dee la , wodi ŋutete geɖe tso egbɔ elabena nu si wotsɔ de eƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te la sɔ gbɔ . ”

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: ” Đe meva be made agbe yeye ƒe dzo anyigbadzitɔwo me . Ne ɖe mewu dɔ sia nu xoxo la , ne anyo ŋutɔ hafi .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Tsideta dziŋɔ aɖe le ŋgɔnye , eye anye nu si ate ɖe dzinye va se ɖe esime enu nava yi . ”

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Miebu be ŋutifafae metsɔ va anyigba dzia ? Gbeɖe , dzre kple domemama boŋ metsɔ vɛ .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Tso azɔ dzi yina la , ƒomewo me ama , akpa etɔ ̃ adze yonyeme , eye akpe eve atsi tre ɖe ŋunye . Alo akpa eve adze yonyeme eye akpa etɔ ̃ atsi tre ɖe ŋunye .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Vi kple tɔ ƒe gbe madze gbe dzi o le tanye , nenema ke adika aɖo vinyɔnu kple dadaa dome . Eye nenye be lɔ ̃ xo aɖe aɖo nu nyui aɖe be yeawɔ la , lɔ ̃ xoayɔvi atu afɔ eme . ”

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe ameha la ŋu azɔ eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Ne miekpɔ alili ̃ kpowo le ƒu ƒom ɖe ɣetoɖoƒe la , miegblɔna be , ‘ Agbafie le dzadza ge . ’ Eye wo ̀ dzana ha ̃ vava ̃ . ”

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Ne anyigbemeya de asi ƒoƒo me la miegblɔna be , ‘ Egbe la ŋdɔ le ʋuʋu ge sesi ̃ e . ’ Eye esia ha ̃ vaa eme .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Mi alakpanuwɔlawo ! Mienya be tsi le dzadza ge alo ŋdɔ le ʋuʋu ge to ŋkule ́ le ɖe yame ŋu me . Gake miegbe be yewomale ́ ŋku ɖe ʋunyaʋunya ga ̃ si gbɔna la ƒe dzesi si ƒo xla ̃ mi la ŋu o .

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: Nu ka tae wo ̀ le be miagbe be yewomakpɔ nu si nyo la na mia ɖokuiwo o ? ”

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Nenye be ame aɖe tsɔ nya ɖe ŋuwo ̀ eye ne ̀ kpɔe le mɔdzi wo ̀ yina ʋɔnu kple wo ̀ nya la , tɔe eye na ̃ le ́ avu le mi kplii dome . Ne menye nenema o la , ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la ade wo ̀ mɔ .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Eye ne wode wo ̀ mɔ la , a ̃ nɔ afi ma va se ɖe esime na ̃ xe fe siwo kata ̃ ne ̀ nyi la wo ̀ avɔ keŋkeŋ . ”

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi me la , ame aɖewo gblɔ ale si Pilato na be wowu Yudatɔ aɖewo siwo tso Galilea le esime wonɔ vɔ sam na Mawu le gbedoxɔ me le Yerusalem la nɛ .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Yesu trɔ bia ameawo be , “ Đe miebu be ame siwo wowu la ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo sɔ gbɔ wu Galileatɔ bubuwo tɔ tae wowu wo ɖoa ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Gbeɖe , mele eme nenema o ! Miawo ha ̃ minya be yewoatsrɔ ̃ alea ke , nenye be miegbe be yewomele nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzudzɔ ge adze Mawu yome o . ”

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Aleke miebu tso ame wuienyi siwo dzi Silɔm gbetakpɔxɔ la mu dze woku la ŋu ? Woawoe nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ga ̃ tɔwo wu le Yerusalem maha ̃ ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Gbeɖe , menye woawoe o . Miawo ha ̃ miatsrɔ ̃ nenye be miegbe be yewomadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ o . ”

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Azɔ Yesu yi dzi do lo sia be , “ Ŋutsu aɖe do kutsetseti aɖe ɖe eƒe abɔ me , eye wo ̀ vaa atia te edziedzi be yeakpɔ be etse ku aɖe maha ̃ , gake mekpɔa kutsetse aɖeke le edzi o .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Mlɔeba la , egblɔ na abɔdzikpɔla be nela ̃ atia ƒu anyi . Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu dzikutɔe be , ‘ Melala ʋuu ƒe etɔ ̃ sɔŋ gake ati sia metse ku ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ kpɔ o ! Nu ka ta magana wo ̀ anɔ te ? Mate ŋu ado nuku bubu ɖe teƒe si wo ̀ xɔ la ɖe ? ”

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: ” Abɔdzikpɔla la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , na wo ̀ aganɔ anyi ƒe ɖeka kpɔ . Matrɔ asi le eŋu nyuie agbugbɔ aɖu ado ɖe ete .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Nenye be etse ku la , enyo , ke ne metse ku o la mala ̃ e , ƒu anyi . ’ ”

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu nɔ nu fiam le Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe le Sabat ŋkekea dzi la ,

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: ekpɔ nyɔnu aɖe si nɔ dɔ le ́ m vevie ƒe wuienyi sɔŋ . Dɔle ́ le la na be wo ̀ xa gobaa ale be mate ŋu adzɔ ɖe tsitre nu o .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Yesu yɔe va eɖokui gbɔe eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nyɔnu e ̀ vo tso wo ̀ dɔle ́ le la si me ! ”

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Azɔ eka asi eŋu eye enumake nyɔnua ƒe dɔa vɔ nɛ eye wo ̀ dzɔ ɖe tsitre ka . Nyɔnua kpɔ dzidzɔ ale gbegbe be wo ̀ da akpe hekafu Mawu !

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe kplɔla si nɔ ƒuƒoƒe ma dzi kpɔm la do dziku vevie le nu si Yesu wɔ la ta elabena eyɔ dɔ na nyɔnua le Sabat ŋkekea dzi . Edo ɣli gblɔ na ameha la be , “ Ŋkeke ade sɔŋ le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me esiwo dzi woawɔ dɔ le , esiae nye ŋkeke siwo dzi wo ̀ le be na ̃ va woayɔ dɔ wo ̀ , ke menye le Sabat ŋkeke dzi o ! ”

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu bena , “ Mi alakpanuwɔlawo ! Đe mieɖea ka miaƒe nyiwo le woƒe kpowo me le Sabat dzi eye miekplɔawo yina ɖanaa tsi wo wonona oa ? Esia ha ̃ nye dɔwɔwɔ le Sabat ŋkekea dzie .

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ke nu vɔ ̃ wo ̀ nye nye ya mewɔ , be meɖe ga Yuda nyɔnu sia si Satana bla ƒe wuienyi sɔŋ la ? ”

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Eƒe nya siawo na be ŋu kpe eƒe futɔwo kata ̃ eye ame sia ame kpɔ dzidzɔ le nukunu ga ̃ siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ wɔ la ta .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Azɔ egade asi nufiafia amewo me le mawufiaɖuƒe la ŋuti . Ebia wo be , “ Aleke mawufiaɖuƒe la le ? Nu ka ŋue mi ́ ate ŋu atsɔe asɔ ɖo ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Ele abe atiku sue aɖe si wodo ɖe agble me ene . Atiku sia tsi kabakaba heva zu ati kɔkɔ aɖe eye wo ̀ ɖe alɔwo fu ̃ u eye xeviwo va wɔ atɔ ɖe wo me . ”

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Egabia ake be , ‘ Nu ka ŋu matsɔ mawufiaɖuƒe la asɔ ɖo ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Eɖi nuʋãnu si nyɔnu aɖe tsɔ de abolomɔ me eye wo ̀ wɔ dɔ to abolomɔ blibo la me va se ɖe esime wo ̀ ʋa ̃ nyuie .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Azɔ Yesu nɔ tsatsam le du kple kɔƒewo me nɔ nu fiam amewo , ke ekpɔ egbɔ be yenɔ tetem ɖe Yerusalem ŋu .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Ame aɖe va egbɔ va biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , ame ʋee aɖewo koe le ɖeɖe kpɔ gea ? ” Eɖo eŋu na wo be , “

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: Miʋli be miage ɖe eme to agbo bii la me , elabena ame geɖewo adi be yewoage ɖe eme , ke mele gblɔm be womate ŋui o .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Nenye be aƒetɔ tsi tre hetu ʋɔa eye mietsi tre ɖe egodo , de asi eƒoƒo me hele gbɔgblɔm be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , ʋu ʋɔa na mi . ’ “ Ke aɖo eŋu na mi be , ‘ Nyemenya mi kple afi si mietso o . ’ ”

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Miawo miaɖo eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Mi kpli wo ̀ mi ́ ede asi agba ɖeka me ɖu nu kpɔ eye ne ̀ fia nu le miaƒe ablɔwo dzi ha ̃ kpɔ . ’ ”

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Ke agaɖo eŋu na mi be , ‘ Megblɔe na mi be , nyemenya mi o . Miate ŋu ava me o , elabena nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo mienye . Midzo le afi ma . ’ ”

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Miafa avi aɖu aɖukli le esime miele tsitre ɖe xexe le Abraham , Isak , Yakob kple nyagblɔɖila siwo kata ̃ le mawufiaɖuƒea me la kpɔm ɖo ɖa .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Amewo atso xexeame ƒe dzogoe eneawo kata ̃ me ava nɔ woƒe nɔƒewo le afi sia .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Mina nya sia nanɔ susu me na mi be , ame siwo womebuna ɖe naneke me fifia o la , axɔ bubu ga ̃ aɖe le dziƒo , eye ame siwo nye ame ŋkutawo le afi sia la , womabu wo ɖe naneke me le afi ma o . ”

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Farisitɔ aɖewo va gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ne e ̀ di be yeatsi agbe la , ekema dzo le afi sia elabena Fia Herodes le diwo ̀ m be yeawu . ”

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Miyi ɖagblɔ na ayetɔ ma bena manɔ gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo nyanya dzi , eye mawɔ nukunu geɖewo , ayɔ dɔ amewo egbea kple etsɔ . Ke le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la , ma ̃ wu nye dɔ nu eye maɖo afi si yim mele .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: E ̃ , egbea , etsɔ kple ŋkeke si akplɔe ɖo la , ma ̃ wu nye dɔ nu ! Elabena menyo be Mawu ƒe nyagblɔɖila aɖeke naku ɖe afi aɖeke tsɔ wu Yerusalem o .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ” O , Yerusalem , Yerusalem ! Du si me tɔwo wua nyagblɔɖilawo eye woƒua kpe ame siwo woɖo ɖa be woakpe ɖe wo ŋu la . Zi geɖe la , medina vevie bena maƒo mia viwo nu ƒu abe ale si koklonɔ ƒoa viawo nu ƒui ɖe eƒe aʋala te ene , gake mieɖe mɔ nam o .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Fifia miaƒe aƒee ma zu aƒedo . Miegale kpɔnye ge o , va se ɖe esime miado dzaa nam agblɔ be , ‘ Woayra ame si gbɔna le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ me . ’ ”

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Gbe ɖeka le Sabat dzi , Yesu yi nuɖuƒe le Farisitɔwo ƒe amega ̃ aɖe ƒe aƒe me , eye wonɔ ŋku le ́ m ɖe eŋu vevie .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Afi ma ŋutsu aɖe si nɔ tetedɔ le ́ m la dze ŋgɔe .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ke Yesu bia Farisitɔ kple Senyala siwo nɔ tsitre ɖe afi ma be , “ Ele se nu be woada gbe le ame ŋu le Sabat ŋkekea dzia ? ”

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Womeɖo biabia la ŋu nɛ o , ale Yesu le ́ dɔnɔa ƒe alɔnu eye woda gbe le eŋu . Emegbe la , eɖe mɔ nɛ wo ̀ dzo .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yesu gatrɔ ɖe ameawo ŋu bia wo be , “ Mia dometɔ kae mewɔa dɔ le Sabat ŋkeke dzi o . Nenye be evia alo eƒe nyi ge dze do me le Sabat ŋkekea dzi ɖe , meɖenɛ enumake oa ? ”

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Ameawo mete ŋu ɖo biabia sia ha ̃ ŋu nɛ o .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Yesu kpɔ be ame siwo kata ̃ wokpe be woava ɖu nua nɔ didim vevie be yewoanɔ kplɔ ̃ a ta . Le esia ta exlɔ ̃ nu wo gblɔ be ,

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: “ Nenye be wokpe wo ̀ ɖe srɔ ̃ ɖekplɔ ̃ ŋu la , me ̀ gaʋli bena yeanɔ kplɔ ̃ ta o , elabena ne ame ŋkuta aɖe si ŋu bubu le wu wo ̀ la va la ,

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: ne edzɔ nenema la ame , si kpe wo ̀ la akplɔe va afi si ne ̀ nɔ eye wo ̀ agblɔ na wo ̀ bena , “ Tso na ̃ tsɔ wo ̀ nɔƒe na ame sia . ’ Esia ana be ŋu akpe wo ̀ , eye na ̃ yi aɖanɔ zikpui sia zikpui si le kplɔ ̃ a ƒe nuwuwu lɔƒo la dzi . ”

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Nu si boŋ wo ̀ le be na ̃ wɔ enye esi , yi ɖanɔ teƒe aɖe le kplɔ ̃ a ƒe nuwuwu , eye ne ame si kpe wo ̀ ŋutɔ kpɔ wo ̀ la , ava gblɔ na wo ̀ be , ‘ Nɔvi , mi ́ egble ̃ nɔƒe nyui aɖe ɖi na wo ̀ ! ’ Ale wo ̀ ade bubu ŋuwo ̀ le ame siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ kpe la ŋkume .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ame sia ame si dina be ye ŋutɔ yeade bubu ye ɖokui ŋu la , woabɔbɔe ɖe anyi , eye ame si abɔbɔ eɖokui la , woade bubu eŋu . ”

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Azɔ etrɔ ɖe ame si kpee ɖe kplɔ ̃ ŋu la gbɔ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ne e ̀ ɖo kplɔ ̃ la megakpe xɔ ̃ wo ̀ wo , nɔviwo ̀ wo kple wo ̀ ƒometɔwo kple kesinɔtɔwo o . Elabena woawo ha ̃ ava kpe wo ̀ ɖe kplɔ ̃ ŋu emegbe .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Boŋ la , kpe ame dahewo , tekunɔwo , la ̃ metututɔwo kple ŋkunɔwo .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Ekema le ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe tsitretsitsi ŋkekea dzi la , Mawu ŋutɔ axe fe na wo ̀ be e ̀ wɔ dɔmenyo na ame siwo mate ŋu aɖo eteƒe na wo ̀ o . ”

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ŋutsu aɖe si nɔ kplɔ ̃ a ŋu kple Yesu la se nya siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ gblɔ , ale wo ̀ gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Mɔnukpɔkpɔ ga ̃ blibo ka wo ̀ anye be ame nakpɔ mɔ age ɖe mawufiaɖuƒe la me ! ”

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Yesu ɖo eƒe nya la ŋu nɛ be , “ Ŋutsu aɖe ɖo kplɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe eye wo ̀ kpe ame geɖewo .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Esi nu sia nu sɔ gbe vɔ be wɔnawo nadze egɔme la , edɔ eƒe subɔvi ɖe ame siwo wo ̀ kpe la gbɔ be wo ̀ aɖayɔ wo vɛ .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
