text2: Gake ame sia ame de asi taflatsɛdodo me esi subɔvi la yi . Ame ɖeka do taflatsɛ be yeƒle anyigba aɖe eye yedi be yeayi aɖale ́ ŋku ɖe eme eya ta yemate ŋu ava o .

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Bubu ha ̃ do taflatsɛ be , yeƒle nyitsu ewo be woawɔ dɔ le yeƒe agble me eya ta yeyina wo do ge akpɔ .

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Ame bubu ha ̃ gado taflatsɛ be nyitsɔ laa ko yeɖe srɔ ̃ eya ta yemate ŋu agble nyɔnua ɖi ava o . ”

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Subɔvi la trɔ va gblɔ nya siwo ameawo gblɔ la na eƒe aƒetɔ . Dɔme ve aƒetɔa ŋutɔ eya ta edɔ eƒe subɔvi la wo ̀ yi dua ƒe ablɔwo dzi kple kpɔdomeewo ɖayɔ nubialawo , tekunɔwo , la ̃ metututɔwo kple ŋkunɔwo va kplɔ ̃ a ŋui .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Togbɔ be wo ̀ wɔ esia ha ̃ la , teƒe ganɔ kplɔa ŋu ko . ”

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Aƒetɔ la gagblɔ na subɔvia be , “ Enyo , yi dua ƒe mɔ ga ̃ wo dzi , kple kpɔwo godo eye naƒoe ɖe ame siwo kata ̃ nakpɔ la nu bena woava , be aƒea me nayɔ .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Elabena ame siwo kata ̃ mekpe gba ̃ la ƒe ɖeke maɖɔ nu siwo meɖa na wo la ƒe ɖeke kpɔ o . ”

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Ame geɖe ŋutɔ nɔ Yesu yome nɔ yiyim . Ale wo ̀ trɔ ɖe wo ŋu hegblɔ na wo be .

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: “ Ame si di be yeanɔ yonyeme la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ alɔ ̃ m wu fofoa , dadaa , srɔ ̃ a , viawo , nɔvia ŋutsu alo nɔvia nyɔnu . E ̃ , le nyateƒe me ele nɛ be wo ̀ alɔ ̃ m wu eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ , ne menye nenema o la , mate ŋu anye nye nusrɔ ̃ la o .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ame si matsɔ eƒe atitisoga akplɔm ɖo o la , mate ŋu anye nye nusrɔ ̃ la o . ”

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: “ Ne ame aɖe be yeanɔ yonyeme la , ele be wo ̀ abu eŋuti kpɔ nyuie hafi . Ame kae aɖo be yeatu xɔ ke mawɔ akɔnta tso ga home si wo ̀ agble ̃ la ŋu eye wo ̀ akpɔe ɖa be ga si le ye si la ade xɔa tutu nu o maha ̃ ?

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Ne mewɔ nenema o , wo ̀ ɖo xɔa ƒe gɔmeɖokpewo la , akpɔe be ga megale ye si yeayi etutu dzi o . Ale amewo kata ̃ akoe ! ”

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: Woaɖu fewu ha ̃ le eŋu be , ‘ Mikpɔ ame ma ɖa ! Eyae dze xɔ ma tutu gɔme gake mete ŋu wu enu hafi ga vɔ le esi o . ’

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: ” Alo fia kae atso kpla ko ayi aʋa ke mayɔ eƒe aɖaŋudelawo be woawɔ akɔnta le futɔwo ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ ŋu akpɔe ɖa be yeƒe asrafo akpe ewo ate ŋu aɖu futɔwo tɔ akpe blaeve dzi o ?

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Nenye be wo ̀ akpɔe be yeƒe asrafowo mate ŋu aɖu dzi o la , adɔ ame ɖo ɖe futɔwo gbɔ be wo ̀ awɔ ŋutifafa kple wo hafi woava ɖo eƒe du gbɔ .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ale ame aɖeke mate ŋu anye nye nusrɔ ̃ la o , negbe ɖe wo ̀ nɔ anyi gba ̃ , bu eƒe kesinɔnuwo kata ̃ ŋu eye wo ̀ gbe nu le wo gbɔ ɖe tanye hafi !

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: ” Ŋudɔwɔnu kae dze , si bu eƒe vivi la ganye ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Dze si bu eƒe vivi la meganyo na naneke o , menyo na aɖudodo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . Đeko wo ̀ le be woatsɔe aƒu gbe . Miɖo to nyuie , nenye be miedi be yewoase nu si mewɔnɛ la gɔme . ”

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Dugadzɔla mawɔnuteƒewo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔla adodoewo va ɖoa to Yesu ƒe mawunya zi geɖe .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Esia na Farisitɔwo kple agbale ̃ fialawo gali ̃ liʋiliʋi ̃ geɖe le Yesu ŋu elabena wobu be edea ha kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔla siwo nye ame ɖigbɔ ̃ wo , heɖua nu kpli wo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Esia na be Yesu do lo sia na wo be ,

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: “ Nenye be ale ̃ alafa ɖeka le asiwo ̀ eye ɖeka tra mɔ yi gbeme hebu ɖe magble ̃ blaasieke - vɔ - asieke mamlɛa ɖe gbea dzi aɖadi ɖeka ma va se ɖe esime ne ̀ ke ɖe eŋu oa ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Eye nenye be e ̀ kpɔe la , a ̃ kɔe ɖe abɔta kple dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe ayi aƒee .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Ne e ̀ ɖo aƒe la , a ̃ yɔ wo ̀ aƒelikawo kple xɔlɔ ̃ wo be woava kpɔ dzidzɔ kple ye elabena e ̀ kpɔ wo ̀ ale ̃ si bu la .

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: ” Nenema kee dziƒonɔlawo akpɔ dzidzɔ le nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ɖeka pɛ si dzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ la ŋu tsɔ wu ame blaasieke - vɔ - asieke siwo mehiã na dzimetɔtrɔ o . ”

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: Mise lododo sia ha ̃ ɖa . Klosaloga ewo nɔ nyɔnu aɖe si eye wo ̀ bu ga vevi siawo dometɔ ɖeka . Đe nyɔnu sia masi akaɖi adi ga la le eƒe aƒe ƒe dzogoewo kata ̃ me kple ɣaɣlaƒewo kata ̃ va se ɖe esime wo ̀ kpɔe oa ?

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Eye ne ekpɔe ɖe , mayɔ eƒe aƒelikawo kple exɔlɔ ̃ wo be woava akpɔ dzidzɔ kpli ye oa ?

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Nenema kee mawudɔlawo kpɔa dzidzɔe nenye be nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ɖeka dzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ . ”

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Yesu yi edzi gblɔ be , “ Viŋutsu eve nɔ ŋutsu aɖe si .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , suetɔ va gblɔ na fofoa be , ‘ Medi be na ̃ tsɔ domenyinu si le tɔnye zu ge la nam fifia , nyemate ŋu alala va se ɖe esime na ̃ ku hafi o . ’ Fofoa lɔ ̃ ɖe eƒe nya la dzi eye wo ̀ ma eƒe nuwo me hetsɔ etɔ nɛ .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Le ŋkeke ʋee aɖewo megbe la , ɖevi suetɔ ƒo eƒe nuwo kata ̃ nu ƒu eye wo ̀ dzo yi du didi aɖe me . Egble ̃ eƒe ga kata ̃ le afi ma le gbolowo yomenɔnɔ kple agbe kɔkɔ ɖuɖu me .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Esime ga vɔ le esi teti ko la , dɔ dziŋɔ aɖe to le anyigba ma dzi , ale dɔ de asi ewuwu me .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Eya ta eɖe kuku na agbledela aɖe be wo ̀ axɔ ye yeanɔ eƒe hawo dzi kpɔm nɛ .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Dɔ wu ɖekakpui sia ale gbegbe be nu siwo hawo ɖuna la dzroe be wo ̀ aɖu elabena mekpɔa naneke ɖuna o . ”

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Eyi eɖokui me eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , ‘ A , subɔvi siwo le fofonye ƒeme gɔ ̃ ha ̃ kpɔa nu ɖuna wo ̀ sua wo nyuie eye ɖe gakpɔtɔna gɔ ̃ ha ̃ , ke nye ya mele afii le kukum le dɔwuame ta ! ”

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Mayi aƒe aɖagblɔ na fofonye be , “ Fofo , mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖe dziƒo kple ŋutiwo ̀ ,

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: eye nyemegadze be na ̃ yɔm be viwo ̀ o , meɖe kuku xɔm abe wo ̀ subɔviwo dometɔ ɖeka ko ene . ”

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: ” Ale wo ̀ trɔ ɖo ta aƒe . Hafi wo ̀ aɖo aƒea me la , fofoa kpɔe le adzɔge ɖaa wo ̀ gbɔna . ” Eƒe dɔme trɔ ɖe eŋu ale wo ̀ ƒu du heyi ɖawɔ atuu nɛ hegbugbɔ nu nɛ .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: ” Đevia gblɔ na fofoa be , ‘ Fofo , meɖe kuku mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖe dziƒo kple ŋuwo ̀ , eye nyemegadze be manye viwo ̀ o . ’ ”

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Gake fofoa gblɔ na eƒe subɔviwo be , ‘ Miyi ɖatsɔ awu nyuitɔ si le aƒea me la vɛ mi ́ ado nɛ kaba ! Ne miatsɔ asigɛ kple afɔkpa va do nɛ .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Miwu nyivi dami si le nyikpoa me ha ̃ . Ele be mi ́ aɖo kplɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe akpɔ dzidzɔ .

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Elabena vinye sia ku eye wo ̀ gagbɔ agbe . Ebu eye megakpɔe . ’ Kplɔ ̃ ɖoɖoa kple dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ dze egɔme enumake . ”

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ me la , nɔvia tsitsitɔ ya nɔ dɔ wɔm le agble me . Esi wo ̀ trɔ gbɔna va aƒe me la , ese ʋuƒoƒo kple hadzidzi ƒe ɖiɖi le aƒea me ,

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: ale woyɔ subɔvi ɖeka hebiae be , nu kae le edzi yim le aƒea me ?

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Subɔvi la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Nɔviwo ̀ e gbɔ , eye fofowo ̀ wu nyivi si mi ́ ele nuɖuɖu namii be wo ̀ ada ami la , heɖo kplɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe be woatsɔ do dzidzɔe ɖe eŋu be etrɔ gbɔ dedie . ’ ”

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Dɔme ve viŋutsuvi tsitsitɔ la ŋutɔ eya ta egbe be yemage ɖe aƒea me o . Fofoa yi ɖaɖe kuku nɛ be wo ̀ age ɖe aƒea me .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Gake via gblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Mewɔ dɔ na wo ̀ kple nye ŋutetewo kata ̃ ƒe geɖe . Nyemegbe dɔ na wo ̀ zi ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ kpɔ o , ke me ̀ na gbɔ ̃ vi ɖeka tetim kpɔ be matso ne nye kple xɔ ̃ nyewo miaɖa nu aɖu akpɔ dzidzɔ o .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Gake esi viwo ̀ sia yi ɖagble ̃ wo ̀ ga ɖe gbolowo ŋu trɔ gbɔ la , e ̀ wu nyivi damitɔ kekeake si le mi ́ a si la tsɔ ɖo kplɔ ̃ e nɛ . ’ ”

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: Fofoa gblɔ nɛ be , “ Kpɔɖa , vinye lɔlɔ ̃ a , nye kpliwo ̀ mi ́ eli xoxoxo . Nu sia nu si le asinye la tɔwo ̀ e .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Gake enyo be mi ́ akpɔ dzidzɔ , elabena nɔviwo ̀ e . Azɔ eku eye wo ̀ gagbɔ agbe , ebu eye mi ̃ egafɔe . ”

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Yesu do lo sia na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Kesinɔtɔ aɖe xɔ gakɔntametola aɖe be wo ̀ akpɔ eƒe ganyawo dzi nɛ . Ke eteƒe medidi o la , eva se be gakɔntametolaa nye ame fiti aɖe ŋutɔ .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: ” Le esia ta kesinɔtɔ la yɔe gblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Nya kawoe nye esiawo mese le ŋuwo ̀ be e ̀ le nye nuwo fim ? Wɔ akɔnta le ga siwo kata ̃ ne ̀ xɔ la ŋu nam , elabena tso egbea dzi la menya wo ̀ le dɔ me . ’

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: ” Gakɔntametola la yi ta me se ̃ e eye wo ̀ bia eɖokui be , ‘ Nu ka mawɔ fifia ? Wonyam le afi sia , evɔ ŋuse ̃ ha ̃ mele ŋunye be mayi aɖawɔ dɔ sese ̃ aɖeke o , eye nyemate ŋu abia nu ha ̃ o elabena esia aɖe dzinye kpɔtɔ akpa .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Menya nu si mawɔ ! Ele be madi xɔlɔ ̃ wo fu ̃ u , esiwo gbɔ maɖu nu le ne medzudzɔ dɔa . ’ ”

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Ale wo ̀ yɔ eƒe aƒetɔ ƒe fenyilawo ɖeka ɖekae . Ebia gba ̃ tɔ be , ‘ Ho neni ƒe fe ne ̀ nyi le nye aƒetɔ ŋu ?

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Eɖo eŋu be , “ Amitimi kilolita etɔ ̃ ” . “ Gakɔntametola gblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Tsɔ wo ̀ fegbale ̃ gba ̃ tɔ , nɔ anyi kaba eye na ̃ trɔe wo ̀ azu kilolita ɖeka kple afa ̃ . ’ ”

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Tete wo ̀ bia ame evelia be , ‘ Fe nenie wo ̀ ya ne ̀ nyi ? ’ “ Eɖo eŋu be , wɔ memi kilolita blaetɔ ̃ - vɔ - atɔ ̃ . ” Egblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Tsɔ wo ̀ fegbale ̃ eye na ̃ ŋlɔ kilolita blaetɔ ̃ .

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: ” Aƒetɔ la kafu nuteƒemawɔla sia le eƒe aɖaŋudzedze ta . Eye enye nyateƒe be ame siwo le xexe sia me la dze aye le nu madzɔmadzɔ wɔwɔ me tsɔ wu ame siwo vɔ ̃ a Mawu . ”

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi be mitsɔ anyigbadzinu madzɔmadzɔwo dze xɔlɔ ̃ woe na mia ɖokui , ne wo nu va yi vɔ la , woaxɔ mi ɖe aƒe mavɔ la me . ”

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Ame si te ŋu wɔ nuteƒe le nu suetɔ me la , ate ŋu awɔ nuteƒe le nu geɖewo ha ̃ me , eye ame si nye nu madzɔmadzɔ wɔla le nu suetɔ me la , anye nu madzɔmadzɔ wɔla le nu geɖewo ha ̃ me .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Ne amewo mekana ɖe mia dzi ɣeaɖekeɣi le xexemekesinɔnuwo ŋuti o la , ame kae atsɔ dziƒo nu xɔasi vava ̃ wo ade mia si ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Eye nenye be mieɖia anukware le ame bubuwo ƒe nu siwo wotsɔ de mia si me o la , aleke wɔ woatsɔ ga ̃ si nye wo ̀ ŋutɔ tɔwo ̀ la ade asi na wo ̀ ? ”

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Ame aɖeke mate ŋu asubɔ aƒetɔ eve o . Agbe nu le ɖeka gbɔ eye wo ̀ atsɔ nyateƒetoto kple lɔlɔ ̃ na evelia . Miate ŋu asubɔ Mawu kple ga o . ”

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Farisitɔ siwo lɔ ̃ a ga vivivo la se nya siawo kata ̃ eye woɖo hehe ɖe Yesu ta .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Miewɔa mia ɖokuiwo abe ame kɔkɔe deblibowo ene le amewo ƒe ŋkume , gake Mawu nya miaƒe dzimesusu vɔ ̃ ɖiwo . ” Miaƒe alakpanuwɔwɔ na be amewo tsɔa bubu na mi , gake enye ŋunyɔnu le Mawu ƒe ŋkume .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: Hafi Yohanes Mawutsidetanamela nadze mawunya gbɔgblɔ gɔme la , Mose ƒe sewo kple nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe gbedeasiwo koe kplɔa mi . Gake Yohanes tsɔ nyanyui sia vɛ be , mawufiaɖuƒe la gbɔna kpuie . Eye fifia la , ame geɖe ŋutɔ le ʋiʋlim vevie be yewoage ɖe eme .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Gake esia mefia be sea ƒe ŋuse ̃ dzi ɖe kpɔtɔ le mɔ aɖeke nu o . Ŋuse ̃ gale eŋu eye wo ̀ le te sesi ̃ e abe dziƒo kple anyigba ene .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: ” Eya ta ne ame aɖe gbe srɔ ̃ a eye wo ̀ ɖe nyɔnu bubu la , ewɔ ahasi , eye ame si ha ̃ ɖe nyɔnu si ŋu woɖe asi le la ha ̃ wɔ ahasi . ”

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: Yesu do lo sia be , “ Ŋutsu kesinɔtɔ aɖe nɔ anyi , ame sia doa awu xɔasiwo eye wo ̀ nɔa dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ dzi gbe sia gbe .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Ŋutsu dahe aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Lazaro , ame si ƒe ŋuti yɔ fu ̃ u kple abiwo eye wo ̀ nye nubiala la va mlɔa kesinɔtɔ sia ƒe agbo nu .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Emlɔ afi sia henɔ mɔ kpɔm be nuɖuɖu kakɛ aɖe ava ka ye si tso kesinɔtɔ la ƒe nuɖukplɔ ̃ dzi . Avuwo va nɔa eƒe abiwo me ɖuɖɔm le agboa nu .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Mlɔeba la Lazaro nubiala la va ku eye mawudɔlawo va kɔe yi Abraham gbɔ afi si ame dzɔdzɔewo nɔna . Kesinɔtɔ la ha ̃ ku mlɔeba eye woɖii .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: Eƒe lu ̃ ʋɔ yi ɖe dzomavɔ me . Esi wo ̀ nɔ fu kpem le afi ma la , ekpɔ Lazaro ɖaa le Abraham gbɔ .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: ” Edo ɣli sesi ̃ e be , ‘ Fofo Abraham , kpɔ nye nublanui ! Dɔ Lazaro ɖa be wo ̀ ade eƒe asibidɛ tsi me atsɔ ge ɖe nye aɖe dzi be nye dzi nafa vie , elabena nye veme ƒu kplakplakpla le dzo ga ̃ sia me . ’ ”

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Gake Abraham gblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Ŋutsu , ɖo ŋku edzi bena le wo ̀ agbeme ŋkekewo me la , e ̀ kpɔ nu sia nu si ne ̀ di , ke naneke menɔ Lazaro ya si o . Ale le afi sia la , ekpɔ akɔfafa , ke wo ̀ ya e ̀ le vevesese me .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , ʋe ga ̃ aɖe le mi ́ kpli wo ̀ dome , ale be ne ame aɖe be yeatso afii ava mia gbɔ la , ʋe la gbɔ ko wo ̀ ava se eye ame aɖeke ha ̃ mate ŋu atso mia gbɔ ava mi ́ a gbɔ o . ’ ”

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Ale kesinɔtɔ la gblɔ be , ‘ Fofo Abraham , ekema dɔ Lazaro ɖe fofonye ƒeme

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: elabena nɔviŋutsu atɔ ̃ bubuwo gale megbea bena wo ̀ agbe nya na wo tso agbe si ƒomevi wole la ŋu be ne woawo ha ̃ va ku la , womava dzomavɔ sia me o . ’

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: ” Abraham ɖo eŋu be , ‘ Mose kple Nyagblɔɖilawo le wo gbɔ , woaɖo to woawo .

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: ” Egblɔ be , ‘ Ao , Fofo Abraham , nenye be ame aɖe atso ame kukuwo dome ayi wo gbɔ la , woatrɔ dzime .

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: ” Egblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Nenye be womaɖo to Mose kple Nyagblɔɖilawo o la , ne ame aɖe fɔ tso ame kukuwo dome gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , mate ŋu aƒoe ɖe wo nu woaxɔe o . ’ ”

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Yesu gblɔ na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Tetekpɔ ava mia dzi ɖaa be miawɔ nu vɔ ̃ gake baba na ame si ate nɔvia kpɔ . ”

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Enyo nɛ be woatsɔ kpe ga ̃ aɖe atsi ɖe kɔ nɛ , eye woatsɔe ƒu gbe ɖe atsiaƒu me wu esi wo ̀ aɖia ɖevi sue siawo dometɔ ɖeka nu wo ̀ awɔ nu vɔ ̃ .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Eya ta minɔ ŋudzɔ . “ Ne nɔviwo ̀ wɔ nu vɔ ̃ la , ka mo nɛ eye ne etrɔ le eƒe dzime la , tsɔe kee .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Ne e ̀ da vo ɖe ŋuwo ̀ zi adre le ŋkeke ɖeka dzi eye wo ̀ va zi adre va gblɔ be , ‘ Metrɔ dzime la , ekema tsɔe kee . ”

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Le ɣebubuɣi la , apostoloawo gblɔ na Aƒetɔ la be , “ Mi ́ edi be mi ́ aƒe xɔse nase ̃ ŋu ɖe edzi . Fia nu si mi ́ awɔ la mi ́ . ”

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nenye be xɔse le mia si lolo abe kutsetse suetɔ kekeake ene la , ate ŋu ana be miaɖe gbe na ati ga ̃ sia be neho yi ɖadze ƒu me eye wo ̀ awɔ miaƒe gbe dzi . ”

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: Mia dometɔ ka ƒe dɔla anɔ agble ŋlɔm alo le ale ̃ kplɔm eye wo ̀ trɔ tso agble va aƒe me eye wo ̀ agblɔ na dɔla be , ‘ Va nɔ anyi eye naɖu nu ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Ke magblɔ nɛ boŋ be , ‘ Wɔ nye fie ̃ nuɖuɖu , dzra ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖo eye na ̃ va subɔm le nye kplɔ ̃ ŋuti maɖu nu eye mano nu , le esia megbe wo ̀ ha ̃ na ̃ ɖu nu , na ̃ no nu oa ?

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Đe wo ̀ ada akpe na dɔla la elabena ewɔ nu si wogblɔ nɛ be newɔa ?

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Alea kee nenye be mieɖo tom la , mele be miabu be , ele be makafu mi o , elabena miaƒe dɔdeasi ko miewɔ ! ”

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Esi wonɔ woƒe mɔzɔzɔ dzi ɖo ta Yerusalem la , wova ɖo Galilea kple Samaria ƒe liƒo dzi .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Woge ɖe kɔƒe aɖe me eye le afi ma la , wokpɔ kpodɔle ́ la ewo wonɔ tsitre ɖe adzɔge nɔ ɣli dom be ,

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: ” Aƒetɔ Yesu , kpɔ nublanui na mi ́ ” .

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Yesu trɔ kpɔ wo hegblɔ na wo be , “ Miyi ɖe Osɔfowo gbɔ miatsɔ mia ɖokuiwo fia be yewo ŋuti kɔ ! ” Esi wonɔ mɔa dzi yina la , wokpɔe be kpodɔ la bu le yewo ŋu .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Wo dometɔ ɖeka trɔ va Yesu gbɔ kple dzidzɔ henɔ ɣli dom be , “ Woakafu Mawu , elabena nye la ̃ me se ̃ . ”

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Edze klo ɖe Yesu ƒe akɔme le anyigba eye wo ̀ da akpe nɛ le esi wo ̀ yɔ dɔe ta . Ame sia nye Samariatɔ , ame siwo womebuna ɖe naneke me o .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Yesu biae be , “ Menye ŋutsu ewo ŋue meda gbe le oa ? Asieke mamleawo ya ɖe ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Nu ka ta wo ̀ nye amedzro sia koe trɔ va be yeakafu Mawu ? ”

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na ŋutsua be , “ Tso na ̃ dzo , wo ̀ xɔsee da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ . ”

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Farisitɔwo va bia Yesu be “ Ɣekaɣie mawufiaɖuƒea le egɔme dze ge ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Mawufiaɖuƒea mava kple dzesi siwo miakpɔ kple ŋku o .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Miate ŋu agblɔ be , edze egɔme tso afi sia alo dukɔ la ƒe akpa kemɛ o . Elabena mawufiaɖuƒe la le mi ́ a dome xoxo . ”

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Emegbe la , Yesu gaƒo nu le nu sia ŋu na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Ɣeyiɣi aɖe gbɔna esi miadim be manɔ mia gbɔ ŋkeke ɖeka pɛ ko . Gake nyemanɔ anyi o . ”

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Amewo ava gblɔ na mi be metrɔ gbɔ eye mele afii alo afi mɛ . Migaxɔ wo dzi se o , eye migayi be yewoadim o . ”

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Elabena ne matrɔ gbɔ la , mianya kokoko . Nye tɔtrɔ gbɔ adze nyuie abe ale si dzi kea dzo le alili ̃ kpowo mee ene , be ame sia ame nakpɔe .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Gake gba ̃ la , ele be makpe fu vevie eye dukɔ blibo sia nagbe nu le gbɔnye . ”

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Hafi matrɔ agbɔ la , xexeame anɔ abe ale si wo ̀ nɔ le Noa ŋɔli pɛpɛpɛ ene .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Amewo nɔ nutsu ɖum , nɔ srɔ ̃ ɖem eye agbe vivi ɖuɖu nɔ edzi vevie va se ɖe esime Noa ge ɖe eƒe aɖakaʋu la me eye tsiɖɔɖɔ va tsrɔ ̃ ame bubuawo kata ̃ . ”

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: ” Xexeame anɔ abe ale si wo ̀ nɔ le Lɔt ƒe ŋkekewo me ene . Ame sia ame nɔ eƒe gbe sia gbe dɔ wɔm pɛpɛpɛ . Wonɔ nu ɖum , nɔ nu nom , wonɔ asi ƒlem , wode agble , tu xɔ ga ̃ wo

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: va se ɖe ŋdi si Lɔt dzo le Sodom . Eye dzo kple dzokpexɔxɔwo dza tso dziƒo hetsrɔ ̃ ameawo kata ̃ . ”

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: E ̃ , nenema ke amewo anɔ woƒe dɔwo dzii va se ɖe esime gaƒoƒo si dzi matrɔ gbɔ la naɖo .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: ” Ame siwo manɔ aƒe gbe ma gbe o la , megatrɔ yi aƒe me be yewoaƒo ƒu yewoƒe nuwo o . ” Ame siwo le agble la megaxa trɔ yi aƒe me le dua me o .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Miɖo ŋku nu si dzɔ ɖe Lɔt srɔ ̃ dzi !

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Ame sia ame si adi vevie be yeatsi agbe la aku eye ame si aku la , atsi agbe .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Le za ̃ ma me la , ame eve amlɔ abati ɖeka dzi eye woava kplɔ ɖeka dzoe agble ɖeka ɖi .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Nyɔnu eve woanɔ wɔ tum le teƒo , woaxɔ ɖeka , eye woagble evelia ɖi .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ame eve lanɔ agble me woatsɔ ɖeka agble evelia ɖi .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , afi kae woakplɔ wo ayi ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Afi si wotsɔ nu kukuwo ƒu gbe ɖo la , afi mae akagawo ha ̃ nɔna ! ”

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Yesu do lo sia na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be wo ̀ atsɔ fia wo be ehi ̃ a be woanɔ gbedodoɖa dzi atraɖii va se ɖe esime woxɔ ŋuɖoɖo na woƒe biabiawo .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la aɖe nɔ du ga ̃ aɖe me . Ame sia mevɔ ̃ a Mawu o , eye mebua ame aɖeke ha ̃ ɖe naneke me o .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Ahosi aɖe si ha ̃ nɔ dua me la vaa ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la sia gbɔ gbe sia gbe va nɔ kuku ɖem nɛ be wo ̀ atso afia na ye le ye kple ŋutsu aɖe si dze agɔ le ye dzi la ƒe nya me .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: ” Hena ɣeyiɣi aɖe la , egbe be yemaɖo toe o . Ke mlɔeba la egblɔ na eɖokui bena , ‘ Togbɔ be nyemevɔ ̃ a Mawu alo bua amewo ɖe naneke me o ha ̃ la ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: le ahosi sia ƒe fuɖeɖe nam atraɖii ta la , makpɔ egbɔ be wotrɔ nu si nye etɔ la nɛ ale be magana be nu nati kɔ nam le eƒe fuɖeɖe nam ta o ! ’ ”

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Yesu yi edzi be , “ Nenye be woɖe fu na ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la vɔ ̃ ɖi sia va se ɖe esime wo ̀ lɔ ̃ be yeawɔ nu si wobia tso esi la , ɖe

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: miebu be Mawu matso afia na via siwo le kuku ɖem nɛ za ̃ kple keli la oa ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Le nyateƒe me , a ̃ ɖo woƒe biabiawo ŋu na wo enumake . Gake biabia lae nye be , Nenye be nye Mesia la , metrɔ gbɔ ɖe , ame nenie makpɔ siwo ƒe xɔse anɔ te eye woanɔ gbedodo ɖa dzi ? ”

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Azɔ Yesu do lo sia na ame aɖewo siwo dana eye womekpɔa ame bubuwo ɖe naneke me o la be ,

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: “ Ame eve aɖewo yi gbedoxɔ me be woado gbe ɖa . Đeka nye Farisitɔ eye evelia nye nudzɔla aɖe .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Farisitɔ la do gbe ɖa be , ‘ Meda akpe na Mawu be , nyemenye nu vɔ ̃ wɔla abe ame bubuwo ene o , vevitɔ abe nudzɔla si le afi mɛ ɖa ene o . ” Elabena nyemebaa ame o , nyemewɔa ahasi o ,

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: meblaa nu zi eve le kɔsiɖa ɖeka me , eye metsɔa nye nukpɔkpɔwo ƒe ewolia naa Mawu . ’ ”

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Gake nudzɔla la nɔ tsitre ɖe adzɔge afi aɖe ke eye wo ̀ de mo to heƒo eƒe akɔta kple vevesese do gbe ɖa kple ɣli be , ‘ Mawu , kpɔ nublanui na nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔla sia . ’

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi bena , nudzɔla sia trɔ yi aƒe me kple dzidzɔ elabena wotsɔ eƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kee ! Ke wometsɔ Farisitɔ la ƒe nu vɔ ̃ kee o , elabena woabɔbɔ dadalawo kata ̃ ɖe anyi eye woado ame siwo bɔbɔa wo ɖokui la ɖe dzi . ”

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , dzila aɖewo kplɔ wo viwo vɛ be Yesu nada asi ɖe wo dzi ayra wo . Gake nusrɔ ̃ lawo nya wo ɖa be woadzo .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Ke Yesu yɔ ɖeviawo va eɖokui gbɔe eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Mina ɖevi suewo nava gbɔnye eye migaxe mɔ na wo o , elabena ame sia tɔgbiwo tɔe nye mawufiaɖuƒe la .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , mele gblɔm na mi be , ame si maxɔ mawufiaɖuƒe la abe ɖevi sue ene o la , mage ɖe eme gbeɖe o . ”

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , Yudatɔwo ƒe kplɔla ɖeka biae be , “ Nufiala nyui , nu kae mawɔ be mayi dziƒo ? ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Yesu biae be , “ Ebu be e ̀ nya nu si gblɔm ne ̀ le esi ne ̀ yɔm be ame nyuia ? Le nyateƒe me la , ame aɖeke menyo o , negbe Mawu ɖeka ko .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Ke le wo ̀ biabia ŋu la , magblɔ be e ̀ nya seawo xoxo be , me ̀ gawɔ ahasi o , me ̀ gafi fi o , me ̀ gawu ame o , me ̀ gada alakpa o , bu fofowo ̀ kple dawo ̀ , kple bubuawo . ”

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mewɔ ɖe se siawo kata ̃ dzi tso keke nye ɖevime ke . ”

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Esusɔ nu vevi ɖeka na ̃ wɔ , yi na ̃ dzra nu siwo kata ̃ le asiwo ̀ eye na ̃ tsɔ ga la na ame dahewo ; esia anye kesinɔnu na wo ̀ le dziƒo , ekema va na ̃ dze yonyeme . ”

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Gake esi ŋutsua se nya sia la , etrɔ dzo nublanuitɔe , elabena kesinɔtɔ ga ̃ aɖe wo ̀ nye .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesu nɔ eyome kpɔm esi wo ̀ yina eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Asese ̃ na kesinɔtɔ ŋutɔ be wo ̀ age ɖe mawufiaɖuƒe la me !

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Anɔ bɔbɔe na kposɔ be wo ̀ ato abi ƒe vo me ado , tsɔ wu be kesinɔtɔ nage ɖe mawufiaɖuƒea me . ”

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ame siwo le afi ma se nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la gblɔ be , “ Nenye be esese ̃ alea ɖe , ekema ame ka koŋ ate ŋu akpɔ ɖeɖe sia ? ”

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Eɖo eŋu be , “ Mawu ate ŋu awɔ nu si amegbetɔ mate ŋu awɔ o ! ”

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mi ́ awo la mi ́ egble mi ́ aƒe aƒewo kple nu sia nu ɖi dze yowo ̀ me . ”

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Esia le me vava ̃ eye ame sia ame si gble eƒe aƒe , srɔ ̃ a , nɔviawo , dzilawo alo viawo ɖi ɖe mawufiaɖuƒea ta la ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: akpɔ fetu geɖe fifia , eye wo ̀ akpɔ agbe mavɔ ha ̃ le xexeme si le vava ge la me . ”

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Eyɔ nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo va eɖokui gbɔ , gblɔ na wo be , “ Abe ale si mienyae ene la , mi ́ eyina Yerusalem . Ne mi ́ eɖo afi ma la , nyagblɔɖi siwo kata ̃ nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ ɖi tso ŋutinye la le eme va ge .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Woatsɔm ade asi na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo be woaɖu fewu le ŋunye , ado ŋukpem nyuie , woaɖe ta ɖe ŋunye ,

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: aƒom eye woawum . Eye le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la mafɔ tso ku me . ” "

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo mese eƒe nya siwo wo ̀ gblɔ la ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ gɔme o , elabena edze abe ele nu ƒom na wo le lododo me ene .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Esi wote tu Yeriko la , wokpɔ nubiala ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ aɖe wo ̀ nɔ mɔ to nɔ nu biam le mɔzɔlawo si .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Esi wo ̀ se ameha aɖe ŋkɔ wo ̀ va yina la , ebia ame aɖe be wo ̀ agblɔ nu si nɔ dzɔdzɔm la na ye .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Amea gblɔ nɛ be , " “ Yesu Nazaretitɔ lae va yina . ”

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ale wo ̀ de asi ɣlidodo me be , “ Yesu David Vi la , kpɔ nye nublanui ! ”

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ame siwo nɔ Yesu ŋgɔ la di be yewoaɖo asi ŋkuagba ̃ tɔa dzi , gake ɖeko wo ̀ gado ɣlia sesi ̃ e wu be , “ David Vi , kpɔ nye nublanui . ”

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Esi Yesu va ɖo afi si wo ̀ nɔ la , etɔ , eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Mikplɔ ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ ma va afii . ”

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: Esi wo ̀ va la , Yesu biae be , “ Nu ka dim ne ̀ le tso asinye ? ” Ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ la ɖe kuku nɛ gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ medi be makpɔ nu ! ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Enyo wo ̀ ŋkuwo neʋu na ̃ kpɔ nu . Wo ̀ xɔse da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ . ”

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Ŋutsua de asi nukpɔkpɔ me enumake eye wo ̀ dze Yesu yome henɔ Mawu kafum . Ame siwo kata ̃ kpɔ nu si dzɔ la ha ̃ kafu Mawu .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Yesu ge ɖe Yeriko du la me eye wo ̀ zɔ to dua me .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Ŋutsu aɖe nɔ dua me , ame si ŋkɔe nye Zaxeo . Enye nudzɔlawo ƒe amega ̃ eye wo ̀ nye kesinɔtɔ ha ̃ .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Ame sia di be yeakpɔ Yesu , gake mete ŋui o , esi wo ̀ nye ame kpui ta , eye amehawo ha ̃ ƒo xla ̃ e .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Le esia ta eƒu du dze wo ŋgɔ , yi ɖalia ati kɔkɔ aɖe si le mɔa to , be yeakpɔe tso afi ma .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Esi Yesu va ɖo atia te la , ewu mo dzi kpɔ Zaxeo le atia me . Eyɔ eŋkɔ be , “ Zaxeo , ɖi kaba ! Elabena madze aƒewo ̀ me egbe . ”

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Zaxeo ɖi le atia dzi kaba eye wo ̀ kplɔ Yesu yi eƒemee le dzidzɔ ga ̃ aɖe me .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Nu sia medzɔ dzi na ameha la o . Woli ̃ liʋiliʋi ̃ gblɔ be , “ Eyi be yeadze nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ga ̃ sia ƒeme . ”

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Le aƒea me la , Zaxeo gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Aƒetɔ tso azɔ la , matsɔ nye kesinɔnuwo ƒe afa ̃ na ame dahewo , eye ne mexɔ ga le ame aɖe si wu ale si wo ̀ le be maxɔ la , maɖo eteƒe nɛ zigbɔzi ene sɔŋ ! ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Egbe xɔxɔ va aƒe sia me , elabena ame sia ha ̃ la , Abraham vi wo ̀ nye .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Elabena Amegbetɔvi la va be yeadi eye yeaɖe ame siwo bu . ”

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ tetem ɖe Yerusalem ŋu la , edo lo aɖe si awɔe be amewo nagabu be mawufiaɖuƒe la le egɔme dze ge enumake o . Egblɔ be ,

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: “ Bubume aɖe si nɔ nutome aɖe me le anyigba aɖe dzi la xɔ du be wo ̀ ava anyigba la ƒe du ga ̃ tɔ me , ale be woatsɔe aɖo fiae ɖe eƒe nutometɔwo nu .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Hafi wo ̀ adzo la , eyɔ eƒe dɔlawo dometɔ ewo ƒo ƒui eye wo ̀ tsɔ ga sidi akpe eve na wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe be wo ̀ atsɔ anɔ asi tsamii hafi yeagbɔ .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Gake eteviwo le ́ fui eye wodɔ amewo ɖo ɖe eyome gblɔ be , “ Mi ́ ele ame sia dim be wo ̀ aɖu fia ɖe mi ́ a dzi o . ”

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Togbɔ be ele alea ha ̃ la , woɖoe fiae eye wo ̀ trɔ gbɔ va aƒe . Tete wo ̀ dɔ be woayɔ eƒe subɔla siwo wo ̀ tsɔ ga na la be yeakpɔe ɖa be wowɔ ga la ŋudɔ kpɔ viɖe aɖe maha ̃ . ”

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Ame gba ̃ tɔ wɔ akɔnta eye wo ̀ gblɔ ale si wo ̀ kpɔ viɖe teƒe ewo ɖe edzi la nɛ . ”

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Fia la kafui gblɔ be , ‘ Enyo ŋutɔ ! E ̀ ɖi anukware le nu sue si metsɔ na wo ̀ me , eye abe wo ̀ fetu ene la , matsɔ du ewo ade wo ̀ dzikpɔkpɔ te . ’ ”

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Ame evelia ha ̃ kpɔ viɖe ŋutɔ . Ekpɔ viɖe teƒe atɔ ̃ ɖe ga si wotsɔ nɛ la dzi .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Eƒe aƒetɔ gblɔ nɛ be , ‘ Esia ha ̃ nyo ! Matsɔ du atɔ ̃ ade wo ̀ dzikpɔkpɔ te . ’

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: ” Ame etɔ ̃ lia ya gbugbɔ ga la vɛ pɛpɛpɛ . Mekpɔ viɖe aɖeke ɖe edzi o . Egblɔ be , ‘ Metsɔ ga la dzra ɖo na wo ̀ be wo ̀ anɔ dedie ,

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: elabena mevɔ ̃ be a ̃ bia viɖe tso asinye , evɔ wo ̀ nya ɖe wo ̀ sese ̃ , e ̀ xɔa nu si menye tɔwo ̀ o le amewo si akpasese ̃ tɔe . E ̀ xɔa amewo ƒe agblewo le wo si akpasese ̃ tɔe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ’

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Fia la do dɔmedzoe hegblɔ na dɔla vɔ ̃ ɖi la be , ‘ Wo ̀ kuviatɔ , e ̀ be menye ŋutase ̃ la . Wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ nuƒoƒoe matsɔ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo ̀ e . Ne e ̀ nya nyuie be ŋutase ̃ la menye ɖe ,

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: nu ka tae me ̀ tsɔ ga la da ɖe gadzraɖoƒe bena wo ̀ ahe viɖe vi aɖe teti vɛ nam o ? ”

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Etrɔ ɖe ame mamle siwo le tsitre la gbɔ eye wo ̀ ɖe gbe na wo be , ‘ Mixɔ ga la le esi , ne miatsɔe na ame si kpɔ viɖe geɖe ɖe etɔ dzi la . ’

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , ‘ Aƒetɔ , ga geɖe le ame ma si xoxo ɖe ! ’

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Fia la ɖo eŋu be , ‘ Ele eme nenema , gake enye nyateƒe matrɔmatrɔ be , ame siwo si nu le la , woawoe agakpɔ nu ɖe edzi eye ame si si nu sue aɖe le la , abu sue si le esi la gɔ ̃ ha ̃ le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe me .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Azɔ le nye futɔ siwo tsi tre ɖe ŋunye gome la , mikplɔ wo va ŋkunyemee ne miatso ta le wo nu . ’

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Esi Yesu wu lo sia dodo nu la , edze nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋgɔ ɖo ta Yerusalem .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Esi wova ɖo Betfage kple Betania , du siwo le Amito dzi me la , edɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la eve be woadze ŋgɔ ayi kɔƒe si le wo ŋgɔ la me .

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Ebe ne woge ɖe kɔƒea me la , woatsa ŋku na tedzi aɖe si wode kae ɖe mɔto la . Enye tedzivi si ame aɖeke medo kpɔ o . Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Ne miekpɔe la , mitu kae ne miakplɔe va afii .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Eye ne ame aɖe bia mi nu si ta miele ka tumii la , migblɔ ko be , ‘ Aƒetɔ la hia ̃ e . ’ ”

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Wokpɔ tedzivi la abe ale si Yesu gblɔe ene

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: eye esi wonɔ ka tumii la , nutɔwo va wo gbɔ va bia wo be , “ Nu kae ma wɔm miele ? Nu ka tae miele ka tum mi ́ aƒe tedzivia ? ”

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo eŋu na wo dzaa be , “ Aƒetɔ la hia ̃ e . ”

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Ale wokplɔ tedzivi la vɛ na Yesu eye woɖo woƒe avɔwo ɖe edzi be wo ̀ anɔ edzi .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ yiyim la , amewo tsɔ woƒe avɔwo keke ɖe mɔƒo me nɛ .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Azɔ esi wo ̀ gogo teƒe si woɖia Amito la ƒe aga lena la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒe ha blibo la de asi Mawu kafukafu me kple gbe sesi ̃ e le nukunu siwo wokpɔ la ta ,

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: gblɔ bena , “ Woayra Fia si gbɔna le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔa me ! ” “ Ŋutifafa le dziƒo , eye ŋutikɔkɔe le dziƒo boo ! ”

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Gake Farisitɔ aɖewo siwo nɔ ameawo dome la gblɔ na Yesu be ; “ Aƒetɔ , na be ameawo nadzudzɔ nya siawo gbɔgblɔ ! ”

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Eɖo ŋu na wo be , “ Nenye be ameawo zi ɖoɖoe ha ̃ la , kpe siwo le mɔto afii la ade asi aseyetsotso me . ”

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Esi wote ɖe Yerusalem ŋu eye wo ̀ kpɔ dua la , e ̀ fa avi ɖe eŋu ,

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Wo ̀ ha ̃ , ne ɖe na ̃ nya nu si na ŋutifafa wo ̀ le ŋkeke sia me hafi , ke eɣla ɖe wo ̀ ŋkuwo fifia .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Wo ̀ futɔwo aƒu kpo ɖe wo ̀ gliwo ŋu , aɖe to ɖe wo ̀ eye woadze dziwo ̀ ,

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: atugu wo ̀ , agba ̃ wo ̀ gudugudu elabena e ̀ gbe mɔnukpɔkpɔ si Mawu na wo ̀ be nadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ la . ”

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Azɔ Yesu ge ɖe gbedoxɔ la me eye wo ̀ de asi asiƒlelawo nyanya me .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Egblɔ na wo be ; “ Mawunya gblɔ be , ‘ Nye gbedoxɔ la enye gbedoɖaƒe ’ , gake miawo la , mietsɔe wɔ fiafitɔwo ƒe nɔƒee ! ”

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Le esia megbe la , efia nu le gbedoxɔ la me gbe sia gbe , gake Osɔfoga ̃ wo , agbale ̃ fialawo kple ame ŋkuta siwo le dua me la nɔ mɔnu dim bena yewoaɖe eƒe agbe ɖa .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Ke womekpɔ mɔ si dzi woato o , elabena ame sia ame kloe lɔ ̃ e vevie eye eƒe nyawo sɔ tome na wo ŋutɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ nu fiam amewo eye wo ̀ nɔ nyanyui la gblɔm na wo le gbedoxɔ la me le ŋkeke mawo dometɔ ɖeka dzi la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo kple dumega ̃ wo va ƒo xla ̃ e heɖe ɖeklemi kplii .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Wobiae be , “ Ame kae na ŋuse ̃ wo ̀ be na ̃ nya asitsalawo do goe le gbedoxɔa me ? ”

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Eɖo eŋu be , “ Nye ha ̃ mabia biabia ɖeka mi hafi maɖo miaƒe biabia ŋu na mi .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Biabia lae nye , ‘ Yohanes ƒe mawutsideta la ɖe , Mawu gbɔe wo ̀ tso loo alo eya ŋutɔe tsɔe ɖo eɖokui dzi nɔ nu si dze eŋu la wɔma ? ”

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Wodzro biabia la me le wo ɖokuiwo dome kpɔ hegblɔ be , “ Ne mi ́ egblɔ be Mawue dɔe ɖa la , ekema mi ́ ede mi ́ a ɖokuiwo nya me , elabena abia mi ́ be , ‘ Nu ka tae mi ́ exɔ edzi se o mahã ? ’

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Ne mi ́ egblɔ ha ̃ be menye Mawue dɔe ɖa o la , ekema ameha la kata ̃ awɔ funyafunya mi ́ , elabena woxɔe se vevie be Yohanes nye nyagblɔɖila . ”

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Mlɔeba la , woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mi ́ enya afi si wo ̀ tso o . ”

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ale Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Ekema nye ha ̃ nyemaɖo miaƒe biabia la ŋu na mi o . ”

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Yesu gatrɔ ɖe ameha la gbɔ eye wo ̀ do lo sia na wo be , “ Ŋutsu aɖe de waingble eye wo ̀ tsɔe de agbledela bubuwo si hedzo yi du didi aɖe me afi si wo ̀ nɔ ƒe geɖe .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Esi nuŋeɣi ɖo la , edɔ eƒe dɔla ɖeka ɖo ɖe agbledelawo gbɔ be wo ̀ ava xɔ waintsetsea ƒe akpa si nye etɔ gome la vɛ . Gake agblea dzikpɔlawo ƒo dɔla la vevie eye wogbugbɔe ɖo ɖa asi ƒuƒlu .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Agbletɔ la gadɔ dɔla bubu ɖa gake wowɔ eya ha ̃ nenema , woƒoe , dzui nyuie eye wonyae dzoe asi ƒuƒlu .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Agbletɔ la gadɔ ame etɔ ̃ lia ɖo ɖe agblea dzikpɔlawo gbɔ ake , gake eya ha ̃ kpɔ nuteƒe abe ame gba ̃ tɔ eveawo ene . Wode abi eŋu eye wonyae ɖe du nu wo ̀ do go le agblea me heyi aƒe asi ƒuƒlu . ”

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Agbletɔ la gblɔ na eɖokui azɔ be , ‘ Menya nu si mawɔ ! Madɔ vinye ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ la ɖe wo gbɔ . Meka ɖe edzi be woade bubu eya ŋu . ’ ”

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Gake esi agblea dzikpɔlawo kpɔ via wo ̀ gbɔna la , wogblɔ be , ‘ Nu si dim mi ́ ele la va ɖo . Ame si ava nyi eƒe dome nenye be megali o lae nye esi va do ! Mina mi ́ awui bena eƒe domenyinua nazu mi ́ atɔ . ’

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Ale wole ́ e , hee le anyigba do goe le waingblea me heyi ɖawu . ” Yesu bia ameha la be , “ Nu ka miebu be agbletɔ la awɔ ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Magblɔe na mi . Agbletɔa ava eye wo ̀ ana woawu ame vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo eye wo ̀ atsɔ waingble la de ame bubuwo ƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te . ” Ameha la gblɔ nɛ be , “ Agbledzikpɔlawo mate ŋu awɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖi sia ƒomevi o ɖe . ”

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Yesu kpɔ wo du ̃ u hegblɔ be , “ Ke nu kae mawunya wɔnɛ esi wogblɔ be , ‘ Kpe si xɔtulawo gbe la , eyae va zu kpe si wotsɔ ɖo dzogoe na xɔa ’ ? ”

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Ame sia ame si akli kpe sia la , aŋe afɔ . Ke ame si dzi wo ̀ age adze la , agba ̃ gudugudu . ” "

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Esi osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo se ŋutinya si Yesu gblɔ la , wodi be yewoale ́ e enumake , elabena wonya be yewo ŋutie wo ̀ gblɔe ɖo . Woawoe nye agbledzikpɔla vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo le ŋutinya la me . Gake wovɔ ̃ bena ne yewo ŋutɔ yewole ́ e la , ahe ʋunyaʋunya vɛ .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Esi wonɔ mɔnu dim le eŋu ta la , wodɔ ame aɖewo ɖe egbɔ bena woawɔ wo ɖokuiwo abe ame dzɔdzɔewo ene eye woabia biabiawoe .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Wova Yesu gbɔ va gblɔ nɛ be , " “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ enyae be nufiala anukwaretɔe ne ̀ nye . E ̀ toa nyateƒe ɣesiaɣi eye me ̀ kpɔa ame aɖeke ha ̃ ŋkume o , ke boŋ e ̀ fiaa nu si nye Mawu ƒe mɔwo .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Azɔ gblɔ wo ̀ susu na mi ́ tso nya sia ŋuti . Enyo be mi ́ adzɔ nu na Kaisaro loo alo menyo o . ”

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Yesu kpɔ aye si wɔm ameawo nɔ la dze sii eya ta wo ̀ gblɔ be ,

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: “ Mitsɔ kɔba ɖeka nam makpɔ ɖa . Ame ka ƒe tatae nye sia le kɔba sia dzi ? Eye ame ka ƒe ŋkɔe le tata la te ? ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Kaisaro si nye Roma duwo kata ̃ dziɖula ƒe tatae . ”

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Egblɔ na wo be , “ Ekema mitsɔ nu siwo kata ̃ nye Kaisaro tɔ la nɛ eye mitsɔ nu siwo kata ̃ nye Mawu tɔ la na Mawu ! ”

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Ale mɔ si wotre nɛ be wo ̀ aɖee le ameha la ŋkume la mete ŋu ɖee o . Eƒe nyaŋuɖoɖo la wɔ nuku na wo ale gbegbe be ɖoɖoe zi le wo nu .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Azɔ Zadukitɔ aɖewo , ame siwo xɔe se be ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi aɖeke meli o la

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: va Yesu gbɔ kple nya sia be , “ Mose ƒe se gblɔ be nenye be ŋutsu aɖe ɖe srɔ ̃ gake wo kple srɔ ̃ a medzi vi hafi wo ̀ ku o la , nɔvia ŋutsu naɖe ahosia eye vi si woadzi la anye ame si ku la tɔ , eye wo ̀ ava xɔ ɖe eteƒe nenye be eva tsi .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Mi ́ enya ƒome aɖe , si me ɖekakpui adre nɔ . Tsitsitɔ ɖe srɔ ̃ gake medzi vi aɖeke hafi ku o .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Ame si dzɔ ɖe eyome la ɖe ahosia gake eya ha ̃ medzi vi kplii hafi trɔ megbe o .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Nu sia yi dzi ʋuu va se ɖe esime ɖekpakpui adreawo kata ̃ ɖe ahosia kpɔ gake ɖeke medzi vi kplii hafi ku o .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Nyɔnua ha ̃ va ku mlɔeba .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Azɔ mi ́ aƒe biabia lae nye be , Ame ka srɔ ̃ e nyɔnu sia anye nenye be wofɔ tso ku me ? Elabena ŋutsuawo kata ̃ ɖee kpɔ ! ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ame siwo le agbe le xexe sia mee woɖo srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe anyi na .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Gake ame dzɔdzɔe siwo woafɔ ɖe tsitre yi dziƒo la , womaɖe srɔ ̃ o .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Womagaku ha ̃ o , ale woanɔ abe mawudɔlawo ene , eye woanye Mawu viwo , elabena wofɔ wo ɖe tsitre yi agbe yeye mee .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Ke le ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi ŋuti la , Mose gɔ ̃ ha ̃ gblɔe fia le ŋuve mumu si nɔ bibim la gbɔ , esi woyɔ Mawu be , ‘ Abraham ƒe Mawu , Isak ƒe Mawu kple Yakob ƒe Mawu . ’

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Ke menye ame kukuwo ƒe Mawu wonye o , ke boŋ ame gbagbewo tɔe , elabena le eya gbɔ la , wo kata ̃ wole agbe nɛ . ”

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Sefialawo dometɔ aɖewo gblɔ be , “ Nufiala , egblɔe nyuie ŋutɔ ! ”

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Ale wodzudzɔ woƒe biabiawo elabena dzi megale wo ƒo be woagabia nya ɖekee o .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Azɔ Yesu tsɔ biabia sia ɖo woƒe ŋkume be , “ Nu ka tae wogblɔ be Kristo Mesia la nye Fia David ƒe vi ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Elabena David ŋutɔ gblɔ le Psalomowo ƒe Agbale ̃ me be , “ Aƒetɔ la gblɔ na nye Aƒetɔ be . Bɔbɔ nɔ nye nuɖusi me ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: va se ɖe esime matsɔ wo ̀ ketɔwo awɔ wo ̀ afɔɖodzinu . ”

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: David yɔe be , “ Aƒetɔ ” Aleke wɔ wo ̀ aganye via ?

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋu le esime ameha la nɔ to ɖomii eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be ,

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: “ Mikpɔ nyuie le agbale ̃ fiala siawo ŋuti , elabena woɖoa atsyɔ ̃ ga ̃ wo nɔa yiyim , eye ne wole ablɔ dzi la , wodina be amewo nabɔbɔ ado gbe na yewo bubutɔe . Wolɔ ̃ a teƒe kɔkɔwo nɔnɔ le ƒuƒoƒewo kple aza ̃ bubuwo ɖuƒe .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Ke ne wole woƒe gbe didi mawo dom ɖa hele atsyia dem eme la , woganɔa susu wɔm le ale si woawɔ aba ahosi dahewo la ŋuti . Eya ta Mawu ƒe tohehe ga ̃ tɔ le wo lalam . ”

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ tsitre ɖe gbedoxɔ la me la , enɔ ŋku le ́ m ɖe ale si kesinɔtɔwo le woƒe nunanawo dam ɖe nudzɔɖaka la me dadatɔe ŋuti .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Ke ekpɔ ahosi dahe aɖe ha ̃ va eye wo ̀ da pesewa eve ko ɖe nua me .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Yesu kpɔe du ̃ u eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Le nyateƒe me ne wotsɔ nunalawo kata ̃ ƒe nunanawo ƒo ƒui la , ahosia ƒe nunana sɔ gbɔ sa ̃ a wu wo tɔ .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Elabena nenem gatɔ siawo tsɔ nu si womehia ̃ o la ƒe sue aɖe ko vana eye togbɔ be ahosi sia , da ahe alea ha ̃ la , etsɔ nu sia nu si le esi la na faa . ”

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ la aɖewo nɔ nu ƒom le atsyɔ ̃ ga ̃ si woɖo na gbedoxɔ la ŋuti . Wokpɔ ŋudzedze le nɔnɔmetata siwo wota ɖe gliawo ŋu kple akpedanunana vovovo siwo wotsi ɖe gliawo ŋu la ŋu ŋutɔ .

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Ɣeyiɣi aɖe li gbɔna esime woagba ̃ nu siwo kafum miele la . Woagba ̃ e ale gbegbe be kpe ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ magasusɔ ɖe nɔvia dzi o . Nu sia nu akaka azu kpo kɔkɔ aɖe ɖe afi si gbedoxɔa le . ”

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Wo kata ̃ wodo ɣli biae be , “ Aƒetɔ ! Ɣekaɣie esiawo ava eme ? Dzesi kae ado ŋgɔ na nu siawo ? ”

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Eɖo ŋu na wo be , “ Migana be ame aɖeke naflu mi o ! Elabena ame geɖewo ava aɖe gbeƒa ̃ be yewoe nye Mesia la , eye woanɔ gbɔgblɔm be , ‘ Ɣeyiɣi ɖo azɔ . ’ Gake migaxɔ wo dzi se o !

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Eye ne miese be aʋa dzɔ eye ʋunyaʋunyawo ha ̃ dze egɔme la , dzidzi megaƒo mi o . Nyateƒe ele be aʋawo nadzɔ , gake nuwuwua mava enumake o .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Elabena dukɔ atsi tre ɖe dukɔ ŋu , eye fiaɖuƒe akpe akɔ kple fiaɖuƒe .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Anyigba aʋuʋu sesi ̃ e le teƒewo , eye dɔ ato vevie le teƒe bubuwo ha ̃ . Dɔvɔ ̃ geɖewo akaka ɖe xexeame , eye nu dziŋɔ geɖewo ado ɖe dziƒo ŋu .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: ” Gake hafi nu siawo kata ̃ nava dzɔ la , woati mia yome vevie eye woahe mi ayi woƒe ƒuƒoƒewo kple gaxɔwo me , woakplɔ mi ayi ʋɔnui le fiawo kple gɔvina ga ̃ wo gbɔe . Woawɔ esiawo kata ̃ ɖe mia ŋu le tanye .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Nu siawo anye mɔnukpɔkpɔ tɔxɛ na mi be miaɖi ɖase le ŋunye na wo be woanya Mesia la nyuie eye woatsɔ bubu tɔxɛ nɛ .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Eya ta migatsi dzi le ale si miawɔ aʋli mia ɖokuiwo ta nenye be wotsɔ nya ɖe mia ŋu la o ,

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: elabena mana nunya mi eye made nya siwo kata ̃ miagblɔ la nu me na mi ale be ame aɖeke mate ŋu atsi tre ɖe nu siwo miagblɔ la ŋu o .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Azɔ ame siwo nye miawo ŋutɔ ŋutimewo , abe mia dzilawo , nɔviŋutsuwo , nɔvinyɔnuwo kple xɔlɔ ̃ veviwo ene la , ade mi asi eye woana woava le ́ mi , eye woawu mia dometɔ aɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ame sia ame ale ́ fu mi elabena mienye tɔnyewo ta .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Gake le nyateƒe me la , miaƒe taɖa ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ matsrɔ ̃ o .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Elabena ne miele tsitre sesi ̃ e la , ekema miaƒe luʋɔwo akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Nenye be miekpɔ asrafowo woƒo xla ̃ Yerusalem dua la , ke minyae be dua gba ̃ ɣi ɖo vɔ .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Ekema mina ame siwo le Yudea la nasi ayi togbɛwo dzi eye ame siwo le Yerusalem la nadze agbagba asi , ke ame siwo le dua godo la , megate kpɔ be yewoatrɔ ayi dua me o .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Ŋkeke siawoe nya si nyagblɔɖila xoxoawo kata ̃ gblɔ da ɖi la ava eme pɛpɛpɛ .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Ke , baba na nyɔnu siwo ƒo fu le kple ame siwo si vidzi ̃ fe ̃ wo le , elabena nuxaxa geɖe ava anyigba sia dzi eye Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoe ava dukɔ sia dzi .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Woawu wo tamesese ̃ tɔe alo woaɖe aboyo wo ayi xexeme dukɔ bubuwo mee . Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo aɖu Yerusalem dua dzi agba ̃ e gudugudu . Esia ayi dzi va se ɖe esime wo ̀ dze Mawu ŋu be wo ̀ aɖo asi Trɔ ̃ subɔla siawo dzi . ”

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Azɔ la nu dziŋɔwo ado ɖe yame esiwo ana nyanya mi . Dzesi dziŋɔwo ado ɖe ɣe , ɣleti kple ɣletiviwo me . Le anyigba dzi afi sia la , ʋunyaʋunya ava dukɔwo me eye woatɔtɔ elabena atsiaƒu aɖe gbe sesi ̃ e eye ƒutsotsoewo aŋe ŋɔdzitɔe .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ame geɖewo abu mɔkpɔkpɔ le nu dziŋɔ ̃ siwo gbɔna dzɔdzɔ ge ɖe anyigba sia dzi ta , elabena dziƒowo ŋutɔ ƒe ŋuse ̃ kura aʋuʋu sesi ̃ e .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Ale ame siwo le anyigba dzi la akpɔ nye Mesia la manɔ alilikpowo dzi gbɔna le ŋuse ̃ kple ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ aɖe me .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Eya ta ne nu siawo kata ̃ le dzɔdzɔm la , minɔ te sesi ̃ e eye mianɔ ŋudzɔ elabena ɣeyiɣia ɖo vɔ be woaɖe mi . ”

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Azɔ edo lo sia na wo be , “ Mikpɔ gboti kple ati bubuawo kata ̃ ɖa .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: ne woto aŋgbawo la , miakpɔe adze sii le mia ɖokui si be dzomeŋɔli le ɖoɖom . ”

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Nenema ke nenye be miekpɔ be nu siwo megblɔ na mi le eme vam la , minyae be mawufiaɖuƒe la te tu aƒe .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: ” Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , dzidzime sia anɔ agbe akpɔ nu siawo teƒe pɛpɛpɛ hafi aku .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Eye togbɔ be dziƒo kple anyigba nu ava yi ha ̃ la , nye nyawo anye nyateƒenya anɔ anyi tegbetegbe .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Mikpɔ nyuie , be nutsuɖuɖu , ahamumu kple dzimaɖitsitsi ɖe agbemenyawo ŋu nagate miaƒe dzi ɖe to o , eye ŋkekea naɖi ɖe mi abe ale si mɔ ɖea ame ene o .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Elabena adze ame siwo kata ̃ le anyigba dzi la dzi kpoyi .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Minɔ ŋudzɔ ɖaa , eye miado gbe ɖa be ne edze Mawu ŋu la miagakpɔ nu dziŋɔ siawo dometɔ aɖeke teƒe hafi ava gbɔnye o . ”

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Yesu nɔ nu fiam le gbedoxɔa me gbe sia gbe , eye le fie ̃ me la etrɔna yia Amito la dzi , afi si wo ̀ dɔna le za ̃ me ,

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: eye ameha la kata ̃ ƒoa ƒu ŋdi sia ŋdi be yewoaɖo to eƒe nufiafia .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Azɔ Ŋutitotoŋkekea te tu aƒe . Ŋkeke siae nye Yudatɔwo ƒe ŋkekenyui si dzi woɖua abolo si wotsɔ amɔ maʋamaʋa ̃ wɔe la ko .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo nɔ ŋugble dem vevie le mɔ si dzi woato awu Yesu ale be ʋunyaʋunya madzɔ le dukɔa me o la ŋuti elabena wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m na dukɔa me tɔwo .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Azɔ Satana ge ɖe Yuda Iskariɔt , ame si nye nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo dometɔ ɖeka la me ,

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: ale wo ̀ yi Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple gbedoxɔmesrafowo ƒe amega ̃ wo gbɔ be yeade aɖaŋu kple wo le mɔ nyuitɔ si dzi yeato ade Yesu asi na wo la ŋuti .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Edzɔ dzi na ameawo ŋutɔ be Yuda le klalo be yeakpe ɖe yewo ŋu eya ta wodo ga home aɖe ŋugbe nɛ .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Tso esia dzi la , Yuda de asi ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ si me woale ́ Yesu le amehawo ƒe manyamanya me la didi me .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Azɔ Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui si dzi wowua ŋutitotole ̃ vi la le eye woɖanɛ kple amɔ maʋamaʋa ̃ ƒe abolo la ɖo edzi .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Yesu dɔ Petro kple Yohanes be woado ŋgɔ aɖawɔ dzadzraɖo na yewoƒe Ŋutitotoŋkekea ɖuɖu .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Wobia be , “ Afi kae ne ̀ di be mi ́ ayi aɖadzra ɖo ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Eɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ne miege ɖe Yerusalem dua me teti ko la , miakpɔ ŋutsu aɖe si le ́ tsize ɖe ta la ; wo ̀ azɔ va yina . Mikplɔe ɖo eye miage ɖe aƒe si me wo ̀ age ɖo la me ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: eye miagblɔ na aƒea tɔ be , ‘ Mi ́ aƒe Nufiala be mibia wo ̀ na ̃ fia mi ́ amedzrowo ƒe xɔ afi si eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo aɖu Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la le . ’

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Aƒea tɔ akplɔ mi ayi dziƒoxɔa dzi eye wo ̀ afia xɔ ga ̃ aɖe si me wodzra ɖo la mi . Teƒe lae nye ma . Miyi eye miaɖo kplɔ ̃ ɖe afi ma . ”

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Woyi dua me eye wokpɔ nu sia nu abe ale si Yesu gblɔe ene , eye woɖo kplɔ ̃ ɖe xɔa me hena Ŋutitotoŋkekea ɖuɖu le fie ̃ ma .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Yesu kple nusrɔ ̃ la mamleawo va ɖo le ɣeɣiɣi si woɖo ɖi la dzi eye wo kata ̃ wonɔ kplɔ ̃ a ŋu hena nua ɖuɖu .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Menɔ mɔ kpɔm vevie be maɖu Ŋutitotoŋkekea ƒe nuɖuɖu sia kpli mi hafi nye fukpekpewo nadze egɔme .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Elabena medi be mianya fifi be nyemagaɖui akpɔ o , va se ɖe esime woɖe nu si tututu wo ̀ nye la ɖe go le mawufiaɖuƒea me . ”

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Azɔ etsɔ wainkplu ɖeka , eye esi wo ̀ da akpe ɖe eta vɔ la , egblɔ na wo be , “ Mixɔe eye ame sia ame nanoe .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Elabena nyemagano wain akpɔ o , va se ɖe esime mawufiaɖuƒe la ava . ”

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Emegbe etsɔ abolo , eye esi wo ̀ da akpe na Mawu le eta vɔ la , eŋe eme eye wo ̀ tsɔe na nusrɔ ̃ lawo hegblɔ be , “ Esia nye nye ŋutila ̃ , si wotsɔ na ɖe mia ta . Miɖui ne miaɖo ŋku dzinye . ”

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Esi woɖu nua vɔ la , egatsɔ wainkplu la na wo eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Esia nye Mawu ƒe nubabla yeye si wo ̀ wɔ be yeatsɔ axɔ mi ɖe agbee la ƒe dzesi . Wotre nubabla sia nu kple ʋu si makɔ ɖi abe vɔsasa ɖe mia ta ene .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
