text2: Gake ame aɖe nɔ anyi ɖe kplɔ ̃ ŋu afi sia abe mi ́ a xɔlɔ ̃ ene , evɔ eyae nye ame si adem asi .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Ele be Mesia la naku abe ale si Mawu ɖoe ene . Gake baba na ame si adee asi ! ”

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo tsa ŋku godoo le wo nɔewo dome hebia be , ame kae le nu sia tɔgbi wɔ ge .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Azɔ ʋiʋli ɖo nusrɔ ̃ lawo dome le ame si anye ga ̃ tɔ la ŋu .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Xexe sia me fiawo ɖua aƒetɔ ɖe wo teviwo dzi , eye amega ̃ bubuwo ha ̃ tea wo teviwo ɖe to gake teviawo bua ame siawo kata ̃ amenuvelawoe .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Gake mele be wo ̀ anɔ nenema le mia dome o , ame si di be yeanye miaƒe amega ̃ la , newɔ eɖokui subɔlae .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Le xexeame la , aƒetɔ nɔa kplɔ ̃ ŋu eye eƒe subɔviwo va subɔnɛ . Gake esia mele mia dome le afii o ! Elabena nyee nye miaƒe subɔvi .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Miawoe nye ame siwo do dzi nɔ anyi kplim le nye tetekpɔwo me ,

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: eye nye la , mele fiaɖuƒe ɖom anyi na mi abe ale si Fofonye ɖo fiaɖuƒe anyi nam ene . ”

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Miaɖu nu , ano nu le kplɔ ̃ ŋu kplim le fiaɖuƒe ma me . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , mianɔ fiazikpuiwo dzi adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu Israel ƒe tokɔ wuieveawo . ”

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Yesu gblɔ na Petro be , “ Simɔn , Simɔn , Satana le mi kata ̃ dim be yeagbɔ mi abe ale si wogbɔa blii ene .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Gake medo gbe ɖa ɖe tawo ̀ be wo ̀ xɔse magabu keŋ o . Ale nenye be e ̀ dze si wo ̀ vodada eye ne ̀ gatrɔ va gbɔnye la , do ŋuse ̃ nɔviwo ̀ mamleawo ha ̃ eye na ̃ tu woƒe xɔse ɖe edzi . ”

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Simɔn ɖo eŋu be , “ Aƒetɔ , mele klalo be mayi gaxɔ me kpli wo ̀ eye maku kpli wo ̀ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Gake Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Petro , na magblɔ nya aɖe na wo ̀ . Va se ɖe etsɔ fɔŋli hafi koklo naku atɔ la , a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zi etɔ ̃ be yemenyam gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . ”

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Azɔ Yesu bia nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Esi medɔ mi be miyi ɖagblɔ nyanyui la , eye mietsɔ ga , mɔzɔkotoku alo awu eve ɖe asi o eye miedo afɔkpa ha ̃ o ɖe , nane hia ̃ mia ? ” Woɖo ŋu nɛ be , “ Naneke mehia ̃ mi o . ”

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Eyi dzi be , “ Azɔ la mitsɔ mɔzɔkotoku nenye be ɖe le mia si . Mitsɔ ga ha ̃ ɖe asi , eye ne yi mele mia dometɔ aɖe si o la , nedzra eƒe awuwo wo ̀ atsɔ ga la aƒle ɖee .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Elabena ɣeyiɣi la ɖo bena nya si wogblɔ ɖi tso ŋunye la nava eme be , ‘ Woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnui abe nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ene . ’ Le nyateƒe me , nya siwo kata ̃ nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ tso ŋunye la ava eme . ”

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , yi eve le mi ́ a si le afi sia . ” Yesu gblɔ be , “ Esɔ gbɔ . ”

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Azɔ Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo le aƒea me heyi Amito la dzi abe ale si wo ̀ wɔna ɖaa ene .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Le afi sia la , egblɔ na wo be , “ Mido gbe ɖa be tetekpɔ nagaɖu mia dzi o . ”

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Edzo le nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ , zɔ vie ko eye wo ̀ dze klo do gbe ɖa be ,

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: “ Fofo , nenye wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ nu la , na kplu sia nato nunye ayi , gake menye nye lɔlɔ ̃ nu o , ke boŋ tɔwo ̀ ko woawɔ . ”

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Kasia mawudɔla aɖe tso dziƒo va do ŋuse ̃ e ,

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: elabena eƒe gbɔgbɔ nɔ veve sem ale gbegbe be , fifia nɔ dzadzam le eŋu abe ʋu ene le esime wo ̀ nɔ gbe dom ɖa atraɖii .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Mlɔeba la , etso eye wo ̀ trɔ yi eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ , gake eva ke ɖe wo ŋu wonɔ alɔ ̃ dɔm elabena konyifafa na be woƒe la ̃ me gbɔdzɔ .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Yesu do ɣli gblɔ be , “ Alɔ ̃ dɔm mielea ? Mifɔ kaba ! Mido gbe ɖa be miaɖu tetekpɔwo dzi . ”

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Ke esi wo ̀ nɔ nya siawo gblɔm la , ameha aɖe do ɖe wo dzi , Yuda , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka nɔ ŋgɔ na wo . Yuda zɔ ɖe Yesu dzi eye wo ̀ gbugbɔ alɔgo nɛ abe lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe dzesi ene .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Gake Yesu biae bena , “ Yuda , nu ka tae ne ̀ wɔ esia ɖo , nugbugbɔe natsɔ ade Mesia la asia ? ”

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Esi nusrɔ ̃ la mamleawo kpɔ nu si be yeadzɔ la , wodo ɣli be , “ Aƒetɔ , miwɔ avu kpli woa ? Mietsɔ mi ́ aƒe yiawo ɖe asi ! ”

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Kasia , nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka tsɔ eƒe yi kpa ɖusimeto na Osɔfoga ̃ tɔ ƒe subɔvi si nɔ ameawo dome .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Migawɔ avu kpli wo o , miɖe asi le wo ŋu ko . ” Ale wo ̀ ka asi afi si subɔvia ƒe to la nɔ ŋu eye toa gaɖo eteƒe abe tsa ̃ ene .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe Osɔfoga ̃ wo , hamemega ̃ wo kple gbedoxɔmesrafowo ƒe amega ̃ siwo nɔ ameha la ŋgɔ va la ŋu eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Adzodalae menye ta mietsɔ kpowo kple yiwo va be yewoale ́ m ha ̃ ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Nu ka tae miele ́ m le gbedoxɔ la me o ? Menɔa afi ma gbe sia gbe ɖe ! Gake ɣeyiɣi sia enye ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ na mi , ɣeyiɣi si me Satana ƒe ŋuse ̃ le dzi ɖum . ”

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Ale wole ́ e eye wokplɔe yi Osɔfoga ̃ tɔ ƒeme eye Petro nɔ eyome ʋi ̃ i gbɔna .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Asrafowo do dzo ɖe xɔxɔnu le ƒuƒum eye Petro va nɔ wo dome le afi ma .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Dɔlanyɔnuvi aɖe si kpɔ Petro dze sii la gblɔ be , “ Ame sia ha ̃ nɔ Yesu yome kpɔ . ”

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Ke Petro gbe gblɔ be , “ Nyɔnu nyemenya amea ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o ! ”

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Le aɖabaƒoƒo ʋee aɖewo megbe la , ame bubu ha ̃ kpɔe eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ ha ̃ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka tututue ne ̀ nye ! ” Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Gbeɖe , amega ̃ menye wo dometɔ ɖekae menye o . ”

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Abe gaƒoƒo ɖeka megbe ene la , ame bubu ha ̃ va gblɔ kple kakaɖedzi be , “ Menya be ame sia ha ̃ nye Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka , elebena eya ha ̃ nye Galileatɔ abe Yesu ene . ”

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Ke Petro gado dzi gblɔ be , “ Ŋutsu , nyemenya naneke kura tso nu si gblɔm ne ̀ le la ŋu o . ” Eye esi wo ̀ ɖe nu le nya siawo me ko la , koklo ku atɔ .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me tututu la , Yesu trɔ kpɔ Petro du ̃ u . Kasia Petro ɖo ŋku Yesu ƒe nya siawo dzi be , “ Hafi koklo naku atɔ etsɔ fɔŋli la , a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zi etɔ ̃ . ” "

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Petro dzo le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ƒea ƒe xɔxɔnu heyi ɖafa avi vevie .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Asrafo siwo le Yesu ŋu dzɔm , la dze fewuɖuɖu le eŋu eye wonɔ eƒom ha ̃ .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Wotsyɔ nu mo nɛ eye wobia tso esi be , " “ Gblɔ nya ɖi ! Ame kae ƒo wo ̀ . ” " Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , wodzu dzu ƒomevi geɖewo nɛ .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Le ŋufɔke ŋdi kanya la , Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo , dumega ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo va ɖi anyi , eye wokplɔ Yesu va wo ƒe ŋkumee .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Wogblɔ be , " “ Nenye woe nye Kristo la , gblɔe na mi . ” Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Ne megblɔe na mi la , miaxɔ dzinye ase o ,

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: eye ne mebia biabia aɖe mi ha ̃ , miele eŋu ɖo ge nam o .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Gake ɣeyiɣi gbɔna esi woaɖo Nye Mesia la fiazikpui dzi le Mawu ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la ƒe ɖusime . ”

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Ameawo kata ̃ do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Ekema ɖe ne ̀ le gbɔgblɔm be Mawu Vie ye ̀ nyea ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , Mawu Vie menye abe ale si miegblɔe ene . ”

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Ameawo gado ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Đe mi ́ egahia ̃ ɖasefo bubuwo be woatso ame sia nua ? Gbeɖe ! Mi ́ awo ŋutɔ mi ́ esee wo ̀ gblɔ be Mawu Vie yenye ! ”

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Azɔ takpekpe bliboa kata ̃ kplɔ Yesu va Pilato ƒemee .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Esi woɖo afi ma teti ko la , wode asi enu tsotso me na Pilato be , “ Ŋutsu sia le to gble ̃ m na dukɔa me viwo be womegadzɔ nu na Kaisaro o . Gawu la , etɔ asi akɔta be yee nye mi ́ aƒe Mesia , si nye Fia si gbɔna la . ”

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Pilato bia Yesu be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Yudatɔwo ƒe fia la ? ” Eɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , ele me abe ale si ne ̀ gblɔe ene . ”

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Pilato trɔ ɖe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple ameha la ŋu gblɔ be , “ Nyemekpɔ vodada aɖeke le ame sia ŋu o . ”

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Ke ameawo ganɔ nutsotso nam le eŋu vevie ŋutɔ . Wogblɔ na Pilato be , “ Ne medze agɔ o ha ̃ la , ehe tɔtɔ geɖe vɛ . Ena be amewo le tsitre tsim ɖe dziɖuɖua ŋu le afi sia afi si wo ̀ de la . Ewɔ esia ƒo xla ̃ Yudea godoo kpeɖo tso keke Galilea va se ɖe Yerusalem ke ! ”

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Esi Pilato se nya siawo la , ebia be ame la ɖe Galileatɔ wo ̀ nyea ?

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Ke esi wo ̀ se be Yesu tso Herodes ƒe ŋuse ̃ te la , eɖoe ɖa Herodes , ame si ha ̃ nɔ Yerusalem le ŋkeke mawo me .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Herodes kpɔ dzidzɔ ŋutɔ esi wo ̀ kpɔ Yesu elabena ese eŋkɔ zi geɖe eye wo ̀ se nukunu ga ̃ siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ wɔ la ha ̃ ale wo ̀ nɔ mɔ kpɔm be awɔ ɖe yeakpɔ .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Herodes bia biabia geɖewo Yesu ke meɖo ɖeke ŋu nɛ o . "

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ me la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo nɔ tsitre ɖe afi ma nɔ nutsotso geɖewo nam le Yesu ŋu kabakaba ŋutɔ .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Herodes kple eƒe asrafowo ha ̃ va de asi vlododoe me . Woɖu fewu geɖe ha ̃ le eŋu , wodo awu nɛ abe fia ene eye wogbugbɔe ɖo ɖe Pilato gbɔ .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Tso gbe ma gbe la , Herodes kple Pilato , ame siwo le ́ fu wo nɔewo vevie tsa ̃ la trɔ zu xɔlɔ ̃ veviwo .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Pilato yɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo , dumega ̃ wo kple ameha la ƒo ƒui ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , " “ Togbɔ be miekplɔ ame sia vɛ be egble ̃ to na ame geɖewo be woatsi tre ɖe Roma dziɖuɖua ŋu ha ̃ la , meku miaƒe nutsotsoa gɔme tsitotsito , ke mekpɔe dzesii kɔtee be ame sia medze agɔ aɖeke o .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Herodes ha ̃ kpɔe be medze agɔ o , eya ta wo ̀ gatrɔe ɖo ɖe mi ́ . Vava ̃ ame sia mewɔ naneke si ta wo ̀ le be woatso kufia nɛ o .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Le esia ta la , mana woaƒoe sesi ̃ e le dutoƒo eye maɖe asi le eŋu . ”

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Azɔ ele na Pilato be , wo ̀ aɖe asi le gamenɔla ɖeka ŋu na wo le Ŋutitotoŋkekenyuia dzi .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Ke wo kata ̃ do ɣli kple gbe ɖeka be , “ Đe ame sia ɖa ! Đe asi le Baraba ŋu na mi ́ ! ”

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Barabas sia nye ame aɖe si wole ́ de gaxɔ me be ehe tɔtɔ ga ̃ aɖe va Yerusalem , be amewo natsi tre ɖe dziɖuɖua ŋu . Gawu la , ewu ame ha ̃ .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Eya ta Pilato gaɖe nya me na ameha la , elabena edi vevie be yeaɖe asi le Yesu ŋu .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Gake ɖeko ameha la gado ɣli sesi ̃ e wu be , “ Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu ! Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu ! ”

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Pilato gabia wo zi etɔ ̃ lia be , “ Nu ka tae wo ̀ le be makla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu ɖo ? Vɔ ̃ kae wo ̀ wɔ ? Đeko maƒo ame sia eye maɖe asi le eŋu elabena nyemekpɔ vɔ ̃ aɖeke le eŋu si ana be matso kufia nɛ o . ”

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Gake ɖeko ameawo ganɔ ɣli dom sesi ̃ e atraɖii be woawu Yesu .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Mlɔeba la , Pilato wɔ ɖe woƒe didi dzi eye wo ̀ tso kufia na Yesu .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Ale wo ̀ tsɔ Yesu de asi na wo be woawɔ nu si wolɔ ̃ la kplii . Ke eɖe asi le Barabas , ame si wode mɔ ɖe ʋunyaʋunyawɔwɔ kple amewuwu ta la ŋu .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Esi ameha la kplɔ Yesu yina wuwu ge la , wodo go ŋutsu aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Simɔn , ame si nye Kirenetɔ la wo ̀ tso agbleta gbɔna Yerusalem . Ale wozi edzi be wo ̀ atsɔ Yesu ƒe atitsoga la kplii .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe kplɔe ɖo hoo eye nyɔnu geɖewo nɔ avi fam ɖe eŋu le wo dome .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe konyifala siawo ŋu gblɔ na wo be , “ Yerusalem nyɔnuwo , migafa avi ɖe ŋunye o , ke boŋ mifa avi na mia ɖokuiwo kple mia viwo .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Elabena ŋkeke aɖewo gbɔna esime konɔwo gɔ ̃ akpɔ dzidzɔ be yewomedzi vi o .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Amegbetɔwo aɖe kuku na towo be woaho va dze yewo dzi eye togbɛwo naɖi yewo ɖe tome .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Megblɔ esia elabena ne wole nu siawo ƒomevi wɔm ɖe ati mumu ŋu ɖe , nu ka woawɔ ɖe ati ƒuƒu ŋu ? ”

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Wokplɔ ŋutsu bubu eve siwo nye hlɔ ̃ dolawo kpe ɖe eŋu be woakla ̃ woawo ha ̃ ɖe ati ŋu kplii .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Esi woɖo teƒe si woyɔna be “ Ametakoliƒe ” la , wokla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu le afi ma , hlɔ ̃ dola ɖeka le eƒe ɖusime eye ɖeka le eƒe miame .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Se ̃ e la , Yesu do ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Fofo tsɔ ame siawo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke wo elabena womenya nu si wɔm wole la o . ” Asrafowo ɖe eƒe awuwo le eŋu eye woda akɔ ɖe ɖe sia ɖe dzi be wo ̀ anye ame si aɖu dzi la tɔ .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe nɔ afi ma nɔ Yesu kpɔm , ke Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ siwo nɔ wo dome la nɔ fewu ɖum le eŋu . Wogblɔ be , “ Ame sia ɖe ame geɖewo , ke mina miakpɔe ɖa be ate ŋu aɖe ye ŋutɔ ɖokui le atia ŋu nenye eyae nye Mesia , si nye Mawu ƒe Ametiatia la vava ̃ . ”

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Asrafo siwo nɔ eŋu dzɔm ha ̃ ɖu fewu le eŋu . Wotsɔ aha tsitsi nɛ be wo ̀ ano

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: eye wogblɔ be , “ Nenye wo ̀ e nye Yudatɔwo ƒe fia la , ekema ɖe wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ . ”

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Woŋlɔ kla ̃ ɖe eƒe atitsoga tame be , “ AME SIA ENYE YUDATÅWO ƑE FIA ”

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Adzodala siwo wokla ̃ ɖe ati ŋu le egbɔ la dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ busunya sia ɖe eŋu be , “ Ke wo ̀ boŋue nye Mesia la ? Nenye wo ̀ e la , ekema ɖe ɖokuiwo ̀ eye na ̃ ɖe míawo ha ̃ le atitsoga la ŋue . ”

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Ke adzodala evelia blu ɖe nɔvia ta be , “ Đe mevɔ ̃ a Mawu oa , esi mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ele fɔbubu ma ke tea ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Mi ́ awo ya tohehe sia dze mi , elabena nu si dze mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔwɔwo la , eya kpɔm mi ́ ele . Ke ame sia ya mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ aɖeke o . ”

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Eyi edzi be , “ Yesu ɖo ŋku dzinye le wo ̀ fiaɖuƒe la me . ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mele ŋugbe dom na wo ̀ kple kakaɖedzi be , egbea ke na ̃ nɔ Paradiso la me kplim . ”

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , eƒo ga wuieve lɔƒo , ke viviti do ɖe anyigba blibo la kata ̃ dzi enumake va se ɖe ɣetrɔ ga etɔ ̃ me .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Ɣe ƒe kekle ̃ bu eye enumake xɔmetsovɔ titri si wotsɔ tso gbedoxɔ la mee la ma ɖe akpa eve .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Yesu do ɣli sesi ̃ e le gaƒoƒo sia me gblɔ be , “ Fofo , metsɔ nye gbɔgbɔ de asiwo ̀ me . ” Esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya siawo vɔ ko la , emia nu kpoo .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Esi Romasrafo siwo kla ̃ Yesu ɖe ati ŋu la ƒe amega ̃ kpɔ nu si dzɔ la , vɔvɔ ̃ ɖoe ale wo ̀ kafu Mawu gblɔ bena , “ Le nyateƒe me , ame sia medze agɔ aɖeke o . ”

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Esi ame siwo kata ̃ va ƒo ƒu be yewoakpɔ nu siwo ava dzɔ teƒe la , kpɔ nu siwo va dzɔ la , wotrɔ dzo nɔ woƒe akɔta ƒom .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Ke eƒe ame nyanyɛwo kata ̃ kple nyɔnu , siwo dze eyome tso Galilea la , tsi tre ɖe adzɔge ke le nu siawo kpɔm .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Azɔ ŋutsu aɖe si ŋkɔe nye Yosef , Yudatɔwo ƒe Takpekpega ̃ me nɔla , ame si nye ame nyui kple ame dzɔdzɔe ,

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: ame si melɔ ̃ ɖe woƒe aɖaŋudede kple woƒe nuwɔwɔ dzi o . Etso Yuda du si woyɔna be Arimatia la me , eye wo ̀ nye ame si le mɔ kpɔm na mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe vava .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Ŋutsu sia yi Pilato gbɔ ɖabia Yesu ƒe kukua .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Wona mɔe eye wo ̀ ɖe Yesu ƒe kukua le atitsoga la ŋu . Exatsa aklala ɖe eŋu eye wo ̀ tsɔe yi ɖamlɔ yɔdo yeye aɖe si woɖe ɖe agakpe aɖe si le togbɛ aɖe xa la me . Womeɖi ame aɖeke ɖe yɔdo sia me kpɔ o .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Ewɔ esia le Fiɖa ɣetrɔ le esime amewo nɔ dzadzra ɖo wɔm na Sabat ŋkekea ɖuɖu .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Esi Yosef kɔ ame kukua yina ɖiɖi ge la , nyɔnu siwo tso Galilea va la kplɔe ɖo eye woyi ɖakpɔ afi si wo ̀ ɖii ɖo .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Ale woyi aƒe me ɖawɔ atikewo kple ami ʋeʋi ̃ wo be yewoava si na Yesu ƒe kukua be wo ̀ agavo o . Gake esi wowu ami ʋeʋi ̃ awo kple atikeawo wɔwɔ nu la , Sabat ŋkekea ɖo edzi , eye le Yudatɔwo ƒe kɔa nu la , wodzudzɔ le ŋkeke sia dzi .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Le kɔsiɖa ƒe ŋkeke gba ̃ tɔ ƒe ŋdikanyaa la , nyɔnuawo tsɔ ami ʋeʋi ̃ awo ɖe asi heva yɔdoa to

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: gake wokpɔe be womli kpe ga ̃ si wotsɔ tu yɔdoa nui la ɖa .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Woge ɖe yɔdoa me gake womekpɔ Yesu ƒe kukua o .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Nu sia wɔ moya na wo ŋutɔ eya ta wonɔ tsitre ɖe yɔdoa to henɔ ta me bum tso nu si dzɔ ŋu , kasia ame eve siwo do awu ɣi siwo nɔ dzo dam miamiamia la va do ɖe wo dome .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Nyɔnuawo vɔ ̃ ale gbegbe be wodze klo ɖe ameawo ŋkume . Ŋustuawo biawo bena , “ Nu ka tae mieva le ame gbagbe dim le yɔdo me ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Mele afi sia o ; etsi tre tso ame kukuwo dome . Miɖo ŋku ale si wo ̀ gblɔe na mi , esime wo ̀ nɔ anyi kpli mi le Galiliea la dzi be .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: ‘ Ele be woade Amegbetɔvi la asi na nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo , woakla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti eye le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la wo ̀ atsi tre . ’ ”

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Nyɔnuawo ɖo ŋku eƒe nyawo dzi .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Esime wogbɔ tso yɔdo la gbɔ la , woka nu siawo kata ̃ ta na ame wuiɖekeawo kple ame bubuawo kata ̃ .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Nyɔnu siwo de yɔdoa to woe nye Maria Magdalatɔ , Yohana kple Maria Yakobo dada kpakple nyɔnu bubu geɖewo .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Esi nusrɔ ̃ lawo se nyɔnuawo ƒe nyawo la , ɖeko wo ̀ ɖi glitoto le woƒe towo me .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Ke Petro ƒu du yi yɔdoa to be yeakpɔ nu si dzɔ la ɖa . Ebɔbɔ do mo ɖe yɔdoa me , gake aklala ƒuƒlu ko wo ̀ kpɔ le anyigba . Ale wo ̀ trɔ yi aƒe me , henɔ nu si dzɔ la ŋuti bum vevie .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Le gbe ma gbe ke la , Yesu yomenɔla eve nɔ mɔ zɔm yina kɔƒe aɖe si woyɔna be Emaus la me . Kɔƒe sia didi tso Yerusalem gbɔ abe kilometa wuiɖekɛ lɔƒo ene .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Wonɔ dze ɖom kple wo nɔewo tso nu siwo kata ̃ va dzɔ la ŋuti .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Esi wonɔ dzea ɖom nɔ nu siawo me dzrom kple wo nɔewo la , Yesu ŋutɔ va tu wo eye wo ̀ de asi zɔzɔ me kpli wo .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Gake womekpɔe dze si o elabena wotsyɔ nu woƒe ŋkuwo dzi .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Yesu bia wo be , “ Nya ka me dzrom miele vevie alea ? Edze nam ƒa ̃ a be nya siwo me dzrom miele la nye nya ga ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ si dzɔ . ” Mɔzɔla eveawo nɔ tsitre eye wodzudzɔ nuƒoƒo . Blanui le ́ wo ŋutɔ .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Ke wo dometɔ ɖeka si ŋkɔe nye Kleopa la , ɖo Yesu ƒe biabia ŋu be , “ Đewohi ̃ wo ̀ ɖeka koe nye ame le Yerusalem si mese nya dziŋɔ si dzɔ le kɔsiɖa si va yi me la o . ”

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Yesu gabiae be , “ Nya kae dzɔ ? ” Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nya siwo dzɔ ɖe Yesu , ŋutsu si tso Nazaret dzi lae mewɔnɛ . Ŋutsu sia nye nyagblɔɖila xɔŋkɔ aɖe si wɔ nu wɔnukuwo eye wo ̀ ganye nufiala deŋgɔ aɖe si tɔgbi mebɔ o . Le nyateƒe me la , ede ŋgɔ ŋutɔ le Mawu kple amegbetɔwo siaa ŋkume .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Ke nu kae va dzɔ , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple miaƒe agbale ̃ fialawo le ́ e hetsɔ de asi na Roma dziɖuɖua be woatso kufia nɛ . Ale Roma dziɖuɖua tso kufia nɛ eye wokla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu . ”

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Mi ́ awo ya mi ́ enɔ bubum be eyae nye Mesia ŋuse ̃ tɔ si va Israel dukɔa ɖe ge tso kluvinyenye me hafi . Nu siawo kata ̃ dzɔ ŋkeke etɔ ̃ e nye esi va yi .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋuti la , mi ́ aƒe nyɔnuawo dometɔ aɖewo do voɖi na mi ́ . Woyi yɔdoa to fɔŋli sia

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: gake womekpɔ eƒe ŋutila ̃ kukua o . Wotrɔ gbɔ va gblɔ na mi ́ be yewokpɔ ŋutega eye yewokpɔ mawudɔlawo le ŋutega la me , ame siwo gblɔ na yewo be , ele agbe .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Miatɔ aɖewo ƒu du yi yɔdoa to enumake , ke woawo ha ̃ kpɔ be yɔdoa le ƒuƒlu vava ̃ abe ale si ame gba ̃ tɔwo gblɔe ene . ”

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Mi ame manyanuwo ! Esese ̃ na na mi be miaxɔ nya siwo kata ̃ nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ da ɖi la dzi ase !

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Đe nyagblɔɖilawo megblɔ da ɖi be , ele be Mesia la nakpe fu siawo kata ̃ hafi age ɖe eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la me oa ? ”

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Ale Yesu gblɔ mawunya kpukpui geɖewo na wo tso Mose dzi va se ɖe nyagblɔɖila bubuawo kata ̃ dzi , eye wo ̀ ɖe akpa siwo ku ɖe ye ŋutɔ ŋu la me na wo .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , wogogo Emaus , kɔƒe si me woyina la . Yesu wɔ abe ɖe wo ̀ le eme tsom ene , eya ta

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: woɖe kuku nɛ be wo ̀ atsi yewo gbɔ adɔ ŋu nake elabena za ̃ do vɔ keŋ . Ale Yesu lɔ ̃ eye wo ̀ yi woƒe aƒe me .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Esi wonɔ anyi be yewoaɖu nu la , eyra ɖe nuɖuɖua dzi eye wo ̀ tsɔ abolo , ŋe eme hetsɔe na wo .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Kasia , woƒe ŋkuwo ʋu eye wokpɔe dze sii be eyae nye Yesu eye enumake wo ̀ bu le wo gbɔ .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Ame eveawo de asi gbɔgblɔ me be , me ̀ kpɔe be mi ́ aƒe dziwo ʋu dzo ŋutɔ le esime wo ̀ nɔ mawunya la me ɖem na mi ́ le mɔa dzi oa ?

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Enumake wogatso dze mɔ ɖo ta Yerusalem eye esi woɖo afi ma la , wokpɔ nusrɔ ̃ la wuiɖekeawo kple Yesu yomedzela bubuwo .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo gblɔ na wo be , “ Aƒetɔ la tsi tre vava ̃ ! Eɖe eɖokui fia Petro ! ”

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Ŋutsu eve siwo tso Emaus la ha ̃ gblɔ ale si wodo go Yesu le Emaus mɔ dzi eye wo ̀ zɔ kpli wo va ɖo Emaus , kple ale si wokpɔe dze sii to aboloŋeŋe me na wo .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Esi ŋutsuawo nɔ woƒe nuteƒekpɔkpɔwo gblɔm la , Yesu ŋutɔ va do ɖe wo dome hedo gbe na wo !

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Dzika tso ameawo kata ̃ ƒo eye wovɔ ̃ ŋutɔ ŋutɔ , elabena wobu be ŋɔli kpɔm yewole .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Yesu bia wo be , “ Nu ka tae miele vɔvɔ ̃ m ɖo ? Nu ka tae miele ɖi kem le miaƒe dziwo me , be nyee le mia dome ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Mile ́ ŋku ɖe nye asiwo kple afɔwo ŋu nyuie ! Miva le ́ m kpɔ eye miakpɔe kɔtɛe be menye ŋɔlie menye o ! Elabena ŋɔliwo la , ŋutila ̃ menɔa wo ŋu abe ale si mele ene o . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nua ƒom la , etsɔ eƒe asiwo do ɖe wo gbɔ bena woakpɔ abi siwo gatagbadzɛwo de eŋu la , le eƒe asiƒome kple afɔƒome .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Ke ame aɖeke mete ŋu te ɖe eŋu o , elabena dzidzɔ kple ɖikeke yɔ wo me fu ̃ u . Le esia ta , ebia wo be , “ Nuɖuɖu aɖe le mia si le afi sia ? ”

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Wotsɔ la ̃ meme ̃ kakɛ aɖe nɛ eye esi wo ̀ nɔ

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: eɖum la , wonɔ ekpɔm !

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Esi menɔ anyi kpli mi le ŋkeke siwo va yi me ɖe , nyemegblɔe na mi be nu siwo Mose kple nyagblɔɖilawo kpakple Psalmowo gblɔ tso ŋunye la ava eme oa ? ”

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Ale wo ̀ ʋu woƒe susuwo be woase mawunya siawo kata ̃ gɔme .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Yesu yi edzi be , “ Vava ̃ , woŋlɔe ɖi tso gba aɖe gbe ke be , ele na Mesia la be wo ̀ akpe fu eye wo ̀ aku eye le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la , woagatsi tre tso ame kukuwo dome .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Eye ele bena woatsɔ dzimetɔtrɔ kple nu vɔ ̃ tsɔtsɔkenya sia ayi na dukɔwo kata ̃ eye woadze egɔme tso Yerusalem .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Miawoe nye ɖasefowo na nu siawo kata ̃ . ”

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Azɔ makɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ɖe mia dzi abe ale si Fofonye do ŋugbee ene . Ke minɔ Yerusalem afii va se ɖe esime Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la nava mia dzi tso dziƒo ana ŋuse ̃ mi . ”

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Yesu kplɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo do go va se ɖe Betania , eye wo ̀ kɔ eƒe asiwo dzi heyra wo .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ wo yram la , wokɔe le nusrɔ ̃ lawo gbɔ heyi dziƒoe .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Le esime wo ̀ dzo yina la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo dze klo eye wosubɔe . Emegbe wotrɔ yi Yerusalem kple dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Wonɔ gbedoxɔ la me gbe sia gbe henɔ Mawu kafum .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Le gɔmedzedzea me la , Nya la li , eye Nya la li kple Mawu , eye Nya la nye Mawu .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Eli kple Mawu le gɔmedzedzea me .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: To eya amea me wowɔ nuwo kata ̃ eye eya manɔmee la , womewɔ naneke si wowɔ o .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Eya amea mee agbe le eye agbe siae nye amegbetɔwo ƒe kekeli .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Kekeli la kle ̃ ɖe viviti me eye viviti la mete ŋu ɖu edzi o .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Ame aɖe va tso Mawu gbɔ , eƒe ŋkɔe nye Yohanes .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Ame sia va be yeaɖi ɖase tso Kekeli la ŋu , ale be to eya amea dzi la amewo kata ̃ naxɔ ase .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Menye Yohanes ye nye Kekeli la o , eya la , ɖeko wo ̀ va be yeaɖi ɖase le Kekeli la ŋu .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Kekeli vava ̃ si akle ̃ na amewo kata ̃ la le mɔ dzi gbɔna va xexeame .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Eya amea nɔ xexeame gake xexeame mekpɔe dze sii o , evɔ eya amea dzie woto wɔ xexeame .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Eva eya ŋutɔ tɔwo gbɔ , gake eya ŋutɔ ƒe amewo mexɔe o .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Ke ame siwo kata ̃ xɔe , eye woxɔ eƒe ŋkɔ dzi se la , ena ŋuse ̃ wo be woazu Mawu viwo ,

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: ame siwo womedzi tso ʋu alo ŋutila ̃ ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu alo ŋutsu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu me o , ke boŋ tso Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu me .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Nya la trɔ zu ame va nɔ mi ́ a dome le anyigba sia dzi eye eƒe agbe yɔ fu ̃ u kple amenuveve kple nyateƒea . Mi ́ ame aɖewo mi ́ ekpɔ eƒe Ŋutikɔkɔe si nye Mawu , Fofo la , ƒe Vi ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ la tɔ .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Yohanes ɖi ɖase le eŋuti hegblɔ bena , “ Ame siae nye ame si ŋu menɔ nu ƒom le na mi esi megblɔ be , ‘ Ame aɖe si li xoxoxo hafi meva dzɔ la gbɔna , ame sia de ŋgɔ wum sa ̃ a . ’ ” "

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Ena yayra geɖe mi tso eƒe amenuveve sɔ gbɔ la me .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Esi Mose va la , etsɔ Se sese ̃ la kple kuxi geɖe , siwo le edziwɔwɔ me la , vɛ na mi . Ke Kristo ya tsɔ amenuveve kple nyateƒe la vɛ na mi .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Ame aɖeke mekpɔ Mawu kpɔ o , ame si ke nye Vi ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ la , ame si sɔ kple Mawu eye wo ̀ le Fofo la ƒe axadzi la , eyae ɖee fia mi ́ .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Azɔ esiae nye Yohanes ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi esime Yudatɔ siwo le Yerusalem dɔ Osɔfowo kple Levitɔwo ɖo ɖe egbɔ ne woabiae be , " “ Ame kae ne ̀ nye ? ”

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Mese ̃ nu o , ke boŋ eʋu eme na wo faa be , “ Menye nyee nye Kristo la o . ”

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Wogabiae be , “ Ekema ame kae ne ̀ nye , Eliya ? ” Egaɖo eŋu be , “ Kpao , menye Eliyae menye o . ” Wogabiae ake be , “ Nyagblɔɖila lae ne ̀ nyea ? ” Eye wo ̀ ɖo eŋu be , “ Gbeɖe , menye nyagblɔɖila lae menye o . ”

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Amedɔdɔawo gayi edzi biae bena , “ Ke ame ka tututue ne ̀ nye ? Gblɔe na mi ́ ale be mi ́ anya nya si mi ́ agblɔ na ame siwo dɔ mi ́ . Gblɔ nya aɖe na mi ́ tso ɖokuiwo ̀ ŋu . ”

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Yohanes ɖo eŋu na wo kple Nyagblɔɖila Yesaya ƒe nya siawo be , “ Nyee nye gbe si le ɣli dom le gbea dzi be , ‘ Midzra Aƒetɔ la ƒe mɔ la ɖo wo ̀ anɔ dzɔdzɔe ’ ”

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Farisitɔwo ƒe amedɔdɔwo ha ̃ ,

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: biae be , “ Esi menye wo ̀ e nye Kristo la alo Eliya loo alo Nyagblɔɖila la o la , nu ka ta ne ̀ le mawutsi dem ta na amewo ɖo ? ”

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Yohanes ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Nye la , mele mawutsi dem ta na amewo kple tsi ƒuƒlu ko , gake ame aɖe le mia dome afii , si mienya o .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Ame sia le yonyeme gbɔna eye nyemadze be manye amea ƒe subɔvi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o . ” "

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Nu siawo kata ̃ dzɔ le Betania , kɔƒe aɖe si le Yɔdan tɔsisia godo , afi si Yohanes nɔ mawutsi dem ta na amewo le la me .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Le ŋufɔke la , Yohanes kpɔ Yesu wo ̀ gbɔna egbɔ , ale wo ̀ do ɣli gblɔ bena , " “ Mikpɔ ɖa ! Mawu ƒe Ale ̃ vi si le xexe sia me ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ɖem ɖa lae nye ekem !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Eya ŋutie menɔ nu ƒom le esi megblɔ bena , ‘ Ŋutsu aɖe gbɔna kpuie , ame si de ŋgɔ wum boo , eye wo ̀ li xoxoxo hafi nye ya meva dzɔ gɔ ̃ . ’

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Nye ŋutɔ nyemenya ame si wo ̀ nye o , ke nye dɔ koe nye be , made mawutsi ta na amewo kple tsi atsɔ aɖee afia Israel dukɔa . ”

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Azɔ Yohanes ɖi ɖase le ale si wo ̀ kpɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la wo ̀ nɔ akpakpa ƒe nɔnɔme me nɔ ɖiɖim ɖe Yesu dzi tso dziƒo la ŋu .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yohanes gblɔ ake be , “ Nye la , nyemenya be eyae nye amea o . Gake esi Mawu ɖom ɖa be made mawutsi ta na amewo la , egblɔ nam be , ‘ Nenye be e ̀ kpɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la wo ̀ le ɖiɖim ɖe ame aɖe dzi la , nyae bena eyae nye ame si dim ne ̀ le . Eyae ade mawutsi ta na amewo kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la . ’

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Mekpɔe be nu sia tututue dzɔ ɖe ŋutsu sia dzi eya ta meɖi ɖase bena eyae nye Mawu Vi la . ”

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Le ŋkeke evea gbe la , Yohanes kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la eve aɖewo nɔ tsitre ɖe teƒe aɖe eye Yesu va to wo gbɔ yina .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Yohanes li ŋku ɖe Yesu dzi ga ̃ a eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Mikpɔ ɖa ! Mawu ƒe Ale ̃ vi lae nye ekem ! ”

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la eveawo dzo le Yohanes gbɔ dze Yesu yome .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Yesu trɔ kɔ kpɔ wo wonɔ eyome eye wo ̀ bia wo bena , “ Nu ka dim miele ? ” Woawo ha ̃ ɖo eŋu be , “ ‘ Rabi ’ ” ( si gɔmee nye Nufiala ) “ afi kae nye wo ̀ nɔƒe ? ”

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Miva kpɔe ɖa . ” Ale wokplɔe ɖo yi aƒe si me wo ̀ nɔna la me eye wonɔ egbɔ tso ɣetrɔ ga ene me va se ɖe fie ̃ hafi trɔ dzo .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Ame siawo dometɔ ɖekae nye Andrea si nye Simɔn Petro nɔvi .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Nu gba ̃ tɔ si Andrea wɔ lae nye be edi nɔvia Simɔn eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mi ́ ekpɔ Mesia la ” , si gɔmee nye Kristo la

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Enumake ekplɔ nɔvia Simɔn va Yesu gbɔ . Yesu kpɔe du ̃ u eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Wo ̀ e nye Simɔn , Yohanes vi . Woayɔ wo ̀ azɔ be Kefa ” " Esia gɔmee nye Kpe Gbadza .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Le ŋufɔke la , Yesu ɖoe be yeayi Galilea , esi wo ̀ nɔ mɔa dzi yina la , edo go Filipo eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ be , " “ Va , na ̃ dze yonyeme . ”

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Filipo sia tso Betsaida si nye Andrea kple Petro wo de .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Filipo ha ̃ ɖe abla yi ɖadi Nataniel eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Nɔvi , mi ́ eke ɖe Mesia , ame si ŋuti woŋlɔ nu tsoe le nyagblɔɖilawo kple Mose ƒe sea me la ŋu . Eŋkɔe nye Yesu , eye fofoa nye Yosef si tso Nazaret . ”

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Nataniel do ɣli enumake gblɔ bena , “ Nu nyui aɖe ate ŋu ado tso Nazaret maha ̃ ? ” Filipo ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Wo ̀ ŋutɔ va na ̃ va kpɔe ɖa . ”

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Esi Yesu kpɔ Nataniel wo ̀ gbɔna egbɔ la , egblɔ be , “ Israel vi vava ̃ si me alakpa aɖeke mele o lae nye esi gbɔna . ”

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Nataniel bia Yesu be , “ Aleke ne ̀ wɔ nya ame si ƒomevi menye ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mekpɔ wo ̀ le gboti ma te xoxoxo hafi Filipo va yɔ wo ̀ gɔ ̃ . ”

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Nataniel gblɔ bena , “ Nufiala , wo ̀ e nye Mawu Vi la vava ̃ . Wo ̀ e nye Israel ƒe Fia la ! ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Yesu gabiae bena , “ Đee ne ̀ xɔ dzinye se elabena mete ŋu kpɔ wo ̀ le gboti ma tea ? Nu ga ̃ wo wu esia , aɖe ame si menye afia wo ̀ .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: E ̀ le dziƒo kpɔ ge wo ̀ aʋu eye mawudɔlawo anɔ Nye Mesia alo Amegbetɔ Vi la gbɔ vam aganɔ dziƒo yim kura gɔ ̃ . ”

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ a gbe la , wokpe Yesu dada be wo ̀ ava kpɔ srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe aɖe teƒe le Kana si le Galilea nutomea me .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Wokpe Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ha ̃ .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Esi wɔnawo nɔ edzi yim la , wain si nom ameawo nɔ la vɔ . Ale Yesu dada va egbɔ va gblɔ nya sia nɛ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na dadaa be , “ Aƒenɔ , nu ka dim ne ̀ le be mawɔ na wo ̀ fifia ? Nye ɣeyiɣi meɖo haɖe o . ”

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Gake Yesu dada gblɔ na subɔlawo bena , “ Miwɔ nu sia nu si wo ̀ be miawɔ . ”

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Azɔ tsizɔ ade nɔ teƒea . Esiawo Yudatɔwo za ̃ na hena woƒe ŋutikɔklɔkɔnuwo wɔwɔ . Tsi lita blaadre - vɔ - atɔ ̃ alo alafa ɖeka wuiatɔ ̃ tea ŋu nɔa wo me .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na subɔlawo be , “ Miku tsi kɔ ɖe zɔwo kata ̃ me woayɔ . ” Ale wowɔ nenema .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Egagblɔ na wo bena , “ Azɔ mikui yi ɖana nuɖuɖudzikpɔla la . ” Wowɔ nenema .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Nuɖuɖudzikpɔla la no tsi si trɔ zu wain la ƒe ɖe , ke menya afi si wo ̀ tso o , subɔlawo koe nya . Azɔ eyɔ ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ bena ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: “ Wo ̀ la e ̀ to vovo kura tso ame bubuwo gbɔ elabena zi geɖe la , srɔ ̃ ɖelawo na wain nyuitɔ woƒe amekpekpewo gba ̃ eye ne ame sia ame noe wosui vɔ la , ekema wotsɔa manyomanyotɔ vanɛ . Ke wo ̀ la , e ̀ dzra nyuitɔ ɖo eye ne ̀ tsɔe vɛ le nuwuwua . ”

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Nukunu si Yesu wɔ le Kana le Galilea lae nye gba ̃ tɔ si wo ̀ wɔ hetsɔ ɖe ŋuse ̃ si wo ̀ xɔ tso dziƒo la fia . Esia na be eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ha ̃ xɔe se be eyae nye Mesia , ame si lava . "

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Esi srɔ ̃ ɖeŋkekenyui la wu enu la , Yesu kple dadaa , nɔviawo kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo yi Kapernaum eye wonɔ afi ma ŋkeke ʋee aɖewo .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Esi Yudatɔwo ƒe Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la ɖo edzi la , Yesu yi Yerusalem . "

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Le afi sia la , ekpɔ asitsalawo le gbedoxɔ la ƒe xɔxɔnu wonɔ nyiwo , ale ̃ wo kple akpakpawo dzram hena vɔsasa . Gaɖɔlilawo ha ̃ nɔ teƒea nɔ ga ɖɔ lim na amewo .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Enumake Yesu tsɔ ka aɖewo tro atam eye wo ̀ nya wo kata ̃ do goe le gbedoxɔ la me , enya ale ̃ awo kple nyiawo ha ̃ do goe , ekaka gaɖɔlilawo ƒe gawo ɖe anyigba eye wo ̀ mu woƒe kplɔ ̃ wo ƒu anyi .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Azɔ ezɔ yi ame siwo nɔ akpakpawo dzram la gbɔ eye wo ̀ ɖe gbe na wo bena , “ Mitsɔ nu siawo do goe le afi sia ! Migatsɔ Fofonye ƒe Aƒe wɔ asimee o ! ”

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo ŋku edzi be mawunya gblɔ be , “ Didi vevi aɖe le menye be mawɔ dɔ akɔ wo ̀ aƒe alo gbedoxɔ la ŋu . ”

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Azɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo va Yesu gbɔ va biae bena , “ Ŋuse ̃ kae ne ̀ kpɔ bena na ̃ nya ameawo do goe ? Nenye be e ̀ ka ɖe edzi be Mawue na ŋuse ̃ sia ye la ekema wɔ nukunu aɖe na ̃ tsɔ ɖo kpe edzii na mi . ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Enyo , mawɔ nukunu aɖe na mi , eyae nye be , migba ̃ mawuxɔ sia eye nye la magbugbɔe atu le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ pɛ ko megbe . ”

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Ameawo kata ̃ do ɣli be , “ Nu ka ! Ƒe blaene - vɔ - adee wotsɔ tu gbedoxɔ siae . Ke wo ̀ ya ne ̀ be yeate ŋu atui le ŋkeke etɔ ̃ mea ? ” "

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Ke “ gbedoxɔ ” si ŋu Yesu nɔ nu ƒom le lae nye eƒe ŋutila ̃ .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Esi Yesu tsi tre tso ame kukuwo dome la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo ŋku edzi be egblɔ nya sia ɖi . Eye wokpɔe dze sii be , nya siwo kata ̃ Yesu gblɔ tso mawunya me la ƒo nu tso eya ŋutɔ ŋu eye wo kata ̃ ha ̃ va eme vava ̃ .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Nukunu geɖe siwo Yesu wɔ le Ŋutitotoŋkekea dzi le Yerusalem la na bena ame geɖe xɔe se be eyae nye Mesia la vava ̃ .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Ke Yesu meka ɖe ame siawo ƒe xɔse dzi o , elabena edze si amegbetɔwo ƒe nɔnɔme .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Mehia ̃ be ame aɖeke naɖi ɖase nɛ tso amegbetɔ ŋu o , elabena eya ŋutɔ nya nu si le ame me . "

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Azɔ la ame aɖe si tso Farisitɔwo dome , eye eƒe ŋkɔe nye Nikodemo la li ; enye Yudatɔwo ƒe takpekpe ga ̃ me nɔla .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Eva Yesu gbɔ le za ̃ me eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Rabi , menyae be nufialae ne ̀ nye tso Mawu gbɔ va . Elabena ame aɖeke mate ŋu awɔ dzesi wɔnuku siwo ne ̀ wɔna o , ne menye Mawue li kplii o . ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Esia le eme , gake le nyateƒe me , mele egblɔm na wo ̀ bena , ne womegbugbɔ wo ̀ dzi o la , ma ̃ te ŋu ayi mawufiaɖuƒe la me o . ”

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Nikodemo do ɣli gblɔ be , “ Đe ne ̀ be woagadzim akea ? Nya sia gɔme ɖe ? Aleke wɔ ame tsitsi nagatrɔ ayi dadaa ƒe vidzigolo me be woagadzii ake ? ”

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nya si dzi mele gbe tem ɖo lae nye be , ne womegbugbɔ ame aɖe dzi to tsi kple gbɔgbɔ me o la , mate ŋu ayi mawufiaɖuƒe la me o .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Amegbetɔ ate ŋu adzi ŋutila ̃ ko gake Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe lae naa agbe yeye tso dziƒo .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Le esia ta megawɔ nuku na wo ̀ bena megblɔ na wo ̀ be ele be woagbugbɔ wo ̀ adzi o .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Ya ƒona yia teƒe ɖe sia ɖe si wo ̀ lɔ ̃ , a ̃ te ŋu ase eŋkɔ gake ma ̃ te ŋu agblɔ afi si wo ̀ tso alo afi si wo ̀ yina o , nenema kee wo ̀ nɔna na ame sia ame si wodzi to Gbɔgbɔ la me . ”

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Nikodemo gabia Yesu bena , “ Nu ka tututu gblɔm ne ̀ le ? Nyemese wo ̀ nyaa gɔme o . ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Wo ̀ , Israel ƒe nufiala , me ̀ se nu siawo gɔme oa ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , mi ́ awo la , mi ́ eƒoa nu tso nu siwo mienya , eye mi ́ eɖia ɖase tso nu siwo mi ́ ekpɔ la ŋu , ke ha ̃ la miexɔa mi ́ aƒe ɖaseɖiɖi o .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Esi megblɔ nu siwo le edzi yim le amewo dome le anyigba dzi le afii la na wo ̀ gake me ̀ xɔ wo dzi se o ɖe , aleke na ̃ wɔ axɔe se ne megblɔ nu siwo le edzi yim le dziƒo la na wo ̀ ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Elabena nye Mesia alo Amegbetɔ Vi la koe tso dziƒo va anyigba dzi eye magatrɔ ayi dziƒo .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: ” Abe ale si Mose kɔ akɔblida la ɖe dzi le gbea dzi ene la , nenema ke woakɔ Amegbetɔvi la ɖe dzii ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: be ame sia ame si xɔa edzi sena la nakpɔ agbe mavɔ .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Elabena Mawu lɔ ̃ a xexeame ale gbegbe bena wo ̀ tsɔ eya ŋutɔ Via ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ la na bena , ame sia ame si axɔ edzi ase la , matsrɔ ̃ o , ke boŋ akpɔ agbe mavɔ .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Mawu meɖo Via ɖa be wo ̀ ava drɔ ̃ ʋɔnu xexeame o , ke boŋ be woaɖe xexeame to eya amea dzi .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: ” Ame siwo xɔ edzi se la , womadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo o . Ke ame siwo mexɔ edzi se o la , wodrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo xoxo , elabena womexɔ Mawu ƒe Vi ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ la dzi se o .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Nu si ta wodrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo xoxo lae nye be , Kekeli tso dziƒo va xexeame , gake ame siawo lɔ ̃ viviti wu kekeli la , elabena woƒe nuwɔnawo vɔ ̃ ɖi ŋutɔ .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Wole ́ fu Kekeli si tso dziƒo va la elabena wodi vevie bena yewoawɔ nu vɔ ̃ le viviti me . Wote ɖa xaa tso Kekeli la gbɔ , elabena wovɔ ̃ be yewoƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo adze le gagla ̃ gbe .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Gake ame siwo le nu nyui wɔm la , vaa Kekeli la gbɔ dzidzɔtɔe bena ame sia ame nakpɔe be yewole Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu wɔm . ”

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu kple ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo le Yerusalem heyi Yudea afi si wonɔ ŋkeke ʋee aɖewo hede mawutsi ta na amewo .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Ke Yohanes ha ̃ le mawutsi dem ta na amewo le Aenon , si te ɖe Salem ŋuti , elabena tsi sɔgbɔ ɖe afi ma , eye amewo le vavam enuenu be wo ̀ ade mawutsi ta na yewo

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Esia do ŋgɔ na Yohanes le ́ le de gaxɔ me .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Gbe ɖeka la , nyaʋiʋli ɖo Yohanes ƒe nusrɔ ̃ la aɖewo kple Yudatɔwo dome tso Yudatɔwo ƒe ŋutikɔklɔkɔnu la ŋu .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Esia na be nusrɔ ̃ lawo va Yohanes gbɔ va gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nufiala , ŋutsu si nedo goe le Yɔdan tɔsisia godo , ame si ne ̀ be eyae nye Mesia la ha ̃ le mawutsi dem ta na amewo , eye ame geɖe le egbɔ yim , le esime wo ̀ le be woava mia gbɔ boŋ hafi . ”

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Yohanes ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Mawu si le dziƒo la de dɔ tɔxɛ asi na ame sia ame .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Nye dɔe nye be madzra mɔ ɖo ɖi na ŋutsu sia bena ame sia ame nate ŋu ayi egbɔ . Miawo ŋutɔwo miaɖo ŋku edzi be megblɔ na mi va yi kɔtee be , menye nyee nye Mesia la o . Nye ya la , nu si wɔ ge meva la koe nye be mata mɔ na Mesia la .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Ele eme be amewo ƒoa zi ɖe nu nyui ɖe sia ɖe ŋu . Nenema ke ŋugbetɔ ayi afi si ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la le , eye afi mae ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la xɔlɔ ̃ wo akpɔ dzidzɔ kplii le . Nyee nye ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ la xɔlɔ ̃ , eya ta dzidzɔ yɔ menye ɖe eƒe dzidzedzekpɔkpɔ ŋuti .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Ele be eya amea natsi ɖe edzi gbeawotsyogbe . Ke nye la , mayi to .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: “ Ame sia la , dziƒoe wo ̀ tso eye ede ŋgɔ wu amewo kata ̃ . Nye la , anyigba dzie metso eye nye nunya kple nugɔmesese mate ŋu akɔ wu anyigbadzitɔwo tɔ o .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Eɖia ɖase tso nu si wo ̀ kpɔ kple nu si wo ̀ se la ŋuti , gake ame ʋee aɖewo koe xɔa eƒe ɖaseɖiɖiwo dzi sena .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Ame si xɔ edzi se la ɖi ɖase be Mawue nye anukwaretɔ ,

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Elabena ame si Mawu ɖo ɖa gblɔa Mawu ƒe nyawo , elabena Mawu na Gbɔgbɔ lae le agbɔsɔsɔ me .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Fofo la lɔ ̃ a Via sia ale gbegbe be etsɔ nu sia nu de eƒe asime .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Ame sia ame si xɔ Mawu ƒe Vi sia dzi se la , akpɔ agbe mavɔ . Ke ame siwo meɖoa toe o , eye womexɔa edzi sena o la , makpɔ agbe mavɔ la o , ke boŋ Mawu ƒe dziku anɔ wo dzi ɖaa . ”

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Farisitɔwo se be Yesu le nusrɔ ̃ lawo kpɔm fu ̃ u eye wo ̀ le mawutsi dem ta na amewo tsɔ wu Yohanes ,

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: togbɔ be menye eya ŋutɔe le mawutsi dem ta na amewo o , ke boŋ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawoe .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Esi Yesu se nya sia la , edzo le Yudea , hetrɔ yi Galilea nutome .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Enɔ na Yesu be wo ̀ ato Samaria nutome hafi ayi Galilea .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Le ŋdɔ ga wuieve me lɔƒo la , eva ɖo Samariatɔwo ƒe du aɖe si woyɔna be Sikar la ƒe gbɔto .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Yakɔb ƒe vudo la le afi sia . Vudo sia le anyigba si Yakɔb tsɔ na via Yosef la dzi . Le mɔ legbe si wo ̀ zɔ le ŋdɔ sese ̃ nu kple ɖeɖiteameŋu ta la , Yesu bɔbɔ nɔ vudoa gbɔ be yeadzudzɔ .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Eteƒe medidi o , Samaria nyɔnu aɖe va be yeaku tsi , ale Yesu biae be nena tsi vi aɖe ye yeano .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Yesu ɖeka koe nɔ teƒea le ɣeyiɣi sia me elabena eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo yi kɔƒea me nuɖuɖu ƒle ge .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Ewɔ nuku na Samaria nyɔnua ŋutɔ be Yesu si nye Yudatɔ la bia nu ye Samariatɔ . Le nyateƒe me la , Yudatɔwo meƒoa nu kple Samariatɔwo o . Le esia ta Samaria nyɔnua gblɔ na Yesu bena , “ Aleke wo ̀ Yudatɔ , ne ̀ le tsi biam nye Samaria nyɔnu be yeano ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ne ɖe ne ̀ nya ame si ƒomevi menye kple nunana xɔasi si Mawu ɖo ɖi na wo ̀ la , anye ne a ̃ biam be mana agbetsi la ƒe ɖe ye . ”

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Vudo sia goglo ŋutɔ eye naneke mele asiwo ̀ be na ̃ tsɔ aku tsii le eme o . Afi ka ne ̀ le agbetsia kpɔ ge le ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , wo ̀ e de ŋgɔ wu mia tɔgbuitɔgbui Yakɔb maha ̃ ? Aleke wɔ wo ̀ na ̃ te ŋu ana tsi si nyo wu tsi si eya kple viawo kpakple eƒe nyiwo no va yi ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ne amewo no tsi sia ƒe ɖe la , tsikɔ gawua wo .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Gake tsi si mana wo ̀ la , azu agbetsi anɔ dzidzim le mewo ̀ , ana be tsikɔ magawu wo ̀ o , ke boŋ ahe agbe mavɔ vɛ na wo ̀ . ”

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Nyɔnu la gblɔ na Yesu bena , “ Aƒetɔ , meɖe kuku , na tsi sia ƒe ɖem ! Ekema nyemagazɔ azɔli tso keke dua me ke ava nɔ tsi kum le afi sia gbe sia gbe o . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Heyi na ̃ yɔ srɔ ̃ wo ̀ vɛ . ”

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Srɔ ̃ mele asinye o ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ E ̀ to nyateƒe esi ne ̀ gblɔ be srɔ ̃ mele asiwo ̀ o . ”

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Elabena e ̀ ɖe ŋutsu atɔ ̃ kpɔ , eye ame si gbɔ ne ̀ le fifia ha ̃ la menye srɔ ̃ wo ̀ wo ̀ nye o , e ̀ to nyateƒe le nya sia me . ”

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Egblɔ na Yesu be , “ Aƒetɔ , mexɔe se be nyagblɔɖilae ne ̀ nye .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Nu ka tae mi Yudatɔwo mienɔa gbɔgblɔm godoo be , Yerusalem kokokoe wo ̀ le be woasubɔ Mawu le , evɔa mi ́ Samariatɔwo ha ̃ miebe , ele be woasubɔ Mawu le to sia dzi elabena afi siae mi ́ a tɔgbuiwo subɔe le ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Nyɔnu , xɔm se be , ɣeyiɣi gbɔna eye womagasubɔ Fofo la le to sia dzi alo leYerusalem o .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Mi Samariatɔwo la , miesubɔa nu si mienya o , ke mi ́ awo la mi ́ esubɔa nu si mi ́ enya , elabena xɔxɔ la tso Yudatɔwo gbɔ .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Gake ɣeyiɣi aɖe gbɔna , eye wo ̀ de azɔ be nyateƒe subɔsubɔwɔlawo woasubɔ Fofo la le gbɔgbɔ kple nyateƒe me , elabena Fofo la dia subɔla siawo tɔgbi

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Mawu nye Gbɔgbɔ eye ame siwo le esubɔm la , ele be woasubɔe le gbɔgbɔ kple nyateƒe me . ”

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nye la , menyae bena Mesia alo Kristo la le vava ge eye ne eva la , aɖe nu sia nu gɔme na mi ́ . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nyee nye Mesia la . ”

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya sia vɔ teti ko la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo va do . Ewɔ nuku na nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ bena Yesu nɔ dze ɖom kple nyɔnu aɖe gake wo dometɔ aɖeke mebia nu si ta wo ̀ le nu ƒom kple nyɔnua alo nu si me dzrom wonɔ la o .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Nyɔnu la gble eƒe tsize la ɖe vudoa to eye wo ̀ trɔ yi dua me ɖagblɔ na ame siwo wo ̀ kpɔ la be ,

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: “ Miva kpɔ ŋutsu aɖe si gblɔ nu siwo kata ̃ mewɔ kpɔ la nam ɖa . Đe manye ame siae nye Kristo la oa ? ”

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Ale ame geɖewo tso dua me va bena yewoakpɔ amea ɖa .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Esi nuɖuɖua sɔ gbe la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖe kuku na Yesu be wo ̀ aɖu nu .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Nyemaɖu nu o , elabena nuɖuɖu aɖe le asinye esi ŋu miawo mienya nu le o . ”

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Ke nusrɔ ̃ lawo bia le wo nɔewo dome be , “ Ame kae tsɔ nuɖuɖua vɛ nɛ ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Yesu ɖe eme na wo bena , “ Nye nuɖuɖue nye be mawɔ Mawu , ame si ɖom ɖa la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu eye mawu dɔ si wo ̀ dɔm la nu .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Menye miawoe nɔa gbɔgblɔm be esusɔ ɣleti ene ne nuŋeɣi naɖo oa ? Miwu miaƒe ŋkuwo dzi , ne miakpɔ agblewo dzi ɖa , nukuawo tsi eye wole klalo na ŋeŋe xoxo .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Nuŋelawo axɔ fetu nyuiwo eye woakplɔ ame geɖewo va agbe mavɔ la mee . Nuƒa ̃ lawo kple nuŋelawo siaa akpɔ dzidzɔ geɖe .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be , ame aɖee doa nu hafi ame aɖe va ŋena .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Nye la , medɔ mi be miayi aɖaŋe nu le afi si mieƒa ̃ nu ɖo o , ame bubuwoe ƒa ̃ nua hafi miawo mieyi ɖaŋe wo . ”

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Esi Samaria nyɔnua gblɔ na wo detɔwo be Yesu gblɔ nu sia nu si yewɔ kpɔ la na ye la , ame geɖe ŋutɔ le dua me xɔe se be Yesue nye Mesia la .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Azɔ esi Samariatɔwo va egbɔ la , woɖe kuku nɛ be wo ̀ anɔ yewo gbɔ , eye wo ̀ nɔ wo gbɔ ŋkeke eve

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Le eƒe nyawo ta la , ame geɖe wu xɔ edzi se .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Ale wova gblɔ na nyɔnu si do goe gba ̃ le vudoa to be , “ Azɔ la , miawo ha ̃ miexɔ edzi se elabena mi ́ awo ŋutɔ ha ̃ miese nya geɖewo tso eƒe nu me , ke menye le wo ̀ ɖaseɖiɖi ɖeɖe ko ta o . Le nyateƒe me la , ame siae nye xexeame ƒe Đela vava ̃ . ”

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Le ŋkeke eve megbe la , edzo yi Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Elabena Yesu ŋutɔ gblɔe ɖi xoxo be , nyagblɔɖila aɖeke mekpɔa bubu le eya ŋutɔ de o .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Gake esi wo ̀ yi Galilea la , Galileatɔwo xɔe alɔ eve , elabena ewɔ nukunu geɖewo wokpɔ le Yerusalem esi wo ̀ yi ɖaɖu ŋutitotoŋkeke nyui la le afi ma .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Yesu gava Kana le Galilea afi si wo ̀ trɔ tsi wo ̀ zu wain le . Afi mae wo ̀ do go fiaŋutime aɖe le , ŋutsu sia ƒe vi le dɔ le ́ m le Kapernaum .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Esi wo ̀ se be Yesu tso Yudea va ɖo Galilea la , eyi egbɔ heɖe kuku nɛ be wo ̀ ava yɔ dɔ ye viŋutsuvi si ɖo kudo nu la na ye .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Yesu biae bena , “ Ke mia dometɔ aɖeke maxɔ dzinye ase o , negbe ɖeko mewɔ nukunu geɖewo hafia ? ”

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Aʋafia la ɖe kuku nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , meɖe kuku , va mi ́ yi kaba hafi vinyea naku ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Trɔ na ̃ yi aƒe elabena viwo ̀ la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ . ” Aʋafia la xɔ Yesu dzi se eye wo ̀ trɔ hedze aƒemɔ dzi .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ mɔa dzi yina la , eƒe dɔla aɖewo va kpee hegblɔ nɛ be , via ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Aʋafia la bia wo be woagblɔ gaƒoƒo si me tututu ŋutsuvi la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ la na ye . Woɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Etsɔ , anɔ abe ŋdɔ ga ɖeka me ene la , asra ̃ sese ̃ la dzo ɖa le edzi kpata . ”

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Aʋafia la ɖo ŋku edzi be gaƒoƒo ma me tututue Yesu gblɔ na ye be , “ Viwo ̀ la ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ . ” Ale Aʋafia sia kple eƒe aƒe me tɔwo kata ̃ xɔe se be Yesue nye Mesia la vava ̃

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Esia nye Yesu ƒe nukunu evelia si wo ̀ wɔ esi wo ̀ tso Yudea va Galilea .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Le nu siawo megbe la , Yesu yi Yerusalem le Yudatɔwo ƒe ŋkekenyui aɖe dzi .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Taa aɖe nɔ dua ƒe agbo si woyɔna be Ale ̃ gbo la gbɔ . Woyɔa taa sia le Hebrigbe me be Betesda Taa . Wowɔ agbadɔ atɔ ̃ ƒo xla ̃ e .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
