text2: La ̃ metututɔwo , bunɔwo , ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo , titile ́ lawo kple dɔ vovovo le ́ lawo va nɔa agbadɔawo te , le taa la to , henɔa tsia me bublu lalam

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Elabena edziedzi la , mawudɔla aɖe ɖina ɖe tsi la me heblunɛ , eye dɔnɔ si ge ɖe tsia me gba ̃ le ebublu vɔ megbe la , ƒe dɔ si le ́ m wo ̀ nɔ la vɔna nɛ .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Ame aɖe ha ̃ nɔ teƒea si nɔ dɔ le ́ m ƒe blaetɔ ̃ - vɔ - enyi sɔŋ .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Esi Yesu kpɔe eye wo ̀ kpɔe dze sii be ele dɔa le ́ m eteƒe didi la , ebiae be , “ E ̀ di be wo ̀ la ̃ me nase ̃ a ? ”

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Dɔnɔa ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̃ , gake ame aɖeke mele asinye si akɔm ada ɖe tsia me nenye be wova blui o . Ne medze agbagba be mage ɖe eme ko la , ame bubu doa ŋgɔ gena ɖe eme xoxo . ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Tsi tre , na ̃ ŋlɔ wo ̀ aba ne na ̃ yi aƒe me ! ”

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Dɔnɔa ƒe la ̃ me se ̃ enumake ale wo ̀ ŋlɔ eƒe aba la hede asi zɔzɔ me . Sabat ŋkekea dzie Yesu wɔ nukunu sia le .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Le esia ta la , Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo kpɔ dziku ɖe eŋu . Wogblɔ na ame si ŋu wo ̀ da gbe le be , “ Egbee nye Sabat , eya ta me ̀ kpɔ mɔ awɔ dɔ aɖeke o . Mɔɖeɖe ha ̃ meli be nale ́ aba ɖe asi anɔ yiyim o ! ”

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ame si da gbe le ŋunye lae na mɔm . ”

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Wobiae be , “ Ame kae nye ame ma si ɖe mɔ na wo ̀ be na ̃ wɔ esia ? ” "

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Amea menya ame si Yesu nye o , evɔ Yesu ha ̃ bu ɖe ameha la dome xoxo .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Emegbe la , Yesu va ke ɖe eŋu le gbedoxɔ la me eye wo ̀ gblɔ nɛ bena , " “ Azɔ la , wo ̀ la ̃ me se ̃ eya ta me ̀ gawɔ nu vɔ ̃ azɔ o , ne menye nenema o la , nu si adzɔ ɖe dziwo ̀ emegbe la , avɔ ̃ ɖi wu gba ̃ tɔ . ”

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Ke ŋutsua yi ɖadi Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo bena Yesue nye ame si da gbe le ye ŋu .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Le esia ta la , Yudatɔwo ti Yesu yome vevie be eda le Sabat ƒe sea dzi .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Ke Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Fofonye le dɔ nyui wɔwɔ dzi ɖaa va se ɖe fifi , ale nye ha ̃ mele eƒe afɔteƒe tom . ” Eƒe nya siawo gade ada mo na Yudatɔwo ƒe nunɔlawo ale wodi kokoko be yewoawui . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , wogblɔ be eyɔ Mawu be eyae nye ye Fofo , ale be wo ̀ tsɔ eɖokui sɔ kple Mawu .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Vi la mate ŋu awɔ naneke le eya ŋutɔ ɖokui si o , nu si wo ̀ wɔna lae nye nu si wo ̀ kpɔ Fofoa wo ̀ le wɔwɔm .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Elabena Fofo la lɔ ̃ a Via be wo ̀ awɔ nukunu ga ̃ wo wu esi miekpɔ va yi .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Via afɔ ame kuku siwo dze eŋgɔ la ɖe tsitre abe ale si Fofo la wɔnɛ ene .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Fofo la tsɔ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ kata ̃ gble ɖe Via sime

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: be amewo kata ̃ nade bubu eŋu abe ale si wodea bubu Fofo la ŋui ene . Gake ne miegbe bena yewomade bubu Mawu Vi si wo ̀ ɖo ɖe mi la ŋu o la , efia be miele bubu dem Fofo la ha ̃ ŋu o .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: ” Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , ame sia ame si sea nye nyawo , eye wo ̀ xɔ Mawu si ɖom ɖa la dzi se la , akpɔ agbe mavɔ , ale be womadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnui o , elabena eto ku me yi agbe mavɔ la me xoxo .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Megale gbe tem ɖe edzi na mi bena , ɣeyiɣi aɖe gbɔna , eva ɖo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ xoxo , esime ame kukuwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ase nye gbe , e ̃ , woase nye Mawu Vi la ƒe gbe , eye ame siwo awɔ ɖe edzi la akpɔ agbe mavɔ .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Abe ale si agbe le Fofo la ŋutɔ me ene la , nenema kee wo ̀ na be agbe nanɔ Via ha ̃ me ,

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: ale be Vi la nadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu amegbetɔwo kata ̃ le woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta elabena eyae nye Mesia alo Amegbetɔvi la .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Megawɔ nuku na mi o . Le nyateƒe me la , ɣeyiɣi aɖe li gbɔna ; esi ame kuku siwo le yɔdowo me ha ̃ ase Mawu Vi la ƒe gbe ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: eye woatsi tre ado go tso yɔdoawo me . Ana ame siwo wɔ nu nyuiwo la nayi agbe mavɔ la me , ke adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame vlo siwo kpɔ dzidzɔ le vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ŋuti .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: ” Nye la medrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu abe ale si Fofo la di tso asinye ene . Nyemedrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu ame aɖeke ha ̃ o , negbe ne Fofo la di tso asinye ko . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , medrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu le dzɔdzɔenyenye nu eye ame ŋkumekpɔkpɔ mele eme o , elabena medrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu ɖe Mawu si dɔm ɖa la ƒe didi nu . Nye la nyemewɔa nye lɔlɔ ̃ nu le ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ me o , Fofo la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu ko mewɔna .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: ” Ne meɖi ɖase le ɖokuinye ŋu la , amewo mexɔnɛ sena o .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Ame bubu aɖe li si le ɖase ɖim tso ŋutinye eye menya be eƒe ɖaseɖiɖi tso ŋutinye le eteƒe .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: ” Miawo la miedɔ amewo ɖe Yohanes gbɔ , eye wo ̀ ɖi ɖase ɖo kpe nyateƒe la dzi .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Gake mana mianya bena , ɖase detotɔ kata ̃ wu esi woɖi tso ŋunye metso amegbetɔ aɖeke gbɔ o . Togbɔ be meƒo nu na mi tso Yohanes ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi ŋuti ha ̃ la , ɖe mewɔ esia be miaxɔ dzinye ase ale be miakpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yohanes zu kekeli kle ̃ na mi ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe , ale be miekpɔ dzidzɔ le kekelia ŋuti elabena eƒe kekle ̃ la ɖe vi na mi .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Ke nye la , ɖasefo si kɔ wu Yohanes la le asinye . Esiae nye be , mewɔ nukunu geɖe siwo nye dɔ siwo Fofo la tsɔ de asi nam . Woawoe fia be Fofo lae dɔm vava ̃ .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Fofo la ŋutɔ ɖi ɖase le ŋunye togbɔ be miekpɔe kpɔ alo meƒo nu na mi kpɔ o ha ̃ .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Ke , togbɔ be Fofo la le ɖase ɖim na mi ha ̃ la , miegbe be yewoamaɖo toe o , elabena miegbe be yewomaxɔ nye , ame si wo ̀ dɔ ɖa kple eƒe agbenya la dzi ase o .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: ” Miedzroa mawunya me tsitotsito elabena miexɔ se bena miekpɔa agbe mavɔ le eme . Evɔ mawunya bliboa kata ̃ la , dzinyee wotui ɖo .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Gake miegbe gbidii bena yewomava gbɔnye ale be mana agbe mavɔ sia mi o .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: ” Nyemexɔa kafukafu tso amewo gbɔ o .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Ke menya mi , eye menyae be , Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ mele mia me o .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Menya esia elabena nye la meva le fofonye ƒe ŋkɔ me gake miegbe gbidii be yewomaxɔm o , ke esi ɖokuitɔdilawo va le woawo ŋutɔwo ƒe ŋkɔ me la , miexɔ wo alɔ eve .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Mewɔ nuku nam bena miegbe bena yewomaxɔ dzinye ase o . Elabena miedea bubu mia nɔewo ŋu kple dzidzɔ gake mietsɔ ɖeke le eme na bubu si Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ ha ̃ de mia ŋu o !

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: ” Menye nyee le mia nu tso ge na Fofo la tso nu siawo ŋuti o , ke boŋ Mose , ame si ƒe sewo dzi mietsɔ miaƒe mɔkpɔkpɔwo kata ̃ da ɖo bena ele mia kplɔ ge ayi ɖe dziƒoe la , eyae le mia nu tso ge .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Miawo la , miegbe bena yewomaxɔ Mose dzi ase o , anye ne miexɔ nye ha ̃ dzinye se . Elabena Mose ŋlɔ nu tso ŋunye gake miexɔ edzi se o . Le esia ta miexɔ nye ha ̃ dzinye se o .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Esi miexɔ Mose ƒe ŋɔŋlɔwo dzi se o ta la , miexɔ nye ha ̃ dzinye se o . ”

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Le esiawo megbe la , Yesu tso Galilea ƒu si woyɔna ha ̃ be Tiberia ƒu la yi egodo .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ aɖe nɔ eyome elabena wokpɔ nukunu siwo wo ̀ wɔ heda gbe le dɔnɔwo ŋu .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Yesu lia togbɛ aɖe eye eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ anyi ɖe afi ma .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la ha ̃ te tu aƒe le ɣemaɣi me .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Esi Yesu fɔ ta dzi la , ekpɔ ameha ga ̃ aɖe gbɔna ɖe egbɔ , etrɔ ɖe Filipo ŋu biae bena , “ Filipo , afi kae mi ́ akpɔ nuɖuɖu le aƒle na ame gbogbo siawo ? ”

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Yesu gblɔ esia bena yeatsɔ ado Filipo ƒe xɔse akpɔ elabena eya ŋutɔ nya nu si wɔ ge wo ̀ ala .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Filipo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mi ́ ahia ̃ ga home ga ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ ne mi ́ ete kpɔ be mi ́ aƒle nuɖuɖu na ame siawo kata ̃ ! ”

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka , Andrea , Simɔn Petro nɔvi , gblɔ nɛ bena ,

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: “ Ŋutsuvi aɖe le afii si si abolo atɔ ̃ kple tɔmela ̃ memee eve le , gake nu ka esia ate ŋu awɔ le ameha ga ̃ sia ŋuti ? ”

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Mina ame sia ame nanɔ anyi . ” Ale ame siwo ƒe xexle ̃ me anɔ akpe atɔ ̃ la nɔ anyi ɖe gbe dama la dzi .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Yesu tsɔ aboloawo eye wo ̀ do gbe ɖa heda akpe ɖe wo ta . Emegbe la , etsɔe na eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo be woama na ameawo . Edo gbe ɖa ɖe tɔmela ̃ memee eveawo ha ̃ ta eye wo ̀ tsɔe na ameawo . Ale ame sia ame ɖu nu ɖi ƒo nyuie .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo bena , “ Azɔ , miƒo abolo wuwluiawo kata ̃ nu ƒu bena womagazu vlo o . ”

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Woƒo abolo wuwluiawo kata ̃ nu ƒu wo ̀ yɔ kusi wuieve sɔŋ .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Esi ameawo kpɔ nukunu ga ̃ si Yesu wɔ la , wodo ɣli gblɔ bena , “ Le nyateƒe me la , ame siae nye Nyagblɔɖila si mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm na ! ”

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Yesu kpɔe dze sii bena ameawo nɔ didim be yewoale ́ ye aɖo fia sese ̃ tɔe eya ta ewɔ dzaa galia togbɛ la eye wo ̀ dzo le wo gbɔ .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Le fie ̃ me la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo yi ƒuta ɖanɔ elalam le afi ma .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Za ̃ do vɔ keŋ , gake Yesu medo ta ɖa o . eya ta nusrɔ ̃ lawo ge ɖe ʋu aɖe me eye wokui ɖo ta Kapernaum

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Ya sese ̃ aɖe de asi ƒoƒo me eye ƒu la dze agbo .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Esi woku ʋua abe kilometa atɔ ̃ alo ade ko ene la , wokpɔ Yesu wo ̀ le tetem ɖe ʋua ŋuti , enɔ zɔzɔm le tsia dzi , ke nusrɔ ̃ lawo vɔ ̃ ŋutɔ .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Gake edo ɣli yɔ wo eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo bena , womegavɔ ̃ o .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Esi wonya be Yesue la , wokɔe de ʋua me eye enumake ʋua de tɔkɔ afi si yim wonɔ .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Le ŋufɔke la ameha la le tsitre ɖe ƒu la ƒe go kemɛ dzi , eye wokpɔ bena ʋu bubu aɖeke megale afi ma o , negbe ɖeka ko , wokpɔ ha ̃ be Yesu meɖo ʋua kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo o , ke boŋ woawo ɖeɖe koe yi .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Tete ʋu bubu aɖewo ha ̃ tso Tiberia va ɖo afi si ameawo ɖu abolo si Aƒetɔ la yra kple akpedada le ,

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: eya ta ameawo nɔ ŋku le ́ m ɖe wo me nɔ Yesu dim . Ke esi womekpɔ Yesu alo eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo le ʋuawo dometɔ aɖeke me o la , woɖo ʋuawo heyi Kapernaum be yewoaɖadii

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Esi woɖo Kapernaum la , wokpɔ Yesu eye wobiae be , “ Nufiala , ale ke ne ̀ wɔ hafi va do ɖe afi sia ? ”

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Le nyateƒe me la , miele diyem , menye kple susu be miexɔ dzinye se ta o , ke boŋ le nuɖuɖu si mena mi nyitsɔ la ta .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Nuɖuɖu tea ŋu gble ̃ na , eya ta migatsi dzi ɖe nu siwo gble ̃ na la ŋu akpa o . Ke boŋ mitsɔ miaƒe ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ ti agbe mavɔ si Nye , Mesia alo Amegbetɔ Vi la mana mi la yome . Elabena esia tae Mawu Fofo la ɖom ɖe xexeame . ”

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Ameawo biae be , “ Nu ka tututue mi ́ awɔ be wo ̀ adze Mawu ŋu ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Enye Mawu ƒe didi be miaxɔ ame si wo ̀ ɖo ɖe mi la dzi ase . ”

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Tete ameawo biae be , “ Nukunu ka na ̃ wɔ mi ́ akpɔ be mi ́ axɔ dziwo ̀ ase ? Nu ka na ̃ wɔ ? ”

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Mi ́ a fofowo ɖu mana le gbea dzi abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖi ene be , “ Ena abolo wo tso dziƒo be woaɖu . ”

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Fofonyee na aboloa wo , menye Mosee na wo o . Eya ta azɔ la , ele Abolo vava ̃ tɔ nam mi tso dziƒo .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Abolo vava ̃ tɔ siae nye Amegbetɔ , si Mawu ɖo ɖa tso dziƒo , eye ame sia naa agbe xexeame kata ̃ . ”

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Ameawo gagblɔ bena , “ Aƒetɔ , na abolo vava ̃ sia mi ́ gbe sia gbe . ”

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Nyee nye abolo vava ̃ si naa agbe amewo . Ame sia ame si ava gbɔnye la , dɔ magawui akpɔ o , eye ame si xɔ dzinye se la , tsikɔ ha ̃ magawui gbeɖegbeɖe o .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Gake nu si le fu ɖem na mi , abe ale si megblɔ do ŋgɔe ene lae nye bena , togbɔ be miekpɔm ha ̃ la , miexɔ dzinye se o .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Ke ame siwo Fofo la tsɔ nam la , ava gbɔnye eye nyemagbe wo xɔxɔ gbeɖe o .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Elabena ɖe metso dziƒo va bena mawɔ Mawu si dɔm ɖa la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu , ke menye nye ŋutɔ nye lɔlɔ ̃ nu o .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Mawu ƒe didie nye bena , nyemabu ame siwo wo ̀ tsɔ nam la ƒe ɖeke o , ke boŋ be makplɔ wo va agbe mavɔ la mee le Nuwuwuŋkekea dzi .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Enye Fofo la ƒe didi vevie ha ̃ be , ame sia ame si kpɔ Via eye wo ̀ xɔ edzi se la , nakpɔ agbe mavɔ eye mafɔe ɖe tsitre le Nuwuwuŋkekea dzi . ”

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Azɔ Yudatɔwo de asi liʋiliʋi ̃ lili ̃ me le eŋu le ale si wo ̀ gblɔ be yee nye abolo si tso dziƒo va la ta .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Wodo ɣli hoo be , “ Nu ka ! Menye ame siae nye Yesu , Yosef vi la oa ? Mienya fofoa kple dadaa ɖe ! Ke nu ka koŋ gblɔm wo ̀ le fifia ? Đe wo ̀ le gbɔgblɔm be dziƒoe yetso va ? ”

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Migali ̃ liʋiliʋi ̃ be megblɔ nya sia ta o .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Elabena ame aɖeke mate ŋu ava gbɔnye o , negbe Fofo si dɔm ɖa lae hee ɖe ŋunye , eye le Nuwuwuŋkekea dzi la , mana ame siawo kata ̃ ƒomevi natsi tre .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖe mawunya mee ene la , ‘ Woafia nu wo kata ̃ tso Mawu ŋuti . ’ Ame siwo kata ̃ Fofo la ƒo nu na , eye wosrɔ ̃ nyateƒe la le egbɔ la , ava gbɔnye .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Menye ɖe mele gbɔgblɔm be ame aɖeke kpɔ Mawu kpɔ ŋkume kple ŋkume o , elabena Nye , ame si tso Fofo la gbɔ la , koe kpɔe kpɔ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: ” Mele egblɔm na mi nyateƒetɔe be , ame sia ame si xɔ dzinye se la , agbe mavɔ le esi xoxo !

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Nyee nye agbebolo la !

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Togbɔ be mia fofowo ɖu mana si wona wo tso dziƒo ha ̃ la , wo kata ̃ woku .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Ke esiae nye abolo si ɖi tso dziƒo va , esi ame aɖu eye maku o .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Nyee nye agbebolo si ɖi tso dziƒo va . Ne ame aɖe ɖu abolo sia la , anɔ agbe tegbee . Abolo siae nye nye ŋutila ̃ si matsɔ ana ɖe xexeame ƒe agbe ta . ”

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Azɔ ʋiʋli gaɖo Yudatɔwo dome tso nya si tututu gblɔm Yesu nɔ la ŋuti . Wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Aleke ŋutsu sia awɔ atsɔ eƒe ŋutila ̃ ana mi be míaɖu ? ”

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Yesu gaɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Mele gbe tem ɖe edzi na mi nyateƒetɔe bena , ne ame aɖe meɖu Mesia alo Amegbetɔ Vi la ƒe ŋutila ̃ eye wo ̀ no eƒe ʋu o la , agbe mavɔ la mate ŋu anɔ eme o .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ke ame si ɖu nye ŋutila ̃ eye wo ̀ no nye ʋu la , agbe mavɔ la le esi xoxo , eye eyae nye ame si mafɔ ɖe tsitre le Nuwuwuŋkekea dzi .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Elabena nye ŋutila ̃ e nye nuɖuɖu vava ̃ la eye nye ʋue nye nunono vava ̃ la .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Ame sia ame si ɖua nye ŋutila ̃ eye wo ̀ noa nye ʋu lae nye ame si le menye eye nye ha ̃ mele eme .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Nye la mele agbe , elabena Fofo gbagbe si dɔm ɖa la na ŋuse ̃ m , eye nenema ke ame siwo ɖua nye ŋutila ̃ la , anɔ agbe elabena mena agbe wo .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Nyee nye abolo vava ̃ si tso dziƒo va , ame sia ame si aɖu abolo sia ƒe ɖe la anɔ agbe tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me , eye maku abe ale si mia fofowo ku togbɔ be woɖu abolo si tso dziƒo la ha ̃ ene o . ”

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya siawo kata ̃ le esime wo ̀ nɔ nu fiam le Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒuƒoƒe le Kapernaum . Nya la nye gbɔgbɔ kple agbe

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ gblɔ bena , “ Nyateƒe , Aƒetɔ ƒe nya siawo gɔmesese sese ̃ ŋutɔ . Ame kae ate ŋu ase wo gɔme ? ”

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Yesu kpɔe dze sii be yeƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo le liʋiliʋi ̃ li ̃ m , eya ta ebia wo bena , “ Đe nye nyawo ɖia mia nua ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Ne ele alea ɖe , aleke miabu nenye be miekpɔ Amegbetɔ Vi la , wotrɔ yina dziƒo ake ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la koe naa agbe mavɔ . Wɔna aɖeke mele ŋutila ̃ ya ŋu o . Nya siwo megblɔ na mi la , nye Gbɔgbɔ kple Agbe .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Gake va se ɖe fifia la , mia dometɔ aɖewo mexɔ dzinye se o . ” Ke Yesu nya ame siwo mexɔ edzi se o kple ame si le ede ge asi la tso gɔmedzedzea me ke .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Yesu gblɔ mlɔeba be , “ Nya si megblɔ va yi lae nye nu si mewɔnɛ esi megblɔ be ame aɖeke mate ŋu ava gbɔnye o , negbe Fofo la ŋutɔe hee ɖe ŋunye . ”

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya siawo vɔ la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la geɖewo trɔ dzo le egbɔ hegblee ɖi .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Yesu trɔ ɖe nusrɔ ̃ la wuieveawo ŋu eye wo ̀ bia wo bena , “ Miawo ha ̃ miedi be yewoadzoa ? ”

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Simɔn Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ame ka gbɔe mi ́ adzo ayi ? Wo ̀ ko sie agbe mavɔ nya la le .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Mi ́ exɔe se eye mienyae bena wo ̀ e nye Mawu ƒe Vi Kɔkɔe la . ”

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Yesu trɔ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mi ame Wuievee metia , gake ame ɖeka le mia dome si nye abosam ! ”

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya sia tso Yuda , Simɔn Iskariɔt vi , ame si nye ame Wuieveawo dometɔ ɖeka , eye wo ̀ nye ame si atsɔe ade asi na eƒe futɔwo la ŋu .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Emegbe la , Yesu trɔ yi Galilea nutome , henɔ tsatsam le kɔƒewo me . Medi bena yeaɖo Yudea ya kura o , elabena Yudatɔwo nɔ nugbe ɖom ɖe eŋu le afi ma be yewoawui .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Azɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe ŋkekenyui vevi aɖe ɖo edzi . Woyɔa ŋkeke sia be Agbadɔmeŋkekenyui .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Esi ŋkekea tu aƒe ta la , Yesu nɔviŋutsuwo va ƒoe ɖe enu be neyi Yudea ne wo ̀ aɖu ŋkekenyuia le afi ma . Nɔviawo gblɔ nɛ be , “ Mi ́ edi be na ̃ yi Yudea elabena amewo le afi ma fu ̃ u si ate ŋu akpɔ wo ̀ nukunuwɔwɔwo .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Ame si dina be yeazu ame ŋkuta la mewɔa nu le bebeme o . Eya ta esi ne ̀ le nu siawo wɔm la , ele be na ̃ do ɖe gagla ̃ gbe ne xexeame nakpɔ wo ̀ . ”

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Nɔviawo gblɔ esia elebena woawo ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mexɔ edzi se o .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Miawo la , mievo eye miekpɔ mɔ ayi teƒe sia eye nya aɖeke madzɔ o , ke nye la , ɣeyiɣi sia menye ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ nam be mayi o .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Miawo la , xexeametɔwo mele ́ fu mi o , ke nye la , wole ́ fum vevie elabena mehe nya ɖe wo ŋu ɖe woƒe nu vɔ ̃ kple nu madzemadze wɔwɔ ta .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Mido ŋgɔ mianɔ yiyim faa . Ne ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ ɖo nam ko la , nye ha ̃ madze mia yome . ”

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Ale Yesu tsi Galilea le ŋkeke mawo me .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔviŋutsuwo dzo vɔ megbe la , eya ha ̃ yi ŋkekenyuia ɖuƒe . Ke eyi le bebeme be amewo nagakpɔ ye o .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo dii vevie le aza ̃ la ɖuƒe eye wonɔ eta biam se le amewo gbɔ .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Ame geɖewo nɔ nu ƒom le eŋu le teƒea . Ame aɖewo gblɔ be , “ Enye ame deŋgɔ wɔnuku aɖe . ” Ke ame bubuwo ha ̃ gblɔ be , “ Alakpatɔe wo ̀ nye le amewo flum le yiyim . ”

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Ke dzideƒo menɔ ame siwo nɔ ekafum la si be woaƒo nu tso eŋu le dutoƒo o , elabena wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m be Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo ava he to na yewo .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Esi ŋkekenyui la ƒe afa nu yi la , Yesu yi ɖe gbedoxɔ la me eye wo ̀ de asi nufiafia amewo me .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Ewɔ nuku na Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo ŋutɔ esi wose nu siwo gblɔm wo ̀ nɔ le gbedoxɔ la me . Wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Aleke wɔ ame sia nya nu siawo nyuie ale , togbɔ be mede miaƒe suku aɖeke kpɔ o ? ”

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Nye la , nyemele nu siwo tso nye ŋutɔ nye susu me la fiam o , ke boŋ Mawu si ɖom ɖa la ƒe susuwo fiam mele .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Nenye be mia dometɔ aɖe ɖoe kplikpaa bena yeawɔ Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu la , akpɔe adze sii xoxo nenye be nye nufiafia tso Mawu gbɔ loo alo enye nye ŋutɔ nye nyawo .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Ne ame aɖe le nu ƒom tso nu si eya ŋutɔ susu ŋuti la , ekema ele kafukafu dim na eɖokui tso amewo gbɔ . Ke ame si le didim bena yeade bubu ame si ɖoe ɖa ŋuti la , ame mae nye nyateƒetɔ kple nuteƒewɔla .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Mia dometɔ aɖeke mewɔa Mose ƒe sewo dzi o , ke nu ka tae wo ̀ le be miatsɔ nya ɖe ŋunye bena meda le eƒe sewo dzi . Eye nu ka tae wo ̀ le be miawum ɖe esia ta ? ”

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Ameawo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ la , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le mewo ̀ ! Ame kae le didim be yeawu wo ̀ ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Nukunu ɖeka pɛ ko mewɔ eye mi kata ̃ miaƒe mo wɔ yaa .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Ke Mose de se na mi be miatso aʋa eye mietsoa aʋa na mia viwo le Sabat ŋkekea gɔ ̃ ha ̃ dzi . Ke menye Mosee to aʋatsotso vɛ o , ke boŋ edzɔ tso fofoawo dzi le blema .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Azɔ la nenye be woate ŋu atso aʋa na ɖevi le Sabat dzi ale be womada le Mose ƒe se dzi o la , nu ka ŋuti miele dziku dom ɖe ŋunye be meda gbe le ameti blibo la ŋu le Sabat dzi ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Migadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ɖe dzedzeme nu o , ke boŋ midrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ɖe dzɔdzɔenyenye nu . ”

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Yerusalemtɔ aɖe siwo nɔ afi ma la gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Alo menye ame si dim dumega ̃ wo le be yewoawu lae nye esia oa ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Ame lae nye esi le afii le mawunya gblɔm le dutoƒo gake ame aɖeke mebia nya aɖekee o . Đe mi ́ aƒe dumega ̃ wo xɔe se mlɔeba be eyae nye Kristo la vava ̃ ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Ame bubuwo ha ̃ nɔ gbɔgblɔm be ame sia mate ŋu anye Kristo la o , elabena mi ́ enya afi si wodzii le , evɔ nenye be Kristo ŋutɔ ava la , ɖeko wo ̀ ado ko kpoyi , ame aɖeke manya afi si wo ̀ tso o . ”

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Yesu nya nu sia nu si gblɔm wonɔ eya ta esi wo ̀ nɔ mawunya gblɔm le gbedoxɔ la me la , egblɔ bena , “ Miawo la , mienyam eye mienya afi si wodzim le , ke magblɔ na mi bena , ame si mienya o lae dɔm ɖa , eye ame siae nye Nyateƒe la .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Nye la menyae elabena nye kplie li hafi wo ̀ dɔm ɖe mia gbɔ . ”

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Le Yesu ƒe nya siawo ta la , Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo di be yewoale ́ e , gake ame aɖeke mete ŋu te ɖe eŋu kaka ayi ele ́ ge o , elabena Mawu ƒe ɣeyiɣi si wo ̀ ɖo la mede haɖe o .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Ame geɖe siwo nɔ gbedoxɔ la me la xɔ edzi se eye wogblɔ be , “ Nukunu kawoe miele mɔ kpɔm be ne Kristo la va la awɔ , esi ame sia mewɔ o ? ”

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Esi Farisitɔwo se nya siawo le amewo nu la , wo kple Osɔfoga ̃ wo dɔ gbedoxɔmesrafowo ɖa bena woayi aɖale ́ Yesu .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Gake Yesu gblɔ be , “ Ele be maganɔ mia gbɔ vie hafi matrɔ agayi ame si dɔm ɖa gbɔ .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Miadim , ke miakpɔm o , eye miate ŋu ava afi si meyi ha ̃ o . ”

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Yesu ƒe nya siawo na be Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo tɔtɔ . Wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Afi kae wo ̀ le ɖoɖo wɔm bena yeadzo ayi ? Đewohi ̃ edi be yeayi aɖagblɔ mawunya na Yudatɔ siwo le anyigba vovovowo dzi alo be yeayi trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ƒe anyigba dzi aɖagblɔ mawunya na wo le afi ma . ”

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Wogabia ha ̃ be , “ Nu ka tututue wo ̀ wɔnɛ be , ‘ Miadim ke miakpɔm o , eye miate ŋu ava afi si mayi ha ̃ o . ’ ”

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Le agbadɔmeŋkekenyuia ƒe ŋkeke mamlɛtɔ dzi la , Yesu do ɣli gblɔ na ameha la be , “ Nenye be tsikɔ le mia dometɔ aɖe wum la , neva gbɔnye wo ̀ ava no tsi faa .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Elabena , mawunya gblɔ bena , “ Ame si xɔ dzinye se la , tɔsisi si me agbetsi le la anɔ dzidzim tso eya ma me ke . ”

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Yesu nɔ nu ƒom tso Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋuti elabena woana Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ame sia ame si xɔ edzi se . Ke womena Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la haɖe o elabena womekɔ Yesu ŋuti haɖe o . Mama ɖo ameawo dome

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Esi amehawo se nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la , ɖewo gblɔ be , “ Le nyateƒe me la , ame siae nye nyagblɔɖila si ava do ŋgɔ na Mesia la . ”

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Ame bubu aɖewo be , “ Eyae nye Kristo la ” . Ke ame bubu aɖewo le biabiam be , “ Đe Kristo ate ŋu atso Galilea maha ̃ ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Đe mawunya megblɔ be Kristo la atso David ƒe ƒome kple Betlehem , du si me David nɔ la me oa ? ”

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Ale mama ɖo ameawo dome tso ame si tututu Yesu nye la ŋuti .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Ame aɖewo di vevie be yewoale ́ e gake wo dometɔ aɖeke medo dzi ka asi eŋu o .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Asrafo siwo Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Farisitɔwo ɖo ɖa be woayi aɖale ́ Yesu la trɔ gbɔ va asi ƒuƒlu . Ameawo bia wo bena , “ Nu ka tae miele ́ ŋutsua vɛ o . ”

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Ke asrafoawo ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nya geɖe siwo ŋutsu sia gblɔ la sɔ to me na mi ŋutɔ . Le anukware me la mi ́ ese nya deto sia tɔgbi kpɔ o . ”

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Faristitɔawo ɖu fewu le asrafoawo ŋu gblɔ be , “ Ke ɖe ŋutsu sia flu miawo ha ̃ xoxoa ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Miekpɔ dumega ̃ aɖe alo Farisitɔ aɖe wo ̀ xɔ ame sia dzi sea ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Ameha ga ̃ sia , si mele naneke nyam o la , koe xɔ edzi se , ke nu kae wonya tso nu sia ŋuti . Fiƒode ava ame siawo dzi kokoko ! ”

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Ke Nikodemo si nye ameawo dometɔ ɖeka , ame si ha ̃ va Yesu gbɔ le za ̃ me la tsi tre hebia etɔwo bena ,

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: “ Đe wo ̀ le se nu be woatso nya me hafi adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame aɖea ? ”

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ ha ̃ Galileatɔe ne ̀ nyea ? Wo ̀ ŋutɔ dzro mawunya la me eye na ̃ kpɔ ŋuɖoɖo na ɖokuiwo ̀ . Le nyateƒe me la , nyagblɔɖila aɖeke matso Galilea o ! ”

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Ale takpekpea kaka eye ame sia ame dzo yi aƒe me .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Yesu trɔ dzo yi Amito la dzi .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Gake esi ŋu ke ko la , egatrɔ va gbedoxɔ la me . Ameha ga ̃ aɖe gaƒo zi ɖe eŋu , eye wo ̀ bɔbɔ nɔ anyi hefia nu wo .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nu ƒom la , Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo kple Faristitɔwo kplɔ nyɔnu aɖe si wole ́ asiasii , wo ̀ nɔ ahasi wɔm la vɛ eye wokplɔe da ɖe ameawo titina .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Azɔ wogblɔ na Yesu be , “ Nufiala , mi ́ ele ́ nyɔnu sia , asiasii wo ̀ nɔ ahasi wɔm .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Mose ƒe Se gblɔ bena , ne wole ́ ame aɖe alea la , ele be woaƒu kpee . Aleke ne ̀ kpɔ tso nya sia ŋu ? ”

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Ame siawo bia biabia sia Yesu be yewoatsɔ atre mɔ nɛ ale be ne wo ̀ gblɔ nya aɖe ko la , yewoatsɔ nya ɖe eŋu . Ke ɖeko Yesu bɔbɔ ta tsɔ eƒe asibidɛ ŋlɔ nui ɖe anyigba .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Ameawo ganɔ fu ɖem nɛ kokoko be neɖo nya la ŋu na yewo , eya ta efɔ kɔ dzi gblɔ na wo be , “ Enyo , miƒu kpe nyɔnu sia ne wo ̀ aku , gake ame si ŋu nu vɔ ̃ aɖeke mele o la , netre kpea ƒuƒui . ”

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Esi Yesu gblɔ nya siawo vɔ ko la , ebɔbɔ ta eye wo ̀ gade asi nua ŋɔŋlɔ me ɖe anyigba .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Esi wose esia la , wode asi dzodzo me ɖekaɖeka , tso tsitsitɔ dzi va se ɖe esime wo kata ̃ wodzo negbe Yesu kple nyɔnua kple ameha la koe susɔ .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Yesu fɔ ta dzi bia nyɔnua be , “ Afi ka ame siwo tsɔ nya ɖe ŋuwo ̀ la le ? Wo dometɔ ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ ha ̃ meƒu kpe wo ̀ oa ? ”

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Nyɔnua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Meɖe kuku , ao . ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nye ha ̃ nyemebu fɔ wo ̀ o ; heyi eye tso esia dzi la , me ̀ gawɔ nu vɔ ̃ azɔ o . ”

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Yesu gaƒo nu na ameawo eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Nyee nye xexeame ƒe Kekeli la . Eya ta ne ame aɖe dze yonyeme la , mazɔ viviti me o , elabena agbe ƒe kekeli la akle ̃ ɖe eƒe mɔ dzi . ”

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Farisitɔ siwo nɔ afi ma la ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ la , ɖokuiwo ̀ ko dom ne ̀ le ɖe dzi . Wo ̀ ɖaseɖiɖiwo nye alakpa sɔŋ ko . ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Togbɔ be mele ɖase ɖim le ɖokuinye ŋu ha ̃ la , nye ɖaseɖiɖi la nye nyateƒe . Elabena nye la menya afi si metso kple afi si meyina , ke miawo la mienya afi si metso alo afi si meyina o .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Miawo la miedrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu le amegbetɔwo ƒe nugɔmesese nu . Nye la nyemele ʋɔnu drɔ ̃ m ame aɖeke o ,

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: gake ne medrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu la , anye ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ dzɔdzɔe le go sia go me , elabena nye kple Fofonye si dɔm ɖa lae le edrɔ ̃ ge .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Miaƒe see gblɔ be , ne ame eve ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi le nya aɖe ŋu sɔ ko la , woaxɔe be nyateƒe .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Nenema ke nye kple Fofonye ha ̃ ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi le ɖeka , eya ta nye nyawo nye nyateƒe . ”

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Ameawo biae be , “ Afi kae Fofowo ̀ a le ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Miawo la mienya ame si menye o , eya ta mienya ame si nye Fofonye ha ̃ o . Ne ɖe mienyam la , anye ne mienya Fofonye ha ̃ . ”

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Togbɔ be Yesu gblɔ nya siawo le gbedoxɔ la ƒe gadzraɖoƒe ha ̃ la , ame aɖeke mete kpɔ be yeale ́ e o elabena eƒe ɣeyiɣi la meɖo haɖe o .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ na wo ha ̃ be , “ Nye la mele dzodzo ge , miadim gake miakpɔm o , miaku ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me , eye afi si meyina ha ̃ la , miate ŋu ava o . ”

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Yudatɔwo bia be , “ Ame sia ɖe , ɖe wo ̀ le susu wɔm be yeawu ye ɖokuia ? Nu ka tututue wo ̀ wɔnɛ esi wo ̀ gblɔ be , ‘ Miawo la miate ŋu ava afi si nye la meyina o . ’ ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Miawo la , anyigba sia dzie mietso , ke nye la dziƒoe metso . Miawo la , xexe sia me tɔwoe mienye , ke nye la , nyemetso xexe sia me o .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Esia tae megblɔ na mi be , miaku ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me . Le nyateƒe me , ne miexɔ dzinye se be nyee nye ame si le vava ge o la , miaku ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me . ”

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Ameawo gabia be , “ Gblɔ ame si tututu ne ̀ nye la na mi . ” Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Megblɔ ame si menye la tso gɔmedzedzea me ke .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Nye la nu geɖewo li mate ŋu agblɔ tso mia ŋuti eye mate ŋu adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu mi ɖe wo ta gake nyemawɔ esia o , elabena ame si dɔm ɖa la , eyae nye nyateƒetɔ la , eye nu siwo mese tso egbɔ lae megblɔna na xexeame . ”

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Ke va se ɖe fifi ha ̃ la , ameawo mese nu si gblɔm wo ̀ nɔ na wo le Fofo la ŋuti gɔme kpɔ o .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Ale Yesu gagblɔ na wo be , “ Le nye ku kple tsitretsitsi vɔ megbe hafi miakpɔe adze sii be , nyee nye Mesia la , eye nya siwo kata ̃ menɔ gbɔgblɔm na mi la , menye nye ŋutɔ nye nya kpakpawo o , ke boŋ wonye nya siwo Fofo la fiam be magblɔ .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Eya ame si dɔm ɖa la li kplim ɖaa , medzo le gbɔnye o , elabena mewɔa eƒe didi ko dzi ɖaa . ”

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ nu ƒom la , ame geɖewo xɔ edzi se .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Yesu gblɔ na Yudatɔ siwo xɔ edzi se la bena , “ Ne miele ́ nye nufiafiawo me ɖe asi la , ekema mianye nye nusrɔ ̃ la vava ̃ wo .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Miadze si nyateƒe la ha ̃ , eye nyateƒe la awɔ mi ablɔɖeviwoe . ”

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Ameawo ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mi ́ awo la , Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwoe mi ́ enye eye mi ́ enye kluviwo na ame aɖeke kpɔ le anyigba sia dzi o . Eya ta nu kae ne ̀ wɔnɛ esi ne ̀ gblɔ bena , ‘ Mi ́ azu ablɔɖeviwo ’ ? ”

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ na wo be , “ Mele gbe tem ɖe edzi na mi be , ame sia ame si wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la nye nu vɔ ̃ ƒe kluvi .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Kluviwo la , gomekpɔkpɔ aɖeke meli na wo o , gake gomekpɔkpɔ li na aƒea tɔ ƒe vi la ya .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Eya ta nenye be Vi la na miekpɔ ablɔɖe la , ekema miezu ablɔɖeviwo vava ̃ .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Menyae bena Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwoe mienye , gake mi ame aɖewo miedi be yewoawum elabena nye nyawo mesɔ to me na mi o .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Nu siwo gblɔm mele na mi lae nye esiwo teƒe mekpɔ esi menɔ Fofonye gbɔ . Gake miawo la , miele mia fofo ƒe gbedzi wɔm . ”

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Ameawo gaɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mi ́ a fofoe nye Abraham . ” Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Gbeɖe ! Abraham menye mia fofo o , ne mia fofoe wo ̀ nye la , anye ne miadze kpɔɖeŋu nyui si wo ̀ gble ̃ ɖi na mi la yome .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Ke miawo la miele agbagba dzem be yewoawum elabena mele nyateƒe si tso Mawu gbɔ la gblɔm na mi . Abraham mewɔ nu siawo ƒomevi aɖeke o .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Le nyateƒe me ne miewɔ alea la , mia fofo ƒe afɔtoƒe tututu ko tom miele . ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mi ́ awo la , menye ahasie mi ́ a dzilawo wɔ hafi dzi mi ́ o . Fofo ɖeka koe li na mi ́ le nyateƒe la me eye eyae nye Mawu ŋutɔ . ”

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Đe miaƒe nya sia le eme la , anye ne mialɔ ̃ m , elabena Mawu gbɔe metso hafi va mia gbɔ . Nyemeva le ɖokuinye si o , ke boŋ Mawue ɖom ɖa .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Nu ka tae miate ŋu ase nya si gblɔm mele na mi la gɔme o ? Miesea nu gɔme o , elabena wogbe na mi be miagaɖo tom o .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Miawo la , satana ƒe viwoe mienye eya tae mielɔ ̃ a nu vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo wo ̀ wɔna la wɔwɔ . Amewulae wo ̀ nye tso gɔmedzedzea me ke eye melɔ ̃ a nu si nye nyateƒe o . Nyateƒe kui ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ mele eme o . Alakpadada ha ̃ la , meʋaa dzi nɛ o , elabena eyae nye alakpatɔwo fofo .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Eya ta ne mele nyateƒe la gblɔm na mi ha ̃ la , ɖeko wo ̀ ɖia alakpa le miaƒe towo me ale miexɔa edzi sena o .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ” Mia dometɔ kae le afi sia si ate ŋu atɔ asi nu vɔ ̃ ɖeka pɛ si mewɔ kpɔ la dzi ? Ame aɖeke o . Ke nu ka tae ne mele nyateƒea gblɔm na mi la miexɔnɛ sena o .

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Ame si Fofoe nye Mawu la , ɖoa to eƒe nyawo dzidzɔtɔe . Gake esi miawo mielɔ ̃ a toɖoɖo Mawu ƒe nyawo o ta la , efia be mienye viawo o . ”

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo gblɔ na Yesu dzikutɔe be , “ Đe menye nyateƒe wo ̀ nye miegblɔ be , Samariatɔ si me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le lae ne ̀ nye oa ? ”

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Gbeɖe ! Gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ aɖeke mele menye o . Elabena nye la medea bubu Fofonye ŋu , ke miawo la miele vlo domem .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Togbɔ be menye nye didi be makɔ ɖokuinye ɖe dzi o ha ̃ la , Mawu ŋutɔ dom ɖe dzi xoxo eye wo ̀ le ʋɔnu drɔ ̃ ge ame siwo kata ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi kple kakaɖedzi be , ame sia ame si ɖoa tom la , mele kuku ge akpɔ o . ”

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo gagblɔ nɛ be , “ Azɔ mi ́ eka ɖe edzi be gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ aɖe le mewo ̀ vava ̃ , elabena Abraham kura kple nyagblɔɖila ga ̃ siwo nɔ anyi kpɔ la ku , ke wo ̀ la , e ̀ le gbɔgblɔm na mi fifia be , ame si xɔ ye dzi se la maku gbeɖe o .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Đe ne ̀ le gbɔgblɔm be yede ŋgɔ wu mi ́ a fofo Abraham si kua ? Eye ɖe ne ̀ le gbɔgblɔm ha ̃ be yede ŋgɔ wu nyagblɔɖila siwo ku va yia ? Ame ka koŋ ne ̀ buna be yenye ? ”

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nenye nye ŋutɔe le ɖokuinye kafum la , ekema nye kafukafu la menye naneke o , ke Fofonye , si miawo ha ̃ miebe enye yewoƒe Mawu lae le kafuyem .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Nye la menya Fofo la , ke miawo la mienyae o . Ne megblɔ be nyemenyae o la , ekema menye alakpatɔ abe miawo ke ene . Enye nyateƒe be menyae eye meɖoa toe le nuwo kata ̃ me .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Esi mia fofo Abraham nya be megbɔna la dzi dzɔe eye eƒe dzidzɔ de blibo esi wo ̀ kpɔ ŋkekea . ”

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Yudatɔwo gabiae be , “ Wo ̀ ame si mexɔ ƒe blaatɔ ̃ ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ haɖe o lae le gbɔgblɔm be yekpɔ Abraham maha ̃ ? ”

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nyateƒe matrɔmatrɔ lae nye be , nye la meli xoxoxo hafi Abraham va dzɔ ɖe xexeame nyitsɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Esi wo ̀ gblɔ esia vɔ ko la , Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo fɔ kpe be yewoaƒui . Gake Yesu ɣla eɖokui eye wo ̀ do go le gbedoxɔ la me .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ tsa ɖim la , ekpɔ ŋutsu aɖe si nye ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ tso dzidzime ke .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo bia Yesu be , “ Nufiala , nu ka tae wodzi ame sia ŋkuagba ̃ tɔe ? Eya ŋutɔ ƒe nu vɔ ̃ e wɔe be wo ̀ le alea loo alo edzilawo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ woea ? ”

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Menye wo dometɔ aɖeke ƒe nu vɔ ̃ e na be ame sia ƒe ŋku gba ̃ o . Wodzii nenema be woatsɔ aɖe Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ afia .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Ele nam be mawɔ dɔ siwo ame si dɔm ɖa la nam kaba , elabena esusɔ vie ko za ̃ nado eye ame aɖeke magate ŋu awɔ dɔ o .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Gake zi ale si mele xexeame la , nyee nye xexeame ƒe Kekeli la . ”

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Le esia megbe la , Yesu ɖe ta ɖe anyigba eye wo ̀ wɔ ba vi aɖe ɖe asi hesisi ɖe ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ la ƒe ŋkuwo dzi .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Azɔ egblɔ nɛ be , “ Yi na ̃ le tsi le Siloam Ta la me . ” Siloam gɔmee nye , “ Wodɔe ɖa . ” Ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ la tso kpla eye wo ̀ dze mɔ yi ɖawɔ abe ale si Yesu gblɔ nɛ la ene , eye enumake eƒe ŋkuwo ʋu nyuie wo ̀ nɔ nu kpɔm .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Ŋutsu sia ƒe aƒelikawo kple ame siwo kata ̃ nyae tsa ̃ be nubialae wo ̀ nye la , bia wo nɔewo be , “ Alo ɖe menye ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ ma si nɔ nu biam lae nye esia oa ? ”

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Ame aɖewo be eyae eye ɖewo ha ̃ be menye eyae o , ɖeko wo ̀ ɖii . Ke ŋutsua ŋutɔ gblɔ be , “ Nye tututue . ”

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Ameawo biae be , “ Ke aleke wɔ hafi wo ̀ ŋkuawo ʋu ? ”

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Ŋutsua gblɔ na wo be , “ Ŋutsu aɖe si woyɔna be Yesu lae nya anyi vi aɖe tsɔ sisi ɖe nye ŋkuwo dzi hegblɔ nam be mayi ɖale tsi le Siloam Ta la me . Mewɔ esia ale nye ŋkuwo ʋu eye mede asi nukpɔkpɔ me . ”

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Ameawo gabiae be , “ Afi ka amea le ? ” Eɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nyemenya o . ”

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Ale ameawo kplɔ ŋutsua yi ɖe Farisitɔwo gbɔe .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Nya siawo kata ̃ dzɔ le Sabat ŋkeke la dzi .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Farisitɔ siwo gbɔ wokplɔ ŋutsua vɛ la biae be wo ̀ agblɔ nu si va eme la na yewo . Ale wo ̀ gblɔ ale si Yesu tsɔ ba sisi ɖe eƒe ŋkuwo dzi , eye esi wo ̀ yi ɖale tsi ko la , eƒe ŋkuwo ʋu eye wo ̀ de asi nukpɔkpɔ me la na wo .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Farisitɔawo dometɔ aɖewo gblɔ be , “ Nenye be Yesu sia do dzi da gbe le ame ŋu le Sabat ŋkeke dzi la , ekema menye Mawue dɔe ɖa o . ”

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Faristɔawo gatrɔ ɖe ame si woʋu ŋku na la gbɔ hebiae be , “ Wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖe alekee nye wo ̀ susu le ame si ʋu ŋku na wo ̀ la ŋu , ? Ame ka ƒomevi ne ̀ bu be enye ? ” Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Le nye nukpɔkpɔ nu la , enye nyagblɔɖila aɖe si Mawu dɔ ɖo ɖa . ”

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo gbe be yewomaxɔe ase be ŋutsua nye ŋkuagbãtɔ tsa ̃ o , va se ɖe esime woyɔ edzilawo vɛ , eye

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: wobia wo be , “ Mia vie nye ame sia ? Ŋkuagba ̃ tɔe wo ̀ nye hafi miedzia ? Nenye be ele eme nenema ɖe ale ke wɔ wo ̀ le nu kpɔm fifia ? ”

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Edzilawo ɖo eŋu be , “ Vava ̃ mia vie nye ɖekakpuia , eye ele eme ha ̃ be ŋkuagba ̃ tɔe mi ́ edzii ,

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: gake mi ́ enya nu si va dzɔ hafi eƒe ŋkuwo ʋu o , eye mi ́ enya ame si wɔe be eƒe ŋkuwo ʋu ha ̃ o . Mi ́ a via ŋutɔ ha ̃ tsi , aƒo nu aɖe eɖokui nu eya ta taflatse , mibia gbee ! ”

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Ŋutsua dzilawo gblɔ esiawo le vɔvɔ ̃ na Yudatɔwo ta , elabena Yudatɔwo ɖoe da ɖi xoxoxo be ame si agblɔ be eyae nye Kristo la , woaɖe nenem me ma le yewoƒe hame .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Le esia ta dzilawo gblɔ be , “ Etsi , mibia eya ŋutɔ . ”

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Ale Farisitɔawo gayɔ ŋutsu si ƒe ŋkuwo gba ̃ kpɔ la zi evelia eye wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Kpɔ ɖa , Mawue wo ̀ le be na ̃ kafu , ke menye Yesu o , elabena Yesu la mi ́ enya be ame vɔ ̃ ɖie wo ̀ nye . ”

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Yesu ɖanye ame vɔ ̃ ɖi o , eɖanye ame nyui o , nyemenya o . Nu ɖeka si ko menyae nye be , tsa ̃ la , menye ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ , ke azɔ la , mele nu kpɔm ! ”

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Ameawo gabiae ake be , “ Nu kae wo ̀ wɔ ? Aleke tututue wo ̀ wɔ hafi da gbe le ŋuwo ̀ ? ”

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Ŋutsua do ɣli gblɔ na wo be , “ Kpɔ ɖa , megblɔ nya sia na mi zi ɖeka xoxo . Alo miesee oa ? Nu ka ta miedi be magagblɔ nu si dzɔ la na mi ake ? Alo miawo ha ̃ ɖe miedi be yewoazu eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawoa ? ”

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Nya siawo na be Farisitɔawo dzu ŋutsua eye wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lae ne ̀ nye , ke miawo la , Mose ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawoe mi ̃ enye .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Mi ̃ enyae bena Mawu ƒo nu na Mose , ke ame sia la , mienya naneke tso eŋu o . ”

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Ŋutsua gate kpɔ ɖo nya sia ha ̃ ŋu na wo bena , “ Ewɔ nuku ŋutɔ be miegblɔ be yewomenya afi si ame sia tso o , evɔ wo ̀ te ŋu ʋu nye ŋkuwo .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , Mawu meɖoa to ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo o , ke boŋ ame siwo subɔnɛ eye wowɔa eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea , ke la womese kpɔ be ame aɖe ʋu ŋku na ame si wodzi ŋkuagba ̃ tɔe kpɔ o ,

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: ne menye Mawu gbɔe ame sia tso o la , mate ŋu awɔ nenem nu sia o . ”

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Ameawo do ɣli ɖe ŋutsua ta gblɔ be , “ Wo ̀ si wodzi ɖe nu vɔ ̃ mee be yeafia nu mi ́ a ? ” Ale wonyae do goe .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Yesu se be wonya ŋutsu sia eya ta edii va ke ɖe eŋu eye wo ̀ biae be , “ E ̀ xɔ Amegbetɔ Vi la dzi sea ? ”

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Ŋutsua ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ame kae ? Gblɔe nam elabena medi be madze sii . ”

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ame si ne ̀ kpɔ va yi eye wo ̀ gale nu ƒom na wo ̀ fifia lae . ”

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Ŋutsua do ɣli be , “ Nye Aƒetɔ , mexɔe se ! ” Ale wo ̀ dze klo hesubɔ Yesu .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nye la ɖe meva xexeame bena maʋu ŋku na ame siwo ƒe gbɔgbɔmeŋkuwo gba ̃ eye mafia ame siwo bu be yewole nu kpɔm la be woƒe ŋkuwo gba ̃ . ”

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Farisitɔ siwo nɔ afi ma la biae be , “ Đe ne ̀ le gbɔgblɔm be mi ́ aƒe ŋkuwo gba ̃ ? ”

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ne ɖe mielɔ ̃ be yewonye ŋkuagba ̃ tɔwo la , anye ne fɔɖiɖi aɖeke manɔ mia ŋu o . Gake esi miebe yewole nu kpɔm ko la , miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo azu agba ɖe mia dzi . ”

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: “ Nyateƒe wo ̀ nye mele gbɔgblɔm na mi be ame si megena ɖe ale ̃ kpoa me to agboa nu o , ke boŋ wo ̀ yina ɖaliana to afi bubu hafi gena ɖe eme la , eyae nye fiafitɔ kple adzodala .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Ke ame si toa agboa nu gena ɖe eme la , eyae nye ale ̃ awo ƒe kplɔla .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Agbonudzɔla ʋua agbo la na eyamea eye ale ̃ awo ɖoa to eƒe gbe . Eyɔa eƒe ale ̃ wo kple ŋkɔ eye wo ̀ kplɔa wo doa goe .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Edzea ŋgɔ na ale ̃ awo eye wokplɔnɛ ɖo elabena wodea dzesi eƒe gbe .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Womadze ame tutɔ yome o , ke boŋ woasi le egbɔ elabena womede dzesi eƒe gbe o . ”

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Yesu do lo sia na wo gake womese nu si gblɔm wo ̀ le na wo la gɔme o .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Eya ta Yesu gagblɔ na wo be , “ Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , Nyee nye Agbo na ale ̃ awo .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Eye ame siwo kata ̃ va do ŋgɔ nam la , ale ̃ awo meɖo to wo o , elabena fiafitɔwo kple adzodalawoe wonye .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be Nyee nye Agboa ta la , ame siwo kata ̃ to Agboa nu la akpɔ ɖeɖe . Woado go ayi aɖaɖu gbe damawo eye woagagbɔ va to Agbo la nu age ɖe ale ̃ kpoa me .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Fiafitɔ la ƒe taɖodzinue nye be yeafi fi , awu ame , agble ̃ nu . Ke nye ya ɖe meva be mana agbe si de blibo amewo .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: ” Nyee nye Ale ̃ kplɔla Nyui la , elabena , metsɔ nye agbe na ɖe ale ̃ awo ta .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Ke apadɔwɔla si woxɔ be wo ̀ akpɔ ale ̃ awo dzi la mele ́ a be na wo o . Ne ekpɔ amegâxi wo ̀ gbɔna la , esina elabena ale ̃ awo menye etɔ o . Ale amega ̃ xi la dzea ale ̃ awo dzi hevuvua ɖewo , eye mamlɛawo kakana gbee .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Apadɔwɔla la sina elabena ɖeko wodɔe be wo ̀ akpɔ ale ̃ awo dzi , ke eƒe dzi meku ɖe wo ŋu o .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: ” Nyee nye Ale ̃ kplɔla Nyui la . Menya nye ale ̃ wo eye nye ale ̃ wo ha ̃ nyam ,

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: abe ale si Fofonye nyam ene la , nenema kee nye ha ̃ menya Fofonyee , eye metsɔ nye agbe na ɖe ale ̃ awo ta .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Ale ̃ ha bubuwo ha ̃ le asinye siwo wo ̀ le be makplɔ va gbɔnyee bena woase nye gbe , eye wo kata ̃ woanye ale ̃ ha ɖeka anɔ Kplɔla ɖeka te .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: ” Fofo la lɔ ̃ m ŋutɔ elabena metsɔ nye agbe na ɖe amewo ta bena magaxɔe emegbe . Ame aɖeke mate ŋu aɖem ɖa ne nyemena mɔ o .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Nye ŋutɔe lɔ ̃ tsɔ nye agbe na elabena ŋuse ̃ le asinye be matsɔ nye agbe ana eye ŋuse ̃ le asinye be magaxɔe . Mɔnukpɔkpɔ siae Fofo la tsɔ nam . ”

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Yesu ƒe nya siawo gahe mama de Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo dome elabena ame aɖewo xɔ eƒe nyawo dzi se eye ɖewo ha ̃ mexɔe se o .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Ame siwo mexɔe se o la gblɔ be , “ Ame sia la , gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ e le fu ɖem nɛ , ne menye nenema o la , ekema ele tsu kum eya ta migaɖo toe o . ”

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Ame bubuwo ha ̃ gblɔ be , “ Ame sia ƒe nuƒo kple nuwɔnawo medze abe ame si gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ le fu ɖem na la ene o . Đe gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ ate ŋu aʋu ŋku na ame siwo ƒe ŋku gba ̃ ? ”

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Tete gbedoxɔ Ŋutikɔkɔŋkekenyui ɖo le Yerusalem . Enye vuvɔŋɔli ̃ ,

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: eye Yesu nɔ gbedoxɔ la me nɔ zɔzɔm le teƒe si woyɔna be Salomo ƒe Akpata la me .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒo xla ̃ e eye wogblɔ nɛ be , “ Ɣekayie na ̃ na miatsi dzimaɖi se ɖo ? Nenye wo ̀ e nye Kristo la , gblɔe na mi ”

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Megblɔ ame si menye la na mi xoxo , gake miexɔe se o . Nukunu siwo wɔm mele le Fofonye ƒe ŋkɔ me la ha ̃ le ɖase ɖim le ŋunye .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Gake miele exɔm se o elabena miele nye ale ̃ hawo dome o .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Nye la , menya nye ale ̃ wo eye woawo ha ̃ dze si nye gbe , eye wodzea yonyeme .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Mena agbe mavɔ nye ale ̃ awo ale be womatsrɔ ̃ akpɔ o . Ame aɖeke ha ̃ mate ŋu axɔ wo le asinye akpasese ̃ tɔe o ,

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: elabena Fofonyee tsɔ wo nam eye Fofonyea se ̃ wu ame sia ame . Ale ame aɖeke mate ŋu axɔ wo le esi sese ̃ tɔe o .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Mi ́ kple Fofonye la ame ɖekae mi ́ enye . ”

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Esi Yesu gblɔ alea la , Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo tsɔ kpe be yewoaƒui .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Gake Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Mawu ŋutɔ ɖo nukunu siawo kata ̃ ɖi be mawɔ ne amewo nakpɔ ɖeɖe . Ke dɔ nyui siawo dometɔ ka tae miedi be yewoawum ɖo ? ”

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Menye dɔ nyui siwo ne ̀ wɔ tae miedi be miawu wo ̀ o , ke boŋ busunya siwo gblɔm ne ̀ le la tae . Aleke wo ̀ amegbetɔ na ̃ tsɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ awɔ Mawui ? ”

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Đe womeŋlɔe ɖe miaƒe se la me be , ‘ Megblɔe be mawuwo mienye ’ oa ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Ne woyɔ mi be ‘ mawuwo ’ la , ame kawoe Mawu ƒe nya va na , eye womate ŋu da mawunya dzi o ,

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: eye aleke woabu tso ame si ŋu Fofo la kɔ heɖoe ɖe xexeame ŋu ? Ekema nu ka ta mietsɔ nya ɖe ŋunye be megblɔ busunya elabena megblɔ be ‘ Nyee nye Mawu Vi ’ ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Ne menye Mawu gbɔe nukunu siwo wɔm mele la tso o la , ekema migaxɔ dzinye se o .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Ne mele nukunuwo wɔm eye miexɔ dzinye se o ha ̃ la , mixɔ nukunuawo ya dzi se ale be to esia me la , miadze sii be Fofo la le menye eye nye ha ̃ mele eme . ”

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Ameawo di be yewoagale ́ e gake edo go eye wo ̀ dzo le wo gbɔ .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Etso Yɔdan tɔsisi la yi egodo eye wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ afi si Yohanes nɔ tsi dem ta na amewo le tsa ̃ la .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Ame geɖewo dze eyome va afi sia ha ̃ . Ameawo gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Yohanes mewɔ nukunuwo o gake nya siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ gblɔ ɖi tso ŋutsu sia ŋu la va eme pɛpɛpɛ . ”

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Yesu ƒe nuwɔnawo ɖo kpe edzi na ameawo be , eyae nye Mesia la vava ̃ eye woxɔ edzi se .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Azɔ eva me be ŋutsu aɖe si woyɔna be Lazaro la dze dɔ , ame sia tso Betania , Maria kple Marta ƒe du me .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Maria si nɔvi , Lazaro , le dɔ le ́ m lae nye Maria si kɔ ami ʋeʋi ɖe Yesu ƒe afɔwo ta eye wo ̀ tutui kple eƒe taɖa .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Eya ta nɔvinyɔnu siawo dɔ ame ɖo ɖa Yesu gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ame si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ vevie la le dɔ le ́ m . ”

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Esi Yesu se gbedeasi sia la , egblɔ be , “ Dɔle ́ le sia menye kudɔe o , ke boŋ to eme la woakafu Mawu eye woakɔ Mawu Vi la ŋuti . ”

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Yesu lɔ ̃ Marta kple nɔvianyɔnu Maria kpakple Lazaro .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Gake esi wo ̀ se be Lazaro le dɔ le ́ m la , eganɔ afi si wo ̀ le la ŋkeke eve hafi dze mɔ .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Azɔ eyɔ eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo gblɔ na wo be , “ Mina mi ́ gayi Yudea . ”

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo melɔ ̃ ɖe nya sia dzi kura o . Wogblɔ nɛ bena , “ Nufiala , nyitsɔ laa koe Yudatɔwo di be yewoawu wo ̀ le Yudea , nu ka ta ne ̀ di be yeagayi afi ma ? ”

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Kekeli nɔa anyi gaƒoƒo wuieve le ŋkeke ɖeka me eye le ɣeyiɣi siawo me , la ame ate ŋu azɔ nu maklimaklii elabena kekeli li be wo ̀ akpɔ nu .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Ke ne ame aɖe zɔ le za ̃ me la , akli nu elabena viviti do . ”

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Yesu yi edzi be , “ Mi ́ a xɔlɔ ̃ Lazaro le alɔ ̃ dɔm eya ta meyina be maɖanyɔe . ”

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɖo eŋu be , “ Aƒetɔ , ne ele alɔ ̃ dɔm la , ekema eƒe la ̃ me le sese ̃ ge . ”

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Yesu nɔ nu ƒom tso eƒe ku ŋuti , ke nusrɔ ̃ lawo ya bu be alɔ ̃ dɔdɔ ŋutɔ gblɔm wo ̀ le .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Yesu ʋu eme na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Lazaro ku .
