text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Eye le miawo ta la , edzɔ dzi nam ŋutɔ be nyemenɔ afi ma o . Elabena to esia me la , mana mɔnukpɔkpɔ mi ake be miaxɔ dzinye ase . Mitso kpla ne mi ́ ayi egbɔ . ”

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Toma , si wogayɔna ha ̃ be , “ Venɔvi ” la gblɔ na nɔvia nusrɔ ̃ la mamlɛawo be , “ Mina mi ́ ayi ale be mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ aku kplii . ”

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Esi wova ɖo Betania la , wogblɔ na wo bena Lazaro ku eye woɖii ŋkeke ene sɔŋ va yi xoxo .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania anɔ abe kilometa eve kple afa ̃ ene tso Yerusalem gbɔ ,

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: eya ta Yudatɔ geɖewo va kua teƒe be yewoado baba na Marta kple Maria .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Esi Marta see bena Yesu gbɔna la , etso kpla do go yi ɖakpee le mɔa dzi . Ke Maria ya meyi o .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Marta gblɔ na Yesu be , “ Aƒetɔ , nenye ɖe ne ̀ nɔ afi sia la , anye ne nɔvinyea meku o .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Ke menyae be nu sia nu si ne ̀ bia Mawu la ana wo ̀ . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nɔviwo ̀ la atsi tre . ”

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Marta lɔ ̃ ɖe edzi eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ E ̃ , menya be nɔvinyea atsi tre le nuwuwuŋkekea dzi . ”

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Yesu gagblɔ nɛ be , “ Nyee nye Tsitretsitsi la kple Agbe la . Ame sia ame si xɔa dzinye sena la , togbɔ be aku abe ame bubuwo ene ha ̃ la , aganɔ agbe .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Mana agbe mavɔ si nu meyina o la ame siawo ale be womatsrɔ ̃ akpɔ gbeɖe o . E ̀ xɔ nya siawo dzi sea , Marta ? ”

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Marta ɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , Aƒetɔ , mexɔe se be wo ̀ e nye Mesia , Mawu Vi la , ame si mi ́ ekpɔ mɔ na ʋuu . ”

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Azɔ Marta trɔ dzo va aƒe me le nɔvia Maria gbɔ eye wo ̀ yɔe dzaa le konyifalawo dome gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nufiala la va ɖo eye wo ̀ di be yeakpɔ wo ̀ . ”

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Maria tso enumake yi Yesu gbɔ .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Yesu nɔ lalam le kɔƒea godo afi si Marta va kpee le .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Esi Yudatɔ siwo va be yewoafa akɔ na Maria la kpɔe wo ̀ tso kpla do go yina la , wobu be Lazaro ƒe yɔdo toe woyina be yeaɖafa avi eya ta wokplɔe ɖo .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Ke Maria zɔ va tu Yesu eye wo ̀ dze klo ɖe eƒe afɔnu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ɖe ne ̀ va kaba la , anye ne nɔvinyea meku o . ”

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Esi Yesu kpɔ ale si Maria nɔ avi fam nublanuitɔe eye Yudatɔwo ha ̃ nɔ efam kplii la , eƒe dzi ʋuʋu eye eƒe ta me ɖe fu .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Ebia be , “ Afi kae woɖii ɖo ? ” Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Va kpɔ yɔdoa ɖa ! ”

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Enumake Yesu ha ̃ fa avi .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Le esia ta la , Yudatɔwo gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Mikpɔ ale si gbegbe wo ̀ lɔ ̃ e ɖa ? ”

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Ke wo dometɔ aɖewo gblɔ bena , “ Ame sia si te ŋu ʋu ŋku na ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ , nu ka ŋuti mewɔe be ame sia megaku o ma ? ”

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Yesu gaʋuʋu le eɖokui me eye wo ̀ yi yɔ do la gbɔ . Yɔdoa nye agado aɖe si nu wotsɔ kpe xee .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Eɖe gbe na ameawo be , “ Mimli kpea ɖa . ” Ke Marta , ame si nɔvi ku la gblɔ na Yesu be , “ O Aƒetɔ , amea ku ŋkeke ene sɔŋue nye esi eya ta aʋe ̃ akpa . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Yesu trɔ biae be , “ Nyemegblɔ na wo ̀ bena , ne e ̀ xɔ dzinye se la , Mawu awɔ nukunu ga ̃ aɖe na ̃ kpɔ oa ? ”

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Womli kpe la da ɖe adzɔge . Azɔ Yesu wu mo dzi eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Fofo , meda akpe na wo ̀ be e ̀ ɖoa tom .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: E ̀ ɖoa tom ɣesiaɣi gake mele esia gblɔm le ame siwo kata ̃ le afi sia ta , bena woaxɔe ase be wo ̀ e dɔm ɖa . ”

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Le esia megbe la edo ɣli be , “ Lazaro lee , do go va ! ”

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Enumake Lazaro fɔ tso ku me , do kple ameɖivɔ si me woblae ɖo . Yesu gblɔ na ameawo be , “ Mitu avɔawo le eŋu ne wo ̀ adzo . ” "

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Yudatɔ siwo va be yewoakpɔ Maria ɖa eye wokpɔ nukunu sia teƒe la xɔ Yesu dzi se mlɔeba .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Ke wo dometɔ bubu aɖewo ha ̃ tso yi Farisitɔwo gbɔ eye wogblɔ nya siwo kata ̃ va dzɔ la na wo .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Esi Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Farisitɔwo se nya sia la , woyɔ takpekpe enumake be yewoadzro nya la me . Wobia wo nɔewo be , " “ Nɔviwo , nu ka wɔ ge mi ́ ala ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be ŋutsu sia wɔa nukunuwo . Ne mi ́ ena mɔe alea la , dukɔ la kata ̃ adze eyome . Ne esia va eme la , Romaʋakɔ la ava dze mia dzi , awu mi eye woaxɔ dziɖuɖua le mi Yudatɔwo si . ”

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Wo dometɔ ɖeka si nye Kayafa , ame si nye Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ le ƒe ma me la tsi tre gblɔ be .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: “ Miekpɔe dze sii be enyo be ame ɖeka naku ɖe dukɔa ta wu be dukɔa kata ̃ natsrɔ ̃ oa ? ”

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Abe Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ le ƒe ma me ene la , egblɔ nya ɖi be Yesu aku ɖe dukɔ la ta , ke megblɔ esia le eya ŋutɔ ɖokui si o .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Menye ɖe Israel dukɔa ɖeɖe ko ta o , ke boŋ ɖe Mawu vi siwo kaka ɖe xexeame kata ̃ la be woaƒo wo kata ̃ nu ƒu ɖekae .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Le esia ta tso ema dzi la Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ wo de asi ɖoɖowɔwɔ me ɖe Yesu wuwu ŋu .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Azɔ Yesu dzudzɔ nufiafia le dutoƒo eye eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dzo yi Yerusalem yi dzogbekɔƒe aɖe si woyɔna be Efrayim la me .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la tu aƒe eya ta dutatɔwo kata ̃ va Yerusalem ŋkeke geɖewo do ŋgɔ be yewoawɔ ŋutikɔklɔkɔnu la hafi aza ̃ la naɖo .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Wo dometɔ geɖe ŋutɔ di be yewoakpɔ Yesu eya ta wobia wo nɔewo edziedzi be , “ Alekee , miebu be ele aza ̃ la ɖuƒe va gea ? ”

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Farisitɔwo ɖe gbeƒa ̃ le dutoƒo be ame sia ame si kpɔ Yesu la nena yewoanya ne yewoale ́ e enumake .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Esusɔ ŋkeke ade woaɖu Ŋutitotoŋke - kenyui la . Yesu va ɖo Betania si nye Lazaro , ame si wo ̀ fɔ ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la ƒe du me .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Woɖo kplɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe na Yesu le afi sia eye Marta subɔ Yesu le kplɔ ̃ a ŋu . Lazaro ha ̃ nɔ kplɔ ̃ a ŋu kple Yesu .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Esi wonɔ nu ɖum la , Maria tsɔ amiʋeʋi ̃ xɔasi aɖe vɛ eye wo ̀ sii na Yesu ƒe afɔwo eye wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe taɖa tutu afɔawoe . Amia ƒe ʋeʋe ̃ lilili ̃ la xɔ aƒe blibo la me .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Esi Yuda Iskariɔt , Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka , ame si va fia Yesu yomemɔ emegbe la , kpɔ nu sia la , egblɔ bena ,

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: “ Nu ka ta wo ̀ le be woagble ̃ amiʋeʋi ̃ xɔasi sia ? Đe wo ̀ le be woadzrae atsɔ ga la ana ame dahewo . ”

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Menye ɖe Yuda Iskariɔt le ame dahewo nu vem tae wo ̀ gblɔ esia o , ke boŋ be enye fiafitɔ eye eya kee kpɔa nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒe ga dzi tae .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Tete Yesu gblɔ be “ Miɖe asi le eŋu , elabena ewɔ esia dzra ɖo ɖi na nye ɖigbe .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ame dahewo le mia dome ɖaa , gake nyemanɔ mia dome ɖaa o . ”

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Esi Yerusalemtɔwo se be Yesu va ɖo wo dome la , woʋli vevie bena yewoakpɔe , eye yewoakpɔ Lazaro , ame si gagbɔ agbe tso ku me ha ̃ .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Eya ta Osɔfoga ̃ wo wɔ ɖoɖo be yewoawu Lazaro ha ̃ ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: elabena eya tae Yudatɔ geɖewo dzo le woƒe kplɔlawo gbɔ yi Yesu gbɔ eye woxɔ edzi se .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Le ŋufɔke la , eɖi le Yerusalem dua kata ̃ me be Yesu le mɔ dzi gbɔna . Ame geɖewo siwo va Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la ɖuƒe la ha ̃ see ale woyi be yewoaɖakpee .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Woŋe deʋayawo kple atilɔwo ɖe asi eye wonɔ ɣli dom nɔ aseye tsom be , “ Hosana ! Woayra Israel ƒe Fia la ! Woayra ame si gbɔna le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ me ! ”

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Yesu nɔ tedzivi aɖe dzi eye esia fia be nyagblɔɖi si woŋlɔ ɖi be ,

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: “ Me ̀ gavɔ ̃ o , Zion nyɔnu . Wo ̀ Fia do tedzivi gbɔna le ɖokuibɔbɔ me ! ” la va eme tututu .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo menya bena Yesu wu nyagblɔɖi sia nu le ɣemaɣi o , gake esi wo ̀ trɔ dzo yi dziƒo le ŋutikɔkɔe me la , eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo kpɔ dze sii bena , nyagblɔɖi geɖe siwo woŋlɔ ɖe mawunya me la va eme wokpɔ .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Ame siwo nɔ eteƒe hafi Yesu fɔ Lazaro ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la gblɔ ale si nua kata ̃ va emee la na ame bubuwo .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Le nukunu si wo ̀ wɔ wose ta la , amewo ƒo zi be yewoaɖakpɔe .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Ale Farisitɔwo gblɔ na wo nɔewo be , “ Mikpɔ ɖa , mi ́ edɔ ̃ , xexeame kata ̃ e nye ma kplɔe ɖo hoo ! ”

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Griktɔ alo Helatɔ aɖewo ha ̃ nɔ ame siwo va Yerusalem dua me be yewoaɖu Ŋutitotoŋkekea la dome .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Ame siawo va Filipo si tso Betsaida gbɔ eye wogblɔ nɛ bena , “ Aƒetɔ , mieɖe kuku miedi be miakpɔ Yesu . ”

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Filipo ha ̃ yi ɖagblɔe na Andrea ale eya kple Andrea woyi Yesu gbɔ yi ɖagblɔ ameawo ƒe didi nɛ .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Gaƒoƒo la de woakɔ Amegbetɔvi la ŋu .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , mele egblɔm na mi be , ne bliku la mege ɖe anyigba eye wo ̀ ku o la , ekema eya ɖeka tsi anyi , gake ne eku la , etsea ku geɖe .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Nenye be ame aɖe tsi dzi ɖe eƒe agbe ŋu le xexe sia me la , abui , ke ame si tsɔ eƒe agbe na le tanye la , adzrae ɖo ɖi na agbe mavɔ la .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: ” Nenye be ame aɖe di be yeazu nye nusrɔ ̃ la la , nedze yonyeme , elabena ele na nye subɔla ɖe sia ɖe be wo ̀ anɔ afi si mele . Eye ne edze yonyeme la , Fofo la ŋutɔ ade bubu eŋu . Ele be woakɔ Amegbetɔvi la ɖe dzi

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Nye gbɔgbɔ le nu xam vevie ŋutɔ . Đe mado gbe ɖa be , Fofo , ɖem tso fukpekpe siwo le ŋgɔnye la mea ? Gbeɖe , mele be magblɔ nenema o , elabena esia tae meva xexeame ɖo .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Fofo , de ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu wo ̀ ŋkɔ la ŋu . ” Esi Yesu wu nya siawo nu ko la , gbe aɖe ɖi tso dziƒo be , “ Mewɔ esia xoxo eye magawɔe ake . ”

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Esi ameha la se gbe sia la , wo dometɔ aɖewo bu be dzie ɖe gbe , eye bubuwo ha ̃ gblɔ be mawudɔla aɖee ƒo nu nɛ .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Miawo tae gbe sia ɖi ɖo , menye nye tae o .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Xexeame ƒe Ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ŋkeke la ɖo edzi vɔ eye gaƒoƒoa ha ̃ su be woanya satana , si nye xexeame dziɖula la ɖa .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Eye ne wokla ̃ m ɖe atitsoga ŋu vɔ megbe la , mahe amewo kata ̃ ɖe ɖokuinye ŋu . ”

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya sia bena yeatsɔ afia ku si ƒomevi ku ge yele .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Ameha la biae be ; “ Đe ne ̀ be yele kuku gea ? Mi ́ esee be ne Mesia la va la , anɔ agbe tegbee . Nu ka tae ne ̀ be woakla ̃ Mesia la ɖe atitsoga ŋu ? Mesia ka gblɔm ne ̀ le ? ”

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nye Kekeli agakle ̃ na mi hena ɣeyiɣi sue aɖe ko . Mizɔ le Kekeli la me esi mɔnukpɔkpɔ gale mia si be viviti nagado ɖe mi o , elabena ame si le zɔzɔm le viviti me la , menya afi si yim wo ̀ le o .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Mixɔ Kekeli la dzi se zi ale si wole mia gbɔ be miazu kekeli ƒe viwo . ” " Esi Yesu gblɔ nya siawo vɔ la , edo go le ameawo dome yi ɖaɣla eɖokui .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Togbɔ be Yesu wɔ nukunu geɖe ha ̃ la , ame geɖewo mexɔ edzi se be eyae nye Mesia la o .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Nu sia tututu ŋutie nyagblɔɖila Yesaya ƒo nu tsoe be , " “ Aƒetɔ , ame kae axɔ mia dzi ase ? Ame kae axɔ Mawu ƒe nukunu ga ̃ siwo wo ̀ wɔ la dzi ase ? ”

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Yesaya gagblɔ bena ,

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: “ Mawu na bena ame siawo ƒe gbɔgbɔmeŋkuwo gba ̃ eye wo ̀ na bena woƒe dziwo ku atri , bena womagase nu , akpɔ nu alo atrɔ ɖe Mawu gbɔ be wo ̀ ada gbe le wo ŋu o . ”

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Yesaya ƒe nya siawo kata ̃ ku ɖe Yesu ŋu elabena Yesaya kpɔ ŋutega aɖe si me woɖe Mesia la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe fiae le .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Togbɔ be Yudatɔwo ƒe dumega ̃ geɖewo xɔe se be Yesue nye Mesia la ha ̃ la , wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m na Farisitɔwo elabena ne wogblɔ le dutoƒo be Yesue nye Mesia la la , woaɖe wo le hame . Esia tae wogbe be yewomaʋu Yesu me o ,

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: elabena wolɔ ̃ amegbetɔ ƒe bubu wu Mawu ƒe bubu . Yesu ƒe nyawoe woatsɔ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu amewo

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Yesu do ɣli gblɔ na ameha la be , “ Ne miexɔ dzinye se la , ekema Mawu dzie ma miexɔ se .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Elabena ne miekpɔm la , ekema ame si dɔm ɖa lae ma miekpɔ .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Nye la Kekelie menye va xexeame , ame siwo kata ̃ xɔ dzinye se la , magazɔ viviti me o .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Ne ame aɖe se nye nyawo ke mewɔ ɖe wo dzi o la ; nyemadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnui o , elabena menye ʋɔnu drɔ ̃ gee meva o ke boŋ ɖe meva be maɖe xexeame tso tsɔtsrɔ ̃ me .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Gake ame siwo mexɔm o , eye womewɔ ɖe nye nyawo dzi o la , woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo le nuwuwuŋkekea dzi eye nya siwo gblɔm mele fifia lae woatsɔ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu woe .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Elabena nya siwo kata ̃ megblɔna la menye nye ŋutɔ nye nyawo o , ke boŋ wonye gbedeasi si mexɔ tso Fofo la gbɔ na mi .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Menyae kɔtee be eƒe nyawo kata ̃ akplɔ ame ayi agbe mavɔ mee , eya ta megblɔa nya sia nya si wo ̀ gblɔ nam be magblɔ na mi la na mi . ”

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Azɔ esusɔ ŋkeke ɖeka ko ne Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la naɖo eye Yesu nya be ɣeyiɣia de be yeadzo le xexeame atrɔ ayi Fofo la gbɔ . Elɔ ̃ etɔ siwo le xexeame ŋutɔ , eye wo ̀ gaɖe lɔlɔ ̃ sia fia .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Yesu kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo nɔ fie ̃ nuɖuƒe . Do ŋgɔ la , Satana dee ta me na Yuda Iskariɔt , Simɔn vi la , be wo ̀ ayi aɖade Yesu asi .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Yesu nya be Fofo la tsɔ ŋuse ̃ wo kata ̃ na ye . Enya ha ̃ be , Mawu gbɔe yetso va eye yeagatrɔ ayi Mawu gbɔ .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Le sia ta Yesu tsi tre le fie ̃ nuɖukplɔ ̃ a ŋu eye wo ̀ ɖe eƒe awu da ɖi hetsɔ tsiletsɛ sa ɖe ali .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Etsɔ gagba ku tsi ɖe eme eye wo ̀ de asi nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒe afɔwo kɔklɔ me . Ne eklɔ ame aɖe tɔ vɔ la , etsɔa tsiletsɛ si wo ̀ sa ɖe ali la ƒe akpa aɖe tutua wo ŋui .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Esi wo ̀ ɖo Petro dzi be wo ̀ aklɔ eƒe afɔwo nɛ la , Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , mele be wo ̀ na ̃ klɔ mi ́ aƒe afɔwo ŋuti na mi ́ o . ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Mase nu si ta mele ewɔm la gɔme fifia o , gake ava se egɔme emegbe . ”

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Ke ha ̃ Petro gbe be Yesu maklɔ yeƒe afɔwo o . Egblɔ na Yesu be , “ Gbeɖe , ma ̃ klɔ nye afɔwo ŋuti o . ” Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ne nyemeklɔ wo ̀ afɔwo o la , ekema ma ̃ kpɔ gome aɖeke tso gbɔnye o . ”

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Petro do ɣli gblɔ be , “ Ne ele nenema la , ekema menye nye afɔwo ko o , ke boŋ klɔ nye asiwo kple nye ta ha ̃ . ”

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Ame si le tsi xoxo la , afɔkɔklɔ koe hia ̃ nɛ bena eŋuti nakɔ nyuie . Wo ̀ la , ŋutiwo ̀ kɔ , gake menye ame sia ame si le afi sia la ŋutie kɔ o . ” "

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya sia elabena enya ame si gbɔna ye de ge asi .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Esi wo ̀ klɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo ƒe afɔwo vɔ la , etsɔ eƒe awu do , nɔ anyi eye wo ̀ bia wo be , " “ Miese nu si mewɔ la gɔmea ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Miawo la mieyɔam be , ‘ Aƒetɔ ’ kple ‘ Nufiala ’ , eye esia le eme vava ̃ .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Minya be , esi nye , miaƒe Aƒetɔ kple Nufiala , meklɔ miaƒe afɔwo ŋu la , ele na miawo ha ̃ be miaklɔ mia nɔewo ƒe afɔwo .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Kpɔɖeŋu wo ̀ nye mena mi eya ta miwɔ ɖe kpɔɖeŋu sia dzi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be subɔla mekɔna wua eƒe aƒetɔ o , eye dɔtsɔla ha ̃ mewua ame si dɔe o .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Mienya esiawo eya ta miwɔ nenema be woahe yayra geɖe vɛ na mi .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: ” Ele eme be menye mi kata ̃ e mele nya sia gblɔm na o , elabena menya mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe . Mawunya gblɔ be “ Ame si le nu ɖum kplim lae adem asi . ” Nya sia ava eme kpuie .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Mele nya siawo kata ̃ gblɔm na mi bena ne wova eme la , miaxɔ dzinye ase .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: ” Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , ame si laxɔ ame si medɔ la , nyee wo ̀ xɔ , eye ame si laxɔm la , xɔ ame si dɔm ɖa . ”

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Azɔ Yesu gblɔ kple vevesese ga ̃ aɖe be , “ Le nyateƒe me la , mia dometɔ ɖekae adem asi . ”

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Nya siawo na be nusrɔ ̃ la ɖe sia ɖe trɔ kpɔ nɔvia ƒe ŋkume . Wonɔ ame si wo ̀ wɔnɛ la dim be yewoanya .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka , esi Yesu lɔ ̃ na vevie la , nɔ anyi ziɔ ɖe Yesu ŋu .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Simɔn Petro wɔ dzesi nɛ gblɔ nɛ be , “ Biae , mi ́ a dometɔ si ŋuti wo ̀ le nu ƒom tsoe . ”

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la la gaziɔ ɖe Yesu ŋu eye wo ̀ biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , ame kae ? ”

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Eyae nye ame si matsɔ abolo kakɛ sia asisi detsi atsɔ ana . ” Tete wo ̀ tsɔ abolo kakɛ la sisi detsi hetsɔe na Simon vi , Yuda Iskariot .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Esi Yuda ɖu aboloa vɔ ko la , satana ge ɖe eme . Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Đe abla na ̃ yi aɖawɔ nu si ne ̀ ɖo la . ”

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Ke nusrɔ ̃ la mamlɛawo mese nya si gblɔm Yesu nɔ la gɔme o .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Woawo ya bu be esi wo ̀ nye Yudae nye yewoƒe gadzikpɔla tae Yesu le edɔm be wo ̀ ayi aɖaxe fe ɖe nu si ɖum yewole la ta loo alo wo ̀ ayi aɖana ga ame dahewo .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Yuda ha ̃ dzo le xɔa me enumake hege ɖe viviti la me .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Esi Yuda do go le xɔa me la , Yesu gblɔ be , “ Ɣeyiɣi de be woaɖe Amegbetɔ Vi la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ɖe go eye woaɖe Mawu ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ɖe go to eya amea me .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe megbe la , Mawu aɖe ŋutikɔkɔe sia ɖe go to menye .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ wo , ɣeyiɣi vi aɖe ko maganɔ mia gbɔ ! Abe ale si megblɔ na Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo ene la , miadim gake miakpɔm o , eye afi si meyina ha ̃ miate ŋu ava o . ”

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Le esia ta la , mele se yeye nam mi , si nye be , milɔ ̃ mia nɔewo abe ale si nye ha ̃ melɔ ̃ mii ene .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Lɔlɔ ̃ vava ̃ si miatsɔ na mia nɔewo lae afia xexeame kɔtee be mienye nye nusrɔ ̃ lawo vava ̃ . ”

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Simɔn Petro biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , afi kae ne ̀ yina ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Afi si meyina fifia la miate ŋu akplɔm ɖo ayi o , ke emegbe la , miava . ”

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Petro gabiae be , “ Nu ka tae nyemate ŋu akplɔ wo ̀ ɖo fifia o ? Nye la mele klalo be maku ɖe tawo ̀ . ”

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̀ ka ɖe edzi be a ̃ te ŋu aku ɖe tanyea ? Nyateƒe wo ̀ nye gblɔm mele na wo ̀ be hafi koklo naku atɔ zi gba ̃ tɔ etsɔ fɔŋli la , a ̃ gbe nu le gbɔnye zigbɔzi etɔ ̃ be yemenyam o . ”

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Yesu yi edzi gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ lawo be , “ Migana vɔvɔ ̃ naɖo mi eye miaƒe dzi naʋuʋu nyanyanya o . Mixɔ Mawu dzi se , eye mixɔ nye ha ̃ dzinye se .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Fofonye ƒeme la xɔ nyui geɖewo li , ne ɖe mele nenema o la , ne megblɔe na mi . Meyina afi ma be madzra teƒe ɖo ɖi na mi .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Ne meyi ɖadzra teƒe ɖo ɖi na mi la , matrɔ ava akplɔ mi be mianɔ gbɔnye ale be afi si mele la , miawo ha ̃ mianɔ afi ma .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Mienya afi si meyina la xoxo eye mienya mɔ la ha ̃ . ”

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Toma gblɔ nɛ be , “ Gbeɖe , Aƒetɔ , mienya afi si ne ̀ yina o , aleke wɔ miate ŋu anya mɔ la ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nyee nye Mɔ la , Nyateƒe la kple Agbe la . Ame aɖeke mate ŋu ayi Fofo la gbɔ o , negbe to dzinye ko .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ne ɖe mienya ame si ƒomevi menye la , anye ne mienya ame si ƒomevi Fofonye ha ̃ nye . Tso azɔ dzi la , mienya ame si Fofonye nye eye miekpɔe ha ̃ ! ”

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Filipo gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ , fia Fofo la mi ́ ekema miaƒe dzi adze eme . ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Filipo , ke va se ɖe fifi ha ̃ la , me ̀ nya ame si ƒomevi menye o . Ke esi meli kpli mi ŋkeke siawo kata ̃ ha ̃ mienyam kpɔ oa ? Ame sia ame si kpɔm la , Fofo lae ma wo ̀ kpɔ . Ke nu ka wɔ miegale didim be yewoakpɔ Fofo la ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Đe miexɔe se be , mele Fofo la me eye Fofo la ha ̃ le menye oa ? Nya siwo kata ̃ megblɔna la menye nye ŋutɔ nye nyawoe o , ke boŋ wonye Fofonye si le menye la ƒe nyawo . Fofo la wɔa eƒe dɔwo to dzinye .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Miawo ya mixɔe se ko be mele Fofo la me eye Fofo la ha ̃ le menye . Ne miate ŋu axɔ ase le mɔ sia nu o la , ekema mixɔ dzinye se le nukunu ga ̃ geɖe siwo mewɔ miekpɔ la ta .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Le nyateƒe me , mele egblɔm na mi be , ame sia ame si xɔa dzinye sena la awɔ dɔ siwo kata ̃ mele wɔwɔm , eye awɔ dɔ ga ̃ wo wu esiwo mewɔ , elabena meyina ɖe Fofo la gbɔ .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Mawɔ nu sia nu si miabia le nye ŋkɔ dzi la na mi ale be Vi la nakɔ Fofo la ŋuti .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: E ̃ , ne miebia nane to nye ŋkɔ dzi ko la , mawɔe na mi .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: ” Ne mielɔ ̃ am la , miawɔ nye sewo dzi .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: ” Mabia Fofo la , wo ̀ aɖo Nyaxɔɖeakɔla bubu ɖe mi ,

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: ame si nye nyateƒe ƒe Gbɔgbɔ , be wo ̀ anɔ anyi kpli mi yi ɖe mavɔ me . Xexeame mate ŋu axɔ Nyaxɔɖeakɔla sia o elabena mekpɔnɛ alo dzea sii o . Ke miawo la , mienyae elabena ele mia me eye wo ̀ anɔ anyi kpli mi .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Nye la , nyemagble mi ɖi abe tsyɔ ̃ eviwo ene o , matrɔ ava mia gbɔ .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe megbe la , xexeametɔwo magakpɔm o , ke miawo ya miakpɔm elabena mele agbe eye miawo ha ̃ mianɔ agbe .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Gbe ma gbe la , mianya be mele Fofo la me , eye miawo miele menye eye nye ha ̃ mele mia me .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Ame si wɔna ɖe nye nyawo dzi la , eyae lɔ ̃ am , eye ame si lɔ ̃ am la , Fofonye ha ̃ alɔ ̃ e , nye ha ̃ malɔ ̃ e eye maɖe ɖokuinye afiae . ”

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Yuda , ke menye Yuda Iskariɔt o , ke boŋ nusrɔ ̃ la bubu si tsɔ ŋkɔ sia la biae be , “ Aƒetɔ , nu ka ta wo ̀ nye be mi ́ nusrɔ ̃ lawo koe ne ̀ le ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖe ge afia ke menye xexeame kata ̃ o ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Elabena ele be maɖe ɖokuinye afia ame siwo lɔ ̃ m eye wowɔa nye gbe dzi . Fofo la ha ̃ alɔ ̃ wo eye nye kple Fofo la miava nɔ wo gbɔ .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Ame sia ame si mewɔa nye gbe dzi o la , melɔ ̃ am o . Nya siwo gblɔm mele la menye nye ŋutɔ tɔnye o , ke boŋ etso Fofo si dɔm ɖa la gbɔ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Mele nya siawo gblɔm na mi fifia esi megale mia gbɔ .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Ke ne Fofo la dɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe , Akɔfala la , ɖo ɖe nye teƒe la , afia nu geɖewo mi eye wo ̀ agbugbɔ kpe aɖo nu siwo kata ̃ megblɔ na mi la dzi na mi .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: ” Mele ŋutifafa gblem ɖi na mi . Nye ŋutɔ nye ŋutifafa tsɔm mele na mi . Menye xexeame tɔ ƒomevi o . Eya ta migana miaƒe dzi naʋuʋu nyanyanya kple vɔvɔ ̃ o , eye dzika ha ̃ megatso mia ƒo o .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: ” Miese megblɔ be , ‘ Madzo eye magatrɔ agbɔ va mia gbɔ . ’ Ne mielɔ ̃ m la , dzi adzɔ mi be mele dzodzom yina ɖe Fofo la gbɔ elabena Fofo la lolo wum .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Megblɔ nya siawo na mi hafi woava dzɔ ale be ne wova dzɔ la , ne miaxɔ dzinye ase .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: ” Nyemagayi nuƒoƒo na mi dzi fu ̃ u o elabena xexe sia me dziɖula le mɔ dzi gbɔna . Mekpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe dzinye o ,

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: gake ele be xexeame nanyae be melɔ ̃ Fofo la eye be mewɔa nu si tututu Fofo la ɖo nam be mawɔ . Azɔ la , mina mi ́ adzo . ”

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: Nyee nye Wainti vava ̃ la eye Fofonyee nye Agbletɔ la .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Ela ̃ a alɔdze siwo le ŋunye eye wometsea ku o la ɖa , ke esiwo tsea ku la , eɖea wo ŋu be woagatse ku geɖe fu ̃ u wu .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Miawo la Fofo la kɔ mia ŋu xoxo le nya siwo megblɔ na mi la ta .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Minɔ menye eye nye ha ̃ manɔ mia me . Wain ƒe alɔdze aɖeke mate ŋu atse ku nenye be wola ̃ e ɖa tso wainti la ŋu o . Eya ta miawo ha ̃ , nyemanɔmee la , miate ŋu atse ku aɖeke o . ”

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: Nyee nye Wainti la eye miawoe nye alɔdzeawo . Ame si le menye eye nye ha ̃ mele eme la , atse ku nyui geɖe elabena nyemanɔmee la miate ŋu awɔ naneke o .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Ame si aɖe ɖe aga tso gbɔnye la , woatsɔe aƒu gbe abe alɔdze matseku ene , eye woatɔ dzoe .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Ke ne mienɔ menye eye miewɔ nye gbe dzi la , nu sia nu si miabia la , woawɔe na mi .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Nye nusrɔ ̃ la vava ̃ wo tsea ku geɖe eye esia hea ŋutikɔkɔe geɖe vanɛ na Fofonye . ”

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Melɔ ̃ mi abe ale si Fofo la lɔ ̃ m ene . Eya ta minɔ nye lɔlɔ ̃ sia me ɖaa .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Ne miewɔa nye se siwo mede na mi dzi la , mianɔ nye lɔlɔ ̃ me abe ale si meɖo to Fofonye ƒe sededewo eye menɔ eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ la me ene .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Mele nya siawo gblɔm na mi bena dzidzɔ si le menye la nanɔ miawo ha ̃ mia me eye wo ̀ anɔ mia me agba go .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Mele se dem na mi be , mialɔ ̃ mia nɔewo abe ale si nye ha ̃ melɔ ̃ mii ene .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Lɔlɔ ̃ ga ̃ tɔ kekeake si ame ate ŋu aɖe afia nɔviae nye be wo ̀ atsɔ eƒe agbe ana ɖe eta .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Ne miewɔ ɖe nye gbe dzi la , ekema mienye xɔ ̃ nyewo .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Azɔ la , nyemagayɔ mi be subɔlawo o , elabena aƒetɔ mate ŋu agblɔ eƒe nya ɣaɣlawo na subɔla o . Ke mayɔ mi azɔ be xɔ ̃ nyewo . Esia le eme vava ̃ elabena megblɔ nya sia nya si Fofo la gblɔ nam la na mi .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Menye miawoe tiam o . Nyee tia mi . Eye ɖe metia mi be miayi aɖatse ku nyui siwo anɔ anyi ɖaa . Le esia ta nu sia nu si miabia Fofo la le nye ŋkɔ dzi la , awɔe na mi .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Mele se dem na mi be mialɔ ̃ mia nɔewo .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: Ne xexe sia me tɔwo le ́ fu mi la , minyae be wole ́ fum gba ̃ .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Nenye xexe sia me tɔwo mienye la , anye ne woalɔ ̃ mi , ke esi metia mi tso xexeame ta la , wole ́ fu mi .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Miɖo ŋku nya si megblɔ na mi la dzi be , “ Subɔla mewua eƒe Aƒetɔ o ne woti yonyeme la , woati miawo ha ̃ yome . Nenye ɖe woɖo tom la , woaɖo to miawo ha ̃ .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Xexe sia me tɔwo ati mia yome elabena mienye tɔnyewo . Woawɔ esia elabena womenya Mawu si dɔm ɖa la o .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: ” Nenye ɖe nyemeva gblɔ mawunya la na wo o la , womabu fɔ wo ɖe woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta o , gake esi wose mawunya la ta la , taflatsedodo aɖeke meli na wo o .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Ame sia ame si le ́ fum la , le ́ fu Fofonye ha ̃ .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Đe nyemewɔ nukunu ga ̃ geɖe si ame aɖeke mewɔ kpɔ le wo dome o la , anye ne womabu fɔ wo o . Gake wokpɔ nukunu geɖe siwo mewɔ , eye wometsɔ ɖeke le eme o , ke boŋ wogbe nu le nye kple Fofonye gbɔ .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Esia wu nya si nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ tso Mesia la ŋu be , ‘ Wogbe nu le gbɔnye dzodzro . ’

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Ne Nyaxɔɖeakɔla la , ame si madɔ ɖo ɖe mi tso Fofo la gbɔ , nyateƒe ƒe Gbɔgbɔ si tso Fofo la gbɔ , va la , aɖi ɖase tso ŋutinye .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Gake ele be miawo ha ̃ miaɖi ɖase le ŋutinye , elabena mienɔ anyi kplim tso gɔmedzedzea me ke .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: Megblɔ nya siawo kata ̃ na mi bena ne miedo go nu dziŋɔ siwo le mia ŋgɔ la , ke megaɖe le mia te o .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Ŋkekewo li gbɔna esi woaɖe mi le woƒe hame eye ne wowu mi ha ̃ la , woabu be Mawu ƒe dɔ wɔm yewole .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Woawɔ esiawo elabena womedze sim alo Fofo la o .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , ɖe mele nya siawo gblɔm na mi be mianɔ klalo eye ne ɣeyiɣia ɖo la , miaɖo ŋku edzi be mena mienya do ŋgɔ . Nyemegblɔ nya siawo na mi tsa ̃ o , elabena menya be manɔ mia gbɔ vie .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Azɔ medzo yina ame si dɔm ɖa la gbɔ , gake mia dometɔ aɖeke mebia afi si meyina ta se o .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Ke esi megblɔe na mi la , miaƒe dziwo yɔ fu ̃ u kple nuxaxa .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be ne medzo le mia gbɔ la enyo wu , elabena ne nyemedzo o la , Akɔfala ha ̃ mava o . Ke ne medzo la , Ame sia ava , elabena maɖoe ɖe mi . ”

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Ne Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la va la , atɔ asi xexe sia me tɔwo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo dzi na wo . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , aɖe Mawu ƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye kple ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ afia .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Xexe sia me tɔwo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ e nye be , womexɔ dzinye se o .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Le dzɔdzɔenyenye ŋuti la , meyina Fofo la gbɔ eye miagakpɔm o .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Eye le ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ ŋuti la , wodrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu xexe sia me fia la xoxo . ”

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Nya geɖe ŋutɔ le asinye be magblɔ na mi gake miate ŋu ase wo gɔme fifia o .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Ne Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe si nye nyateƒe Gbɔgbɔ va la , ana miaŋɔ ɖe nyateƒe la me , elabena , magblɔ nya si dze eya ŋutɔ ŋu o , ke boŋ aƒo nu na mi tso nya siwo wo ̀ se la ko ŋu , eye agblɔ nu siwo gbɔna dzɔdzɔ ge la na mi .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la aɖe nye ŋutikɔkɔe afia elabena nu siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ agblɔ na mi la atso gbɔnye .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Nu siwo kata ̃ le Fofonye si la tɔnyee , esia tae megblɔ na mi be nu si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la agblɔ na mi la atso gbɔnye . E

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Esusɔ vie miagakpɔm o eye esusɔ vie miagakpɔm . ”

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ aɖewo bia wo nɔewo bena , “ Nu ka tututu gblɔm wo ̀ le ? Egblɔ be , ‘ Esusɔ vie miagakpɔm o ’ eye ‘ esusɔ vie miagakpɔm ’ . Egagblɔ ha ̃ be , ‘ Meyina Fofo la gbɔ . ’

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: ‘ Esusɔ vie sia gɔme ɖe ? ’ Mi ́ ese nu siwo kata ̃ gblɔm wo ̀ le la gɔme o . ”

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Yesu nya be nusrɔ ̃ lawo di be yewoabia nya siwo yegblɔ la gɔme , eya ta egblɔ be , “ Nya siwo megblɔ la gɔme biam miele mia nɔewoa ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Mele egblɔm na mi le nyateƒe me be , miaxa nu eye miafa avi , ke xexeame ya akpɔ dzidzɔ , miale ́ blanui , ke esia atrɔ azu dzidzɔ na mi .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Ne nyɔnu le ku le ́ m la , esea veve ale gbegbe , gake ne edzi vi ko la , eŋlɔa vevesesea be enumake eye wo ̀ kpɔa dzidzɔ be yedzi ame ɖe xexeame .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Nenema ke wo ̀ le na miawo ha ̃ fifia , miele konyi fam , gake ne megatrɔ va mia gbɔ la , miakpɔ dzidzɔ ga ̃ aɖe , eye ame aɖeke mate ŋu axe mɔ na miaƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ o .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Le ŋkeke mawo me la , miagabia nanekem o , elabena miate ŋu abia nu sia nu Fofo la faa , eye ne miebiae le nye ŋkɔ dzi ko la , ana mi .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Va se ɖe fifi la , miebia naneke le nye ŋkɔ dzi kpɔ o . Ke azɔ la miadze egɔme . Mibia nu Fofo la le nye ŋkɔ dzi , ekema ana mi eye miaƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ ha ̃ agba go . Meɖu xexeame dzi ”

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: Meƒo nu tso nu siawo ŋu na mi to lododowo me , ke ɣeyiɣi li gbɔna esi nyemagawɔ esia o , ke boŋ maƒo nu na mi faa tso Fofo la ŋu .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Le ŋkeke mawo me la , magahia ̃ be maɖe kuku ɖe mia nu o , ke boŋ ne miebia nane Fofo la le nye ŋkɔ dzi la ,

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: ana mi , elabena mielɔ ̃ m eye miexɔe se bena Fofo lae dɔm ɖa . Le esia ta Fofo la ha ̃ lɔ ̃ mi vevie .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Fofo la gbɔe metso va xexe sia me eye Fofo la gbɔ magatrɔ ayi . ”

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo gblɔ nɛ be , “ Azɔ ko ne ̀ le nu ƒom na mi faa , ke menye to lododowo me o .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Azɔ la mienyae bena e ̀ nya nu sia nu eye megahia ̃ be ame aɖeke naɖe naneke gɔme na wo ̀ o . Miexɔe se tso azɔ dzi yina be Mawue dɔ wo ̀ ɖa . ”

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Yesu bia wo be , “ Miexɔe se azɔa ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Mikpɔ ɖa , gaƒoƒo aɖe li gbɔna eye eva ɖo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ xoxo , bena woade zi mia dome eye miaka ahle ̃ , ame sia ame aɖo ta eya ŋutɔ ƒe aƒe me , eye miagblem ɖi . Gake nyematsi akogo o , elabena Fofo la li kplim .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Megblɔ nu siawo kata ̃ na mi be miaƒe dzi nadze eme . Tetekpɔ kple konyifafa geɖewo ava mia dzi , gake mele egblɔm na mi be , mile ́ dzi ɖe ƒo , elabena meɖu xexe sia me ƒe fuwo kata ̃ dzi . ”

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Esi Yesu gblɔ nya siawo vɔ la , ewu mo dzi hegblɔ be , “ Fofo , ɣeyiɣia de azɔ . Đe Viwo ̀ la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe fia ne Viwo ̀ ha ̃ natsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe na wo ̀ .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Elabena e ̀ na ŋuse ̃ e ɖe amegbetɔwo kata ̃ dzi le xexeame eye be wo ̀ ana agbe mavɔ ame sia ame si ne ̀ tsɔ nɛ .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Ale si ame awɔ akpɔ agbe mavɔ lae nye be , wo ̀ anya wo ̀ Mawu vava ̃ la , eye wo ̀ axɔ Yesu Kristo , ame si ne ̀ ɖo ɖe xexeame ha ̃ dzi ase .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Mewɔ dɔ ɖe sia ɖe si ne ̀ de asi nam la eye to esia me la , mena wo ̀ ŋutikɔkɔe dze na anyigbadzitɔwo kata ̃ .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Eye azɔ la , Fofo , esi mele ŋkuwo ̀ me fifia la , ɖe ŋutikɔkɔe si le nye kpli wo ̀ si tso gɔmedzedzea me la fia le menye .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Megblɔ ame si ƒomevi ne ̀ nye la na ame siawo . Tsa ̃ la , wonɔ agbe abe xexe sia me tɔwo ene , ke azɔ la , e ̀ tsɔ wo nam . Le nyateƒe me la , tɔwo ̀ woe wonye , eye esi ne ̀ tsɔ wo nam va se ɖe fifia la , wole ́ wo ̀ nya la me ɖe asi .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Azɔ ko wonya be nu sia nu si ne ̀ tsɔ nam la tso gbɔwo ̀ ,

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: elabena nya si ne ̀ de asinye la metsɔe na wo eye woxɔe . Wonyae kɔtee bena metso gbɔwo ̀ , eye woxɔe se ha ̃ be wo ̀ e dɔm ɖo ɖa . ”

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Nyemele kuku ɖem ɖe xexeame kata ̃ nu o , ke boŋ ɖe ame siwo ne ̀ tsɔ nam la ko nu , elabena tɔwo ̀ woe wonye .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Nu siwo kata ̃ nye tɔnye la tɔwo ̀ e eye nu siwo nye tɔwo ̀ ha ̃ tɔnyee eye woawo mee woɖe nye ŋutikɔkɔe fia le .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Azɔ la , mele xexe sia me gble ge ɖi , ava gbɔwo ̀ . Fofo kɔkɔe , ame siwo kata ̃ ne ̀ tsɔ nam la , wo ̀ ŋutɔ kpɔ wo dzi nyuie bena woawɔ ɖeka abe ale si nye kpli wo ̀ miele ɖeka ene , me ̀ gana ɖeke nabu le wo dome o .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Esi menɔ xexeame le afii la , mekpɔ ame siwo kata ̃ ne ̀ tsɔ nam la dzi nyuie . Medzɔ wo ŋu bena ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ megatsrɔ ̃ o , negbe vi se ̃ to la koe ayi dzo mavɔ me abe ale si mawunya gblɔe da ɖi ene . ”

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Ke azɔ la megbɔna gbɔwo ̀ eye mele nya siawo gblɔm esi mele wo gbɔ be nye dzidzɔ nanɔ wo me .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , megblɔ wo ̀ sededewo na wo , eye woxɔ wo , ke xexeametɔwo le ́ fu wo elabena womewɔa nu abe xexeametɔwo ene o . Nenema ke nye ha ̃ nye agbenɔnɔ mesɔ kple xexeametɔwo ƒe agbenɔnɔ o .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Fofo , menye ɖe mele biabiam be na ̃ ɖe wo le xexeame o , ke boŋ na ̃ de wo wo ̀ aʋala te bena satana nagakpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe wo dzi o .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Menye xexe sia me tɔwo wonye o , abe ale si nye ha ̃ nyemenye xexe sia me tɔ o ene .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Eya ta na woazu kɔkɔe eye woanye ame dzadzɛwo , to wo ̀ nya la me , elabena wo ̀ nya lae nye nyateƒe .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Abe ale si ne ̀ dɔm ɖe xexeame ene la , nye ha ̃ mele wo dɔm ɖe xexeame .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Mewɔ ɖokuinye kɔkɔe ɖe wo ta , bena woawo ha ̃ woazu ame kɔkɔewo le nyateƒe la me . ”

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: “ Nyemele gbe dom ɖa ɖe woawo ɖeɖe ko ta o . Ke mele gbe dom ɖa ɖe ame siwo ha ̃ ava xɔ dzinye ase to woƒe gbedeasi me ,

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: be wo kata ̃ woanɔ ɖeka abe ale si wo ̀ , Fofo la , ne ̀ le menye eye nye ha ̃ mele mewo ̀ ene . Woawo ha ̃ nenɔ mi ́ a me be xexeame naxɔe ase be wo ̀ e dɔm ɖa .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Metsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe si ne ̀ tsɔ nam la na wo ; wo ameawo nenɔ ɖeka le nu sia nu me be xexeame nanyae be wo ̀ e dɔm ɖa eye ne ̀ lɔ ̃ woawo ha ̃ abe ale si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ m ene .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Ne mele wo me eye wo ̀ ha ̃ ne ̀ le menye la , mi kata ̃ miade blibo le ɖekanyenye me , ale be xexeame anyae bena wo ̀ e dɔm ɖa , eye ne ̀ lɔ ̃ woawo ha ̃ abe ale si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ m ene .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Fofo , medi be ame siwo ne ̀ tsɔ nam la nanɔ gbɔnye bena woakpɔ nye ŋutikɔkɔe . Wo ̀ e na ŋutikɔkɔe siam elabena e ̀ lɔ ̃ m vevie hafi xexeame va dzɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: ” O , Fofo dzɔdzɔetɔ , xexe sia me tɔwo menya wo ̀ o , gake nye la menya wo ̀ , eye nusrɔ ̃ la siawo ha ̃ nya be wo ̀ e ɖom ɖa .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Meɖe ame si wo ̀ Fofo la ne ̀ nye la fia wo , eye manɔ esia dzi bena lɔlɔ ̃ ga ̃ si ne ̀ tsɔ nam la nanɔ woawo ha ̃ me , eye nye ha ̃ maxɔ nɔƒe ɖe woƒe dziwo me . ”

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Esi Yesu wu nya siawo nu la , eya kple eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo do go yi ɖatso tɔsisi si woyɔna be Kidron la heyi egodo eye woyi abɔ aɖe si le afi ma la me .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Yuda , ame si de Yesu asi la ha ̃ nya teƒe sia elabena Yesu kplɔa eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo yina afi ma edziedzi .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple Farisitɔwo ɖe asrafowo kple kpovitɔwo kpe ɖe Yuda ŋu bena woava le ́ Yesu . Ale wodze mɔ kple akakatiwo kple akaɖiwo kpakple aʋawɔnuwo va do ɖe abɔa me afi si Yesu le .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Yesu nya nu siwo kata ̃ le dzɔdzɔ ge ɖe dzi . Ezɔ ɖe ameawo dzi eye wo ̀ bia wo be , “ Ame ka dim miele ? ”

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Yesu Nazaretitɔ la dim mi ́ ele . ” Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nyee nye esi . ” Yuda , ame si fia eyomemɔ la ha ̃ le tsitre ɖe wo gbɔ le afi ma .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Esi Yesu gblɔ nya sia ko la , ameawo kata ̃ dze anyi .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Yesu gabia wo ake be , “ Ame ka tututu dim miele ? ” Eye wogaɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Yesu Nazaretitɔ la dim mi ́ ele . ”

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Yesu te gbe ɖe edzi na wo ake be , “ Megblɔe na mi be , Nyee nye esi , azɔ le esime wo ̀ nye nye dim miele ta la , mina ame siawo ya nadzo le ŋutifafa me . ”

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya sia bena woawu nya si wo ̀ gblɔ ɖi do ŋgɔ nu be , “ Nyemebu ame siwo ne ̀ tsɔ nam la ƒe ɖeke o . ”

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Ke Simɔn Petro ɖe eƒe yi le aku me eye wo ̀ kpa ɖusimeto na Malkus , Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ la ƒe dɔla .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Yesu trɔ gblɔ na Petro bena , “ Tsɔ wo ̀ yi la de aku me . Đe mele be mano kplu si Fofo la tsɔ nam la oa ? ”

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Ale Yudatɔwo ƒe kpovitɔwo kple asrafowo kpakple asrafomega ̃ wo le ́ Yesu eye woblae .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Gba ̃ la , wokplɔe yi na Anas , si nye Kayafa to . Kayafae nye Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ le ƒe ma me eye

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: eyae nye ame si ɖo aɖaŋu na Yudatɔwo bena , “ Enyo be ame ɖeka naku ɖe dukɔa ta tsɔ wu be dukɔ bliboa natsrɔ ̃ . ”

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simɔn Petro kple nusrɔ ̃ la ɖeka dze amehawo yome . Le esi nusrɔ ̃ la bubu sia dze si Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ ta la , woɖe mɔ na eya faa wo ̀ ge ɖe aƒea me .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Ke enɔ na Petro be wo ̀ alala le agboa nu . Nusrɔ ̃ la kemɛ , ame si Nunɔlaga ̃ la nya nyuie la , trɔ gbɔ va ƒo nu na ɖetugbi si nɔ agboa nu dzɔm eye wo ̀ na mɔ Petro wo ̀ ge ɖe eme .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Enumake nyɔnuvi la bia Petro bena , “ Menye Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖekae ne ̀ nye oa ? ” Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Gbeɖe , menye eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la menye o . ” "

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Kpovitɔwo kple subɔlawo do dzo nɔ ƒuƒum ɣemaɣi elabena vuvɔ nɔ wɔwɔm sesi ̃ e . Ale Petro ha ̃ va tsi tre ɖe wo dome nɔ dzoa ƒum .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Le ʋɔnua la , Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ la bia Yesu ame siwo nye eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo kple nu si tututu wo ̀ le wo fiam .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , " “ Ame geɖewo nya nu si fiam mele , elabena mefia nu zi geɖe le ƒuƒoƒewo kple gbedoxɔ la me , Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo kata ̃ ɖoa to nya siwo megblɔna , eye nya aɖeke meli si megblɔna le ɣaɣlɛƒe si nyemegblɔna le dutoƒo o .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Eya ta menye nyee wo ̀ le be miabia nya siae o , ke boŋ mibia ame siwo va ɖoa to nye nyawo . Wo dometɔ aɖewo ha ̃ le afi sia eya ta mibia wo . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Asrafo siwo le Yesu ŋu dzɔm la dometɔ ɖeka ƒo tome nɛ zi ɖeka hebiae bena , “ Nenema wo ̀ le be na ̃ ɖo nya ŋui na Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ la ? ”

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Nenye be alakpa dam mele la , ekema tɔ asi nu si nye alakpa le nye nuƒoa me la dzi nam . Ke ne nyateƒe tom mele la , ɖe wo ̀ le be na ̃ ƒo tome na ame si le nyateƒe tom la maha ̃ ? ”

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Ale Anas na wobla Yesu eye wokplɔe yi Kayafa , Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ la gbɔe .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ me la , Simɔn Petro ganɔ dzoa ƒum eye ame bubu gabiae bena , “ Menye eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖekae ne ̀ nye oa ? ” Petro ɖo eŋu be , “ Gbeɖe , menye eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lae menye o . ”

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Osɔfo ga ̃ tɔ la ƒe dɔlawo dometɔ ɖeka si nye ame si ƒe to Petro kpa la ƒe ƒometɔ aɖe hã bia Petro bena , “ Menye wo ̀ e mekpɔ le abɔa me , ne ̀ le Yesu ŋu oa ? ” "

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Ke Petro gase ̃ nu bena , yemenya Yesu o . Eye enumake la koklo ku atɔ .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Kayafa ha ̃ drɔ ̃ ʋɔnu Yesu , eye wo ̀ wu eƒe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ nu le fɔŋli . Tso afi sia la wokplɔe yi ɖe Roma gɔvina la ƒe aƒe mee . Ame siwo tsɔ nya ɖe Yesu ŋu la gbe bena yewomage ɖe aƒea me o , elabena ne woyi afi ma la , ekema wogble ̃ kɔ na wo ɖokui , eye ne woƒo ɖi wo ɖokui alea la , womana mɔ wo woaɖu Ŋutitotole ̃ vi la o .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Ale Pilato , Roma gɔvina la ŋutɔ do go va kpe wo eye wo ̀ bia wo bena , " “ Nya kae mietsɔ ɖe ame sia ŋu eye nu kae miebe ewɔ ? ”

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Ameawo ha ̃ da gbe ɖe Pilato bena , “ Đe ame sia mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖi aɖeke o la , mi ́ ele ekplɔ ge ava afi siae o . ”

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Pilato ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Ne ele alea la , mikplɔe yii eye miatsɔ miawo ŋutɔ ƒe sewo adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnui . ” Ameawo gaɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Đe miedi bena miakla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu eya tae mi ̃ eva bena na ̃ da asi ɖe ɖoɖo sia dzi . ”

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Esia wu nyagblɔɖi si Yesu gblɔ ɖi tso ale si wole ewu gee la nu .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato trɔ yi ɖe eƒe fiasa ̃ la me , ena wokplɔ Yesu va egbɔe eye wo ̀ bia be , “ Woe nye Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia la ? ”

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Yesu biae bena , “ Susu ka nue ne ̀ bia nya sia ɖo ? Le Yudatɔwo ƒe susu nu loo alo le wo ̀ susu nua ? ”

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Pilato ɖo eŋu kple dziku be , “ Yudatɔe menye hafi ne ̀ le nya ma biamem ha ̃ ? Menye wo ̀ ŋutɔ mia de tɔwo kple woƒe Osɔfoga ̃ woe ̃ kplɔ wo ̀ va afi sia oa ? Nu ka tae wokplɔ wo ̀ vɛ ɖo ? Agɔ kae ne ̀ dze ? ”

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nye la , menye anyigbadzifiae menye o . Nenye anyigbadzifiae menye la , anye ne nye amewo awɔ aʋa ɖe nunye esi Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo va le ́ m . Nye fiaɖuƒea metso xexe sia me o . ”

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Pilato gabiae bena , “ Ekema fiae nenye nyateƒea ? ” Yesu ɖo eŋu be , “ Ele me nenema , eye fiaɖuɖu tae wodzim ɖo . Eye esi meva xexe sia me la , ɖe meva bena magblɔ nyateƒe la afia ame sia ame . Ame siwo kata ̃ xɔ nyateƒe la dzi se lae nye nye nusrɔ ̃ lawo . ”

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Pilato do ɣli enumake bena , “ Nu kae nye nyateƒe la ? ” Edo go ɖagblɔ na Yudatɔwo be , “ Nyemekpɔ fɔɖiɖi aɖeke le ame sia ŋu o .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Azɔ kɔnu aɖe le mia si si mewɔna na mi ƒe sia ƒe le Ŋutitotoŋkeke la dzi , eyae nye be maɖe asi le ame siwo le gaxɔ me la dometɔ si mielɔ ̃ la ŋu na mi . Eya ta ne enye miaƒe didi la , maɖe asi le ‘ Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia ’ la ŋu na mi . ”

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Ke ameawo ƒe mo nyra eye wodo ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Gbeɖe ! Me ̀ gaɖe asi le ame sia ŋu o , ke boŋ ɖe asi le Baraba ŋu na mi ! ” Baraba siae nye adzodala aɖe si wode gaxɔ me .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Azɔ Pilato na woƒo Yesu kple atam vevie .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Asrafowo wɔ ŋukuku ɖɔ nɛ eye wodo awu dzi ̃ nɛ .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Woɖu fewu le eŋu , eye wodo gbe nɛ fewuɖutɔe be , “ Miedo gbe na wo ̀ Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia . ” Eye ne wole esia wɔm la , woƒoa tome nɛ .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Pilato gado go va xexe eye wo ̀ gblɔ na Yudatɔwo be , “ Mele ekplɔ ge ado goe na mi , gake minyae bena nyemekpɔ fɔɖiɖi aɖeke le eŋu o . ”

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Ale wo ̀ kplɔ Yesu do goe . Wodo awu dzi ̃ nɛ , tsɔ ŋukuku ɖɔ nɛ . Pilato gblɔ na wo bena “ Miaƒe ame lae nye esi . ”

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Esi Yudatɔwo kple woƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo kpɔ Yesu ko la , woƒe dzi fla eye wodo ɣli sesi ̃ e bena , “ Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti ! Kla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti ! ” Pilato ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Miawo ŋutɔ miyi miakla ̃ e ɖe atia ŋu , nye la , nyemekpɔ fɔɖiɖi aɖeke le eŋuti o . ”

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Woɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Le miaƒe se nu la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ aku elabena etsɔ eɖokui wɔ Mawu ƒe Vii . ”

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Esi Pilato se nya siawo la , vɔvɔ ̃ ɖoe wu tsa ̃

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: eya ta egakplɔ Yesu yi fiasa ̃ la mee eye wo ̀ biae be , “ Kpɔ ɖa afi kae ne ̀ tso ? ” Gake Yesu meɖo nya la ŋu nɛ o .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Pilato gabiae bena , “ Me ̀ le nya ŋu ɖo ge nam oa ? Me ̀ nyae be ŋuse ̃ le asinye be maɖe asi le ŋuwo ̀ alo be mana woakla ̃ wo ̀ ɖe ati ŋu oa ? ”

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Wo ̀ la , ma ̃ te ŋu akpɔ ŋuse ̃ aɖeke ɖe dzinye nenye be womena wo ̀ tso dziƒo o . Eya ta ame siwo kplɔm vɛ na wo ̀ la , woƒe nu vɔ ̃ sɔgbɔ wu tɔwo ̀ . ”

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya siawo vɔ la , Pilato di vevie ŋutɔ be yeaɖe asi le eŋu , gake Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfowo gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Ne e ̀ katse ɖe asi le ame sia ŋu la , ekema me ̀ nye Kaisaro xɔlɔ ̃ o . Ame sia ame si tsɔ eɖokui wɔ fiae la , tsi tre ɖe Kaisaro ŋu . ”

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Esi Pilato se nya siawo la , ekplɔ Yesu gado goe tsɔ va wo gbɔe eye wo ̀ yi ɖanɔ anyi ɖe eƒe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ zikpui la dzi . Woda ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ zikpui sia ɖe kpe gbadza aɖe dzi , Woyɔa teƒe si woda kpe gbadza sia ɖo le Hebrigbe me be , “ Gabata ” .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Ŋkeke si dzi wole nu siawo wɔm la nye dzadzraɖoŋkeke na Ŋutitotoŋkekenyui la . Eye esi ŋdɔ me ɖo la , Pilato gblɔ na Yudatɔwo bena , “ Mikpɔ ɖa , miaƒe Fia lae nye esi ! ”

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Wo kata ̃ wodo ɣli sesi ̃ e be , “ Mikplɔe dzoe , mikplɔe dzoe ne miakla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti ! ”

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Ale Pilato tsɔ Yesu de asi na wo be woayi aɖakla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋuti .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Woƒe asi su Yesu dzi mlɔeba . Wotsɔ eƒe atitsoga da ɖe abɔta nɛ be wo ̀ atsɔ eye wokplɔe do go le dua me ɖo ta “ Ametakoloeƒe ” , si woyɔna be “ Golgata ” le Hebrigbe me .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Afi siae wokla ̃ Yesu ɖe ati ŋu le eye wokla ̃ adzodala eve ha ̃ ɖe eƒe axawo kple eve dzi .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Pilato ŋlɔ kla ̃ ɖe Yesu ƒe atitsoga la tame be , ‘ YESU NAZARETITÅ , YUDATÅWO ƑE FIA . ”

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Afi si wokla ̃ Yesu ɖo la medidi tso Yerusalem dua gbɔ o eye woŋlɔ nya siawo ɖe Hebrigbe , Latingbe kple Helagbe me bena ame sia ame nate ŋu axle ̃ e .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ wo va gblɔ na Pilato be , mele be woaŋlɔ ɖe atitsoga la ƒe tame be “ Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia ” o , ke boŋ neŋlɔe be , “ Ame sia be yee nye Yudatɔwo ƒe Fia . ”

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Pilato ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Nu si meŋlɔ la , meŋlɔe xoxo . Nenɔ nenema . ”

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Esi asrafoawo kla ̃ Yesu ɖe atia ŋu la , woma eƒe awuwo ɖe akpa ene me , eye woxɔe ɖekaɖekae , ke awutewui la ya la , womemae o . Awu sia nye awuʋlaya si wometɔ o , ke boŋ ɖe wolɔ ̃ e bliboe tso dzi va anyi .
