text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Eya ta wogblɔ na wo nɔewo be “ Menyo be miavuvui o , ke boŋ mina miada akɔ eye ame si ɖu dzi la naxɔe ” . Esia va eme be wo ̀ awu ŋɔŋlɔ la nu be , “ Woma nye awuwo na wo nɔewo , eye woda akɔ ɖe nye awuʋlaya dzi . ” Aleae asrafoawo wɔ .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Nyɔnu aɖewo va tsi tre ɖe atitsoga la gbɔ ɣemaɣi . Woawoe nye Yesu dada , dada nɔvi si woyɔna be Maria , ame si nye Kleopa srɔ ̃ kple Maria si tso Magdala .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Esi Yesu kpɔ dadaa wo ̀ nɔ tsitre ɖe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ la si wo ̀ lɔ ̃ na vevie xa la , egblɔ nɛ be , “ Nyɔnu , kpɔ ɖa , viwo ̀ e nye esi . ”

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Eye wo ̀ gblɔ na nusrɔ ̃ la la ha ̃ be , “ Kpɔ ɖa , dawo ̀ e nye esia ! ” " Eye tso ɣemaɣi dzi la nusrɔ ̃ la la kplɔ Maria yi eƒemee .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Esi Yesu nyae bena nu sia nu wu nu azɔ eye woawu nya siwo woŋlɔ ɖe mawunya me nu la , egblɔ bena , " “ Tsikɔ le wuyem ! ”

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Wain tsitsi kplu ɖeka aɖe nɔ afi ma . Wotsɔe kɔ ɖe akutsa tɔxɛ aɖe me eye wotsɔe tɔ ɖe ati nu hetsɔ ɖo nu nɛ be wo ̀ ano .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Esi Yesu ɖɔe kpɔ vɔ ko la , egblɔ bena , “ Ewu nu vɔ azɔ , ” " eye wo ̀ de ta to heɖe asi le eƒe gbɔgbɔ ŋu .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo medi bena ameawo nanɔ atia ŋu va se ɖe Sabat ŋkeke la dzi o , eye kpe ɖe esia ŋu la , Sabat ŋkeke sia nye Sabat tɔxɛ elabena edze Ŋutitotoŋkeke la dzi , eya ta wodi tso Pilato si bena wo ̀ ana woaŋe wo kata ̃ ƒe afɔwo bena woaku kaba . Eye ne woku la , woate ŋu aɖe woƒe kukuawo le atiawo ŋu . "

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Ale asrafowo va ŋe ame eve siwo wokla ̃ kpe ɖe Yesu ŋu la ƒe afɔwo .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Ke esi wo ̀ ɖo Yesu dzi la , wokpɔ bena eku xoxo , eya ta womegaxa ŋe eƒe afɔwo o .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Ke ha ̃ la , asrafoawo dometɔ ɖeka tsɔ akplɔ tɔ axadame nɛ eye ʋu kple tsi do go .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Ame si kpɔ nu siawo kata ̃ teƒe la ŋlɔ nu tso eŋu na mi ́ tsitotsito bena miawo ha ̃ miaxɔe ase .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Nuwɔna siawo va eme be woawu mawunya nu be , “ Womele eƒe ƒu aɖeke ŋe ge o ! ”

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Eye ŋɔŋlɔ bubu ha ̃ gagblɔ be , “ Woafɔ ŋku ɖe ame si wotsɔ akplɔ tɔe la dzi . ”

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Le nu siawo megbe la , Yosef si tso Arimatia , ame si nye Yesu ƒe nusrɔ ̃ la le adzame le vɔvɔ ̃ na Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo ta la , va bia Pilato be wo ̀ ana mɔ ye yeaɖe Yesu ƒu kukua le atia ŋu , eye Pilato na mɔe .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Nikodemo , ame si va Yesu gbɔ le za ̃ tiƒe la ha ̃ va eye wo ̀ tsɔ ami si naa ame kuku nɔa anyi ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe la vɛ . Ami sia ƒe kpekpe me anɔ abe kilogram blaetɔ ̃ sɔŋ ene eye wotsɔ atike tɔxɛ aɖewo wɔe .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Wosi ami la nɛ eye wo kple eve la tsɔ aklala si me ami ʋeʋi ̃ yɔ fu ̃ u la bla Yesu ƒe kukua ɖe eme . Wowɔe abe ale si Yudatɔwo wɔna na ame kuku hafi ɖina ene .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Abɔ aɖe te ɖe afi si wokla ̃ e ɖo la ŋu eye le abɔa me la yɔdo yeye aɖe si me womeɖi ame ɖo kpɔ o la li .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Eye le esime Sabat la ƒe gɔmedzedze tu aƒe ta la , wotsɔe yi ɖaɖi ɖe yɔdo sia me . Elabena etsɔ ɖe kpuiƒe na wo .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Le Kɔsiɖagbe ŋdi kanya , esi xexeame mekɔ vɔ tututu o la , Maria si tso Magdala la yi Yesu ƒe yɔdo gbɔ eye wo ̀ kpɔ bena womli kpe ga ̃ si nɔ yɔdoa nu la ɖa .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Eƒu du yi Petro kple nusrɔ ̃ la ma si Yesu lɔ ̃ vevie la gbɔ eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo be , “ Wova ɖe Aƒetɔ la ƒe kukua le yɔdoa me eye nyemenya afi si wotsɔe ɖada ɖo o ! ”

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Azɔ Petro kple nusrɔ ̃ la ma si Yesu lɔ ̃ la tso kpla yi ɖe yɔdoa gbɔ .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Wo ame eve la ƒu du , ke nusrɔ ̃ la kemɛ la ƒu du gbɔ Petro ŋu hetre yɔdo la gbɔ ɖoɖo .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Ebɔbɔ eye wo ̀ kpɔ ameɖivɔ la le yɔdoa me .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Simɔn Petro ha ̃ va ɖo , eye wo ̀ ge ɖe yɔdoa me . Eya ha ̃ kpɔ avɔ ɣi ƒuƒlu la le anyigba eye

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: taku si wotsɔ bla Yesu ƒe moe la , woxatsae nyuie tsɔ da ɖe yɔdoa ƒe axa dzi .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la ma si ɖo yɔdoa gbɔ gba ̃ la ha ̃ ge ɖe eme mlɔeba , ekpɔ eye wo ̀ xɔe se be etsi tre vava ̃ .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Elabena va se ɖe ɣemaɣi ha ̃ la , womenya be mawunya gblɔ bena agatsi tre o .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la la kple Petro trɔ yi aƒe me .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Ke le ɣeyiɣi sia me Maria ya gatrɔ yi yɔdoa to eye wo ̀ nɔ avi fam . Esi wo ̀ nɔ avi fam la , ebɔbɔ be yeagakpɔ yɔdoa me ɖa ,

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: kasia ekpɔ mawudɔla eve siwo nɔ awu ɣiwo me la le yɔdoa me , ɖeka le tade eye evelia le afɔde .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Mawudɔlawo biae bena , “ Nu ka tae ne ̀ le avi fam ɖo ? ” Eɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Elabena wotsɔ nye Aƒetɔ la dzoe , eye nyemenya afi si wotsɔe da ɖo o . ”

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Efɔ kɔ dzi eye wo ̀ nye kɔ kpɔ megbe , kasia ekpɔ ame aɖe wo ̀ nɔ tsitre ɖe emegbe . Yesue nye amea gake mekpɔe dze si o .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Ame la biae be , “ Nu ka ta ne ̀ le avi fam ? Ame ka dim ne ̀ le ? ” Maria bu be eyae nye abɔdzikpɔla , eya ta wo ̀ ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Aƒetɔ , nenye wo ̀ e va tsɔe le afi sia la , gblɔ afi si ne ̀ tsɔe da ɖo la nam bena mayi aɖakɔe . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Azɔ Yesu yɔe be , “ Maria ! ” Enumake Maria ha ̃ trɔ ɖe Yesu ŋu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Me ̀ gaka asi ŋunye o , elabena nyemetrɔ yi Fofo la gbɔ haɖe o . Gake yi na ̃ di nɔvinyewo ne na ̃ gblɔ na wo bena meyina ɖe Fofonye , ame si nye miawo ha ̃ Fofo la kple nye Mawu ame si nye miawo ha ̃ ƒe Mawu la gbɔ . ”

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Maria Magdalatɔ la yi ɖadi nusrɔ ̃ lawo eye wo ̀ gblɔ na wo bena , “ Mekpɔ Aƒetɔ la ! ” " eye wo ̀ gblɔ nya siwo Yesu de asi nɛ la na wo .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Le Kɔsiɖa ma ƒe fie ̃ la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo ɣla wo ɖokuiwo ɖe xɔ me nɔ takpekpe wɔm . Wotu ʋɔtru kple fesrewo kata ̃ sesi ̃ e elabena wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m na Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo . Wole afi sia kasia Yesu va do ɖe wo dome kpoyi eye wo ̀ do gbe na wo be , " “ Ŋutifafa na mi ” .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Etsɔ eƒe asiwo kple axadame fia wo . Nusrɔ ̃ lawo kpɔ dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe bena wogakpɔ Aƒetɔ la .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ na wo be , “ Ŋutifafa na mi . Abe ale si Fofo la dɔm ene la , nenema nye ha ̃ mele mia dɔm ɖe xexeame . ”

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Le esia megbe la , egbɔ ɖe wo dzi eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Mixɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Ne mietsɔ ame aɖe ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kee la , ekema ekpɔ tsɔtsɔke vava ̃ eye ne miegbe mietsɔe ke ame aɖe o la , ekema eƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo atsi eŋu . ”

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka , si nye evenɔvi , eye woyɔnɛ be Toma ya menɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo dome ɣemaɣi o .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Esi wo ̀ va la nusrɔ ̃ lawo gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Miekpɔ Aƒetɔ la . ” Ke Toma ɖo eŋu na wo bena , “ Nyemaxɔe ase o , va se ɖe esime nye ŋutɔ matsɔ nye asibidɛ aƒo ɖe eƒe gatagbadzɛbiawo me eye matsɔ nye asi aƒo ɖe abi si le axadame nɛ la me hafi . ”

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Anɔ abe ŋkeke enyi megbe ene la , nusrɔ ̃ lawo gaƒo ƒu ɖe xɔ me tu ʋɔ ɖe wo ɖokuiwo nu eye fifia ya la Toma ha ̃ nɔ wo dome . Kasia Yesu gava do ɖe wo dome eye wo ̀ gado gbe na wo be , “ Ŋutifafa na mi ” .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Azɔ egblɔ na Toma bena , “ Zɔ va na ̃ tsɔ wo ̀ asibidɛ aƒo ɖe nye asiƒome , eye na ̃ tsɔ wo ̀ asi aƒo ɖe nye axadame kpɔ . Tso azɔ la , me ̀ ganye dzimaxɔsetɔ o , xɔse vava ̃ nenɔ asiwo ̀ ! ”

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Toma ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ Nye Aƒetɔ kple nye Mawu . ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Yesu gagblɔ nɛ be , “ Esi ne ̀ kpɔm la e ̀ xɔe se be nyee , ke woayra ame siwo mekpɔm o , gake woxɔ dzinye se . ”

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ lawo kpɔ Yesu wo ̀ wɔ nukunu bubu geɖewo siwo ya womeŋlɔ ɖe agbale ̃ sia me o ,

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: ke woŋlɔ esiawo da ɖi bena miaxɔe ase bena eyae nye Mesia la kple Mawu ƒe Vi , eye ne miexɔe se la , miakpɔ agbe .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Emegbe la , Yesu gaɖe eɖokui fia eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo le Tiberias ƒua nu .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Eva dzɔ bena , Simɔn Petro , Toma Venɔvi la , Nataniel si tso Kana le Galilea , kple Zebedeo viwo hekpe ɖe nusrɔ ̃ la eve bubu ŋu , nɔ ƒuta .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Simon Petro gblɔ bena , “ Meyina tɔƒo . ” Tete wo kata ̃ gblɔ be , “ Mi ́ ayi kpli wo ̀ . ” Ale wodze mɔ yi ɖage ɖe tɔdziʋua me gake womeɖe la ̃ aɖeke le za ̃ ma me o .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Le ŋdi la , Yesu nɔ tsitre ɖe ƒua ta gake nusrɔ ̃ lawo menyae be Yesue ma o .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Yesu do ɣli bia be , “ Xɔ ̃ nyewo , mieɖe la ̃ aɖea ? ” Woɖo eŋu be , “ Ao , mieɖe naneke o . ”

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Egagblɔ bena , “ Mida miaƒe ɖɔ la ɖe ʋua ƒe nuɖusime lɔƒo eye miaɖe la ̃ ” Wowɔ ɖe eƒe gbe dzi eye nyateƒe woɖe la ̃ fu ̃ u ale gbegbe be womete ŋu hee de ʋua me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Azɔ nusrɔ ̃ la si Yesu lɔ ̃ na vevie la gblɔ na Petro bena , “ Kpɔ ɖa , Aƒetɔ lae ! ” Esi Petro se nya sia ko la , etsɔ eƒe awu do kaba elabena avɔ kakɛ aɖe koe wo ̀ sa ɖe ali , eye wo ̀ dzo dze tɔa me doo , heƒu tsi va gota .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Ke mi ́ ame mamlɛawo la , mi ́ etsi ʋua me he ɖɔa va gota elabena gota anɔ abe meta alafa ɖeka ko ene .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Esi mi ́ eɖo gota la , mi ́ ekpɔ be wodo dzo ɖe afi ma , la ̃ meme nɔ edzi , eye abolo ha ̃ kpe ɖe eŋu .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo bena , “ Mitsɔ la ̃ si mieɖe fifia la ƒe ɖe vɛ . ”

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Ale Simɔn Petro yi ɖakpe ɖe wo ŋu wohe ɖɔ la ɖe gota . Esi woxle ̃ e la , ga ̃ siwo woɖe la , enɔ alafa ɖeka blaatɔ ̃ - vɔ - etɔ ̃ , gake ɖɔ la mevuvu o .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Yesu gblɔ na wo be , “ Azɔ , miva ɖu nu . ” Ke wo dometɔ aɖeke mete ŋu bia ame si wo ̀ nye o elabena woka ɖe edzi be Aƒetɔ lae .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Yesu ma aboloa kple la ̃ la na wo .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Esia nye zi etɔ ̃ lia Yesu ɖe eɖokui fia nusrɔ ̃ lawo esi wo ̀ fɔ tso ame kukuwo dome .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Esi woɖu ŋdinu vɔ la , Yesu bia Simɔn Petro bena , “ Simɔn , Yohanes vi , e ̀ lɔ ̃ m wu ame siawoa ? ” Petro ɖo eŋu nɛ be , “ E ̃ , wo ̀ ŋutɔ e ̀ nyae bena nyemelɔ ̃ a nu gbɔwo ̀ o . ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ekema kpɔ nye ale ̃ awo dzi . ”

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Yesu gabiae be , “ Simɔn , Yohanes vi , elɔ ̃ m vava ̃ ? ” Petro ɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , Aƒetɔ , wo ̀ ŋutɔ e ̀ nyae be nyemelɔ ̃ a nu gbɔwo ̀ o . ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Ekema kpɔ nye ale ̃ awo dzi . ”

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Yesu biae zi etɔ ̃ lia be , “ Simɔn , Yohanes vi , e ̀ le lɔ ̃ yema ? ” Biabia etɔ ̃ lia sia ve Petro elabena Yesu biae zi etɔ ̃ lia be , “ E ̀ le lɔ ̃ yema ? ” Ke Petro ɖo eŋu be , “ Aƒetɔ , wo ̀ ŋutɔ e ̀ nya nu sia nu eye e ̀ nyae be melɔ ̃ wo ̀ . ” Yesu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nyi nye ale ̃ awo .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Mele egblɔm na wo ̀ le nyateƒe me be esi ne ̀ nye ɖekakpui la , wo ̀ ŋutɔ e ̀ doa awu hedoa go yia afi si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ , gake ne e ̀ ku amega ̃ la , a ̃ kɔ wo ̀ abɔwo dzi , ame bubu ado awu na wo ̀ eye woakplɔ wo ̀ ayi afi si me ̀ di be yeayi o . ”

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Yesu gblɔ nya sia nɛ bena wo ̀ atsɔ afia ku si ku ge wo ̀ ala atsɔ kafu Mawu . Esi Yesu wu nya la nu la , egblɔ nɛ bena , “ Dze yonyeme . ”

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Esi Petro trɔ la , ekpɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo dometɔ ɖeka le eƒe megbe gbɔna . Nusrɔ ̃ la siae nye ame si nɔ Yesu ƒe axadzi tututu le nuɖuƒea hebiae be , “ Aƒetɔ , mi ́ a dometɔ kae ade wo ̀ asi maha ̃ ? ”

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Ale Petro bia Yesu be , “ Ku ka tɔgbie li na ame sia ya ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu nɛ bena , “ Nenye be medi be wo ̀ anɔ agbe va se ɖe esi magava la , wo ̀ nyae wo ̀ nyea ? Wo ̀ ya mebe dze yonyeme . ”

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Ke nya sia kaka ɖe nɔvia nusrɔ ̃ la bubuwo dome bena , nusrɔ ̃ la sia mele kuku ge o . Ke menye nya siae Yesu gblɔ kura o , ɖeko wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Ne medi be wo ̀ anɔ agbe va se ɖe esi magava la , wo ̀ nyaea ? ”

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Nusrɔ ̃ la siae nye esi Yesu lɔ ̃ na . Ekpɔ nu siawo kata ̃ teƒe tsitotsito eye wo ̀ ŋlɔ wo da ɖi . Eye mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ enya be eƒe ɖaseɖiɖi tso nu siawo ŋu nye nyateƒe .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Yesu wɔ nu bubu geɖewo ha ̃ kpe ɖe esiawo ŋu . Ne woaŋlɔ wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ɖi la , mesusu be xexeame kata ̃ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ malolo na agbale ̃ siawo tsɔtsɔ o .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: O Teofil , le nye agbale ̃ gba ̃ tɔ na wo ̀ me la meƒo nu tso nu siwo kata ̃ Yesu de asi wɔwɔ kple fiafia me ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: va se ɖe ŋkeke si dzi wotsɔe yi dziƒoe le esime wo ̀ de se na apostolo siwo wo ̀ tia to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la me vɔ megbe ŋu .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Le eƒe fukpekpe , ku kple tsitretsitsi vɔ megbe la , eɖe eɖokui fia ame siawo , eye wo ̀ na kpɔɖeŋu geɖewo tsɔ ka ɖe edzii na wo be yele agbe . Eɖe eɖokui fia wo le ŋkeke blaene sɔŋ me eye wo ̀ ƒo nu na wo tso mawufiaɖuƒe la ŋuti .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Gbe ɖeka esi Yesu nɔ nu ɖum kple eƒe apostolowo la , ede se na wo be , “ Migadzo le Yerusalem o ke boŋ milala va se ɖe esime miaxɔ Fofonye ƒe nunana si ŋugbe wo ̀ do , nu si ŋu meƒo nu tsoe na mi xoxo .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Elabena tsi ƒuƒlue Yohanes tsɔ de mawutsi ta na mi , gake le ŋkeke ʋe aɖewo megbe la woade tsi ta na mi kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la . ”

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Ɣebubuɣi esi Yesu gaɖe eɖokui fia apostoloawo la , wobiae se be , “ Ale kee , Aƒetɔ , ɖe ne ̀ le Israel dukɔ la ɖe ge tso Romatɔwo te aɖoe te abe dukɔ nɔɖokuisi ene azɔa ? ”

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Yesu ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Fofo la ŋutɔe ɖo ŋkeke na nu siawo tɔgbi eye mehia ̃ be miawo mianya ɣeyiɣi la kple ŋkeke la o .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Gake ne Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la va mia dzi eye wo ̀ yɔ mia me la , ŋuse ̃ tɔxɛ kple dzideƒo blibo aɖo mia me eye miate ŋu anye nye ɖaseɖilawo le Yerusalem , Yudea kple Samaria nutowo kata ̃ me kple xexeame ƒe seƒe ke . ”

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Le nya siawo gbɔgblɔ vɔ megbe tete ko la , apostoloawo kpɔ Yesu wo ̀ nɔ dziƒo yim abe ame aɖee nɔ ekɔm nɔ dzi yimii ene , kasia wo ̀ bu ɖe alilikpo me eye wo ̀ dzo le wo gbɔ . Ke apostoloawo ke nu ɖe te nɔ ekpɔm va se ɖe esime wo ̀ bu ɖe wo .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Woganɔ kɔ didim be yewoakpɔ Yesu , kasia ame eve aɖewo , siwo do awu ɣiwo la va do ɖe wo dome . Ame eve siawo gblɔ na apostoloawo be ,

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: “ Mi Galilea ŋutsuwo , nu ka ta miegale tsitre ɖe afii gale yame kpɔm ga ̃ a ale ? Yesu dzo yi dziƒo , gake gbe ɖeka la , agatrɔ agbɔ abe ale si tututu wo ̀ dzo yi dziƒo lae ene ! ”

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Le nyadzɔdzɔ siawo megbe la , apostoloawo ɖi tso Amito la dzi , afi si nu siawo dzɔ le la hetrɔ va Yerusalem si didi abe kilometa ɖeka ko ene .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Esi wova ɖo Yerusalem la , woƒo wo ɖokuiwo nu ƒu ɖe xɔ aɖe me le dziƒoxɔ si dzi wonɔ la dzi eye wodo gbe ɖa le afi ma .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Apostolo siwo nɔ afi ma la woe nye : Petro , Yohanes , Yakobo , Adreas , Filipo , Toma , Bartolomeo , Mateo , Yakobo si nye Alfeo vi , Simɔn si wogayɔna be Zelote , Yuda si nye Yakobo vi kpakple Yesu nɔviŋutsuwo . Yesu dada Maria kple nyɔnu bubu geɖewo ha ̃ nɔ ameawo dome .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Wonɔ gbedodoɖa dzi alea ŋkeke geɖewo . Gbe ɖeka esi ame abe alafa ɖeka blaeve lɔƒo ene gaƒo ƒu nɔ gbe dom ɖa la , Petro tsi tre ƒo nu na wo gblɔ be ,

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: “ Nɔvinyewo , ale si Yuda de mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu asi eye wowui la va eme tututu abe ale si woŋlɔe da ɖi le mawunya me ene . Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒo nu le nu siawo ŋu xoxo to Fia David dzi .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Yuda la , mi ́ a dometɔ ɖeka wo ̀ nye tsa ̃ . Yesu tiae koŋ be wo ̀ anye yeƒe apostolo abe mi ́ awo ke ene .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Yuda tsɔ ga si wo ̀ xɔ ɖe Yesu dede asi ta la yi ɖaƒle anyigba aɖe si dzi wo ̀ wu eɖokui le . Elia ati dzi hetsɔ eɖokui xla ̃ ɖe anyigba sesi ̃ e ale be eƒe ƒodo wo too eye eƒe dɔkaviwo kaka ɖe anyigba .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Eƒe kunya sia kaka ɖe Yerusalem dua me kaba ŋutɔ ale wona ŋkɔ teƒea be , ‘ Ʋunyigba . ’ ”

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Petro gblɔ be , “ Elabena woŋlɔe ɖi ɖe Psalmowo me be , ‘ Eƒe nɔƒe naɖi gbɔlo , ame aɖeke neganɔ afi ma o , eye ame bubu naxɔ eƒe amekplɔdɔ awɔ . ”

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: Petro yi eƒe nuƒoa dzi be , “ Azɔ la ele be mi ́ atia ame bubu aɖe wo ̀ anɔ Yuda teƒe le mi ́ a dome . Ame si mi ́ atia la nanye ame si nɔ mi ́ a dome kplikplikpli tso gɔmedzedzea ,

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: tso esime mi ́ enya Aƒetɔa , tso ɣeyiɣi si me Yohanes de mawutsi ta nɛ va se ɖe esime wo ̀ dzo le mia gbɔ yi dziƒo . ”

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Ƒuƒoƒea tɔ asi ame eve dzi , ame siawoe nye Yosef Yusto si wogayɔna be Basaba kple Matias , be woatia wo dometɔ ɖeka .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Eya megbe la wodo gbe ɖa gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ , wo ̀ e nya ame sia ame ƒe dzime , eya ta fia mi ́ ame si ne ̀ tia le ame eve siawo dome

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: be wo ̀ axɔ apostolonyenye ƒe dɔ sia ɖe Yuda teƒe , ame si gble ̃ dɔa ɖi le esime wo ̀ yi teƒe si dzee . ”

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Le esia megbe la , woda akɔ eye wo ̀ dze Matias dzi ale wotiae abe apostolo ene kpe ɖe ame wuiɖekɛ mamlɛawo ŋu .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Le Yesu ƒe ku kple tsitretsitsi ƒe kwasiɖa adre megbe la , Pentekoste ŋkekenyui la gaɖo . Yesu dzixɔsela siawo gaƒo wo ɖokuiwo nu ƒu ɖe teƒe ɖeka henɔ gbe dom ɖa le ɖekawɔwɔ blibo me .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Kasia wose gbeɖiɖi aɖe abe ya sese ̃ aɖe ƒe ƒoƒo ene le xɔa tame tututu , eye aƒea me kata ̃ yɔ kple gbeɖiɖia .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Enumake nane si ɖi dzobibi ƒe aɖewo la dze ɖe wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ƒe tame ,

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: kasia , Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ ame sia ame si le afi ma la me fu ̃ eye wode asi gbegbɔgblɔ bubu si womenya tsa ̃ o la gbɔgblɔ me elabena Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la na ŋutete sia wo .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi ha ̃ la , Yudatɔ mawuvɔ ̃ la geɖewo tso dukɔ vovovowo me va Yerusalem be yeawoɖu ŋkeke tɔxɛ sia .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Esi wose ɣli sese ̃ si nɔ ɖiɖim le afi si apostoloawo nɔ la , ame geɖewo ŋutɔ ɖe abla va teƒea be yewoakpɔ nu si nɔ edzi yim ɖa . Ame siawo ƒe nu ku ŋutɔ esi wose nusrɔ ̃ lawo wonɔ gbe vovovowo gblɔm eye ame sia ame se wonɔ eƒe degbe gblɔm .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Nu sia wɔ nuku na amedzroawo ale gbegbe be wogblɔ be , “ Ame siawo kata ̃ ɖe , menye Galileatɔwoe wonye oa ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Ke ale ke wɔ mi ́ ese wole anyigba siwo dzi wodzi mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ɖo la ƒe gbe gblɔm maha ̃ ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Mi ́ a dometɔ aɖewo nye Patiatɔwo , ɖewo nye Midiatɔwo kple Elamtɔwo , bubuwo ha ̃ tso Mesopotamia , Yudea , Kapadokia , Ponto kple Asia nutowo me .

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Ame aɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ tso keke Frigia , Pamfilia , Egipte kple Libia si le Kirene gbɔ .

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: E ̃ , ame aɖewo tso Roma gɔ ̃ . Ame siawo nye Yudatɔ vava ̃ wo kple trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo ŋutɔ trɔ zu Yudatɔwo , eye bubuwo ha ̃ nye Kretatɔwo kple Arabiatɔwo . Mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia aɖe se ame siawo le Mawu ƒe nukunu ga ̃ wo ƒe nya gblɔm le eya ŋutɔ degbe me ! ”

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Ameha blibo la ƒe nu ku eye woƒe mo wɔ yaa le nyadzɔdzɔ sia ta eye wobia wo nɔewo be , “ Nu sia gɔme ɖe ? ”

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Gake ame aɖewo ya nɔ ameha la me nɔ fewu ɖum le apostoloawo ŋu be , “ Ame siawo la , aha yeye womu , menye nu tɔxɛ aɖekee le dzɔdzɔm o . ”

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Azɔ la Petro kple apostolo wuiɖekɛawo tsi tre eye Petro ƒo nu na wo kple gbe sese ̃ be , “ Agoo na mi , Yudaeatɔwo , mi amedzrowo kple Yerusalem nɔlawo siaa , miɖo to miasee !

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Mia dometɔ aɖewo le gbɔgblɔm be ahae le mi ́ a mum , ke medi be mianya nyui be mi ́ a dometɔ aɖeke mede nu aha me ŋdi sia o . Miawo ŋutɔwo mienyae be ŋu meke haɖe na ahanono o elabe ŋdi ga asieke me ko mi ́ ele fifia .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Ke boŋ nu si teƒe kpɔm miele ŋdi sia la nye nu si Nyagblɔɖila Yoel gblɔ ɖi xoxoxo ƒe alafa nanewoe nye esi va yi be ,

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: ‘ Le ŋkeke mamlɛawo me la , Mawu gblɔ be makɔ nye Gbɔgbɔ ɖe amegbetɔƒomewo kata ̃ dzi . Esia ana be mia viŋutsuwo kple mia vinyɔnuwo agblɔ nya ɖi . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , mia viŋutsuwo akpɔ ŋutegawo eye ame tsitsiwo ha ̃ aku drɔ ̃ e le nu siwo ava dzɔ la ŋuti .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: E ̃ , Gbɔgbɔ la ayɔ nye subɔlawo kata ̃ me , ŋutsuwo kple nyɔnuwo siaa , ale be woagblɔ nya ɖi .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Mana nukunuwo nadzɔ le dziŋgɔli ̃ me kple anyigba dzi siaa , eye wo ̀ adze abe ʋu , dzobibi kple dzudzɔtutu

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: kɔlikɔli ene . Hafi ŋkeke dziŋɔ si Aƒetɔ la ɖo da ɖi nava la , ɣe atrɔ zu viviti eye ɣleti abia he ̃ abe ʋu ene .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ke ame si abia nublanuikpɔkpɔ tso Aƒetɔ la gbɔ la akpɔ ɖeɖe . ’ ”

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: Petro yi eƒe nuƒoa dzi gblɔ be , “ Mi Israeltɔwo , miɖo to miasee ! Mawu wɔ nukunu klitsu geɖewo le mia dome to Yesu Nazaretitɔ la dzi , be yeatsɔ aɖo kpe edzii be , Yesu nye ye vi vava ̃ . Nu siawo kata ̃ le nyanya me na mi pɛpɛpɛ .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Azɔ , abe ale si Mawu ŋutɔ wɔ ɖoɖo da ɖi xoxo ene la , eɖe mɔ na mi , mieto Roma dziɖuɖua dzi kla ̃ Yesu ɖe atitsoga ŋu eye miewui .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Gake Mawu ŋutɔ gaɖe Yesu tso ku ƒe ŋɔdzi me , fɔe ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome , elabena ku ƒe ŋuse ̃ mete ŋu ɖu Yesu dzi o .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: ” Fia David ƒo nu tso Yesu ŋu be , ‘ Menya be nye Aƒetɔ la le gbɔnye ɖaa . Ekpena ɖe ŋunye , e ̃ , Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ ga ̃ la xɔna nam .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: ” ‘ Esia ta dzidzɔ blibo yɔ nye dzime eye mele Mawu kafum ɖaa gbe sia gbe . Kakaɖedzi le asinye ha ̃ be nu sia nu anyo nam le ku me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: ” ‘ Mawu , magble ̃ nye luʋɔ ɖe tsie ̃ ƒe o , eye mana be e ƒe Kɔkɔetɔ la ƒe ŋutila ̃ nanyunyɔ o .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: ” ‘ A ̀ na magbɔ agbe eye makpɔ dzidzɔ blibo le gbɔwo . ’ ”

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: Petro yi edzi be , “ Nɔviwo , mibu tame nyuie ! Mi ́ a Togbui David menɔ nu ƒom le eɖokui ŋuti esi wo ̀ gblɔ nya siwo megblɔ na mi la o . Elabena David ku xoxoxo eye eƒe yɔdo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ le mi ́ a dome afii .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: David nye nyagblɔɖila eye enya be Mawu do ŋugbe matrɔmatrɔ da ɖi be , David ƒe dzidzimevi ɖeka ava zu Mesia la eye wo ̀ anɔ David ƒe fiazikpui dzi aɖu fia .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Gawu la David kpɔ nu siwo ava dzɔ le ŋgɔgbea eye wo ̀ gblɔe ɖi le Mesia la ƒe tsitretsitsi tso ame kukuwo dome ŋu be , eƒe luʋɔ matsi tsie ̃ ƒe o , eye eƒe ŋutila ̃ manyunyɔ o .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Yesu ŋue David gblɔ nya siawo tsoe eye le nyateƒe me la , mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ate ŋu aɖi ɖase be Mawu fɔ Yesu tso ame kukuwo dome vava ̃ .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: ” Ke fifia la , Yesu bɔbɔ nɔ bubu ƒe fiazikpui kɔkɔtɔ dzi le Mawu ŋutɔ gbɔ tututu . Eye abe ale si Fofo la ŋutɔ do ŋugbee ene la , ena ŋuse ̃ e be wo ̀ aɖo Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ɖe mi ́ a me eye eya ƒe dɔwɔnae nye nu siwo kpɔm miele kple nu siwo sem mie ̀ le fifia .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Elabena David melia yi dziƒo o , gake egblɔ be , ‘ Aƒetɔ la gblɔ na nye Aƒetɔ be : nɔ anyi ɖe nye nuɖusime

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: va se ɖe esime mawɔ wo ̀ futɔwo wo ̀ afɔɖodzinuwoe . ’

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: ” Eya ta mika ɖe edzi na Israel bliboa be Mawu wɔ Yesu sia , ame si miawo miekla ̃ ɖe ati ŋu la Aƒetɔ la kple Kristo la siaa . ”

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Petro ƒe nyawo wɔ dɔ ɖe ameha la dzi ale gbegbe be wo dometɔ aɖewo bia Petro kple apostolo bubuawo be , “ Nɔviwo , nu ka wɔ ge mi ́ ala ? ”

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Petro ɖo eŋu na wo be , “ Ele be mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ , atrɔ ɖe Mawu ŋu eye woade mawutsi ta na mi le Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ me bena woatsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake mi . Ne miewɔ esia la ekema miawo ha ̃ miaxɔ nunana sia , si nye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Elabe Kristo do Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋugbe na mia dome ame sia ame si Aƒetɔ Mawu ŋutɔ yɔ va eɖokui gbɔe eye menye miawo ɖeɖe ko o , ke boŋ na mia viwo kple ame siwo tso dukɔ bubuwo me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Petro yi dzi hegblɔ mawunya didi aɖe na ameha la . Eƒo nu le Yesu ŋu na wo eye wo ̀ bia tso wo si be woadze agbagba adzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ eye woaɖe wo ɖokuiwo ɖa tso nu vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo le edzi yim le dukɔa me la gbɔ .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Ame abe akpe etɔ ̃ sɔŋ xɔ Petro ƒe nyawo dzi se ale be wona wo ̀ de mawutsi ta na wo gbe ma gbe ke .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Ame siawo ge ɖe xɔsetɔwo ƒe habɔbɔ me eye wo kata ̃ wodoa go edziedzi hesrɔ ̃ a mawunya tso apostoloawo gbɔ ; wodoa gbe ɖa eye woɖua Aƒetɔ ƒe Nuɖuɖu Kɔkɔe la ha ̃ .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Wo kata ̃ nɔ anyi le vɔvɔ ̃ tɔxɛ me eye apostoloawo ha ̃ wɔ nukunu geɖewo wokpɔ .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Xɔsetɔwo kata ̃ nɔ teƒe ɖeka , wowɔ woƒe nuwo kata ̃ hamenui

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: wotsɔ woƒe kesinɔnuwo kple nunɔamesiwo dzra eye woma ga la na ame sia ame ɖe eƒe hiahia ̃ nu .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Wokpea ta ɖe gbedoxɔ la me gbe sia gbe hesubɔa Mawu . Wogamaa wo ɖokuiwo ɖe ha suesuewo me ha ̃ eye wodoa go le wo nɔewo ƒe aƒewo me heɖua Aƒetɔ ƒe Nuɖuɖu Kɔkɔe la . Woɖua nu ɖekae ha ̃ dzidzɔtɔe ,

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: wonɔa akpedada na Mawu , dzi ɖaa , amewo kata ̃ kpɔa ŋudzedze nyuie le xɔsetɔ siawo ŋuti eye Aƒetɔ la tsɔa ame siwo kpɔ xɔxɔ la kpena ɖe wo ŋuti gbe sia gbe .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Gbe ɖeka le ɣetrɔ ga etɔ ̃ me la , Petro kple Yohanes yi gbedoxɔ la me be yewoaɖado gbe ɖa abe ale si wowɔnɛ ɖaa ene .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Esi woɖo gbedoxɔa gbɔ la , wokpɔ tekunɔ aɖe si wokɔ va da ɖe agbo si woyɔna be “ Agbo Nyui ” la nu . Amea nye tekunɔ tso eƒe dzɔdzɔme ke eye gbe sia gbe la eƒe ƒometɔwo kɔnɛ va dana ɖe agbo sia nu be wo ̀ abia nu le afi ma .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Esi Petro kple Yohanes to tekunɔ sia ŋu va yina ko la , edo ɣli bia wo be woana ga ye .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Petro kple Yohanes trɔ kpɔe du ̃ eye Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nɔvi , fɔ ta na ̃ kpɔ mi ́ aƒe ŋkume . ”

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Tekunɔ la fɔ ŋku ɖe wo dzi ga ̃ a henɔ mɔ kpɔm be woana ga ye .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Petro gblɔ nɛ be , “ Nɔvi , klosalo kple sika mele asinye o , ke nu si le asinye lae mana wo ̀ . Le Yesu Kristo , Nazaretitɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ me , tsi tre na ̃ zɔ azɔli . ”

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Ale Petro do asi ɖa le ́ tekunɔ la ƒe alɔnu be wo ̀ atsi tre . Kasia dɔnɔ la kpɔ be ŋuse ̃ ɖo yeƒe afɔ kple drikame ŋu .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Ale wo ̀ ti kpo , tsi tre hede asi azɔlizɔzɔ me . Enɔ kpo tim nɔ zɔzɔm alea henɔ Mawu kafum eye wo ̀ dze Petro kple Yohanes yome ge ɖe gbedoxɔa me .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ kpɔ ame sia wo ̀ nɔ zɔzɔm nɔ Mawu kafum la

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: de dzesii be eyae nye ŋutsu ma si nɔa nu biam le gbedoxɔ la ƒe agbo si woyɔna be ‘ Nyui ’ la nu ; woƒe nu ku eye woƒe mo wɔ yaa le nu si dzɔ ɖe edzi la ŋu . Petro gblɔ mawunya na ame siwo le gbedoxɔ la me

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Nuwɔametɔ sia nɔ Petro kple Yohanes ŋu kplikplikpli va ɖo gbedoxɔa ƒe akpa si woyɔna be Salomo ƒe Akpata la me eye ameha la ƒo zi va wo gbɔ le afi ma . Le afi sia la , ame sia ame tɔ te ɖi nɔ nu wɔnuku sia teƒe kpɔm kple vɔvɔ ̃ .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Enumake Petro wɔ mɔnukpɔkpɔ sia ŋutidɔ heƒo nu na ameha la . Egblɔ na wo be , “ Israeltɔwo , nu ka ta nuwɔna sia wɔ nuku na mi alea gbegbe eye miebu be ŋuse ̃ tɔxɛ aɖee le mi ́ awo ŋutɔwo si alo mi ́ aƒe kɔkɔenyenye tae mi ́ ete ŋu da gbe le ame sia ŋu ale be wo ̀ te ŋu le zɔzɔm ha ̃ ? ”

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Medi be eme nakɔ na mi nyuie be Mawu si nye Abraham , Isak , Yakɔb kple mi ́ a tɔgbuitɔgbuiwo ƒe Mawu lae da gbe le ame sia ŋu be yeatsɔ ade bubu eƒe subɔla Yesu Kristo ŋu . Yesu Kristo siae nye ame si gbɔ miawo miegbe nu le le Pilato ŋkume , togbɔ be Pilato dze agbagba ale gbegbe be yeaɖe asi le eŋu , aɖe eƒe agbe tso ku me hafi ha ̃ .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Medze mia ŋu be wo ̀ aɖe asi le Ame Kɔkɔe vɔ ̃ mawɔla sia ŋu o , ke boŋ miebia be wo ̀ aɖe asi le hlɔ ̃ dola ŋu boŋ .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: E ̃ , miewu ame si me agbe doa go tsona la , gake Mawu fɔe ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome . Nye kple Yohanes mi ́ ate ŋu aɖi ɖase kɔtee le esia ŋu be esi miewui vɔ la , mi ́ edo goe , agbagbe , ŋkume kple ŋkume .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: ” Yesu ƒe ŋkɔe da gbe le dɔnɔ sia ŋu . Miawo ŋutɔ mienya nuwɔametɔ si ƒomevi wo ̀ nye va yi . Le nyateƒe me la , Yesu dzixɔse si Mawu ŋutɔ na mi ́ la ƒe ŋuse ̃ mee dɔnɔ sia kpɔ hayahaya blibo sia tsoe . ”

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: “ Nɔviwo , menya be nu si miewɔ ɖe Yesu ŋu la , mienya hafi wɔe o . Nenema kee nye mia nunɔlawo ha ̃ .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Ke to wɔna siawo me la , Mawu na be nu siwo nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ da ɖi be ele be Mesia la nakpe fu nenema la va eme pɛpɛpɛ .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Ke azɔ la nɔviwo , mitrɔ miaƒe susu kple nɔnɔme ɖe Mawu ŋu , eye mitsɔ mia ɖokuiwo nɛ ale be Mawu ha ̃ natsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake mi eye wo ̀ ana be miakpɔ dzidzeme .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Gawu la , Mawu agaɖo Yesu miaƒe Mesia la ɖe mi

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: E ̃ , abe ale si nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔe da ɖi xoxoxo ene la , ele be Yesu nanɔ dziƒo va se ɖe esime woaɖe nu vɔ ̃ ɖa le nu sia nu ŋu keŋkekeŋ .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Mose ha ̃ gblɔe xoxo be , ‘ Ɣeyiɣi gbɔna esi Mawu ŋutɔ aɖo nyagblɔɖila tɔxɛ aɖe ɖe mia dome abe nye Mose pɛpɛpɛ ene . Anyo na mi be miaɖo to ame sia ƒe gbe

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: elabena woatsrɔ ̃ ame sia ame si mase eƒe gbe awɔ ɖe edzi o . ’

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: “ Samuel kple nyagblɔɖila bubuawo tso Samuel ŋɔli va ɖo fifia ha ̃ ƒo nu tso nu siwo le dzɔdzɔm egbegbe la ŋu .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Miawoe nye nyagblɔɖila siawo ƒe dzidzimeviwo eye ŋugbe si Mawu do na mia tɔgbuiwo la , miawo ha ̃ miele eme . Mawu do ŋugbe na Abraham be , ‘ Woayra xexeame blibo la to wo ̀ dzidzimeviwo dzi . ’

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Le ŋugbedodo sia ta , esi Mawu ɖo via ɖe xexea me la , eɖoe ɖe Israel dukɔ la gbɔ gba ̃ be wo ̀ akplɔ mi , miadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ , atrɔ va Mawu gbɔ . ”

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Esi Petro kple Yohanes nɔ nu ƒom na ameawo alea la , Osɔfoga ̃ wo kple gbedoxɔŋudzɔlawo ƒe amega ̃ kpakple Zadukitɔwo dometɔ aɖewo va do ɖe wo dzi .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Ale si Petro kple Yohanes nɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem be Yesu gagbɔ agbe tso ame kukuwo dome la nye nu si mevivi wo nu kura o .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Eya ta wole ́ Petro kple Yohanes , gake esi fie ̃ ɖo xoxo ta la , wotsɔ wo ame evea de gaxɔ me be woadɔ afi ma ŋu nake .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Togbɔ be wo ̀ va me alea ha ̃ la , ame geɖe siwo se Petro kple Yohanes ƒe nyagbɔgblɔ gbe ma gbe la xɔe se hetrɔ dzime eye wozu xɔsetɔwo ale xɔsetɔwo kata ̃ ƒe xexle ̃ me va ɖo abe akpe atɔ ̃ ene .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Le ŋufɔke la , Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ wo , agbale ̃ fialawo kple dumemega ̃ wo kpe ta le Yerusalem .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Takpekpea me nɔla aɖewo nye Anas si nye Osɔfoga ̃ , Kayafa , Yohanes , Aleksandro kple Anas ƒe ƒometɔ aɖewo .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Wokplɔ Petro kple Yohanes va woƒe ŋkumee . Takpekpea me nɔlawo bia Petro kple Yohanes be , “ Ame kae na ŋuse ̃ mi be miawɔ nu sia ? ”

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Enumake Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la do ŋuse ̃ Petro eye wo ̀ ɖo eŋu na wo be ,

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: “ Osɔfoga ̃ , bubutɔwo , kple dumega ̃ wo , nenye tekunɔ sia ƒe hayahaya tae miele gbe biam mi ́ la ,

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: ekema medi be mi kple Israeltɔwo kata ̃ mianya kɔtee be , to ŋuse ̃ tɔxɛ si le Yesu Kristo Nazaretitɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ mee ame sia kpɔ lamese ̃ le . Yesu siae nye Mesia ame si miawo miewu , ke Mawu fɔe ɖe agbe tso ame kukuwo dome . Eya ƒe ŋuse ̃ e na be dɔnɔ sia tsi tre ɖe mia dome fifi laa , eye eƒe la ̃ me se ̃ .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Mawunya gblɔe be , ‘ Kpe si xɔtulawo gbe la eya kee trɔna zua dzogoedzikpe . ’

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Yesu ɖeka pɛ ko dzie ame sia ame ato hafi akpɔ ɖeɖe . Ame aɖeke megali le xexea me godoo si ate ŋu axɔ na amegbetɔ aɖeke wu Yesu o . ”

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Ŋuse ̃ tɔxɛ si ɖo Petro kple Yohanes me be wote ŋu ɖo nyawo ŋu alea la , wɔ nuku na Takpekpea ŋutɔ , elabena wonya be Petro kple Yohanes menya agbale ̃ o . Takpekpea kpɔe dze sii be , Yesu yomenɔnɔ tae wote ŋu kpɔ ŋuse ̃ sia .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Gawu la , esi wo ̀ nye be dɔnɔ si ŋu woda gbe le ha ̃ nɔ tsitre ɖe wo dome ta la , ɖe ko wo ̀ nɔ na Takpekpea me nɔlawo be woalɔ ̃ be ŋuse ̃ aɖe le Petro kple Yohanes si vava ̃ .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Le esia ta wona wokplɔ Petro kple Yohanes do goe le xɔa me ale be woate ŋu akpɔ mɔnu abu tame le nya la ŋu .

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: Azɔ Takpekpea me nɔlawo bia wo nɔewo be , “ Nu ka tututue mi ́ awɔ ame eve siawo ? Enye nyateƒe matrɔmatrɔ be woda gbe le nuwɔametɔ sia ŋu vava ̃ eye nukunu sia ɖi hoo le Yerusalem du bliboa me .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Gake ha ̃ ɖewohi ̃ mi ́ ate ŋu axe mɔ na wo be woagakaka woƒe nya si gblɔm wole le Yesu kple ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi ŋu ayi dzii o . Mi ́ ayɔ wo ado vɔvɔ ̃ na wo be ne wogakatse gblɔ nya tso Yesu ŋu la , manyo na wo kura o ! ”

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Ale wogayɔ Petro kple Yohanes va wo dome eye wode se na wo vevie be yewomedi be yewoagasee alo akpɔ wo woanɔ nu fiam tso Yesu ŋu le teƒe aɖeke kura o .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Ke Petro kple Yohanes ɖo eŋu gblɔ na wo be , “ Miawo ŋutɔwo mibu eŋu kpɔ be enyo be mi ́ ase amegbetɔ ƒe gbe agbe Mawu ƒe gbedziwɔwɔ ha ̃ ?

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Asese ̃ na mi ́ ŋutɔ be mi ́ adzudzɔ nuƒoƒo le nu wɔnuku siwo mi ́ ekpɔ kɔtee be Yesu wɔ kple nya siwo wo ̀ gblɔ la ŋu . ”

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Ke Takpekpea me nɔlawo gakle ̃ ŋku do wo hede se na wo be woadzudzɔ nyawo gbɔgblɔ . Emegbe la woɖe asi le wo ŋu wodzo elabena womenya ale si tututu woawɔ ahe to na wo ale be zi matɔ le dua me o , elabena ame sia ame kloe le dua me nɔ Mawu kafum le nukunu ga ̃ si wo ̀ wɔ to Petro kple Yohanes dzi la ta .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Esia nye be woda gbe le ame si nye tekunɔ ƒe blaene sɔŋ la ŋu .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Esi woɖe asi le Petro kple Yohanes ŋu tete ko la , woti wo tɔ nusrɔ ̃ lawo bubuawo yii ɖagblɔ nu siwo kata ̃ dzɔ ɖe wo dzi la na wo .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Enumake wo kata ̃ woƒo ƒu do gbe ɖa gblɔ be , “ O Aƒetɔ Mawu ga ̃ , wo ̀ ame si wɔ dziƒo , anyigba , atsiaƒu kple emenuwo kata ̃ ,

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: wo ̀ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒo nu to mi ́ a tɔgbui David dzi be , ‘ Nu ka ta Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo do dziku ɖe Mawu ŋu eye dukɔwo ha ̃ le bablawo wɔm dzodzro ɖo ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: E ̃ , anyigbadzifiawo wɔ ɖeka be yewoaho aʋa ɖe Mawu kple Mesia la ŋu ! ”

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: ” Nu sia tututue le dzɔdzɔm le mi ́ a dome egbe le Yerusalem du sia me ! Elabena fia Herodes kple Pontio Pilato kple Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo kata ̃ kpakple Israelviwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ wɔ ɖeka hetsi tre ɖe viwo ̀ Yesu , wo ̀ dɔla kɔkɔe si dzi

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: ne ̀ da asi ɖo la ŋu . Ke nu si wo ̀ ŋutɔ ne ̀ ɖo da ɖi le wo ̀ nunya kple ŋuse ̃ me xoxo la eya ko woate ŋu awɔ .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Azɔ mi ́ a Mawu , wo ̀ ŋutɔ se ale si wole kakam ɖe mi ́ a ŋui la ɖa ! Na dzideƒo blibo mi ́ wo ̀ subɔlawo be mi ́ ate ŋu agblɔ wo ̀ nya kple

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: agbe eye na ŋuse ̃ mi ́ be mi ́ ate ŋu ada gbe le dɔnɔwo ŋu , awɔ nukunu ga ̃ wo le wo ̀ dɔla Kɔkɔe , Yesu , ƒe ŋkɔ me . ” "

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Esi wodo gbe ɖa vɔ alea ko la xɔ si me wonɔ la ʋuʋu sesi ̃ e eye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ge ɖe wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe me ale be wogakpɔ ŋuse ̃ hegblɔ Mawu ƒe nya la kple dzideƒo ga ̃ blibo .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Xɔsetɔ siawo kata ̃ ƒe dziwo kple susuwo nɔ ɖeka . Wo dometɔ aɖeke mebuna be nu si le ye si la nye ye ɖeka ko tɔ o , ke boŋ womaa nuwo ɖe wo nɔewo dome .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Apostolowo kpɔ ŋuse ̃ gblɔ mawunya detowo heɖe gbeƒa ̃ Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe tsitretsitsi tso ame kukuwo dome eye amenuveve ga ̃ le wo kata ̃ dzi . "

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Koɖoɖo aɖeke menɔ anyi o , elabena ame siwo si nuwo nɔ abe anyigba , xɔ kple bubuwo ene la dzra wo

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: hetsɔ ga la vɛ na apostoloawo wona wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ɖe eƒe hiahia ̃ nu .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Yosef , Levitɔ , ame si wodzi le Kipro eye apostoloawo yɔna ha ̃ be Barnaba , si gɔme woɖe be “ Dzideƒovi ”

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: dzra eƒe agble hetsɔ ga la kata ̃ vɛ na apostoloawo .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Ŋutsu aɖe si woyɔna be Anania kple srɔ ̃ a Safira ha ̃ dzra anyigba ,

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: ke Anania tsɔ ga la ƒe ɖe dzra ɖo hafi tsɔ mamlɛa vɛ na apostoloawo be eyae nye ga si yekpɔ . Nuwɔna sia nɔ nyanya me na srɔ ̃ a , Safi ̃ ra , ha ̃ .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Ke Petro biae be , “ Anania , nu ka ta ne ̀ ɖe mɔ na Satan be wo ̀ va xɔ aƒe ɖe mewo ̀ alea ? Menye amegbetɔ blem ne ̀ le o , ke boŋ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la blem ne ̀ le .

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Anyigba la , wo ̀ ŋutɔ tɔwo ̀ e eye ne edze ŋuwo ̀ la , a ̃ te ŋu adzrae , ke ne me ̀ lɔ ̃ o ha ̃ la , ma ̃ dzrae o . Nenema ke esi ne ̀ dzrae vɔ la , ŋuse ̃ le asiwo ̀ be na ̃ tsɔ ga la ƒe akpa si dze ŋuwo ̀ la vɛ na mi ́ . Ke nu ka tae ne ̀ tsɔ ga la ƒe ɖe dzra ɖo heva le gbɔgblɔm be ga la kata ̃ e nye esia ? Menye amegbetɔ blem ne ̀ le o ke boŋ Mawu ŋutɔ blem ne ̀ le . ”

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Esi Anania se nya sia tete ko la emu dze anyi enumake heku .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Vɔvɔ ̃ ɖo ame sia ame ŋutɔ . Ke ɖekakpui siwo kpɔ eteƒe la bla avɔ ɖe ame kukua ŋu hekɔe yi ɖaɖi .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Abe gaƒoƒo etɔ ̃ megbe ene la , Anania srɔ ̃ , Safi ̃ ra , ha ̃ va ɖo . Eya menya nu si dzɔ ɖe srɔ ̃ a dzi o .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Petro biae be , “ Safi ̃ ra , ga home ale kple alee miekpɔ tso anyigba si miedzra mea ? ” Safi ̃ ra ɖo eŋu enumake bobobo be , “ E ̃ , nenema tututue mi ́ ekpɔ . ”

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Petro gblɔ na Safi ̃ ra be , “ Nu ka ta mi kple srɔ ̃ wo ̀ , Anania , miewɔ ɖeka be yewoate Aƒetɔ la ƒe Gbɔgbɔ kpɔ maha ̃ ? Đekakpui siwo ɖi wo ̀ aƒetɔ ƒe kukua woe nye ema le xɔa godo le wo ̀ ha ̃ lalam . ”

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Enumake Safi ̃ ra ha ̃ mu dze anyi heku , eye esi ɖekakpuiawo va kpɔ eƒe kukua le anyigba la , wokɔ eya ha ̃ yi ɖaɖi ɖe srɔ ̃ a xa .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Nyadzɔdzɔ sia de vɔvɔ ̃ ga ̃ aɖe hame blibo la kple ame siwo kata ̃ see la me .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi siawo me la , apostoloawo ƒoa ƒu edziedzi ɖe gbedoxɔ ƒe akpa si woyɔna be Salomo ƒe Akpata la me , eye wonɔa dzesi kple nukunu geɖewo wɔm le afi ma .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Ame geɖewo metea ŋu doa dzi tena ɖe apostoloawo ŋu tututu o , ke ha ̃ ame sia ame tsɔ bubu tɔxɛ blibo na wo .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Ame geɖewo ŋutɔ , ŋutsu kple nyɔnu siwo xɔ se la ge ɖe Aƒetɔ ƒe ha la me .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Đe apostoloawo ƒe nukunuwɔwɔwo ta la , amewo kɔa dɔnɔwo dana ɖe abawo dzi le mɔwo to be ne Petro va yina la , eƒe vɔvɔli ̃ nadze wo dzi .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Zi ga ̃ aɖe tɔ le kɔƒe siwo ƒo xla ̃ Yerusalem la me eye amewo tsɔ woƒe dɔnɔwo kple ame siwo me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo le la vɛ eye wo ̀ da gbe le wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ŋu .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Ke Osɔfoga ̃ la kple eŋume siwo tso Zadukitɔwo ƒe kɔmama la me la yɔ fu ̃ kple ŋuʋaʋa ̃ .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Ale wole ́ apostoloawo de gaxɔ me .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Ke le za ̃ me la , mawudɔla aɖe va apostoloawo gbɔ le gaxɔa me . Eʋu gaxɔa ƒe agbowo eye wo ̀ kplɔ wo do goe . Egblɔ na wo be ,

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: “ Miyi gbedoxɔ la me eye miagblɔ Agbe Yeye sia ƒe nya na ame sia ame . ”

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Apostoloawo va ɖo gbedoxɔa me le ŋdi kanya eye wodze mawunyagbɔgblɔ gɔme . Se ̃ ko la , Osɔfoga ̃ la kple eŋumewo ha ̃ va ɖo gbedoxɔ la me . Woyɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe takpekpe ga ̃ me nɔlawo ƒo ƒu ɖe woƒe takpeƒe , eye wodɔ asrafoawo ɖa be woayi aɖakplɔ apostoloawo tso gaxɔ la me vɛ ne yewoadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Ke esi asrafoawo yi la , womekpɔ apostoloawo le gaxɔa me o , ale wotrɔ yi ɖagblɔ na takpekpea me nɔlawo be ,

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: “ Esi mi ́ ede la , asrafowo nɔ agboa nu dzɔm pɛpɛpɛ eye ʋɔtrua ha ̃ nɔ tutu goŋgoŋgoŋ gake esi mi ́ eʋu ʋɔa hege ɖe eme la , mi ́ ekpɔ ame aɖeke le teƒea o . ”

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Nya sia ʋuʋu asrafo siwo kpɔa gbedoxɔa dzi ƒe amega ̃ kple Osɔfoga ̃ wo ŋutɔ eye woƒe dzi gba ̃ . Womenya nu si tututu ava dzɔ ɖe esia yome o eye womenya ɣekaɣi tututu ha ̃ nu siawo nu ava yi o .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Ke ame aɖe va gblɔ na wo be , ame siwo wole ́ de gaxɔ me la woe nye ma le nya gblɔm na ameawo ŋuse ̃ tɔe le gbedoxɔ la me .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Enumake , asrafowo ƒe amega ̃ kplɔ etevi aɖewo ɖe asi eye woyi ɖale ́ apostoloawo . Asrafoawo kpɔ egbɔ be yewomele ́ wo sese ̃ tɔe o , elabe wonɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m be ne yewowɔ esia la , ɖewohi ̃ ameha ga ̃ si le afi ma la aƒu kpe yewo awu .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Wokplɔ apostoloawo va Sanhedrin la ƒe ŋkume be Osɔfoga ̃ nabia gbe wo .

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: Esi apostoloawo va ɖo Takpekpea me nɔlawo ŋkume la , Osɔfoga ̃ bia be , “ Menye ɖe mi ́ ede se na mi be miadzudzɔ Yesu sia ƒe ŋutinya gbɔgblɔ oa ? Ke azɔ kura boŋ miekaka nya sia ɖe Yerusalem du bliboa me kple susu be amewo nabu fɔ mi ́ be mi ́ eda vo be mi ́ ewu Yesu sia ! ”

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Petro ɖe etɔwo nu gblɔ be , “ Ele na mi ́ be mi ́ awɔ ɖe Mawu ƒe gbe dzi ke menye ɖe amegbetɔ tɔ dzi o .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Esi miewu Yesu si miekla ̃ ɖe ati ŋu la , mi ́ a tɔgbuitɔgbuiwo ƒe Mawu la ŋutɔ gafɔe ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Eye Mawu tsɔ ŋuse ̃ blibo doe ɖe dzi be wo ̀ anye Fiavi kple Đela ale be to eya dzi la , Israelviwo nakpɔ mɔnu atrɔ woƒe agbenɔnɔ ale be woatsɔ wo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake wo .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Mi ́ awo ŋutɔwo mi ́ ekpɔ nu sia teƒe tsitotsito eye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe si Mawu naa ame siwo wɔa eƒe gbe dzi la ɖi ɖase le nu siawo ŋu ha ̃ . ”

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Petro ƒe nya sia wɔ abe ɖe wo ̀ tsɔ ami kɔ ɖe dzo me ene , takpekpea me nɔlawo kata ̃ nyra ; wodo dziku blibo eye woɖoe be yewoawu apostoloawo .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Ke ametsitsiawo dometɔ ɖeka si ŋkɔe nye Gamaliel ame si ha ̃ nye Farisitɔ xɔŋkɔ aɖe si nya xɔsenyawo ƒe sea nyuie la , tsi tre heƒo nu na takpekpea me nɔlawo . Ke hafi wo ̀ adze nua ƒoƒo gɔme la , ebia be woakplɔ apostoloawo aɖe kpɔe vie .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Azɔ Gamaliel trɔ ɖe etɔwo gbɔ gblɔ na wo be , “ Mi ́ a tɔ , Israeltɔwo , mikpɔ nyuie le ɖoɖo si wɔm miele ɖe ame siawo ŋu la ŋuti .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Miawo ŋutɔwo miaɖo ŋku edzi kɔtee be , ɣeyiɣi aɖe va yi la , ɖekakpui aɖe va do ɖe mi ́ a dome eye wo ̀ wɔ eɖokui hlodzoo be yenye ame ga ̃ aɖe . E ̃ , le nyateƒe me la , ame abe alafa ene sɔŋ dze eyome . Ke nu kae va dzɔ ? Wowu eya ŋutɔ eye eyomedzelawo kata ̃ kaka gbe ̃ , ke nya vɔ ̃ aɖeke medzɔ o .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Le eya megbe la ame bubu ha ̃ gava do . Ame sia nye Yuda si tso Galilea . Eya ha ̃ dze agbagba he amewo ɖe eɖokui ŋu abe eƒe nusrɔ ̃ lawo ene , le ŋkɔŋɔŋlɔ ŋkekeawo me . Gake , eya ha ̃ va ku eye eyomedzelawo kaka . ”

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Gamaliel yi dzi be , “ Tɔnyetɔwo , aɖaŋu si medi be maɖo na mie nye be , miɖe asi le ame siawo ŋu kpoo . Ne wo ̀ nye woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nufiafia kakam wole la , ekema eteƒe madidi o , nu sia nu awu enu .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Gake nenye Mawu ƒe dɔ wɔm wole vava ̃ la , ekema miate ŋu atsi enu gbeɖe o . Gawu la , ne miekpɔ nyuie o la , miakpɔ be yewole kame tem kple Mawu . ”

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Takpekpea me nɔlawo xɔ Gamaliel ƒe aɖaŋu sia ale woyɔ apotoloawo vɛ eye woƒo wo . Emegbe wode se na wo be woagagblɔ nya aɖeke le Yesu ƒe ŋkɔ me gbeɖe o , eye woɖe asi le wo ŋu .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Apostoloawo ɖe abla do go le takpexɔa me kple dzidzɔ blibo be wodo ŋukpe yewo le Yesu ƒe ŋkɔ ta .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Azɔ woyi edzi nɔ nya gblɔm gbe sia gbe le gbedoxɔa me kple woƒe aƒewo me siaa be Yesue nye Mesia la .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Esime xɔsetɔawo ƒe xexle ̃ me va nɔ dzidzim ɖe edzi atraɖii ta la , liʋiliʋi ̃ lili ̃ aɖewo va nɔ ta dom ɖa le wo dome . Wo dometɔ siwo nye Helatɔwo la gblɔ bena ameŋkumekpɔkpɔ le ta dom ɖa le nuɖuɖumama me , elabena womenaa nuɖuɖu Helatɔ siwo nye ahosiwo la wo ̀ dea Hebritɔ siwo ha ̃ nye ahosiwo la tɔ nu o .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Le esia ta la , Apostolo wuieveawo ƒo xɔsetɔwo kata ̃ nu ƒu hewɔ takpekpe aɖe . Apostoloawo doe ɖe hamea gbɔ be ,

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: “ Nɔviwo , mele be mi ́ awo mi ́ atsɔ nuɖuɖudzikpɔkpɔ awɔ mi ́ aƒe dɔ o . Mi ́ aƒe dɔe nye be mi ́ agblɔ mawunya . Eya ta mitsa ŋku le mia ɖokuiwo dome , miatia mia dometɔ adre siwo sea nu gɔme , Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ wo me fu ̃ eye ame sia ame kpɔ ŋudzedze le wo ŋu . Ne mietia ame siawo la ekema mi ́ atsɔ nuɖuɖudzikpɔdɔ sia ade wo si koŋ ,

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: ale be mi ́ awo la mi ́ akpɔ ɣeyiɣi awɔ mi ́ aƒe dɔ si nye gbedodoɖa , mawunyagbɔgblɔ kple nufiafia amewo . ”

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Nya sia me kɔ na hamea kata ̃ eya ta wotia ame adreawo . Ame siwo wotia woe nye Stefano , ame si ƒe xɔse de to eye wo ̀ yɔ fu ̃ kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la . Filipo , Prokoro kple Nikano , bubuwoe nye Timon , Parmena kple Nikolas tso Antioxia ame si nye trɔ ̃ subɔla si va zu Yudatɔ .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Esi wotia ame adre siawo vɔ la wokplɔ wo va apostoloawo gbɔe eye wodo gbe ɖa ɖe wo ta heda asi ɖe wo dzi , yra wo .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Le esia megbe la apostoloawo kple xɔsetɔ bubuawo gblɔ mawunya le teƒeteƒewo eye Yesu yomedzelawo ƒe xexle ̃ me dzi ɖe edzi fu ̃ le Yerusalem , nenema ke Yudatɔwo ƒe Osɔfo geɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ trɔ zu kristotɔwo .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Stefano ame si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ fu ̃ eye eƒe xɔse de to blibo la wɔ nukunu geɖewo le amewo dome .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Ke gbe ɖeka la , Stefano do go Yudatɔwo ƒe xɔsehabɔbɔ tɔxɛ aɖe si woyɔna be , “ Ablɔɖeviwo ” la , me tɔwo eye ame siawo de asi nyahehe me kplii vevie . Se ̃ ko la , Yudatɔ bubu siwo tso Kirene , Aleksandria le Egipte kple Kilikia kpakple Asia la va kpe ɖe “ Ablɔɖeviawo ” ŋu le nyaa hehe me .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Gake wo dometɔ aɖeke mete ŋu ɖu Stefano dzi o , le eƒe nunya kple gbɔgbɔ si le eme la ta .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Le esia ta woyi ɖakpɔ gbevu aɖewo be woava ɖi aʋatsoɖase le Stefano ŋu be eƒo fi de Mose kple Mawu ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Nya sia sese na be dua me tɔ geɖewo dze agbo vevie . Wotso ɖe Stefano ŋu eye Yudatɔwo ƒe amega ̃ wo kple agbale ̃ fialawo le ́ e hekplɔe yi ɖe dumega ̃ wo gbɔe .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Aʋatsoɖaseɖila siawo gaɖi ɖase ɖe eŋu le takpekpea me be , “ yewo ŋutɔ yewose Stefano wo ̀ nɔ fewu ɖum le Yerusalem gbedoxɔ la kple Mose ƒe sewo ŋu . ”

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Woyi dzi gblɔ be , “ Mi ́ ese Stefano gblɔ be , Yesu Nazaretitɔ sia , ava gba ̃ gbedoxɔ la eye wo ̀ aɖe Mose ƒe sewo kata ̃ ɖa . ”

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Esi nu siawo nɔ edzi yim la , ame siwo kata ̃ nɔ takpekpea me la kpɔ be Stefano ƒe mo trɔ nɔ kekle ̃ m abe mawudɔla tɔ ene .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ la bia Stefano be , “ Nɔvi , ɖe nya siwo kata ̃ wogblɔ le ŋuwo ̀ le eme vava ̃ a ? ”

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Stefano ƒo nu legbe aɖe heɖe nya me na wo be , “ Nɔvinyewo kple fofonyewo , misee ɖa ! , Mawu bubutɔ la ŋutɔ ɖe eɖokui fia mi ́ a tɔgbui Abraham le esime wo ̀ nɔ Mesopotamia hafi wo ̀ va yi Haran .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Mawu gblɔ nɛ be nekla eƒe ƒometɔwo kata ̃ eye wo ̀ abla agba , adzo adze mɔ ayi anyigba bubu aɖe sa ̃ a si yeafiae la dzi .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Ale Abraham dzo le Kaldea nyigba dzi heyi ɖanɔ Haran , va se ɖe esime fofoa ku gble ̃ e ɖi . Esia megbe la , Mawu kplɔe va Israel nyigba sia dzi .
