text2: Wodzro nyawo me le wo ɖokuiwo me ʋuu hafi kaka dzo . Ke nya si tsi tome na wo eye wo ̀ ɖe fu na wo dometɔ geɖewo lae nye esi Paulo gblɔ na wo be , “ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe nya si wogblɔ to nyagblɔɖila Yesaya dzi la le eme tututu be ,

text: Saying , Go unto this people , and say , Hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and not perceive :
text2: ‘ Migblɔ na Yudatɔwo be , miaƒe towo ase nyawo gake miase wo gɔme o . ’

text: For the heart of this people is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes have they closed ; lest they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Elabena miaƒe dziwo ku atri , miaƒe towo ku , eye miaƒe susuwo me meʋu be miase nu gɔme o . Le nyateƒe me la , menye miaƒe didi wo ̀ nye be miakpɔ nu , ase nu gɔme eye miatrɔ ɖe ŋunye be mada gbe le mia ŋu o . ” "

text: Be it known therefore unto you , that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles , and that they will hear it .
text2: Eya ta medi be mianya be Mawu ƒe ɖeɖedɔ sia ɖo Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo gbɔ eye woaɖo toe .

text: And when he had said these words , the Jews departed , and had great reasoning among themselves .
text2: Esi wo ̀ gblɔ esia la Yudatɔwo dzo eye nyahehe geɖe ɖo wo dome .

text: And Paul dwelt two whole years in his own hired house , and received all that came in unto him ,
text2: Ke Paulo nɔ afi ma ƒe eve sɔŋ le xɔ si ta wo ̀ xe fe ɖo la me , eye ame geɖewo va nɔ ekpɔm ɖa le eƒe aƒeme .

text: Preaching the kingdom of God , and teaching those things which concern the Lord Jesus Christ , with all confidence , no man forbidding him .
text2: Enɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem mawufiaɖuƒe la nɔ nu fiam le Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ŋuti dzideƒotɔe eye ame aɖeke mexea mɔ nɛ le esiawo kata ̃ wɔwɔ me o . "

text: Paul , a servant of Jesus Christ , called to be an apostle , separated unto the gospel of God ,
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ awo le Roma : Agbale ̃ sia tso Paulo , Yesu Kristo ƒe kluvi , ame si wotia be wo ̀ anye mawunyadɔgbedela eye wodɔe ɖa be wo ̀ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ Mawu ƒe nyanyui la , gbɔ .

text: ( Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures , )
text2: Mawu ƒe nyagblɔɖilawo do nyanyui sia ŋugbe xoxoxo le Nubabla Xoxoa me .

text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord , which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh ;
text2: Enye nyanyui tso Via , Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ , ame si va xexeame abe amegbetɔ ene eye wodzii ɖe Fia David ƒe fiaƒomea me la ŋu .

text: And declared to be the Son of God with power , according to the spirit of holiness , by the resurrection from the dead :
text2: Esi wofɔe ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la , wofia be eyae nye Mawu Vi ŋuse ̃ tɔ la eye Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe nɔnɔme kɔkɔe la nɔ eme .

text: By whom we have received grace and apostleship , for obedience to the faith among all nations , for his name :
text2: Azɔ la , to Kristo me la , wokɔ Mawu ƒe dɔmenyo ɖe mi ́ nu vɔ ̃ wɔla madzemadzewo dzi , eye azɔ la ele mi ́ a dɔm ɖe xexeame godoo be mi ́ agblɔ nu ga ̃ siwo Mawu wɔ na xexeame la na amewo kata ̃ le afi sia afi , ale be woawo ha ̃ naxɔ edzi ase eye woaɖo toe .

text: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ :
text2: Eye miawo ha ̃ miele ame siwo woyɔ be woanye Yesu Kristo tɔwo la dome .

text: To all that be in Rome , beloved of God , called to be saints : Grace to you and peace from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ŋutifafa kple amenuveve tso Mawu , mi ́ a Fofo kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gbɔ na mi kata ̃ le Roma , ame siwo Mawu lɔ ̃ eye wo ̀ yɔ mi be miazu ame kɔkɔewo .

text: First , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all , that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world .
text2: Mina magblɔe na mi gba ̃ be teƒe ɖe sia ɖe si meyi la , mesea amewo nɔa nu ƒom tso mia ŋu , elabena amewo le nu nyam le xexeame godo tso miaƒe xɔse ŋu . Medaa akpe na Mawu to Yesu Kristo dzi le ɖaseɖiɖi nyui sia sese ta eye megadaa akpe ɖe mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe ta .

text: For God is my witness , whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son , that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers ;
text2: Mawu nya ale si medoa gbe ɖa enuenu ɖe mia tae . Metsɔa miawo kple miaƒe hiahia ̃ wo yia gbedodoɖa me za ̃ kple keli na ame si mesubɔna kple nye ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ , eye megblɔa nyanyui la tsoa Via ŋu na ame bubuwo .

text: Making request , if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you .
text2: Nu siwo mebiana to gbedodoɖa me la dometɔ ɖekae nye be makpɔ mɔnu , ne Mawu lɔ ̃ la , mava kpɔ mi ɖa mlɔeba la , eye ne adze edzi la , mazɔ mɔ la dedie .

text: For I long to see you , that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift , to the end ye may be established ;
text2: Mele didim vevie be mava kpɔ mi ɖa ale be matsɔ gbɔgbɔmenunana aɖe si ado ŋuse ̃ mi la ana mi ,

text: That is , that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me .
text2: hekpe ɖe esia ŋu be nye kple miawo siaa mi ́ ado ŋuse ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo ƒe xɔse .

text: Now I would not have you ignorant , brethren , that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you , ( but was let hitherto , ) that I might have some fruit among you also , even as among other Gentiles .
text2: Nɔvinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , medi be mianya be meɖoe zi geɖe be mava kpɔ mi ɖa ale be mate ŋu awɔ dɔ le mia dome eye makpɔ kutsetse nyui siwo ado tso eme abe ale si mewɔ le Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ƒe ha bubuwo me ene . Gake esia mete ŋu dze edzi o ,

text: I am debtor both to the Greeks , and to the Barbarians ; both to the wise , and to the unwise .
text2: elabena menyi fe le ame sia ame si , ŋkuʋuʋutɔwo kple ŋkumaʋumaʋutɔwo , ame siwo wohe kple ame siwo womehe o siaa si .

text: So , as much as in me is , I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also .
text2: Eya ta ne mate ŋui ko la , mele klalo be mava miawo ha ̃ gbɔ le Roma be magblɔ Mawu ƒe nyanyui la na mi .

text: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ : for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth ; to the Jew first , and also to the Greek .
text2: Elabena nyanyui si tso Kristo ŋuti mekpea ŋu nam o . Eyae nye Mawu ƒe mɔ si ŋu ŋuse ̃ le si dzi Mawu ato akplɔ ame siwo xɔ edzi se la ayi dziƒo . Gba ̃ la , wogblɔ nya siawo na Yudatɔwo ɖeɖe ko , ke azɔ la wole ame sia ame yɔm be wo ̀ ava Mawu gbɔ to mɔ ma ke dzi .

text: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith : as it is written , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Nyanyui sia le gbɔgblɔm na mi ́ be Mawu dzraa mi ́ ɖo hena dziƒoyiyi eye wo ̀ naa mi ́ awo kple Mawu dome kɔna , ne mi ́ exɔ Kristo dzi se be aɖe mi ́ . Xɔsee wɔa nu sia tso gɔmedzedzea va se ɖe nuwuwu . Abe ale si Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔe ene la , “ Ame si akpɔ agbe la , akpɔe ato mawudzixɔse me . ”

text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men , who hold the truth in unrighteousness ;
text2: Woɖe Mawu ƒe dziku ɖe go tso dziƒo ɖe amegbetɔ ƒe mawumavɔ ̃ mavɔ ̃ kple vɔ ̃ ɖinyenye kata ̃ ŋu , ame siwo tea nyateƒe la ɖe to , to woƒe vɔ ̃ ɖinyenye me .

text: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them ; for God hath shewed it unto them .
text2: Elabena nu si wo ̀ le be woanya tso Mawu ŋu me kɔ na wo keŋ , elabena Mawu kɔ eme na wo .

text: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen , being understood by the things that are made , even his eternal power and Godhead ; so that they are without excuse :
text2: Elabena tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea me Mawu ƒe nɔnɔme siwo womekpɔa kple ŋku o , esiwo nye eƒe ŋuse ̃ mavɔ kple eƒe mawunyenye me kɔ na wo ƒa ̃ a . Wose esia gɔme to eƒe nuwɔwɔwo me , be taflatsedodo naganɔ ame aɖeke si o .

text: Because that , when they knew God , they glorified him not as God , neither were thankful ; but became vain in their imaginations , and their foolish heart was darkened .
text2: Togbɔ be wonya Mawu ha ̃ la , womesubɔnɛ alo daa akpa nɛ abe Mawu ene o ke boŋ woƒe tamesusuwo zu nu dzodzro eye woƒe dzi manyanu la me do viviti .

text: Professing themselves to be wise , they became fools ,
text2: Togbɔ be wobu be yewonye nunyalawo ha ̃ la , wonye bometsilawo boŋ ,

text: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man , and to birds , and fourfooted beasts , and creeping things .
text2: elabena wotsɔ Mawu makumaku la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ɖɔ li aklamakpakpɛwo be wo ̀ anɔ abe amegbetɔ , dziƒoxeviwo kple la ̃ afɔenewo kpakple nutatawo tɔ ene .

text: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts , to dishonour their own bodies between themselves :
text2: Eya ta , le woƒe dzi vɔ ̃ ɖiwo ƒe didi nu la , Mawu tsɔ wo de asi na ahasiwɔwɔ ƒe makɔmakɔnyenye be woado ŋunyɔ woƒe ŋutila ̃ wo kple wo nɔewo .

text: Who changed the truth of God into a lie , and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator , who is blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Wotsɔ Mawu ƒe nyateƒe la ɖɔ li aʋatsoe ; wosubɔa eye wodea ta agu na nuwɔwɔwo wu wo Wɔla , ame si wo ̀ le be woakafu tegbetegbe . Amen .

text: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections : for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature :
text2: Le esia ta Mawu tsɔ wo de asi na dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo ; woƒe nyɔnuwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ tsɔ nu siwo menye dzɔdzɔmenuwo o la , ɖɔ li dzɔdzɔmenuwoe le gbɔdɔdɔnyawo gome .

text: And likewise also the men , leaving the natural use of the woman , burned in their lust one toward another ; men with men working that which is unseemly , and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet .
text2: Nenema ke woƒe ŋutsuwo ha ̃ ɖe asi le dzɔdzɔme ƒe kadodo si le ŋutsu kple nyɔnu dome ŋu eye woƒe la ̃ me fiena ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu . Ale ŋutsu wɔa ŋunyɔnu kple ŋutsu bubuwo . Ale woxɔ woƒe ŋukpenanuwo ƒe fetu ɖe woƒe ŋutila ̃ me .

text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge , God gave them over to a reprobate mind , to do those things which are not convenient ;
text2: Gawu la , esi wosusui be mehia ̃ be woale ́ sidzedze Mawu me ɖe asi o ta la , Mawu ɖe asi le woƒe susu ŋu na bometsitsi be woawɔ nu si mele be woawɔ o .

text: Being filled with all unrighteousness , fornication , wickedness , covetousness , maliciousness ; full of envy , murder , debate , deceit , malignity ; whisperers ,
text2: Ale wo ameawo me yɔ fu ̃ u kple vɔ ̃ ɖinyenye ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi , nu tovo wɔwɔ , ŋukekle ̃ kple gbɔ ̃ ɖiɖi ame ɖokui . Nenema ke ŋuʋaʋa ̃ , hlɔ ̃ dodo , dzrewɔwɔ , beble kple vɔ ̃ ediname ha ̃ yɔ wo me fu ̃ u . Wonye ameŋunyagblɔlawo ,

text: Backbiters , haters of God , despiteful , proud , boasters , inventors of evil things , disobedient to parents ,
text2: ameŋugble ̃ lawo , ame siwo le ́ a Mawu ɖe ke me , amemabulawo , dadalawo , adegbe ƒuƒlu ƒolawo , ame siwo toa nu gbegble ̃ yeyewo wɔwɔ vanɛ , ame siwo meɖoa to wo dzilawo o .

text: Without understanding , covenantbreakers , without natural affection , implacable , unmerciful :
text2: Wonye numanyalawo , dzimaxɔsetɔwo , nublanuimakpɔlawo kple tamesese ̃ tɔwo .

text: Who knowing the judgment of God , that they which commit such things are worthy of death , not only do the same , but have pleasure in them that do them .
text2: Togbɔ be wonya nu le Mawu ƒe sedede dzɔdzɔe la ŋu be ame siwo wɔa nenema nu siawo tɔgbi dze na ku ha ̃ la , womeyia nu siawo wɔwɔ dzi ɖeɖe ko o ke boŋ woda asi ɖe ame siwo wɔnɛ ha ̃ tɔ dzi .

text: Therefore thou art inexcusable , O man , whosoever thou art that judgest : for wherein thou judgest another , thou condemnest thyself ; for thou that judgest doest the same things .
text2: Mianɔ biabia be , “ Ame vɔ ̃ ɖi kawo ŋue mele nu ƒom le ? ” Milala vie . Miawo ha ̃ miele abe woawo ke ene . Ne miele gbɔgblɔm be wonye ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo eye ele be woahe to na wo la , miele nya siawo ke gblɔm tso miawo ŋutɔ ha ̃ ŋu , elabena miewɔa nu vɔ ̃ ɖi siawo ke .

text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things .
text2: Mi ́ enya be Mawu ahe to na ame sia ame si wɔa nu siawo tɔgbi le eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye ta .

text: And thinkest thou this , O man , that judgest them which do such things , and doest the same , that thou shalt escape the judgment of God ?
text2: Đe miele bubum bena Mawu adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu abu fɔ ame aɖewo le nu siawo wɔwɔ ta ke wo ̀ agbe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ miawo ne miewɔ nu mawo kea ?

text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering ; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance ?
text2: Đe mienya ale si gbegbe wo ̀ gbɔa dzi ɖi na mi oa ? Alo ɖe mietsɔ ɖeke le eme oa ? Đe miekpɔe be egbɔ dzi ɖi ɣeyiɣi siawo kata ̃ eye mehe to na mi o ale be yeana ɣeyiɣi mi miatrɔ dzime oa ? Eƒe dɔmenyo ƒe taɖodzinue nye wo ̀ ana miatrɔ dzime .

text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God ;
text2: Gake , gbeɖe , miegbe toɖoɖo . Ale miele tohehe sese ̃ dzram ɖo na mia ɖokuiwo le miaƒe gbegbe be yewomaɖe asi le yewoƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ŋu o ta ; elabena ŋkeke aɖe gbɔna , gbe si gbe Mawu anye Ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la dzɔdzɔe na xexeame kata ̃ .

text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds :
text2: Atsɔ nu sia nu si dze na ame sia ame le eƒe dɔwɔwɔ ta la anɛ .

text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality , eternal life :
text2: Ana agbe mavɔ ame sia ame si wɔa eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu , eye wo ̀ dia ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu kpakple agbe mavɔ si Mawu nana .

text: But unto them that are contentious , and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness , indignation and wrath ,
text2: Ke ahe to na ame siwo tsia tsitre ɖe eƒe nyateƒe la ŋu eye wowɔa nu vɔ ̃ . Mawu atrɔ eƒe dɔmedzoe akɔ ɖe wo dzi .

text: Tribulation and anguish , upon every soul of man that doeth evil , of the Jew first , and also of the Gentile ;
text2: Konyifafa kple fukpekpe anɔ anyi na Yudatɔ kple Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo nɔa nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi la siaa sɔsɔe .

text: But glory , honour , and peace , to every man that worketh good , to the Jew first , and also to the Gentile :
text2: Ke ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu kpakple ŋutifafa atso Mawu gbɔ na ame sia ame si ɖoa toe , ne wonye Yudatɔwo loo alo Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ,

text: For there is no respect of persons with God .
text2: elabena Mawu meɖea ame aɖeke le eme o .

text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law : and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law ;
text2: Eya ta woahe to na ame siwo kata ̃ si se mele o la abe se manɔsitɔwo ene ne wowɔ nu vɔ ̃ , eye woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame siwo le se la te abe setenɔlawo ene .

text: ( For not the hearers of the law are just before God , but the doers of the law shall be justified .
text2: Elabena menye ame siwo sea se la , woe nye ame dzɔdzɔewo le Mawu ƒe ŋkume o , ke boŋ ame siwo wɔa sea dzi lae woatso afia na abe ame dzɔdzɔewo ene .

text: For when the Gentiles , which have not the law , do by nature the things contained in the law , these , having not the law , are a law unto themselves :
text2: Le nyateƒe me , ne Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo si se mele o , gake wowɔ nu ɖe dzɔdzɔme ƒe ɖoɖo nu eye wo ̀ sɔ kple se la la , ekema wozu se na wo ɖokuiwo ,

text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another ; )
text2: elabena wofia be woŋlɔ se la ƒe nyawo ɖe woƒe dziwo me , woƒe dzitsinya ha ̃ ɖia ɖase eye woƒe tamesusu ha ̃ tsoa wo nu ɣeaɖewoɣi eye wo ̀ ɖea wo nu ɣebubuɣi .

text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel .
text2: Gbe ɖeka aɖe gbɔna kokoko , gbe si gbe le Mawu ƒe gbeɖeɖe nu la , Yesu Kristo adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame sia ame le nu siwo wo ̀ wɔ le adza me la ta eye wo ̀ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo le woƒe susu ɣaɣlawo kple taɖodzinuwo ta . Nu siawo kata ̃ nye Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo triakɔ si mele gbeƒa ̃ ɖem la ƒe akpa aɖe .

text: Behold , thou art called a Jew , and restest in the law , and makest thy boast of God ,
text2: Mi Yudatɔwo miebu be yewo kple Mawu dome li nyuie elabena Mawu tsɔ eƒe sewo na mi . Mieƒoa adegbe be yewoe nye Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ veviwo .

text: And knowest his will , and approvest the things that are more excellent , being instructed out of the law ;
text2: E ̃ , mienya nu si dim wo ̀ le . Mienya nyui tso vɔ ̃ gbɔ eye mieda asi ɖe nyui dzi , elabena wofia eƒe sewo mi tso keke miaƒe ɖevime ke .

text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind , a light of them which are in darkness ,
text2: Mienya Mawu gbɔ mɔ nyuie ale gbegbe be miate ŋu afia asii na ŋkuagba ̃ tɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . Miebua mia ɖokuiwo abe mɔfiakaɖiwo ene hena mɔfiafia ame siwo bu ɖe viviti me la be woaɖo ta Mawu gbɔ .

text: An instructor of the foolish , a teacher of babes , which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law .
text2: Miebuna be yewoate ŋu afia mɔ numanyalawo eye yewoafia mawunya ɖeviwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ elabena mienya eƒe seawo nyuie eye nunya kple nyateƒe yɔ seawo me fu ̃ .

text: Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? thou that preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ?
text2: E ̃ , miefiaa nu ame bubuwo , ekema nu ka ta miafia nu miawo ŋutɔ mia ɖokuiwo o ? Miegblɔna na amewo be womegafi fi o ; ɖe miawo miefia fia ?

text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? thou that abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ?
text2: Miegblɔna be ahasiwɔwɔ nye nu vɔ ̃ ; ɖe miawo ŋutɔ miewɔnɛa ? Miegblɔna be “ Migasubɔ legbawo o , ” ke mietsɔ ga wo ̀ zu miaƒe mawu .

text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law , through breaking the law dishonourest thou God ?
text2: Miedana ɖe Mawu ƒe seawo nyanya dzi ŋutɔ ke miedoa vlo Mawu to seawo dzi dada me .

text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you , as it is written .
text2: Nu sia tae Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ be xexeame ɖua fewu le Mawu ŋu le mia ta .

text: For circumcision verily profiteth , if thou keep the law : but if thou be a breaker of the law , thy circumcision is made uncircumcision .
text2: Asixɔxɔ aɖe le Yudatɔnyenye ŋu ne miewɔ Mawu ƒe seawo dzi . Ke ne miewɔ seawo dzi o la , ekema mienyo wu trɔ ̃ subɔlawo le go aɖeke me o .

text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law , shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision ?
text2: Eye ne Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo wɔa Mawu ƒe sewo dzi la , ɖe Mawu matsɔ nu nyui kple bubu siwo wo ̀ ɖo ɖi na Yudatɔwo la ana Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo o maha ̃ ?

text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature , if it fulfil the law , judge thee , who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law ?
text2: Trɔ ̃ subɔla mawo tɔ me anyo sa ̃ a wu mi Yudatɔwo tɔ , evɔ mi Yudatɔwo mienya nu geɖewo tso Mawu ŋu eye eƒe ŋugbedodowo ha ̃ le mia si ke miewɔa eƒe sewo dzi o .

text: For he is not a Jew , which is one outwardly ; neither is that circumcision , which is outward in the flesh :
text2: Elabena mienye Yudatɔ akuakuawo le mia dzilawo ƒe Yudatɔwo nyenye ɖeɖe ko ta loo alo le aʋatsotso si nye Yudatɔwo ƒe kɔnyinyi ɖeɖe ko ta o .

text: But he is a Jew , which is one inwardly ; and circumcision is that of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not of men , but of God .
text2: Yudatɔ akuakuae nye ame sia ame si ƒe dzi le nyuie ɖe Mawu ŋu . Elabena Mawu mele ame siwo la ̃ a woƒe ŋutila ̃ le aʋatsotso le ŋutila ̃ me la dim o , ke ame siwo trɔ woƒe dziwo kple susuwo la dim wo ̀ le . Ame sia ame si ƒe agbenɔnɔ me tɔtrɔ ma tɔgbi le la , axɔ eƒe kafukafu tso Mawu gbɔ , ne mexɔe tso miawo gbɔ o gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: What advantage then hath the Jew ? or what profit is there of circumcision ?
text2: Ekema viɖe kae le Yudatɔnyenye me ? Mɔnukpɔkpɔ tɔxɛ aɖe li na wo tso Mawu gbɔa ? Viɖe aɖe le Yudatɔwo ƒe aʋatsotso ƒe kɔnuwɔwɔ la mea ?

text: Much every way : chiefly , because that unto them were committed the oracles of God .
text2: E ̃ , nu nyui geɖewo le Yudatɔnyenye me . Gba ̃ la , Mawu tsɔ eƒe sewo de asi na wo ale be woate ŋu anya eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu eye woawɔe .

text: For what if some did not believe ? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect ?
text2: Nyateƒee , wo dometɔ aɖewo mewɔ Mawu ƒe gbe dzi o . Ke ɖe woƒe ŋugbedodowo na Mawu dzi mawɔmawɔ fia be Mawu ha ̃ agbe eƒe ŋugbedodowo dzi wɔwɔ na woa ?

text: God forbid : yea , let God be true , but every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings , and mightest overcome when thou art judged .
text2: Gbeɖe o ! Togbɔ be ame sia ame nye aʋatsokala le xexeame ha ̃ la , Mawu ya mele nenema o . E ̀ ɖo ŋku nu si Psalomowo ƒe Agbale ̃ gblɔ tso susu sia ŋu dzia ? Egblɔ be , togbɔ be amewo atsi tsitre ɖe Mawu ƒe nyawo ŋu ha ̃ la , Mawu ƒe nyawo anye nyateƒe kple nya dzɔdzɔe ɣesiaɣi .

text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God , what shall we say ? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance ? ( I speak as a man )
text2: Ame aɖewo gblɔna be , “ Mi ́ aƒe vodadawo ɖe Mawu ŋu nye nu nyui elabena mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ana amewo nadze si Mawu ƒe nyonyo ne wokpɔ mi ́ aƒe gbegble ̃ . Ekema ɖe wo ̀ nyo be wo ̀ ahe to na mi ́ le esime mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo nye kpekpeɖeŋu nɛa ? ” Nenemae ame aɖewo gblɔna .

text: God forbid : for then how shall God judge the world ?
text2: Mawu naxe mɔ na nya sia tɔgbiwo . Ekema Mawu ka tɔgbi wo ̀ anye ne wo ̀ aŋe aɖaba aƒu nu vɔ ̃ wo dzi ? Ale ke wo ̀ ate ŋu abu fɔ ame aɖee ?

text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory ; why yet am I also judged as a sinner ?
text2: Mate ŋu adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnum , abu fɔm abe nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ene o , elabena nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ he ŋutikɔkɔe vɛ nɛ to asifiafia vovototo si le eya ƒe nuteƒewɔwɔ kple nye nuteƒemawɔmawɔ dome la me .

text: And not rather , ( as we be slanderously reported , and as some affirm that we say , ) Let us do evil , that good may come ? whose damnation is just .
text2: Ne e ̀ kplɔ susu ma ɖo la , a ̃ va ke ɖe susu sia ŋu . Ale si mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo sɔ gbɔ ɖe edzi wu la , nenemae Mawu lɔ ̃ a mi ́ ɖe edzi wui ! Ele be woabu fɔ ame siwo gblɔa nya siawo tɔgbi . Ke ame aɖewo gblɔna be nu siawo tɔgbie mefiana !

text: What then ? are we better than they ? No , in no wise : for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles , that they are all under sin ;
text2: Ekema ɖe mi ́ Yudatɔwo mi ́ enyo wu ame bubuawoa ? Ao , mele eme nenema kura o , elabena mi ́ eɖee fia xoxo be amewo kata ̃ nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo sɔsɔe , mi ́ eɖanye Yudatɔwo loo alo mi ́ eɖanye Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo o .

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: Abe ale si Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔe ene la , “ Ame aɖeke meli si nyo o , eye ame ɖeka aɖeke meli si ŋu nu vɔ ̃ mele o . ”

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: Ame aɖeke mewɔ Mawu ƒe sewo dzi pɛpɛpɛ kpɔ loo alo ɖo kplikpaa kpɔ be yeawɔ wo dzi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Ame sia ame tra mɔ ; ame sia ame wɔ nu vɔ ̃ . Ame aɖeke mele afi aɖeke si le ́ nyuiwɔwɔ me ɖe asi o . Ame ɖeka pɛ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ meli o .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Woƒe nuƒoƒo nye nu vɔ ̃ ɖi kple ŋunyɔnu abe ʋeʋe ̃ si doa go tsoa yɔdo nuvowo me ene . Aʋatsokaka yɔ aɖe dzi na wo . Da si ƒomevi me aɖi vɔ ̃ tɔ le la ƒe aɖi nɔa nu sia nu si wogblɔna la me .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Điŋudodo kple dzrewɔwɔ yɔa nu me na wo .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Woɖea abla ɖe amewuwu ŋu eye wole ́ a fu ame sia ame si tsia tsitre ɖe wo ŋu .

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: Afi sia afi si woyi la , wogble ̃ a konyifafa kple masɔmasɔ ɖe megbe ,

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: eye womenya ale si woaɖe dzi ɖi eye woadzɔ dzi le Mawu ƒe yayrawo ŋu kpɔ ha ɖe o .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Wometsɔ ɖeke le eme na Mawu o eye wometsɔ ɖeke le nu si Mawu bu tso wo ŋu la ha ̃ me o .

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Ale Mawu ƒe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ ase ̃ na Yudatɔwo elabena woawo ƒe dɔdeasie wo ̀ nye be woakpɔ Mawu ƒe seawo dzi le nu vɔ ̃ siawo kata ̃ wɔwɔ teƒe . Đokuinuɖenya aɖeke mele wo dometɔ aɖeke si o . Le nyateƒe me la , xexeame kata ̃ ɖi fɔ le Mawu Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la ŋkume .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Miekpɔe azɔa ? Womate ŋu atso afia na ame aɖeke le Mawu ƒe ŋkume le amea ƒe sedziwɔwɔ ta akpɔ o . Elabena ale si mi ́ enya Mawu ƒe seawo ɖe edzi wu la , nenema tututue eme kɔna na mi ́ ɖe edzi wu be mi ́ ele seawo dzi wɔm o . Đe ko eƒe seawo nana mi ́ enyana be nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo mi ́ enye .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Ke azɔ la woɖe dzɔdzɔenyenye aɖe tso Mawu gbɔ ɖe go si to vovo tso se la gbɔ . Se la kple Nyagblɔɖilawo ɖi ɖase le eŋuti .

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Nenem dzɔdzɔenyenye sia si tso Mawu gbɔ la vana to Yesu Kristo dzixɔse me , na ame siwo kata ̃ xɔ se . Vovototo aɖeke meli o ,

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: elabena wo kata ̃ wɔ nu vɔ ̃ , Mawu ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe bu ɖe wo ,

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: eye wotso afia na wo faa to eƒe amenuveve si va to Kristo Yesu ƒe ɖeɖedɔ dzi la me .

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Elabena Mawu ɖo Kristo Yesu ɖa be wo ̀ axɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ŋu tohehe eye wo ̀ atsi Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoe ɖe mi ́ a ŋu nu . Ewɔ mi ́ aƒe xɔse kple Kristo ƒe ʋu ŋudɔ hena eƒe dɔmedzoe ɖe mi ́ a ŋu nu tsitsi . Ewɔ nuteƒe le mɔ sia nu togbɔ be mehe to na ame siwo wɔ nu vɔ ̃ tsa ̃ o ha ̃ . Elabena enɔ mɔ kpɔm na ɣesiɣi Kristo ava eye wo ̀ aɖe nu vɔ ̃ mawo ɖa .

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: Le ŋkeke siawo ha ̃ me la , agate ŋu axɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo le mɔ sia ke nu elabena Yesu ɖe woƒe nu vɔ ̃ ɖa .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Ekema nu ka ŋuti mi ́ ate ŋu aƒo adegbe le be mi ́ awɔ hena mi ́ aƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ? Naneke kura meli o . Nu ka ta ? Elabena mi ́ aƒe afiatsotso meku ɖe mi ́ aƒe dɔ nyuiwo wɔwɔ ŋu o , ke boŋ eku ɖe nu si Kristo wɔ kple ale si mi ́ exɔ Kristo dzi se la ŋu .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Aleae wo ̀ le be wotsoa afia na mi ́ to Kristo dzixɔse me eye menye to nu nyui siwo mi ́ ewɔna la me o .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Eye ɖe Mawu ɖea Yudatɔwo ko to mɔ sia nua ? Ao , Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ ate ŋu ava egbɔ to mɔ sia ke dzi .

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: Mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ esɔ le Mawu ŋkume . Ame sia ame , Yudatɔwo kple Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo siaa ate ŋu akpɔ ɖeɖe ne woxɔ se ko .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Enyo ; ne woaɖe mi ́ to xɔse me la , ekema ɖe esia fia be megahia ̃ be mi ́ awɔ Mawu ƒe sewo dzi oa ? Mele nenema kura o ! Ne mi ́ exɔ Yesu dzi se la , eya ko hafi miate ŋu awɔ seawo dzi .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Azɔ nu ka gblɔ ge mi ́ ala tso mi ́ a fofo Abraham , ame si ƒe nuteƒekpɔkpɔ ŋu mi ́ eke ɖo le nya sia me la ŋuti ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Ne ele eme vava ̃ be wotso afia na Abraham to dɔwɔnawo me la , ekema nane li si ŋuti wo ̀ aƒo adegbe le gake menye le Mawu gbɔ o .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Nu ka mawunya gblɔ tso nu sia ŋuti ? “ Abraham xɔ Mawu dzi se eye wobui dzɔdzɔenyenyee nɛ . ”

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Azɔ ne ame aɖe wɔ dɔ la ekema eƒe fetu menye amenuvevenu o , ke boŋ wobui abe nu si dze nɛ ene .

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: Ke ne amea mewɔ dɔ aɖeke o , ke boŋ wo ̀ xɔ Mawu , ame si bua ame vɔ ̃ ɖi dzɔdzɔe la dzi se la , ekema eƒe xɔse le Mawu me wɔe ame dzɔdzɔe .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Fia David ƒo nu tso nu sia ŋu esi wo ̀ ɖi ɖase le nu vɔ ̃ wɔla aɖe si ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo Mawu ɖe ɖa la ƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ ŋu be ,

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: “ Woayra ame siwo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wotsɔ ke wo kple ame siwo ƒe dzidada dzi wotsyɔ nui .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Woayra ŋutsu si ƒe nu vɔ ̃ Aƒetɔ la magabu nɛ o . ”

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Azɔ la , biabia lae nye , ɖe wotsɔa yayra sia naa ame siwo xɔa Kristo dzi sena gake wole ́ a Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo me ɖe asi loo alo ɖe wotsɔa yayra sia naa ame siwo mele ́ a Yudatɔwo ƒe seawo me ɖe asi o , ke woxɔa Kristo dzi sena ya maha ̃ ? Enyo , Abraham ɖe ? Mi ́ egblɔna be Abraham xɔ yayra siawo to eƒe xɔse me . Đe wo ̀ xɔe to xɔse ɖeɖe ko mea ? Alo , ɖe wo ̀ xɔe to eƒe Yudatɔwo ƒe seawo dzi wɔwɔ me ha ̃ ?

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Hafi na ̃ ɖo biabia ma ŋu la , ele be na ̃ ɖo biabia sia ŋu gba ̃ . Ɣekaɣie Mawu tsɔ yayra sia na Abraham ? Etsɔe nɛ hafi wo ̀ zu Yudatɔ . Esia gɔmee nye do ŋgɔ na eƒe Yudatɔwo ƒe aʋatsotso ƒe kɔnu la wɔwɔ .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Menye emegbe sa ̃ a hafi o ; wotso aʋa nɛ esi Mawu do ŋugbe nɛ be yeayrae le eƒe xɔse ta . Aʋatsotso la nye dzesi be Abraham xɔ se xoxo , be Mawu ha ̃ xɔe xoxo eye wo ̀ ɖi ɖase le eŋu be enye ame dzɔdzɔe le yeƒe ŋkume hafi wotso aʋa nɛ . Ale Abraham zu gbɔgbɔmefofo na ame siwo kpɔ ɖeɖe to xɔse me ke menye to Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me o . Edze ƒa ̃ a be ame siwo mewɔa se siawo dzi o la kpɔa ɖeɖe to Mawu dzixɔse me .

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , Abraham nye gbɔgbɔmefofo na Yudatɔ siwo wotso aʋa na . Woakpɔe kɔtee le Abraham ƒe kpɔɖeŋu me be menye aʋatsotsoe nana wokpɔa xɔxɔ o , elabena Mawu kpɔ ŋudzedze le Abraham ŋu to eƒe xɔse me hafi wova tso aʋa nɛ .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Ekema eme kɔ be Mawu medo ŋugbe be yeatsɔ anyigba la kata ̃ ana Abraham kple eƒe dzidzimeviwo le eƒe Mawu ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ ta o , ke boŋ le ale si wo ̀ xɔe se be Mawu awɔ eƒe ŋugbedodo dzi la ta .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Eya ta ne miegale gbɔgblɔm kokoko be Mawu ƒe yayra vana na ame siwo nye ame dzɔdzɔewo la , ekema ɖe miele gbɔgblɔm bena gɔmesese aɖeke mele Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodo na ame siwo xɔ se la me o , eye xɔse nye abunɛnu .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Nya la ƒe nyateƒe lae nye esi : Ne mi ́ edi be mi ́ axɔ Mawu ƒe yayra kple ɖeɖe to eƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me la , nu si dzɔna koe nye mi ́ edoa dɔmedzoe nɛ elabena mi ́ etea ŋu wɔa seawo dzi o . Mɔ ɖeka si ko dzi mi ́ ate ŋu ato avo tso sedzidada me koe nye se aɖeke manɔ anyi si dzi mi ́ ada o !

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Eya ta wonaa Mawu ƒe yayrawo mi ́ to xɔse me abe nunana fexexemanɔŋu ene . Kakaɖedzi li be mi ́ axɔ nunana siawo ne mi ́ ele ́ Yudatɔwo ƒe kɔnyinyiwo me ɖe asi loo alo mi ́ ele ́ wo me ɖe asi o , ne xɔse le mi ́ a si abe Abraham ene ko . Elabena Abraham nye mi ́ kata ̃ fofo le xɔse ƒe nya gome .

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: Nu siae Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la le fiafiam esi wo ̀ gblɔ be Mawu wɔ Abraham dukɔ geɖewo fofo . Mawu axɔ ame sia ame tso dukɔ ɖe sia ɖe me , ne amewo axɔ Mawu dzi ase abe Abraham ene . Ŋugbedodo sia tso Mawu ŋutɔ gbɔ , ame si naa ame kukuwo tsia tsitre eye wo ̀ ƒoa nu tso nya siwo gbɔna dzɔdzɔ ge la ŋu kple kakaɖedzi abe ɖe nuawo va eme xoxo ene .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Eya ta esi Mawu gblɔ na Abraham be yeana viŋutsuvii , ame si ƒe dzidzimeviwo asɔ gbɔ eye woazu dukɔ ga ̃ aɖe la , Abraham xɔ Mawu dzi se togbɔ be ŋugbedodo ma tɔgbi mate ŋu ava eme hafi o ha ̃ .

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: Esi eƒe xɔse tri akɔ ta la , metsi dzi be yetsi akpa na viŋutsuvidzidzi o , le esime wo ̀ xɔ ƒe alafa ɖeka , srɔ ̃ a Sara ha ̃ xɔ ƒe blaasieke eye wo ̀ tsi akpa na vidzidzi .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Ke Abraham meke ɖi kura o . Exɔ Mawu dzi se elabena eƒe xɔse gali ke ɖe edzi eye wo ̀ kafu Mawu ɖe eƒe yayra ta hafi nu si ŋugbe wodo nɛ la va eme gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: Eka ɖe edzi vevie be Mawu ate ŋu awɔ nu sia nu si ŋugbe wo ̀ do .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Le Abraham ƒe xɔse ta la , Mawu tsɔ eƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kata ̃ kee .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Nya wɔnuku sia be woɖe Abraham le eƒe xɔse ta la , menye viɖe na Abraham ɖeɖe ko o .

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: Enye viɖe na mi ́ awo ha ̃ eye wo ̀ nye kakaɖedzi na mi ́ be Mawu axɔ mi ́ awo ha ̃ to mɔ ma ke si dzi wo ̀ to xɔ Abraham ne mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ axɔ Mawu , ame si na Yesu tsi tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la , ƒe ŋugbedodowo dzi se .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Eku ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta eye wo ̀ gatsi tsitre be yeale ́ avu le mi ́ awo kple Mawu dome eye wo ̀ na Mawu ƒe amenuveve la yɔ mi ́ a me .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Eya ta azɔ la , esi wodzra mi ́ kple Mawu dome ɖo to ale si mi ́ exɔ eƒe ŋugbedodowo dzi se ta la , ŋutifafa vava ̃ tɔ ate ŋu anɔ mi ́ kple Mawu dome le nu si Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la , wɔ na mi ́ ta .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Elabena le mi ́ aƒe xɔse ta la , ekplɔ mi ́ va afi sia , afi si mɔnukpɔkpɔ tɔxɛ le , afi si mi ́ etsi tsitre ɖo eye mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm dzidzɔtɔe le xɔse me be mi ́ ava zu nu si tututu Mawu ɖo ɖe mi ́ a ŋu be mi ́ ava zu .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Mi ́ ate ŋu akpɔ dzidzɔ ne nukpekeamewo kple tetekpɔwo va mi ́ a dzi elabena mi ́ enya be wonye nu nyuiwo na mi ́ , wokpena ɖe mi ́ a ŋu be mi ́ asrɔ ̃ dzidodo .

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: Dzidodo doa ŋuse ̃ mi ́ aƒe nɔnɔme eye wo ̀ kpena ɖe mia ŋu be mi ́ axɔ Mawu dzi ase wu , ɣesiaɣi si mi ́ awɔ eŋudɔ va se ɖe esime le nuwuwu la , mi ́ aƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ kple xɔse va se ̃ a ŋu eye wonɔa te .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Ekema ne eva eme alea la , kakaɖedzi nɔa mi ́ a me le nyadzɔdzɔ ɖe sia ɖe me be nu sia nu anyo , elabena mi ́ enya ale si Mawu lɔ ̃ a mi ́ . Mi ́ esea Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ sia le mi ́ a me elabena Mawu tsɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la na mi ́ be wo ̀ atsɔ Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ ayɔ mi ́ aƒe dzime .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Kpɔ ɖa , le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ dzi , esi mi ́ eganye gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔtɔwo ko la Kristo va ku ɖe ame mavɔ ̃ mawuwo ta .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Mebɔ be ame aɖe naku ɖe ame dzɔdzɔe ta o ke ame nyui ya la , ɖewohi ̃ ame aɖe ado dzi be yeaku ɖe eya ta .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Gake Mawu ɖe eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ fia mi ́ le esia me be esi mi ́ eganye nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo la , Kristo ku ɖe mi ́ a ta .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Eye esi wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe ʋu wɔ esiawo kata ̃ na mi ́ , ame siwo nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo , eye azɔ esi eya ŋutɔ tso afia na mi ́ la , ale ke gbegbe wo ̀ agawɔ na mi ́ wu ? Azɔ la , aɖe mi ́ tso Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoe siwo kata ̃ gbɔna la me .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Eye , esi mi ́ enye eƒe futɔwo tsa ̃ , gake Via ƒe ku gbugbɔ mi ́ va Mawu gbɔe la , ele be yayra geɖewo nanɔ esi na mi ́ le esi mi ́ enye xɔlɔ ̃ awo azɔ eye wo ̀ le agbe le mi ́ a me la ta .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Fifia miekpɔ dzidzɔ le mi ́ aƒe ƒomedodo wɔnuku kple Mawu ŋuti . Ƒomedodo yeye sia tso nu si mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo wɔ na mi ́ to eƒe ku ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta la me . Ku sia wɔ mi ́ Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwoe .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: To Adam ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ me la , nu vɔ ̃ ge ɖe amegbetɔƒome blibo la me . Eƒe nu vɔ ̃ he ku va xexe blibo la me , ale nu sia nu de asi tsitsi kple kuku me , elabena ame sia ame wɔ nu vɔ ̃ .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Mi ́ enya be Adam ƒe nu vɔ ̃ e he esia vɛ , elabena , togbɔ be amewo nɔa nu vɔ ̃ wɔm tso Adam dzi va ɖo Mose ƒe ɣeyiɣiwo me ha ̃ la , Mawu medrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo , tso kufia na wo le eƒe sewo dzi dada ta o , elabena mena eƒe sewo wo haɖe o , eye megblɔ nu si wo ̀ di be woawɔ la ha ̃ na wo o .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Eya ta woƒe ŋutila ̃ ƒe kuku metso woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo gbɔ o , elabena woawo ŋutɔ meda Mawu ƒe se tɔxɛ ma dzi eye woɖu atikutsetse si ŋu wode se ɖo la abe Adam ene o . Vovototo ga ̃ ŋutɔe le Adam kple Kristo si meva haɖe o la dome !

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Nenema ke vovototo ga ̃ ŋutɔe le amegbetɔ ƒe nu vɔ ̃ kple Mawu ƒe tsɔtsɔke dome ! Elabena ame ɖeka sia , Adam , he ku vɛ na ame geɖewo to eƒe nu vɔ ̃ me . Ke ame bubu ɖeka sia , Yesu Kristo , he tsɔtsɔke vɛ na ame geɖewo to Mawu ƒe amenuveve me .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Adam ƒe nu vɔ ̃ ɖeka he tohehe si nye ku la vɛ na ame geɖewo le esime Kristo ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ gbogboawo ɖa faa eye wo ̀ na agbe si me ŋutikɔkɔe le la mi ́ ɖe nu vɔ ̃ teƒe .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Adam ɖeka ƒe nu vɔ ̃ na ku zu fia ɖe ame sia ame dzi , ke ame siwo axɔ Mawu ƒe tsɔtsɔke ƒe nunana la , woazu fiawo le agbe sia me le Yesu Kristo ɖeka la ta .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Nyateƒe , Adam ƒe nu vɔ ̃ he tohehe vɛ na ame sia ame , ke Kristo ƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye dzra Mawu kple amewo dome ɖo ale be woate ŋu anɔ agbe .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Adam na ame geɖewo zu nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo elabena meɖo to Mawu o ; Kristo na be ame geɖewo nakpɔ xɔxɔ le Mawu gbɔ elabena eɖo to Mawu .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Wotsɔ Se Ewoawo na amegbetɔwo ale be ame sia ame nanya ale si gbegbe wo ̀ gbe mewɔ Mawu ƒe sewo dzi o . Ke zi ale si nu mi ́ edzea si mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo nyenye la , zi nenema kee mi ́ edzea si Mawu ƒe amenuveve gbago la kple ale si wo ̀ naa tsɔtsɔke mi ́ i .

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Tsa ̃ la , nu vɔ ̃ ɖu ame sia ame dzi eye wo ̀ kplɔ amewo kata ̃ de ku me ; ke azɔ la , Mawu ƒe amenuveve ɖu dzi ɖe eteƒe eye wo ̀ na mi ́ kple Mawu dome le nyuie ale mi ́ ekpɔa agbe mavɔ la to Yesu Kristo mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la dzi .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Enyo , ekema ɖe wo ̀ le be mi ́ anɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi ale be Mawu nate ŋu anɔ nublanuikpɔkpɔ kple nu vɔ ̃ tsɔtsɔke dzia ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: Gbeɖe ! Esi mi ́ eku na nu vɔ ̃ la ale ke wɔ mi ́ aganɔ agbe le nu vɔ ̃ me maha ̃ ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: Alo ɖe mienyae be mi ́ ame siwo kata ̃ wode mawutsi ta na le Kristo Yesu me la , wodee na mi ́ ɖe eƒe ku me oa ?

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Esi wo ̀ ku la , woɖi mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe nɔnɔme xoxo la kplii to mawutsideta me . Esi Mawu , Fofo la , fɔe ɖe tsitre to eƒe ŋuse ̃ me la , wotsɔ agbe yeye wɔnuku sia na mi ́ .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Elabena miezu eyama ƒe akpa aɖe eya ta mieku kplii esi wo ̀ ku . Azɔ la , mi ́ ekpɔ gome le eƒe agbe yeyea me eye miatsi tsitre abe eya ke ene .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Wokla ̃ mi ́ aƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ ɖi xoxoawo ɖe atisoga la ŋu kplii . Wode kubi mi ́ aƒe nɔnɔme si lɔ ̃ a nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ la ŋu ale be mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ si lɔ ̃ a nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ la , megale nu vɔ ̃ ƒe ŋuse ̃ te loo alo ganye kluvi na nu vɔ ̃ o .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Elabena esi mi ́ etsri nu vɔ ̃ ko la , mievo tso ŋuse ̃ si nu vɔ ̃ ƒe amebeble kpɔ ɖe mia dzi tsa ̃ la me .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Eye esi mi ́ aƒe nɔnɔme si me nu vɔ ̃ lɔlɔ ̃ yɔ la “ ku ” kple Kristo la , mi ́ enya be mi ́ akpɔ gome le eƒe agbe yeyea me .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Kristo fɔ tso ame kukuwo dome eye magaku akpɔ o . Ku megakpɔ ŋuse ̃ aɖeke ɖe edzi o .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Eku zi ɖeka ko be yeaɖe nu vɔ ̃ ƒe ŋuse ̃ ɖa , ke azɔ la , ele agbe le hadede mavɔ me kple Mawu tegbetegbe .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Eya ta mibu miaƒe nɔnɔme xoxo si lɔ ̃ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ la abe ɖe wo ̀ ku eye nu vɔ ̃ megakpɔ ŋuse ̃ aɖeke ɖe edzi o ene , ke boŋ minɔ agbe na Mawu eye mianɔ ŋudzɔ nɛ to Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la , me .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Migana nu vɔ ̃ nakpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe miaƒe ŋutila ̃ dzi azɔ o , eye migana nu vɔ ̃ ƒe dzodzrowo naɖu mia dzi o .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Migana miaƒe ŋutila ̃ ƒe akpa aɖeke nazu dɔwɔnu na vɔɖivɔ ̃ ɖinyenye o , ke boŋ mitsɔ miaƒe ŋutila ̃ ƒe akpa ɖe sia ɖe na Mawu le goawo kata ̃ me , elabena miefɔ tso ku me eye miedi be yewoazu ŋudɔwɔnu le Mawu ƒe asime , be wo ̀ awɔ mia ŋudɔ hena eƒe dɔ nyuiwo wɔwɔ .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Mele be nu vɔ ̃ naganye miaƒe dziɖula o , elabena azɔ la , miegale se siwo kplɔ mi le esime mienye nu vɔ ̃ ƒe kluviwo la te o , ke mievo azɔ esi miele Mawu ƒe amenuveve kple nublanuikpɔkpɔ te .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Đe esia le fiafiam be azɔ la , mi ́ ate ŋu ayi nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi eye mi ́ agatsi dzi le eŋu oa ? Gbeɖe ! Elabena mi ́ aƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ meku ɖe sedziwɔwɔ ŋu o , ke boŋ eku ɖe Mawu ƒe amenuveve ŋu .

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Đe miedze sii be yewoate ŋu atia Aƒetɔ na yewo ɖokui oa ? Miate ŋu atia nu vɔ ̃ eye ku akpe ɖe eŋu alo miate ŋu atia toɖoɖo eye tsɔtsɔke akpe ɖe eŋu . Wo dometɔ si mietsɔ mia ɖokuiwo na la , eyae axɔ mi eye wo ̀ anye miaƒe aƒetɔ eye miawo mianye eƒe kluviwo .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Mida akpe na Mawu be togbɔ be mietia tsa ̃ be yewoanye kluviwo na nu vɔ ̃ ha ̃ , azɔ la , mietsɔ miaƒe dzi blibo xɔ nufiafia si Mawu tsɔ na mi .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Azɔ la , mievo tso miaƒe aƒetɔ xoxoa si nye nu vɔ ̃ , sime eye miezu kluviwo na miaƒe aƒetɔ yeyea si nye dzɔdzɔenyenye .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Mele nu ƒom alea eye metsɔ kluviwo kple aƒetɔwo le kpɔɖeŋu ɖom elabena wo gɔmesese le bɔbɔe . Abe ale si mienye kluviwo tsa ̃ na nu vɔ ̃ vovovowo ene la , nenema kee wo ̀ le be miatsɔ mia ɖokuiwo awɔ kluviwo azɔ na nu siwo kata ̃ nyo eye wole kɔkɔe .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Le ɣemaɣi esi mienye kluviwo na nu vɔ ̃ la , mietsi dzi ɖe nyuiwɔwɔ ŋu tututu o .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Nu kae do tso eme ? Eme kɔ ƒa ̃ a be nyui aɖeke medo tso eme o , elabena ŋu le mia kpem fifia le nu siwo miewɔna tsa ̃ la ŋububu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ŋu , elabena nu mawo kata ̃ kplɔ mi yi tsɔtsrɔ ̃ mavɔ me .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Ke azɔ la , mievo tso nu vɔ ̃ ƒe ŋuse ̃ tenɔnɔ me . Miezu kluviwo na Mawu eye kɔkɔenyenye kple agbe mavɔ le viɖe siwo miakpɔ tso Mawu gbɔ la dome .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Elabena nu vɔ ̃ ƒe fetue nye ku , ke Mawu ƒe amenuveve ƒe nunanae nye agbe mavɔ to Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la me .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Nɔvi Yudatɔ lɔlɔ ̃ awo le Kristo me , ɖe mienyae haɖe be ne ame aɖe ku la , se la megablae o maha ̃ ?

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Mina maɖo kpɔɖeŋu aɖe na mi . Ne woɖe nyɔnu aɖe la , se la blae ɖe srɔ ̃ a ŋuti zi ale si srɔ ̃ ŋutsu la le agbe . Ke ne srɔ ̃ ŋutsu la ku la , srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe ƒe se la megabla nyɔnu la o .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Ekema ate ŋu aɖe ŋutsu bubu ne elɔ ̃ . Nyɔnu la ada vo ne ŋutsu la le agbe , ke nu sia sɔ le go sia go me le ŋutsu la ƒe ku megbe .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Tsa ̃ la , mia “ srɔ ̃ ŋutsu , ” si nye miaƒe aƒetɔ lae nye Yudatɔwo ƒe se ; ke magblɔ be “ mieku ” kple Kristo le atitsoga la ŋu , eye esi “ mieku ” ta la , “ miegaɖe se la o , ” eye se la megabla mi o . Miegagbɔ agbe esi Kristo fɔ tso ame kukuwo dome eye miezu ame yeyewo . Azɔ la , mieɖe ame si fɔ tso ame kukuwo dome ale be miate ŋu atse ku nyui siwo nye dɔ nyuiwo wɔwɔ na Mawu .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Esi miaƒe nɔnɔme xoxoa nɔ mia me la , dzodzro vɔ ̃ ɖiwo nɔ dɔ wɔm le mia me , eye wonaa miedina be yewoawɔ nu siwo Mawu di be miagawɔ o . Ale mietsea nu vɔ ̃ ƒe kutsetse siwo nye ku ƒe kutsetse gbegble ̃ wo .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Ke azɔ la , mehia ̃ be miagatsi dzi ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe seawo kple kɔnyinyiwo ŋuti o , elabena “ mieku ” le esime woɖe aboyo mi , ke azɔ la , miate ŋu asubɔ Mawu nyateƒetɔe , menye le mɔ xoxoa nu to seawo dzi wɔwɔ me tamemabumabutɔe o , ke boŋ le mɔ yeyea nu , miasubɔ Mawu kple miaƒe dzi blibo kpakple miaƒe susu kata ̃ .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Ekema ɖe mele gbɔgblɔm be Mawu ƒe se siawo nye se dzodzrowoa ? Gbeɖe ! Ao , nu vɔ ̃ mele se la ŋu o , ke boŋ se lae ɖe nye nu vɔ ̃ fiam . Ne se la megblɔ be , “ Mele be dzodzro vɔ ̃ ɖiwo nanɔ wo ̀ dzime o ” la , anye ne nyemate ŋu anya nu vɔ ̃ si le nye dzime kple dzodzro vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo ɣla ɖe afi ma o .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Ke nu vɔ ̃ wɔ se siawo ŋudɔ hetso tsi tre ɖe dzodzro vɔ ̃ ɖiwo ŋu to ŋkuɖoɖo wo dzi nam me be , dzodzro ma tɔgbiwo nye nu vɔ ̃ eye wonyɔa dzodzro siwo nu wode se ɖo la le menye ! Ne se aɖeke meli si dzi woada o la , eya ko hafi nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ aɖeke ha ̃ manɔ anyi o .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Eya tae nye dzi dze eme , zi ale si nyemese nu si se la bia tututu la gɔme o . Ke esi meke ɖe nyateƒea ŋu la , medze sii be meda sea dzi eye mezu nu vɔ ̃ wɔla si wotso kufia na .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Eya ta le nye ɖeka gome la , le ale si se nyui la afia agbemɔ lam teƒe la , ena wotso kufia nam boŋ .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Nu vɔ ̃ wɔm mezu abunɛtɔ esi wo ̀ to Mawu ƒe se nyuiwo ŋudɔwɔwɔ me na medze be woatso kufia nam .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Ke , abe ale si miakpɔe ene la , se la ŋutɔ le eteƒe pɛpɛpɛ eye wo ̀ nyo ha ̃ !

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Ke ale ke nu sia ate ŋu ava emee ? Menye se lae hem de tsɔtsrɔ ̃ mee nye ema oa ? Ekema ale ke wo ̀ ate ŋu anye nu nyui ? Ao , enye nu gbegble ̃ kple nu vɔ ̃ , nu si wɔ nu nyui ŋudɔ eye wo ̀ na wobu fɔm . Ale miate ŋu akpɔ ale si wo ̀ nye nu vɔ ̃ ɖi si ate ŋu ahe ku vɛ eye wo ̀ le be woatsri eŋudɔwɔwɔ , elabena ewɔa Mawu ƒe se nyuiwo ŋudɔ hena eya ŋutɔ ƒe tameɖoɖo vɔ ̃ ɖiwo .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Ekema se la nyo , ke nu si gble ̃ la tso gbɔnye elabena wodzram mezu kluvi na nu vɔ ̃ .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Nyemese ɖokuinye gɔme kura o elabena medina vevie be mawɔ nu si nyo , gake nyemetea ŋui o . Mewɔa nu si nyemedina be mawɔ o . Mele ́ fu nu sia .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Menya nyuie be nu si wɔm mele la menyo o ; nye dzitsinya vɔ ̃ ɖi la ɖenɛ fiaam be melɔ ̃ ɖe se siwo dzi dam mele la dzi .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Gake wɔna aɖeke mele ŋunye o , elabena menye nyee gale ewɔm o ; nu vɔ ̃ si le menye la kpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe dzinye eye eyae naa mewɔa nu vɔ ̃ siawo .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Menya be menye ame gbegble ̃ le goawo kata ̃ me le ale si nye dzɔdzɔme si nye nu vɔ ̃ xoxoa sɔŋ le la ta . Nye agbagbadzedze ɖe sia ɖe metea ŋu naa mewɔa nu nyui o . Medina be mawɔ nu nyui gake nyemetea ŋu wɔnɛ o .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Ne medi be mawɔ nu nyui la , nyemetea ŋu wɔnɛ o . Ne medze agbagba be nyemawɔ nu vɔ ̃ o la , mewɔa nu vɔ ̃ kokoko .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Azɔ ne mele nu si nyemedina be mawɔ o wɔm la , ekema eme kɔ be menye nye ŋutɔe le ewɔm o , ke boŋ nu vɔ ̃ si gakpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe dzinye kokoko lae .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Edze abe enye nyateƒe aɖe le nye agbe me ene be , ne medi be mawɔ nu si nyo la , mewɔa nu si menyo o la kokoko .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Medina be mawɔ Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu le nye dzɔdzɔme yeyea nu .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Ke mekpɔ se bubu si le dɔ wɔm le nye ŋutila ̃ me , ewɔa aʋa kple nye susu eye wo ̀ wɔam kluvi na nu vɔ ̃ ƒe se la le nye ŋutinuwo me .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: O , menye nublanuitɔ ga ̃ aɖe ! Ame ka aɖem tso ŋutila ̃ si kplɔm yina ku mee la sime ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Ke woada akpe na Mawu be eɖem to Yesu Kristo mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la , dzi . Eya ta azɔ la menye kluvi na Mawu ƒe se la le nye susu me , ke menye kluvi na nu vɔ ̃ ƒe se la le ŋutila ̃ nu .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Eya ta azɔ la , fɔbubu aɖeke megale ame siwo nye Yesu Kristo tɔ la lalam o .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Elabena Gbɔgbɔ si naa agbe ƒe ŋuse ̃ si le menye to Yesu Kristo me la , ɖem tso nu vɔ ̃ kple ku sime .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Womeɖea mi ́ tso nu vɔ ̃ ƒe asime to Mawu ƒe seawo nyanya me o , elabena mi ́ ewɔa seawo dzi o , eye mi ́ ate ŋu awɔ wo dzi ha ̃ o . Ke Mawu wɔ ɖoɖo bubu aɖe ŋudɔ be yeaɖe mi ́ . Eɖo eya ŋutɔ via ɖa wo ̀ nɔ ŋutila ̃ me abe mi ́ awo ke ene , ke nu vɔ ̃ le mi ́ awo ya ƒe ŋutila ̃ ŋu . Eɖe nu vɔ ̃ ƒe ŋuse ̃ si wo ̀ kpɔ ɖe mi ́ a dzi la ɖa to eɖokuitsɔtsɔ sa vɔe ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta me .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Eya ta azɔ la , mi ́ ate ŋu awɔ Mawu ƒe sewo dzi ne mi ́ edze Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yome eye mi ́ egaɖoa to nu vɔ ̃ ƒe gbɔgbɔ si le mi ́ a me la o .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Ame siwo ɖea mɔ woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ƒe dzodzrowo ɖua wo dzi la , nɔa agbe ko be yewoadze yewo ɖokuiwo ŋu , ke ame siwo dzea Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yome la , dzea sii be yewole nu siwo dzea Mawu ŋu la wɔm .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yomedzedze kplɔa mi ́ yia agbe kple ŋutifafa me , ke nu vɔ ̃ ƒe dzɔdzɔme xoxoa yomedzedze kplɔa ame yia ku me ,

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: elabena mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ ƒe dzɔdzɔme xoxoa tsia tsitre ɖe Mawu ŋu . Dzɔdzɔme sia mewɔ Mawu ƒe sewo dzi kpɔ o , eye mawɔe ha ̃ o .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Eya ta ame siwo gale woƒe nu vɔ ̃ ƒe dzɔdzɔme xoxoa te kokoko eye wodina be yewoadze dzodzro vɔ ̃ ɖiwo yome la , mate ŋu adze Mawu ŋu akpɔ o .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Ke miawo miele nenema o . Ne Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ le mia me la , ekema miele miaƒe dzɔdzɔme yeye la te . Miɖo ŋku edzi be ame sia ame si me Kristo ƒe Gbɔgbɔ mele o la , ame ma menye kristotɔ o .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Ke , togbɔ be Yesu Kristo le agbe le mia me ha ̃ la , miaƒe ŋutila ̃ aku le nu vɔ ̃ ta ke miaƒe gbɔgbɔ ya anɔ agbe elabena Kristo ve enu .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Eye ne Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ si fɔ Yesu ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome le agbe le mia me la , ana miaƒe ŋutila ̃ kukuawo naganɔ agbe le miaƒe ku megbe to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ma ke si le agbe le mia me la dzi .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Eya ta , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , se aɖeke mebla mi be miawɔ nu si miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ ƒe dzɔdzɔme xoxoa di tso mia si be miawɔ o .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Elabena ne miaganɔ eyome kokoko la , miabu eye miatsrɔ ̃ , ke ne to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe ŋuse ̃ me , mieɖu miaƒe dzɔdzɔme xoxo vɔ ̃ ɖi la dzi la , mianɔ agbe .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Elabena ame siwo kata ̃ Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ kplɔna la , ame mawoe nye Mawu viwo .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Eya ta mele be mi ́ anɔ abe kluvi vɔvɔ ̃ nɔtɔwo ene o , ke boŋ mi ́ awɔ nu abe Mawu ŋutɔ vi siwo wo ̀ xɔ ɖe eƒe ƒome la me eye mi ́ eyɔnɛ be , “ Fofo , Aba ” ene .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Elabena eƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒoa nu na mi ́ le mi ́ aƒe dzi ƒe gogloƒe ke eye wo ̀ gblɔna na mi ́ be Mawu viwo mi ́ enye vava ̃ .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Eye esi mi ́ enye viawo ta la mi ́ akpɔ gome le eƒe kesinɔnuwo me elabena nu siwo kata ̃ Mawu naa Via Yesu la , zu mi ́ awo ha ̃ tɔ azɔ . Ke ne mi ́ akpɔ gome le eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe me la , ele be mi ́ akpɔ gome le eƒe fukpekpe ha ̃ me .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Ke fu si mi ́ akpe fifia la , menye naneke si woatsɔ asɔ kple ŋutikɔkɔe si woana mi ́ emegbe la kura o .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Elabena Mawu ƒe nuwɔwɔwo kata ̃ tsɔ dzigbɔɖi kple mɔkpɔkpɔ le lalam na ŋkeke si gbɔna si dzi Mawu afɔ viawo ɖe tsitre .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Elabena nuwɔwɔ blibo la le teteɖeanyi ga ̃ aɖe me , nu si menye eƒe didi o ke boŋ ame si he gbegble ̃ sia vɛ la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu wo ̀ nye kple mɔkpɔkpɔ

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: be nuwɔwɔ blibo la axɔ ablɔɖe tso gbegble ̃ ƒe kluvinyenye me age ɖe Mawu viwo ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe ablɔɖe la me .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Elabena mi ́ enyae be dzɔdzɔmenu siwo nye atiwo kple la ̃ wo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ kpea fu le dɔle ́ le kple ku sime esime wole mɔ kpɔm na nya ga ̃ sia ƒe dzɔdzɔ .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Mi ́ kristotɔwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ , togbɔ be Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la le mi ́ a me eye wo ̀ nye ŋutikɔkɔe si le mi ́ a ŋgɔ ƒe ɖeɖefia na mi ́ ha ̃ la , mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ edina vevie be woaɖe mi ́ tso vevesese kple fukpekpe me . Mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm vevie na ŋkeke ma gbe sia gbe . Mawu ana nu siwo nye mi ́ a tɔ abe viawo ene la mi ́ . Nu siawo dometɔ ɖekae nye ŋutila ̃ yeye siwo ŋugbe wo ̀ do na mi ́ . Ŋutila ̃ siawo magale ́ dɔ o eye womaku gbeɖe o .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Woɖe mi ́ to xɔse me ; xɔse gɔmee nye mɔkpɔkpɔ na nane si mele mi ́ a si o la kpɔkpɔ . Mahia ̃ be ame si si nane le xoxo la , nakpɔ mɔ eye wo ̀ axɔe se be yeakpɔ nu ma o .

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Ke ne wo ̀ le be mi ́ axɔ Mawu dzi ase le nu si medzɔ haɖe o gome la , dzixɔse sia fiaa mi ́ be mi ́ alala kple dzigbɔɖi kpakple kakaɖedzi .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Nenema ke to mi ́ aƒe xɔse me la , Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la kpena ɖe mi ́ a ŋu le mi ́ aƒe gbe sia gbe ƒe xaxawo kple gbedodoɖawo me . Elabena mi ́ enyaa nu si mi ́ abia to gbedodoɖa me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ loo alo ale si miado gbe ɖae o . Ke Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la doa gbe ɖa ɖe mi ́ a ta kple seselela ̃ me si tɔgbi ŋu womate ŋu aƒo nu le o .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Eye Fofo la , ame si nyaa dziwo kata ̃ me la , nyaa nu si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la le gbɔgblɔm esime wo ̀ ɖea kuku ɖe mi ́ a ta le nu siwo sɔ ɖe Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu dzi la ta .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Ke mi ́ enyae bena le nuwo kata ̃ me la , Mawu wɔa nu hena ame siwo lɔ ̃ nɛ la ƒe nyui , ame siwo woyɔ le eƒe tameɖoɖo ɖi nu .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Elabena ame siwo Mawu nya ɖi la , woawo kee wo ̀ ɖo ɖi be woanɔ Via ƒe nɔnɔme me be wo ̀ anye ŋgɔgbevi le nɔviawo dome .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Ame siwo wo ̀ tia da ɖi la , woawo ke ha ̃ e wo ̀ yɔ , ame siwo wo ̀ yɔ la , woawoe wo ̀ tso afia na eye ame siwo wo ̀ tso afia na la , woawo ŋutie wo ̀ kɔ .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Nu ka gɔ ̃ mi ́ ate ŋu agblɔ tso nu wɔnuku siawo tɔgbi ŋu ? Ne Mawu le mi ́ a dzi la , ame kae ate ŋu atsi tsitre ɖe mi ́ a ŋu ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Esi Mawu meve nu le Via gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ŋu o , ke boŋ wo ̀ tsɔe na ɖe mi ́ kata ̃ ta la , ɖe matsɔ nu bubu ɖe sia ɖe ha ̃ ana mi ́ oa ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Ame kae ate ŋu atsɔ nya ɖe mi ́ ame siwo Mawu tia na eɖokui la ŋu ? Mawue nye afiatsola .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Ekema ame kae abu fɔ mi ́ ? Đe Kristo awɔ esia ? Ao ! Elabena eyae nye ame si ku ɖe mi ́ a ta eye wo ̀ gatsi tsitre na mi ́ ; ebɔbɔ nɔ Mawu ƒe ɖusime eye wo ̀ le kuku ɖem ɖe mi ́ a ta le dziƒo .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Ame kae ama mi ́ ɖa tso Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ gbɔ ? Fuwɔame loo alo xaxa ? Yometiti loo alo dɔwuamea ? Amamanɔnɔ , loo dzɔgbevɔ ̃ e loo alo yia ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖi ene be , “ Le tawo ̀ mi ́ eɖoa ku ƒe xaxawo me le ŋkeke blibo la me , wobua mi ́ abe ale ̃ siwo wokplɔ yina wuwu ge la ene . ”

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Ao , le nu siawo kata ̃ me mi ́ eɖu dzi ʋuu , wo ̀ glo to ame si lɔ ̃ mi ́ la me .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Elabena medze sii be naneke mate ŋu ama mi ́ ɖa tso Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ la gbɔ o . Ku mate ŋui o , agbe ha ̃ mate ŋui o . Mawudɔlawo mawɔe o , eye tsi ̃ eƒe ŋutɔ ƒe ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mate ŋu aɖe mi ́ ɖa tso Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ la gbɔ o . Mi ́ aƒe egbe ƒe vɔvɔ ̃ wo kple mi ́ aƒe etsɔ ƒe dzimaɖeɖiwo

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: alo kɔkɔƒe , alo gogloƒe alo nuwɔwɔ bubu aɖeke gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mate ŋu ama mi ́ ɖa tso Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ si le Kristo Yesu , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ , me la gbɔ o .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Nyateƒe gblɔm mele le Kristo me , nyemada alakpa aɖeke o eye nye dzitsinya le ɖase ɖim le Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la me

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: be mele nu xam ŋutɔ eye mele vevesese ga ̃ aɖe me le nye dzime .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Elabena anyo nam wu be woabu fɔm eye woaɖem ɖa tso Kristo gbɔ ne esia ana be nye amewo , Yudatɔwo , nakpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Woawo tɔe nye vinyenye la , woawo tɔe nye Mawu me ŋutikɔkɔe la , nubablawo , se la xɔxɔ , gbedoxɔ me subɔsubɔ la kple ŋugbedodoawo .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Wonye fofoawo ƒe dzidzimeviwo , dzidzime siwo me Kristo dzɔ tso le ŋutila ̃ nu , ame si nye Mawu ɖe nuwo kata ̃ dzi , ame si wokafuna tegbee ! Amen .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Ekema ɖe Mawu gbe ŋugbe siwo wo ̀ do na Yudatɔwo la dzi wɔwɔa ? Ao ! Elabena edo ŋugbe siawo na ame siwo nye Yudatɔ akuakuawo . Ke menye ame sia ame si wodzi ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe ƒome me lae nye Yudatɔwo akuakuawo o .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Be wodo tso Abraham me ɖeɖe ko mewɔ wo Abraham vi vava ̃ wo o . Elabena Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ be ŋugbedodo siawo li na Abraham vi Isak kple Isak ƒe dzidzimeviwo ko , togbɔ be vi bubuwo nɔ Abraham si ha ̃ .

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Esia le fiafiam be menye Abraham viwo kata ̃ e nye Mawu viwo o , ke boŋ ame siwo xɔ ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ƒe ŋugbe si wodo na Abraham dzi se la koe .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Elabena Mawu do ŋugbe be , “ Mana viŋutsuvi wo ̀ kple Sara le ƒe si gbɔna me . ”

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Menye esia ɖeɖe ko o , ke Rebeka ƒe venɔviawo fofoe nye mi ́ a tɔgbui Isak .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Hafi ne woadzi venɔvi siawo alo venɔvi siawo nawɔ nane , nyui alo vɔ ̃ la , bena Mawu ƒe tameɖoɖoɖi nanɔ eteƒe le tatia la nu ,

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: ke menye le dɔwɔwɔ aɖeke nu o , ke boŋ tso ame si yɔa ame gbɔ la wogblɔ na Rebeka be , “ Tsitsitɔ la azu subɔla na ɖevitɔ la . ”

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Abe ale si woŋlɔe ɖi ene be , “ Mayra Yakɔb , ke menye Esau o . ”

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Đe Mawu wɔ nu madzɔmadzɔa ? Gbeɖe !

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Elabena Mawu gblɔ na Mose be , “ Ne medi be mave ame aɖe nu la , mawɔe eye makpɔ nublanui na ame sia ame si medi be makpɔ nublanui na . ”

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Ale womenaa Mawu ƒe yayra ame elabena amea di be woayra ye alo ku kutri be yeaxɔ yayra la o . Wonaa yayra siawo elabena Mawu kpɔa nublanui na ame siwo wo ̀ di be yeakpɔ nublanui na .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Farao , Egipte fia , nye kpɔɖeŋu le go sia me . Elabena Mawu gblɔ nɛ be yetsɔ Egipte fiaɖuƒea nɛ ale be yeate ŋu aɖe yeƒe ŋuse ̃ si tsi tsitre ɖe eŋu la afia , ale be xexeame kata ̃ nase nu tso ye Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ kɔkɔe la ŋu .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Ale miekpɔ be Mawu nyo dɔme na ame aɖewo elabena edi be yeanyo dɔme na wo eye wo ̀ naa ame aɖewo se ̃ a dzime .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Ekema nu ka ta Mawu bua fɔ wo le woƒe tomaɖomaɖo ta ? Đe womewɔ nu si wo ̀ ɖo na wo be woawɔ oa ?

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Ao , me ̀ gagblɔ nenema o ! Ame kae ne ̀ nye be na ̃ drɔ ̃ ʋɔnu Mawu ? Đe ame aɖe ƒe nuwɔwɔ abia nuwɔla be , “ Nu ka ta ne ̀ wɔm alea maha ̃ ? ”

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Ne ame aɖe tsɔ tsu me ze aɖe la , ɖe mɔɖeɖe meli be zemela la natsɔ tsu ma ke ame kplu nyui aɖe si me woatsɔ seƒoƒo ade eye wo ̀ ame kplu bubu si me wo ̀ atsɔ gbeɖuɖɔwo akɔ ɖo oa ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Nu ka adzɔ nenye be Mawu ame si lɔ ̃ , ɖe eƒe dɔmedzoe kple ŋuse ̃ fia la , gbɔ dzi ɖi na ame siwo dze na eƒe dɔmedzoe ƒe tohehe ?

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Alo ewɔ esia be yeaɖe eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe kesinɔnuwo afia ame siwo le mɔ kpɔm na eƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ , ame siwo wo ̀ dzra ɖo do ŋgɔ na eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la ,

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: mi ́ ame siwo ha ̃ wo ̀ yɔ , menye tso Yudatɔwo dome ɖeɖe ko o , ke boŋ tso Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ domea ?

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Mieɖo ŋku nu si Hosea ƒe nyagblɔɖi gblɔ la dzia ? Afi mae Mawu gblɔ le bena yeadi vi bubu siwo metso Yuda ƒomea me o la na ye ɖokui eye yealɔ ̃ wo togbɔ be ame aɖeke melɔ ̃ wo kpɔ o ha ̃ .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Wogblɔ le Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ŋu tsa ̃ be , “ Menye nye amewo mienye o . ” Azɔ la , woayɔ wo be , “ Mawu Gbagbe la ƒe viwo . ”

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Nyagblɔɖila Yesaya gblɔ tso Yudatɔwo ŋu be , “ togbɔ be woade ame akpe akpewo ha ̃ la , wo dometɔ ame ʋe aɖewo koe akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Elabena Aƒetɔ la atso nya me tso anyigba dzi ŋuti , awu eƒe wɔnawo nu kaba kple dzɔdzɔenyenye . ”

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Yesaya gagblɔ le teƒe aɖe be ne menye Mawu ƒe amenuveve tae o la , woatsrɔ ̃ Yudatɔwo kata ̃ , ame sia ame , abe ale si wotsrɔ ̃ ame sia ame le Sodom kple Gomora ene .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Nya kawo mi ́ agblɔ tso nu siawo ŋu ? Nu si mi ́ agblɔ koe nye be Mawu na mɔnukpɔkpɔ Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo be woakpɔ ɖeɖe to xɔse me , togbɔ be womenɔ Mawu dim vevie o ha ̃ .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Ke Yudatɔwo , ame siwo dze agbagba vevie be yewoadze Mawu ŋu to Mawu ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me la , mete ŋu dze Mawu ŋu o .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Nu ka tae ? Elabena wonɔ agbagba dzem be yewoakpɔ ɖeɖe to seawo dzi wɔwɔ me eye yewoanɔ agbe nyui le esime wo ̀ le be woanya be xɔse me ko yewoato akpɔ ɖeɖe teƒe . Wokli kpe ga ̃ la dze anyi .

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Mawu gbe nya na wo tso nu sia ŋu le Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la me esi wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Metsɔ Agakpe aɖe da ɖe mɔ me na Yudatɔwo . Ame geɖewo akli Agakpe sia , si nye Yesu , eye woadze anyi . Ame siwo axɔ edzi se la , ŋu makpe wo gbeɖe o . ”

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Nɔvinye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo , nye dzi ƒe didi kple nye gbedodoɖae nye be Yudatɔwo nakpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Menya ale si wotsɔa dzo ɖe Mawu ƒe bubu ŋuti gake womewɔa nu sia to mɔ nyuitɔ dzi o .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Elabena womese egɔme be Kristo ku be yeadzra yewo kple Mawu dome ɖo o . Le esia gɔmesese teƒe la , wole agbagba dzem be yewoadze na Mawu ƒe amenuveve la to Yudatɔwo ƒe seawo kple kɔnyinyiwo dzi wɔwɔ me ; ke esia menye ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ƒe mɔ o .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Womese eme be ame siwo xɔ Kristo dzi se la , Kristo naa nu sia nu si wodina to eƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me la wo o . Ewu nu siawo kata ̃ nu .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Elabena Mose ŋlɔ be ne ame aɖe anye ame nyui le go ɖe sia ɖe me , aɖu tetekpɔwo dzi le eƒe agbemeŋkekewo kata ̃ me eye mawɔ nu vɔ ̃ akpɔ o la , eya ko hafi woave enu wo ̀ akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Ke ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ si vana to xɔse me la , gblɔ be , “ Mele be na ̃ di dziƒo be yeakpɔ Yesu le afi ma eye yeahee va anyigba dzi be wo ̀ akpe ɖe ye ŋu o , ” eye ,

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: Mehia ̃ be na ̃ yi ame kukuwo dome be yeana Kristo nagatsi tsitre o .
