text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Elabena ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ si tso Kristo dzixɔse me , si nye nu si ƒe gbeƒa ̃ mi ́ eɖena la , le bɔbɔe be wo ̀ asu mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe si . Le nyateƒe me la etsɔ ɖe mi ́ a gbɔ kpuie abe mi ́ aƒe dziwo kple nuwo ene .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Elabena ne e ̀ tsɔ wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ nu ʋu eme na ame bubuwo be Yesu Kristoe nye yeƒe Aƒetɔ eye ne ̀ xɔe se tso wo ̀ ŋutɔ wo ̀ dzime be Mawu fɔe ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la , a ̃ kpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Elabena ame ƒe xɔse tso eƒe dzime kee naa ame kple Mawu dome nyona , eye ne e ̀ ʋu eme kple wo ̀ nu na amewo la , ekema e ̀ ɖo kpe wo ̀ ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ dzi .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Elabena Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ na mi ́ be , ŋu makpe ame sia ame si xɔ Kristo dzi se la akpɔ o .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Yudatɔwo kple Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo siaa sɔ le go sia me ; Aƒetɔ ɖeka ma koe le wo kata ̃ si eye Aƒetɔ sia naa eƒe kesinɔnuwo ame sia ame si bianɛ la faa .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ame sia ame si yɔa Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ dzi la akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Ke ne womexɔ edzi se o la , ale ke woate ŋu abiae be wo ̀ aɖe yewo ? Eye ale ke woate ŋu axɔ edzi ase ne womese nu tso eŋu kpɔ o ? Eye ale ke woawɔ ase nu tso eŋu ne ame aɖeke megblɔe na wo o ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Eye ale ke ame aɖe ayi aɖagblɔ Kristo ŋunya na wo ne ame aɖeke medɔe o ? Nya siae Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la le gbɔgblɔm to nya siawo me be , “ Ame siwo ɖea gbeƒa ̃ ŋutifafa si nɔa Mawu kple amewo dome ƒe nyanyui eye wo ̀ gblɔa dzidzɔnyawo tso nu nyuiwo ŋuti la ƒe afɔwo nya kpɔna loo ! ” Esia gɔmee nye woado dzaa na ame siwo vana gblɔa Mawu ƒe nyanyui la !

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Ke menye ame sia ame si sea nyanyui lae xɔnɛ kple dzidzɔ o , elabena nyagblɔɖila Yesaya gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ , ame kae xɔ dzinye se esi megblɔe na wo ? ”

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Ke xɔse vana na ame to nyanyui sia , si nye nyanyui tso Kristo ŋuti la , sese me .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Ke Yudatɔwo ya ɖe ? Đe wose Mawu ƒe Nya ? E ̃ , ede afi sia afi si wole ; wogblɔ nyanyui la na xexeame ƒe akpa ɖe sia ɖe .

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Eye ɖe wose egɔme be Mawu atsɔ eƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ana ame bubuwo ne woawo , Yudatɔwo , gbe be yewomaxɔe oa ? E ̃ , elabena le keke Mose ŋɔli gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , Mawu gblɔ be yeanyɔ ŋuʋaʋa ̃ kple sidzedze ƒe gbɔgbɔ le wo me to yeƒe ɖeɖetsɔtsɔ na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , abunɛtɔwo ƒe dukɔwo , me .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Emegbe la Yesaya ɖe gbeƒa ̃ bena ame siwo manɔ Mawu dim gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o la , akpɔe .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Fifia la , ele asimiamia Yudatɔwo dzi , ke woawo le ɖeklemiɖeɖe dzi eye wogbea vava .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Ekema mabia be , ɖe Mawu gbe eƒe amewo , Yudatɔwo , eye wo ̀ gble ̃ wo ɖia ? Ao , mele nenema kura o . Miɖo ŋku edzi be nye ŋutɔ ha ̃ Yudatɔe menye ; Abraham ƒe dzidzimevie menye eye metso Benyamin ƒe ƒomea me .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Mawu meɖe asi le eya ŋutɔ ƒe amewo , ame siwo wo ̀ tia tso gɔmedzedzea me ke la ŋu o . Mieɖo ŋku nu si Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ na Eliya esi wo ̀ nɔ Israelviwo nu tsom na Mawu dzia ?

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: Eliya gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ , wowu wo ̀ Nyagblɔɖilawo eye wogba ̃ wo ̀ vɔsamlekpuiwo ƒu anyi ; nye ɖeka hɔ ̃ koe susɔ , eye wodi be yewoawu nye ha ̃ . ”

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Mieɖo ŋku ale si Mawu ɖo nya sia ŋu dzia ? Mawu gblɔ be , “ Ao , menye wo ̀ ɖeka koe susɔ o . Ame akpe adre sɔŋ le asinye kpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ , ame siwo galɔ ̃ am kokoko eye womedea ta agu na legbawo o ! ”

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Alea ke wo ̀ gale egbe sia ha ̃ . Menye Yudatɔwo kata ̃ e de megbe tso Mawu gbɔ o . Ame ʋe aɖewo le xɔxɔ kpɔm le Mawu ƒe amenuveve si wo ̀ tsɔ tia woe la ta .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Nenye Mawu ƒe amenuveve tae la , ekema menye woƒe nyonyo tae o . Elabena ne ele nenema la , ekema nu si wona faa la meganye nunana o , ke boŋ enye nu si ame ŋutɔ wɔ dɔ hekpɔ .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Eya ta alea nya la lee nye esi : Yudatɔ geɖewo mekpɔ Mawu ƒe amenuveve si dim wole la o . Wo dometɔ ʋe siwo Mawu tia la kpɔe , ke ame bubuwo ƒe ŋkuwo gba ̃ .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Nu siae Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la le gbɔgblɔm esi wo ̀ xle ̃ fia be Mawu na wodɔ alɔ ̃ , womia woƒe ŋkuwo eye woƒe towo me xe ale be womete ŋu se nu si gblɔm mi ́ ele tso Kristo ŋu la gɔme o . Aleae wo ̀ le va se ɖe egbe .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Fia David ƒo nu tso nu ma ke ŋu esi wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Mina woƒe nuɖuɖu nyuiwo kple yayra bubuwo nana woabu be nu sia nu sɔ le yewo kple Mawu dome . Mina nu nyui siawo nayi atrɔ agbɔ va dze ta dzi na wo eye woagba ̃ wo gudugudu .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Mina woƒe ŋkuwo dzi natsyɔ ale be womagate ŋu akpɔ nu o . Mina agba kpekpe nabi dzime na wo gobaa hafi woanɔ yiyim ɖaa . ”

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Đe esia le fiafiam be Mawu gbe Yudatɔwo tegbetegbea ? Kura o ! Eƒe taɖodzinue nye yeana yeƒe ɖeɖe nanɔ anyi na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ ekema Yudatɔwo aʋa ̃ ŋu eye woadi Mawu ƒe ɖeɖe na woawo ŋutɔ .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Azɔ ne xexeame kata ̃ kpɔ yayra to Mawu ƒe ɖeɖenana me la , ekema ne Yudatɔwo agbe Mawu ƒe ɖeɖe la xɔxɔ la , mibu yayra ga ̃ si wu esia , si ava xexeame dzi ne Yudatɔwo ha ̃ va xɔ Yesu la ŋu .

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Abe ale si mienya ene la , Mawu tiam be manye dɔtsɔla tɔxɛ na mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo . Metea gbe ɖe nu sia dzi eye meɖoa ŋku edzi na Yudatɔwo ɣesiaɣi si mate ŋui ,

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: ale be , ne mate ŋui la , mana woadi nu si le mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo si eye mato esia me aɖe wo dometɔ aɖewo .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Anye nu wɔnuku ga ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ ne wozu kristotɔwo . Mawu ƒe tɔtrɔ le wo yome fia be Mawu trɔ ɖe xexeame ƒe akpa bubuawo ŋu be yeatsɔ yeƒe ɖeɖe ana wo . Aganye nu si awɔ nuku wu ne Yudatɔwo azu kristotɔwo . Anɔ abe ame kukuwo ƒe agbegbɔgbɔ ene .

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Eye zi ale si Abraham kple nyagblɔɖilawo nye Mawu ƒe amewo la , wo viwo ha ̃ anye Mawu ƒe amewo . Elabena ne ati aɖe ƒe kewo le kɔkɔe la , eƒe alɔwo ha ̃ anɔ kɔkɔe .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Ke wola ̃ alɔ siawo dometɔ aɖewo , siwo le Abraham ƒe ati la ŋu la ɖa ; ame siawoe nye Yudatɔwo . Eye mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , mienye alɔwo tso amiti aɖe si nɔ gbeme la dzi , ke azɔ la , mieva zu alɔ na Abraham ƒe ati la . Eya ta azɔ la , miawo ha ̃ mixɔ yayra si ŋugbe Mawu do na Abraham kple viawo eye miakpɔ gome le Mawu ƒe nunyiame me tso eya ŋutɔ ƒe amiti tɔxɛ la gbɔ .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Gake mikpɔ nyuie be miagaƒo adegbe be wotsɔ yewo ɖo atilɔ siwo wola ̃ ɖa la teƒe o . Miɖo ŋku edzi be miele vevie le ale si mienye Mawu ƒe ati la ƒe akpa aɖe la ɖeɖe ko ta ; alɔ ko mienye , menye ati la ƒe kee mienye o .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Miagblɔ be , “ Wola ̃ alɔ siawo ɖa be woakpɔ teƒe nam . Esia fia be menye ame dzadzɛ . ”

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Kpɔ nyuie . Đo ŋku edzi be wola ̃ alɔ ma siwo nye Yudatɔwo ɖa , elabena womexɔ Mawu dzi se o , eye miawo miezu alɔwo le miaƒe dzixɔse ɖeɖe ko ta . Migado mia ɖokuiwo ɖe dzi o ; mibɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo , mida akpe eye miakpɔ nyuie .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Elabena ne Mawu mekpɔ nublanui na atilɔ gba ̃ tɔwo o la , makpɔ nublanui na miawo ha ̃ o .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Mide dzesi ale si Mawu nyoa dɔme eye wo ̀ gahea to ha ̃ e . Ese ̃ a asi ɖe ame siwo gbea toɖoɖoe la dzi , ke enyoa dɔme ne mi ́ eyi elɔlɔ ̃ kple edzixɔxɔse dzi . Ke ne mi ́ elɔ ̃ e o eye mi ́ exɔ edzi se ha ̃ o la , ala ̃ mi ́ awo ha ̃ ɖa .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Ke ne Yudatɔwo aɖe asi le woƒe dzimaxɔse ŋu eye woatrɔ ava Mawu gbɔ la , Mawu agaxɔ wo ado ɖe ati la dzi . Ŋuse ̃ le esi be wo ̀ awɔe .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Elabena ne Mawu lɔ ̃ be yeaxɔ mi ame siwo nɔ adzɔge ke , mienye amiti dzodzro aɖe ƒe akpa aɖe tsa ̃ eye fifia yeaxɔ mi ado ɖe ye ŋutɔ yeƒe ati nyui dzi , nu si medzɔna edziedzi o la , ɖe miekpɔe be anɔ klalo sa ̃ a wu be yeagbugbɔ Yudatɔwo , ame siwo nɔ afi ma tsa ̃ la axɔ oa ?

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , medi be mianya nyateƒe sia tso Mawu gbɔ , ale be miagado mia ɖokuiwo ɖe dzi eye miade asi dada me o . E ̃ , eme kɔ be Yudatɔ aɖewo tsi tsitre ɖe nyanyui la ŋu azɔ , ke anɔ alea va se ɖe esime mi Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo kata ̃ lɔ ̃ la , miava Kristo gbɔ .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Ekema Israel blibo la akpɔ ɖeɖe . Mieɖo ŋku nu si nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔ tso nu sia ŋuti dzia ? “ Xɔla aɖe ado tso Zion eye wo ̀ atrɔ Yudatɔwo kata ̃ ɖa tso mawumavɔmavɔ ̃ ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi gbɔ .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Ɣemaɣi me la , maɖe woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kata ̃ ɖa abe ale si medo ŋugbee ene . ”

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Azɔ la Yudatɔ geɖeawo nye nyanyui la ƒe futɔwo . Wole ́ fui . Ke nu sia nye viɖe na miawo , elabena ena Mawu tsɔ eƒe nunana na mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo . Ke Mawu galɔ ̃ a Yudatɔwo kokoko le eƒe ŋugbe si wo ̀ do na Abraham , Isak kple Yakɔb la ta .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Elabena Mawu magagbugbɔ eƒe nunanawo kple eƒe ameyɔyɔ axɔ o ; Mawu magbe eƒe ŋugbedodowo dzi wɔwɔ gbeɖe o .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Tsa ̃ la , mienye agla ̃ dzelawo ɖe Mawu ŋu , ke esi Yudatɔwo gbe eƒe nunanawo xɔxɔ la , Mawu ve miawo nu ɖe wo teƒe .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Azɔ la , Yudatɔwoe nye agla ̃ dzelawo . Gake gbe ɖeka la , woawo ha ̃ akpɔ gome le Mawu ƒe amenuveve si wo ̀ kɔ ɖe mia dzi la me .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Elabena Mawu ɖe ŋku ɖa le wo ŋu le woƒe nu vɔ ̃ ta ale be yeate ŋu akpɔ nublanui na amewo kata ̃ sɔsɔe .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: O , Mawu wɔnuku aɖe ŋutɔe le mi ́ a si . Eƒe nunya kple kesinɔnuwo lolo loo ! Mi ́ ate ŋu ase eƒe nyametsotsowo kple ɖoɖowo me akpɔ o !

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Elabena mi ́ a dometɔ kae ate ŋu anya Aƒetɔ la ƒe tame ? Ame kae nya nu ale gbegbe be wo ̀ ate ŋu azu eƒe aɖaŋudela alo mɔfiala ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: Ame kae ate ŋu adɔ Aƒetɔ la ɖa be wo ̀ aɖe mɔ amea nawɔ nane ?

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Elabena Mawu ko gbɔe nu sia nu tsona . Nu sia nu le agbe le eya ko ƒe ŋuse ̃ ta , eye nu sia nu li na eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe . Ŋutikɔkɔe nanye etɔ tegbee ! Amen .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Eya ta , nɔvinyewo , le Mawu ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ sɔgbɔ la ta , mele ŋuse ̃ dom mi be miatsɔ miaƒe ŋutila ̃ wo awɔ vɔsa gbagbe si le kɔkɔe eye wo ̀ dzea Mawu ŋu esi anye miaƒe subɔsubɔ gbɔgbɔmetɔ .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Migazɔ azɔ ɖe xexe sia me ƒe nuɖoanyiwo nu o ke boŋ mitrɔ to miaƒe tamesusuwo ƒe yeyewɔwɔ me ekema miate ŋu anya , akpɔ kakaɖedzi le nu si Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu nye la ŋu , eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu si nyo eye wo ̀ dze hede blibo .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Le Mawu ƒe amenuveve ƒe nunana si wo ̀ nam nu la , mele egblɔm na mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe be : migabu mia ɖokuiwo ame ga ̃ woe wu ale si dze o , ke boŋ mibu mia ɖokuiwo ɖokuibɔbɔlawoe le xɔse ƒe dzidzenu si Mawu na mi la nu .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Abe ale si ŋutinu geɖewo le miaƒe ŋutila ̃ wo ŋu eye ŋutinu siawo kata ̃ mewɔa dɔ ɖeka o ene la

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: nenema kee wole Kristo ha ̃ ƒe ŋutila ̃ ŋui , eye ŋutinu siawo nye wo nɔewo tɔ , ame sia ame hia ̃ nɔvia .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Mawu na amenuvevenunana mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe be wo ̀ awɔ nu tɔxɛ aɖe nyuie . Eya ta ne Mawu na nunana wo ̀ be na ̃ gblɔ nya ɖi la , ekema ele na wo ̀ be na ̃ gblɔ nya ɖi ɣesiaɣi si na ̃ te ŋui kple zi geɖe ale si wo ̀ xɔse ase ̃ ŋu ale be na ̃ te ŋu axɔ nya tso Mawu gbɔ .

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Ne wo ̀ nunanae nye be na ̃ subɔ ame bubuwo la , ekema na ̃ subɔ wo nyuie . Ne e ̀ nye nufiala la , na ̃ fia nu nyuie .

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: Ne e ̀ nye mawunyagblɔla la , ekema ele be na ̃ kpɔ egbɔ be ŋuse ̃ le yeƒe mawunya ŋu eye wo ̀ kpena ɖe amewo ŋu . Ne Mawu na hotsui wo ̀ la tsɔe nyo dɔme eye na ̃ kpe ɖe ame bubuwo ŋu . Ne Mawu na dzikpɔkpɔ ƒe nunana wo ̀ eye wo ̀ na be na ̃ kpɔ ame bubuwo ƒe dɔwo dzi la , ele na wo ̀ be na ̃ le ́ fɔ ɖe wo ̀ dɔdeasi sia ŋu vevie . Ele na ame siwo faa akɔ na konyifalawo be woatsɔ kristotɔwo ƒe dzidzɔ awɔe .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Migalɔ ̃ mia nɔewo le ŋkume ko o , ke boŋ milɔ ̃ wo tso dzi vava ̃ me ke . Mile ́ fu nu vɔ ̃ . Mide nu nyui dzi .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Mitsɔ dadaviwo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ lɔ ̃ mia nɔewo eye mide bubu mia nɔewo ŋu wu miawo ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Migagbɔdzɔ le vevidodo me o , ke boŋ mixɔ dzo le gbɔgbɔ me eye misubɔ Aƒetɔ la kple dzi blibo .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Mikpɔ dzidzɔ le ɖoɖo siwo kata ̃ Mawu le wɔwɔm ɖe mia ŋu la ŋuti . Mido dzi le xaxawo me eye mianɔ gbedodoɖa dzi ɣesiaɣi .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Ne Mawu viwo ge ɖe hia ̃ me la , miɖe wo tso eme . Mikpe amewo va miaƒe aƒewo me enuenu ne woaɖu nu kpli mi ; ne dzeƒe hia ̃ wo la , mina wo .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Ne ame aɖe wɔ nu masɔmasɔ aɖe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ le wo ̀ kristotɔnyenye ta la , me ̀ gaƒo fi dee o ; do gbe ɖa ɖe eta eye na ̃ yrae .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Mikpɔ dzidzɔ kple ame siwo le dzidzɔ kpɔm . Mifa konyi kple ame siwo le konyi fam .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Miwɔ dɔ kple mia nɔewo dzidzɔtɔe . Migado mia ɖokuiwo ɖe dzi glodzoo o . Migadze agbagba be yewoadze amega ̃ wo ŋu o , ke boŋ mide ha kple ame gblɔewo . Migabu be yewonya nu sia nu o .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Migaɖo vɔ ̃ vɔ ̃ teƒe o . Miwɔ nuwo ale be ame sia ame nate ŋu akpɔe be mienye nyateƒetɔwo le goawo kata ̃ me .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Migawɔ dzre kple ame aɖeke o , ke boŋ minɔ anyi kple ame sia ame le ŋutifafa me abe ale si miate ŋui ene .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , migabia hlɔ ̃ na mia ɖokuiwo o . Migble ̃ hlɔ ̃ biabia ɖe Mawu ƒe asime elabena eya ŋutɔe gblɔ be yeabia hlɔ ̃ ame siwo dze na hlɔ ̃ biabia .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Le hlɔ ̃ biabia teƒe la , ne dɔ le wo ̀ futɔ wum la , na nuɖuɖui . Ne tsikɔ le ewum la , na tsii wo ̀ ano . Ekema a ̃ na ŋu nakpee le nu si wo ̀ wɔ ɖe ŋuwo ̀ la ta .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Me ̀ gana nu vɔ ̃ naɖu dziwo ̀ o , ke boŋ tsɔ nu nyui wɔwɔ ɖu nu vɔ ̃ dzii .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Miɖo to dziɖuɖu la , elabena Mawue nye ame si ɖo dziɖuɖu la anyi . Dziɖuɖu aɖeke mele afi aɖeke si Mawu ŋutɔ metsɔ ŋuse ̃ na o .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Eya ta ame sia ame si gbe dukɔa ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ la , gbe Mawu ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ eye tohehe adze nu sia yome .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Elabena kpovitɔ medoa ŋɔdzi na ame siwo le nu nyui wɔm o , ke ame siwo le nu vɔ ̃ wɔm la , avɔ ̃ kpovitɔ ɣesiaɣi . Eya ta ne me ̀ di be yeanɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m o la , wɔ seawo dzi kpoo ekema eme anyo na wo ̀ .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Mawue ɖo kpovitɔ la ɖa be wo ̀ akpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ . Ke ne e ̀ le nu vɔ ̃ aɖe wɔm la , eme kɔ ƒa ̃ a be a ̃ nɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m elabena kpovitɔ la ana woahe to na wo ̀ . Nu sia tututu tae Mawu ɖoe ɖa .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Eya ta miwɔ seawo dzi le nu eve siawo ta : gba ̃ , be miagaxɔ tohehe o ; evelia , elabena mienyae xoxo be ele be yewoawɔ seawo dzi .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Midzɔ miaƒe dugawo ha ̃ le nu eve siawo ke ta , elabena ele be woaxe fe na dziɖuɖudɔwɔlawo ale be woate ŋu anɔ Mawu ƒe dɔ la wɔm , anɔ kpekpem ɖe mia ŋu .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Mixe fe na ame sia ame abe ale si wo ̀ dzee ene . Mixe miaƒe dugawo kple adzɔwo dzidzɔtɔe . Miɖo to miaƒe tatɔwo eye mitsɔ bubu na ame sia ame si dze bubu .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Migana naneke ƒe fe natsi mia ŋu o negbe ame bubuwo lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe fe ko . Migaxe ame bubuwo lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe fe sia vɔ gbeɖe o ! Elabena ne mielɔ ̃ wo la , miawɔ Mawu ƒe sewo kata ̃ dzi eye miawɔ nu sia nu si Mawu bia tso mia si .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ne e ̀ lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe ale si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ wo ̀ ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ene la , ma ̃ di be yeawɔ nu vevii , abae , awui , alo afi eƒe naneke o . Gawu la , ma ̃ wɔ nu vɔ ̃ kple hawo ̀ vi srɔ ̃ alo adi nu si nye etɔ alo awɔ nu bubu aɖeke si Se Ewoawo gblɔ be menyo o la ɖe eŋu o . Seawo kata ̃ ƒe ƒuƒoƒoe nye esia be na ̃ lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe ale si ne ̀ lɔ ̃ ɖokuiwo ene .

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Lɔlɔ ̃ naa womedaa vo ɖe ame aɖeke ŋu o . Eya tae wo ̀ sɔ ɖe nu siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ le be mi ́ awɔ la dzi . Se ɖeka sia koe miehi ̃ a .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Nu bubu si ta wo ̀ le be mianɔ agbe nyui nye be : mienya be ɣeyiɣi boo megali o . Minyɔ elabena Aƒetɔ la ƒe vava tu aƒe fifia wu ale si mi ́ exɔe se tsa ̃ .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Za ̃ la va yi vɔ , ŋu le kekem azɔ ! Eya ta mina mi ́ aɖe asi le vivitimenuwɔwɔwo ŋu eye mi ́ ado kekeli ƒe akpoxɔnuwo .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Mina mi ́ awɔ nu dzeame , abe ale si nyo le ŋkeke me ene , menye le aglotutuwo kple ahamumuwo , menye le ahasiwɔwɔwo kple hadzedzewo eye menye le dzrewɔwɔ kple ŋuʋaʋa ̃ me o .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Ke boŋ mibia Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo be wo ̀ akpe ɖe mia ŋu be mianɔ agbe abe ale si dze ene . Migakpɔ dzidzɔ le nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ŋu o .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Mixɔ nɔvi ɖe sia ɖe si adi be yeage ɖe hamea me la nyuie , ne eƒe xɔse mese ̃ ŋu o ha ̃ . Migahe nya ɖe eŋu le eƒe susu siwo to vovo tso mia tɔwo gbɔ la ŋu le nu si nyo alo nu si menyo o la ta o .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Le kpɔɖeŋu me , migahe nya kplii be enyo be wo ̀ aɖu la ̃ si wotsɔ sa vɔe na legbawo loo alo menyo o . Mixɔe se be nu vɔ ̃ aɖeke mele nu sia me o , ke ame bubuwo ƒe xɔse gbɔdzɔ wu mia tɔ . Woawo bu be menyo o eye woagbe la ̃ ɖuɖu kura aɖu amagbewo ko ɖe la ̃ ma tɔgbi ɖuɖu teƒe .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Mele be ame siwo bu be enyo be woaɖu la ̃ ma tɔgbi la nado vlo ame siwo mebui nenema o . Ne mienye ame siwo meɖui o la , migaɖe vodada na ame siwo aɖui o . Elabena Mawu xɔ wo be woanye ye viwo .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Mawu ƒe subɔlawo wonye , menye miawo ƒe subɔlawo wonye o . Mawue wole agbe na , menye miawoe wole agbe na o . Mina Mawu nana woanya ne wo tɔ dzɔ loo alo wo tɔ medzɔ o . Mawu ate ŋu ana woawɔ nu si wo ̀ le be woawɔ .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Ame aɖewo bu be ele be woawɔ kristotɔwo ƒe ŋkekenyuiwo kple ŋkeke tɔxɛwo ŋudɔ atsɔ asubɔ Mawu , ke ame aɖewo gblɔ be , menyo o eye wo ̀ nye abunɛnu be woaɖe fu na ame ɖokui nenema , elabena ŋkeke sia ŋkeke nye Mawu tɔ . Ele be ame sia ame natso nya siawo tɔgbi me na eɖokui .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Ne ŋkeke tɔxɛwo le mia si hena Aƒetɔ la subɔsubɔ la , miele agbagba dzem be yewoade bubu eŋu eye wo ̀ nye nu nyui aɖe miele wɔwɔm . Nenema kee nye ame si ɖu la ̃ si wotsɔ sa vɔe na legbawo ; eda akpe na Aƒetɔ la ɖe eta . Eya ha ̃ wɔe nyuie . Ame si madi be yeaɖu la ̃ ma tɔgbi o la ha ̃ di be yeadze Aƒetɔ la ŋu eye wo ̀ le akpe dam .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Menye aƒetɔwo mi ́ enye na mi ́ a ɖokuiwo be mi ́ anɔ agbe alo aku abe ale si mi ́ awo ŋutɔ mi ́ atia la ene o .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Ne mi ́ ele agbe o , mi ́ eku o , mi ́ edzea Aƒetɔ la yome eye mi ́ enye etɔwo le go eveawo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe me .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Nu sia tututu tae Kristo ku eye wo ̀ gatsi tsitre ale be yeate ŋu anye mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ ne mi ́ ele agbe o , mi ́ eku o .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Me ̀ kpɔ mɔ na ̃ ɖe vodada na nɔviwo ̀ alo na ̃ do vloe o . Đo ŋku edzi bena mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe atsi tsitre ɖe Mawu ƒe Ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ zikpui la ŋgɔ .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Elabena woŋlɔe ɖi bena Aƒetɔ la gblɔ be , “ Esi mele agbe la , ame sia ame adze klo nam eye aɖe sia aɖe aʋu nya me na Mawu . ”

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Nyateƒe ame sia ame ana akɔnta tso eɖokui ŋu na Mawu .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Eya ta me ̀ gaɖe vodada na nɔviwo ̀ azɔ o . Le esia teƒe la , dze agbagba eye na ̃ nɔ agbe ale be ma ̃ nye nuɖiaɖia na nɔviwo ̀ ne wo ̀ akpɔ wo ̀ na ̃ nɔ nu si eya bu be menyo o la wɔm o .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Le nye ŋutɔ gome la , meka ɖe Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe ŋuse ̃ dzi be naneke megble ̃ le la ̃ si wotsɔ sa vɔe na legbawo la ɖuɖu ŋu o . Ke ne ame aɖe ya xɔe se be menyo o la , ekema mele be wo ̀ aɖui o elabena menyo le eya gbɔ o .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Eye ne nu si na ̃ ɖu anye nuɖiaɖia na nɔviwo ̀ la , me ̀ le nu wɔm le lɔlɔ ̃ me , ne e ̀ ɖui o . Me ̀ gana wo ̀ nuɖuɖu nagble ̃ nu le ame si ta Yesu ku ɖo la ŋu o .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Me ̀ gawɔ nu si ana amewo naɖe vodada na wo ̀ o , togbɔ be e ̀ nya be nu si yewɔ la nyo hafi ha ̃ .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Elabena le nuwo kata ̃ megbe la , nu si le vevie na mi ́ kristotɔwo la , menye nu si mi ́ eɖu alo nu si mi ́ eno o , ke boŋ be mi ́ ana Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la nana amenuveve , ŋutifafa kple dzidzɔ mi ́ .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Ne miena Kristo nye Aƒetɔ le nu siawo me la , dzi adzɔ Mawu eye ame bubuwo ha ̃ akpɔ dzidzɔ .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Eya ta mina miaƒe taɖodzinu nanye be nusɔsɔe nanɔ hamea me eye miadze agbagba ado ŋuse ̃ mia nɔewo .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Migana la ̃ kɔ ɖeka nagble ̃ Mawu ƒe dɔwɔwɔ me o . Miɖo ŋku edzi be naneke megble ̃ le la ̃ ŋu o , ke enye nu vɔ ̃ be na ̃ ɖui eye wo ̀ azu nuɖiaɖia na ame bubu .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Nu nyuitɔ si na ̃ wɔe nye na ̃ ɖe asi le la ̃ ɖuɖu alo ahanono alo nu sia nu si wɔwɔ aɖia nɔviwo ̀ nu alo ana wo ̀ awɔ nu vɔ ̃ la ŋu .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: A ̀ nya be nu gbegble ̃ aɖeke mele nu si yewɔ la ŋu le Mawu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ gbɔ o , ke wɔe na ɖokuiwo ̀ ko . Me ̀ gaɖe wo ̀ nu si ne ̀ xɔ se be enyo la fia le ame bubu siwo nu wo ̀ aɖia la ŋkume o . Le go sia me la , woayra ame si mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ to nu si wo ̀ nya be enyo la wɔwɔ me o .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Ke ame sia ame si xɔ se be nu si yedi be yeawɔ menyo o la , mele be wo ̀ awɔe o . Ne ewɔe la , ewɔ nu vɔ ̃ elabena ebu be menyo o , eya ta nua menyo na eya o . Nu sia nu si wo ̀ awɔ to nu si wo ̀ nya be enyo gbɔ la , nye nu vɔ ̃ .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Ehia ̃ be , mi ́ ame siwo ŋu ŋuse ̃ le la mi ́ atsɔ ame siwo ŋu ŋuse ̃ mele o la ƒe gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔwo eye mi ́ agadze mi ́ a ɖokui ŋu o .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Mi ́ a dome ame sia ame nadze ehavi ŋu hena ehavi ƒe nyonyo kple tutuɖedzi .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Kristo mewɔ nu be yeadze ye ɖokui ŋu o . Abe ale si Psalmokpala gblɔe ene la , “ Eva be yeakpe fu eye yeaxɔ dzudzu tso ame siwo tututu tsi tsitre ɖe Aƒetɔ la ŋu la gbɔ . ”

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Ele be nu siwo woŋlɔ ɖe Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la me gbe aɖe gbe ke la nafia dzigbɔɖi mi ́ eye wo ̀ ade dzi ƒo na mi ́ ale be mi ́ anɔ mɔ kpɔm na ɣeyiɣi si Mawu aɖu nu vɔ ̃ kple ku dzi .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Mawu , ame si naa dzigbɔɖi kple tenɔnɔ kpakple dzideƒo ame la , nakpe ɖe mia ŋu be mianɔ anyi kple mia nɔewo le nɔvilɔlɔ ̃ blibo me eye ame sia ame natsɔ Kristo ƒe nɔnɔme anɔ agbe ɖe nɔvia ŋu .

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ekema mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ate ŋu atsɔ gbe ɖeka akafu Aƒetɔ la , atsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe ana Mawu , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo Fofo .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Eya ta mixɔ mia nɔewo nyuie ɖe hame la me abe ale si Kristo ŋutɔ ha ̃ xɔ mi ene , ekema miatsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe ana Mawu .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Miɖo ŋku edzi be Yesu Kristo va be yeafia be Mawu wɔa eƒe ŋugbedodowo dzi eye be yeakpe ɖe Yudatɔwo ŋu .

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Migaɖo ŋku edzi ha ̃ be eva be Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ nakpɔ ɖeɖe eye woatsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe ana Mawu le ale si wo ̀ vea wo nu la ta . Nu siae Psalmokpala la fia esi wo ̀ ŋlɔ bena , “ Makafu wo ̀ le Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo dome eye madzi ha na wo ̀ ŋkɔ . ”

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Le teƒe bubu aɖe la , egagblɔ be , “ O , Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , mikpɔ dzidzɔ kple Mawu ƒe amewo , Yudatɔwo . ”

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Egagblɔ le teƒe bubu ha ̃ be , “ O , Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , mikafu Aƒetɔ la , mina ame sia ame nakafui . ”

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Nyagblɔɖila Yeseya gblɔ be , “ Domenyila aɖe atso Isai ƒe aƒe me eye wo ̀ aɖu fia ɖe Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo dzi . ”

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Eya ta mele gbe dom ɖa ɖe mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ta be Mawu , ame si naa mɔkpɔkpɔ mi la , nana dzidzɔ kple ŋutifafa nayɔ mia me le esi miexɔ edzi se ta . Mele gbe dom ɖa be Mawu nakpe ɖe mia ŋu be mɔkpɔkpɔ le Mawu me nagba go le mia me to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ƒe ŋuse ̃ si le mia me la me .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Nɔvinyewo , menya be mienye ame nyanuwo kple ame nyuiwo eye mienya nu siawo nyuie ale be miate ŋu afia nu ame bubuwo tso wo kata ̃ ŋu .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Metsɔ dzideƒo ŋlɔ nya aɖewo na mi abe ŋkuɖoɖo nu dzi na mi ene to amenuveve si Mawu nam la me

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: be manye Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔtsɔla na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , eye be matsɔ Mawu ƒe nyanyui la vɛ na mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo be miazu vɔsa si dze Mawu ŋu si ŋu Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la kɔ .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Eya ta mekpɔ mɔ maƒo adegbe vie le nu siwo kata ̃ Kristo Yesu wɔ to dzinye la ŋu .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Mele be mabu akɔnta le ale si wo ̀ wɔ ame bubuwo ŋudɔ la ŋu o , ke menya esia be : eto dzinye eye wo ̀ he Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo va Mawu gbɔe .

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: Meɖe wo kple nye gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe kpakple nye agbe nyui si menɔ le woƒe ŋkume hekpe ɖe nukunu siwo wowɔ to dzinye abe dzesiwo tso Mawu gbɔ ene la ŋu . Esiawo kata ̃ tso Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe ŋuse ̃ me . Meɖe gbeƒa ̃ Kristo ƒe nyanyui blibo la to mɔ sia dzi tso keke Yerusalem yi ɖado ɖe Iliriko ke .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Ke enye nye didi vevi be magayi ŋgɔ wu nenema gɔ ̃ ha ̃ eye maɖe gbeƒa ̃ nyanyui la le teƒe siwo womese Kristo ŋkɔ le kpɔ haɖe o . Esia dzrom wu be maɖe gbeƒa ̃ le afi si ame bubu aɖe ɖo hame aɖe anyi ɖo xoxo .

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: Menɔ zɔzɔm ɖe ɖoɖo si ŋu woƒo nu le le Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔea me la nu . Afi siae Yesaya gblɔ le be , “ Ame siwo mese Kristo ŋkɔ kpɔ haɖe o la , woakpɔ nu eye woase egɔme . ”

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Nu sia tututu tae nyemete ŋu va kpɔ mi ɖa kaba o .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: Ke mewu nye dɔ la nu le afi sia mlɔeba azɔ eye mele klalo be mava le ƒe geɖe siwo melala la megbe .

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: Mele tame ɖom be mayi Spania . Ne meyina la , matɔ ɖe Roma eye ne menɔ anyi kpli mi le dzidzɔ me ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe la , miagate ŋu ado mɔm .

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: Ke hafi mava la , ele be mayi Yerusalem gba ̃ eye matsɔ nunana aɖe ayi na Yudatɔ siwo nye kristotɔwo le afi ma .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Elabena kristotɔ siwo le Makedonia kple Akaya la di nanewo be yewoaɖo ɖe nɔvi siwo le Yerusalem , ame siwo le ɣeyiɣi sese ̃ aɖe ŋutɔ me tom .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Edzɔ dzi na wo ŋutɔ be woawɔ esia elabena wodze sii be yewonyi akpedafe ga ̃ aɖe le kristotɔ siwo le Yerusalem la si . Nu ka ta ? Elabena nya tso Kristo ŋu va na Trɔ ̃ subɔla siawo tso hame si le Yerusalem la gbɔ . Tso esime woxɔ nyanyui la ƒe gbɔgbɔmenunana sia tso afi ma la , wodze sii be nu suetɔ si yewo ha ̃ yewoate ŋu awɔ lae nye yewoakpe ɖe wo ŋu kple anyigbadzinu aɖewo .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Ne metsɔ ga sia na wo eye mewu dɔ nyui si wowɔ na wo nɔviwo nu na wo la , mava kpɔ mi ɖa ne mele Spania yim .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Meka ɖe edzi be ne meva la , Aƒetɔ la ana yayra geɖem matsɔ vɛ na mi .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Miado gbe ɖa kplim maha ̃ ? Le Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ta kple miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nam si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la tsɔ na mi ta la , mido gbe ɖa vevie ɖe tanye .

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: Mido gbe ɖa be Mawu nakpɔ tanye le Yerusalem tso ame siwo menye kristotɔwo o la sime . Mido gbe ɖa ha ̃ be kristotɔ siwo le afi ma la nalɔ ̃ axɔ ga si metsɔ yina na wo .

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: Ekema ne Mawu lɔ ̃ la , mate ŋu ava mia gbɔ kple dzidzɔ eye mi ́ ade agbe yeye mi ́ a nɔewo me .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ke azɔ la , mi ́ a Mawu , ame si naa ŋutifafa la nanɔ anyi kpli mi kata ̃ Amen .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Mele Foibe , mi ́ a nɔvinyɔnu , ame si nye subɔla le Kenkrea hame me la kafum na mi .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Mele biabiam tso mia si be miaxɔe abe ale si dze le Aƒetɔ la me ene , eye le mɔ sia mɔ si dze ame kɔkɔewo la nu miakpe ɖe eŋu le nu sia nu si ahia ̃ e la me . Elabena ekpe ɖe ame geɖewo ŋu le woƒe hiahia ̃ wo me . Ekpe ɖe nye ŋutɔ ha ̃ ŋu .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Mido gbe na Priskila kple Akwila nam . Wonye nye hadɔwɔlawo le Kristo Yesu ƒe dɔ la me .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Wotsɔ woƒe agbe de xaxa me ɖe tanye . Menye nye ɖeka koe le akpe dam na wo o . Ame siwo kata ̃ le Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo zu kristotɔwo ƒe hamewo me la ha ̃ le akpe dam na wo .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Mido gbe na ame siwo kata ̃ kpea ta hesubɔa Mawu le woƒe aƒewo me la nam . Mido gbe na xɔ ̃ nye vevi , Epeneto , ha ̃ nam . Eyae nye ame gba ̃ tɔ si zu kristotɔ le Asia .

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: Mido gbe na Maria ha ̃ , ame si wɔ dɔ sesi ̃ e hekpe ɖe mi ́ a ŋu la , nam .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Andronika kple Yunia ha ̃ li ; woawoe nye nye ƒometɔ siwo nɔ gaxɔ me kplim . Apostoloawo bua wo eye wozu kristotɔ hafi meva zui . Mido gbe na wo nam .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Mido gbe na Ampliato , ame si melɔ ̃ na abe Mawu ŋutɔ viwo dometɔ ɖeka ene

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: kple Urbano , mi ́ aƒe hadɔwɔla kpakple Stakis nam .

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: Apeles , ame nyui si ŋu Mawu kpɔ ŋudzedze le la ha ̃ li . Mido gbe nɛ nam . Mitsɔ nye gbedoname nyuitɔ na ame siwo le dɔ wɔm le Aristobulo ƒe aƒeme .

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: Medo gbe na nye ƒometɔ Herodion kple kluvi siwo nye kristotɔwo le Narkiso ƒe aƒe me ,

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: kple Trifena kpakple Trifosa , ame siwo nye Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔwɔlawo kple Persis lɔlɔ ̃ a , ame si wɔ dɔ sesi ̃ e ŋutɔ na Aƒetɔ la .

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Medo gbe na Rufo , ame si Aƒetɔ la tia be wo ̀ anye ye ŋutɔ tɔ kple dadaa lɔlɔ ̃ a , ame si kpɔ dzinye abe danye ene .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Mido gbe na Asinkrito , Flego , Herme , Patroba , Herma kple nɔvi bubu siwo kata ̃ le gbɔ .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Migblɔ na Filologo , Yunia , Nereo kple nɔvianyɔnu kple Olimpa kpakple kristotɔ bubu siwo kata ̃ le wo gbɔ la be medo gbe na wo .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Mitsɔ nugbugbɔ kɔkɔe do gbe na mia nɔewo nam . Hame siwo kata ̃ le afi sia la do gbe na mi kata ̃ .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Nya ɖeka gale asinye magblɔ hafi awu agbale ̃ sia nu . Migade ha kple ame siwo dea mama amewo dome , naa amewo ƒe xɔse trana eye wofiaa nu siwo tsi tre ɖe nu siwo wofia mi tso Kristo ŋuti la o .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Nufiala siawo mele dɔ wɔm na mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo o , ke boŋ woawo ŋutɔ ƒe viɖe ko dim wole . Woƒoa nu nyuie eye woblea susu wodzoe tɔwo enuenu .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Ke ame sia ame nya be miawo ya la mienye nuteƒewɔlawo . Nu sia doa dzidzɔ ga ̃ nam . Medi be mianya nu tso nu si nyo la ŋu ɣesiaɣi eye miavo tso nu vɔ ̃ ɖe sia ɖe me .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Esusɔ vie Ŋutifafa ƒe Mawu la nagba ̃ Satana ɖe miaƒe afɔ te gudugudu . Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe yayra nava mia dzi .

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: Timoteo , nye hadɔwɔla , kple Lukio , Yason kple Sosipatro , nye ƒometɔwo do gbe na mi .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Nye Tertio , ame si le agbale ̃ sia ŋlɔm na Paulo la , nye ha ̃ medo gbe na mi abe mia nɔvi kristotɔ ɖeka ene .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: Gayo be mado gbe na mi . Eya ƒe amedzroe menye eye hamea kpea ta le afii le eƒe aƒe me . Erasto , ame si nye dugadzikpɔla kple Kuarto , nɔvi kristotɔ aɖe , do gbe na mi .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe amenuveve nanɔ anyi kpli mi kata ̃ .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
text2: Azɔ ame si te ŋu ɖo mia gɔme anyi to nye nyanyui kple gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe Yesu Kristo me esiae nye ɖoɖo si woɣla ɖe mi tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea me ke .

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: Ke azɔ la abe ale si nyagblɔɖilawo gblɔe do ŋgɔ eye abe ale si Mawu mavɔtɔ la de se ene la , wole gbeƒa ̃ ɖem na dukɔwo kata ̃ be woaxɔe ase eye woaɖo to eya amea .

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Mawu ame si ɖeka koe nye nunyatɔ to Yesu Kristo dzi la , tɔ nanye ŋutikɔkɔe la yi ɖe mavɔmavɔ me ! Amen .

text: Paul , called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
text2: " Agbale ̃ sia tso nye , Paulo , Yesu Kristo ƒe apostolo , si woyɔ to Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu me la kple nɔvi Sostenes gbɔ

text: Unto the church of God which is at Corinth , to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus , called to be saints , with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord , both theirs and ours :
text2: na Mawu ƒe hame si le Korinto , ame siwo ŋu . wokɔ le Kristo Yesu me eye woyɔ wo be woanɔ Kɔkɔe la kpakple ame siwo kata ̃ le xexeame godoo xɔ mi ́ a Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔa dzi se abe wo ƒe Aƒetɔ kple mi ́ a Aƒetɔ ene .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu mi ́ a Fofo kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo nayra mi eye wo ̀ ana be miakpɔ ŋutifafa le miaƒe dziwo kple tamesusuwo me .

text: I thank my God always on your behalf , for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ ;
text2: Mele akpedada dzi ɖaa na Mawu le nunana tɔxɛ siwo wo ̀ na mi le esime miezu kristotɔ azɔ la ta . "

text: That in every thing ye are enriched by him , in all utterance , and in all knowledge ;
text2: Ena be miaƒe agbanɔnɔ de blibo eye nu sia nu su mia si azɔ . Ena ŋuse ̃ mi be miate ŋu aƒo nu kple dzideƒo le Yesu Kristo ŋuti eye wo ̀ na be miake ɖe nu si nye nyateƒe la ŋu azɔ .

text: Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you :
text2: Nu si megblɔ be Yesu Kristo awɔ na mi la va eme pɛpɛpɛ abe ale si megblɔe ene .

text: So that ye come behind in no gift ; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Azɔ la , Mawu ƒe amenuveve manyagblɔ kple eƒe yayra su mia si . Le ɣeyiɣi sia me , esime miele mi ́ a Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe vava zi evelia lalam la , Mawu na gbɔgbɔmenunana vovovowo kple ŋuse ̃ tɔxɛ , si ana be miate ŋu anɔ eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu wɔm la mi .

text: Who shall also confirm you unto the end , that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , Mawu do ŋugbe be , tso fifia va se ɖe nuwuwu la , ame aɖeke makpɔ nu vɔ ̃ aɖeke le mia ŋu o eye womabu fɔ mi le ŋkeke si dzi Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo agatrɔ ava la dzi o .

text: God is faithful , by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Kakaɖedzi blibo le asinye be Mawu awɔ esia na mi elabena medana le eƒe ŋugbedodo dzi gbeɖe o . Gawu la Mawu ŋutɔe yɔ mi be miava zu Yesu Kristo xɔlɔ ̃ wo .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye all speak the same thing , and that there be no divisions among you ; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment .
text2: Nɔviwo , metsɔ Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo le kuku ɖem na mi be miadzɔdzɔ nyahehe vivivo le mia nɔewo dome . Mina nusɔsɔ blibo nanɔ mia me ale be mama kukluiwo nagava mia dome o . Meɖe kuku na mi be miawɔ ɖeka le susu kple ɖoɖowo wɔwɔ me .

text: For it hath been declared unto me of you , my brethren , by them which are of the house of Chloe , that there are contentions among you .
text2: Nɔvinye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo , mia nɔvi siwo le aƒetɔ Kloe ƒe aƒeme la dometɔ aɖewo fi tofi nam be , nyahehe kple dzre sɔŋ ko dzi miele .

text: Now this I say , that every one of you saith , I am of Paul ; and I of Apollos ; and I of Cephas ; and I of Christ .
text2: Mia dometɔ aɖewo le gbɔgblɔm be , yewo la Paulo yomedzelawo yewonye ; bubuwo be Apoloe nye yewoƒe amega ̃ . Ame aɖewo ha ̃ be Petro ƒe amewo yewonye , gawu la ame aɖewo ha ̃ be yewo koe nye Yesu Kristo yomedzela vava ̃ wo .

text: Is Christ divided ? was Paul crucified for you ? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul ?
text2: Miaƒe nuwɔna sia na wo ̀ le dzedzem abe ɖe Kristo ma ɖe akpa vovovowo me ene . Ke medi be mabia mi se be , nye Pauloe ku ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta ha ̃ ? Alo wode mawutsi ta na mia dometɔ aɖe le nye ŋkɔ dzia ?

text: I thank God that I baptized none of you , but Crispus and Gaius ;
text2: Edzɔ dzi nam ŋutɔ eye meda akpe na Mawu vevie be Krispo kple Gayo ɖeɖe koe nye ame siwo nye ŋutɔ mede mawutsi ta na le mia dome .

text: Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name .
text2: Eya ta fifia la , ame aɖeke mate ŋu agblɔ be mehe nu yeye aɖeke vɛ alo be mele nye ŋutɔ nye ha yeye tɔxɛ aɖe ɖom o .

text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas : besides , I know not whether I baptized any other .
text2: E ̃ , meɖo ŋku edzi be mede mawutsi ta na Stefano kple eƒe aƒemetɔwo ha ̃ . Le woawo megbe la , nyemegade mawutsi ta na ame bubu aɖeke kura o .

text: For Christ sent me not to baptize , but to preach the gospel : not with wisdom of words , lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect .
text2: Elabena Yesu Kristo meɖom ɖa be mava de mawutsi ta na amewo o ke boŋ be magblɔ nyanyui la . Ke ha ̃ la nye nyagblɔgblɔ la meɖea kpe tututu o elabena ne mele mawunya gblɔm la , nyemeɖea ami ɖe nye nyawo o , elabena nyemedi be matɔtɔ ŋuse ̃ blibo si le Yesu ƒe atitsogaŋunya la me kple amegbetɔwo ƒe nunya o .

text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness ; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God .
text2: Menya nyuie be ne ame siwo le mɔ tram eye wole bubum la se be Yesu ku be yeaɖe wo la , aɖi bometsinya na wo . Ke nya sia nye Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ na mi ́ ame siwo kpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: For it is written , I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent .
text2: Elabena Mawu ŋutɔ gblɔ be , “ Magble ̃ amegbetɔwo ƒe ɖoɖo siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ wɔ hena ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ la me , ale ke ke nyasa ̃ anɔ emee ha ̃ eye maŋe aɖaba aƒu woƒe susuwo keŋ dzi . ”

text: Where is the wise ? where is the scribe ? where is the disputer of this world ? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
text2: Ekema ale ke wo ̀ anɔ na xexemegbale ̃ nyala ga ̃ wo kple nunyala ga ̃ wo kata ̃ ? Mawu na wo kata ̃ wodze abe bometsilawo kple numanyalawo ene .

text: For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God , it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe .
text2: Elabena , to nunya me la Mawu wɔe be xexeametɔwo mate ŋu ake ɖe Mawu ŋu gbeɖe to woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nunya alo ŋuse ̃ me o . Ke boŋ esi ɣeyiɣia de tututu ko la Mawu ŋutɔ na bena ame siwo kata ̃ xɔ eƒe nyanyui , si xexeametɔwo ya buna be enye bometsinya la dzi se la , kpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: For the Jews require a sign , and the Greeks seek after wisdom :
text2: Yudatɔwo dia nukunu kple dzesiwo , eye Griktɔwo dia xexemenunya ,

text: But we preach Christ crucified , unto the Jews a stumblingblock , and unto the Greeks foolishness ;
text2: ke mi ́ awo ya mi ́ eɖea gbeƒa ̃ Kristo ame si wokla ̃ ɖe ati ŋuti , nu si nye nukikli na Yudatɔwo kple bometsinya na Helatɔwo ,

text: But unto them which are called , both Jews and Greeks , Christ the power of God , and the wisdom of God .
text2: ke hena ame siwo Mawu yɔ la , Yudatɔwo kple Griktɔwo siaa la , Kristoe nye Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ kple nunya .

text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men ; and the weakness of God is stronger than men .
text2: Elabena Mawu ƒe bometsinya xɔ asi wu amewo ƒe nunya eye Mawu ƒe gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ sese ̃ wu amewo ƒe ŋuse ̃ .

text: For ye see your calling , brethren , how that not many wise men after the flesh , not many mighty , not many noble , are called :
text2: Nɔviwo , ne miele ́ ŋku ɖe mia nɔewo dome la , miakpɔe be mi ́ ame siwo le Kristo yome la , dometɔ ʋee aɖewo koe nye amega ̃ wo alo ame ŋkutatɔwo .

text: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise ; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty ;
text2: Ke boŋ Mawu ɖe wo ̀ ɖoe hetia ame siwo ŋu bubu mele o la be to wo dzi la , yeado ŋukpe xexemenunyala ga ̃ wo kple amega ̃ siwo ŋu bubu le .

text: And base things of the world , and things which are despised , hath God chosen , yea , and things which are not , to bring to nought things that are :
text2: Đoɖo si xexemetɔwo mebu ɖe naneke me o ke boŋ wodo vloe la , eya dzie Mawu to heɖi gbɔ ̃ xexemetɔwo ƒe ɖoɖo ga ̃ wo

text: That no flesh should glory in his presence .
text2: eye le esia ta ame aɖeke mate ŋu atɔ asi akɔ le Mawu ƒe ŋkume be yenye nane o .

text: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus , who of God is made unto us wisdom , and righteousness , and sanctification , and redemption :
text2: Elabena miaƒe agbe tso Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ gbɔ to Yesu Kristo dzi . Yesue fia Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo si wo ̀ wɔ na mi ́ a ɖeɖe la mi ́ . Eya kee wɔ mi ́ mi ́ edze Mawu ŋu . Ewɔ mi ́ mi ́ ezu ame dzadzɛwo kple ame kɔkɔewo , eye wo ̀ tsɔ eɖokui na be yeaɖe mi ́ tso nu vɔ ̃ ƒe kluvinyenye me .

text: That , according as it is written , He that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Mawunya ŋutɔ gblɔe be , “ Ne ame aɖe di be yeaƒo adegbe la ekema neƒo adegbe le nu si Mawu wɔ la ɖeɖe ko ŋu . ”

text: And I , brethren , when I came to you , came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom , declaring unto you the testimony of God .
text2: Nɔviwo , esi meva mia gbɔ zi gba ̃ tɔ la nyemegblɔ mawunya na mi kple susu deŋgɔ boo aɖeke o .

text: For I determined not to know any thing among you , save Jesus Christ , and him crucified .
text2: Elabena meɖoe kplikpaa be nyemagblɔ nya boo aɖeke wu esi ku ɖe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo kple eƒe ku le atitsoga ŋuti la ŋu o .

text: And I was with you in weakness , and in fear , and in much trembling .
text2: Meva mia gbɔ le ɖokuibɔbɔ ga ̃ aɖe me eye menɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m henɔ dzodzom nyanyanya .

text: And my speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man ' s wisdom , but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power :
text2: Nyemeɖe ami ɖe nye mawunyagbɔgblɔ kura o , ke boŋ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋutɔ nɔ menye hedo ŋuse ̃ nye nyawo ale be ame siwo se nyawo la , dze sii be Mawu gbɔe wotso , ke menye xexemenunyala aɖeke ƒe nyawo wonye o .

text: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men , but in the power of God .
text2: Mewɔ esia be miaƒe xɔse nali ke le Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ me ke menye le amewo ƒe nunya nu o .

text: Howbeit we speak wisdom among them that are perfect : yet not the wisdom of this world , nor of the princes of this world , that come to nought :
text2: Ke ne mele kristotɔ siwo de ŋgɔ le gbɔgbɔ me la dome la , meƒoa nu na wo kple nunya tɔxɛ . Ke ha ̃ la , nyemewɔa xexe sia me nunya ŋutidɔ o eye nyemegblɔa nya siwo ƒomevi asɔ tome na ameŋuta siwo le xexeame , ame siwo le tsɔtsrɔ ̃ ge abe ale si Mawu ɖoe anyi ene o .

text: But we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery , even the hidden wisdom , which God ordained before the world unto our glory :
text2: Nya siwo mi ́ egblɔna la tso Mawu ŋutɔ gbɔ , eya ta wonye nya siwo gɔmesese blibo li na eye woɖe Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo tɔxɛ si wowɔ be yeana mi ́ akpɔ dzidzɔ la fia . Togbɔ be wowɔ ɖoɖo sia da ɖi hena mi ́ aƒe viɖekpɔkpɔ hafi xexeame va dzɔ ha ̃ la , enɔ ɣaɣla ɖe mi ́ a tɔgbuiwo .

text: Which none of the princes of this world knew : for had they known it , they would not have crucified the Lord of glory .
text2: Ke nublanuitɔe la , xexe sia me ƒe amega ̃ wo mese ɖoɖoa gɔme o . Nenye ɖe wose egɔme la anye ne womekla ̃ Ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe Aƒetɔ la ɖe atitsoga ŋu o .

text: But as it is written , Eye hath not seen , nor ear heard , neither have entered into the heart of man , the things which God hath prepared for them that love him .
text2: Esia tututue le Mawu ƒe nya la me be , nu si amegbetɔ aɖeke mekpɔ kple ŋku o , nu si ame aɖeke mese kpɔ alo nu si ame aɖeke mesusu ɖe ta me kpɔ gbeɖe o la , eya tututue Mawu dzra ɖo ɖi na ame siwo lɔ ̃ a Aƒetɔ la .

text: But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit : for the Spirit searcheth all things , yea , the deep things of God .
text2: Gake mi ́ awo ya mi ́ enya nu le nu siawo ŋu elabena Mawu ɖo eƒe Gbɔgbɔ ɖe mi ́ be wo ̀ aɖe nu ɣaɣla siawo afia mi ́ eye eƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la dzroa nu sia nu me tsitotsito heɖea Mawu ƒe nu ɣaɣlawo kata ̃ fiaa mi ́ .

text: For what man knoweth the things of a man , save the spirit of man which is in him ? even so the things of God knoweth no man , but the Spirit of God .
text2: Amegbetɔ aɖeke mate ŋu anya nu si le nɔvia ƒe ta me alo ame si ƒomevi tututu ame bubu aɖe nye o , ke amea ŋutɔ koe anya nu si le ta me nɛ . Nenema ke ame aɖeke mate ŋu anya Mawu ƒe susuwo o negbe Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ la ŋutɔ ko .

text: Now we have received , not the spirit of the world , but the spirit which is of God ; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , Mawu tsɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe Gbɔgbɔ na mi ́ be wo ̀ aɖe Mawu ƒe dɔmenyo ƒe nunana ga ̃ si nye eƒe yayra kple amenuveve manyagblɔ la afia mi ́ .

text: Which things also we speak , not in the words which man ' s wisdom teacheth , but which the Holy Ghost teacheth ; comparing spiritual things with spiritual .
text2: Nya siwo tututu Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ na mi ́ la woawoe mi ́ etsɔ ɖe nya me na mi le nunana siawo ŋu , ke menye nya siwo dze mi ́ a ŋutɔwo ŋue megblɔ na mi o . Ale mi ́ eƒoa nu kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe ŋuse ̃ be mi ́ atsɔ aɖe eƒe nyawo me na mi .

text: But the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God : for they are foolishness unto him : neither can he know them , because they are spiritually discerned .
text2: Eya ta ne ame aɖe mexɔ Kristo ƒe Gbɔgbɔ o la mate ŋu ase Mawu ƒe nya siawo gɔme o eye maxɔ wo dzi ase ha ̃ o , elabena Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋutɔe le nya siawo gblɔm . Nya siawo kata ̃ aɖi bometsinya le tome na ame sia tɔgbi elabena ame siwo me Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la le la koe ate ŋu ase nya si gblɔm Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la le la gɔme , ame bubu aɖeke mate ŋu ase egɔme o .

text: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things , yet he himself is judged of no man .
text2: Ke ame si me Gbɔgbɔ la le la , sea , nu sia nu me tsitotsito , eye esia ɖea fu na xexeametɔwo , ame siwo me Gbɔgbɔ la mele o , elabena eya mate ŋu ase nu siawo gɔme o .

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord , that he may instruct him ? But we have the mind of Christ .
text2: Wɔna aɖeke mele ame sia tɔgbi ŋu o , elabena menya Aƒetɔ la ƒe susu o eye medzroa nya me kple Mawu kaka wo ̀ ava yi Mawu yɔ ge to gbedodoɖa me wo ̀ atɔ nɛ o . Gake la enye nukunya be Kristo ƒe ɖoɖowo kple eƒe susuwo ƒe akpa aɖe le mi ́ kristotɔwo me .

text: And I , brethren , could not speak unto you as unto spiritual , but as unto carnal , even as unto babes in Christ .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo , nyemete ŋu ƒo nu na mi abe ame siwo tsi le Gbɔgbɔ me ene o , ke boŋ abe vidzi ̃ wo , ame siwo mede ŋgɔ le kristotɔwo ƒe agbenɔnɔ me o eye wogale agbe le ŋutila ̃ me abe ame siwo menye kristotɔwo o ene .

text: I have fed you with milk , and not with meat : for hitherto ye were not able to bear it , neither yet now are ye able .
text2: Le esia ta nyemate ŋu ana nuɖuɖu sese ̃ mi be miaɖu o , ke boŋ notsi ko mana mi , elabena miaƒe dɔgbowo metsi atu nuɖuɖu sese ̃ o . Va se ɖe fifia ha ̃ la , notsi koe wo ̀ le be mianɔ nonom .

text: For ye are yet carnal : for whereas there is among you envying , and strife , and divisions , are ye not carnal , and walk as men ?
text2: Elabena va se ɖe fifi ha ̃ la , miegale ko abe ɖeviwo ene le kristotɔwo ƒe agbenɔnɔ me . Nu sia nu si dze mia ŋu lae miewɔna ke menye ɖe Mawu ƒe didi dzi o . Nu si tututu fia be mieganye ɖeviwo ko lae nye ale si miema ɖe hatsotso vovovowo me eye dzre , ŋuʋaʋa ̃ kple liʋiliʋi ̃ lili ̃ sɔŋ xɔ aƒe ɖe mia me . Le nyateƒe me la , miaƒe nuwɔnawo dze ko abe ame siwo menya Aƒetɔ la kura o la tɔ ene .

text: For while one saith , I am of Paul ; and another , I am of Apollos ; are ye not carnal ?
text2: Mikpɔ ɖa , mia dometɔ aɖewo le gbɔgblɔm be yewoe nye Paulo ƒe amewo , bubuwo ha ̃ be yewoe nye Apolo yomedzelawo , ale miema Kristo ƒe ha la ɖe akpa eve me . Đe miaƒe nuwɔna sia mesɔ kple Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo tɔ oa ?

text: Who then is Paul , and who is Apollos , but ministers by whom ye believed , even as the Lord gave to every man ?
text2: Ke ame ka tututue nye Apolo alo nye Paulo ŋutɔ , be mianɔ dzre wɔm ɖe mi ́ a ta ? Mawu ƒe dɔla maɖinu siwo wo ̀ na ŋutete tɔxɛ aɖewo ko mi ́ enye eye to mi ́ aƒe dɔwɔwɔwo me la , miexɔ Mawu dzi se .

text: I have planted , Apollos watered ; but God gave the increase .
text2: Dɔ si Mawu de asi nam koe nye be mado nuku la ɖe miaƒe dziwo me , eye Apolo ha ̃ ƒe dɔe nye be wo ̀ ade tsi nukuawo . Ke Mawu ŋutɔe na be nukuawo tsi eye wotse ku le miaƒe dziwo me .

text: So then neither is he that planteth any thing , neither he that watereth ; but God that giveth the increase .
text2: Nukudola kple ame si de tsi nukuawo la ƒe dɔ mele vevie abe Mawu , ame si na be nukuawo tsi la tɔ ene o .

text: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one : and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour .
text2: Nye kple Apolo la , dɔ ɖeka ma ke ko wɔm mi ́ ele . Taɖodzinu ɖeka koe le mi ́ a si , ke Mawu axe fe na mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe le ale si wo ̀ do vevi ɖe eƒe dɔ ŋu la nu .

text: For we are labourers together with God : ye are God ' s husbandry , ye are God ' s building .
text2: Mawu ƒe hadɔwɔlawo ko mi ́ enye , ke miawoe nye Mawu ƒe agble kple eƒe xɔ si wo ̀ tu , menye nye kple Apolo tɔwoe mienye o .

text: According to the grace of God which is given unto me , as a wise masterbuilder , I have laid the foundation , and another buildeth thereon . But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon .
text2: Le eƒe dɔmenyo manyagblɔ ta la , Mawu na xɔtutu ƒe aɖaŋum eye nye ha ̃ medze agbagba ɖo gɔme ɖokpe anyi , ke Apoloe va tu xɔa yi edzi . Ele be ame si le xɔa tum ɖe gɔmeɖokpea dzi la nakpɔ egbɔ be yetui nyuie .

text: For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid , which is Jesus Christ .
text2: Elabena ame aɖeke mate ŋu aɖo gɔmeɖokpe bubu aɖeke anyi si to vovo tso esi li xoxo , si nye Yesu Kristo la gbɔ o .

text: Now if any man build upon this foundation gold , silver , precious stones , wood , hay , stubble ;
text2: Gake xɔtunu vovovowo li si woate ŋu atsɔ atu xɔe ɖe gɔmeɖokpea dzi . Ame aɖewo tua xɔ kple sika , klosalo alo kpe xɔasi bubuwo , ame bubuwo ha ̃ tsɔa ati , aɖa alo be gɔ ̃ ha ̃ tua xɔe .

text: Every man ' s work shall be made manifest : for the day shall declare it , because it shall be revealed by fire ; and the fire shall try every man ' s work of what sort it is .
text2: Ke ele be ame sia ame naɖo ŋku edzi be , ne Kristo ƒe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ŋkeke la ɖo edzi la , woado xɔtunu vovovoawo kpɔ . Woatsɔ dzo ado ame sia ame ƒe dɔwɔna kpɔ , akpɔe ɖa be eƒe dɔ la anɔ te maha ̃ ?

text: If any man ' s work abide which he hath built thereupon , he shall receive a reward .
text2: Ame siwo ƒe dɔ mefia le dzo me o la , axɔ wo ƒe fetu .

text: If any man ' s work shall be burned , he shall suffer loss : but he himself shall be saved ; yet so as by fire .
text2: Ke ne ame aɖe ƒe xɔ fia le dzoa me la ekema ebu nu ga ̃ aɖe , gake woaɖe eya ŋutɔ abe ame si woɖe le dzobibi me ene .

text: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God , and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you ?
text2: Đe mienyae bena , Mawu ƒe xɔe mienye eye Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ le mia me oa ?

text: If any man defile the temple of God , him shall God destroy ; for the temple of God is holy , which temple ye are .
text2: Ne ame aɖe katse , do ŋunyɔ eye wo ̀ gble ̃ Mawu ƒe aƒe sia la , Mawu ha ̃ atsrɔ ̃ ame ma enumake . Elabena , Mawu ƒe aƒe la nye teƒe kɔkɔe si me ɖiƒoƒo aɖeke mele o eye miawo tututue nye aƒe sia .

text: Let no man deceive himself . If any man among you seemeth to be wise in this world , let him become a fool , that he may be wise .
text2: Mikpɔ nyuie be miaganɔ mia ɖokuiwo flum o . Ne mia dometɔ aɖe bu be yenyaa nu ŋutɔ le amewo ƒe nukpɔkpɔ nu la , ekema ele be wo ̀ awɔ eɖokui bometsilae hafi ate ŋu anye nunyala vava ̃ tɔ tso dziƒo .

text: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God . For it is written , He taketh the wise in their own craftiness .
text2: Elabena xexe sia me ƒe nunyawo kata ̃ nye bometsitsi le Mawu ƒe ŋkume . Nu sia tututue woŋlɔ ɖe Hiob ƒe agbale ̃ me be , “ Mawu tre mɔ na amegbetɔ kple eya amegbetɔ ŋutɔ ƒe nunya ”

text: And again , The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise , that they are vain .
text2: Wogagblɔe na mi ́ le Psalmowo ƒe agbale ̃ ha ̃ me be , “ Aƒetɔ la nyae be amegbetɔwo ƒe susuwo kata ̃ le wodzoe abe ɖetifu ko ene . ”

text: Therefore let no man glory in men . For all things are yours ;
text2: Eya ta nɔviwo , miganɔ dadam ɖe mia nɔewo dzi o , elabena Mawu tsɔ nu sia nu si hia ̃ mi la na mi xoxo .

text: Whether Paul , or Apollos , or Cephas , or the world , or life , or death , or things present , or things to come ; all are yours ;
text2: Etsɔ Paulo , Apolo kple Kefa na mi be woakpe ɖe mia ŋu . Mawu gatsɔ xexeame blibo , agbe , ku , egbe ŋkeke kple etsɔ si gbɔna la ha ̃ na mi .

text: And ye are Christ ' s ; and Christ is God ' s .
text2: Nu siawo kata ̃ nye mia tɔ , eye miawo ha ̃ mienye Kristo tɔ eye Kristo ha ̃ nye Mawu tɔ .

text: Let a man so account of us , as of the ministers of Christ , and stewards of the mysteries of God .
text2: Eya ta ele be miakpɔ Apolo kple nye Paulo ŋutɔ abe Kristo ƒe subɔlawo ko ene . Mi ́ aƒe dɔe nye be mi ́ aɖe Mawu ƒe nu ɣaɣlawo ɖe go eye to esia me la mi ́ ahe yayra geɖe vɛ na amewo .

text: Moreover it is required in stewards , that a man be found faithful .
text2: Nu si le vevie na dɔla enye be , wo ̀ akpɔ egbɔ be yewɔ yeƒe aƒetɔ ƒe gbe dzi pɛpɛpɛ .

text: But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you , or of man ' s judgment : yea , I judge not mine own self .
text2: Ke ame aɖe abia be , ɖe nye Paulo ha ̃ mewɔ dɔ abe dɔla nyui enea ? Esia menye nya si ɖea fu na nye susu o . Nyemetsɔ ɖeke le nu si miawo alo ame bubu aɖewo buna le nye dɔwɔwɔ ŋu la me o . Azɔ ha ̃ nyemeka ɖe nye ŋutɔ nye nyametsotso ha ̃ dzi le nya sia me o .

text: For I know nothing by myself ; yet am I not hereby justified : but he that judgeth me is the Lord .
text2: Togbɔ be nye dzitsinya meɖea fu nam o ha ̃ la , esia mefia kokoko be mele nye dɔ wɔm abe ale si dze ene o . Mawu ŋutɔ koe ate ŋu ana nyametsotso le nye dɔwɔna ŋu , be mewɔe nyuie alo nyemewɔe nyuie o .

text: Therefore judge nothing before the time , until the Lord come , who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness , and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts : and then shall every man have praise of God .
text2: Eya ta nɔvinyewo , mikpɔ nyuie be miaganɔ nya me tsom le ame aɖe ƒe dɔwɔwɔ ŋuti , hafi Aƒetɔ la nava , be ewɔe nyuie alo mewɔe nyuie o . Ne Aƒetɔa ŋutɔ va la , eƒe kekeli ga ̃ la akle ̃ ɖe ame sia ame dzi ga ̃ a ale be nu si mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nye tututu le eƒe dzime la adze nyuie . Ale ame sia ame anya taɖodzinu si tututu nɔ mi ́ a si hafi mi ́ enɔa kutri kum ɖe Aƒetɔ ƒe dɔa ŋu . Eye Mawu ŋutɔ ana kafukafu si dze la ame sia ame le ɣemaɣi me .

text: And these things , brethren , I have in a figure transferred to myself and to Apollos for your sakes ; that ye might learn in us not to think of men above that which is written , that no one of you be puffed up for one against another .
text2: Đe ko metsɔ Apolo kple nye ŋutɔ le kpɔɖeŋu ɖom na mi be maɖe nu si gblɔm mele la me na mi nyuie , ale bena miagade vovototo amewo me o . Migado vivi ɖe mawudɔwɔla ɖeka ha ̃ ŋu wu bubuawo o .

text: For who maketh thee to differ from another ? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive ? now if thou didst receive it , why dost thou glory , as if thou hadst not received it ?
text2: Nɔvinyewo , nu ka ta kura , miele mia ɖokuiwo dom ɖe dzi hlodzoo ale ? Nu ka kurae le mia si si menye Mawue na mi o ? Ke ne mielɔ ̃ ɖe edzi be nu siwo kata ̃ le mia si la nye nunana tso Mawu gbɔ la , ekema nu ka tae miele wɔwɔm abe ɖe miede ŋgɔ fu ̃ ŋutɔ eye mia ŋutɔwo ƒe agbagbadzedze tae miezu ame alea ene ?

text: Now ye are full , now ye are rich , ye have reigned as kings without us : and I would to God ye did reign , that we also might reign with you .
text2: Edze nam abe miebuna be yewoƒe asi su gbɔgbɔmenuɖuɖu siwo hia ̃ mi la kata ̃ dzi xoxo ene . Miewɔ mia ɖokuiwo abe ame siwo naneke megahia ̃ o , ame siwo ɖi ƒo le gbɔgbɔ me la ene . E ̃ , miezu abe fia ga ̃ hotsuitɔ siwo bɔbɔ nɔ woƒe fiazikpuiwo dzi hele mi ́ ame mamlɛawo kpɔm ɖo ɖa ene ! Nenye ɖe miezu fiawo vava ̃ eye miebɔbɔ nɔ miaƒe fiazikpuiwo dzi la , anye ne enyo ŋutɔ hafi . Elabena ne ɣeyiɣi sia ɖo la , miakpɔe be mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ abɔbɔ nɔ mi ́ aƒe fiazikpuiwo dzi aɖu fia kpli mi .

text: For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last , as it were appointed to death : for we are made a spectacle unto the world , and to angels , and to men .
text2: Ɣeaɖewoɣi la edzena nam abe ɖe Mawu wɔ mi ́ apostolowo abe ame mamlɛatɔwo ene . Mi ́ edzena abe ame siwo wotso kufia na hekplɔ yina wuwu ge la ene eye mi ́ ezu nukpɔkpɔ na mawudɔlawo kple amegbetɔwo siaa .

text: We are fools for Christ ' s sake , but ye are wise in Christ ; we are weak , but ye are strong ; ye are honourable , but we are despised .
text2: Le Kristo ta la , mi ́ ezu abe bometsilawo ene , ke miawo mienye kristotɔ nunyalawo . Mi ́ egbɔdzɔna le ŋutila ̃ me , gake ŋuse ̃ le miawo ya ŋu . Wobua mi nyuie , ke mi ́ awo la mi ́ ezu ame ɖigbɔ ̃ wo ɖeɖe ko .

text: Even unto this present hour we both hunger , and thirst , and are naked , and are buffeted , and have no certain dwellingplace ;
text2: Va sa ɖe fifi laa ha ̃ la , dɔ le mi ́ a wum , tsikɔ ha ̃ le mi ́ a wum eye mi ́ ekpɔ awu vuvu tete ha ̃ ado be vuvɔ nagawɔ mi ́ o . Eye esi aƒe aɖeke mele mi ́ a si o ta la , wotua asi mi ́ tso afii yi afi mɛ .

text: And labour , working with our own hands : being reviled , we bless ; being persecuted , we suffer it :
text2: Mi ́ awo ŋutɔwo mi ́ etsɔ asi wɔ dɔ kple kutrikuku be mi ́ akpɔ mi ́ a ɖikuiwo dzii . Mi ́ eyraa ame siwo ƒoa fi de mi ́ la eye mi ́ egbɔa dzi ɖi blewu na mi ́ aƒe futɔwo .

text: Being defamed , we intreat : we are made as the filth of the world , and are the offscouring of all things unto this day .
text2: Ne ame aɖe gblɔ nya vɔ ̃ ɖi tso mi ́ a ŋu ha ̃ la , mi ́ ewɔa dzre kplii o . Ke esiawo kata ̃ meɖe vi aɖeke o elabena va se ɖe fifia ha ̃ la amewo mebua mi ́ o . Mi ́ ele ko abe aɖukpodzinu si ŋu ŋudɔwɔnu aɖeke kura mele o la ene .

text: I write not these things to shame you , but as my beloved sons I warn you .
text2: Menye ɖe mele nu siawo ŋlɔm ɖo ɖe mi be ŋu nakpe mi o , ke boŋ be maka mo na mi eye maɖo aɖaŋu na mi abe vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo ene .

text: For though ye have ten thousand instructors in Christ , yet have ye not many fathers : for in Christ Jesus I have begotten you through the gospel .
text2: Elabena , togbɔ be ame akpe ewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ afia nu mi tso Kristo ŋu ha ̃ la , nye koe nye mia fofo . Nyee nye ame si to nyanyui la gbɔgblɔ na mi eye to esia me la mehe mi va Kristo gbɔe .

text: Wherefore I beseech you , be ye followers of me .
text2: Eya ta mele kuku ga ̃ aɖe ɖem na mi bena , miato nye afɔtoƒe , eye miawɔ nu si mewɔna la .

text: For this cause have I sent unto you Timotheus , who is my beloved son , and faithful in the Lord , who shall bring you into remembrance of my ways which be in Christ , as I teach every where in every church .
text2: Esia tututu tae mele Timoteo ɖom ɖe mi be wo ̀ ava kpe ɖe mia ŋu . Eya ha ̃ nye ame siwo mehe va Kristo gbɔ la dometɔ ɖeka eye enye vinye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ kple nuteƒewɔla vava ̃ le Aƒetɔ la me . Timoteo sia agaɖo ŋku nu siwo kata ̃ mefiana le hawo kata ̃ me la dzi na mi .

text: Now some are puffed up , as though I would not come to you .
text2: Menyae nyuie be , dadagbɔgbɔ yɔ mia dometɔ aɖewo me eye miele gbɔgblɔm gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be nyemate ŋu ava he nya ɖe yewo ŋu o .

text: But I will come to you shortly , if the Lord will , and will know , not the speech of them which are puffed up , but the power .
text2: Ne Aƒetɔ la lɔ ̃ la , mava mia gbɔ kpuie eye nyemegbɔna be mava nya nu siwo gblɔm dadala siawo le la ɖeɖeko o , ke boŋ be manya afi si wokpɔ ŋuse ̃ ha ̃ tsoe hafi le nyawo gblɔm .

text: For the kingdom of God is not in word , but in power .
text2: Mawufiaɖuƒe la me nɔnɔ menye nu kpoloe ƒoƒo wo ̀ nye o , ke boŋ enye agbenɔnɔ le Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ me .

text: What will ye ? shall I come unto you with a rod , or in love , and in the spirit of meekness ?
text2: Kae adze mia ŋu wu , be mava mia gbɔ kple ameƒoti loo alo be mava le lɔlɔ ̃ kple tufafa me ?

text: It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you , and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles , that one should have his father ' s wife .
text2: Busunya si dzɔ le mia dome lae nye be , miaƒe hametɔ aɖe xɔ fofoa srɔ ̃ . Nya sia ɖi hoo eye ame sia ame le nu ƒom le eŋu . Nu sia nye busunu ale gbegbe be medzɔna le Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ dome o .

text: And ye are puffed up , and have not rather mourned , that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you .
text2: Ke esi nu sia ƒomevi le edzi yim le mia dome la , ɖe miegale mia ɖokuiwo bum be yewode ŋgɔ le gbɔgbɔ mea ? Đe wo ̀ le be miale ́ blanui afa konyi ŋukpetɔe eye miaɖe ame sia le ha la me enumake !

text: For I verily , as absent in body , but present in spirit , have judged already , as though I were present , concerning him that hath so done this deed ,
text2: Togbɔ be nyemele mia gbɔ le afi ma o ha ̃ la , mebua tame vevie le nu sia ŋu , eye le Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ me la meɖo kpe nu si wo ̀ le be miawɔ la dzi , abe ɖe mele mia dome ene .

text: In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , when ye are gathered together , and my spirit , with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Miyɔ hame takpekpe ga ̃ , eye miaɖe ame sia ɖa le hamea me . Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ kple nye gbɔgbɔ anɔ mia dome le takpekpea me .

text: To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh , that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Minya ame sia tsɔ de asi na Abosam be wo ̀ ahe to nɛ vie le ŋutila ̃ me , ale be to esia me la ɖewohi ̃ eƒe luʋɔ akpɔ ɖeɖe ne Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gatrɔ va .

text: Your glorying is not good . Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump ?
text2: Enye nublanui ŋutɔ be , togbɔ be nu dziŋɔ sia le edzi yim le mia dome ha ̃ la , miegale mia ɖokuiwo bum ame kɔkɔewoe . Mienyae be , “ Deku ɖekae gble ̃ a bubuawo kata ̃ oa ? ” Eye ne mieɖe mɔ be ame ɖeka nawɔ nu vɔ ̃ sia ɖe , magble ̃ nu le ame bubuwo ha ̃ ŋu oa ?

text: Purge out therefore the old leaven , that ye may be a new lump , as ye are unleavened . For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us :
text2: Miɖe ame vɔ ̃ ɖi sia ɖa le mia dome , bena miaƒe ŋkɔ nagagble ̃ o eye mianɔ dzadzɛ . Miɖo ŋku edzi be , wowu Kristo , ame si nye Mawu ƒe Ale ̃ vi la , abe ŋutitotoŋkekenyui ƒe vɔsale ̃ vi ene na mi ́ .

text: Therefore let us keep the feast , not with old leaven , neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness ; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth .
text2: Eya ta mina mi ́ aɖu nu , ano nu le Kristo me bena mi ́ atsi nyuie le kristotɔgbenɔnɔ me , eye mi ́ aɖe asi le agbe vlo siwo mi ́ enɔna tsa ̃ la ŋu , adzudzɔ fule ́ le kple tamesese ̃ wɔwɔ . Boŋ la , mina be , bubu , nyateƒetoto kple nu si le eteƒe la nanye mi ́ aƒe gbe sia gbe nuɖuɖu kple nunono .

text: I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators :
text2: Le nye agbale ̃ si meŋlɔ na mi do ŋgɔ me la , megblɔ na mi be , migade ha kple ahasiwɔlawo o .
