text2: eye mi ́ apostolowo kata ̃ mi ́ enye alakpatɔwo elabena mi ́ egblɔ be Mawu fɔ Kristo tso yɔdo me . Ke ne womefɔ Kristo ɖe tsitre hafi o la ekema mienye alakpatɔwo .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Nenye be ame kukuwo metsia tsitre o la , ekema Kristo ganye ame kuku kokoko .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Ekema mienye bometsilawo be miaganɔ Mawu dzi xɔm se kokoko be eɖe mi eye be fɔbubu li na mi ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Ne ele nenema la , ekema kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ ku la bu .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Eye ne kristotɔnyenye nye viɖe na mi ́ fifia le agbe sia me ɖeɖeko la , ekema mi ́ enye nublanuitɔ ga ̃ tɔwo wu amewo kata ̃ .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Ke nyateƒe lae nye be Kristo tsi tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome vava ̃ eye wo ̀ zu gba ̃ tɔ na ame akpe akpe siwo ava tsi tsitre gbe ɖeka .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Ku va xexeame le nu si ame ɖeka , Adam , wɔ la ta eye le nu si ame bubu sia , Kristo , wɔ la ta la , tsitretsitsi tso ame kukuwo dome li azɔ .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Ame sia ame kuna elabena mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ edo ƒome kple Adam eye mi ́ edzɔ tso eƒe ƒome si wɔ nu vɔ ̃ la me eye afi sia afi si nu vɔ ̃ nɔna la , ku nɔa anyi . Ke ame siwo kata ̃ do ƒome kple Kristo la agatsi tsitre .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Ame sia ame atsi tsitre le eya ŋutɔ ƒe ɣeyiɣi dzi : Kristo tsi tsitre gba ̃ eye ne Kristo gatrɔ va la , eƒe amewo kata ̃ agagbɔ agbe .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Le ema megbe la , Kristo aɖu futɔ ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi dzi , nuwuwua ava eye wo ̀ atsɔ fiaɖuƒe la ade asi na Mawu , Fofo la .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Eya ta Kristo aɖu fia va se ɖe esime wo ̀ aɖu eƒe futɔwo kata ̃ dzi

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: eye wo ̀ aɖu futɔ mamlɛtɔ , ku , gɔ ̃ ha ̃ dzi . Woaɖu eya ha ̃ dzi eye woaɖee ɖa .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Elabena Fofo la tsɔ dziɖuɖu kple ŋuse ̃ kpɔkpɔ ɖe nu sia nu dzi na Kristo , ke Kristo meɖu Fofo la ŋutɔ , ame si tsɔ ŋuse ̃ sia nɛ be wo ̀ aɖu dzi la , ya dzi o .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Ne Kristo ɖu dzi le aʋa si wɔm wo ̀ le kple eƒe futɔwo kata ̃ me mlɔeba la , ekema eya , Mawu Vi la , atsɔ eya ŋutɔ ha ̃ ade Fofoa ƒe ɖoɖowo te , ale be Mawu , ame si na dziɖuɖui ɖe nu bubu ɖe sia ɖe dzi la , azu tatɔ , dziɖula ga ̃ tɔ .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Ne ame kukuwo magatsi tsitre o la , ekema viɖe kae le mawutsidedeta na amewo ɖe ame kukuwo nu me ? Nu ka tae wo ̀ le be miawɔe ne miexɔe se be ame kukuwo magatsi tsitre o ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Eye nu ka ta wo ̀ le be mi ́ atsɔ mi ́ aƒe agbe ade xaxa me anɔ ku ƒe asime ɣesiaɣi ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be menɔa ku ƒe asime gbe sia gbe . Esia nye nyateƒe abe ale si medana le miaƒe tsitsi le Aƒetɔ la me ta ene .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Eye viɖe kae le avuwɔwɔ kple la ̃ wɔada ̃ mawo , Efesotɔwo , me ne wo ̀ anye ɖe viɖe si makpɔ le agbe sia me le anyigba sia dzi ta ko ? Ne mi ́ aganɔ agbe le ku megbe o la , ekema anyo be mi ́ aɖu nu , ano nu eye mi ́ akpɔ dzidzɔ , elabena etsɔ mi ́ aku eye nu sia nu ase afi ma .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Migana ame siwo gblɔa nya siawo la nado la ̃ mi o . Ne mieɖo to wo la , miade asi nuwɔwɔ me abe woawo ke ene .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Miwɔ susu ŋudɔ eye miadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ . Ŋu nakpe mi elabena mia dometɔ aɖewo menye kristotɔwo o eye womedze si Mawu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Ke ame aɖe abia be , “ Ale ke ame kukuwo awɔ hafi agagbɔ agbe ? Ŋutila ̃ ka tɔgbie anɔ wo si ? ”

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Biabia sia nye abunɛtɔwo ƒe biabia ! Miakpɔ ŋuɖoɖoa le miawo ŋutɔ miaƒe agblewo me ! Ne mietsɔ nuku aɖe de tome la , metsina zua ati o , negbe ɖe ko “ wo ̀ aku ” gba ̃ hafi .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Eye ne nuku la mie la , nu miemie la toa vovo sa ̃ a tsoa nuku si mieƒa ̃ gba ̃ la gbɔ . Nu si miede tome la nye bliku ƒuƒu sue aɖe ko alo nuku bubu aɖe si mieƒa ̃ .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Emegbe la , Mawu naa dzedzeme dzeani yeye aɖee ; nɔnɔme si eya ŋutɔ di be wo ̀ anɔ esi . Ati bubu ƒomevi doa go tsoa nuku ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi me .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Abe ale si nuku kple ati ƒomevi vovowo li ene la , nenema kee ŋutila ̃ ƒomevi vovovowo ha ̃ li . Amegbetɔwo , la ̃ wo , tɔmela ̃ wo kple xeviwo ƒe ŋutila ̃ wo to vovo .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Nuwɔwɔ siwo le dziƒo la ƒe nɔnɔme to vovo sa ̃ a tso esiwo le anyigba dzi tɔ gbɔ . Nenema kee , woƒe nyonyo kple ŋutikɔkɔe ha ̃ to vovo tso mia tɔ gbɔe .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Ŋutikɔkɔe aɖe ƒomevi le ɣe si eye ŋutikɔkɔe ƒomevi bubu le ɣleti kple ɣletiviwo ha ̃ si eye ɣletiviwo to vovo tso wo nɔewo gbɔ le nyonyo kple kekle ̃ me .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Nenema ke mi ́ aƒe anyigbadziŋutila ̃ siwo kuna eye wonyunyɔna la to vovo tso ŋutila ̃ siwo anɔ mi ́ a si ne mi ́ etsi tsitre la gbɔ , elabena woawo ya magaku gbeɖe o .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Ŋutila ̃ siwo nye mi ́ a tɔ fifia la ɖea fu na mi ́ elabena wole ́ a dɔ eye wokuna , ke ŋutikɔkɔe ayɔ wo me ne mi ́ eva tsi tsitre . E ̃ , wonye ŋutila ̃ siwo gbɔdzɔna eye wokuna fifia , ke ne mi ́ eva tsi tsitre la , ŋuse ̃ ayɔ wo me fu ̃ .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Wonye dzɔdzɔmeŋutila ̃ wo ko le ku me , ke ne mi ́ eva tsi tsitre la , woanye gbɔgbɔmeŋutila ̃ wo , elabena abe ale si amegbetɔwo ƒe ŋutila ̃ dzɔdzɔmetɔwo li ene la , nenema kee ŋutila ̃ siwo nye gbɔgbɔmetɔwo ha ̃ li .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔe na mi ́ be , “ Ame gba ̃ tɔ , Adam , zu luʋɔ gbagbe . ” Ke Adam mamlɛtɔ la zu gbɔgbɔ si na agbe .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Ale menye gbɔgbɔmetɔ enye gba ̃ tɔ o , ke boŋ dzɔdzɔmetɔ lae , eya megbe hafi gbɔgbɔmetɔ va .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Wowɔ Adam tso anyi me ; ke Kristo ɖi tso dziƒo va .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Ŋutila ̃ le amegbetɔ ɖe sia ɖe si abe Adam tɔ ene . Wowɔe tso anyi me ke ame siwo kata ̃ zu Kristo tɔ la , Kristo ƒe ŋutila ̃ tɔgbi , si anye ŋutila ̃ si tso dziƒo la , anɔ wo si .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Abe ale si Adam ƒe ŋutila ̃ tɔgbi le mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe si fifia ene la , nenema kee Kristo ƒe ŋutila ̃ tɔgbi anɔ mi ́ a si gbe ɖeka .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Nɔvinyewo , megblɔ esia na mi : Anyigbadziŋutila ̃ si nye la ̃ kple ʋu la , mate ŋu ayi Mawu ƒe fiaɖuƒe la me o . Mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ siwo gble ̃ na la menye ŋutila ̃ nyuitɔ siwo anɔ agbe tegbee o .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Ke mele nya ɣaɣla wɔnuku sia gblɔm na mi : Mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ aku o , ke woana ŋutila ̃ yeyewo mi ́ kata ̃ .

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: Nu siawo kata ̃ ava eme le aɖabaƒoƒo ɖeka me ne woaku kpe ̃ mamlɛtɔ . Elabena woaku kpe ̃ aɖe tso dziŋgɔli me eye kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ ku la atsi tsitre enumake kple ŋutila ̃ yeye siwo maku akpɔ o , eye mi ́ ame siwo gale agbe la , woana ŋutila ̃ yeyewo mi ́ awo ha ̃ enumake .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Elabena ele be woatrɔ mi ́ aƒe anyigbadziŋutila ̃ siwo le mi ́ a si fifia eye woate ŋu aku la woazu dziƒoŋutila ̃ siwo mate ŋu agble ̃ o , ke boŋ woanɔ agbe tegbee .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Ne eva dzɔ alea la , ekema Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la me nyawo ava eme be , “ Womi ku le dziɖuɖu me . ”

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: O , ku afi ka wo ̀ dziɖuɖu la le ? O , ku afi ka wo ̀ ti la le ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Elabena ku ƒe ti enye nu vɔ ̃ , eye nu vɔ ̃ ƒe ŋuse ̃ enye se la .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mi ́ eda akpe na Mawu le esiawo kata ̃ ta ! Eyae wɔ mi ́ dziɖulawoe to Yesu Kristo mi ́ a Aƒetɔ la dzi !

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Eya ta nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , esi kakaɖedzi li be mi ́ ava ɖu dzi ta la , mise ̃ ŋu eye minɔ te . Mina miaƒe dɔwɔwɔ le Aƒetɔ la me nagba ̃ go ɖaa si ; elabena mienya bena nu sia nu si miawɔ na Aƒetɔ la la , mazu dzodzro akpɔ abe ale si wo ̀ anɔ ne tsitretsitsi aɖeke meli ene o .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Azɔ la , se siwo le ga si dzɔm miele be yewoaɖo ɖa kristotɔ siwo le Yerusalem ŋu la woe nye esiawo . Se siawo kee mede na hame siwo le Galatia .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Le Kwasiɖa ɖe sia ɖe gbe la ele be mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe natsɔ ga si wo ̀ kpɔ le kwasiɖa me la ƒe akpa aɖe adzra ɖo eye wo ̀ awɔ eŋutidɔ na nunana sia . Ga home la ku ɖe home si Aƒetɔ la kpe ɖe amea ŋu wo ̀ kpɔ la ŋu . Migalala va se ɖe esime mava afi ma hafi miadze agbagba be yewoadzɔ ga home la kata ̃ zi ɖeka o .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ne meva la , maŋlɔ agbale ̃ akpe ɖe miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe nunana la ŋu aɖo ɖe Yerusalem to dɔla nuteƒewɔla aɖe si miawo ŋutɔ miatia la dzi .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Eye ne anyo be nye ha ̃ mayi kplii la , ekema mi ́ ate ŋu azɔ afɔ ɖeka .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Made Makedonia gba ̃ hafi ava kpɔ mi ɖa , ke manɔ afi ma ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Ate ŋu ava eme be manɔ miawo gbɔ wo ̀ adidi wu , ɖewohi ̃ le vuvɔŋɔli blibo la kata ̃ me , eye miado mɔm mayi teƒe bubu .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Nyemegadi azɔ be makpɔ mi ɖa ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko eye matso eme o . Medi be mava nɔ anyi se ̃ e ne Aƒetɔ la aɖe mɔ nam .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Manɔ Efeso le afi sia va se ɖe Pentekoste ƒe ŋkekenyui la dzi ,

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: elabena mɔnukpɔkpɔ tɔxɛ aɖe li nam be magblɔ mawunya eye mafia nu le afi sia . Mɔnukpɔkpɔ geɖewo li ke futɔwo ha ̃ sɔ gbɔ .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Ne Timoteo va la , mina eƒe mo nadze anyi elabena ele Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔ wɔm abe nye ke ene .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Migana ame aɖeke nado vloe alo agbe toɖoɖoe , be enye ɖekakpui ta o , ke mina wo ̀ akpɔ dzidzɔ le ɣeyiɣi si wo ̀ anɔ mia dome la me , eye miaɖoe ɖem . Mele mɔ kpɔm be makpɔe kaba kple ame bubu siwo trɔ gbɔna .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Meɖe kuku na Apolo be eya kple ame bubuwo nava kpɔ mi ɖa , ke ebu be menye Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo wo ̀ nye na ye be yeayi fifia o . Ava mia gbɔ emegbe ne mɔnu aɖe ʋu nɛ :

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Minɔ ŋudzɔ be miadze si gbɔgbɔme ƒe dzɔgbevɔ ̃ ewo . Miwɔ nuteƒe na Aƒetɔ la . Minɔ agbe abe ŋutsuwo ene eye mise ̃ ŋu .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Nu sia nu si miawɔ la , miwɔe kple amenuveve kpakple lɔlɔ ̃ .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Mieɖoa ŋku Stefana kple eƒe ƒomea dzia ? Woawoe nye ame gba ̃ tɔ siwo zu kristotɔwo le Akaya eye wole kpekpeɖeŋu geɖe nam kristotɔwo le afi sia afi .

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Miwɔ nu siwo woaɖo na mi eye miwɔ nu sia nu si miate ŋui la be miakpe ɖe wo kple ame bubu siwo kata ̃ tsɔ wo ɖokuiwo sa vɔe abe woawo ene eye wowɔa dɔ sesi ̃ e le mia dome la ŋu .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Mekpɔ dzidzɔ ŋutɔ be Stefana , Fortunato kple Akaiko va ɖo mi ́ a gbɔ be yewoakpɔ mi ́ ɖa . Wole kpekpeɖenudɔ siwo miele afi ̃ sia awɔ nam o la wɔm nam ɖe mia teƒe .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Wodo dzidzɔ geɖe nam eye wode dzi ƒo nam ŋutɔ . Meka ɖe edzi be nenema kee wowɔ na miawo ha ̃ . Mexɔe se be miekpɔ ŋudzedze le ame siawo kple ame bubu siwo le abe woawo ene la ƒe dɔwɔwɔ ŋu .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Hame siwo le Asia le afii la do gbe na mi . Akwila kple Priskila kpakple ame bubu siwo kata ̃ kpea ta le woƒe aƒe me hena sɔlemedede la ha ̃ do gbe na mi .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Nɔvi siwo kata ̃ le afi sia la bia tso asinye be mado gbe na mi na yewo . Mido gbe na mia nɔewo kple lɔlɔ ̃ si dze la ne miedo go .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Meŋlɔ agbale ̃ sia ƒe nya mamlɛtɔwo kple nye ŋutɔ nye asi .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Ame sia ame si melɔ ̃ a Aƒetɔ la o la , woaƒo fi adee . Aƒetɔ Yesu va !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ kple amenuveve nanɔ anyi kpli mi kata ̃ .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Metsɔ nye lɔlɔ ̃ na mi kata ̃ elabena mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ enye Kristo Yesu tɔwo .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Nɔvinye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ siwo le Korinto , agbale ̃ sia tso nye Paulo , ame si Mawu ŋutɔ tia be manye Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔla kple nɔvinye Timoteo gbɔ na mi . Mi ́ ele agbale ̃ sia ŋlɔm na miawo ɖeɖe ko o , ke boŋ mi ́ ele eŋlɔm na nɔvi siwo ha ̃ le Akaya blibo la kata ̃ .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu , mi ́ a Fofo kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe amenuveve kple ŋutifafa nagba go ɖe mia dzi duu .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Woakafu Mawu ame si nye mi ́ a Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo Fofo , nublanuikpɔkpɔ Fofo kple akɔfafa kata ̃ ƒe Mawu la ,

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: ame si fa akɔ na mi ́ le mi ́ aƒe xaxawo kata ̃ me , ale be mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ ate ŋu afa akɔ na ame siwo le xaxa me kple akɔfafa si mi ́ awo ŋutɔ mi ́ exɔ tso Mawu gbɔ .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Abe ale si Kristo ƒe fukpekpewo gena ɖe mi ́ aƒe agbemee ene la , nenema kee to Kristo me mi ́ aƒe akɔfafa ha ̃ gba goe .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Ne mi ́ exaxa la , miawo ƒe akɔfafa kple ɖeɖe tae ; ke ne wofa akɔ na mi ́ la , miawo ƒe akɔfafa tae , esia dea dzigbɔgbɔblewuu miame be miawo ha ̃ mietea ŋu kpea fu siwo miekpena .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ na mi like goŋgoŋgoŋ , elabena mi ́ enyae bena , abe ale si miekpɔ gome le mi ́ aƒe fukpekpewo me ene la , nenema ke miakpɔ gome le mi ́ aƒe akɔfafa ha ̃ me .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo mebu be ele be magblɔ fu siwo mi ́ ekpe le Asia la na mi . Woƒo mi ́ eye wowɔ fu mi ́ ale gbegbe be mi ́ awo ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mi ́ ebu mɔkpɔkpɔ ɖe sia ɖe be mi ́ atsi agbe .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Mi ́ ebu be mi ́ ele kuku ge elabena mi ́ ekpɔ be wɔna aɖeke meganɔ mi ́ a ŋu o gake mi ́ etsɔ nu sia nu gble ̃ ɖe Aƒetɔ si tea ŋu wɔa nu sia nu eye wo ̀ fɔa ame kukuwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ tso yɔdo me la sime .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Vava ̃ , Mawu ɖe mi ́ tso ku dziŋɔ aɖe sime , ale mi ́ etsɔ mi ́ aƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ da ɖe edzi be aɖe mi ́ tso fukpekpe ɖe sia ɖe me ɖaa .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Eya ta mi kata ̃ miwɔ ɖeka ne miado gbe ɖa ɖe mi ́ a ta vevie . Zi ale si miedo gbe ɖa eye mieɖe kuku ɖe mi ́ a ta la , zi nenema ke miagada akpe na Aƒetɔ la ɖe eƒe ŋuɖoɖo si na be mi ́ enɔ dedie la ta .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Ke mi ́ awo ha ̃ , adegbe si mi ́ eƒona lae nye be , mi ́ ele ́ a mi ́ a ɖokuiwo nyuie le xexe sia me , eye le mia dome ha ̃ la , mi ́ ezɔna le dzitsinya kɔkɔe nu , mi ́ ewɔ mi ́ a ɖokuiwo dzadzɛ eye mi ́ etoa nyateƒe le nu sia nu me . Ke menye mi ́ awo ŋutɔ ƒe ŋuse ̃ mee mi ́ ewɔ esiawo le o , ke boŋ wo kata ̃ tso Aƒetɔ la gbɔ .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Elabena mi ́ eŋlɔ nya bubu aɖeke na mi , si miate ŋu axle ̃ alo ase egɔme o . Mele mɔ kpɔm be

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: abe ale si miese mi ́ aƒe nya gɔme afa ̃ kple afa ̃ e ene la , miava se egɔme blibo ale be miate ŋu aƒo adegbe le mi ́ a ŋu abe ale si mi ́ aƒoe le mia ŋu le Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe ŋkeke la dzi ene .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Esi meka ɖe miaƒe nugɔmesese dzi tae medi be mava mia gbɔ gba ̃ le nye mɔzɔzɔ me , ale be miagaxɔ yayra ɖe yayra dzi .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Tso mia gbɔ la , mayi Makedonia eye ne metrɔ tso Makedonia la magava to mia gbɔ ale miado mɔm ne medzo yina Yudea .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Đewohi ̃ mianɔ biabia be , ɖe metrɔ ɖoɖo si mewɔ gba ̃ la alo ɖe mele nu wɔm abe xexeametɔ siwo menya Kristo o la ene , ame siwo ne , nya lae nye “ e ̃ ” la , wogblɔna be “ ao ” ha ̃ ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Gbeɖe , mele eme nenema o . Abe ale si Mawu nye nyateƒetɔ ene la , nyemenye ame ma ƒomevi o . Nye “ e ̃ ” nye “ e ̃ ” .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Elabena Mawu ƒe Vi , Yesu Kristo , ame si ŋu nye Paulo , Silvano kple Timoteo mi ́ eɖe gbeƒa ̃ le na mi la , menye ame si ne nya lae nye “ e ̃ ” la , wo ̀ gblɔ be “ ao ” o . Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo wɔna ɖe nu sia nu si wo ̀ gblɔ la ko dzi .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo kpɔna ha ̃ be Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodo ɖe sia ɖe va eme pɛpɛpɛ . Ne ŋugbedodoawo wu akpe nanewo ha ̃ la , wovaa eme na mi ́ to Kristo dzi hena Mawu ƒe kafukafu .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Medi be wo ̀ anɔ susu me na mi bena , Mawue wɔ mi ́ kple miawo ha ̃ bena mi ́ ezu kristotɔ vava ̃ wo eye wo ̀ tia mi ́ abe eƒe apostolowo ene be mi ́ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ nyanyui la .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Eya ame si de dzesi mi ́ abe viawo ene , eye wo ̀ tsɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la de mi ́ aƒe dziwo me abe kpeɖodzi ene be mi ́ enye etɔwo eye abe nu siwo wo ̀ le mi ́ ana ge la ƒe akpa gba ̃ tɔ ene .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Azɔ la , meyɔ Mawu tso nye dzime ke abe ɖase ene bena nu si gblɔm mele na mi la enye nyateƒe tututu ; susu si ta nyemeva mia gbɔ haɖe o lae nye be nyemedi be mava ka mo na mi eye mawɔe be miaxa nu o .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Menye ɖe mi ́ egale amega ̃ ɖum ɖe mia dzi hele se dem na mi tso nu si ke miaxɔ ase la ŋuti o , elabena mienya nu si dze be miaxɔ ase , eyae nye Kristo ame si dzi miexɔ se ha ̃ . Togbɔ be ne meva la nyemate ŋu akpe ɖe mia ŋuti , adzi mi ́ aƒe xɔse ɖe edzi o , elabena miaƒe xɔse sɔ gbɔ xoxo ha ̃ la , medi be mawɔ nane si ado dzidzɔ na mi ne meva , menye be mana miale ́ blanui o .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Ke azɔ la , nye ŋutɔ meɖoe be nyemagava mia gbɔ kple nu si agahe nuxaxa vɛ na mi o .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Elabena ne megade nuxaxa miaƒe dzi me la , miete ŋu le dzidzɔ do ge nam le mia gbɔnɔnɔ me o ; evɔ ame bubu aɖeke ha ̃ meli si ado dzidzɔ nam tsɔ wu miawo o .

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Esia tae meŋlɔ agbale ̃ ma na mi ale be miaɖɔ nuwo ɖo hafi mava , elabena nyemedi be makpɔ naneke le mi ame siwo ŋu meɖoa ŋu ɖo be miado dzidzɔ geɖe nam la ŋu si ade nuxaxa nye dzime o . Menyae nyuie bena ne meva mia gbɔ le dzidzɔ me la ekema miawo ha ̃ miakpɔ dzidzɔ geɖe .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Nuxaxa kple veve geɖe nɔ nye dzime , eye aɖatsiwo ge le mo nam gɔ ̃ ha ̃ le agbale ̃ ma ŋɔŋlɔ me , eye menye ɖe meŋlɔ agbale ̃ la be mana miaxa nu o , ke boŋ meŋlɔe be mana miadze si nu masɔmasɔ siwo le edzi yim le mia gbɔ kple ale si melɔ ̃ mii vevie .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Ne ame aɖe he nuxaxa vɛ la , menye nyee wo ̀ do nuxaxa na o ke boŋ mi kata ̃ e , mele egblɔm alea be nyemagate gbe ɖe dzi fu ̃ u o .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Eya ta tohehe si ame akpa ga ̃ tɔ da ɖe nenem me sia dzi la sɔ gbɔ nɛ .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Azɔ ele be miatsɔ eƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kee eye miafa akɔ nɛ . Ne menye nenema o la , ase veve eye dzi aɖe le eƒo ale gbegbe be wo ̀ atrɔ ɖa tso nyateƒe la gbɔ .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Meɖe kuku na mi , miɖee fiae azɔ be miegalɔ ̃ e pɛpɛpɛ abe tsa ̃ ene .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Meŋlɔ agbale ̃ ma na mi be makpɔe ɖa be , miele klalo awɔ ɖe nye ɖoɖowo dzi eye be makpɔe ɖa be toɖoɖo gbɔgbɔ le mia me maha ̃ ?

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Nu si mietsɔ ke ame aɖe la , nye ha ̃ metsɔe kee , eye edze be nye ha ̃ matsɔe ke le Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ me hena miaƒe nyonyo ko .

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: Susu bubu si ta wo ̀ dze be miatsɔ nu vɔ ̃ ake amewo lae nye be miaxe mɔ na Satana be wo ̀ agaɖu mia dzi ahe tɔtɔ va mia dome o , elabena mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ edze si ale si wo ̀ di be yeade zitɔtɔ hamewo dome .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Esi meva Troa be magblɔ Kristo ƒe nyanyui la le afi ma la , mekpɔ be Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔ ʋu mɔ nam be dɔ la nayi edzi nyuie .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Gake metsi dzi le ɖokuinye me , elabena nyemekpɔ nɔvinye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ Tito le afi ma o , gawu la nyemenya afi si wo ̀ nɔ kple nu siwo nɔ dzɔdzɔm ɖe edzi o . Medo taflatse na Troatɔwo eye medzo le afi ma heyi Makedonia .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Ke akpe na Mawu be to nu si Kristo wɔ me la mi ́ ekpɔ dziɖuɖu eye mi ́ ekaka nyanyui la abe ami ʋeʋi ̃ si ʋe ̃ na lilili ̃ ene ɖe amewo dome le afi sia afi si mi ́ eyi .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Elabena Mawu wɔ mi ́ mi ́ ezu ami si ʋe ̃ na lilili ̃ la eye Kristo ƒe ʋeʋe ̃ lilili ̃ si wo ̀ tsɔ de mi ́ a me la kaka ɖe ame siwo kata ̃ kpɔ xɔxɔ kple ame siwo mekpɔe o siaa dome .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Nunana nyui si Kristo tsɔ na mi ́ la ɖi ku ƒe ʋeʋe ̃ na ame siwo le tsɔtsrɔ ̃ m . Ke le ame siwo xɔ Kristo dzi se ya gbɔ la , mi ́ enye ʋeʋe ̃ lilili ̃ si naa agbe . Azɔ biabia lae nye be , ame ka ŋu ŋutete le be wo ̀ awɔ Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔ siawo ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Mi ́ awo la mi ́ ele abe ame siwo tsɔ mawunya la ɖo ŋgonu hele amewo blem , le ga xɔm le wo si la ene o . Esi wo ̀ nye Mawue dɔ mi ́ ta la , mi ́ eƒoa nu kple Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ la eye Mawu ƒe ŋku le mi ́ a ŋu ɖaa .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Ke nya siwo meŋlɔ na mi la , ɖe wodze abe mi ́ ele mi ́ a ɖokui kafum enea ? Mi ́ awo la mi ́ ele abe aʋatsonufiala mawo siwo xɔa kafukafugbale ̃ wo tsoa amewo gbɔ va nɔa mia fiam la ene o ; mi ́ awo ya kafukafugbale ̃ aɖeke mehia ̃ mi ́ o .

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Fifia la ame sia ame le afi sia afi kpɔe dze sii azɔ be Kristo to mia dzi wɔ dɔ nukutɔe le mia dome , eye miezu ame yeyewo . Elabena miedzudzɔ agbe vlo nɔnɔ eye mieva nyateƒe ƒe kekeli la gbɔ , esia ɖeɖe si amewo kpɔ le mia ŋuti la nye agbale ̃ blibo si woaxle ̃ .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Amewo akpɔe be miezu agbale ̃ si tso Kristo gbɔ to mi ́ a dzi . Menye agbale ̃ si woŋlɔ kple nuŋlɔti kple nuŋlɔtsi o ke boŋ esi wotsɔ Mawu gbagbe la ƒe Gbɔgbɔ ŋlɔe ɖe miaƒe dziwo me , ke menye ɖe nuŋlɔkpewo dzi o .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Mi ́ ele nya siawo gblɔm kple kakaɖedzi , elabena mi ́ eɖo ŋu ɖe Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ la ko ŋu to Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo me be akpe ɖe mi ́ a ŋu be mi ́ awɔ ɖe nu sia nu si mi ́ agblɔ la dzi .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Mi ́ awo la ŋuse ̃ aɖeke mele mi ́ a si si mi ́ ate ŋu atsɔ awɔ nu siawo kata ̃ o , ke mi ́ aƒe ŋuse ̃ kple dzidzedzekpɔkpɔ la tso Mawu gbɔ .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Mawu nye ame si de dɔ sia asi na mi ́ bena mi ́ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ nubabla yeye si wo ̀ wɔ be ame sia ame nakpɔ agbe mavɔ la . Nubabla yeye sia to vovo sa ̃ a tso xoxoa si nye be ame nadze agbagba awɔ ɖe Se Ewoawo dzi la gbɔ , ke yeyetɔe nye be mi ́ asubɔ Mawu le Gbɔgbɔ me . Elabena Gbɔgbɔ lae gbɔa agbe ame , ke seawo ɖeɖe ko dzi wɔwɔ kplɔa ame yia ku me .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Enye nyateƒe be Mose xɔ se siwo ɖeɖe dzi wɔwɔ hea ku vɛ la , le ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ aɖe me . Eye esi wo ̀ trɔ gbɔ va Israelviwo gbɔ kple seawo la , kekle ̃ ga ̃ aɖe ƒo xla ̃ e ale gbegbe be eƒe amewo mete ŋu kpɔ eƒe ŋkume gɔ ̃ o gake ŋutikɔkɔe ma nu va yi xoxo .

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: Ke azɔ la ɖe mi ́ akpɔ mɔ na dzidzɔ kple ŋutikɔkɔe geɖe wu le esime Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la le amewo xɔm ɖe agbe le ŋkeke siawo me oa ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Ne ŋutikɔkɔe geɖe ƒo xla ̃ se siwo hea ku vɛ la , ekema ŋutikɔkɔe geɖe wu ŋutɔe aƒo xla ̃ nubabla yeye si Mawu wɔ si kplɔa ame yia agbe mavɔ la me .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la ŋutikɔkɔe ma si kle ̃ tso Mose ƒe ŋkume la menye naneke ne woatsɔ asɔ kple esi ƒo xla ̃ Mawu ƒe nubabla yeye la o .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Eya ta ne nu xoxo si nu va yi la kpɔ ŋutikɔkɔe nenema la , ekema Mawu ƒe nubabla yeye si hea agbe mavɔ vɛ la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la mele gbɔgblɔ me o , elabena eya anɔ anyi tegbetegbe .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Esi mi ́ enya be nubabla yeye sia kple eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la li tegbee ta la , dzika metsoa mi ́ a ƒo o , eye mi ́ egblɔa nya la kple dzideƒo .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Mi ́ awo ya la , mi ́ awɔ abe ale si Mose wɔ esi wo ̀ tsɔ nu tsyɔ mo be Israelviwo nagakpɔ kekle ̃ la kple ale si wonɔ bubum le mo nɛ la ene o .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Va se ɖe egbe ŋkeke dzi la , menye Mose ƒe mo ko wotsyɔ nui o , ke boŋ Israelviwo ha ̃ ƒe susuwo kple nugɔmesese dzie , elabena wogaɖoa dzi ɖe seawo ŋu eye woxle ̃ nɛ ɖaa abe nu si ko me woƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ le ene , evɔ wo ̀ nye to Kristo dzixɔxɔse me ko hafi woate ŋu adzo le vivitia me eye agbe ƒe kekeli la nadze na wo .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Eye va se ɖe fifia ne woxle ̃ Mose ƒe Se Ewoawo la , woƒe ŋkuwo meʋu o elabena wobuna be seawo dzi wɔwɔ koe ana agbe yewo .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Ke gbe si gbe wo dometɔ aɖe trɔ tso eƒe mɔ vɔ ̃ wo dzi eye wo ̀ xɔ Kristo abe Aƒetɔ ene la , ekema nu si tsyɔ mo nɛ ta wo ̀ le viviti me la ɖena ɖa enumake .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔe nye Gbɔgbɔ si naa agbe wo eye afi si Aƒetɔa ƒe Gbɔgbɔ le ko la ablɔɖe vava ̃ ha ̃ nɔa afi ma .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Ke mi ́ ame siwo kata ̃ xɔ Yesu Kristo abe Aƒetɔ ene eye mi ́ eɖo dzi ɖe eya ɖeɖe ko ŋu la , nutsyɔnu aɖeke mele mi ́ aƒe mowo o eya ta mi ́ ele abe ahuhɔ ̃ e si ɖea Aƒetɔ la ƒe kekle ̃ kple ŋutikɔkɔe fi ̃ ana la ene . Eye zi ale si Kristo ƒe Gbɔgbɔ la le dɔ wɔm le mi ́ a me la , etrɔa mi ́ be mi ́ aɖi Kristo le eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe me .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ mee wo ̀ tso be wo ̀ tsɔ dɔ sia de asi na mi ́ be mi ́ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ dzimetɔtrɔ kple agbe yeye nɔnɔ na ame sia ame . Eya tae ɖeɖi metea mi ́ a ŋu le ewɔwɔ me o .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Mi ́ eblua afɔ na Mawu ƒe nya la o , ke boŋ ale si ame geɖewo nyae ene la , mi ́ etsia tsitre ɖe Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ me eye mi ́ egblɔa nyateƒenya vava ̃ tɔ la na ame sia ame . Le Kristo me la , mi ́ eɖe vivitimenuwɔnawo kple ŋukpenanuwɔwɔwo kata ̃ ɖa eye mi ́ egbe nu le alakpadada gbɔ hele ́ nyateƒe la ko me ɖe asi .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Eya ta ne Kristo ƒe nyanyui si mi ́ ele gbeƒa ̃ ɖem la gɔmesese sese ̃ na ame aɖewo la , ekema ame siwo dze tsɔtsrɔ ̃ mɔ dzi la koe wo ̀ anɔ na nenema .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Satana ame si le dzi ɖum le xexe vɔ ̃ ɖi sia me fifia lae gba ̃ dzimaxɔsetɔwo ƒe ŋkuwo eye wo ̀ tsyɔ nu woƒe susuwo dzi . Ewɔ esia be womagakpɔ kekeli si tso nyanyui la me le kekle ̃ m ɖe wo dzi la eye woase nu si gblɔm mi ́ ele tso Kristo si nye Mawu ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ŋu la gɔme o .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Menye mi ́ a ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ŋutie mi ́ ele gbeƒa ̃ ɖem le na mi o , ke boŋ Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ŋutie , eye eya koe dze be mi ́ asubɔ . Nya siwo ko mi ́ egblɔna tsoa mi ́ a ɖokuiwo ŋuti na mi koe nye be Kristo ƒe amedɔdɔwoe mi ́ enye ɖe nu ga ̃ siwo wo ̀ wɔ na mi ́ la ta .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu ame si gblɔ be : “ Kekeli nekle ̃ ɖe viviti me la , ” kee nye ame si kle ̃ ɖe mi ́ awo ha ̃ ƒe dzi me . To esia wɔwɔ me la , ena be mi ́ exɔ kekeli la ƒe sidzedze , si nye eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe si kle ̃ na tso Kristo me .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Ke kesinɔnu sia le mi ́ a si le anyigoewo me , be wo ̀ aɖee fia be ŋuse ̃ triakɔ sia metso mi ́ a gbɔ o , ke boŋ Mawu gbɔe wo ̀ tso .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Womimi mi ́ ɖo le go sia go me , gake womegba ̃ mi ́ o , mi ́ etɔtɔ gake dzi meɖe le mi ́ aƒo o ,

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: woti mi ́ a yome gake womegble ̃ mi ́ ɖi o , woƒo mi ́ ƒu anyi , gake wometsrɔ ̃ mi ́ o .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Yesu ƒe ku le mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ me mi ́ ele yiyimee gbe sia gbe , be woaɖe Yesu ƒe agbe ha ̃ ɖe go le mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ me .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Elabena wotsɔ mi ́ ame siwo le agbe la de asi na ku gbe sia gbe le Yesu ta , be woaɖe eƒe agbe ɖe go le mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ si le kuku ge la me .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Eya ta , ku le dɔ wɔm le mi ́ a me , gake agbe le dɔ wɔm le miawo me .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Esi mi ́ enya be Mawu tsɔa bele ́ le tɔxɛ na mi ́ ta la , mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ eɖea gbeƒa ̃ Kristo ame si dzi mi ́ exɔ se la kple dzideƒo , abe ale si Psalmowoŋlɔla gblɔe ene be : “ Mexɔe se , eya ta meƒo nu ɖo ” la , nenema ke mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ exɔe se eya ta mi ́ adzudzɔ nuƒoƒo o .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Mi ́ enya be Mawu ame si fɔ Kristo ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la , afɔ mi ́ awo ha ̃ kple Kristo ɖe tsitre eye wo ̀ atsɔ mi ́ kple miawo siaa nɛ .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe fukpekpe siawo kata ̃ nye viɖe geɖe na mi , eye zi ale si mi ́ eɖe gbeƒa ̃ Mawu ƒe amenuveve sia na ame geɖewo eye wokpɔ gome le eme la zi nenema ke woatsɔ kafukafu kple akpedada na Aƒetɔ la .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Esia tae ɖeɖi metea mi ́ a ŋu o eye mi ́ ana ta o . Togbɔ be mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ wo le gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔm ha ̃ la , ŋuse ̃ si tso Aƒetɔ la gbɔ eye wo ̀ le mi ́ a me la , le tsitsim ɖe edzi gbe sia gbe .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Xaxa kple fuwɔame siwo kata ̃ le mi ́ a dzi vam fifia la nu gbɔna yiyi ge kpuie . Eye le esia teƒe la , Mawu ana eƒe yayrawo kple ŋutikɔkɔe geɖe mi ́ ɖaa tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Susu sia tae mi ́ etsɔa nu siwo kpɔm mi ́ ele fifia la dea ta me o . Ke boŋ mi ́ etsɔa mi ́ aƒe susuwo gble ̃ na ɖe nu siwo le Aƒetɔ la gbɔ , siwo ke mi ́ ekpɔ haɖe o la dzi . Elabena fukpekpewo kata ̃ nu ava yi kpuie , ke dzidzɔ si gbɔna tso Aƒetɔ gbɔ la anɔ anyi tegbee .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Mi ́ enyae bena ne wokaka mi ́ aƒe anyigbadzixɔ siwo nye mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ wo la , Mawu ana ŋutila ̃ yeye , makumaku mi ́ le dziƒo . Eye xɔ yeye siwo Mawu ana mi ́ la menye amegbetɔwo ƒe asinudɔ o , ke Mawu ŋutɔe tui .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Mi ́ ele fu kpem ŋutɔ le mi ́ aƒe anyigba dzi ŋutila ̃ siawo me , eya tae wo ̀ le mi ́ a dzrom vevie eye mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm na gbe si gbe Aƒetɔ la atsɔ dziƒoŋutila ̃ yeyewo ava do na mi ́ abe awu ene .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Elabena menye gbɔgbɔme ko mi ́ anɔ o , ke boŋ Mawu ado awu na mi ́ esi nye dziƒoŋutila ̃ la .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Zi ale si mi ́ egale anyigbadziŋutila ̃ me ko la zi nenema ke mi ́ ekpea fu siwo hea hu ̃ ɖeɖe kple vevesese vaa mi ́ a dzi . Menye ɖe mi ́ ebe mi ́ adzo kaba le anyighbadziŋutila ̃ sia me o , ke boŋ mi ́ aƒe mɔkpɔkpɔe nye be Aƒetɔ la natsɔ dziƒotɔ si nye agbe la atsyɔ na mi ́ , bena wo ̀ aɖu esi me mi ́ ele fifia si gble ̃ na la dzi .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Mawu ŋutɔe ɖoe be tɔtrɔ sia nava mi ́ aƒe agbenɔnɔ me eya tae wo ̀ tsɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la de mi ́ a me abe kpeɖodzinu ene .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Azɔ la mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm kple dzideƒo na dziƒoŋutila ̃ yeye sia xɔxɔ . Mi ́ enyae bena zi ale si mi ́ egale anyigbadziŋutila ̃ me le afi sia la , mi ́ eɖo Aƒetɔ la gbɔ le dziƒo haɖe o .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Mi ́ enyae bena esiawo kata ̃ le eme vava ̃ to xɔse me ke menye to nukpɔkpɔ kple ŋku me o .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Ke dzideƒo blibo le mi ́ a si eye wo ̀ dzroa mi ́ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be mi ́ adzo le anyigbadziŋutila ̃ sia me aɖanɔ Aƒetɔ la gbɔ le eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe mavɔ la me .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Ke mi ́ aƒe didi vevi enye be ne mi ́ ele agbe le anyigbadziŋutila ̃ sia me alo mi ́ ele egbɔ le dziƒo la mi ́ awɔ eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu le nu sia nu me .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Elabena mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ava tsi tre ɖe Kristo ŋkume gbe ɖeka , bena wo ̀ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu mi ́ eye wo ̀ adzro mi ́ aƒe agbenɔɣinuwɔnawo me tsitotsito . Eye wo ̀ axe fe na ame sia ame pɛpɛpɛ ɖe ale si wo ̀ nɔ agbe le anyigba dzii la nu . Ne e ̀ wɔ nu nyui la , a ̃ xɔ fetu nyui eye ne e ̀ wɔ vɔ ̃ la , a ̃ xɔ fetu vɔ ̃ .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Mawuvɔvɔ ̃ si le mi ́ a me tae mi ́ eɖea gbeƒa ̃ eye mi ́ eƒoa dzimetɔtrɔ ƒe nya la ɖe amewo kata ̃ nu be woava Aƒetɔ la gbɔ . Mawu ŋutɔ nya bena mi ́ ele dɔ sia wɔm kple dzimekɔkɔ ; eye mexɔe se be miawo ha ̃ mienyae nenema tututu .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Menye mi ́ a ɖokui kafum mi ́ ele alo menye mi ́ a ɖokui dom mi ́ ele ɖe dzi o , ɖe ko mi ́ edi be miada ɖe mi ́ a dzi abe ame siwo nye Aƒetɔ la ƒe amedɔdɔ vava ̃ wo ene . Eye miate ŋu atsɔ mi ́ aƒo adegbee alo aɖo nya ŋu na nufiala alakpatɔ siwo le mia dome , ame siwo ƒe susu koe nye be yewoƒe dzedzeme nanya kpɔ nyuie le amewo gbɔ ko , ke woƒe dziwo me do viviti tsiɖitsiɖi .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Ne nya siawo sese ɖi le miaƒe towo me abe ɖe mi ́ aƒe susuwo da ene la , ekema le Mawu ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la tae . Ke ne miedze sii be mi ́ aƒe nyawo meɖi ame siwo ƒe tagbɔ tɔtɔ tɔ o la , ekema aɖe vi geɖe na mi .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Menye mi ́ a ŋutɔwo ƒe viɖekpɔkpɔ tae mi ́ ele nu sia nu si wɔm mi ́ ele la wɔm o ; mi ́ ele ewɔm elabena Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ le mi ́ a kplɔm . Esi mi ́ exɔe se bena Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ku ɖe mi ́ kata ̃ ta la , ele be mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ axɔe se be mi ́ eku na agbe xoxo siwo mi ́ enɔna tsa ̃ la .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Nu vevitɔ si ta Kristo ku ɖo lae nye be mi ́ ame siwo le agbe fifia eye mi ́ ekpɔ gome le Mawu ƒe amenuvevenunana si nye agbe mavɔ la me la , mi ́ aganɔ agbe na mi ́ a ɖokuiwo alo awɔ nu si dze mi ́ a ŋu o . Ele be mi ́ anɔ agbe na Kristo ɖeka ko , ame si ku , ke Fofo la fɔe ɖe tsitre la , eye mi ́ awɔ nu si nye eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu ko .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Eya ta tso fifia dzi heyina la migadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame aɖeke le ŋutila ̃ nu be , ame sia nye amega ̃ alo bubume alo be nɔvi kristotɔ aɖe nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔla o . Ŋku ma ƒomevie mi ́ etsɔ kpɔ Kristoe tsa ̃ be enye vɔ ̃ wɔla . Gake fifia la meganye nenemae mi ́ egale ekpɔmii o .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Ne ame aɖe xɔ Kristo abe eƒe Aƒetɔ ene la , Kristo tsɔa agbenɔnɔ yeye dea amea me . Agbenɔnɔ vɔ ̃ ɖi xoxotɔ si wo ̀ nɔna tsa ̃ la nu va yina , eye wo ̀ dzea agbe yeye nɔnɔ gɔme .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Nu siawo kata ̃ tso Mawu dɔmenyotɔ la gbɔ , ame si gbɔ agbe mi ́ awo ha ̃ eye wo ̀ gawɔa mi ́ etɔwoe to Kristo dzi . Mawu ŋutɔ tsɔ dɔ nyui sia de asi na mi ́ be mi ́ akplɔ ame bubuwo ha ̃ va egbɔe be wo ̀ akpɔ nublanui na wo eye woawɔ ɖeka kplii .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Gbeƒa ̃ si ko ɖem mi ́ ele fifia lae nye be Mawu , to Kristo dzi le xexeame kata ̃ kpem va eɖokui gbɔe . Ma ̃ gaɖo ŋku amewo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo dzi azɔ o , ke boŋ a ̃ tsɔ wo ake wo eye wo ̀ atutu wo ɖa keŋ . Nukunya siae wo ̀ de asi na mi ́ be mi ́ agblɔ na amewo kata ̃ .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Eya ta mi ́ awo la , Kristo ƒe amedɔdɔwoe mi ́ enye , eye Mawu le nu ƒom na mi to mi ́ a dzi . Mi ́ eto Kristo dzi hele kuku ɖem na mi be ame sia ame nadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ eye wo ̀ axɔ Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ si wo ̀ na be ne wo ̀ awɔ ɖeka kplii .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Elabena Kristo mewɔ nu vɔ ̃ aɖeke o , gake be mi ́ awo mi ́ akpɔ agbe ta la , Mawu tsɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ƒe agba dro ɖe eya amea dzi . Eye wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe dɔmenyo kple amenuveve ɖo eteƒe na mi ́ kata ̃ .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Esi mi ́ kata mi ́ enye Mawu ƒe hadɔwɔlawo ta la , mi ́ ele kuku ɖem na mi bena migado vlo Mawu ƒe amenuveve la o .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Elabena Mawu gblɔ be , “ Meɖo to wo ̀ le nye amenuveɣi la , eye mekpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ le xɔxɔgbe la . ” Mele egblɔm na wo ̀ be fifi enye amenuveɣi , kpɔ ɖa fifi enye xɔxɔgbe !

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Mi ́ edi be ame aɖeke nakpɔ vodada le dɔ si wɔm mi ́ ele na Aƒetɔ la ŋu o .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Eya ta le xaxawo , hia ̃ kamewo kple yometiti geɖewo me ha ̃ la mi ́ edoa dzi eye mi ́ eɖea mi ́ a ɖokui fiana abe Mawu ƒe subɔla vava ̃ wo ene .

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: Woƒo mi ́ eye wode mi ́ gaxɔ me , ame siwo lɔ veve heliheli ̃ ɖe dzime la tso ɖe mi ́ a ŋu kpɔ , mi ́ ewɔ dɔ sesi ̃ e ale be ɖeɖi te mi ́ a ŋu kpɔ ; mi ́ etsia za ̃ domadɔlɔ ̃ e eye dɔ wua mi ́ .

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: Le nu sia nu me la , mi ́ eɖea mi ́ a ɖokuiwo fiana abe mawuviwo ene eye mi ́ enɔa anyi le dzadzɛnyenye me . Mi ́ egbɔa dzi ɖi eye mi ́ enyoa dɔme na ame sia ame . Ale si mi ́ edze si Aƒetɔ lae ŋu mi ́ ezɔna ɖo . Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la yɔ mi ́ fu ̃ u eye mi ́ ezɔna le eme kple lɔlɔ ̃ si me alakpa mele o .

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: Mi ́ ezɔna le Mawu ƒe nyateƒe kple eƒe ŋuse ̃ me , esi nana be mi ́ ekpɔa dziɖuɖu ɣesiaɣi . Eye ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe aʋawɔnu siwo le nuɖusime kple miame la le mi ́ a si .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Nenye be amewo de bubu mi ́ a ŋu alo do ŋukpe mi ́ , nenye be wodzu mi ́ alo kafu mi ́ eye wose nyateƒe si gblɔm mi ́ ele gake wogbe be yewomaxɔe o , eye wobu mi ́ abe alakpatɔwo ene ha ̃ la , Aƒetɔ la ko mi ́ anɔ agbe na .

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: Xexeametɔwo mebua mi ́ ɖe naneke me o , gake Mawu ya nya mi ́ nyuie . Mi ́ ele kudo nu ɣesiaɣi , gake kpɔɖa , mi ́ ele agbe wu nu sia nu . Wode abi mi ́ a ŋu gake mieku o .

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe dziwo sea veve ŋutɔ eye mi ́ ele ́ a blanui , gake Aƒetɔ la tsɔa eƒe dzidzɔ dea mi ́ a me . Mi ́ enye kesinɔtɔ le xexeamenuwo me o , gake mi ́ enaa gbɔgbɔmenunana xɔasiwo . Mi ́ edzena abe ame siwo si naneke mele o la ene gake nu sia nu nye mi ́ a tɔ to Kristo me .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Nɔvi Korinto hametɔ lɔlɔ ̃ awo , meʋu nye dzi me faa gblɔ nu siwo le eme la na mi . Mi ́ elɔ ̃ a mi ŋutɔ eya ta

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: mi ́ eɣla naneke ɖe mi o , ke boŋ mi ́ elɔ ̃ mi tso dzi blibo me gake ewɔ nuku ŋutɔ be mieʋu miaƒe dziwo me ɖe mi ́ a ŋu abe ale si mi ́ awo mi ́ ewɔe na mi ene o .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Azɔ la medi be maƒo nu na mi abe vinye ŋutɔ ŋutɔwo ene . Mina be miaƒe dɔme nakɔ ɖe mi ́ a ŋu , eye mialɔ ̃ mi ́ tso dzi blibo me abe ale si mi ́ elɔ ̃ mii ene .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Migawɔ ɖeka kple ame siwo melɔ ̃ a Aƒetɔ la o . Ƒomedodo kae le xɔsetɔwo kple dzimaxɔsetɔwo dome ? Eye ale ke kekeli kple viviti ate ŋu anɔ teƒe ɖekae le ɣeyiɣi ɖeka me ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Ale ke Kristo si nye dzɔdzɔetɔwo ƒe fia kple Abosam si nye nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ƒe fia la ate ŋu awɔ ɖekae ? Eye ale ke kristotɔ ha ̃ ate ŋu awɔ ɖeka kple abosamtɔ ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Nenema ke mele be ɖekawɔwɔ aɖeke nanɔ gbedoxɔ kple trɔ ̃ xɔ dome o . Mi ́ awoe nye Mawu gbagbe la ƒe gbedoxɔ , afi si wo ̀ nɔna . Mawu ŋutɔ gblɔ bena , “ Manɔ ame siwo nye tɔnyewo la dome , mazɔ le wo dome . Manye woƒe Mawu eye woawo ha ̃ woanye nye dukɔ . ”

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Esia tae Aƒetɔ la gblɔ be , “ Vinyewo mido go ɖa le wo dome , eye miaɖe vovo ɖa tso wo gbɔ le nu sia nu me . Migade asi woƒe nu si wo ŋuti mekɔ o , alo nu ƒoɖi siwo wowɔna la ŋuti o , ekema maxɔ mi abe tɔnyewo ene ;

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: manye mia Fofo eye miawo ha ̃ mianye vinye ŋutsuwo kple vinye nyɔnuwo . ”

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Ke azɔ nɔvinye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo esi Mawu do ŋugbe ga ̃ siawo na mi ́ ta la , mina mi ́ a dzudzɔ nu gbegble ̃ wɔwɔ . Eye mi ́ ate ɖa xaa tso nu siwo ƒoa ɖi mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ kple gbɔgbɔ la gbɔ , eye mi ́ anɔ agbe kɔkɔewo to Aƒetɔ la vɔvɔ ̃ me , ale ́ eƒe nyawo me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Le mi ́ aƒe dɔwɔwɔ me kpli mi la mi ́ ekplɔ ame aɖeke to mɔ tatra aɖeke dzi o , mi ́ eba ame aɖeke alo gble ̃ ame aɖeke ƒe naneke o eya ta miʋu miaƒe dziwo ƒe ʋɔtruwo ne miaxɔ mi ́ ɖe eme .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Nyemele esiawo gblɔm be matsɔ fɔbubu aɖeke ada ɖe mia dzi o , elabena megblɔ va yi xoxo be mena teƒe mi le nye dzi me tegbee be manɔ agbe kpli mi eye maku ha ̃ kpli mi .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Meɖoa dzi ɖe mia ŋu ŋutɔ eye medana ɖe mia dzi ha ̃ ŋutɔ eye togbɔ be nuxaxa kple vevesese geɖe le dzinye ha ̃ la , ne meɖo ŋku mia dzi ko la , dzideƒo ɖoa asinye eye dzidzɔ yɔa menye taŋtaŋtaŋ .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Mi ́ ekpɔ ŋutifafa aɖeke esi mi ́ eva ɖo Makedonia o , fukpekpewo sɔŋ koe ƒo xla ̃ mi ́ . Amewo do dzre na mi ́ to mɔ ɖe sia aɖe dzi , eye vɔvɔ ̃ kple ŋɔdzi yɔ mi ́ a me fu ̃ u ŋutɔ .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Ke Mawu , ame si ŋutɔ dea dzi ƒo na ame siwo ƒo dzi ɖe le la , de dzi ƒo na mi ́ awo ha ̃ esi Tito va ɖo mi ́ a gbɔ .

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: Menye esi wo ̀ va ɖo mi ́ a gbɔ dedie la ɖeɖe koe na be mi ́ ekpɔ dzidzɔ o , ke boŋ nya siwo keŋ wo ̀ gagblɔ nam tso mia ŋuti tae ; ale si miexɔe nyuie , ale si wo ̀ nye miaƒe didi be yewoakpɔm , eye ale si wove mi ŋutɔ be mele fu geɖe kpem kple ale si miele klalo be yewoale ́ nu siwo mefia mi la ko me ɖe asi la , na megli kple dzidzɔ .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Fifia la megavem be meŋlɔ agbale ̃ sese ̃ ma ɖo ɖe mi o , togbɔ be mexa nu geɖe le eŋu le gɔmedzedzea me ha ̃ la , menya be miawo ha ̃ miexa nu ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Azɔ la mekpɔ dzidzɔ manyagblɔ aɖe bena meɖo agbale ̃ ma ɖe mi . Nyemele dzidzɔ kpɔm bena miexa nu o , ke boŋ be agbale ̃ la na miedzudzɔ agbe vlowo nɔnɔ eye mieva Aƒetɔ la gbɔ . Mawu ŋutɔe to dzinye ŋlɔ agbale ̃ ma na mi be miadzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ eya ta menye mi ́ awoe na miexa nu o .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Elabena ɣeaɖewoɣi la , Mawu nana mi ́ exaa nu be mi ́ adze si mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo eye mi ́ adzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔwɔ eye mi ́ adi agbe mavɔ la . Ke ne ame aɖe menye kristotɔ o gake wo ̀ xa nu vevie le eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbe vlo nɔnɔ ta gake metrɔ zu kristotɔ o la , ayi dzo mavɔ me godoo le eƒe kugbe .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Miawo ŋutɔ mikpɔ nu si Mawu wɔ na mi to agbale ̃ si meŋlɔ na mi dzi la ɖa . Ena mieku kutri eye mietsi dzimaɖi be yewoatsri nu vɔ ̃ si ŋu meƒo nu le na mi la wɔwɔ . Vɔvɔ ̃ ɖo mi le nuwɔna ma ta eye miedi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be mava kpe ɖe yewo ŋuti le nya sia me . Miehe to na ame siwo wɔ nu gbegble ̃ sia ha ̃ vevie , eye mieɖe mia ɖokui fia be miede nu si wo ̀ wɔ la dzi o .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Eya ta ɖe meŋlɔ agbale ̃ a koŋ be Aƒetɔ la naɖe ale si melɔ ̃ na na mi ́ la afia ke menye ɖe ŋutsu ma si xɔ fofoa srɔ ̃ alo fofoa si ŋu wo ̀ da vo ɖo la koŋ ta o .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Hekpe ɖe dzideƒo si miena mi ́ to lɔlɔ ̃ si mieɖe fia mi ́ la ŋu la , mi ́ egakpɔ dzidzɔ geɖe ha ̃ le ale si miexɔ Tito kple nu nyui siwo kata ̃ miewɔ nɛ be eƒe dzi dze eme la ta .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Hafi Tito nadzo le gbɔnye la , metsɔ mi ƒo adegbe nɛ eye meɖi ɖase nyui le mia ŋuti nɛ , eye vava ̃ miewɔ nu siwo megblɔ nɛ tso mia ŋuti la ha ̃ nɛ . Abe ale si metoa nyateƒe na mi le nu sia nu me ene la , nenema ke me gblɔ nyateƒe tso mia ŋuti na Tito ha ̃ .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Azɔ ne Tito ha ̃ ɖo ŋku ale si mieɖo toe le nu si wo ̀ fia mi me , ale si mieɖe lɔlɔ ̃ fiae kple ale si miexɔe kple dzi blibo dzi la , enana be eya ha ̃ ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na mi gadzina ɖe edzi .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Ke esi menya be ɖekawɔwɔ kple lɔlɔ ̃ gaɖo mi ́ a dome azɔ la , ena be nye ha ̃ mekpɔ dzidzɔ blibo eye megaɖo ŋu ɖe mia ŋu le nu sia nu me .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Azɔ la nɔviwo , medi be magblɔ nu siwo wɔm Mawu le , le Makedonia hamewo me to eƒe amenuveve me la fia mi .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Togbɔ be wole fu geɖe kpem eye wonye ame dahewo ha ̃ la , wokɔ dɔme faa eye wodzɔa nu kple dzidzɔ .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Mele ɖase ɖim le hame siawo ŋuti bena wodzea agbagba dzɔa nu ŋutɔ eye wowɔnɛ wo ̀ wua ale si woate ŋui gɔ ̃ ha ̃ kple dzi faa ke menye ɖe metee ɖe wo dzi be woawɔe o .

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Woɖe kuku na mi ́ be mi ́ axɔ yewo ha ̃ ƒe nunana ale be yewo ha ̃ yewoakpɔ dzidzɔ be yewona kpekpeɖeŋu ame kɔkɔe siwo le Yerusalem .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Esi ƒo wo kata ̃ ta eye wo ̀ wɔ nuku na mi ́ lae nye be wotsɔ wo ɖokuiwo na Kristo kple mi ́ awo ha ̃ eye wolɔ ̃ be yewoaɖo to nya sia nya si mi ́ egblɔ na wo la . Wowɔ esia kple dzidzɔ geɖe ŋutɔ .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Esia ta mi ́ ebia tso Tito , ame si de dzi ƒo na mi le yayra si le nunanadɔ si gɔme miedze me la , si be wo ̀ ayi edzi ade dzi ƒo na mi be miawu amenuvedɔ sia nu le mia dome .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Ale si miede ŋgɔ le xɔse , nufiafia , nunya , vevidodo kple lɔlɔ ̃ si mietsɔ na mi ́ me la , nenema ke medi be mianye ame gba ̃ tɔwo le lɔlɔ ̃ nunanadɔ sia ha ̃ me .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Menye ɖe mele se dem na mi alo le mia dzi zim be miawɔ nunana kokoko o , ke boŋ ale si wo ̀ nye hame bubuwo ƒe didi vevie be yewoawɔ nunana alea tae medi be miawo ha ̃ miaɖe miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ afia abe hame bubuwo ha ̃ ene .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Miawo ŋutɔ mienya mi ́ a Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ kple dɔmenyo ga ̃ si wo ̀ ɖe fia la bena , togbɔ be kesinɔtɔ ŋutɔ wo ̀ nye gake be wo ̀ awɔe bena mi ame siwo nye nublanuitɔwo kple hia ̃ tɔwo la miava zu kesinɔtɔwo la , egble ̃ eƒe kesinɔnuwo kple ŋutikɔkɔe kata ̃ da ɖi eye wo ̀ va wɔ miawo boŋ miezu kesinɔtɔwo .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Medi be maɖo aɖaŋu na mi be miado vevi nu le nunana sia me , awu nu si gɔme miedze le ƒe si va yi me la nu elabena miawoe nye ame gba ̃ tɔ siwo do susu sia ɖa eye mieɖee fia be miele klalo ɖe ewɔwɔ ŋuti ha ̃ .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Azɔ esi miedze ʋua ƒoƒo gɔme dzidzɔtɔe alea la miaƒoe nenema va se ɖe nuwuwu . Mina nu si miate ŋui la tso nu si le mia si la me .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ne enye miaƒe didi be yewoana nu mi ́ la , migatsi dzi le ga home si sinu le mia si la ŋu o . Mawu ƒe didie nye be nana nu si nate ŋui ke menye wu esi le asiwo o .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Menye mi ́ aƒe didie wo ̀ nye be miamia ŋku ana ga fu ̃ u be ame siwo miele nua dzɔm na la , nazu kesinɔtɔwo atsɔ miaƒe ga anɔ agbe vivi ɖum o .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Ke boŋ ɖe mi ́ edi be miama nu siwo le mia si la kpli wo . Fifia la nu geɖe le mia si , eya ta mikpe ɖe wo ŋu , ale be ne emegbe nu megava le mia si o , ke wo ̀ le woawo si la , woawo ha ̃ nakpe ɖe mia ŋu . To esia me la , ame sia ame akpɔ etɔ sinua .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Abe ale si wo ̀ le Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la mee ene be , “ Ame si ƒoa ƒu nuwo fu ̃ u ha ̃ mekpɔ ɖeka ɖe edzi o , ke ame si ƒo ƒu sue aɖe la ha ̃ la naneke mehia ̃ e o . ”

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Mi ́ eda akpe na Mawu bena wo ̀ dee Tito ƒe dzime be wo ̀ akpe ɖe mia ŋu axlɔ ̃ nu mi le dɔ sia ƒe vevinyenye ŋuti abe nye ke ene .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Tito kpɔ dzidzɔ ŋutɔ esi mi ́ egblɔ nɛ be wo ̀ agava kpɔ mi ɖa . Eya ŋutɔ ha ̃ di vevie be yeava hafi mi ́ egblɔe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Mele nɔvi nyanyɛ bubu aɖe ha ̃ ɖom ɖa kpe ɖe Tito ŋuti le mɔzɔzɔ sia me . Hame geɖewo ɖi ɖase le ale si nɔvi sia ha ̃ kpɔ gome le Mawu ƒe amenuvevenunana la me be wo ̀ agblɔ Aƒetɔ la ƒe nyanyui la kple dzideƒo la ŋuti .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , hameawo tia nɔvi sia ha ̃ be eya ha ̃ nanɔ mi ́ ame siwo le miaƒe nunanawo tsɔ ge ayi Yerusalem la dome . Mi ́ ele dɔ sia wɔm be mi ́ atsɔ ade bubu Aƒetɔ la ŋuti eye mi ́ aɖe ale si wo ̀ nye mi ́ aƒe didi vevie be mi ́ akpe ɖe mi ́ a nɔewo ŋuti la ha ̃ afia .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Nu si ta wo ̀ hia ̃ be woatia amewo tso hameawo me woayi Yerusalem kple nunana lae nye be , mi ́ edi be ne ameawo trɔ gbɔ la woagblɔ ale si mi ́ ema nunana ga ̃ sia la fia .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Mawu ŋutɔ nya be nuteƒewɔlawo mi ́ enye gake mi ́ edi be amewo ha ̃ nanya esia .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Mi ́ egale nɔvi bubu ha ̃ ɖom ɖe mi kpe ɖe wo ŋuti ame sia ha ̃ nye hadɔwɔla vevi ɖeka . Eya ha ̃ di vevie be yeakpe ɖe mia ŋu , esi megblɔ miaƒe vevidodo nɛ .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Đewohi ̃ ne ame aɖe bia mi bena ame kae nye Tito ha ̃ la , migblɔ be eya kple nye Pauloe le dɔ wɔm na Aƒetɔ la eye wo ̀ nye tenyeƒenɔla le mia gbɔ . Eye ne wobia nu tso nɔvi eve bubuawo ha ̃ ŋu la , migblɔ ko be ame dɔdɔwoe wonye tso hame bubuawo me eye wonye kristotɔ vava ̃ siwo nye Aƒetɔ la tɔ .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Meɖe kuku mitsɔ lɔlɔ ̃ si le mia me ɖe ŋunye la na ame siawo ha ̃ , ale be woakpɔe be ale si meƒoa adegbe tso mia ŋuti la le eme vava ̃ .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Mikpɔe be megahia ̃ kokoko bena magaŋlɔ agbale ̃ na mi le ale si wo ̀ hia ̃ be miadzɔ nu na nɔvi siwo le Yerusalem la ŋu o .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Elabena menya ale si wo ̀ nye miaƒe didi vevie be yewoawɔ lɔlɔ ̃ nununana sia , eye metsɔ esia ƒo adegbe na Makedonia hamewo be miele klalo kple miaƒe nunanawo abe ƒe ɖekae nye esia ene . Le nyateƒe me la , esia de dzo tɔxɛ aɖe woawo ha ̃ me be wodzea nudzɔdzɔ gɔme .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Ke mele nɔvi siawo dɔm kple miaƒe nudzɔdzɔawo vava ̃ , elabena mi ́ etsɔ mi ƒo adegbe na amewo ŋutɔ eye nyemedi be mi ́ aƒe adegbe sia natrɔ zu alakpa o .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Eye anye ŋukpe nam ŋutɔ eye wo ̀ anye ŋukpe na miawo ha ̃ ne nɔvi siwo tso Makedonia va kplim ko wo ̀ ava dzɔ be miele klalo abe ale si megblɔ na wo ene o .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Esia tae mele nɔvi siawo dɔm ɖo ɖe mia gbɔ be woakpɔ egbɔ be nu siwo ŋugbe miedo la nasɔ gbe hafi nye ŋutɔ mava . Ale be wo ̀ anye nu si miena faa tso dzime eye menye tso dzizizi me o .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Ke medi be esia nanɔ nyanya me na mi be , ame si ana nu sue aɖe la , nu si wo ̀ akpɔ ɖe eteƒe anɔ sue . Agbledela si ƒa ̃ nuku sue aɖe ko la , xaa nuku sue aɖe ko le nuxaɣi , gake nenye be wo ̀ ƒa ̃ nuku wo ̀ sɔ gbɔ la axa nuku fu ̃ u le nuxaɣi .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Ale si sinu ame aɖe di be yeana ko la nenae ; migazi ame aɖeke dzi be nena wu ale si wo ̀ ate ŋui o . Elabena Mawu kpɔa dzidzɔ geɖe le ame siwo naa nu kple dzi faa la ŋu .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Seɖoƒe aɖeke meli na Mawu ƒe nunana si wo ̀ naa mi gbe sia gbe o . Eya ŋutɔ naa nu siwo hia ̃ a mi la mi , eye wo ̀ nanɛ le agbɔsɔsɔ blibo me be , ne miewɔ wo ŋutidɔ ʋuu ha ̃ la , agatsi anyi za ̃ be miana ame bubuwo ha ̃ .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Ele Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la me bena , “ Ema eƒe nuwo na ame dahewo yi keke didiƒewo ke , eya ta eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye anɔ anyi tegbetegbe . ”

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Ke Mawu ame si naa nuku agbledela wo ̀ ƒa ̃ na eye emegbe la wo ̀ yrana ɖe edzi be wo ̀ akpɔ nuɖuɖu gbe sia gbe la , ana nuku geɖewo mi be miaƒa ̃ eye wo ̀ ana woatsi aʋa ̃ nyuie ale gbegbe be miakpɔ nuku geɖe le nuxaɣi be miatsɔ ɖewo ana ame bubuwo ha ̃ .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Mawu ŋutɔ ana be miazu kesinɔtɔwo ale be miate ŋu ana nu ame dahewo ɣesiaɣi , ale be ne mi ́ etsɔ wo yii na wo la , woada akpe geɖe na Mawu le ale si miekpe ɖe wo ŋu ta .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Ale miakpɔe be nu evee do go tso miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nunana si nam miele la me ; woawoe nye be ame siwo hia ̃ m nu le la kpɔ nu siwo le wo hia ̃ m la eye woatsɔ akpedada blibo na Fofo la .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Nɔvi siwo kata ̃ ŋu miele kpekpem ɖo la makpɔ dzidzɔ le miaƒe nunana nyuiwo ɖeɖe ko ŋuti o , ke boŋ woakafu Mawu ha ̃ le ale si wo ̀ to Kristo dzi wɔ mi miezu ame yeyewo eye Kristo ɖeɖe ko le miaƒe dzime la ta . Eye miaƒe nunana ha ̃ nye kpeɖodzi be Kristo le mia me vava ̃ .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Nɔvi siawo ado gbe ɖa ɖe mia ta vevie ada akpe ga ̃ aɖe na Fofo la le amenuvedɔ ga ̃ siwo wo ̀ wɔ na wo to mia dzi la ta .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Akpedada kple kafukafu woatsɔ ana Mawu le Via si nye nunana vava ̃ tɔ la ta .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Azɔ la , nye Paulo ŋutɔ mele nu xlɔ ̃ m mi kple dzigbɔɖi abe ale si Kristo ŋutɔ awɔ ene . Ke mia dometɔ aɖewo le gbɔgblɔm be , “ Ne mele adzɔge la meŋlɔa agbale ̃ sese ̃ wo na mi , gake ne meva mia gbɔ ko la menɔa anyi abe vɔvɔ ̃ nɔtɔ ene . ”

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: Mele kuku ɖem na mi bena migana be makplɔ mi kple asi sese ̃ ne meva mia gbɔ o . Menya be ŋuse ̃ le asinye maza ̃ ɖe ame siwo buna le mia dome be amegbetɔ ƒe nunya kple ŋuse ̃ ko metsɔ le dɔ wɔmii la ŋu hafi gake nyemedi be mawɔ alea o .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Enye nyateƒe bena amegbetɔe menye , eye ŋuse ̃ aɖeke mele ŋunye o . Gake menye amegbetɔwo ƒe mɔwo kple ŋuse ̃ metsɔna wɔa aʋawo o .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Menye amegbetɔwo ƒe ŋuse ̃ mi ́ eza ̃ na o , ke boŋ Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ si tri akɔ wu nu sia nu lae mi ́ etsɔna ɖua Abosam ƒe ŋuse ̃ wo kata ̃ dzi .

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: Mi ́ etsɔa Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ sia ɖua nya vlo siwo kata ̃ amegbetɔwo gblɔna ɖe Mawu ŋuti la dzi eye eyae mi ́ etsɔna gba ̃ a gli si wo ̀ tu ƒo xla ̃ amewo be woagadze si Mawu o . Eye to ŋuse ̃ sia me la , mi ́ ele ́ a ame si dze agla ̃ ɖe Mawu ŋuti la kluvii be wo ̀ atrɔ gbɔ va Mawu gbɔ eye mi ́ etrɔa eƒe susuwo be wo ̀ aɖo to Kristo .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Ŋuse ̃ ma kee mi ́ etsɔ he miawo ha ̃ va Kristo gbɔe , eye eya kee mi ́ atsɔ ahe to na mi , ame siwo me agla ̃ dzegbɔgbɔ gale le hamea me la vevie .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Nu si le fu ɖem na mi lae nye be , mietsɔ ameŋkumekpɔkpɔ ɖo dɔe , eye miele nye ha ̃ kpɔm be ŋuse ̃ aɖeke mele ŋunye o . Ke medi be miase egɔme bena ne ame aɖe ate ŋu agblɔ be Krsito ƒe ŋuse ̃ le ye si tututu la , nye Pauloe ate ŋu agblɔ esia .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Đewohi ̃ la awɔ na mi abe ɖe mele adegbe ƒom akpa le Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ si wo ̀ nam la ta ene . Gake nye la menye ŋukpe nam bena maƒo adegbe le Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ si wonam la ta o , elabena ɖe wo ̀ na ŋuse ̃ siam be matsɔ tu mii ɖe edzi , menye be matsɔ agble ̃ nu le mia ŋu o .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Nyemedi be miabui bena ɖe ko mele vɔvɔ ̃ dom na mi kple nye agbale ̃ wo o .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Mia dometɔ aɖewo gblɔ be , “ Miɖe asi le Paulo ya ŋu , elabena ne ele adzɔge la eyae wo ̀ ŋlɔa agbale ̃ nɔa ŋɔdzi kple vɔvɔ ̃ dom na ame . Gake ne eya ŋutɔ va la megatea ŋu gblɔa nya mawo dometɔ aɖeke o , ke boŋ eƒoa nu abe ɖevi ene .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Menya mawunya aɖeke ha ̃ gbɔgblɔ o . ” Ke medi be ame siwo le nya mawo gblɔm la , nadzra ɖo ɖi , elabena ne mi ́ eva la , ŋuse ̃ si mi ́ etsɔ ŋlɔ agbale ̃ awo la , mi ́ ele eɖe ge afia wo .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Mi ́ edi be mi ́ awɔ abe ale si mia dometɔ aɖewo wɔna nɔa wo ɖokuiwo kafum , eye wonɔa nya ʋlim le wo ɖokuiwo dome be ame kae nye ga ̃ tɔ ha ̃ o . Nu siawo kata ̃ nye movidzɔdzɔ be miadi be yewoakpɔ be ame kae nye ga ̃ tɔ wu le yewo dome ha ̃ ?

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Ke mi ́ awo la , mi ́ aƒo adegbe le nu si le mi ́ asi la ko ŋu ; nu si Aƒetɔ la de mi ́ a si be mi ́ awɔ siwo dometɔ ɖekae nye be mi ́ atsɔ nyanyui la ava mia gbɔe la koe nye mi ́ aƒe taɖodzinu .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Mi ́ edze agɔ ne mi ́ egblɔ bena ŋuse ̃ le mi ́ a si ɖe mia dzi o , elabena mi ́ awoe nye ame gba ̃ tɔ siwo tsɔ Kristo ƒe nyanyui la vɛ na mi .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Eye menye ɖe mi ́ ele didim be mi ́ aƒo adegbe le ame bubu ƒe dɔ si wo ̀ wɔ le mia dome la ta o , ke mi ́ aƒe didi vevie nye miaƒe xɔse natsi ɖe edzi be mi ́ ate ŋu awɔ dɔ ga ̃ wo le mia dome le ɖoɖo si wona mi ́ la nu .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Le esia megbe la , mi ́ ate ŋu akpɔ mɔ atsɔ Kristo ƒe nyanyui la ayii na dukɔ siwo le adzɔge le mia gbɔ afi si ame aɖeke mede haɖe o be woawo ha ̃ nadze si Kristo . Ale be ame aɖeke nagagblɔ be yee nye ame gba ̃ tɔ si tsɔ nyanyui la yi du ma me hafi mi ́ eva o .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
