text2: Mawunya gblɔe be , “ Ame sia ame si di be yeaƒo adegbe la naƒoe le nu si Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo wɔ la ko ŋu eye menye le amea ŋutɔ ŋu o . ”

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Elabena ame si ƒoa adegbe le eya ŋutɔ ƒe dɔwɔwo ŋuti la , medzea Aƒetɔ la ŋu o , ke ame si ƒe dɔwɔwɔ ŋu Aƒetɔ la kpɔ ŋudzedze nyui le lae nye dɔwɔla nyuitɔ .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Mexɔ se be miagbɔ dzi ɖi ase nye movinya siwo gblɔm mele na mi . Miɖo to ne magblɔ nye dzimenyawo na mi .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Metsi dzi vevie ɖe mia ŋu be mianye Kristo ɖeka ko tɔ , eye mialɔ ̃ Kristo ɖeka hɔ ̃ ko tso dzi vava ̃ me abe ale si ɖetugbi tsɔa eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ naa ŋutsu si wotsɔe na be wo ̀ aɖe la ene .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Gake mele vɔvɔ ̃ m ɖe mia nu bena ɖewohi ̃ la , ame aɖe ava ble mi eye wo ̀ atrɔ miaƒe susu ɖa tso Kristo gbɔ , abe ale si da dzeaye ma ble Eva le Eden bɔ mee ene .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Nu si ta mele esiawo gblɔm lae nye be edze nam be mia beble le bɔbɔe eye ne ame aɖe va mia gbɔ va ɖe gbeƒa ̃ Yesu bubu si to vovo tso esi ŋuti mi ́ efia nu mi le la gbɔ alo wo ̀ fia nu bubu sa ̃ a mi , alo ƒo nu tso gbɔgbɔ bubu aɖe si mesɔ kple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe si miexɔ o ŋuti la , miexɔa ame ma dzi sena bɔbɔe .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Ke nye Paulo mexɔe se be , ame siwo nɔa wo ɖokuiwo yɔm be Mawu ƒe ame dɔdɔwo yewonye la , menyo wum le mɔ aɖeke nu o .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Ne nyemeɖea ami ɖe nye nuƒo abe ale si woawo wɔnɛ ene o ha ̃ la , menya nu si tututu gblɔm mele , elabena Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋuse ̃ me meƒoa nu le abe ale si miawo ŋutɔ mienya ene .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Azɔ esi meva mia gbɔ eye meɖe gbeƒa ̃ Mawu ƒe nyanyui la na mi le ɖokuibɔbɔɖeanyi blibo me eye nyemexɔ naneke le mia si o la , eyae nye nu vɔ ̃ si mewɔ ɖe mia ŋu eya ta miebum ɖe naneke me oa ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi si mele gbeƒa ̃ ɖem le mia gbɔ la , hame bubuwoe nɔ dzinye kpɔm . Ale be wo ̀ va zu be mexɔ nu siwo hame bubuwo nam la hetsɔ wɔ dɔe le mia gbɔ .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Esi menɔ mia gbɔ eye nanewo va hia ̃ m la nyemebia mi o , ke boŋ kristotɔ siwo tso Makedonia va gbɔnye lae tsɔ nu sia nu vɛ nam . Meɖoe be nyemanye agba na mi o , eya tae nyemebia pesewa ɖeka ha ̃ va se ɖe fifia o , eye nyemabia mi ha ̃ gbeɖegbeɖe o .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Abe ale si Kristo ƒe nyateƒe la le menye ene la , ame aɖeke mate ŋu atrɔ nye susu sia o eye mana nɔvi siwo kata ̃ le Akaya nutowo me la ha ̃ nanya nu le esia ŋuti .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Ame aɖe agblɔ be ɖe nyemelɔ ̃ mi kristotɔwo o eya ta megblɔ esia ɖo gake mele eme nenema o elabena Mawu ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ nya be melɔ ̃ mi vevie .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Ke mawɔ nu si meɖo la dzi be matsɔ ɖe ke le miaƒe apostolo siwo le adegbe ƒom bena yewo ha ̃ Mawu ƒe dɔ ko wɔm yewole abe mi ́ awo ke ene la te .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Nenɔ nyanya me na mi bena menye Mawue dɔ alakpa aʋatsopostolo mawo o . Alakpatɔwo wonye , eye wodze agbagba ble mi be Kristo ƒe apostolowo yewonye .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Esia mewɔ nuku nam o , elabena Satana ŋutɔ ha ̃ tea ŋu trɔa eɖokui ɣeaɖewoɣi abe Mawu ƒe dɔla ene .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Eya ta menye nu wɔnuku aɖeke wo ̀ nye kura be Satana ƒe dɔlawo trɔ wo ɖokuiwo abe Kristo ƒe dɔlawo ene o . Gake le nuwuwu la woahe to na wo ɖe woƒe nuwɔnawo ta .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Megale kuku ɖem na mi be migabu be ɖe nyemenya ale si maƒo nui abe ame mawo ene o eye nenye be nyemenya ale si maƒo nui abe woawo ene o ha ̃ la , miɖe mɔ nam be maƒo nu abe abunɛtɔ ene eye nye ha ̃ maƒo adegbe vie abe woawo ene .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Adegbe sia ƒoƒo menye nu si Aƒetɔ la di tso asinye be mawɔ o gake mele eƒo ge abe ale si ame tagbɔmanɔsitɔ ƒoa nui ene .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Abe ale si ame geɖewo ƒoa adegbe be yewonye ame tɔxɛwo le xexeame ene la , nenema ke nye ha ̃ mele wɔwɔ ge fi ̃ fi ̃ laa .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Miebe nunyalawoe yewonyea , gake mieɖoa to la ̃ nyawo dzidzɔtɔe .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Mielɔ ̃ wotsɔ mi wɔ kluviwoe woɖoa nu siwo menyo o la na mi miewɔna , wona miekpɔ wo dzi , wowɔa wo ɖokuiwo glodzoo eye wokaa mo na mi ɖe madzɔmadzɔ dzi gake miekea nu o .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Enye ŋukpe nam be magblɔ be dzideƒo kple ŋuse ̃ mele asinye be maƒo nu nenema o , ke nu sia nu si ŋu woaƒo adegbe le la nye ha ̃ mate ŋu aƒo adegbe le nenema nu ma ŋu . Eye enye dada nam be megale nu ƒom abe la ̃ ene .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Woƒoa adegbe be Hebritɔwo yewonye , nye ha ̃ Hebritɔ menye . Wobe Israelviwo yewonye , nye ha ̃ Israelvi menye , eye wobe Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwoe yewonye , nye ha ̃ Abraham ƒe dzidzimevie menye .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Megale nu ƒom dadatɔe abe ame si ƒe tagbɔ da enea ? Wobe Kristo ƒe subɔlawo yewonyea ? Gake mesubɔa Kristo wu wo kata ̃ . Eye mewɔ dɔ wu wo elabena le Kristo ta wodem gaxɔ me zi geɖe , woƒom kutɔkutɔe eye ɣeaɖewoɣi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , medea tsie ̃ ƒe gagbɔna .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Yudatɔwo ƒom zi atɔ ̃ sɔŋ , eye le ƒoƒo ɖe sia ɖe me la , woƒom zi blaetɔ ̃ - vɔ - asieke .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Romatɔwo ha ̃ ƒom zi etɔ ̃ kple gakawo , eye woƒu kpem zi ɖeka . Menɔ tɔdziʋu me wo ̀ gba ̃ zi etɔ ̃ sɔŋ ; ɣeaɖeɣi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ mege dze atsiaƒu me eye menɔ atsiaƒu gbanaa la me za ̃ ɖeka kple ŋkeke ɖeka .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Mezɔ mɔ didi teɖeɖiameŋu geɖewo eye nye agbe ɖo xaxame le tɔɖɔɖɔ , fiafitɔwo , Yudatɔwo kple Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ta . Le nyateƒe me la , meto dzɔgbevɔ ̃ ewo me le afi sia afi si mede la , le du ga ̃ wo me , gbedzi kple ƒudzi siaa . Nenema ke ame aɖewo siwo be yewonye nɔviwo le Kristo me evɔ mele eme nenema o ha ̃ do ŋɔdzi na nye agbe .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Le dɔwɔwɔ fu ̃ u ta la ɖeɖi tea ŋunye eye metsi za ̃ domadɔlɔ ̃ e zi geɖe . Dɔ kple tsikɔ wuam zi geɖe . Dɔƒe ha ̃ menɔa asinye o , eye le za ̃ me la vuvɔ wɔam elabena avɔ titri menɔa asinye o .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Hekpe ɖe nu siawo ŋuti la , metsina dzodzodzoe enuenu tso hamewo ƒe tsitsi ɖe edzi ŋuti .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Ne ame aɖe le hame aɖe me si gbɔdzɔ la etena ɖe dzinye eye nye ha ̃ megbɔdzɔna enumake , eye ne hamevi aɖe wɔ nu vɔ ̃ eye wo ̀ dze anyi la , enana be nuxaxa yɔa nye dzi me .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Azɔ ne medi be maƒo adegbe la , ɖe ko maƒoe le nu siwo nana be ŋuse ̃ mele ŋunye o la ŋu .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Mawu , ame si nye Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo Fofo , eye wo ̀ dze kafukafu tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me la ha ̃ nya bena nyateƒe gblɔm mele .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Esi menɔ Damasko la , fia Areta ɖo asrafowo dua ƒe agbowo nu be woale ́ m .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Gake nɔvi siwo le afi ma la de ka kusi ŋu eye wotsɔm da ɖe kusia me hetsɔ to do si le glia me la me eye mesi dzo le egbɔ . Đe esia mefia be ame geɖewo lɔ ̃ a nye nya oa ?

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Adegbe siwo kata ̃ ƒom mele la mehia ̃ o , movinyawo sɔŋ ko wonye gake mele edzi yi ge . Mina magblɔ ŋutega siwo mekpɔ kple nu siwo kata ̃ Aƒetɔ la ɖe fiam la na mi .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Anɔ abe ƒe wuiene enye esia ene la , wokɔm yi dziƒo be makpɔ afi ma ɖa .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Migabiam be ŋutila ̃ mee menɔ alo gbɔgbɔ mee menɔ hafi yi afi ma ha ̃ o , elabena nyemenya o . Mawu ɖeka koe nya . Gake menya be mede Paradiso la me vava ̃ .

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Le afi ma la mese nya siwo wɔ nuku ale gbegbe be wogbɔ amegbetɔwo ƒe susu kple gɔmesese ŋu yi , eye womeɖe mɔ nam be magblɔ wo na ame aɖeke o .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Nu si teƒe mekpɔ la nye nu xɔasi aɖe , si ŋu mate ŋu aƒo adegbe le gake nyemedi be mawɔ nenema o . Ke boŋ la maƒo adegbe le ale si megbɔdzɔe gake Mawu wɔ ŋutinyedɔ hena eya ŋutɔ ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la ŋuti .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Nu geɖewo ŋutɔ li siwo ŋu maƒo adegbe le , eye ne mewɔ esia la mawɔm movitɔ o gake nyemedi be amewo nabum amega ̃ e wu ame si ŋutɔ menye o , ke boŋ be woakpɔ nu si wo ̀ dze be woakpɔ le nye agbenɔnɔ kple gbeƒa ̃ si ɖem mele la me .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Mawu ƒe ga ̃ nyenye kple nukunu siwo teƒe mekpɔ la menye nu bɔbɔe o , eye be nyemagado ɖokuinye ɖe dzi o la tae Mawu na be dɔle ́ le aɖe ge ɖe nye ŋutila ̃ me si zu ŋu nɔa fu ɖem nam . Esia nye Satana ƒe dɔla ƒe nuwɔna . Mawu ɖe mɔ na dɔle ́ le sia be wo ̀ anɔ fu ɖem nam be nyemagaƒo adegbe o .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Medo gbe ɖa na Aƒetɔ la zi etɔ ̃ sɔŋ kple kukuɖeɖe be wo ̀ aɖe dɔle ́ le ́ sia ɖa le menye .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Ke ɣesiaɣi la Aƒetɔ la gblɔna nam be , “ Ao , meli kpli wo ̀ . Nye amenuveve sɔ gbɔ na wo ̀ . Elabena meɖea nye ŋuse ̃ fiana to ame siwo gbɔdzɔ le ŋutila ̃ me la dzi . ” Eya ta enye dzidzɔ nam be maƒo adegbe le nye gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ ŋuti boŋ , ale be Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ blibo la kata ̃ nadze le menye tsɔ wu be maɖe nye ŋutɔ nye ŋuse ̃ kple ŋutetewo afia .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Esi menya be Kristo ŋutɔ ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu wo ̀ nye be nu sia nadzɔ ɖe dzinye ta la , mekpɔa dzidzɔ be “ ŋu ” sia le nye ŋutila ̃ me . Mekpɔa dzidzɔ ha ̃ be amewo dzuam , tia nye agbe yome eye meɖoa xaxa kple hia ̃ geɖe me . Elabena mekpɔa ŋuse ̃ to gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ me eye zi ale si megbɔdzɔ la zi nenema ke meɖoa ŋu ɖe eŋu .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Miaƒe nuwɔnae na be meƒo nu , do ɖokuinye ɖe dzi abe la ̃ tɔ ene . Evɔ la miawoe wo ̀ le be miakafum ke menye nye ŋutɔe wo ̀ le be makafu ɖokuinye hafi o eye togbɔ be nyemele naneke me o ha ̃ la , naneke mele miaƒe apostolo mawo si , si mele asinye o .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Esi mele mia gbɔ la , nye dɔwɔwɔ ɖe sia ɖe ɖo kpe edzi be Aƒetɔ lae tiam abe apostolo ene eye wo ̀ dɔm be mava gblɔ nyanyui la na mi , eye metsɔ dzigbɔɖi wɔ dzesiwo , nukunuwo kple ŋuse ̃ dɔ geɖewo ha ̃ le mia dome .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Nu si ko nyemewɔ le mia gbɔ o , evɔ mewɔe le hame bubuwo me lae nye be nyemetsɔ nye nuɖuɖu , nye nuhiahia ̃ wo kple xɔ si me manɔ la ɖo mia ŋkume o . Mitsɔe kem be nyemetsɔ agba siawo da ɖe mia dzi o .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Azɔ la , zi etɔ ̃ liae nye esia megbɔna mia gbɔ eye le nye vava me ha ̃ la , nyematsɔ dzinyekpɔkpɔ ƒe agba aɖo mia dzi o , elabena nyemele miaƒe ga dim o , ke boŋ miawo ŋutɔ dim mele . Vinyewoe mienye , eye menye viwoe wo ̀ le be woadi nuɖuɖu na wo dzilawo o . Vi fofoe wo ̀ le be wo ̀ akpɔ via dzi .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Enye dzidzɔ nam be matsɔ ɖokuinye kple nu siwo le asinye la na mi , be miatsi ɖe dzi le gbɔgbɔ me . Gake zi ale si mele mia lɔ ̃ m ɖe edzi la , zi nenema ke miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nam ha ̃ dzi le ɖeɖem kpɔtɔ .

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Ame aɖewo le mia dome le gbɔgblɔm be “ Enye nyateƒe be ne eɖi tsa va kpɔ mi ́ la , mi ́ egble ̃ a ga aɖeke ɖe eŋuti o . Gake Paulo sia ayetɔe wo ̀ nye le mi ́ a blem . Le nyateƒe me la , anya to mɔ aɖe dzi kokoko wɔ ga le mi ́ a ŋuti . ”

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Enye nyateƒea ? Đe ame siwo medɔ ɖo ɖe mi la ƒe ɖe va xɔ nane le mia sia ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Alo ɖe Tito kple nɔvi si medɔ ɖo ɖe mia gbɔ la va ba mia ? Gbeɖe , elabena menya nyuie bena mi ́ kata ̃ la Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ma ɖeka koe le mi ́ a me , eye nu ɖeka tɔgbi mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ewɔna .

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Đewohi ̃ la , mianɔ bubum be ɖe mele esiawo kata ̃ gblɔm be maʋli mi ́ a ɖokuiwo ta le mia gbɔ ale be miagalɔ ̃ m . Esia mele eme nenema o . Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo mele nya sia gblɔm na mi le Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ me be matu mi ɖo le gbɔgbɔ me ke menye be matu ɖokuinye ɖo o .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Nu si vɔ ̃ m mele lae nye be ne meva mia gbɔ la , miaƒe agbenɔnɔ ava tɔ ŋku nam , eye esia ana be nye nuwɔna manɔ abe ale si miadi be wo ̀ anɔ ene o . Mele vɔvɔ ̃ m be ne meva la , mava kpɔ dzrewɔwɔ , ŋuʋaʋa ̃ , dɔmedzoedodo , ameŋuzɔzɔ , sakplisasa , ɖokuidodoɖedzi , kple mama le mia dome .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Mele vɔvɔ ̃ m ha ̃ be nenye be meva la , Mawu abɔbɔm ɖe anyi le miaƒe ŋkume ale be manɔ dzi gbagba ̃ kple nuxaxa me . Elabena mia dometɔ geɖe siwo wɔ nu vɔ ̃ la trɔ zu nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo gbidii elabena wometsɔ ɖeke le eme be yewoatrɔ dzime o . Ke boŋ wogale nu vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple ŋunyɔnuwo wɔm eye wole ahasi wɔm , le hadzenu wɔm , le amesrɔ ̃ xɔm .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Esia anye zi etɔ ̃ lia mava mia gbɔ . Azɔ abe ale si woŋlɔ ̃ e ɖe mawunya mee ene la , “ Woaxɔ nya si ame aɖe tsɔ ɖe nɔvia ŋu la to ɖasefo eve alo etɔ ̃ ƒe kpeɖodzi me . ”

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Mexlɔ ̃ nu mi xoxo esi meva mia gbɔ zi evelia va yi . Azɔ la megale egblɔm , esi nyemele mia gbɔ o . Ke ne metrɔ va la , nyematsɔe ake ame siwo wɔ nu vɔ ̃ do ŋgɔ alo ame bubu siwo wɔe kplɔ ɖo o ,

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: elabena miele nane dim be wo ̀ aɖo kpe edzi na mi be Kristoe le nu ƒom to dzinye . Kristoa megbɔdzɔ le tohehe na mi me o , ke ese ̃ ŋu le mia dome .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Be woaka ɖe edzi na mi la , wokla ̃ e ɖe ati ŋu le gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ me , ke ha ̃ la , ele agbe to Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ me . Nenema ke , mi ́ egbɔdzɔ le eya amea me , gake to Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ me mi ́ ele agbe be mi ́ asubɔ mi .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Mido mia ɖokuiwo kpɔ be miele xɔse me vava ̃ maha ̃ ? Nenema ke midzro mia ɖokuiwo me . Đe miekpɔ dzesi be Kristo le mia me oa ? Negbe ɖee mieto xɔse ƒe dodokpɔ la me o .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Mexɔe se be mi kata ̃ mialɔ ̃ ɖe edzi kplim be mieto dodokpɔ la me .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe gbedodoɖae nye be , mianɔ agbe dzadzɛ . Menye be miatso afia be mi ́ efia nu nyui mi alo miede ŋgɔ o . Gbeɖe , nenye be woɖe vodada na mi ́ ha ̃ la ele be miawo ya miawɔ nu nyui .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe dɔdeasi enye be mi ́ ado ŋuse ̃ mi be miawɔ nu dzɔdzɔetɔ le ɣeawokata ̃ ɣi , ke menye nu vɔ ̃ o .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Enye dzidzɔ na mi ́ ne wobu mi ́ ame gblɔewo eye woɖe alɔme le mi ́ a ŋu ke miawo miese ̃ le xɔse me . Mi ́ aƒe gbedodoɖa kple didi vevi enye be miatsi ɖe edzi le Kristo me .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Mele nu sia ŋlɔm na mi kple mɔkpɔkpɔ be ne meva ɖo la , magahia ̃ be mahe nya ɖe mia ŋu alo ahe to na ame aɖeke o . Elabena nye didie nye be mawɔ ŋuse ̃ si Aƒetɔ la nam la ŋutidɔ atsɔ atu mi ɖo le xɔse me . Ke menye be matsɔe aɖiɖi mi ɖe anyi o .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Mawu nye agbale ̃ a nu kple nya mamlɛtɔ siawo bena , Minɔ dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ dzi ɖaa . Mitsi ɖe edzi le Kristo me . Miɖo to nya siwo kata ̃ megblɔ na mi . Minɔ anyi le ɖekawɔwɔ kple ŋutifafa me . Eye ŋutifafa kple lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe Mawu la nanɔ anyi kpli mi .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Mitsɔ nugbugbɔ kɔkɔe do gbe na mia nɔewo .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Nɔvi kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le gbɔnye afii la do gbe na mi nyuie .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe amenuveve kple Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ kpakple Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ƒe habɔbɔ nanɔ anyi kple mi kata ̃ .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Paulo , apostolo , si metso amewo gbɔ o , eye menye ame aɖeke ha ̃ dzi wo ̀ to o , ke boŋ to Yesu Kristo kple Mawu Fofo , si fɔ Kristo ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome la dzi ,

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: kple nɔvi siwo li kpli la , ŋlɔ ɖo ɖe hame siwo le Galatia .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ŋutifafa kple yayra woana mi tso Mawu , Fofo la , kple mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gbɔ .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Yesu Kristo ku ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta abe ale si Mawu mi ́ a Fofo la ɖoe ene eye wo ̀ ɖe mi ́ tso nu vɔ ̃ ƒe xexe vɔ ̃ ɖi sia si me mi ́ ele la me .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Bubu woana Mawu tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me . Amen .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Ewɔ nuku nam ŋutɔ be miele mia ɖokuiwo hem ɖa kaba alea tso Mawu , ame si yɔ mi be miakpɔ gome le agbe mavɔ si wo ̀ na to Kristo dzi la me gbɔ . Miekplɔ “ Nyanyui ” bubu si makplɔ mi ayi dziƒo o la ɖo .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Elabena nyanyui bubu aɖeke megali wu esi mi ́ efia mi o . Ame siwo dzeaŋe Kristo ƒe nyateƒe la eye wotrɔnɛ la , le mia flum .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Mawu ƒe fiƒode nava ame sia ame si fiaa nyanyui bubu aɖe si dzi woato akpɔ xɔxɔ , eye wo ̀ to vovo tso esi mi ́ efia mi gbɔ la dzi . Neva nye ŋutɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ dzi . E ̃ , ne mawudɔla aɖe tso dziƒo va gblɔ nya bubu aɖe la , fiƒode mavɔ neva edzi .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Magagblɔe ake ; ne ame aɖe gblɔ nyanyui bubu aɖe wu esi miexɔ la , Mawu ƒe fiƒode neva ame ma dzi .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Miate ŋu akpɔe be nyemele agbagba dzem be madze mia ŋu kple nya viviwo kpakple amebeble o . Gbeɖe , mele agbagba dzem be madze Mawu ŋu . Nenye ɖe medzea agbagba be madze amegbetɔwo ŋu la , anye ne nyemenye Kristo ƒe dɔla o .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔa ̃ wo , mele atam kam na mi bena wometu dziƒomɔ si mefiana la ɖe amegbetɔ aɖeke ƒe susu alo drɔ ̃ ekuku dzi o .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Elabena nye nya metso ame aɖeke gbɔ wu Kristo ŋutɔ gbɔ o ; Kristo ŋutɔe gblɔ nya si megblɔ la nam . Ame bubu aɖeke megblɔe nam o .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Mienya ale si menɔ esi medze Yudatɔwo ƒe subɔsubɔ yome ; ale si meti kristotɔwo yome nublanuimakpɔmakpɔtɔe . Mehea wo yia ʋɔnui eye mewɔ nu sia nu si mate ŋui la be maɖe wo kata ̃ ɖa .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Menye Yudatɔ siwo vɔ ̃ a Mawu wu ame bubuwo la dometɔ ɖeka le nye hatiwo dome le anyigba blibo la dzi eye medze agbagba ɖe sia ɖe si mate ŋui la be mawɔ se xoxo siwo kata ̃ ku ɖe nye subɔsubɔ ŋu la dzi .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Ke nya aɖe va dzɔ ! Elabena hafi woadzim gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , Mawu tiam be manye ye tɔ , eye wo ̀ yɔm . O , amenuveve kple nublanuikpɔkpɔ kae nye esia !

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: Eyɔm be maɖe Via si le menye la afia ale be mate ŋu ayi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo gbɔ eye magblɔ nyanyui la tso Yesu ŋu na wo . Esi nu siawo kata ̃ dzɔ ɖe dzinye la , nyemetso enumake be maƒo nu tso eŋu kple ame aɖeke o .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Nyemeyi Yerusalem be matsɔ nya la ɖo ame siwo nye apostolowo do ŋgɔ nam la ŋkume o . Ao ! Meyi Arabia ƒe gbegbewo eye metrɔ va Damasko .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Ƒe etɔ ̃ va yi hafi mede Yerusalem be makpɔ Petro ɖa eye menɔ egbɔ ŋkeke wuiatɔ ̃ .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Apostolo bubu ɖeka si ko mekpɔ lae , nye Yakobo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la nɔvi .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Mile ́ to ɖe nya si mele gbɔgblɔm na mi la ŋu elabena mele egblɔm na mi le Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe ŋkume . Nu siae nye nu si tututue dzɔ . Nyemele alakpa dam na mi o .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Le esia megbe la meyi Siria kple Kilikia .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Va se ɖe ɣemaɣi me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , kristotɔ siwo nɔ Yudea la mekpɔm kpɔ o .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Nu si wonya koe nye nu si amewo nɔ gbɔgblɔm be , “ Mi ́ aƒe futɔ xoxo la le gbeƒa ̃ ɖem xɔse si me eya ŋutɔ dze agbagba tsa ̃ be yeagble ̃ la azɔ . ”

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Eye wotsɔ bubu na Mawu le tanye .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Le ƒe wuieve megbe la , megayi Yerusalem . Azɔ la , mekplɔ Barnaba ɖe asi eye Tito ha ̃ va .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Meyi le Mawu ƒe gbeɖeɖe nam nu be mayi aɖawɔ takpekpe kple nɔvi siwo le afi ma tso gbeƒa ̃ si ɖem menɔ na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo la , ŋu . Meƒo nu kple hamedzikpɔlawo ɖeɖe ko ale be woase nu si tututu fiam menɔ la gɔme eye menɔ mɔ kpɔm be woalɔ ̃ ɖe edzi be nye nufiafia nye nyateƒe .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Wolɔ ̃ ɖe edzi ha ̃ . Womezi Tito , nye kpeɖeŋutɔ dzi be woatso aʋa nɛ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o , togbɔ be Tito menye Yudatɔ o ha ̃ .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Ame aɖewo nɔ afi ma siwo yɔa wo ɖokuiwo be “ Kristotɔwo , ” ke wonye alakpatɔwo . Ame siawo va be yewoafi ŋku akpɔ mi ́ eye yewoase nu tso ablɔɖe si mi ́ ena mi ́ a ɖokuiwo tso Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me ŋuti . Ne menye ame siawo tae o la , ne aʋatsotso ƒe nya gɔ ̃ ha ̃ medo ta ɖa o . Wodi be yewoatsɔ yewoƒe sewo abla mi ́ abe ale si kluviwo nɔa kɔsɔkɔsɔwo me ene .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Ke mi ́ eɖo to wo kura o , elabena mi ́ edi be mi ́ aflu mi , ana miabu be ame ate ŋu akpɔ ɖeɖe to aʋatsotso kple Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me o .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Naneke menɔ hamea dzikpɔla ga ̃ siwo nɔ afi ma la si woatsɔ akpe gbeƒa ̃ si menɔ ɖeɖem o . Nyemetsɔ ɖeke le woƒe hamedzikpɔla ga ̃ wo nyenye me o , elabena amewo kata ̃ sɔ le Mawu ŋkume .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Ke boŋ wokpɔe be wotsɔ nyanyui la gbɔgblɔ na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ƒe dɔ de asi nam , abe ale si wotsɔ Yudatɔwo tɔ de asi na Petro ha ̃ ene .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Elabena Mawu , ame si li kple Petro le eƒe dɔwɔwɔ me abe apostolo na Yudatɔwo ene la , eya kee li kple nye ha ̃ le nye dɔwɔwɔ me abe apostolo na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ene .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Yakobo , Petro kple Yohanes , ame siwo amewo buna be wonye sɔtiwo na hamea la , wona habɔbɔ ƒe asi nye kple Barnaba esi wokpɔ amenuveve si wona mi ́ la dzesii . Wolɔ ̃ ha ̃ be mi ́ awo mi ́ ayi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo gbɔ , ke woawo woayi Yudatɔwo gbɔ .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Nya ɖeka si ko wogblɔe nye be ele be mi ́ aɖo ŋku edzi ɣesiaɣi be mi ́ akpe ɖe ame dahewo ŋu . Nye ŋutɔ ha ̃ metsi dzi ɖe nu sia ŋu .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Ke esi Petro va Antioxia la , eva hia ̃ be matsi tsitre ɖe eŋu sesi ̃ e le amewo ŋkume eye mahe nya ɖe eŋu vevie le nu masɔmasɔ si wɔm wo ̀ nɔ la ta .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Esi wo ̀ ɖo tetee la , eɖu nu kple kristotɔ siwo menye Yudatɔwo o , ame siwo mebui be mele be woatso aʋa kokoko eye woale ́ Yudatɔwo ƒe se bubu geɖewo me ɖe asi o . Ke emegbe la , esi Yudatɔ aɖewo , ame siwo nye Yakobo xɔlɔ ̃ wo va la , megalɔ ̃ be yeaɖu nu kple wo o , elabena enɔ vɔvɔ ̃ m na nu si ame siawo , siwo le ́ Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e eye wogblɔna be aʋatsotso le vevie na ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ la agblɔ .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Ale kristotɔ bubuawo kata ̃ , ame siwo nye Yudatɔwo la zu alakpanuwɔlawo . Barnaba gɔ ̃ ha ̃ nɔ ame siawo dome . Wodze Petro ƒe kpɔɖeŋu yome le esime wonya nu wu ema hafi .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Esi mekpɔ nu si nɔ edzi yim eye mede dzesii be womenɔ nyateƒe tom tututu le nu si woxɔ se ŋuti o , eye womenɔ zɔzɔm ɖe nyateƒe si le nyanyui la me nu o la , megblɔ na Petro le ame bubuawo kata ̃ ŋkume be , “ Togbɔ be e ̀ nye Yudatɔ dzidzia ha ̃ la , e ̀ ɖe asi le Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo ŋu xoxoxo ; eya ta nu ka tae ne ̀ trɔ kpata hele didim be yeana ame siawo , ame siwo menye Yudatɔwo o la , nawɔ seawo dzi maha ̃ ?

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Nye kple wo ̀ siaa mi ́ enye Yudatɔ dzidziawo ; menye Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔla dzodzrowo mi ́ enye o .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Ke mi ́ kristotɔ siwo nye Yudatɔwo la , mi ́ enyae nyuie be mi ́ ate ŋu adze Mawu ŋu to Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me o , ke boŋ to Yesu Kristo ame si ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ɖa la dzixɔse ɖeɖe ko me . Ale mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ eɖo ŋu ɖe Yesu Kristo ŋu be Mawu axɔ mi ́ le xɔse ta , eye menye be mi ́ ewɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi ta o . Elabena ame aɖeke makpɔ xɔxɔ le seawo dzi wɔwɔ ta akpɔ o . ”

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Ke ne mi ́ exɔ Kristo dzi se be aɖe mi ́ eye mi ́ edze sii be mi ́ eda vo eya ta mi ́ ate ŋu akpɔ ɖeɖe o , negbe ɖe ko wotso aʋa na mi ́ eye mi ́ ewɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe se bubuawo dzi hafi la , ɖe mele be mi ́ agblɔ be Kristo dzixɔsee na mi ́ eda vo oa ? Gbeɖe , Mawu mana be ame aɖeke nabu nu sia tɔgbi ɖe mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la ŋu o .

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Mi ́ anye nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ne mi ́ agadze dzixɔse xoxo siwo mele agbagba dzem be maɖe ɖa la me le ́ le ɖe asi gɔme , anɔ bubum be Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ ana mi ́ akpɔ ɖeɖe .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Elabena to Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la xexele ̃ mee meto va nya be nyemate ŋu adze Mawu ŋu gbeɖe to agbagbadzedze be mawɔ seawo dzi me o , elabena medana ƒu . Meva dzesii bena , mi ́ ate ŋu adze Mawu ŋu to Kristo dzixɔse me ko .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Wokla ̃ m ɖe ati ŋu kple Kristo eye nye ŋutɔ nyemegale agbe o ke boŋ Kristo le agbe le menye . Agbe si tututu le menye fifia la tso ale si mexɔ Mawu Vi la dzi se la gbɔ , ame si lɔ ̃ m eye wo ̀ tsɔ eɖokui na ɖe tanye .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Nyemenye ame siwo bua Kristo ƒe ku abe nu si ŋu gɔmesese aɖeke mele o ene la dometɔ ɖeka o . Elabena ne Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ ate ŋu aɖe mi ́ la , ekema mehia ̃ be Kristo naku o .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: O , mi Galatiatɔ tsibomewo ! Ame kae flu mo na mi eye wo ̀ he gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ va mia dzii ? Elabena tsa ̃ la , miesea Yesu Kristo ƒe ku gɔme nyuie abe ɖe metsɔ nutata aɖe si me Yesu nɔ kukum le atitsoga ŋu fia mi ene .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Mina mabia nya ɖeka sia mi : Đe miexɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la to Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ mea ? Kura o ! Elabena Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la va mia dzi esime miese nu tso Kristo ŋu eye miexɔ edzi se be aɖe yewo la megbe .

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Ekema ɖe miele tsu kum azɔa ? Elabena ne agbagbadzedze be woawɔ ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi mena agbe mi le gbɔgbɔ me o la , nu ka ta miebu be agbagbadzedze be yewoawɔ wo dzi awɔ mi azɔ kristotɔ nyuiwo wu ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Miekpe fu geɖe ɖe nyanyui la ta . Miele didim azɔ be yewoaɖe asi le nyanyui la ŋu . Ese ̃ nam be maxɔ nu sia dzi ase !

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Megale mia biam be ɖe Mawu na Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe ŋuse ̃ mi eye wo ̀ wɔ nukunuwo le mia dome le miaƒe agbagbadzedze be yewoawɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi taa ? Mele nenema kura o . Esime miexɔ Kristo dzi se eye mieɖo ŋu ɖe eŋu tso dzi blibo me tae .

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Nenema kee wo ̀ nɔ na Abraham ha ̃ . Nu si na Mawu kpɔe be edze na dziƒo koe nye be , exɔ Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodowo dzi se .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Miate ŋu akpɔe tso esia me be ame siwo nye Abraham ƒe vi vava ̃ wo lae nye ame siwo kata ̃ xɔ Mawu dzi se nyateƒetɔe .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la kpɔe do ŋgɔ be Mawu atso afia na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo le xɔse me , eya ta wo ̀ ɖe gbeƒa ̃ na Abraham do ŋgɔe be , “ Woyra dukɔwo le mewo ̀ . ”

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Eya ta woyra ame siwo kata ̃ xɔse la kple xɔsetɔ Abraham .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ tsɔ woƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ da ɖe sea dzi wɔwɔ dzi la le fiƒode te , elabena woŋlɔ ɖi be , “ Woƒo fi de ame sia ame si mele ́ nu sia nu si woŋlɔ ɖe Segbale ̃ a me la me ɖe asi o . ”

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Eme kɔ ƒa ̃ a be womatso afia na ame aɖeke le Mawu gbɔ to se la me o , elabena woŋlɔ ɖi be , “ Ame dzɔdzɔe la anɔ gbe le xɔse me . ”

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Wometu Sea ɖe xɔse dzi o , ke boŋ mawunya gblɔ bena , “ Ame si awɔ nu siawo la anɔ agbe ɖe wo nu . ”

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Kristo ɖe mi ́ tso Se la ƒe fiƒode me , esi wo ̀ zu fiƒode ɖe mi ́ a teƒe , elabena woŋlɔ ɖe mawunya me be , “ Woƒo fi de ame sia ame si wokla ̃ ɖe ati ŋuti . ”

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Ale woɖe mi ́ be yayra si wotsɔ na Abraham la nava Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ dzi to Kristo Yesu me , ale be to xɔse me mi ́ axɔ Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe si Mawu tsɔ do ŋugbee .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , le mi ́ aƒe agbenɔnɔ gbe sia gbe me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , ne ame aɖe do ŋugbe na nɔvia eye wo ̀ ŋlɔe da ɖi , de asi ete la , womagate ŋu atrɔe o . Ŋugbedola magate ŋu atrɔ tame be yeawɔ nu bubu o .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Azɔ la , Mawu do ŋugbe aɖewo na Abraham kple Via . Đo ŋku edzi be nya sia megblɔ be wodo ŋugbe na viawo o ; anye ne esia afia be via siwo kata ̃ nye Yudatɔwo . Ke wodo ŋugbe na Via eye esia gɔmee nye na Kristo .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Nu si mele didim be magblɔ lae nye esi : Mawu ƒe ŋugbe si wo ̀ do be woaɖe ame to xɔse me la eŋlɔ ŋugbedodo sia da ɖi eye wo ̀ de asi ete ; womate ŋu aɣlae alo atrɔe ƒe alafa ene blaetɔ ̃ megbe , esi Mawu na Se Ewoawo o .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Ne se mawo dzi wɔwɔ ate ŋu aɖe mi ́ la , ekema eme kɔ ƒa ̃ a bena esia ato vovo sa ̃ tso Abraham ƒe mɔ gbɔ elabena ɖe ko Abraham ya xɔ Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodo dzi se .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Enyo : Nu ka tae wode se mawo ? Wotsɔ se siawo kpe ɖe tsa ̃ tɔwo ŋu le ŋugbe sia dodo vɔ megbe be woafia amewo ƒe fɔɖiɖi ne woda Mawu ƒe sewo dzi . Ke se siawo anɔ anyi va se ɖe Kristo , Vi , si Mawu do ŋugbe na la ƒe vava dzi ko . Vovototo bubu sia ha ̃ gali . Mawu tsɔ eƒe seawo na mawudɔlawo be woatsɔ ana Mose , eye eya ha ̃ tsɔ wo na eƒe amewo .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Ke esi Mawu do ŋugbe na Abraham la , eya ŋutɔe doe na Abraham ; metsɔ ŋugbedodo la to mawudɔlawo alo Mose dzi o .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Ekema ɖe se la tsi tre ɖe Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodowo ŋu maha ̃ ? Gbeɖe ! Elabena nenye ɖe se si wona la ana agbe la , anye ne dzɔdzɔenyenye ava to se la me vava ̃ .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Gake Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ be xexeame kata ̃ le nu vɔ ̃ ƒe game , ale be ŋugbe si wodo be to Yesu Kristo dzixɔse me ame siwo xɔse akpɔ ɖeɖe la , nasu wo si .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Do ŋgɔ na Kristo ƒe vava la , se la dzɔ mi ́ a ŋu abe gamenɔlawo ene va se ɖe esime mi ́ axɔ Đela si gbɔna la dzi ase .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Mina magagblɔe ale : Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo nye mi ́ aƒe nufiala kple mɔfiala va se ɖe esime Kristo va be yeana mi ́ anɔ nyuie kple Mawu to mi ́ aƒe xɔse me .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Ke azɔ esi Kristo va la , mi ́ egahia ̃ se mawo be woadzɔ mi ́ a ŋu eye woakplɔ mi ́ ayi egbɔe o .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Elabena azɔ la , mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ enye Mawu viwo to Yesu Kristo dzixɔse me ,

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: eye mi ́ ame siwo wode mawutsi ta na ɖe ɖekawɔwɔ kple Kristo me la , mi ́ edo Yesu abe awu ene .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Mi ́ eganye Yudatɔwo alo Helatɔwo , kluviwo alo ablɔɖeviwo , ŋutsuwo alo nyɔnuwo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o , ke mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ ele ɖeka ; mi ́ enye kristotɔwo ; mi ́ ele ɖeka le Kristo Yesu me .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Ke azɔ la , esi mi ́ enye kristotɔwo la , mi ́ enye Abraham ŋutɔ ƒe dzidzimeviwo eye Mawu ƒe ŋugbe siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ do na Abraham la nye mi ́ a tɔ .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Miɖo ŋku edzi be ne fofo aɖe ku eye wo ̀ gble ̃ domenyinu ga ̃ aɖe ɖi na via sue aɖe la , ɖevi sue ma tɔ me menyo sa ̃ a wu kluvi aɖeke tɔ o va se ɖe esime wo ̀ atsi togbɔ be nu sia nu si fofoa gble ̃ ɖi nɛ nye etɔ ha ̃ .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Ele na ɖevi la be wo ̀ awɔ nu si edzikpɔlawo ɖo nɛ va se ɖe esime wo ̀ axɔ ƒe si fofoa ɖo da ɖi .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Alea tututue wo ̀ nɔ na mi ́ va se ɖe esime Kristo va . Mi ́ enye kluviwo na Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo kple kɔnyinyiwo elabena mi ́ ebu be woate ŋu aɖe mi ́ .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Ke esi ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ si Mawu ɖo da ɖi va ɖo la , Mawu ɖo Via si nyɔnu aɖe dzi eye wo ̀ nye Yudatɔ la ɖa

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: be wo ̀ ana ablɔɖe mi ́ ame siwo nye kluviwo na seawo ale be wo ̀ ate ŋu axɔ mi ́ abe eya ŋutɔ viwo ene .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Eye be mi ́ enye viawo ta la , Mawu ɖo Via ƒe Gbɔgbɔ ɖe mi ́ aƒe dziwo me eya ta azɔ la mi ́ ate ŋu ayɔ Mawu dzideƒotɔe be enye mi ́ a Fofo lɔlɔ ̃ a .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Mi ́ eganye kluviwo azɔ o ke boŋ mi ́ enye Mawu ŋutɔ viwo azɔ . Azɔ esi mi ́ enye viawo ta la , nu sia nu si nye etɔ la nye mi ́ a tɔ elabena nenemae Mawu ɖoe .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Hafi mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo mianya Mawu la , mienye kluviwo na nu siwo miebuna abe mawuwo ene , evɔ mawu mawo menɔ anyi gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Ke azɔ esi mieke ɖe Mawu ŋu alo magblɔ be Mawu boŋ ke ɖe mia ŋu la , nu ka tae miagadi be yewoagagbugbɔ ayi subɔsubɔ gbɔdzɔ , dahe , dzodzro gbɔ hele agbagba dzem be miayi dziƒo to Mawu ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ me ha ̃ ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Miele agbagba dzem be yewoadze Mawu ŋu to nu si miawɔ alo nu si mele be miawɔ o le ŋkeke tɔxɛ aɖewo dzi alo le ɣleti aɖewo me alo le aza ̃ gbe aɖewo alo le ƒe aɖewo me la dzi .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Mevɔ ̃ ɖe mia nu . Mele vɔvɔ ̃ m be nye agbagbadzedzewo kata ̃ ɖe mia ta la zu nu dzodzro .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo mina nu siawo nawɔ dɔ ɖe mia dzi abe ale si wowɔ dɔ ɖe dzinyee ene , elabena nye la mevo tso kɔkuti siawo te abe ale si miawo ha ̃ mievo tso wo te tsa ̃ ene . Esi megblɔ mawunya na mi zi gba ̃ tɔ la miedo vlom o ,

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: togbɔ be menɔ dɔ le ́ m esi metsɔ nyanyui la vɛ na mi zi gba ̃ tɔ ha ̃ .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Togbɔ be nye dɔle ́ le la nye nuɖiaɖia ha ̃ la , miegbe nu le gbɔnye henyam o , ke boŋ miexɔm eye miekpɔ dzinye abe mawudɔla aɖe menye alo abe Yesu Kristo ŋutɔ ene .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Afi ka dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ ƒe gbɔgbɔ si nɔ mi ́ a dome tsa ̃ la le ? Elabena menyae be le ŋkeke mawo me la , mialɔ ̃ dzidzɔtɔe aho miaƒe ŋkuwo atsɔ aɖo tɔnyewo teƒe ne ema ate ŋu anye kpekpeɖeŋu nam .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Ke azɔ la , ɖe mezu miaƒe futɔ elabena megblɔ nyateƒe la na mia ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Aʋatsonufiala mawo , ame siwo le didim vevie be yewoadze mia ŋu la , mele agbagba dzem nenema ɖe miaƒe nyonyo ta o . Nu si wole didim be yewoawɔ lae nye yewoatrɔ miaƒe mo ɖa tso gbɔnye ale be miaɖo to woawo wu .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Enyo ne amewo ve mia nu kple tameɖoɖo nyui , to dzi vava ̃ tɔ me vevietɔ ne womele mia nu vem le ɣeyiɣi si me mele mia gbɔ ko me o .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: O , vinyewo miena nye dzi le veve sem ! Megale veve sem abe funɔ si le mɔ kpɔm na vidzidzi ene eye mele mɔ kpɔm na ɣeyiɣi si Kristo ƒe gbɔgbɔ ayɔ mia me mlɔeba la .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Medi vevie be manɔ mia gbɔ fifia ale be nyemanɔ nu siawo ŋlɔm na mi o hafi ; ke esi mi ́ a dome didi ta la , maʋu eme be nyemenya nu si tututu mawɔ o .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Miɖo tom , xɔ ̃ nyewo , mi ame siwo bu be ele be miawɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi kokoko hafi akpɔ ɖeɖe . Nu ka ta miadi nu siwo tututu se siawo fia o .

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Elabena woŋlɔ ɖi be viŋutsu eve nɔ Abraham si ; ɖeka dada nye kosi ke evelia dada ya nye ablɔɖenyɔnu .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Nya tɔxɛ aɖeke meku ɖe kosi la ƒe vi ɖe dzidzi ŋu o . Ke ablɔɖenyɔnua ya la Mawu ɖe wo ̀ do ŋugbe nɛ hafi wo ̀ te ŋu dzi vi .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Nu siawo nye alobalo ko , elabena nyɔnu eveawo sɔ kple nubabla eve . Nubabla ɖeka la woxɔe le Sinai to dzi eye eyae dzi ɖevi siwo nye kluviwo . Esia nye Hagar .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Eya ta Hagar enye Sinaito si le Arabia , eye wo ̀ sɔ kple egbegbe Yerusalem du , elabena eya kple viawo le kluvinyenye me .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Ke Yerusalem si le dziƒo la vo , menye kluvi o , eye eyae nye mi ́ a dada .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Elabena woŋlɔ ɖi bena , “ Dzi nedzɔ wo ̀ , O konɔ , wo ̀ nyɔnu si medzi vi kpɔ o ; do ɣli sesi ̃ e na ̃ tso aseye , wo ̀ ame si mele ́ ku kpɔ o ; viwo le nyɔnu si tsi akogo la si wu nyɔnu si si srɔ ̃ le gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . ”

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , nye kple miawo mi ́ enye vi siwo ŋugbe Mawu do abe ale si wo ̀ do Isak ŋugbe ene .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Eya ta ame siwo di be mi ́ awɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi la , le mi ́ ame siwo wodzi tso Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la me yome tim azɔ , abe ale si Ismael , kosi la ƒe vi , ti Isak , vi si ŋugbe wodo la yome ene .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Ke Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔ be Mawu gblɔ na Abraham be wo ̀ anya kosi la kple via elabena kosi la ƒe vi mate ŋu anyi Abraham ƒe dome kple ablɔɖenyɔnu la ƒe vi o .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , menye kosiwo ƒe viwo mi ́ enye o ; eye mi ́ enye kluviwo na Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo ha ̃ o , ke mi ́ enye ablɔɖenyɔnu la ƒe viwo , eye mi ́ edzea Mawu ŋu le mi ́ aƒe xɔse ta .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Ale Kristo wɔ mi ́ ablɔɖeviwoe . Azɔ la , mikpɔ egbɔ be miele ́ ablɔɖe sia me ɖe asi eye miagatrɔ azu kluviwo na Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo kple kɔnyinyiwo o .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Miɖo tom , elabena nya sia le vevie . Ne miele ŋu ɖom ɖe aʋatsotso kple Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ ŋu be woana miadze Mawu ŋu la , ekema Kristo mate ŋu aɖe mi o .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Magagblɔe zi evelia . Ele na ame sia ame si le didim be yeadze Mawu ŋu to aʋatsotso me la be wo ̀ awɔ Yudatɔwo ƒe se ɖe sia ɖe dzi loo alo wo ̀ atsrɔ ̃ .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Ne miele didim be yewoaxe fe si mienyi le Mawu si kple se mawo dzi wɔwɔ la , ekema viɖe aɖeke mele Kristo ŋu na mi o . Ekema Mawu ƒe amenuveve la bu ɖe mi .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Ke to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe kpekpeɖeŋu me la mi ́ ele ŋu ɖom ɖe Kristo ƒe ku ŋu be wo ̀ aɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ɖa ale be mi ́ ate ŋu adze Mawu ŋu .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Eye mehia ̃ be mi ́ ame siwo Kristo na agbe mavɔe la mi ́ atsi dzi o , ne wotso aʋa na mi ́ loo alo mi ́ ele ́ Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo me ɖe asi la , o . Elabena nu si ko mi ́ ehia ̃ lae nye xɔse si wɔa dɔ to lɔlɔ ̃ me .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Miedze egɔme henɔ yiyim nyuie hafi . Ame kae va flu mi eye wo ̀ xe mɔ na nyateƒe la yomenɔnɔ ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Eme kɔ ƒa ̃ a be menye Mawue wɔ nu sia o , elabena eyae nye ame si yɔ mi hena ablɔɖe le Kristo me .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Ke mia dometɔ ɖeka koe agble ̃ ame bubuawo kata ̃ .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Mele mɔ kpɔm be Mawu agagbugbɔ mi va xɔse la gbɔ abe ale si mele mɔ kpɔm le nu siawo me ene . Ame ka kee le fu ɖem na mi hele mia flum la , Mawu ŋutɔ ahe to nɛ .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Ame aɖewo gblɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be nye ŋutɔ mele gbeƒa ̃ ɖem be aʋatsotso kple Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo le vevie hena ɖeɖe . Enyo , ne meɖe gbeƒa ̃ nenema la , womagati yonyeme o , elabena gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe sia meɖia ame aɖeke nu o . Esi wogale yonyeme tim kokoko la , fia be megale gbeƒa ̃ ɖem tso ɖeɖe to xɔse le Kristo ƒe atitsoga ɖeɖe ko me ŋu .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Đe ko medi vevie be nufiala siwo di be miana woatso aʋa na mi la , woaɖe wo ɖokuiwo ɖa le mia dome eye woaɖe le mia ŋu kpoo .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Elabena nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , wona ablɔɖe mi ke menye ablɔɖe be miawɔ nu vɔ ̃ o , ke boŋ ablɔɖe be mialɔ ̃ mia nɔewo eye miave wo nu .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Elabena woate ŋu aƒo seawo kata ̃ nu ƒu wo ̀ azu se ɖeka sia be , “ Lɔ ̃ hawo ̀ vi abe ɖokuiwo ̀ ene . ”

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Ke ne le lɔlɔ ̃ na mia nɔewo teƒe ɖeklemiɖeɖe kple dzrewɔwɔ le miawo ɖeɖe dome la , ekema minɔ ŋudzɔ eye miakpɔ nyuie be miagagble ̃ nu le mi ́ a nɔewo ŋu o .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Eya ta megblɔ be minɔ agbe le Gbɔgbɔ la me ale be miagawɔ miaƒe dzɔdzɔme vɔ ̃ wo ƒe didiwo dzi o .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Elabena dzɔdzɔme vɔ ̃ dia nu si tsi tre ɖe Gbɔgbɔ la ŋu , eye nu si dim Gbɔgbɔ la le la ha ̃ nye futɔ na mi ́ aƒe dzɔdzɔme vɔ ̃ wo . Wole avu wɔm kple wo nɔewo , ale be miate ŋu awɔ nu si miedi be miawɔ la o .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Ke ne Gbɔgbɔ la le miakplɔm la , miegale se la te o .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Ke ŋutila ̃ menudzodzro vɔ ̃ wo dze ƒa ̃ a ; esi woe nye , ahi ̃ awɔwɔ , makɔmakɔnyenye , hadzedze ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: trɔ ̃ subɔsubɔ , adzewɔwɔ , fule ́ le , dzrewɔwɔ ŋuʋaʋa ̃ , dɔmedzoedodo , ɖokuitɔdidi , kɔmamawo , mamawo ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: ŋubiabia ̃ , ahamumu , aglotutu vɔ ̃ wo kple esia tɔgbiwo . Mele nu xlɔ ̃ m mi , abe ale si mexlɔ ̃ nu mi va yi ene la be , ame siwo nɔ agbe alea la manyi mawufiaɖuƒe la ƒe dome o .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Ke Gbɔgbɔ la ƒe kutsetse enye , lɔlɔ , dzidzɔ , ŋutifafa , dzigbɔɖi , dɔmenyowɔwɔ , nyuiwɔwɔ , nuteƒewɔwɔ ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: tufafa kple ɖokuidziɖuɖu . Se la metsi tre ɖe nu siawo ŋuti o .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Ame siwo nye Kristo Yesu tɔ la kla ̃ woƒe dzɔdzɔme vɔ ̃ wo kple woƒe fieŋufieŋuwo kpakple woƒe dzodzrowo ɖe ati ŋuti .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Esi mi ́ ele agbe le Gbɔgbɔ la me la , mina mi ́ azɔ ha ̃ le eƒe kpɔkplɔ te .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Migana dada nayɔ mi ́ a me o , ado dziku na mi ́ a haviwo alo aʋa ŋu mi ́ a nɔewo o .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , ne kristotɔ aɖe dze nu vɔ ̃ me la , ele na mi ame siwo vɔ ̃ a Mawu la be miatsɔ gbe blewu kple ɖokuibɔbɔ akpe ɖe eŋu be wo ̀ agbugbɔ ava mɔ dzɔdzɔe la dzi ; miaɖo ŋku edzi be mia dometɔ aɖe ha ̃ ate ŋu azu vɔ ̃ wɔla ɣebubuɣi .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Mitsɔ mia nɔewo ƒe agbawo eye miakpe ɖe wo ŋu le woƒe xaxawo me , ale miawɔ Aƒetɔ la ƒe se la dzi .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Ne ame aɖe bu be yenye nane le esime menye naneke o la eble eɖokui .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Mina ame sia ame naka ɖe edzi be yele yeƒe dɔ wɔm abe ale si yeate ŋui ene , ekema akpɔ dɔ nyui wɔwɔ ŋuti dzidzɔ eye mahia ̃ be wo ̀ atsɔ eɖokui asɔ kple ame bubu aɖeke o .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Ele be mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe natsɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe vodadawo kple eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbawo elabena mi ́ a dometɔ aɖeke mede blibo o !

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Ame siwo wofia Mawu ƒe nyae la nama woƒe nu nyuiwo kple woƒe nufialawo .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Migable mia ɖokuiwo o . Miɖo ŋku edzi be ame aɖeke mate ŋu aflu Mawu o . Nu si ame ƒa ̃ na la eya kee wo ̀ ŋena ɣesiaɣi .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Ne eƒa ̃ eya ŋutɔ ƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo ƒe ku la , ekema ele nu vɔ ̃ wo ƒe ku ƒa ̃ m eye le nyateƒe me la , aŋe gbegble ̃ ƒe ku . Ke ne eƒa ̃ gbɔgbɔmekuwo la , aŋe agbe mavɔ si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la anɛ .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Migana mi ́ agbɔdzɔ le nu nyui wɔwɔ me o , elabena ne mi ́ egbɔdzɔ o la , mi ́ aŋe nu le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ dzi .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Eya ŋuti esi asinukpɔkpɔ le mi ́ a si la , mina mi ́ awɔ nyui na amewo kata ̃ , vevietɔ na nɔvi dzixɔsetɔwo .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Matsɔ nye ŋutɔ nye asi aŋlɔ nuwunya mamlɛ siawo na mi . Mikpɔ ale si wo ̀ le be mana nye ŋɔŋlɔdzesiwo naloloe ɖa !

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Miaƒe nufiala siwo le agbagba dzem be yewoana miatso aʋa la , le agbagba dzem le nu ɖeka ko ta : eyae nye be yewoadze amewo ŋu eye womagati yewo yome , abe ale si wo ̀ anɔ ne woaʋu eme be Kristo ƒe atitsoga koe ate ŋu aɖe mi ́ ene o .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Menye ame siwo wotso aʋa na gɔ ̃ ha ̃ e wɔa sea dzi o , ke wodi be woatso aʋa na mi ale be woaƒo adegbe le miaƒe ŋutila ̃ ŋu .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Mawu neɖi be nyemaƒo adegbe le naneke ŋu o , negbe le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe atitsoga la ŋu ko , nu si me woto kla ̃ xexeame ɖe ati ŋuti nam eye wokla ̃ nye ha ̃ ɖe ati ŋuti na xexeame .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Gɔmesese aɖeke megale aʋatsotso kple aʋamatsɔmatso ŋu o : nu si le vevie lae nye nuwɔwɔ yeye zuzu .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Mawu ƒe ŋutifafa kple nublanuikpɔkpɔ nanɔ anyi kple ame siwo kata ̃ wɔa se sia dzi , eye woanɔ anyi kple Mawu ƒe Israel ha ̃ .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Mlɔeba la migana ame aɖeke naɖe fu nam le nu siawo ŋuti o elabena Yesu ƒe dzesiwo le nye ŋutila ̃ ŋu .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe amenuveve nanɔ anyi kple miaƒe gbɔgbɔ , Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Nɔvi kristotɔ lɔlɔ ̃ a siwo le Efeso , mi ame siwo le ́ Aƒetɔ la ƒe nya la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e ; nye Paulo , ame si Mawu tia be manye Kristo Yesu ƒe dɔtsɔla lae le agbale ̃ sia ŋlɔm na mi .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu , mi ́ a Fofo kple Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ ƒe yayra kple ŋutifafa nanɔ anyi kpli mi .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Mi ́ etsɔ kafukafu geɖe na Mawu , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo Fofo , ame si tsɔ yayra ɖe sia ɖe si le dziƒo la kɔ ɖe mi ́ a dzi duu le esime mi ́ enye kristotɔwo la ta .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Le blema , hafi wo ̀ va wɔ xexeame gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , Mawu tia mi ́ be mi ́ anye eya ŋutɔ tɔwo , to dɔ ga ̃ si Kristo ava wɔ na mi ́ la dzi . Eɖoe ɣemaɣi ke be yeawɔ mi ́ ame kɔkɔe , maɖifɔwoe le eƒe ŋkume . Mi ́ awoe nye ame siwo le eƒe ŋkume eye eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ ƒo xla ̃ mi ́ .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Đoɖo matrɔmatrɔ si wo ̀ wɔ ɖe mi ́ a ŋuti tso ɣeaɖeɣi ke nye be wo ̀ axɔ mi ́ ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe ƒome la me . Mawu wɔ esia esi wo ̀ ɖo Yesu Kristo ɖa be wo ̀ aku ɖe mi ́ a ta . Ewɔ esia to eya ŋutɔ ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu me !

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Azɔ la mitsɔ kafukafuwo kata ̃ na Mawu ɖe eƒe dɔmenyo ga ̃ na mi ́ ta . Mikafui ɖe eƒe amenuveve sɔ gbɔ si wo ̀ kɔ ɖe mi ́ a dzi la ta , elabena mi ́ enye Via lɔlɔ ̃ la tɔ .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Eƒe dɔmenyonyo la gba go ɖe mi ́ a dzi ale gbegbe be wo ̀ ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kata ̃ ɖa to Via ƒe ʋu la me , ame si dzi wo ̀ to ɖe mi ́ ;

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: eye etsɔ eƒe amenuveve xɔasi la kɔ ɖe mi ́ a dzi duu , elabena ese mi ́ a gɔme nyuie eye wo ̀ nya nu si nyo na mi ́ ɣesiaɣi .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Mawu gblɔ eƒe susu ɣaɣla si ta wo ̀ ɖo Kristo ɖa la na mi ́ . Ewɔ ɖoɖo sia le blema ke ɖe nublanuikpɔkpɔ na mi ́ ta .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Eƒe taɖodzinue nye be , ne ɣeyiɣi si wo ̀ ɖo ɖi la de la , aƒo mi ́ kata ̃ nu ƒu tso afi sia afi si mi ́ ele , eɖanye dziƒo alo anyigbadzi , bena mi ́ anɔ egbɔ le Kristo me , tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Gawu la , le nu si Kristo wɔ ɖe mi ́ a nu ta la , mi ́ ezu nunana xɔasi siwo ŋuti Mawu kpɔa dzidzɔ le , elabena abe ɖoɖo ga ̃ si Mawu wɔ la ƒe akpa aɖe ene la , etia mi ́ tso gɔmedzedzea me ke be mi ́ anye ye tɔwo eye nu siawo kata ̃ le eme vam pɛpɛpɛ abe ale si wo ̀ ɖoe tso blema ke ene .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo le nu sia mee nye be , mi ́ ame siwo nye ame gba ̃ tɔ siwo dze si Kristo la , mi ́ akafui atsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe nɛ , ɖe dɔ ga ̃ siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ wɔ na mi ́ la ta .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Eye ɖe dɔ ga ̃ si Kristo wɔ ta la , mi ame bubu siwo ke ha ̃ se nyanyui la tso ale si ame akpɔ ɖeɖe ŋu , eye miexɔ Kristo dzi se la , Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe si ŋugbe wodo na mi ́ kristotɔwo tso blema ke la , ŋutɔ de dzesi mi be mienye kristotɔwo .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Eƒe mi ́ a me nɔnɔ nye kpeɖodzi tso Mawu gbɔ be awɔ nu sia nu si ŋugbe wo ̀ do na mi ́ la godoo . Gbɔgbɔ la ƒe mi ́ a me nɔnɔ fia bena Mawu ƒle mi ́ xoxo eye wo ̀ ɖo kpe edzi be yeakplɔ mi ́ ava eɖokui gbɔe . Esiae ganye susu ɖeka si tae wo ̀ le be mi ́ akafu mi ́ aƒe Mawu , Ŋutikɔkɔetɔ la .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Esia tae tso ɣeyiɣi si dzi mese xɔse si le mia si le Aƒetɔ Yesu me kple lɔlɔ ̃ si le mia me na ame kɔkɔewo kata ̃ la ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: nyemedzudzɔ akpedada na Mawu ɖe mia ta o eye meɖoa ŋku mia dzi ɖaa le nye gbedodoɖawo me .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Mebiaa Mawu , si nye mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Fofo la , be wo ̀ ana mawumenunya kple ɖeɖefia mi be miaganyae ɖe edzi wu .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Medoa gbe ɖa be kekeli nayɔ miaƒe dziwo me fu ̃ bena miakpɔ nu siwo gome kpɔ ge miegbɔna la ƒe ɖe do ŋgɔ . Medi be mianya be esi wotsɔ mi ́ ame siwo xɔ Kristo dzi se la na Mawu ta la esia wɔe be kesinɔnu ga ̃ aɖe ɖo Mawu si !

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Medoa gbe ɖa be , miade asi ale si eƒe ŋuse ̃ tri akɔe le kpekpeɖeŋunana ame siwo xɔa edzi se me la gɔmesese me .

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: Ŋuse ̃ triakɔ sia kee fɔ Kristo ɖe tsitre tso ame kukuwo dome eye wo ̀ tsɔe ɖo bubuteƒe le Mawu ƒe nuɖusi me le dziƒo .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Teƒe si kɔ sasasa ̃ wu fia dziɖula kple kplɔla ɖe sia ɖe tɔ . E ̃ , ŋutikɔkɔe le eƒe bubu ŋu wu ame sia ame tɔ le xexe sia me loo alo xexe si gbɔna la me .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Mawu tsɔ nuwo kata ̃ de eƒe afɔ te eye wo ̀ wɔe kristohamea kata ̃ ƒe tatɔ ga ̃ tɔ .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Hame sia nye eya ŋutɔ ƒe ŋutila ̃ . Eyɔ hame la fu ̃ , eye wo ̀ ganye nu sia nu si le afi sia afi la ƒe gɔmedzela kple enala .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Tsa ̃ la mienɔ Mawu ƒe fi ̃ ƒode te , eye miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo na be mieyina ɖe tsɔtsrɔ ̃ mavɔ me .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Miedze ameha la yome eye miele ko abe ame bubuwo ene ; mieyɔ fu ̃ kple nu vɔ ̃ , eye miedze Satana , ŋuse ̃ si le yame la ƒe fiavi la yome ; ame si gale dɔ wɔm fifi laa le ame siwo tsi tre ɖe Aƒetɔ la ŋuti ƒe dziwo me .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ enɔ ko abe ame mawo ene tsa ̃ , mi ́ aƒe agbe ɖea nu vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo le mi ́ a me la fiana , eye mi ́ ewɔa nu vɔ ̃ siwo me mi ́ aƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo kple susu vɔ ̃ wo kplɔa mi ́ denae . Mi ́ edze agbe baɖa nɔnɔ gɔme elabena wodzi mi ́ kple dzɔdzɔme vɔ ̃ ɖi ale mi ́ enɔ Mawu ƒe dɔmedzoe la te abe ame bubu ɖe sia ɖe ene .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Gake Mawu ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ gba go ŋutɔ eye wo ̀ lɔ ̃ mi ́ ha ̃ ale gbegbe be

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: togbɔ be mi ́ eku le gbɔgbɔ me , eye woƒo fi de mi ́ be mi ́ atsrɔ ̃ le mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta ha ̃ la , egbugbɔ mi ́ aƒe agbe la tsɔ na mi ́ esi wo ̀ fɔ Kristo tso ame kukuwo dome , ale be eƒe amenuveve ga ̃ la koe ɖe mi ,

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: eye wokɔ mi ́ do goe le yɔdo la me yi ɖe ŋutikɔkɔe me kple Kristo , le dziƒonutowo me , afi si mi ́ ebɔbɔ nɔ anyi kplii le , ɖe dɔ ga ̃ si Kristo Yesu wɔ na mi ́ la ta .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Azɔ Mawu ate ŋu afia asi mi ́ eye wo ̀ atsɔ mi ́ aɖo kpɔɖeŋui ɣesiaɣi na eƒe amenuveve sɔ gbɔ la , ɖe dɔ ga ̃ si wo ̀ wɔ na mi ́ to Yesu Kristo me la ta .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Le eƒe amenuveve sɔ gbɔ la ta la , miekpɔ ɖeɖe to Kristo dzixɔse me . Dzixɔse si le mia si le eya amea me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la menye nu si tso miawo ŋutɔwo gbɔ o ; ke boŋ eya ha ̃ nunanae wo ̀ nye tso Mawu gbɔ .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Đeɖekpɔkpɔ menye fetu na mi ́ le mi ́ aƒe dɔ nyui siwo mi ́ ewɔ la ta o , eya ta mi ́ a dometɔ aɖeke mate ŋu aƒo adegbe le eta o .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Mawu ŋutɔe wɔ mi ́ nu si mi ́ enye eye wo ̀ tsɔ agbe yeye si tso Yesu Kristo gbɔ la na mi ́ . Eɖoe da ɖi na mi ́ tso gbe aɖe gbe ke be mi ́ atsɔ mi ́ aƒe agbe sia akpe ɖe ame bubuwo ŋui .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Migaŋlɔ be akpɔ be tsa ̃ la , mienye Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , eye Yudatɔwo yɔ mi be mawumavɔ ̃ lawo kple ame makɔmakɔwo o . Ke togbɔ be wowɔa mawuvɔ ̃ lawo ƒe ɖoɖowo kple kɔnuwo dzi pɛpɛpɛ ha ̃ la , woƒe dziwo me mekɔ o , evɔ wona wotso aʋa ha ̃ na wo abe mawuvɔvɔ ̃ ƒe dzesi ene hafi .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Miɖo ŋku edzi be le ɣemaɣiwo me la , mienɔ agbe Kristo manɔmee . Mienye futɔ na Mawu viwo eye Mawu medo ŋugbe aɖeke be yeakpe ɖe mia ŋuti o . Ale miebu keŋkeŋ . Mawu menɔ mia si o , eye mɔkpɔkpɔ aɖeke ha ̃ menɔ mia si o .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Ke azɔ la , mienye Kristo Yesu tɔ , eye togbɔ be mienɔ adzɔge ke tsa ̃ tso Mawu gbɔ ha ̃ la , azɔ wokplɔ mi va egbɔe , ɖe nu si Yesu Kristo wɔ ɖe mia ta kple eƒe ʋu la ta .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Elabena Kristo ŋutɔe nye mɔ si dzi mi ́ ato akpɔ ŋutifafa . Ewɔ ŋutifafa le mi ́ Yudatɔwo kple mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo dome to ale si wo ̀ wɔ mi ́ kata ̃ ƒome ɖeka me tɔwoe la me eye wo ̀ ɖe vlodoame si nɔ mi ́ a dome tsa ̃ la ɖa .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: To eƒe ku me la , eɖe ale si mi ́ kple miawo mi ́ enyina tsa ̃ o la ɖa . Yudatɔwo ƒe se siawoe he fule ́ le siawo vɛ elabena seawo de Yudatɔwo dzi eye wotsi tre ɖe Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ŋuti . Ale wo ̀ ku bena wo ̀ ate fli ɖe Yudatɔwo ƒe seawo kple woƒe ɖoɖowo kata ̃ me . Emegbe ewɔ mi ́ kple ame siwo menyina tsa ̃ o la ɖekae le eƒe ŋutila ̃ me ; eye esi wo ̀ tsɔ mi ́ wɔ ame yeye ɖekae mlɔeba la , ŋutifafa va .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Abe ame siwo nye ŋutila ̃ ɖeka ƒe akpa vovovowo ene la , mi ́ aƒe dɔmedzoe ɖe mia nɔewo ŋuti nu tsi keŋkeŋ , elabena wodzra mi ́ ame eve la kata ̃ dome ɖo eye ɖekawɔwɔ nɔ mi ́ kple Mawu dome . Mlɔeba la , dzrehehe la wu nu le atitsoga la ŋuti .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Azɔ la etsɔ ŋutifafa ƒe nyanyui la vɛ na mi Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo nɔ adzɔge ke tso egbɔ kple mi ́ Yudatɔ , siwo te ɖe eŋu .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Azɔ la mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ eɖanye Yudatɔwo alo Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo , mi ́ ate ŋu ato Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe kpekpeɖeŋu kple nu si Kristo wɔ ɖe mi ́ a ta la me , ate ɖe Mawu , Fofo la , ŋuti .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Azɔ la mieganye amedzrowo na Mawu kple dziƒofiaɖuƒe la o , ke boŋ mienye Mawu ŋutɔ ƒe ƒometɔwo kple Mawu ƒe dumetɔwo eye mi kple kristotɔ bubuwo kata ̃ mienye Mawu ƒe aƒemetɔwo azɔ .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Mikpɔ gɔmeɖokpe sese ̃ si dzi wotu mi ɖo la ɖa ! Wotu mi ɖe apostoloawo kple nyagblɔɖilawo dzi eye xɔa ƒe dzogoedzikpee nye Yesu Kristo ŋutɔ !

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Mi ́ ame siwo kata ̃ xɔe se la , wowɔ mi ́ ɖekae kple Kristo le ɖoɖo tɔxɛ me abe gbedoxɔ nyui si tum wole na Mawu eye wo ̀ le dzi dem nyuie gbe sia gbe la ƒe akpa aɖewo ene .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Eye wotsɔ miawo ha ̃ wɔ ɖekae kple ame siawo ale to Gbɔgbɔ la dzi mienye Mawu ƒe nɔƒe sia ƒe akpa aɖe .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Le esia ta , nye Paulo , Kristo Yesu ƒe dɔla , mele ga me le afii le mi Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ta .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Mexɔe se be miese Mawu ƒe amenuveve , si wo ̀ nam le mia ta

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: le esia me be Mawu na menya eƒe ɖoɖo ɣaɣla be Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ nakpɔ amenuveve . Meka nya sia ta na mi do ŋgɔ kpuie to nye agbale ̃ ŋɔŋlɔ na mi me .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Megblɔ esia be matsɔ aɖe nya me na mi tso ale si mewɔ hafi nya nu siawo la ŋuti .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Le blema la , Mawu meɖe eƒe ɖoɖo sia fia eƒe amewo o , gake azɔ la eɖee fia eƒe apostolowo kple nyagblɔɖilawo to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la dzi .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Azɔ nya ɣaɣla lae nye esi : Ebe Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo trɔ dzime la akpɔ gome le domenyinyi magblemagble ̃ si wo ̀ ɖo ɖi na viawo la me sɔsɔe kple Yudatɔwo ; eyɔ wo kple eve la kata ̃ be woanye yeƒe hametɔwo . Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodowo be yeakɔ yayra geɖe ɖe amewo dzi to Kristo dzi la , yi na wo kple eve la kata ̃ , nenye be woxɔ Kristo ƒe nyanyui la kple dɔ ga ̃ si wo ̀ wɔ ɖe wo nu la dzi se .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Mawu na mɔnukpɔkpɔ tɔxɛm be magblɔ eƒe ɖoɖo sia na ame sia ame eye wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe ŋuse ̃ kple ŋutete tɔxɛ nam bena mate ŋu awɔ dɔ sia nyuie .
