text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Mibu nu sia ŋuti kpɔ ! Togbɔ be nyemewɔ naneke si dze na bubu sia o , eye nyee ganye kristotɔ gblɔetɔ wu ame sia ame ha ̃ la , nye koe nye ame si wo ̀ tia , tsɔ dzidzɔ tɔxɛ sia na be magblɔ Dzidzɔnya sia na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo tso kesinɔnu mavɔ si li na wo to Kristo me ;

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: eye wo ̀ gadi be maɖe nya me na ame sia ame be Mawue nye Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo ha ̃ ƒe Đela , abe ale si eya ame si wɔ nuwo kata ̃ la ɖoe da ɖi le adzame tso gɔmedzedzea me ene .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Susu ka tae wo ̀ wɔ ɖoɖo sia ɖo ? Ewɔ ɖoɖo sia be wo ̀ atsɔ afia dziɖula kple ŋuse ̃ vovovo , siwo le dziƒonutowo me , ale si Mawu ƒe nunya de bliboe : ne wokpɔ eƒe ƒome blibo , ame si wo nye Yudatɔwo kple Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo siaa , la woƒo ƒu le eƒe hame la me ,

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: abe ale si wo ̀ ɖo da ɖi be yeawɔ to Yesu Kristo mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la dzi ene .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Azɔ la mi ́ ate ŋu ado ɖe Mawu ŋkume dzideƒotɔe , eye kakaɖedzi ha ̃ le mi ́ a si be axɔ mi ́ dzidzɔtɔe nenye be mi ́ edo ɖe eŋkume kple Kristo eye mi ́ exɔ edzi se .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Eya ta to kukuɖeɖe me , dzi megaɖe le mia ƒo ɖe nu si tum wole kplim le afi sia la ta o . Miawo tae mele fua kpem ɖo eya ta mitsɔe be enye bubudede mia ŋu eye dzideƒo nanɔ mia si .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Eya ta medzea klo doa gbe ɖa na Fofo la

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: ame si gbɔ xɔsetɔwo ƒe ƒomeawo kata ̃ , si le dziƒo kple anyigba dzi la , kpɔa woƒe ŋkɔ tsonɛ .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Medoa gbe ɖa be tso eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe kesinɔnu gbogboawo me la , wo ̀ ana ŋuse ̃ tɔxɛ mi to eƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la dzi .

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: Megadoa gbe ɖa ha ̃ be , gbe sia gbe la Kristo naxɔ aƒe ɖe miaƒe dziwo me to xɔse me eye wo ̀ anɔ mia me , zi ale si miexɔ edzi se . Neva eme be miatsi , ato ke ɖe Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ wɔnuku la me ;

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: eye bena mi kpakple ame kɔkɔewo kata ̃ miakpɔ kelili be miate ŋu adze si ale si Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ keke , didi , kɔkɔ eye wo ̀ gogloe ,

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: eye be mianya Kristo ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ sia , si kɔ wu miaƒe nugɔmesesewo kata ̃ . Ale mlɔeba la , Mawu ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ la kata ̃ nayɔ mi fu ̃ u .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Ke , hena eya ame si tea ŋu wɔ nuwo geɖee wu nu siwo kata ̃ mi ́ ebiana alo susuna , le eƒe ŋuse ̃ si le dɔ wɔm le mi ́ a me la ,

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: eya tɔe lanye ŋutikɔkɔe le hamea me kple Kristo Yesu me le dzidzimewo kata ̃ me , tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me ! Amen .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Nye , ame si le game le afi sia ɖe Aƒetɔ la subɔsubɔ ta lae le kuku ɖem na mi be mianɔ agbe eye miazɔ nyuie abe ame siwo wotia be woaxɔ yayra wɔnuku siawo tɔgbi la ene .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Mibɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo eye mifa tu . Migbɔ dzi ɖi na mia nɔewo , eye ɖe lɔlɔ ̃ si le mia si na amewo ta la , migbɔ dzi ɖi na wo nenye be wodze agɔ le mia dzi .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Midze agbagba ɣesiaɣi be mianɔ ɖeka le Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe amekpɔkplɔ te ale be mianɔ anyi le ŋutifafa me kple mia nɔewo .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Mi ́ kata ̃ la ŋutila ̃ ɖeka ƒe akpa aɖewoe mi ́ enye ; Gbɔgbɔ ɖeka ma kee le mi ́ a me , eye woyɔ mi ́ kata ̃ ha ̃ be mi ́ anɔ mɔ kpɔm na ŋutikɔkɔe ɖeka ma si gbɔna .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Le mi ́ awo gome la , Aƒetɔ ɖeka , xɔse ɖeka , kple mawutsi detaɖeka koe li ,

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: eye Mawu Fofo ɖekae le mi ́ a si , ame si le mi ́ kata ̃ ta kpɔm eye wo ̀ le mi ́ a me eye wo ̀ dzena le mi ́ aƒe agbe ƒe akpa sia akpa .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Ke wotsɔ amenuveve na mi ́ a dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe abe ale si Kristo na mi ́ i ene .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Esia tae woŋlɔ ɖi be , “ Esi wo ̀ lia yi dzi la eɖe aboyo ame geɖewo dzoe eye wo ̀ na nunana amewo . ”

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Azɔ la “ eɖi va anyi ” gɔ me ɖe ? Egɔmee nye be eɖi va anyigba , yi ɖe keke anyigba tume ke .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Eya ta eya ame si ɖi va anyi la eya kee lia yi dzi ʋi ̃ gbɔ dziƒowo kata ̃ ta , be wo ̀ ayɔ xexe blibo la me fu ̃ u .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Eyae na ame aɖewo nye apostolowo , eye ame aɖewo nyagblɔɖilawo , ame aɖewo ha ̃ nyanyuigblɔlawo , ame aɖewo kplɔlawo kple nufialawo

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: bena Mawu ƒe amewo nate ŋu asu te na dɔwɔwɔ , ale woatu Kristo ƒe ha si nye eƒe ŋutila ̃ la ɖe edzi wo ̀ atsi

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: va se ɖe esime mlɔeba la dzixɔse ɖeka nanɔ mi ́ a si tso mi ́ aƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ kple mi ́ a Đela si nye Mawu Vi la ŋuti , eye va se ɖe esime ame sia ame tsi , eye wo ̀ kpɔ ŋuse ̃ le Aƒetɔ la me , e ̃ , va se ɖe esime Kristo xɔ aƒe ɖe ame sia ame me .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Ekema mi ́ aganɔ abe ɖeviwo ene o . Mi ́ aganɔ mi ́ aƒe susuwo trɔm ɣesiaɣi tso nu si mi ́ exɔ se la ŋuti elabena ame aɖe va gblɔ nya bubu na mi ́ alo wo ̀ da alakpa be ne mi ́ axɔe se be nu si yegblɔ lae nye nyateƒe o .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Ke boŋ mi ́ ato nyateƒe na mi ́ a nɔewo le lɔlɔ ̃ me ale be le nuwo kata ̃ me la mi ́ atsi ali ke le Kristo ame si nye Ta na hame la me .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Tso eya amea me wotsɔ ŋutila ̃ la ƒe akpa ɖe sia ɖe ƒo ƒui nyuie , eye akpa ɖe sia ɖe le eƒe mɔ tɔxɛ dzi le kpekpem ɖe akpa mamlɛawo ŋuti , ale be ŋutila ̃ blibo la kata ̃ le sesi ̃ e eye wole tsitsim ɖe edzi le lɔlɔ ̃ me .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Azɔ la mele esia gblɔm na mi , eye mele gbe tem ɖe edzi le Aƒetɔ la me be miagazɔ abe ale si Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo zɔna le woƒe tamesusu dzodzrowo me la ene o .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Ame siawo la woƒe susuwo me do viviti eye woma ɖa tso Mawu gbɔ elabena wole agbe le numanyamanya me le woƒe dzimesese ̃ ta .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Esi ŋukpe aɖeke megale mo na wo o ta la , wotsɔ wo ɖokuiwo dzra na nu tovo wɔwɔ , ale be woakpɔ gome le ŋunyɔnu ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi wɔwɔ me eye nu siawo do du wo wogale wo dim .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Ke miawo la , menye aleae mienya Kristoe o .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Vava ̃ miese eŋkɔ eye wofia nu mi le eya amea me , le nyateƒe si le Yesu me la nu .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Wofia nu mi ku ɖe miaƒe agbe xoxo si mienɔ la ŋuti , be miaɖe asi le agbe xoxo la ŋuti , agbe si le tsɔtsrɔ ̃ mɔ dzi to eƒe beblenudzodzrowo me .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Azɔ la ele be miaƒe nɔnɔme kple miaƒe susuwo nanɔ tɔtrɔm yeyee hena nyuia ɣesiaɣi .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: E ̃ , ele be mianye ame yeye siwo to vovo tso ame xoxo la gbɔ , ale be mianɔ dzadzɛ , anɔ kɔkɔe . Mitsɔ amenyenye yeye sia do abe awu ene .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Midzudzɔ aʋatsokaka na mia nɔewo ; minɔ nyateƒetoto ko dzi , elabena ŋutila ̃ ɖeka ƒe ŋutinuwo mi ́ enye . Eya ta nenye be mi ́ eka aʋatso na mi ́ a nɔewo la , mi ́ a ɖokuiwo ko mi ́ ele nu vevi wɔmii .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Nenye be dzi ku wo ̀ la me ̀ gale ́ dziku la ɖe dɔme wo ̀ azu nu vɔ ̃ na wo ̀ o . Me ̀ gana ɣe naɖo to ɖe wo dɔmedzoe o . Đu wo ̀ dziku la dzi kaba

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: elabena zi ale si ne ̀ do dziku ko la , ena mɔnukpɔkpɔ Abosam be wo ̀ aɖu dziwo ̀ .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Ne ame aɖe nye fiafitɔ le mia dome la , nedzudzɔ kaba eye wo ̀ atsɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe asiwo awɔ dɔ ɖɔʋu aɖee be wo ̀ akpɔ emetsonu eye wo ̀ ana ɖe hia ̃ tɔwo ha ̃ .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Nya vlo aɖeke megado go le mia nu o . Ke boŋ migblɔ nya siwo nyo eye woate ŋu ado ame siwo le esem la ɖe ŋgɔ , eye migblɔ nu siwo ko ahe yayra vɛ na wo .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Migana Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la naxa nu le miaƒe agbenɔnɔ ta o . Miɖo ŋku edzi be eyae nye ame si dea dzesi mi be miate ŋu ado gbe ma gbe esi woawu ɖeɖe tso nu vɔ ̃ me ƒe dɔ la nu .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Midzudzɔ fule ́ le mia nɔewo kple dɔmedzoedodo . Migana nɔƒe aɖeke dzrewɔwɔ , nya vlo gbɔgblɔ kple fule ́ le amewo le miaƒe agbenɔnɔ me o .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Ke boŋ la , minyo dɔme na mia nɔewo , eye mikɔ dɔme ɖe amewo ŋuti , mitsɔ nu vɔ ̃ ke mia nɔewo , abe ale si Mawu ha ̃ tsɔa nu vɔ ̃ kea mi ene elabena kristotɔwoe mienye .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Eya ta mizu mawusrɔ ̃ lawo abe vi lɔlɔ ̃ wo ene

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: eye minɔ agbe le lɔlɔ ̃ me abe ale si Kristo lɔ ̃ mi ́ hetsɔ eɖokui na ɖe mi ́ a ta abe nunana kple vɔsa si le ʋeʋe ̃ m lilili ̃ na Mawu la ene .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Migaɖe mɔ na ahasiwɔwɔ , makɔmakɔnyenye kple ŋukekle ̃ be woanɔ mia me o . Migana be ame aɖeke nakpɔ kpɔtsɔtsɔ le mia ŋuti le nu vɔ ̃ siawo ta o .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Mele be woase glitoto vlowo , nya ƒoɖiwo kple dzeɖoɖo madzetowo le mia nu o . Ke boŋ la , miɖo ŋku Mawu ƒe amenuveve dzi na mia nɔewo eye miada akpe ɖe eta .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Miate ŋu aka ɖe edzi bena : Mawu kple Kristo ƒe fiaɖuƒe la manye ame makɔmakɔ kple ŋukle ̃ la tɔ o , elabena ŋukle ̃ la sɔ kple legbasubɔla , elabena elɔ ̃ na eye wo ̀ subɔa nu nyui siwo le xexeame ɖe Mawu teƒe .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Ame siwo doa taflatsɛ eye wowɔa nu siawo la megaflu mi o , elabena Mawu ƒe dziku heliheli ̃ le ame siwo wɔa nu siawo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe dzi .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , migade ha gɔ ̃ ha ̃ kple ame siawo ƒomeviwo o .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Elabena tsa ̃ la , viviti yɔ miaƒe dziwo me fu ̃ , ke azɔ la , kekeli si tso Aƒetɔ la gbɔ la xɔ eteƒe eya ta mina miaƒe agbe naɖe kekeli la afia !

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Le kekeli sia si le mia me ta la , miwɔ nu siwo ko nyo , nu siwo le dzɔdzɔe kple nu siwo le eteƒe .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Le miaƒe agbe me la , misrɔ ̃ eye mianya nu siwo ko dzea Aƒetɔ la ŋu .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Migakpɔ gome le vivisese vlowo kple vivitimenu aɖeke me o ; ke boŋ mika mo na nu vlo wɔlawo , eye miaɖe woƒe vivimenuwɔwɔ ɖe go .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Anye ŋukpenanu alo ŋunyɔnu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be maƒo nu le vivitimenuwɔna siwo mawumavɔ ̃ lawo wɔna la ŋuti .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Ke nu sia nu si dzi kekeli kle ̃ ɖo la dzena wokpɔna ,

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: elabena kekelie nana wokpɔa nu sia nu . Esia tae woŋlɔ ɖi be , “ O , alɔ ̃ dɔla nyɔ , nyɔ tso ku me , eye Kristo akle ̃ ɖe dziwo ̀ . ”

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Eya ta mikpɔ nyuie be miaganɔ agbe abe numanyalawo ene o , ke boŋ abe nunyalawo ene

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: ame siwo wɔa woƒe mɔnukpɔkpɔ ɖe sia ɖe ŋudɔ nyuie elabena mi ́ ele ŋkeke sese ̃ wo me fifia .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Migawɔ naneke tamemabumabutɔe o , ke boŋ miadi nu si Aƒetɔ la di be miawɔ eye miawɔe .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Migano aha fu ̃ o , elabena nu vɔ ̃ geɖe dea xa ɖe ahatsunola ƒe mɔ dzi . Mina Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la boŋ nayɔ mi taŋtaŋ eye mina eya naɖu mia dzi .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Mitsɔ Psalmowo kple kafukafuhawo ƒo nu na mia nɔewo tso Aƒetɔ la ŋuti , midzi ha kɔkɔewo eye miaƒo wo na Aƒetɔ la le miaƒe dziwo me .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Mida akpe na Mawu Fofo la ɖaa le nu sia nu ta le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ me .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Mibɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo na mia nɔewo ekema miade bubu Kristo ŋuti .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Mi nyɔnuwo la , mibɔbɔ mia ɖokui ɖe mia srɔ ̃ wo ƒe kpɔkplɔ te abe ale si miebɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo ɖe Aƒetɔ la te ene .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Abe ale si Kristo nye ta na eƒe ŋutila ̃ si nye kristohamea ene la , nenema kee ŋutsu ha ̃ nye ta na srɔ ̃ a . Elabena Kristo tsɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbe ɖo anyi ɖe ha la ta be yeanye eƒe Đela !

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Eya ta mi nyɔnuwo la ele na mi be miaɖo to mia srɔ ̃ wo le nu sia nu me , abe ale si hamea ha ̃ ɖoa to Kristo ƒe gbe ene .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Azɔ mi ŋutsuwo ha ̃ , lɔlɔ ̃ deto ma si Kristo ɖe fia hamea eye wo ̀ ku ɖe eta la , miawo ha ̃ miɖe eya ke fia mia srɔ ̃ wo .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Esi Kristo ku ɖe hame la ta la , ewɔe kɔkɔe , dzadzɛ eye wo ̀ klɔ eŋuti to mawutsideta kple Mawu ƒe nya la me ;

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: ale bena yeate ŋu axɔe na ye ɖokui abe hame kɔkɔe , si dza eye ɖiƒoƒo kple kpɔtsɔtsɔ aɖeke mele eŋu o la ene .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Nenemae wo ̀ le be ŋutsuwo nale ́ be na wo srɔ ̃ woe , eye woalɔ ̃ wo abe woawo ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ene . Elabena zi ale si ŋutsu kple srɔ ̃ a wole ɖeka azɔ la , zi nenema ke ŋutsu anɔ eɖokui nu vem anɔ eɖokui lɔ ̃ m , nenye be elɔ ̃ srɔ ̃ a .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Le nuwo kata ̃ me la , ame aɖeke mele ́ fu eya ŋutɔ ƒe ŋutila ̃ kpɔ o , ke boŋ enyinɛ eye wo ̀ le ́ a be nɛ abe ale si Kristo wɔna na eƒe hamea ene

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: elabena eƒe ŋutila ̃ ƒe ŋutinuwo mi ́ enye .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Nya sia be , ŋutsu kple nyɔnu wonye ŋutila ̃ ɖeka la , tso mawunya sia ƒe kpeɖodzi me be : “ Ele be ŋutsu nagble ̃ fofoa kple dadaa ɖi nenye be eɖe srɔ ̃ , ale be wo kple srɔ ̃ a nawɔ ɖeka , eye womaganye eve o , ke boŋ woanye nu ɖeka . ”

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Menyae be nya sia gɔmesese sese ̃ , gake enye ale si mi ́ enye akpa vovovowo na Kristo ƒe ŋutila ̃ la ƒe kpɔɖeŋu .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Eya ta megale egblɔm na mi be , ele be ŋutsu nalɔ ̃ srɔ ̃ a abe eya ŋutɔ ɖokui ene eye nyɔnua ha ̃ nakpɔ egbɔ be eya ha ̃ tsɔ bubu deto tɔxɛ na srɔ ̃ a , aɖo toe , akafui , eye wo ̀ ado kɔkɔe ɣesiaɣi .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Mi ɖeviwo la , miɖo to mia dzilawo le Aƒetɔ la me , elabena esia le teƒe .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: “ Bu fofowo ̀ kple dawo ̀ ” esiae nye sedede gba ̃ tɔ si ŋuti ŋugbedodo kpe ɖo .

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: “ be wo ̀ adze edzi na wo ̀ nyuie eye na ̃ nɔ agbe didi le anyigba dzi . ”

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Mi fofowo la migado dziku na mia viwo o , ke boŋ mihe wo eye miafia nu wo le Aƒetɔ la me .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Mi kluviwo la , miɖo to miaƒe aƒetɔwo ; miwɔ nu nyuitɔ ko ɣesiaɣi be woakpɔ ŋudzedze le mia ŋuti . Misubɔ wo abe ale si miasubɔ Kristoe ene .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Migawɔ ameŋkumenu , awɔ dɔ kple ŋuse ̃ nenye be miaƒe aƒetɔ li o , ke boŋ abe Kristo ƒe kluviwo ene to Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nuwɔwɔ me tso miaƒe dzi me ke .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Misubɔ tso dzi blibo me ke abe Aƒetɔ la subɔm miele ene ke menye amegbetɔ o .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Miɖo ŋku edzi be , Aƒetɔ la axe fe na mi ɖe dɔ nyui sia dɔ nyui si miawɔ la ta , e ̀ ɖanye ablɔɖevi alo kluvi o .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Mi aƒetɔwo la , miwɔ nu dzɔdzɔetɔ ko ɖe miaƒe kluviwo ŋuti abe ale si megblɔ na woawo ha ̃ be woawɔ na mi ene . Miganɔ ŋɔdzi dom na wo o . Miɖo ŋku edzi be miawo ŋutɔwo ha ̃ mienye Kristo ƒe kluviwo . Aƒetɔ ɖeka ma kee le mi kple kluviawo siaa nu , eye Aƒetɔ sia mekpɔa ame aɖeke ƒe ŋkume o .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Mlɔeba la , medi be maɖo ŋku edzi na mi be , ele be miaƒe ŋuse ̃ natso Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋuse ̃ triakɔ si le mia me la me .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Mitsɔ Mawu ƒe akpoxɔnuwo kata ̃ kpla ale be miate ŋu anɔ te ɖe Satana ƒe ɖoɖowo kple ayemenu siwo wo ̀ ɖo ɖe mia ŋuti la nu .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Elabena menye amegbetɔ siwo nye ŋutila ̃ kple ʋu lae mi ́ ele aʋa wɔm kpli o , ke boŋ kple ame siwo ŋu ŋutila ̃ mele o . Ame siawoe nye gbɔgbɔ siwo womekpɔna kple ŋku o la ƒe dziɖula vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo nye Satana ƒe dɔla ŋuse ̃ tɔ ga ̃ wo , vivimefiavi vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo le xexe sia me dzi ɖum . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la , mi ́ egale aʋa wɔm kple gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ ɖi nyanyra ha ga ̃ aɖe siwo le gbɔgbɔ ƒe xexeame .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Eya ta miwɔ Mawu ƒe akpoxɔnu ɖe sia ɖe ŋutidɔ be miate ŋu anɔ te ɖe futɔ la nu ɣesiaɣi si wo ̀ lu ̃ ɖe mia dzi , eye ne miewɔ aʋa la vɔ la , miaganɔ te sesi ̃ e kokoko .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Be miate ŋu awɔ nu si megblɔ la , ele be miatsɔ nyateƒe la abla alidzii , abe alidziblaka ene eye miatsɔ Mawu ƒe gbedziwɔwɔ atsyɔ akɔta abe akɔtakpoxɔnu ene .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Mido afɔkpa siwo ana be miaɖe abla ne miele Mawu ƒe ŋutifafa ƒe nyanyui la kakam .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Le aʋa ɖe sia ɖe me la , mitsɔ xɔse wɔ miaƒe akpoxɔnui be wo ̀ axɔ Satana ƒe aŋutrɔ ɖaɖɛ siwo dam wo ̀ le ɖo ɖe mi .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Mitsɔ ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ɖɔ abe gakuku ene eye mile ́ Gbɔgbɔ la ƒe yi si nye Mawu ƒe nya la ɖe asi .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Minɔ gbedodoɖa dzi madzudzɔmadzudzɔe . Mibia nu sia nu si miedi la Mawu , gake miaƒe didiwo nasɔ ɖe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu dzi . Minɔ kukuɖeɖe dzi nɛ ɖaa , eye miɖo ŋku miaƒe hiahia ̃ wo dzi nɛ ɣesiaɣi . Mido gbe ɖa atraɖii ɖe kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le afi sia afi la ta .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Mido gbe ɖa ɖe nye ŋutɔ ha ̃ ta , eye miabia Mawu be wo ̀ ana nya nyuitɔwom ne mele nu ƒom dzideƒotɔe na amewo tso Aƒetɔ la ŋuti kple ne mele nya me ɖem na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo be , Aƒetɔ la ƒe ɖeɖe do na woawo ha ̃ .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Fifi laa la , mele gaxɔ me ɖe Mawu ƒe gbedeasi sia gbɔgblɔ ta . Gake mido gbe ɖa be , manɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe nya la dzi kple dzideƒo ɣesiaɣi abe ale si wo ̀ dzem ene le gaxɔ me afii gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Tikiko , ame si nye nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ a kple kpeɖeŋutɔ nuteƒewɔla le Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔ la me la agblɔ nu siwo kata ̃ le edzi yim kplim la na mi .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Susu sia dzaa ta koe mele edɔm ɖo ɖe mia gbɔ be , wo ̀ agblɔ na mi be mi ́ eli nyuie ale be eƒe ɖaseɖiɖi la nade dzi ƒo na mi .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , ŋutifafa kple lɔlɔ ̃ kpakple xɔse si tso Mawu Fofo la kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gbɔ la woana mi .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Mawu ƒe amenuveve kple yayra nanɔ ame siwo lɔ ̃ a Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ɖikaɖika la dzi .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Paulo kple Timoteo , Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔlawo gbɔ le yiyim na Osɔfowo ƒe kpeɖeŋutɔwo kple kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le Filipi .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu nayra mi kata ̃ . E ̃ , medoa gbe ɖa be Mawu mi ́ a Fofo kple mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo nana eƒe yayra detotɔ mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe eye eƒe ŋutifafa la nanɔ miaƒe dziwo kple miaƒe agbenɔnɔ blibo me .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Nye gbedodoɖawo kata ̃ ɖe mia ta nye akpedada sɔŋ ko na Mawu .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Eye ne mele gbe dom ɖa ɖe mia ta la , dzidzɔ sɔŋ yɔa nye dzime .

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Le kpekpeɖeŋu ga ̃ siwo kata ̃ miena le Kristo ƒe nyanyui la kaka me tso ɣeyiɣi si miesee gba ̃ va se ɖe fifia dzi la ta .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Eye meka ɖe edzi be Mawu ame si dze dɔ nyui sia wɔwɔ gɔme le mia me la , ayi edzi akpe ɖe mia ŋu bena miatsi ɖe edzi le eƒe amenuveve la me va se ɖe esime dɔ si wɔwɔ gɔme wo ̀ dze le mia me la nawu nu keŋkeŋ le ŋkeke si Yesu Kristo agatrɔ va la dzi .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Ele ɖoɖo nu be nye dzi nanɔ ɖe mia ŋu abe ale si wo ̀ le ene , elabena miekpɔ gome le Mawu ƒe yayra me esi menɔ gaxɔ me kple esi medo eye menɔ nyateƒe la ta ʋlim henɔ gbeƒa ̃ ɖem Kristo na amewo .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu ɖeka koe nya lɔlɔ ̃ vava ̃ si le menye ɖe mia ŋu abe ale si Yesu Kristo ha ̃ lɔ ̃ mi ene .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Nye gbedodoɖa ɖe mia tae nye bena , miayɔ fu ̃ eye miagba ̃ go kple lɔlɔ ̃ na mia nɔewo eye nenema ke mianɔ tsitsim ɖe edzi le gbɔgbɔmenunya kple sidzedze me .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Elabena medina vevie ɣesiaɣi be miakpɔ vovototo le nyui kple vɔ ̃ dome eye kpe ɖe esia ŋuti la mianɔ dzadzɛ le miaƒe dziwo me ale bena ame aɖeke mate ŋu akpɔ kpɔtsɔtsɔ le mia ŋuti o , va se ɖe esime mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la nagatrɔ ava .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Minɔ nu nyui kple dɔmenyowɔwɔ dzi ɖaa . Esiawoe afia be mienye Mawu viwo vava ̃ eye woahe kafukafu kple ŋutikɔkɔe geɖe vɛ na Aƒetɔ la .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , medi be mianya esia be : Nu sia nu si dzɔ ɖe dzinye le afi sia la , do gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe Kristo ƒe nyanyui la ɖe ŋgɔ boŋ .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Elabena ame sia ame si le gbɔnye le afi sia hekpe ɖe asrafo siwo kata ̃ le asaɖame ŋuti la nya kɔtee be susu si ta mele game ɖo koe nye be menye kristotɔ .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Eye nye gamenɔnɔ na be kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le afi sia la megavɔ ̃ na na gamenɔnɔ o . Ke le go aɖewo me la , nye dzidodo si metsɔ le gaxɔ mee la de dzi ƒo na wo ale gbegbe be womegavɔ ̃ a gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe Kristo o .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Nyateƒe wo ̀ nye be ame aɖewo ɖea gbeƒa ̃ Kristo le ŋu ʋaʋa ̃ kple dzrewɔwɔ ta , ke ame bubu aɖewo ɖea gbeƒa ̃ nya la kple dzitsinya nyui .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Ame evelia siawo wɔnɛ le lɔlɔ ̃ me , elabena wonyae be mele game le afii le nyanyui la ta ʋiʋli ŋuti .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Ame kemɛawo gblɔa Kristo ƒe nya la le ɖokuitɔdidi ta , ke menye tso dzi vava ̃ me o , kple susu sia be yewoatsɔ xaxa akpe ɖe nye bablamenɔnɔ ŋu .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Susu ka ke nu wole mawunya la gblɔm ɖo ha ̃ la , enye nyateƒe matrɔmatrɔ be wole gbeƒa ̃ ɖem Kristo ƒe nyanyui la eye esiae nye nye dzidzɔ .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Manɔ dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ dzi ɖaa , elabena menya be zi ale si miele gbe dom ɖa ɖe tanye eye Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ha ̃ le kpekpem ɖe ŋunye ta la , esiawo kata ̃ ahe nyui ko vɛ nam eye woawɔe be woaɖe asi le ŋutinye le gaxɔ me .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Mele lalam eye mele mɔ kpɔm be nyemawɔ naneke atsɔ do ŋukpe ɖokuinye o ; ke boŋ manɔ klalo ɣesiaɣi aɖe gbeƒa ̃ Kristo abe ale si mewɔnɛ tsa ̃ ene , togbɔ be nuwo le sese ̃ m nam le afi sia ŋutɔ le ɣeyiɣi siawo me ha ̃ la , menya be ne mele agbe o , meku o , made bubu Kristo ŋu .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Le gonyeme la , agbenɔnɔ nye mɔnukpɔkpɔ nam be mawɔ dɔ na Kristo . Ke ku gaɖe vi wu .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Ke nenye be agbenɔnɔ ana mɔnukpɔkpɔ geɖem be maɖe luʋɔwo na Kristo la , ekema nyemeganya ne agbe alo kue nyo wu o .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Ewɔna nam ɣeaɖewoɣi be manɔ agbe gake le ɣebubuɣiwo la , edzroam be maku , elabena medi vevie be mayi aɖanɔ Kristo gbɔ . O , adzɔ dzi na nye ya sasasa ̃ wu be manɔ kodzogbe afii !

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Ke nyateƒe lae nye be , mate ŋu ana kpekpeɖeŋu geɖe miawo wu ne mele agbe .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: E ̃ , ele eme be nye dɔwɔwɔ ga hia ̃ le agbe sia me eya ta meka ɖe edzi be maganɔ agbe vie wu be makpe ɖe mia ŋuti be miatsi ɖe edzi le xɔse me eye miakpɔ dzidzɔ .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Nye agbenɔnɔ ado dzidzɔ na mi eye wo ̀ ana mɔnukpɔkpɔ mi be miakafu Yesu Kristo le ale si wo ̀ na megale agbe la ta ne megava mia gbɔ .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Ke nu ka kee adzɔ ɖe dzinye ha ̃ la , miɖo ŋku edzi ɣesiaɣi be mianɔ agbe abe kristotɔwo ene , ale be , ne magakpɔ mi alo nyemakpɔ mi o ha ̃ la , manɔ ɖaseɖiɖi nyuiwo sɔŋ ko xɔm tso mia ŋuti be mi kata ̃ miele ɖeka kple susu ɖeka sia be miagblɔ nyanyui la

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: dzideƒotɔe , nu ka kee miaƒe futɔwo awɔ mi ha ̃ . Woakpɔ esia abe woƒe anyidzedze ƒe dzesi ene , ke miawo la , esia anye dzesi tso Mawu gbɔ be , eli kpli mi eye bena ena agbe mavɔ mi .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Ke miawo la menye edzixɔxɔse ƒe mɔnukpɔkpɔ ko wona mi o , ke boŋ be miakpe fu ɖe eta ha ̃ .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Mi ́ kata ̃ e le avu sia wɔm ɖekae . Miekpɔ ale si mekpe fu ɖe eta va yi eye fifia ha ̃ megale avu sese ̃ aɖe wɔm , abe ale si mienya nyuie la ene .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Nane li abe kristotɔwo ƒe dzidedeƒo na wo nɔewo enea ? Đe mielɔ ̃ m ale gbegbe be miadi be yewoakpe ɖe ŋutinyea ? Đe mi ́ kpli miawo ƒe nɔvinyenye le Aƒetɔ la me kple mi ́ aƒe gomekpɔkpɔ le Gbɔgbɔ ɖeka la me nye viɖe na mia ? Đe nublanuikpɔkpɔ le dzi me na mi le go aɖe mea ?

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Ekema mina makpɔ dzidzɔ vava ̃ tɔ to mia nɔewo lɔlɔ ̃ kple ɖekawɔwɔ me , eye mitsɔ dzi ɖeka , susu ɖeka kple taɖodzinu ɖeka wɔ dɔe aduadu .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Miganye ɖokuitɔdilawo o ; migawɔ nu be miadze ame bubuwo ŋu o . Mibɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo eye mibu ame bubuwo be wonyo wu mi .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Tɔnye ko nenyo meganɔ mia me o ; ke boŋ mibu ame bubuwo ha ̃ ŋuti eye miatsɔ ɖe le nu si wɔm wole la me .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Miaƒe nɔnɔme nenɔ abe Kristo Yesu tɔ ene ,

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: ame si , esi wo ̀ nye be Mawu ƒe nɔnɔme mee wo ̀ nɔ ha ̃ la , mebui be ye kple Mawu ƒe sɔsɔ nye nane si wo ̀ le be yeaʋli kplii o ,

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: ke boŋ eɖi gbɔlo eɖokui hetsɔ dɔla ƒe nɔnɔme do eye wo ̀ va le ame ƒe nɔnɔme me .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nɔ ame ƒe nɔnɔme me la , ebɔbɔ eɖokui , ɖo to yi ɖase ku me , yi ɖase atitsogaŋutiku me ke !

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Eya ta Mawu do eya amea ɖe dzi yi ɖase teƒe kɔkɔtɔ kekeake eye wo ̀ tsɔ ŋkɔ si ƒo ŋkɔwo kata ̃ ta la nɛ .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Be le Yesu ƒe ŋkɔ me , klo sia klo , adze nɛ le dziƒo kple anyigba kpakple anyigba te ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: eye aɖe sia aɖe aʋu eme be Yesu Kristo nye Aƒetɔ , hena Mawu fofo la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ wo , esi menɔ mia gbɔ la , miele ́ se siwo mede na mi la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e . Ke azɔ esi nyemegale mia gbɔ o la , boŋ wo ̀ le be miale ́ be na mia ɖokuiwo wu eye miawɔ nu nyui siwo afia be miekpɔ ɖeɖe . Mitsɔ bubu kple toɖoɖo na Mawu eye miagbe nu le nu siwo medzɔa dzi nɛ o la wɔwɔ gbɔ .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Elabena Mawu le dɔ wɔm le mia me . Eyae kpena ɖe mia ŋu be miaɖo toe eye wo ̀ gakpena ɖe mia ŋu be miawɔ eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Miwɔ nu sia nu liʋiliʋilili ̃ kple nyahehe manɔmee ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: ale bena ame aɖeke mate ŋu akpɔ mɔ atsɔ fɔɖiɖi na mi o . Minɔ agbe dzadzɛ si ŋu fɔɖiɖi mele o , abe Mawu vi siwo le xexe si me do viviti tsiɖitsiɖi heyɔ fu ̃ kple ame mawɔnuteƒewo kple kɔlialiatɔwo la ene . Mikle ̃ le wo dome abe akaɖi ene

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: eye migblɔ Agbenya la na wo . Ekema nenye be Kristo gava la , makpɔ dzidzɔ ga ̃ aɖe be dɔ si mewɔ le mia dome la ɖe vi geɖe .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Eye nenye be wokɔ nye ʋu ɖi le nyateƒe me , be wo ̀ anye vɔsa na Mawu ɖe miaƒe xɔse ta alo nenye be edze be maku ɖe mia ta gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , malɔ ̃ aku faa eye mana mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nakpɔ gome le nye dzidzɔ sia me .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Elabena ele be miakpɔ dzidzɔ ɖe esia ha ̃ ta eye miadzɔ dzi kplim be wona mɔnukpɔkpɔm be maku ɖe mia ta .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Ne Aƒetɔ la lɔ ̃ la , maɖo Timoteo ɖa be wo ̀ ava kpɔ mi ɖa kpuie . Ekema ne etrɔ gbɔ la , nu siwo wo ̀ ava gblɔ nam tso nu siwo kata ̃ wɔm miele kple ale si miele dɔa dzii ŋu la ana dzi nagaɖo ƒonye .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ame aɖeke megali si tsɔ ɖe le miaƒe nya me wu Timoteo o .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Edze abe ɖe bubuawo kata ̃ tsi dzi ɖe woawo ŋutɔ ƒe ɖoɖowo ŋuti eye menye ɖe Yesu Kristo tɔwo ŋu o ene .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Ke mienya Timoteo nyuie . Đe wo ̀ le nam abe vi ene eye wo ̀ kpena ɖe ŋutinye le nyanyui la gbɔgblɔ me .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Mele mɔ kpɔm be maɖoe ɖe mi kpuie ; ne mese nu si adzɔ ɖe dzinye le afi sia ko .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Eye mele mɔ kpɔm be , Aƒetɔ la ana be nye ŋutɔ ha ̃ mava kpɔ mi ɖa kpuie .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Le ɣeyiɣi sia me la , mebui be enyo be magbugbɔ Epafrodito aɖo ɖe mi . Mieɖoe ɖa be wo ̀ ava kpe ɖe ŋutinye le nye hiahia ̃ wo me ; enyo ŋutɔ . Mi ́ kplii mi ́ ezu nɔvi vava ̃ wo eye mi ́ ewɔa dɔ aduadu .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Azɔ la , megbugbɔe le ɖoɖom ɖe mi , elabena aƒe le edzrom eye esi miese be , edze dɔ la , mietɔtɔ le mia ɖokuiwo me .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , edze dɔ eye esusɔ vie ko wo ̀ aku . Gake Mawu kpɔ nublanui na nye kplii siaa , bena metsɔ eƒe ku ƒe nuxaxa tsɔ kpe esiwo le dzinye xoxo la o .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Eya ta metsi dzi vevie be maɖoe ɖe mi , eye menya ale si gbegbe miada akpee be miegakpɔe , eye esia ana nye ha ̃ makpɔ dzidzɔ eye wo ̀ aɖe nye xaxawo dzi akpɔtɔ .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Mido dzaa nɛ le Aƒetɔ la me kple dzidzɔ ga ̃ aɖe , eye miɖe miaƒe ŋudzedzekpɔkpɔ fiae ,

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: elabena eƒe agbe ɖo xaxa ga ̃ aɖe me ɖe Kristo ƒe dɔ la ta eye esusɔ vie ne wo ̀ aku le esime wo ̀ le agbagba dzem be yeawɔ nu siwo miate ŋu wɔ nam o , ɖe ale si miele adzɔge le gbɔnye la ta .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Mlɔeba la , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , midzɔ dzi le Aƒetɔ la me . Meɖe fu nam be maŋlɔ nu mawo ke aɖo ɖe mi o , elabena wonyo na miaƒe dedienɔnɔ .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Minɔ ŋudzɔ na avu mawo , ŋutsu mawo , ame siwo wɔa funyafunya ŋutila ̃ ,

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: elabena mi ́ ame siwo subɔna le Mawu ƒe gbɔgbɔ me lae nye aʋatsotso nyuitɔ , ame siwo dzɔa dzi le Kristo Yesu me eye womeɖoa dzi ɖe ŋutila ̃ ŋu o ,

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: evɔ nye ya susu si ta wo ̀ le be maɖo dzi ɖe ŋutila ̃ ŋu la le asinye hafi . Ne ame aɖe bu be yeate ŋu aɖo dzi ɖe ŋutila ̃ ŋu la , nye la mewui ,

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: elabena wotso aʋa nam le ŋkeke enyia gbe , metso Israel dukɔ me , tso Benyamin ƒe to la me , Hebritɔ tso Hebritɔwo me , le sea nu la , Farisitɔ menye .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Ke le hamea yometiti me la , ame aɖeke mewum o , eye le dzɔdzɔenyenye si tso sea me nu la , mokakamanɔŋutɔe menye .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Gake meɖe asi le nu siwo kata ̃ mebuna tsa ̃ be wonye viɖenuwo la ŋu eye metsɔ wo kata ̃ ƒu gbe be mate ŋu atsɔ nye xɔse kple mɔkpɔkpɔ ana Yesu ɖeka ko .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: E ̃ , azɔ la , ne metsɔ nu siawo kata ̃ sɔ kple viɖe ga ̃ si mekpɔ le Kristo Yesu , nye Aƒetɔ nyanya me la , womegaɖi naneke le nye ŋkume o . Esia ta metsɔ nu mawo kata ̃ ƒu gbe , eye mebu wo aɖukpodzinuwoe , bena nye asi nasu Kristo dzi ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: eye mawɔ ɖeka kplii . Azɔ la , nyemegaɖoa ŋu ɖe nye dɔ nyui wɔwɔ ŋuti alo Mawu ƒe seawo dzi wɔwɔ ŋuti be woaɖem o , ke boŋ meɖoa dzi ɖe Kristo ŋuti be aɖem ; elabena mɔ nyuitɔ si dzi mi ́ ato awɔ ɖeka kple Mawu lae nye xɔse kple ŋuɖoɖo vevie ɖe Kristo ɖeka hɔ ̃ ko ŋuti .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Azɔ la , meɖe asi le nu bubu ɖe sia ɖe ŋuti . Meva kpɔe be esia koe nye mɔ si dzi mi ́ ato anya Kristo eye mi ́ anya nu ha ̃ tso ŋuse ̃ si fɔe ɖe agbe tso ku me la ŋu ; to esia me mi ́ ate ŋu ase nu si wo ̀ nye be mi ́ akpe fu , aku kplii la ha ̃ gɔme .

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Eya ta nu ka kee adzɔ ha ̃ la , nye ha ̃ manye ame siwo akpɔ gome le ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi kple woƒe agbe yeye la me , la dometɔ ɖeka .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Menye ɖe mele gbɔgblɔm be nye asi su nu siawo kata ̃ dzi xoxo alo wowɔm mede blibo xoxo o , ke boŋ mele ŋuse ̃ dom nu be nye asi nasu nu si ta Kristo Yesu ha ̃ ƒe asi su dzinye ɖo la dzi .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , nyemebu ɖokuinye be nye asi su edzi o . Ke nu ɖeka si mewɔna lae nye be ; meŋlɔa nu siwo le megbenye la be eye mewɔa nye ŋutete ŋuti dɔ be maɖo nu si le ŋgɔ nye la gbɔ .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Mele dzesiɖoƒe la nyam vevie be maxɔ dziɖuɖudzesi si ta Mawu yɔm le Kristo Yesu me ɖo be manyi agbe mavɔ dome .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Aleae wo ̀ le be mi ́ ame siwo tsi le xɔsea me la nakpɔ nu siawoe . Ke ne wo ̀ susu to vovo le nu siawo dometɔ aɖe ŋu la , Mawu aɖe eya ha ̃ afia wo ̀ .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Ke ɖeko miana mi ́ anɔ agbe ɖe nu si dzi mi ́ aƒe asi su la nu .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , mikpe ɖe ame bubuwo ŋu ne miasrɔ ̃ nye agbe ƒe kpɔɖeŋu eye miale ́ ŋku ɖe ame siwo zɔna ɖe ɖoɖo siwo mi ́ ewɔ na mi nu la ŋuti .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Elabena megblɔe na mi zi geɖe kpɔ , eye megale egblɔm na mi fifia kple aɖatsi be , ame geɖewo le kristotɔwo ƒe mɔ dzi zɔm , esiwo , le nyateƒe me la , wonye Kristo ƒe atitsoga la ƒe futɔwo .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Woatsrɔ ̃ gbidigbidi , elabena nu sia nu si dzro wo lae zua woƒe mawu ; nu si wo ̀ le be wo ̀ akpe ŋu na wo la boŋ zua dada blibo na wo eye nu si ko ŋuti wobua ta me lena lae nye agbenɔnɔ le anyigba dzi afii .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ke mi ́ awo la dziƒoe nye mi ́ a de afi si mi ́ a Đela , Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo le eye mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm be agatso afi ma ava .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Ne egatrɔ va la , atrɔ mi ́ aƒe ŋutila ̃ siwo ŋu anyigbadzi gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔ le la eye woazu ŋutikɔkɔe ŋutila ̃ siwo ŋu ŋuse ̃ le abe eya ŋutɔ tɔ ene , to ŋuse ̃ triakɔ ma si wo ̀ atsɔ aɖu nu sia nu dzii le afi sia afi la ŋutidɔwɔwɔ me .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Nɔvi kristotɔ lɔlɔ ̃ awo , melɔ ̃ mi eye medi vevie be mava kpɔ mi ɖa elabena miawoe nye nye dzidzɔ kple nye fetu si maxɔ ɖe nye dɔwɔwɔwo ta . Eya ta xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ wo , minɔ te sesi ̃ e nyateƒetɔe le Aƒetɔ la me .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Meɖe kuku na Ewodia eye mele kuku ɖem na Sintike ha ̃ be gbe nadze gbe dzi na wo le Aƒetɔ la me .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Megale biabiam tso mi , nye hadɔwɔlawo si be miakpe ɖe nyɔnu siawo ŋuti elabena wowɔ dɔ kplim aduadu le nyanyui la kaka me na ame bubuwo ; eye wowɔ dɔ kple Klemens kpakple nye dɔwɔla bubu siwo ŋkɔ woŋlɔ ɖe agbegbale ̃ a me la ha ̃ .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Dzi nadzɔ mi le Aƒetɔ la me ɣesiaɣi . Megale egblɔm ake be dzi nadzɔ mi !

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Mina ame sia ame nakpɔe adze sii be , miedia mia ɖokuitɔ o , ke boŋ miebua ame bubuwo ŋuti le nu sia nu si miewɔna la me . Miɖo ŋku edzi be Aƒetɔ la ƒe vava gogo .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Migatsi dzimaɖi le naneke ŋuti o ; ke boŋ mido gbe ɖa le nu sia nu me . Migblɔ miaƒe hiahia ̃ wo na Mawu , eye migaŋlɔ akpedada nɛ be le eƒe ŋuɖoɖo ta o .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ne miewɔ esia la ekema Mawu ƒe ŋutifafa si ƒo amegbetɔwo ƒe nugɔmesesewo kata ̃ ta la anɔ mia me . Eƒe ŋutifafa ana gbɔdzɔe miaƒe susuwo kple miaƒe dziwo le ale si miexɔ Kristo Yesu dzi se la nu .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Mlɔeba la , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , nu siwo nye nyateƒe , nu siwo dze na bubu , nu siwo le dzɔdzɔe , nu siwo le dzadzɛ , nu siwo dze na lɔlɔ ̃ , nu siwo nya kpɔna , ne nu nyui aɖe li alo nane li si wole be woakafu la mibu nu sia tɔgbewo ŋu .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Minɔ nu siwo kata ̃ miesrɔ ̃ tso gbɔnye eye miekpɔm menɔa wɔwɔm la wɔwɔ dzi eye Ŋutifafa ƒe Mawu la anɔ anyi kple mi .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Medzɔ dzi le Aƒetɔ la me vevie be mlɔeba la , miegadze ŋkuɖoɖo dzinye gɔme . Le nyateƒe me la , mietsɔ ɖe le eme nam , gake ɖekoe miekpɔ asinu be miaɖee afia o .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Menye be ɖe mexaxa ɣeaɖekeɣi tae mele egblɔm ɖo o , elabena mesrɔ ̃ ale si manɔ agbee le dzidzɔ me nenye be nu geɖe loo alo nu sue aɖe koe le asinye .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Menya ale si manɔ agbee , ne naneke mele asinye o loo alo ne nu sia nu le asinye . Mesrɔ ̃ dzidzemekpɔkpɔ ƒe nu ɣaɣla le go ɖe sia ɖe me , le ƒoɖiɖi me loo alo le dɔwuame me , le nukpɔkpɔ me loo alo le hia ̃ me .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Mate ŋu awɔ nu sia nu to eya ame si doa ŋuse ̃ m la me .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Ke ha ̃ la , miewɔe nyuie be miekpena ɖe ŋutinye le nye ɣeyiɣi sese ̃ siawo me .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Abe ale si mienya nyuie ene la , esi meva gblɔ nyanyui la na mi zi gba ̃ tɔ eye meyi nye mɔzɔzɔ dzi tso Makedonia la , mi Filipitɔwo koe zu nye hadɔwɔlawo le nunana kple nuxɔxɔ me . Hame bubu aɖeke mewɔ esia o .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Esi menɔ Tesalonika gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , mieɖo nu ɖem zi eve sɔŋ .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Togbɔ be mekpɔ ŋudzedze le miaƒe nunana ŋuti ha ̃ la , nu si gadzɔ dzi nam wu lae nye fetu ga ̃ si miava xɔ le miaƒe dɔmenyowɔwɔ ta .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Fifi laa la , nu sia nu si mehia ̃ la le asinye , le nyateƒe me la nuawo sɔ gbɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ wu ale si mehia ̃ ! Esi Epafrodito va la , etsɔ nunana gbogbo siwo mieɖo ɖem la vɛ nam . Nunana siawo nye vɔsanu ʋeʋe ̃ lili ̃ li si dzea Mawu ŋu ŋutɔ .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Eye eyae ana miaƒe nuhiahia ̃ wo kata ̃ mi tso eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe kesinɔnuwo me , le nu si Kristo Yesu wɔ na mi ́ la ta .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Azɔ ŋutikɔkɔe woana Mawu mi ́ a Fofo la tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Medo gbe na kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le afi ma ; nɔvi siwo le gbɔnye la ha ̃ do gbe na mi .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Kristotɔ ɖe sia ɖe si le afi sia la di be mado gbe na mi na yewo , vevitɔ esiwo le dɔ wɔm le Kaisaro ƒe Fiasa ̃ me .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe amenuveve nanɔ anyi kple miaƒe gbɔgbɔwo

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Paulo , ame si Mawu tia be wo ̀ anye Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔtsɔla kple nɔvi Timoteo gbɔ le yiyim na

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: kristotɔ wɔnuteƒewo kple Mawu ƒe ame siwo le Kolose dua me . Mawu mi ́ a Fofo la ŋutɔ nakɔ eƒe yayra ɖe mia dzi eye wo ̀ atsɔ eƒe ŋutifafa ayɔ mi taŋtaŋ .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Ɣesiaɣi ne mi ́ ele gbe dom ɖa ɖe mia ta la , mi ́ edzea egɔme kple akpadada na Mawu mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo Fofo ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: elabena mi ́ ese nu geɖe tso ale si miexɔ Aƒetɔ la dzi se kple lɔlɔ ̃ manyagblɔ si mietsɔ na eƒe amewo la ŋu .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Eye tso ŋkeke gba ̃ tɔ si dzi wogblɔ nyanyui la na mi va se ɖe fifia la , mietsɔ xɔse kpɔ mɔ na dzidzɔ tso dziƒo .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Nyanyui si wogblɔ na mi la eya ke gblɔm wole le xexeame godoo eye wo ̀ le amewo ƒe agbenɔnɔ trɔm le afi sia afi , abe ale si wo ̀ trɔ miaƒe agbenɔnɔ tso ŋkeke gba ̃ tɔ si dzi miese nu tso Mawu ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ ga ̃ na vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ŋu eye miese eme ene .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Epafra mi ́ aƒe hadɔwɔla lɔlɔ ̃ lae tsɔ nyanyui la vɛ na mi . Eyae nye Yesu Kristo ƒe subɔla si le kpekpem ɖe mi ́ a ŋuti le afi sia ɖe mia teƒe .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Eye eyae nye ame si gblɔ ale si mietsɔ lɔlɔ ̃ ga ̃ si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la de mia me la le amewo lɔ ̃ m la na mi ́ .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Eya ta tso gbe si gbe mi ́ ese mia ŋkɔ zi gba ̃ tɔ ko la , mi ́ edoa gbe ɖa ɖe mia ta ɣesiaɣi eye mi ́ ebiaa Mawu be wo ̀ akpe ɖe mia ŋuti miase nu si wo ̀ di be miawɔ la gɔme , eye wo ̀ awɔ mi mianye nunyalawo tso gbɔgbɔmenuwo ŋuti .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Mi ́ egabiana ha ̃ be miaƒe agbenɔnɔ nadze Aƒetɔ la ŋu ɣesiaɣi eye wo ̀ ade bubu eŋuti , ale be mianɔ nyuiwɔwɔ dzi na ame bubu wo ɣesiaɣi , le esime miele esrɔ ̃ m ɣesiaɣi be mianya Mawu ɖe edzi wu .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Mi ́ ele gbe dom ɖa ha ̃ be Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ ga ̃ nayɔ mia me fu ̃ u ale be nu ka kee adzɔ ha ̃ la , miate ŋu anɔ te sesi ̃ e eye Aƒetɔ la ƒe dzidzɔ nayɔ mia me taŋtaŋ ɣesiaɣi .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Eye be miada akpe na Fofo la , ame si wɔ mi ́ be mi ́ edze na gomekpɔkpɔ le nu siwo kekeli la ƒe fiaɖuƒemetɔwo akpɔ gome le la me .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Elabena eyae ɖe mi ́ tso viviti ƒe ŋuse ̃ kple Satana ƒe fiaɖuƒe la me eye wo ̀ kplɔ mi ́ va Via lɔlɔ ̃ la ƒe fiaɖuƒe mee ;

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: eyae ƒle ablɔɖe na mi ́ kple eƒe ʋu xɔasi la eye wo ̀ tsɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kata ̃ ke mi ́ .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Kristoe nye Mawu si mi ́ ekpɔna o la ƒe nɔnɔme tututu . Eli hafi Mawu wɔ nu sia nu eye le nyateƒe me la ,

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Kristo ŋutɔe nye nu sia nu si le dziƒo kple anyigba dzi , nu siwo mi ́ ekpɔna kple nu siwo mi ́ ekpɔna o la siaa Wɔla . Eya kee wɔ gbɔgbɔwo ƒe xexeme si mi ́ ekpɔna o la , eƒe fiawo , fiaɖuƒewo , amega ̃ wo kple woƒe ŋuse ̃ wo . Kristo wɔ esiawo kata ̃ na eya ŋutɔ ƒe ŋudɔwɔwɔ kple ŋutikɔkɔe .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Eli xoxoxo hafi nu sia nu va dzɔ eye eƒe ŋuse ̃ le ́ xexeamenuwo kata ̃ ƒo ƒui .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Eye eyae nye ta na hame , sinye eƒe ŋutila ̃ , eyae nye gɔmedzedzea kple ame siwo fɔ tso yɔme ƒe ŋgɔgbetɔ , ale be le nu sia nu me la , wo ̀ anye gba ̃ tɔ .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Elabena Mawu di be nu sia nu si le ye me la nanɔ ye Vi ha ̃ me .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Mawu to nu si Via wɔ me , ʋu mɔ be nu siwo kata ̃ le dziƒo kple anyigba dzi la , nava Via gbɔ . Elabena Kristo to eƒe ku le atitsoga ŋuti me wɔ ŋutifafa le Mawu kple amewo kata ̃ dome to eƒe ʋu me .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Ehe ŋutifafa sia vɛ na mi ame siwo nɔ adzɔge tsa ̃ tso Mawu gbɔ la ha ̃ . Tsa ̃ la mienye Mawu ƒe futɔwo , miele ́ fui eye miaƒe susu vɔ ̃ wo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔwo na be mi kplii dome kla ̃ gake azɔ la , egakplɔ mi va eɖokui gbɔe abe xɔlɔ ̃ awo ene .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Kristo wɔ esia to eƒe ku le atitsoga ŋuti me dzi eye fifia to eƒe ku me la , ekplɔ mi va Mawu ƒe ŋkumee ; miele tsitre ɖe Mawu ŋkume ame maɖifɔwoe eye naneke kura megale mia ŋuti si ana woaka mo na mi o .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Nu ɖeka si ku ɖe nu sia ŋuti koe nye be miaxɔ nyateƒe la dzi ase blibo , ale ́ eme ɖe asi sesi ̃ e , aku ɖe Aƒetɔ la ŋuti goŋgoŋgoŋ eye miaxɔ nyanyui la dzi ase be Yesu ku ɖe mia ta . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋuti la , mixɔe se be aɖe mi , ɖikeke aɖeke manɔmee . Esiae nye nukunya kple nya si va na mi kata ̃ eye wo ̀ le kakam ɖe xexeme blibo la kata ̃ fifia . Eye enye dzidzɔ na nye , Paulo , be magblɔ nya sia na ame bubuwo .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Ke nye dɔ ƒe akpa aɖee nye be makpe fu ɖe mia ta , eye enye dzidzɔ nam be wo ̀ le nenema , elabena mele kpekpeɖeŋu nam be Kristo ƒe fu siwo wo ̀ kpe ɖe eƒe ŋutila ̃ si nye eƒe hamea ta la nawu enu .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Mezu hamea ƒe subɔla abe ale si Mawu dɔm abe xɔnuvi ene be mawu eƒe nya blibo la nu ,

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: nya ɣaɣla si woɣla ɖi tso ƒe alafawo kple dzidzimewo me ke , gake azɔ la eɖee fia ame kɔkɔewo .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Ame siawo Mawu lɔ ̃ be yeana woanya yeƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe kesinɔnu ɣaɣlawo le Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo dome , nu ɣaɣla sia nye be Kristo le mia me , si nye ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Eya ta afi sia afi si mi ́ eyina la , mi ́ eƒoa nu tso Kristo ŋuti na ame siwo kata ̃ le klalo be woaɖo to . Mi ́ efi ̃ aa nu wo eye mi ́ exlɔ ̃ a nu wo vevie abe ale si mi ́ ate ŋui ene . Mi ́ edina be mi ́ akplɔ ame sia ame ayi Mawu ƒe ŋkume fɔɖiɖimanɔŋui ɖe dɔ si Kristo wɔ na wo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe la ta .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Esiae nye nye dɔ , eye mate ŋu awɔe to Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ triakɔ si le dɔ wɔm le menye la ɖeɖe ko me .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Adzɔ dzi nam ŋutɔ nenye be ɖe mianya ale si medoa gbe ɖa madzudzɔmadzudzɔe ɖe miawo kple hame si le Laodikea la kpakple nɔvi vevi bubu siwo menyam kura o la ha ̃ ta .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Nu si mebia Mawu na mi lae nye be : dzideƒo nanɔ mia si eye lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe ŋuse ̃ nabla mi ɖekae ale be miate ŋu akpɔ mɔnu anya Kristo le kakaɖedzi me kple gɔmesese deto vava ̃ tɔ . Elabena Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo ɣaɣla si wo ̀ va ɖe fia mlɔeba lae nye Kristo ŋutɔ .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Eya mee woɣla nunya triakɔ ƒe kesinɔnuwo kata ̃ ɖo .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Mele nya siawo gblɔm na mi elabena mele vɔvɔ ̃ m be ame aɖe ate ŋu ava ble mi , alo ado la ̃ mi to eƒe aɖe ŋanɛ nyawo gbɔgblɔ na mi me .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Togbɔ be gbɔnye didi tso mia gbɔ ha ̃ la , nye dzi le mia ŋu . Mekpɔ dzidzɔ elabena miele agbe nɔm nyuie eye miaƒe xɔse ha ̃ le ŋuse ̃ kpɔm ɖe edzi le Kristo me .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Azɔ abe ale si miexɔ Kristo dzi se be aɖe mi ene la , mixɔ se nenema ke le miaƒe gbe sia gbe ƒe nuwɔnawo me ; eye miwɔ ɖeka kplii blibo le xɔse me .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Mili ke ɖe eya amea me blibo eye miaxɔ nunyiame tso egbɔ . Mikpɔ egbɔ be mietsi ɖe edzi le Aƒetɔ la me . Mina dzidzɔ kple akpedada nayɔ miaƒe agbe me fu ̃ ɖe nu ga ̃ siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ wɔ na mi la ta .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Migana ame aɖeke natsɔ eƒe xexemenunya kple nyaŋuɖoɖo siwo wotu ɖe amegbetɔ ƒe nunya dzi , ke menye ɖe nu siwo Kristo gblɔ dzi o la awɔ mi kluviwoe , kple dzidzɔ o .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Elabena Mawu ƒe blibonyenye la kata ̃ nɔ Kristo me le ŋutila ̃ ƒe dzedzeme nu

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: eye blibonyenye sia yɔ mi fu ̃ le Kristo me , ame si nye ta na ŋuse ̃ wo kple dziɖulanyenyewo kata ̃ .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Eya amea me ha ̃ wotso aʋa na mi , le esime mieɖe miaƒe dzɔdzɔme nu vɔ ̃ ŋutila ̃ ɖa , menye kple aʋatsotso si wotsɔ asi tsoe o , ke esi wowɔ to Kristo me la boŋ .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: To mawutsideta me mieku kplii eye mietsi tre kplii to miaƒe xɔse si le Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ si fɔe tso ame kukuwo dome la me .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Mieku ɖe nu vɔ ̃ wo me , eye womeɖe miaƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo ɖa le mia ŋu haɖe o . Gake ena be miekpɔ gome le Kristo ƒe agbenɔnɔ me , elabena etsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke mi ,

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: eye wo ̀ tutu nya si wotsɔ ɖe mia ŋuti la ɖa , vodada siawo nye eƒe se siwo dzi mieda le la . Etsɔ nu vɔ ̃ siawo kata ̃ kla ̃ ɖe Kristo ƒe atitsoga ŋuti eye wo ̀ ɖe wo ɖa .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: To esia me la , Mawu ɖe Satana ƒe ŋuse ̃ si wo ̀ atsɔ atɔ asi miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo dzii la ɖa , eye Mawu ɖe Kristo ƒe dziɖuɖu le atitsoga ŋuti afi si woɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo kata ̃ ɖa le la fia xexeame kata ̃ .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Eya ta migana ame aɖeke naɖe ɖeklemi kpli mi le nu si mieɖuna alo nona ŋu loo alo ale si miawo mieɖua Yudatɔwo ƒe aza ̃ wo , ŋkekenyuiwo , dzinu yeye ƒe wɔnawo kple Sabat ŋkekewo o la ta o .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Elabena esiawo kata ̃ nye ɖoɖo siwo wu enu esi Kristo va do . Đoɖo siawo nye nu la ŋutɔ ƒe vɔvɔli ko . Egɔmee nye wonye Kristo ŋutɔ ƒe vɔvɔli ko .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Migana ame aɖeke nable mi be esi miegbe be yewomasubɔ mawudɔlawo abe ale si wogblɔ na mi ene o ta la , miele tsɔtsrɔ ̃ ge o . Wogblɔna be yewokpɔ ŋutega eye yewonya be ele be miasubɔ mawudɔlawo . Ame siawo nye dadalawo togbɔ be wogblɔna be yewonye ɖokuibɔbɔɖeanyilawo ha ̃ . Susu wɔnuku le wo si .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Ke womeku ɖe Kristo ŋu , ame si nye ta si ŋu mi ame siwo kata ̃ nye eƒe ŋutila ̃ la ku ɖo o ; elabena eƒe la ̃ meka sese ̃ wo wotsɔ bla mi ́ ɖekae eye mi ́ ete ŋu tsina elabena mi ́ exɔa nunyiame kple ŋuse ̃ tso eya ɖeka ko gbɔ .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Le nyateƒe me , esi mieku kple Kristo ta la , mievo tso nu si xexemetɔwo buna tso ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ŋuti la si me . Woƒe susue nye be , ame akpɔ ɖeɖe to dɔ nyui wɔwɔ kple sewo dzi wɔwɔ me . Ne ele alea la , nu ka tae miegale wo wɔwɔ dzi eye woƒe se mawo gabla mi ɖo ?

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: Wobe migaɖu esi o , migaɖɔ ekemɛ kpɔ o , eye wobe migaka asi nuɖuɖu aɖewo ya ŋuti kura o ; nu ka tae ?

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Kpɔ ɖa , se mawo ya la amegbetɔ , numaɖinu ƒe ɖoɖowo ko wonye , elabena nuɖuɖu la , ɖe ko wowɔe be ame naɖu .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Se siawo anya dze se nyuiwoe elabena wonye se siwo hia ̃ ame ɖokuitsɔtsɔke kple ɖokuibɔbɔ blibo eye wo dzi wɔwɔ sese ̃ , gake ŋuse ̃ aɖeke mele wo si be ame natsɔ aɖu eƒe susuwo kple dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo dzi o . Đeko wonaa ame dana .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Azɔ esi mietsi tre kple Kristo tso ku me ta la , mitsɔ miaƒe dziwo ɖo dziƒo ƒe kesinɔnuwo kple eƒe dzidzɔwo ŋuti , afi si Kristo le Mawu ƒe axadzi le , le bubu kple ŋuse ̃ me .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Mina dziƒonuwo ŋutibubu naxɔ miaƒe susuwo me ; migagble ̃ miaƒe ɣeyiɣiwo anɔ anyigba dzi nuwo ŋuti bum o .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Elabena mieku eye wotsɔ mia kple Kristo ƒe agbe ɣla ɖe Mawu me .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Ne Kristo si nye miaƒe agbe va do la ekema miawo ha ̃ miado kpakplii le ŋutikɔkɔe me .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Eya ta migbe nu le anyigbadzinu siwo yɔ fu ̃ kple nu vɔ ̃ la gbɔ ; miwu didi vɔ ̃ siwo le fiefiem le mia me . Migawɔ naneke si ku ɖe ahasiwɔwɔ , makɔmakɔnyenye , fie ̃ ŋufie ̃ ŋu kple ŋukpenanudzroamewo ŋuti o . Migasubɔ xexe sia me ƒe nu nyuiwo ɖe Mawu teƒe o , elabena esia nye Trɔ ̃ subɔsubɔ .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Mawu ƒe dziku heliheli ̃ ava ame siwo wɔa nu siawo la dzi .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Miewɔa nu siawo tsa ̃ esi miele abe xexemetɔ bubuwo ko ene

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: gake azɔ la ɣeyiɣi la de na mi be miaɖe asi le dzikudodo , fule ́ le , fiƒode kple nya vlowo gbɔgblɔ ŋuti .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Migaka aʋatso na mia nɔewo o ; elabena mieɖe agbe xoxo la kple eƒe nuwɔnawo ɖa .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Azɔ la miele agbe yeye nɔm eye agbe yeye nɔnɔ sia na miele nu nyui wɔwɔ srɔ ̃ m gbe sia gbe le si dzedze me , be mianɔ ame si nye Wɔla la ƒe nɔnɔme me .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Le agbe yeye sia nɔnɔ me la , Griktɔ , Yudatɔ , aʋatsotso alo aʋamatsomatso , ŋkumaʋumaʋutɔ alo Skitiatɔ , kluvi alo ablɔɖevi megali o , ke boŋ wo kata ̃ nye kristotɔ eye Kristo le wo kata ̃ me .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be Mawu ame si na agbe yeye mi la ŋutɔe tia mi , wɔ mi kɔkɔe eye wolɔ ̃ mi vevie ta la , mido dɔmetrɔtrɔ , nublanuikpɔkpɔ , ɖokuibɔbɔ , tufafa kple dzigbɔɖi ƒe awuwo na mia ɖokuiwo ,

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: mihe adodo kple mia nɔewo , eye mitsɔ mia nɔewo ƒe vodadawo ke wo . Miɖo ŋku ale si Aƒetɔ la tsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke mii la dzi eye miawo ha ̃ miatsɔ ake mia nɔewo nenema ke .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Ƒo esiawo kata ̃ ta la , mina lɔlɔ ̃ nafia ale si mianɔ agbee la mi , elabena esia ana be hame la kata ̃ nanɔ anyi le ɖekawɔwɔ blibo me .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Mina ŋutifafa si tso Kristo gbɔ la naɖu dzi le miaƒe dziwo kple agbenɔnɔ blibo la kata ̃ me ɣesiaɣi , elabena esia nye miaƒe dɔdeasi kple mɔnukpɔkpɔ abe ame siwo nye ŋutila ̃ ɖeka ƒe ŋutinuwo ene . Eye mida akpe ɣesiaɣi .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Mina be Kristo ƒe nya la natso aƒe ɖe mia me le agbɔsɔsɔ me , esi miele nu fiam , le nu xlɔ ̃ m mia nɔewo kple Mawu menunya , eye midzi Psalmowo , hadzidziwo kple gbɔgbɔmehawo kpakple akpedada le miaƒe dziwo me na Mawu .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Eye nu sia nu si miawɔ la , eɖanye le nya me alo nuwɔwɔ me o , miwɔ wo kata ̃ le Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe ŋkɔ me eye miada akpe na Mawu Fofo la , to eya amea me .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Mi srɔ ̃ nyɔnuwo la , mibɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo na mia srɔ ̃ wo , elabena esia nye Aƒetɔ la ƒe ɖoɖo na mi .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Eye mi srɔ ̃ ŋutsuwo ha ̃ la , milɔ ̃ mia srɔ ̃ wo eye miale ́ be na wo eye migado dziku ɖe wo ŋuti alo ablu ɖe wo ta o .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Mi ɖeviwo la , ele be miabu mia fofowo kple mia dadawo ɣesiaɣi , elabena esiae dze Aƒetɔ la ŋu .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Mi fofowo la , miganɔ nya hem ɖe mia viwo ŋuti ale gbegbe be dzi naɖe le wo ƒo be woadzudzɔ agbagbadzedze o .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Mi kluviwo la , miɖo to miaƒe anyigbadziƒetɔwo ɣesiaɣi ; menye to ameŋkumenuwɔwɔ me o , ke boŋ miawɔe ɣesiaɣi ne miaƒe aƒetɔwo meli o ha ̃ . Miɖo to wo faa ɖe miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na Aƒetɔ la kple ale si miedi be yewoadze eŋui la ta .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Mitsɔ kutrikuku kple dzidzɔ wɔ nu sia nu si wo ̀ le be miawɔ la , abe Aƒetɔ lae miele ewɔm na ene , eye menye abe miaƒe anyigbadziƒetɔwo miele ewɔm na ene o ,

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: esi mienyae be miaxɔ domenyinyi tso Aƒetɔ la gbɔ abe fetu ene . Elebena Aƒetɔ Kristo ŋutɔe miele dɔ wɔm na .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Ame sia me si wɔ nu vɔ ̃ la axɔ eƒe nu vɔ ̃ ƒe fetu eye ameŋkumekpɔkpɔ aɖeke manɔ eme o .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Mi aƒetɔwo la , ele be miawɔ nu si nyo eye wo ̀ dze la ɖe miaƒe kluviwo ŋu . Miɖo ŋku edzi ɣesiaɣi be , miawo ha ̃ la Aƒetɔ le mia si le dziƒo eye wo ̀ le ŋku le ́ m ɖe mia ŋuti vevie .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Mido vevi gbedodoɖa , minɔ ŋudzɔ eye mida akpe na Mawu .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Mido gbe ɖa ɖe mi ́ awo ha ̃ ta be Mawu naʋu agbo na mi ́ aƒe mawunyagbɔgblɔ be mi ́ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ Kristo ƒe nu ɣaɣlawo esi ta mele game le afi sia ɖo .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Mido gbe ɖa be magblɔe eme nakɔ abe ale si mate ŋui ene .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Miwɔ mɔnukpɔkpɔ suetɔ kekeake ŋutidɔ ne miatsɔ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ nyanyui lae na ame bubuwo . Mizɔ le nunya me le miaƒe nuƒoƒo kple wo me .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Mina amenuveve kple dze nanɔ miaƒe nuƒoƒo me , elabena to esia me ko miate ŋu akpɔ ŋuɖoɖo nyuitɔ na ame sia ame .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Tikiko , mi ́ a nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ la agblɔ ale si mele edzii la na mi . Enye kutrikula si subɔa Aƒetɔ la kplim .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Medɔ dɔ tɔxɛ siae be wo ̀ ava kpɔ ale si miele ɖa eye be wo ̀ afa akɔ na mi ade dzi ƒo ha ̃ na mi .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Mele Onesimo , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ kple nuteƒewɔla si nye mia detɔ la ha ̃ ɖom , ɖe mi . Eya kple Tikiko woagblɔ nu siwo le dzɔdzɔm le afi sia fifia la na mi .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Aristarko , ame si le game kplim la do gbe na mi kple lɔlɔ ̃ ; nenema kee nye Marko , Barnaba nɔvi . Abe ale si megblɔ na mi kpɔ ene la , ne Marko va mia gbɔ la , mixɔe dzidzɔtɔe .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
