text2: Yesu , si wogayɔna ha ̃ be Yusto la ha ̃ do gbe na mi nyuie . Ame siawo nye Yudatɔwo le nye dɔwɔhatiwo dome hele dɔ wɔm na mawufiaɖuƒe la eye wonye akɔfafa ga ̃ aɖe nam .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Epafra , mia dometɔ ɖeka , ame si nye Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔla ha ̃ do gbe na mi nyuie . Ele ʋiʋlim ɖe mia ta le gbedodoɖa me ɣesiaɣi be mianɔ te sesi ̃ e le Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu blibo la me , atsi eye miakpɔ kakaɖedzi blibo .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Mate ŋu aka ɖe edzi na mi be , ewɔ dɔ sesi ̃ e ɖe mi kple kristotɔ bubu siwo le Laodikea kple Hierapoli la nu ,

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Luka , Atikewɔla lɔlɔ ̃ la kple Dema ha ̃ do gbe na mi nyuie .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Mido gbe na nɔvi kristotɔ siwo le Laodikea nam . Mido gbe na Nimfa kple hame si kpea ta le eƒe aƒe me la nam .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Nenye be miexle ̃ agbale ̃ sia vɔ la , mitsɔe ɖo ɖe Laodikea hame la ha ̃ woaxle ̃ eye miawo ha ̃ mixɔ agbale ̃ si meŋlɔ ɖo ɖe wo ha ̃ axle ̃ .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Migblɔ na Arkipo be , “ Kpɔ egbɔ be ne ̀ wɔ nu siwo kata ̃ Aƒetɔ la be na ̃ wɔ . ”

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Esia nye nye ŋutɔ nye gbedoname si meŋlɔ kple nye ŋutɔ nye asi . Miɖo ŋku dzinye le nye gaxɔmenɔnɔ me le afi ̃ sia . Mawu ƒe amenuveve nanɔ anyi kpli mi .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Paulo , Silvano kple Timoteo gbɔ le yiyim na kristohame si le Tesalonika , mi ame siwo nye Mawu Fofo la kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo tɔ . Yayra kple ŋutifafa si tso Mawu mi ́ a Fofo kple mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gbɔ la woana mi .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Mi ́ edaa akpe na Mawu ɣesiaɣi ɖe mia ta , eye mi ́ edoa gbe ɖa ɖe mia ta madzudzɔmadzudzɔe .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Le mi ́ aƒe gbedodoɖawo me na Mawu mi ́ a Fofo la ɖe mia ta la , mi ́ eŋlɔa miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ dɔwo , miaƒe xɔse triakɔ kple mɔkpɔkpɔ na mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe tɔtrɔgbɔ la be o . "

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo kple Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ veviwo , me ́ nya bena Mawu ŋutɔe tia mi .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Elabena esi mi ́ etsɔ nyanyui la vɛ na mi la , miexɔe abe nya dzodzro aɖe ko ene o ; ke boŋ mieɖo to eye miese nya la kple dzidzɔ ga ̃ . Nu si mi ́ egblɔ na mi la wɔ dɔ ɖe mia dzi ŋutɔ , elabena Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ŋutɔ ɖo kpe edzi na mi be nu si mi ́ egblɔ na mi la nye nyateƒe . Eye mienya ale si mi ́ awo ŋutɔ ƒe agbenɔnɔ ganye kpeɖodzi na mi be mi ́ aƒe gbedeasi si mi ́ etsɔ vɛ na mi la nye nyateƒe .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ale mieva zu mi ́ awo kple Aƒetɔ la yomedzelawo ; elabena miexɔ mi ́ aƒe nya la kple dzidzɔ si tso Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la gbɔ , togbɔ be ehe tetekpɔ kple nuxaxa geɖewo va mia dzii ha ̃ .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Emegbe la miawo ŋutɔ mieva zu kpɔɖeŋu na kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le Makedonia kple Akaya .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Azɔ la , miekaka Aƒetɔ la ƒe nya la na amewo le afi sia afi , tso Akaya yi keke Makedonia ƒe liƒowo godo ke ha ̃ elabena afi sia afi si mi ́ eyi la , amewo ɖia ɖase tso miaƒe xɔse deto si le mia si le Mawu me la ŋuti . Esia ta megahia ̃ be mi ́ awo mi ́ agagblɔ nya aɖeke na wo o ,

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: elabena woawo boŋ gblɔa ale si miexɔ mi ́ kple dzidzɔ manyagblɔ kple ale si mietrɔ tso Trɔ ̃ subɔsubɔ gbɔ va Mawu gbɔ eye Mawu gbagbe nyateƒetɔ la koe zu miaƒe Aƒetɔ la na mi ́ .

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: Eye wogblɔ ha ̃ na mi ́ be , miele mɔ kpɔm na Mawu Vi , Yesu ƒe tɔtrɔ ava tso dziƒo ; ame si Mawu fɔ tso ku me eye wo ̀ nye Đela si koe aɖe mi ́ tso Mawu ƒe dziku heliheli ̃ ɖe nu vɔ ̃ ŋuti la me .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , miawo ŋutɔ mienya ale si mi ́ aƒe mia gbɔ vava ɖe vi na mii .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Mienya ale si wowɔ funyafunya mi ́ kple ale si mi ́ ekpe fu le Filipi hafi mi ́ eva ɖo mia gbɔ la ha ̃ . Ke Mawu na dzideƒo tɔxɛ mi ́ be mi ́ agblɔ nyanyui ma ke na mi togbɔ be futɔwo ƒo xla ̃ mi ́ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Eya ta miakpɔe adze sii be , mi ́ ele mawunya gblɔm ɖe didi vɔ ̃ wo alo tameɖoɖo vɔ ̃ wo ta o . Ke boŋ mi ́ ele egblɔm le anukwareɖiɖi kple dzitsinya nyui me .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Elabena mi ́ awo la mi ́ ele nya la gblɔm abe dɔla siwo tso Mawu gbɔ , ame siwo dzi ko wo ̀ ka ɖo be woagblɔ nyateƒe la ko ene ; eya ta mi ́ etrɔ eƒe nya la ƒe akpa aɖeke be wo ̀ asɔ ɖe nyaselawo ƒe didi nu o , elabena mi ́ awo la , mi ́ esubɔa Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ si dzroa amewo ƒe dzimesusuwo ƒe gogloƒe ke me .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Abe ale si mienya nyuie ene la , mi ́ edze agbagba zi ɖeka pɛ ha ̃ kpɔ be mi ́ ahe mi va mi ́ a gbɔe to mia nu beble me o , eye Mawu ŋutɔ ha ̃ nya be menye ɖe mi ́ ebua be mi ́ enye mia xɔlɔ ̃ wo ale be miana ga mi ́ o .

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Mi ́ ebia kafukafu tso miawo alo ame bubu aɖeke gbɔ kpɔ o ; evɔ abe Kristo ƒe apostolowo ene la , mi ́ edze na bubu tɔxɛ tso mia gbɔ hafi .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Le esia teƒe la , mi ́ egbɔ dzi ɖi na mi abe ale si vi dada gbɔa dzi ɖi doa nuɖuɖu na viawo eye wo ̀ le ́ a be na wo ene .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Mi ́ elɔ ̃ mi vevie eye mi ́ aƒe lɔlɔ ̃ la de to ale gbegbe be mi ́ etsɔ Mawu ƒe nyanyui la ɖeɖe ko vɛ na mi o ke boŋ mi ́ etsɔ mi ́ awo ŋutɔ ƒe agbe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ kpe ɖe eŋuti na mi .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mieɖo ŋku ale si mi ́ ewɔ dɔ kple kutrikuku geɖe le mia dome la dzi oa ? Za ̃ kple keli mi ́ ewɔa dɔ kple kutrikuku eye mi ́ etea fifia be mi ́ ate ŋu akpɔ nu anɔ agbe ɖe edzi ale be mi ́ aganye agba na ame aɖeke le afi ma esi mi ́ ele Mawu ƒe nyanyui la gblɔm le mia dome o .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Miawo ŋutɔ kple Mawu siaa mienye ɖasefowo na mi ́ be mi ́ enɔ agbe dzadzɛ , kɔkɔe si ŋuti kpɔtsɔtsɔ mele o la le mia dome .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Đe mieɖo ŋku edzi be , mi ́ eƒoa nu na mi abe ale si fofo ƒoa nu na viawoe la ene oa ? Mi ́ eɖea kuku na mi , dea dzi ƒo na mi eye kura gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , mi ́ edina

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: tso mia si be miaƒe agbenɔnɔ naganye nuɖiaɖia na Mawu o , ke boŋ wo ̀ ahe dzidzɔ vɛ na eya ame si yɔ mi ́ va eƒe fiaɖuƒe la me be mi ́ akpɔ gome le eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la me .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Eye mi ́ adzudzɔ akpedada na Mawu ɖe esia ta o , elabena esi mi ́ egblɔ nyanyui la na mi la , miebu nya la abe nya siwo mi ́ awo ŋutɔ mi ́ esusu la ene o , ke boŋ miexɔe abe Nya si tso Mawu ŋutɔ gbɔ la ene , eye le nyateƒe me eya ŋutɔ gbɔe wo ̀ tso , eya ta esi miexɔe se la etrɔ miaƒe agbenɔnɔ .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , esia yomedzenue nye be miawo ha ̃ miekpe fu abe ale si hame siwo le Yudea la kpee ene . Miawo ŋutɔ miaƒe dukɔmetɔwo ti mia yome abe ale si woawo ha ̃ kpe fu tso woawo ŋutɔ ƒe amewo Yudatɔwo , sime ene .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Esi wowu woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nyagblɔɖilawo vɔ la , wokla ̃ Aƒetɔ Yesu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ɖe atitsoga ŋuti , eye azɔ la , woti mi ́ awo ha ̃ yome kutɔkutɔe henya mi ́ do goe le dua me . Wotsi tre ɖe Mawu kple amegbetɔ siaa ŋuti

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: eye wole agbagba dzem be woaxe mɔ na mi ́ ne mi ́ agagblɔ nya la na Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo o , ɖe vɔvɔ ̃ ta , be wo dometɔ aɖewo akpɔ ɖeɖe . Ale ame siawo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo gale tsitsim ɖe edzi . Mlɔeba la Mawu ƒe dziku va wo dzi azɔ .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , esi mi ́ edzo le mia gbɔ le ɣeyiɣi kpui si va yi me la , mi ́ aƒe dziwo ya medzo le mia gbɔ o , ke mi ́ edze agbagba ɖe sia ɖe be mi ́ agava kpɔ mi ɖa gake mete ŋu dze edzi o .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Edzro mi ́ vevie ŋutɔ be mi ́ ava mia gbɔ eye nye , Paulo , medze agbagba zi geɖe be mava gake Satana meɖe mɔ na mi ́ o .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Nu ka gɔ ̃ e mi ́ ele agbe na ? Nu kae na mɔkpɔkpɔ kple dzidzɔ mi ́ eye wo ̀ nye mi ́ aƒe fetu vava ̃ kple fiakuku la ? Miawoe ! E ̃ , miahe dzidzɔ geɖe vɛ na mi ́ , ne mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ etsi tre ɖe mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ŋkume ne etrɔ va .

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Elabena miawoe nye mi ́ aƒe ŋutikɔkɔe kple dzidzɔ .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Mlɔeba , esi mi ́ ate ŋu agado dzi o la , mi ́ eɖoe be mi ́ awo ɖeɖe mi ́ atsi Atene

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: eye mi ́ eɖo Timoteo , mi ́ a nɔvi kple hadɔwɔla ; Mawu ƒe dɔla si ɖea gbeƒa ̃ Kristo ƒe nyanyui la ɖe mi be wo ̀ ava do ŋuse ̃ miaƒe xɔse eye wo ̀ ade dzi ƒo na mi ,

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: ale be miate ŋu ale ́ dzi ɖe ƒo le miaƒe fukpekpe siawo kata ̃ me . Gake mienya bena fukpekpe mawo nye Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo ƒe akpa aɖe na mi ́ kristotɔwo .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Esi mi ́ enɔ mia gbɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , mi ́ egblɔe na mi do ŋgɔ bena fukpekpe kple yometiti ava kpuie abe ale si wo ̀ va dzɔe ene .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Abe ale si megblɔ va yi ene la , esi mi ́ ekpɔ be mi ́ aƒe mia gbɔ vava le megbe tsim akpa la , mi ́ eɖo Timoteo ɖa be wo ̀ akpɔe ɖa be miaƒe xɔse gale te sesi ̃ e maha ̃ . Mevɔ ̃ be ɖewohi ̃ Satana va kplɔ mia dometɔ vevitɔ aɖewo dzoe eye mi ́ aƒe agbagbadzedzewo kata ̃ zu dzodzro .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Azɔ la Timoteo trɔ gbɔ eye wo ̀ tsɔ dzidzɔnya sia vɛ na mi ́ be miaƒe xɔse kple lɔlɔ ̃ le Aƒetɔ la me gale te sesi ̃ e ko abe tsa ̃ ene , eye be mieɖoa ŋku mi ́ aƒe mia gbɔ vava dzi kple dzidzɔ , eye miedi vevie be yewoakpɔ mi ́ abe ale si mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ edi vevie be mi ́ akpɔ mi ene .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Eya ta nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mi ́ aƒe dziwo kpɔ akɔfafa , le mi ́ aƒe hia ̃ wo kple fukpekpewo me le afii , elabena mi ́ enya azɔ be miele te sesi ̃ e nyateƒetɔe le Aƒetɔ la me .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Mi ́ awo la , mi ́ ate ŋu atsɔ fu ɖe sia ɖe zi ale si mi ́ enyae be miele te sesi ̃ e le Aƒetɔ la me .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Ale ke mi ́ awɔ ada akpe na Mawu wo ̀ ade eteƒe ɖe mia ta ɖe dzidzɔ si mi ́ ekpɔ le mi ́ aƒe Mawu la ŋkume le mia ta ?

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Elabena za ̃ kple keli la , mi ́ edoa gbe ɖa ɖe mia ta atraɖii ; mi ́ ebiaa Mawu be wo ̀ aɖe mɔ be mi ́ agakpɔ mi , ale bena mate ŋu aɖe kuxi aɖewo siwo aganɔ fu ɖem na miaƒe xɔse la ɖa .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Mawu mi ́ a Fofo la ŋutɔ kple mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu nagagbugbɔ mi ́ ɖo ɖe mia gbɔ .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Eye Aƒetɔ la nawɔe be miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na mia nɔewo nayɔ fu ̃ agba go abe ale si mi ́ aƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na mi le la ene .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Esia ana be Mawu mi ́ a Fofo la nana be miaƒe dziwo nakpɔ ŋuse ̃ , anɔ dzadzɛ , kɔkɔe ale be miate ŋu ado ɖe eŋkume fɔɖiɖimanɔŋui nenye be mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo trɔ gbɔ kple ame siwo kata ̃ nye etɔ .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Mlɔeba la , nɔviwo , mi ́ efia mi ale si wo ̀ le be mianɔ agbe be miadze Mawu ŋu , eye le nyateƒe me la , miele agbe nɔm nenema . Ke azɔ la mi ́ ele mia biam hele ŋuse ̃ dom mi le Aƒetɔ Yesu me be miagawɔe wu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Mienya nu siwo mi ́ eɖo na mi be miawɔ la to Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe ŋuse ̃ me .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Elabena enye Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu be mianɔ kɔkɔe ; ate ɖa xaa tso ahasiwɔwɔ gbɔ ;

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: eye mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nasrɔ ̃ ale si wo ̀ aɖu eƒe ŋutila ̃ dzi eye wo ̀ anɔ anyi kple srɔ ̃ a le kɔkɔenyenye kple bubu me ,

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: ke menye kple fieŋufie ̃ ŋui ƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo , abe ale si Trɔ ̃ subɔla siwo menya Mawu kple eƒe mɔwo o la , wɔnɛ ene o .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Esia ha ̃ nye Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu be , ame aɖeke magaba nɔvia , axɔ srɔ ̃ a le esi gbeɖegbeɖe o , elabena Aƒetɔ la ahe to na mi nublanuimakpmakpɔtɔe ɖe nu vɔ ̃ sia ta , abe ale si mi ́ egblɔe na mi kple ɖokuibɔbɔ va yi la ene .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Elabena Mawu meyɔ mi ́ be mi ́ ava nye ame ƒoɖi siwo yɔ fu ̃ kple dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo o , ke boŋ be mi ́ anye ame dzadzɛwo kple ame kɔkɔewo .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Nenye be ame aɖe gbe be yemanɔ agbe ɖe ɖoɖo siawo nu o la , menye amegbetɔwo ƒe sewo dzi dam wo ̀ le o ke boŋ Mawu si na eƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la mi la , ƒe sewo dzi dam wo ̀ le .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Meka ɖe edzi be magahia ̃ be magblɔ nya tso dadavilɔlɔ ̃ si dze be wo ̀ anɔ Mawu ƒe amewo dome la ŋuti o ; mienyae xoxo ! Elabena Mawu ŋutɔ le nu fiam mi be mialɔ ̃ mia nɔewo .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Le nyateƒe me , miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na nɔvi kristotɔ siwo le Makedonia la kata ̃ kpɔ ŋuse ̃ ŋutɔ . Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , togbɔ be wo ̀ le alea ha ̃ la , mi ́ ele kuku ɖem na mi be miagalɔ ̃ mia nɔewo ɖe dzi wu .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Esia nanye miaƒe didi ɖaa be , mianɔ agbe le tufafa me ; miakpɔ mia ŋutɔwo ƒe dɔwo gbɔ abe ale si mi ́ egblɔ na mi va yi la ene .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Ne mienɔ agbe alea la , ame siwo menye kristotɔwo o la axɔ mia dzi ase eye woabu mi . Kpe ɖe esia ŋuti la , miganɔ amewo ƒe asinu kpɔm be woana ga mi be miatsɔ akpɔ mia ɖokuiwo dzii o .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Nɔviwo , nyemedi be mianɔ numanyamanya me le ame siwo ku la ŋu alo miaxa nu abe ame bubu siwo si mɔkpɔkpɔ mele la ene o .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Mi ́ exɔe se bena Yesu ku eye wo ̀ gatsi tre eya ta mi ́ exɔe se bena Mawu afɔ ame siwo dɔ alɔ ̃ le Yesu me la kpakple Yesu .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Le Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔ ƒe nya nu la , mi ́ ele egblɔm na mi bena mi ́ ame siwo gale agbe , ame siwo asusɔ va se ɖe Aƒetɔ la ƒe vava la , mado ŋgɔ na ame siwo ku o .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Elabena Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔ aɖi tso dziƒo ava kple gbeɖeɖe ga ̃ aɖe , kple mawudɔlaga ̃ tɔ ƒe gbe kpakple Mawu ƒe kpe ̃ ɖiɖi eye ame siwo ku le Kristo me la afɔ gba ̃ .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Le esia megbe woakɔ mi ́ ame siwo gale agbe le ɣemaɣi la ayi dzi kpliwo le alili ̃ kpowo dzi be mi ́ ayi aɖado go Aƒetɔ la le yame . Ale mi ́ anɔ Aƒetɔ la gbɔ tegbetegbe .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Eya ta mitsɔ nya siawo fa akɔe na mia nɔewo .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Ɣekaɣie nu siawo kata ̃ ava eme ? Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mehia ̃ be magblɔ nya aɖeke tso ema ya ŋuti o ,

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: elabena mienya nyuie be ame aɖeke menya ɣeyiɣi la o . Aƒetɔ la ƒe aza ̃ gbe la aɖi ɖe mi ́ abe ale si fiafitɔ vana le za ̃ me ene .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Esime amewo le gbɔgblɔm be , “ Ŋutifafa kple dedienɔnɔ ” li la , gbegble ̃ ava ƒo ɖe wo dzi kpoyi abe ale si fu ɖua funɔe eye mate ŋu asi le enu o ene .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Ke nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , miawo la nu siawo mele ɣaɣla ɖe mi o , eye wo mava ɖi ɖe mi abe fiafitɔ ene , le Aƒetɔ la ƒe aza ̃ gbe la o .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Elabena mi kata ̃ la , kekeli kple ŋkeke la ƒe viwoe mienye eye mienye viviti kple za ̃ tɔwo o .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Eya ta minɔ ŋudzɔ ɖaa eye migadɔ alɔ ̃ abe ame bubuwo ene o . Minɔ ŋudzɔ na eƒe vava eye mianɔ mo xexi .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Za ̃ mee amewo dɔa alɔ ̃ eye ɣemaɣi me kee amewo mua aha .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Ke mina mi ́ ame siwo nye kekeliviwo la mi ́ anɔ mo xexi , eye mi ́ atsɔ xɔse kple lɔlɔ ̃ ƒe akɔtakpoxɔnu ado eye mi ́ aɖɔ ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ si mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm na la abe gakuku ene .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Mawu meɖo be yeatrɔ eƒe dɔmedzoe akɔ ɖe mi ́ a dzi o , ke boŋ be yeaɖe mi ́ to mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo dzi .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Kristo ku ɖe mi ́ a ta , ale be mi ́ ele agbe alo mi ́ eku o , ne etrɔ va la mi ́ ate ŋu anɔ agbe kplii tegbetegbe .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Eya ta mide dzi ƒo na mia nɔewo be miatu mia nɔewo ɖo abe ale si miele wɔwɔm xoxo la ene .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , azɔ la mi ́ ele biabiam tso mia si be miade bubu ame siwo wɔa dɔ kple vevidodo le mia dome la ŋu , ame siwo wotsɔ ɖo mia nu le Aƒetɔ la me eye woxlɔ ̃ a nu mi .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Mido kɔkɔ ame siawo le lɔlɔ ̃ me le woƒe dɔwɔwɔ ta . Minɔ anyi le ŋutifafa me kple mia nɔewo .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Mi ́ ele ŋuse ̃ dom mi , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo be miaxlɔ ̃ nu ame siwo le kuvia wɔm , mide dzi ƒo na ame siwo le vɔvɔ ̃ m , mikpe ɖe ame siwo gbɔdzɔ la ŋu migbɔ dzi ɖi na ame sia ame .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Mikpɔ egbɔ be ame aɖeke metsɔ vɔ ̃ ɖo vɔ ̃ teƒe o , ke boŋ midze agbagba be ɣesiaɣi la mianyo dɔme na mia nɔewo kple ame bubu ɖe sia ɖe .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Dzi nedzɔ mi ɣesiaɣi .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Minɔ gbedodoɖa dzi madzudzɔmadzudzɔe .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Mida akpe le nuwo kata ̃ me elabena esiae nye Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu na mi le Kristo Yesu me .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Migatsi Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la nu o .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Migado vlo nyagblɔɖiwo o .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Mido nu sia nu kpɔ eye mile ́ ɖe nu si nyo la ŋu .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Mitsri vɔ ̃ ɖe sia ɖe tɔgbi .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Azɔ la , Mawu ŋutɔ , ame si nye ŋutifafa ƒe Mawu nakɔ mia ŋuti keŋkeŋ eye wo ̀ adzra miaƒe gbɔgbɔ , luʋɔ kple ŋutila ̃ blibo la ɖo mokakamanɔŋui le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe vavagbe la .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Nuteƒewɔlae nye ame si yɔ mi eya ta awɔe ade goe .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mido gbe ɖa ɖe mi ́ awo ha ̃ ta .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Mido gbe na nɔviawo kata ̃ kple nugbugbɔ kɔkɔe .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Mele eƒom ɖe mia nu le Aƒetɔ la ŋkume be woaxle ̃ agbale ̃ sia na nɔviawo kata ̃ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe amenuveve nanɔ anyi kpli mi .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Paulo , Silvano kple Timoteo gbɔ le yiyim na kristohame si le Tesalonika , ame siwo le dedie le Mawu mi ́ a Fofo kple mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo me .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu mi ́ a Fofo kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo nana eƒe yayra sɔgbɔ la mi eye wo ̀ ana ŋutifafa nanɔ miaƒe dziwo kple tamesusuwo me .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , akpedada na Mawu ɖe mia ta menye nu dzeame ko wo ̀ nye na mi ́ o , ke boŋ mi ́ aƒe dɔ wo ̀ nye be mi ́ awɔ na Mawu ɖe ale si miaƒe xɔse tsi ɖe edzi nukutɔe eye miaƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na mia nɔewo ha ̃ de to ŋutɔ la ta .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Enye dzidzɔ na mi ́ be mi ́ aƒo adegbe tso miaƒe dzigbɔɖi kple ale si miaƒe xɔse de to le Mawu me la ŋu na hame bubuwo , togbɔ be miele fukpekpe kple ɣeyiɣi sese ̃ wo me tom ha ̃ .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Esia nye ale si Mawu wɔa nu to mɔ dzɔdzɔetɔ dzii la ƒe kpɔɖeŋu ɖeka ko , elabena to miaƒe fukpekpe me la ele mia dzram ɖo hena eƒe fiaɖuƒe la

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: eye le ɣemaɣi me ke la ele ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ kple tohehe dzram ɖo ɖi na ame siwo le fu wɔm mi .

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: Eya ta magblɔ na mi ame siwo le fu kpem la be , Mawu ana dzudzɔ mi kple mi ́ awo nenye be Aƒetɔ Yesu va do kpoyi tso dziƒo le dzo ƒe aɖewo me kple eƒe mawudɔla sese ̃ wo .

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame siwo kata ̃ medi be yewoanya Mawu o , kple ame siwo kata ̃ gbe ɖoɖo si wo ̀ wɔ ɖe wo ŋu be yeaɖe wo to mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo dzi la wɔwɔ me gbidii .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Woahe to na wo le dzo mavɔ la me , eye womagakpɔ Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkume akpɔ gbeɖe o , gawu la womakpɔ eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe ŋuse ̃ ha ̃ o ,

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: ne eva be wo ̀ axɔ kafukafu kple bubu ɖe dɔ ga ̃ si wo ̀ wɔ na ame kɔkɔewo la ta . Miawo la , mianɔ ame siwo anɔ ekafum la dome elabena miexɔ Mawu ƒe nya si mi ́ egblɔ na mi la dzi se .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Eya ta mi ́ edoa gbe ɖa ɖe mia ta ɖaa be mi ́ aƒe Mawu la nawɔ mi vi siwo ƒomevi wo ̀ di be woanɔ ye si lae , eye agawɔ mi mianyo ade ale si miedi la nu ! Mlɔeba la atsɔ eƒe ŋuse ̃ axe fe na mi ɖe miaƒe xɔse ta .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ekema ame sia ame anɔ Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ kafum ɖe nu nyui siwo do go tso mia me wokpɔ la ta ; eye miaƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ga ̃ tɔ kekeake enye be miava nye etɔ . Mi ́ aƒe Mawu kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ sɔgbɔ la ana esiawo kata ̃ ava eme na mi .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe vava kple ale si mi ́ aƒo ƒu ɖe egbɔ ŋuti la , mi ́ ele biabiam tso mia si , nɔviwo , be

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: miagana woatɔtɔ miaƒe susuwo bɔbɔe alo ado dzikatsoameƒo na mi kple nyagblɔɖiwo , nutsotsowo alo kple agbale ̃ aɖe si wogblɔ be etso mi ́ a gbɔ si le gbɔgblɔm be Aƒetɔ la ƒe vavagbe la va yi xoxo o .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Migana woatɔtɔ miaƒe susuwo eye woable mi o ; migaxɔ nu sia nu si wogblɔ la dzi se o . Elabena ŋkeke ma mava o , va se ɖe esime agla ̃ dzedze ava , eye woaɖe ame sedzimawɔla la ɖe go , ame si woɖo ɖi na tsɔtsrɔ ̃ .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Atsi tsitre ɖe mawu bubuwo ŋu eye ayi aɖagba ̃ nu siwo kata ̃ amewo subɔna la kple afi si wosubɔa wo le la gudugudu . Ayi aɖanɔ Mawu ƒe gbedoxɔ me abe Mawu ene eye wo ̀ able amewo be yee nye Mawu .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Mieɖo ŋku edzi be megblɔ nya siawo na mi esi menɔ mia gbɔ oa ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Eye mienya xoxo nu si le mɔ xem na eƒe afi sia vava ; elabena ne eƒe ɣeyiɣi mede o la , mava o .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Ke nu si ŋutsu agla ̃ dzela kple dzomavɔ me vi sia awɔ ne eva la , le edzi yim xoxo gake eya ŋutɔ mava o va se ɖe esime ame si le mɔ xem nɛ la do ɖa le mɔ me nɛ hafi .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Ekema ŋutsu vɔ ̃ ɖi sia ava do eye Aƒetɔ Yesu atsɔ eƒe ya si wo ̀ gbɔna to eƒe nu me la afia ̃ e ; eye ne etrɔ va la , atsrɔ ̃ ŋutsu sia ɖa le anyigba dzi .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Ŋutsu nu vɔ ̃ wɔla sia ava kple Satana ƒe ŋuse ̃ eye Satana awɔ eŋutidɔ atsɔ wɔ dzesi kple nukunu ga ̃ geɖewo , atsɔ aflu amewoe .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Ado la ̃ amesiwo kata ̃ yina ɖe dzomavɔ la me elabena wogbe nyateƒe la xɔxɔ ; wogbe be yewomaxɔ nyateƒe la ase , alɔ ̃ e be wo ̀ aɖe wo o ,

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: eya ta Mawu ɖe mɔ na wo be woaxɔ alakpa siawo kata ̃ dzi ase kple woƒe dzi blibo

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: eye woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu wo kata ̃ pɛpɛpɛ be woxɔ alakpa dzi se , gbe nu le nyateƒe la gbɔ eye wokpɔ dzidzɔ le woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Ke ele be mi ́ ada akpe na Mawu ɖaa ɖe mia ta , mi mi ́ a nɔvi siwo Aƒetɔ la lɔ ̃ , elabena Mawu ɖoe tso blema ke be yeana miakpɔ ɖeɖe , aklɔ mia ŋuti to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe dɔwɔwɔ kple miaƒe nyateƒe la dzixɔxɔse me .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mawu gblɔ nyanyui la na mi to mi ́ a dzi . Eye to mi ́ a dzi wo ̀ yɔ mi be miakpɔ gome le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe la me .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , nu siwo kata ̃ le susu me na mi eya ta minɔ te sesi ̃ e eye miale ́ nyataƒe la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e , nyateƒe siwo mi ́ efia mi esi mi ́ enɔ mia gbɔ kple esiwo mi ́ eŋlɔ ɖo ɖe mi le mi ́ aƒe agbale ̃ wo me na mi .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ŋutɔ kple Mawu mi ́ a Fofo , ame si lɔ ̃ mi ́ eye to eƒe amenuveve me la , wo ̀ na dzideƒo mavɔ kple mɔkpɔkpɔ nyui mi ́ la ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: nade dzi ƒo na mi eye wo ̀ ado ŋuse ̃ mi le dɔ nyui ɖe sia ɖe wɔwɔ kple nya nyui ɖe sia ɖe gbɔgblɔ me . Mido gbe ɖa ɖe mi ́ a ta

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Mlɔeba la , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo , esi mele agbale ̃ sia nu wum la , mabia tso mia si be miado gbe ɖa ɖe mi ́ a ta . Mido gbe ɖa gba ̃ be Aƒetɔ la ƒe nya la nakaka ɖe afi sia afi kaba eye wo ̀ akpɔ dziɖuɖu le afi sia afi si wo ̀ kaka ɖo , ale be wo ̀ aɖe ame geɖewo abe ale si wo ̀ dzɔe esi mi ́ eva mia gbɔ la ene .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Mido gbe ɖa ha ̃ be mi ́ ado go le ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo ƒe asi me , elabena menye ame sia amee lɔ ̃ Aƒetɔ la o .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Aƒetɔ la , nuteƒewɔla wo ̀ nye ; eya ta ado ŋuse ̃ mi eye wo ̀ akpɔ mia ta tso Satana ƒe fuwɔame ɖe sia ɖe me .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Mi ́ eka ɖe edzi le Aƒetɔ la me bena miele nu siwo mi ́ efia mi la dzi wɔm eye menye zi ɖeka ko o ke boŋ ɣesiaɣi .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Aƒetɔ la nawɔe be miaƒe nugɔmesese tso Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ ŋuti la nanɔ to dem ɖe edzi wu ɣesiaɣi .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mi ́ ele se sia dem na mi le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ me be : Migade ha kple nɔvi si nɔa anyi kuviatɔe gbe sia gbe eye mewɔa dɔ aɖeke abe ale si mi ́ efia mi be miawɔ la ene o .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Elabena miawo ŋutɔ mienya ale si wo ̀ le be miadze mi ́ aƒe kpɔɖeŋu yomee . Esi mi ́ enɔ mia dome la , mi ́ enɔ anyi kuviatɔe

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: alo ɖu ame aɖe ƒe nu femaxee o , ke boŋ mi ́ ewɔ dɔ za ̃ kple keli . Mi ́ edze agbagba , ku kutri be mi ́ aganye agba na mia dometɔ aɖeke o .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Mi ́ ewɔ esia menye esi mi ́ ate ŋu abia kpekpeɖeŋu ma tɔgbi mi ta o ke boŋ be mi ́ atsɔ mi ́ a ɖokuiwo aɖo kpɔɖeŋui na mi be miadze eyome .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Elabena esi mi ́ enɔ mia gbɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , mi ́ ede se sia na mi be , “ Ame si medi be yeawɔ dɔ o la , megaɖu nu ha ̃ o . ”

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Gake mi ́ esena be mia dometɔ aɖewo le kuvia wɔm , wogbe be yewomawɔ dɔ aɖeke o , eye wogble ̃ a woƒe ɣeyiɣi le ameŋunyagbɔgblɔ me .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Mi ́ ele kuku ɖem na nenem me mawo kata ̃ eye mi ́ ele gbe ɖem na wo ha ̃ le Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ me be , woadze kɔ anyi awɔ dɔ atsɔ kpɔ wo ɖokuiwo dzii .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Hena nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ mamlɛawo la , mele nu xlɔ ̃ m mi be ɖeɖi megate mia ŋuti le nu nyui wɔwɔ me o .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Nenye be ame aɖe gbe be yemawɔ ɖe nu siwo mi ́ egblɔ ɖe agbale ̃ sia me dzi o la , mile ́ ŋku ɖe eŋuti eye migade ha kplii o , ale be ŋu nakpee .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Ke migabui be enye miaƒe futɔ o ; ke boŋ miƒo nu nɛ abe nɔvi si hia ̃ nuxɔxlɔ ̃ ene .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Ŋutifafa ƒe Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔ nana eƒe ŋutifafa mi ɣesiaɣi le nu sia nu me . Aƒetɔ la nanɔ anyi kpli mi kata ̃ .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Azɔ esia nye , nye ŋutɔ nye gbedoname si mele ŋɔŋlɔm kple nye ŋutɔ nye asi , abe ale si mewɔnɛ le nye agbale ̃ wo kata ̃ ƒe nuwuwu la ene ; be wo ̀ anye kpeɖodzi na mi be agbale ̃ la tso nye ŋutɔ gbɔnye . Esia nye nye ŋutɔ nye asinuŋɔŋlɔ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe yayra nanɔ mi kata ̃ mia dzi .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Nye Paulo , ame si nye Kristo Yesu ƒe apostolo to Mawu , mi ́ a Đela , ƒe gbeɖeɖe kple Kristo Yesu , mi ́ aƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ dzi la ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: na Timoteo , vinye vava ̃ le xɔse la me . Amenuveve , nublanuikpɔkpɔ kple ŋutifafa si tso Mawu , Fofo la kple Kristo Yesu , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ , gbɔ la , nanɔ anyi kpli wo ̀ .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Abe ale si meƒoe ɖe nuwo ̀ hafi dzo yi Makedonia ene la , tsi Efeso eye na ̃ ɖo asi ŋutsu aɖewo , ame siwo le nudada fiam la dzi be womagafia nenem nuwo o

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: tɔ te wo be womagagble ̃ woƒe ɣeyiɣiwo ɖe gliwo kple dzɔdzɔmenyatotowo ŋu o . Elabena nu siawo hea nyahehe dzodzrowo vanɛ ɖe Mawu ƒe dɔwɔwɔ si xɔse hena vanɛ la teƒe .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Nu si metsi dzi na vevie nye be kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ le afi ma la nayɔ fu ̃ u kple lɔlɔ ̃ si tso dzi vava ̃ wo me , eye be woƒe susuwo me nadza eye woase ̃ ŋu le xɔse me . Nufiala siawo da ƒu le nu siawo nyanya me eye wogble ̃ a woƒe ɣeyiɣi nɔa nya hem eye wonɔa nya maɖinyawo gblɔm .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Wodi be yewoaxɔ ŋkɔ abe Mose ƒe sefiala ga ̃ wo ene , evɔ woawo ŋutɔ menya naneke gobii tso Mose ƒe seawo kple nu si wofia mi ́ la ŋu hafi o .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Se mawo nyo , zi ale si wowɔ wo ŋutidɔ abe ale si Mawu ɖoe la ene .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Mi ́ enyae ha ̃ be menye ame nyuiwoe wowɔ se la na o , ke boŋ sedzidalawo kple agla ̃ dzelawo , mawumavɔ ̃ lawo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo , ame makɔmakɔwo kple mawumasubɔlawoe wowɔ se la na , ame siwo wua wo fofowo kple dadawo , na hlɔ ̃ dolawo

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: na ahasiwɔlawo kple nu tovo wɔlawo , amesitsalawo kple aʋatsokalawo kple atam dzodzro kalawo kpakple nu sia nu si tsi tre ɖe nufiafia vava ̃ tɔ

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: si xɔ ɖe Mawu yayratɔ la ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe nyanyui si wo ̀ tsɔ nam la dzi ŋuti .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Medaa akpe geɖe na Kristo Yesu mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la be wo ̀ tia nye ha ̃ abe eƒe dɔlawo dometɔ ɖeka ene , eye wo ̀ na ŋuse ̃ m be manye nuteƒewɔla nɛ ,

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: togbɔ be meɖu fewu le Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ ŋuti kpɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ . Meti eƒe amewo ƒe agbe yome , eye mewɔ nu vevi wo le mɔ ɖe sia ɖe si dzi mate ŋui la nu . Ke Mawu kpɔ nublanui nam elabena nyemenya nu si wɔm menɔ la o , elabena ɣemaɣi la , nyemenya Kristo o .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: O , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la ƒe dɔme nyo loo , elabena efiam ale si wo ̀ le be maxɔ edzi asee eye be Kristo Yesu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nayɔ menye fu ̃ u .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Esia nye nyateƒenya si wo ̀ le be woaɖo toe axɔe ase keŋ be , Kristo Yesu va xexeame nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ɖe ge , ame siwo dome menye ga ̃ tɔ le .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Ke Mawu kpɔ nublanui nam ale be Kristo Yesu ate ŋu awɔ ŋutinyedɔ abe kpɔɖeŋu ene be woatsɔ afia ame sia ame ale si wo ̀ te ŋu gbɔa dzi ɖi na nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ga ̃ tɔ kekeake gɔ ̃ ha ̃ ale be woawo ha ̃ nanyae be , woate ŋu akpɔ agbe mavɔ .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu woana Mawu tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me . Eyae nye Fia tso blema ke , Mawu makumakua si womekpɔna o , eye wo ̀ yɔ fu ̃ u kple nunya . Eya ɖeka koe nye Mawu . Amen .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Azɔ vinye , Timoteo , esia nye nye sedede na wo ̀ . Wɔ Aƒetɔ la ƒe aʋawo nyuie , abe ale si wogblɔ na wo ̀ to eƒe nyagblɔɖilawo dzi la ene .

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: Le ́ wo ̀ xɔse si le Kristo me la ɖe asi sesi ̃ e eye ɣesiaɣi la wo ̀ dzitsinya nanɔ dzadzɛ eye na ̃ wɔ nu si ne ̀ nya be enyo la ko . Elabena ame aɖewo gbe toɖoɖo woƒe dzitsinya eye wowɔ nu si wonya nyuie be mele be woawɔ o . Ale mewɔ nuku be esi wogbe Mawu nenema la wobu woƒe xɔse si le Yesu Kristo me la o .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Himenaio kple Aleksandro wonye nu sia wɔlawo ƒe kpɔɖeŋuwo . Eva nɔ nam be matsɔ wo de asi na Satana be wo ̀ ahe to na wo va se ɖe esime woanyae be menyo be woaƒo ɖi Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ o .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Eya ta mele nu xlɔ ̃ m be do ŋgɔ na nu sia nu la , woawɔ kukuɖeɖewo , gbedodoɖawo , nyaxɔɖeakɔwo kple akpedada ɖe amewo kata ̃ ta

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: ɖe fiawo kple dziɖulawo kata ̃ ta be mi ́ anɔ anyi le ŋutifafa kple agbe ƒe dziɖeɖi me le mawuvɔvɔ ̃ kple kɔkɔenyenye kata ̃ me .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Esia nyo eye wo ̀ dze Aƒetɔ la ŋu .

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Edi vevie bena ame sia ame nakpɔ ɖeɖe eye woase nyateƒe sia gɔme be :

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Yesu Kristo ame si va xexeame abe amegbetɔ ene la , koe va dzra Mawu kple amegbetɔwo dome ɖo .

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: Ewɔ esia esi wotsɔ eƒe agbe na ɖe amewo kata ̃ ta . Esia nye gbedeasi si Mawu tsɔ na xexeame le ɣeyiɣi nyuitɔ dzi .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Enye nyateƒe matrɔmatrɔ be wotiam be manye Mawu ƒe apostolo kple nyanyuidɔgbedela si agblɔ nyateƒe sia na dzimaxɔsetɔwo ; afia wo Mawu ƒe ɖoɖo na amewo be woakpɔ ɖeɖe to xɔse me .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Eya ta medi be ŋutsuwo le afi sia afi nado woƒe asi kɔkɔewo ɖe dzi na Mawu ado gbe ɖa , elabena wovo tso nu vɔ ̃ , dziku kple fule ́ le si me .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Nenema ke medi be nyɔnuwo nado awu ɖe nɔnɔme nyui me , le dzadzenyenye kple nu dzeame wɔwɔ me , menye le atsyɔ ̃ ɖoɖo vivivo kple ɖa ŋɔŋɔe ƒoƒo , sikanuwo kple dzonu xɔasiwo dodo kpakple avɔ xɔasiwo tata me o ,

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: ke boŋ kple nu nyui wɔwɔ si dze nyɔnu siwo ʋu eme be yewonye mawusubɔlawo .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Ele na nyɔnu be wo ̀ asrɔ ̃ toɖoɖo le ɖoɖoezizi kple ɖokuibɔbɔ kata ̃ me .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Nyemeɖe mɔ na nyɔnu be wo ̀ afia nu alo aɖu amega ̃ ɖe ŋutsu dzi o , ke boŋ nezi ɖoɖoe .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Nu ka ta ? Elabena Mawu wɔ Adam gba ̃ hafi va wɔ Eva .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Eye menye Adam Satana ble o , ke boŋ Evae eye to esia me nu vɔ ̃ va .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Eya ta Mawu na be nyɔnuwo nekpe fu ase veve le woƒe vidzidzi me , ke aɖe woƒe luʋɔwo ne woxɔ edzi se , eye wonɔ agbe nyui le lɔlɔ ̃ vava ̃ me .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Enye nyateƒenya be ne ame aɖe di be yeawɔ hamedzikpɔla ƒe dɔ la , etia dɔ nyuitɔ .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Azɔ la , ele na hamedzikpɔla be , wo ̀ anye mokakamanɔŋutɔ , nyɔnu ɖeka ko srɔ ̃ , ame si fa tu , ɖokuidziɖula , ame si ŋu bubu le , amedzrowɔla , ame si nya nufiafia

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: menye aha tsu nola o , menye ame si wɔa nu gbodogbodo o ke boŋ ewɔa nu le bɔbɔenyenye me , menye dzrewɔla alo galɔ ̃ la o .

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: Ele vevie be wo ̀ anye ame si kpɔa eƒe aƒe dzi nyuie eye vi ɖotowo le esi .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Elabena ne ŋutsu aɖe mate ŋu akpɔ eƒe aƒe sue la dzi be woanɔ agbe nyui o la , ale ke wo ̀ awɔ akpɔ Mawu ƒe hame dzi ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Mele be wo ̀ anye ame si ƒe dzimetrɔɣi medidi o , elabena ne menye nenema o la , dada ayɔ eya amea me eye wo ̀ adze anyi le ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ si va Satana dzi la te .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Ele na hamedzikpɔla be wo ̀ akpɔ ɖaseɖiɖi nyui tso hamea godotɔwo ha ̃ gbɔ ale be mage adze vlododo kple Satana ƒe mɔ me o .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Nenema kee wo ̀ le na subɔlawo ha ̃ be woanye ame siwo ŋu bubu le kple nyateƒetɔwo , menye aha tsu nolawo kple ame siwo tia viɖe ƒoɖiwo yome o .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Ele na wo be woale ́ xɔse la ƒe nyateƒe detowo me ɖe asi kple dzitsinya nyui

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Ele be woado wo akpɔ gba ̃ eye ne naneke meku ɖe wo ŋu o la , woaɖe mɔ woawɔ subɔla ƒe dɔ .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Ele na wo srɔ ̃ nyɔnuwo be woanye ame ɖɔŋuɖowo , ke menye aha tsu nolawo kple ameŋunyagblɔlawo o , ke boŋ woawɔ nuteƒe le nu sia nu me .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Subɔlawo nanye srɔ ̃ ɖeka tɔwo eye dzidzɔ kple toɖoɖo nanɔ woƒe aƒewo me .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Kpeɖeŋutɔ siwo wɔ dɔ nyuie la , woƒe fetu anye be amewo aɖo bubu na wo eye woawo ŋutɔ ƒe dzideƒo kple xɔse le Aƒetɔ la me ha ̃ atsi ɖe edzi .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Togbɔ be mele mɔ kpɔm be mava mia gbɔ kpuie ha ̃ la , mele nu siawo ŋlɔm na mi ,

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: ale be ne nye vava he ɖe megbe ha ̃ la miate ŋu anya ame siwo tɔgbi miatia be woanye Mawu gbagbe la ƒe hanunɔlawo , hame si le ́ Mawu ƒe nyateƒe la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Enye nyateƒe be mawumegbenɔnɔ mele bɔbɔe o . Gake ele bɔbɔe le Kristo ta , ame si va anyigba dzi abe ame ene . Điƒoƒo aɖeke menɔ eŋuti o eye wo ̀ dza le eƒe gbɔgbɔ me . Mawudɔlawo subɔe eye wogblɔ mawunya tso eŋuti le dukɔwo dome . Amewo xɔe le afi sia afi si wo ̀ yi eye wogaxɔe ɖe eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe me le dziƒo .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔe na mi kɔtee bena le ŋkeke mamlɛawo me la , ame aɖewo le hamea me atrɔ le Kristo yome adze nufiala siwo ƒe susuwo me gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo yɔ la yome kple dzo .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Nufiala siawo aɖo mo ta , ada alakpa eye woadae enuenu ale gbegbe be woƒe dzitsinya magaɖe fu na wo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Woagblɔ be menyo be woaɖe srɔ ̃ o , eye menyo ha ̃ be woaɖu nanewo o , evɔ wo ̀ nye Mawue tsɔ nu siawo na kristotɔ siwo li ke la be woakpɔ dzidzɔ le wo ŋuti eye woada akpe ɖe wo ta hafi .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Elabena nu sia nu si Mawu wɔ la nyo , eye miate ŋu aɖui kple dzidzɔ nenye be mieda akpe ɖe eta ,

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: eye miebia tso Mawu si be wo ̀ ayrae , elabena Mawu ƒe nya kple gbedodoɖa awɔe kɔkɔe .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Ne ̃ eɖe nu siawo me na ame bubuwo la anɔ wo ̀ dɔdeasi wɔm abe Osɔfo nuteƒewɔla , si le xɔse kple nufiafia dzɔdzɔetɔ si nesrɔ ̃ la ŋuti dɔ wɔm la ene .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Megagble ̃ wo ̀ ɣeyiɣi anɔ nya hem tso susu manyatanuwo kple movinyawo kpakple gli dzodzrowo ŋuti o . Ke boŋ za ̃ wo ̀ ɣeyiɣiwo kple wo ̀ ŋuse ̃ natsɔ atu ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖoe le gbɔgbɔ me .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Ame ɖokui tutuɖo le ŋutila ̃ me nyo gake tutuɖo le gbɔgbɔ me le vevie wu , elabena enye atike na nu sia nu si na ̃ wɔ . Eya ta tu ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖo le gbɔgbɔ me eye nadze agbagba be yeanye kristotɔ nyui wu , elabena eyae ava kpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ . Menye fifia le agbe sia me ko o , ke boŋ le agbe si ava va la me ha ̃ .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Esia nye nyateƒe eye wo ̀ dze be woaxɔe ase blibo

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: eye le esia tae mi ́ ewɔ dɔ heʋli vevie be mi ́ atsɔ mi ́ aƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ ade Mawu gbagbe la me , ame si nye amewo kata ̃ ƒe Đela , vevietɔ ame siwo xɔ se . Fia nu siawo eye naka ɖe edzi be ame sia ame srɔ ̃ wo nyuie .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Me ̀ gana ame aɖeke nabu wo ̀ ame gblɔe le wo ̀ ɖekakpuinyenye ta o . Ke boŋ nye kpɔɖeŋu nyuitɔ na wo . Na woadze nu si ne ̀ fiana kple agbe si ne ̀ nɔna la yome . Na wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ , wo ̀ xɔse , kple wo ̀ susu dzadzɛwo nanye kpɔɖeŋu na wo .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Va se ɖe esime mava mia gbɔ la , xle ̃ Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la na hame la eye naɖe eme na wo ; gblɔ Mawu ƒe nya la ɣesiaɣi .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Kpɔ egbɔ be ne ̀ wɔ amenuvenunana siwo Mawu na wo ̀ to eƒe nyagblɔɖilawo dzi esi hamemega ̃ wo da asi ɖe dziwo ̀ la ŋutidɔ nyuie .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Wɔ nunana siawo ŋutidɔ nyuie . Tsɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ƒo ɖe wo ̀ dɔwɔwɔwo me ale be ame sia ame nate ŋu akpɔ wo ̀ tsitsiɖedzi kple ŋgɔgbeyiyi adze sii .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Le ́ ŋku ɖe nu siwo kata ̃ nesusuna kple nu siwo kata ̃ newɔna la ŋuti nyuie . Le ́ nu si nyo eye wo ̀ le eteƒe la me ko ɖe asi eye Mawu ayra wo ̀ eye wo ̀ awɔ ŋuwo ̀ dɔ le kpekpeɖeŋunana ame bubuwo me .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Me ̀ gaƒo nu na me tsitsi aɖeke kple ada o , ke boŋ ƒo nu nɛ bubutɔe , abe wo ̀ ŋutɔ fofowo ̀ e ne ̀ le nu ƒom na ene . Ƒo nu na ɖekakpuiawo abe ale si na ̃ ƒo nu na nɔviwo ̀ ŋutsu lɔlɔ ̃ awo ene .

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: Tsɔ nyɔnu tsitsiwo abe dawo ̀ wo ene eye ɖetugbiwo abe nɔviwo ̀ nyɔnuwo ene , eye susu dzadzɛwo ko nanɔ wo ̀ ta me ɖe wo ŋu .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Nenye be ahosiwo mekpɔ ame aɖeke woakpɔ wo dzi o la , ekema hamea natsɔe ɖo eɖokui dzi atsɔ lɔlɔ ̃ akpɔ wo dzii .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Ke ne viwo alo mamayɔviwo le wo si la , ekema ele be woawo nakpɔ wo dzi elabena ele be dɔmenyowɔwɔ nadze egɔme tso aƒe me , eya ta ele be woakpe ɖe wo dzila siwo le hia ̃ me la ŋuti . Esia nye nane si dzea Mawu ŋu ŋutɔŋutɔ .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Hame la ne ̀ kpɔ ahosi dahe siwo tsi akogo le xexeame la dzi nenye be wole Mawu sinu kpɔm be wo ̀ akpe ɖe yewo ŋuti , eye wole gbe dom ɖa atraɖii ,

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: ke menye ne wogble ̃ a woƒe ɣeyiɣi nɔa tsatsam nɔa ameŋunya gblɔm , nɔa ŋutila ̃ medzidzɔ ko dim eye wogble ̃ a nu le woƒe luʋɔ ŋuti o .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Esia nanye miaƒe hame la ƒe ɖoɖo ale be kristotɔwo nanya eye woawɔ nu si dze .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Ke ame si makpe ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe ƒometɔ siwo le hia ̃ me , vevietɔ esiwo le eya ŋutɔ ƒe aƒe me ŋuti o la , mekpɔ mɔ be wo ̀ ayɔ eɖokui be kristotɔ o . Trɔ ̃ subɔla gɔ ̃ ha ̃ nyo wu ame sia tɔgbi .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Womatsɔ ahosi aɖeke ƒe ŋkɔ ade ahosiwo dome o negbe exɔ ƒe blaade kple edzivɔ eye wo ̀ nye ame si nɔ srɔ ̃ a gbɔ le nyateƒetoto me .

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Ele be wo ̀ akpɔ ɖaseɖiɖi nyui le amewo kata ̃ gbɔ le eƒe dɔ nyui wɔwɔ me le kpɔɖeŋu me ame si hea viawo nyuie , lɔ ̃ a amedzrowɔwɔ , klɔa ame kɔkɔewo ƒe afɔwo , kpena ɖe ame siwo ɖo xaxa me la ŋu eye wo ̀ ƒoa eɖokui ɖe dɔ nyui sia dɔ nyui wɔwɔ me .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Mele be woaxɔ ahosi siwo metsi o la ɖe dɔ tɔxɛ wɔla siawo dome o elabena le ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe megbe la woada le adzɔgbe si woɖe na Kristo la dzi eye woagaɖe srɔ ̃ .

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Ale woadze na tohehe elabena woda le woƒe ŋugbedodo adzɔgbeɖeɖe la dzi .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Hekpe ɖe esia ŋuti la , ele eme be woava zu ame ɖɔewo eye woagble ̃ woƒe ɣeyiɣi anɔ ameŋunya gblɔm tso aƒe si me yi ekemɛ me , anɔ nu dem ame bubuwo ƒe nya me .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Eya ta mesusu be enyo na ahosi siwo metsi o la be woagaɖe srɔ ̃ , adzi viwo , eye woakpɔ woawo ŋutɔ ƒe aƒe dzi . Ekema ame aɖeke mate ŋu agblɔ nya aɖeke ɖe wo ŋuti o .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Elabena mevɔ ̃ be wo dometɔ aɖewo do le hamea me , eye Satana kplɔ wo tra mɔe xoxo .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Na magaɖo ŋku edzi na wo ̀ ake be ele na ahosiwo ƒe ƒometɔwo be woakpɔ wo dzi , eye mele be woaɖe asi le dɔ sia wɔwɔ ŋuti na hamea o . Ekema hamea ate ŋu atsɔ ga si le esi la akpɔ ahosi amemanɔsitɔwo dzii .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Hamedzikpɔla siwo wɔa hadɔ nyuie la , dze na bubuteƒe eve , vevietɔ esiwo kua kutri le mawunyagbɔgblɔ kple efiafia me ,

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: elabena woŋlɔ ɖe mawunya me be , “ Me ̀ gabla nu na nyitsu ne ele mɔlu tugum o . ” Wogagblɔ le teƒe bubu ha ̃ be , “ Dɔwɔla dze na eƒe fetu . ”

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Ne wotsɔ nya ɖe hamedzikpɔla aɖe ŋu la , me ̀ gawɔ nya la ŋudɔ o , negbe le ɖasefo eve alo etɔ ̃ ƒe nya nu ko .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Woaka mo na nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo le hame bliboa ŋkume be wo ̀ anye kpɔɖeŋu na ame bubuwo .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Mele se dem na wo ̀ moveviɖotɔe le Mawu kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo kpakple mawudɔla kɔkɔeawo kata ̃ ƒe ŋkume , be na ̃ wɔ nu sia ne hamemega ̃ la nye xɔ ̃ wo ̀ vevi loo alo menye xɔ ̃ wo ̀ o . Ele be woatsɔ dzidzenu ɖeka ma ko na ame sia ame .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Me ̀ gatsi dzi klokloklo le hamemega ̃ tiatia me o . Wo ̀ ŋku abu le eƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo dzi eye wo ̀ awɔ abe ɖe ne ̀ de eƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo dzi ene . Kpɔ nyuie be wo ̀ ŋutɔ nate ɖa xaa tso nu vɔ ̃ ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi gbɔ .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Ke ha ̃ la , esia mefia be na ̃ tsri wain keŋkeŋ o . Ele be nano sue aɖe ɣeaɖewoɣi abe atike ene ɖe wo ̀ dɔmeɖu la ta elabena edzea dɔ kabakaba .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Đo ŋku edzi be ŋutsu aɖewo alo hamemega ̃ aɖewo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ , le nu vɔ ̃ gbe nɔm eye esia le nyanya na ame sia ame . Le nu siawo me la , ate ŋu awɔ nane tso eŋuti . Ke le go bubuwo me la , ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la koe ate ŋu aɖe nyateƒe dziŋɔ la ɖe go .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Nenema ke , ame sia ame nya ale si hamemega ̃ aɖewo wɔ dɔ nyuie , gake ɣeaɖewoɣi la womenya woƒe dɔ nyui wɔwɔwo o , va se ɖe ɣeyiɣi didi aɖewo megbe hafi .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Kluvi siwo nye kristotɔwo la nawɔ dɔ na woƒe aƒetɔwo kple ŋuse ̃ eye woabu wo ; me ̀ gana woagblɔ tso Kristo ƒe hadɔwɔlawo ŋuti be wonye kuviatɔwo o . Me ̀ gana Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ alo eƒe nufiafia nazu alɔmeɖenu le nu sia ta o .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Ne woƒe aƒetɔ nye kristotɔ la , esia menye mɔnukpɔkpɔ be woawɔ alɔgblɔdɔ le woƒe dɔwɔnawo ŋuti o ; ke boŋ ele be woagawɔ dɔ ɖe edzi wu elabena wole kpekpeɖeŋu nam wo nɔvi kristotɔ kple woƒe ŋuse ̃ . Timoteo , fia nyateƒenya siawo eye na ̃ do ŋuse ̃ ame sia ame be woawɔ ɖe wo dzi .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Ame aɖewo ase ̃ nu agblɔ be nya siawo mele eme o , gake wonye nufiafia dzɔdzɔe si de blibo , wonye esiwo Kristo ŋutɔ fia eye wonye mawumegbenɔnɔ ƒe gɔmeɖokpe .

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: Ame si agblɔ nya aɖe si ato vovo tso esia gbɔ la , ame ma nye dadala kple movitɔ . Elabena ele gɔmeɖeɖe bubu tsɔm na Kristo ƒe nyawo eye wo ̀ le nyahehe siwo awu nu le ŋuʋaʋa ̃ kple dziku me la hem vɛ . Esia ƒe metsonuwo koe anye megbeŋkɔyɔyɔ na amewo , nyatsɔtsɔ ɖe ame ŋu , kple nu vɔ ̃ ɖi susu ɖe ame nɔewo ŋuti .

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: Nyahela siawo , esiwo ƒe susuwo nu vɔ ̃ bla goŋgoŋ la , menya ale si woagblɔ nyateƒe lae o . Le woawo gbɔ la , Agbenya la gbɔgblɔ nye gakpɔmɔnu ko . Eya ta mite ɖa xaa tso wo gbɔ .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Ke mawuvɔvɔ ̃ kple ŋudzedzekpɔkpɔ nye viɖe ga ̃ ,

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: elabena mi ́ etsɔ naneke va xexe sia me o eye edze ƒa ̃ a be mi ́ atsɔ naneke ha ̃ adzoe o .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Ke ne nuɖuɖu kple nudodowo le mi ́ a si la , mina woadze mi ́ a ŋu .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Ame siwo dina be yewoazu hotsuitɔwo la , gena ɖe tetekpɔ kple mɔtetre kpakple movidzɔdzɔ kple didi vɔ ̃ wo me , esiwo kplɔa amewo yina ɖe gbegble ̃ kple tsɔtsrɔ ̃ me .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Nu tovo wɔwɔwo kata ̃ ƒe dzɔtsoƒee nye galɔlɔ ̃ , ame siwo tsi dzi ɖe gakpɔkpɔ ŋu la , trana tso xɔse la gbɔ eye wotsɔa veve geɖe ŋɔa wo ɖokuiwoe flofloflo .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Ke wo ̀ , Mawu ƒe ame , si le nu siawo kata ̃ nu eye nati dzɔdzɔenyenye , mawuvɔvɔ ̃ , xɔse , lɔlɔ ̃ , tenɔnɔ kple bɔbɔenyenye yome .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Ʋli xɔse ƒe ʋiʋli nyui la , le ́ agbe mavɔ si woyɔ wo ̀ na esi ne ̀ ʋu emeʋuʋu nyui le ɖasefo geɖewo ƒe ŋkume la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Mele didim tso asiwo ̀ le Mawu si na agbe amewo kata ̃ kple Kristo Yesu si ɖi ɖase dzideƒotɔe le Pontio Pilato gbɔ la ƒe ŋkume be ,

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: na ̃ wɔ nu siwo kata ̃ wo ̀ gblɔ na wo ̀ be na ̃ wɔ la , ale be tso fifia dzi va se ɖe esime mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo natrɔ ava la , ame aɖeke makpɔ kpɔtsɔtsɔ le ŋutiwo ̀ o .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Elabena ne ɣeyiɣia ɖo la , Mawu yayratɔ , fiawo dzi Fia , aƒetɔwo dzi Aƒetɔ , si koe nye Mawu Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la , aɖe Kristo afia tso dziƒo .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Mawu sia ɖeka hɔ ̃ koe mate ŋu aku o ; kekle ̃ ga ̃ dziŋɔ aɖe ƒo xla ̃ e ale gbegbe be amegbetɔ aɖeke mate ŋu ate ɖe eŋuti o . Amegbetɔ aɖeke mekpɔe kpɔ o eye makpɔe akpɔ ha ̃ o . Eya tɔ nanye bubu kple ŋuse ̃ kpakple dziɖuɖu tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me . Amen .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Gblɔ na kesinɔtɔwo kata ̃ be womegada wo ɖokuiwo eye woaɖo ŋu ɖe woƒe ga si nu ava yi kpuie la ŋuti o ; ke boŋ woƒe dada kple ŋuɖoɖo nanɔ Mawu gbagbe si naa nu siwo kata ̃ mi ́ ehia ̃ na mi ́ aƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ la mi ́ fu ̃ u ɖeɖe ko ŋu .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Gblɔ na wo be woawɔ woƒe ga ŋutidɔ le dɔ nyui wɔwɔ me . Ele be woazu kesinɔtɔwo le dɔ nyui wɔwɔ me eye woana nu hia ̃ tɔwo faa kple dzidzɔ eye woanɔ klalo ɣesiaɣi be woama nu sia nu si Mawu tsɔ na wo la kple ame bubuwo .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: To esia wɔwɔ me la , woanɔ kesinɔnu vava ̃ wo ƒom ƒu ɖe dziƒo na wo ɖokuiwo . Eya koe nye agbe mavɔ ƒe nu si wodzrana ɖo eye megble ̃ na o ! Ekema woanɔ kristotɔ ƒe agbe si ɖea vi la , le anyigba dzi afi sia ha ̃ .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: O , Timoteo , me ̀ gado kpo nu siwo Mawu tsɔ de asiwo ̀ la wɔwɔ o . Me ̀ gahe nya manyatanu kple ame siwo dana be yewonya nu evɔ womenyae o la o .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Ame siawo bu nu vevitɔ kekeake le agbe me : Womenya Mawu o . Amenuveve nanɔ anyi kpli wo ̀ .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso nye Paulo , Yesu Kristo ƒe apostolo ame si Mawu ɖo ɖa be wo ̀ aɖe gbeƒa ̃ agbe mavɔ si ŋugbe wo ̀ do to Yesu Kristo dzixɔse me na amewo kata ̃ la gbɔ

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: na Timoteo , vinye lɔlɔ ̃ a . Mawu , Fofo la , kple Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ nana eƒe amenuveve , nublanuikpɔkpɔ kple ŋutifafa wo ̀ .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Timoteo , medaa akpe na Mawu ɖe tawo ̀ . Medoa gbe ɖa ɖe tawo ̀ gbe sia gbe . Meɖea kuku na Mawu zi geɖe le za ̃ wo me be wo ̀ akɔ yayra geɖewo ɖe dziwo ̀ . Eyae nye fofonyewo ƒe Mawu kple nye Mawu eye nye taɖodzinu le agbe sia me koe nye madze eŋu .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Mele didim vevie be magakpɔ wo ̀ . Dzi adzɔm ŋutɔ elabena meɖoa ŋku ale si ne ̀ fa avi vevie esime mi ́ enɔ kakla ̃ m ɖa tso mi ́ a nɔewo gbɔ la dzi .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Menya ale si ne ̀ ɖoa ŋu ɖe Aƒetɔ la ŋu abe dawo ̀ Enuike kple mamawo ̀ Loide ke ene . Meka ɖe edzi be e ̀ gale ŋu ɖom ɖe Aƒetɔ la ŋu kokoko abe tsa ̃ ene .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Le esia ta mele ŋku ɖom edzi na wo ̀ be nade dzo Mawu ƒe nunana si ge ɖe me wo ̀ to nye asidada ɖe dziwo ̀ me la me ,

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: elabena Mawu mena vɔvɔ ̃ gbɔgbɔ mi ́ o , ke boŋ ŋuse ̃ kple lɔlɔ ̃ kpakple ɖokuidziɖuɖu ƒe gbɔgbɔe wo ̀ na mi ́ .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Ne a ̃ de dzo ŋuse ̃ si le mewo ̀ me la , ma ̃ vɔ ̃ ɣeaɖekeɣi na gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe Aƒetɔ la na ame bubuwo , alo ana woanya be xɔ ̃ wo ̀ menye , togbɔ be mele gaxɔ me le afii le Kristo ta ha ̃ o . Anɔ klalo be yeakpe fu kplim le Aƒetɔ la ta , elabena Aƒetɔ la ana ŋuse ̃ wo ̀ le fukpekpe me .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Eyae ɖe mi ́ eye wotia mi ́ na eƒe dɔ kɔkɔe la wɔwɔ , menye be mi ́ edze nɛ ta o , ke boŋ elabena eyae nye eƒe ɖoɖo xoxoxo hafi wo ̀ wɔ xexeame be yeaɖe yeƒe lɔlɔ ̃ kple amenuveve afia mi ́ to Kristo dzi .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Ke azɔ la , ena nu siawo kata ̃ me kɔ na mi ́ to mi ́ a Đela Yesu Kristo ƒe vava me . Yesu Kristo ɖu ku ƒe ŋuse ̃ dzi eye wo ̀ fia agbe mavɔ la ƒe mɔ mi ́ to edzi xɔxɔse me .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Eye wo ̀ tiam be manye nyanyui sia ƒe gbeƒa ̃ ɖela , apostolo kple nufiala .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Eya tae mele fu kpem le afi sia le gaxɔ me ɖo . Nu sia menye ŋukpe nam kura o , elabena menya ame si ŋu meɖo ŋu ɖo eye meka ɖe edzi be ate ŋu adzɔ nu siwo kata ̃ metsɔ de asi nɛ la ŋu dedie va se ɖe gbe si gbe wo ̀ agava .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Le ́ nyateƒe si mefia wo ̀ la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e vevitɔ esi ku ɖe xɔse kple lɔlɔ ̃ si Yesu tsɔ na wo ̀ la ŋu .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Le ́ be na ŋutete si Mawu na nexɔ to Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe si le agbe le mewo ̀ dzi la nyuie .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Abe ale si ne ̀ nya ene la , kristotɔ siwo kata ̃ tso Asia va afi sia la , gble ̃ m ɖi . Figelo kple Hermogene gɔ ̃ ha gble ̃ m ɖi .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Aƒetɔ la nayra Onisifero kple eƒe aƒe blibo la elabena ekpɔam ɖa eye wo ̀ dea dzi ƒo nam enuenu . Eƒe kpɔkpɔɖa gbɔa agbem abe ya fafɛ nyui ene eye nye gaxɔmenɔnɔ menye ŋukpe nɛ o .

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , esi wo ̀ va Roma la , edim vevie le afi sia afi eye wo ̀ ke ɖe ŋunye mlɔeba .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Aƒetɔ la nana yayra tɔxɛe le Kristo ƒe vavagbe la dzi . Wo ̀ ŋutɔ e ̀ nya ale si wo ̀ kpe ɖe ŋunye le Efeso la nyuie wu ale si mate ŋu agblɔe na wo ̀ .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ke wo ̀ , vinye Timoteo , se ̃ ŋu le amenuveve si le Kristo Yesu me la me ,

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: elabena ele na wo ̀ be na ̃ fia nu siwo mi kple ame bubuwo miese tso gbɔnye la ame bubuwo . Mifia nyateƒe xɔasi siawo ame nuteƒewɔlawo eye woawo ha ̃ woafia ame bubuawo .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Tsɔ wo ̀ fukpekpewo kpoo abe Yesu Kristo ƒe asrafo vava ̃ ene , abe ale si mewɔna ene ,

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: eye abe Kristo ƒe asrafo ene la , megatsɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ nyrɔ ɖe xexemenuwo me o ; ne menye nenema o la , ma ̃ te ŋu adze ame si xɔ wo ̀ ɖe eƒe aʋakɔ me la ŋu o .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Le ́ Aƒetɔ la ƒe sewo me ɖe asi le eƒe dɔwɔwɔ me abe ale si duɖimekala le ́ a seawo me ɖe asi eye wo ̀ ɖua dzi loo alo wo ̀ ɖea asi le seawo ŋu eye meɖua dzi o ene .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Ku kutri vevie abe agbledela si xɔa fetu nyui ne exa nuku geɖewo ene .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Bu kpɔɖeŋu etɔ ̃ siawo ŋu kpɔ . Aƒetɔ la nakpe ɖe ŋuwo ̀ be na ̃ se ale si kpɔɖeŋu siawo ku ɖe ŋuwo ̀ e la gɔme .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Đo ŋku Yesu Kristo , ame si wofɔ tso ku me eye wo ̀ dzɔ tso David ƒe ƒome me la dzi . Esiae nye nye nyanyui la ,

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: si ta mele fu kpem ɖo eye wodem game gɔ ̃ ha ̃ abe hlɔ ̃ dola ene . Gake womede ga Mawu ƒe nya ya o .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Eya ta mekpea fu sia fu ɖe ame tiatiawo ta be woawo ha ̃ woakpɔ ɖeɖe si le Kristo Yesu me kpe ɖe ŋutikɔkɔe mavɔ ŋu .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Esia nye nyateƒenya be , “ Ne mi ́ eku kpakplii la , Mi ́ anɔ agbe ha ̃ kpakplii ;

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Ne mi ́ ekpe fu kplii la , Mi ́ aɖu dzi ha ̃ kpakplii . Ne mi ́ egbe nu le egbɔ la , Eya ha ̃ agbe nu le mi ́ a gbɔ .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Ne mi ́ enye teƒemawɔlawo ha ̃ la , Eya anɔ anyi nuteƒewɔla Elabena mate ŋu agbe nu le eɖokui gbɔ o . ”

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Đo ŋku nya xɔasi siawo dzi na wo ̀ amewo eye nagbe na wo le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ me be , womagahe nya tso nu siwo mele vevie o la ŋu o . Nyahehe siawo tɔgbi tɔtɔa ame , . Viɖe aɖeke menɔa wo ŋu o eye wowɔa nu vevi ame gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
