text2: Wɔ dɔ sesi ̃ e ale be Mawu nate ŋu agblɔ na wo ̀ be , “ Dɔ nyui wɔla , woe le dɔ nyui wɔwɔ dzi . ” Nye dɔwɔla nyui , ame si ŋu makpe ne Mawu do wo ̀ dɔwɔwɔ kpɔ o . Nya nu si eƒe nya la gblɔ kple nu si wofia .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Megade nu nyahehe dzodzro siwo naa amewo wɔa nu vɔ ̃ to dɔmedzoedodo ɖe wo nɔewo ŋu la me o .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Elabena to esia wɔwɔ me la , ame aɖewo gblɔa nya aɖewo siwo gble ̃ a nu ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe . Himenaio kple Fileto nye ame siawo tɔgbi le ale si wolɔ ̃ a nyahehe dzodzrowo la ta .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Woɖe asi le nyateƒe la ŋu eye wokaa aʋatso ɖea gbeƒa ̃ be ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi la va eme xoxo , eye wona ame siwo xɔ wo dzi se la ƒe xɔse gbɔdzɔ .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Ke ha ̃ la , Mawu ƒe gɔmeɖokpe sese ̃ la , le te eye wotre enu kple nya siawo be “ Aƒetɔ la nyaa ame siwo nye etɔ vava ̃ wo ” , eye , “ Ame sia ame si ʋua Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ me la nate ɖa tso ŋutasese ̃ gbɔ . ”

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Menye sikanuwo kple klosalonuwo ɖeɖe koe nɔa aƒe ga ̃ me o , ke boŋ atinuwo kple anyinuwo ha ̃ nɔa anyi , ɖewo na bubumewo xɔxɔ eye ɖewo ha ̃ na gbe sia gbe ƒe ŋudɔwɔwɔ .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Ne ame aɖe kɔ eɖokui ŋuti tso nu vɔ ̃ mawo me la , eya ŋudɔe woawɔ abe nu si ŋu bubu le , nu si le kɔkɔe , si nye ŋudɔwɔnu na Aƒetɔ la eye wo ̀ le klalo hena dɔ nyui sia dɔ nyui wɔwɔ ene .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Si le nu sia nu si naa nu vɔ ̃ ƒe susu si ɖea fu na ɖekakpuiwo enuenu eye wo ̀ gena ɖe wo me la nu , ke nale ́ fɔ ɖe nu sia nu si nyɔa didi le mewo ̀ be na ̃ wɔ nu nyui la ŋu . Xɔse kple lɔlɔ ̃ nanɔ mewo ̀ eye nana hadede kple ame siwo lɔ ̃ a Aƒetɔ la eye woƒe dzime kɔ la , nado dzidzɔ na wo ̀ .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Megale egblɔm na wo ̀ be megade nu nyahehe dzodzro siwo tɔtɔa ame eye wodoa dɔmedzoe na ame la me o .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Mele be Mawu ƒe amewo nanye dzrewɔlawo o , ke boŋ ele be woanye nufiala siwo faa tu eye wogbɔa dzi ɖi na vodalawo .

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: Bɔbɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ne e ̀ le nu fiam ame siwo tɔtɔ le nyateƒe la ŋu . Elabena ne etsɔ ɖokuibɔbɔ kple gbe blewu ƒo nu na wo la , mɔkpɔkpɔ geɖe li bena , to Mawu ƒe amenuveve me la , woaɖe asi le woƒe susu tatrawo ŋu eye woaxɔ nyateƒe la dzi ase .

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Ekema woadze si nyateƒe la eye woasi le Satana ƒe mɔ siwo wo ̀ trena be yeana woazu kluviwo na nu vɔ ̃ ɣesiaɣi si yelɔ ̃ la nu ; ale woate ŋu adze Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu dzi wɔwɔ gɔme .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Wo ̀ ŋku nenɔ esia dzi be , ɣeyiɣi vɔ ̃ wo lava le ŋkeke mamlɛawo me .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Amewo anye ɖokuilɔ ̃ lawo , galɔ ̃ lawo , adegbe ƒuƒlu ƒolawo , dadalawo , amedzulawo , ame siwo meɖoa to wo dzilawo o , akpemadalawo , ame makɔmakɔwo ,

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: amemalɔ ̃ lawo , ame siwo metsɔa nu vɔ ̃ kena o , ameŋugble ̃ lawo , ɖokuidzimaɖulawo , ŋutase ̃ lawo , ame siwo le ́ a fu nu nyui

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: amegɔmezɔlawo , dzimagbɔɖitɔwo , ɖokuiŋudzelawo , ame siwo lɔ ̃ a xexemedzidzɔ wu Mawu ,

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: ame siwo si gotagome ƒe mawuvɔvɔ ̃ le evɔ wogbe nu le Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ gbɔ . Te ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖa xaa tso ame siawo gbɔ . Woawoe nye ame siwo yia ame bubuwo ƒe aƒewo me le adza me eye wowɔa xɔlɔ ̃ kple nyɔnu abunɛtɔ siwo me nu vɔ ̃ xɔ aƒe ɖo la eye wofiaa woƒe xɔse yeye la wo .

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Nyɔnu siawo tɔgbi dzea nufiala yeyewo yome ɣesiaɣi , ke womesea nyateƒe la gɔme ɣeaɖekeɣi o .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Nufiala siawo tsia tsitre ɖe nyateƒe la ŋu abe ale si Yane kple Yambre tsi tsitre ɖe Mose ŋu ene . Susu ƒoɖi totro kpaɖikpaɖiwo le wo me eye wotsi tre ɖe Kristo dzixɔse la ŋu .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Ke womanɔ edzi alea tegbee o . Gbe ɖeka la , amewo kata ̃ ava nya woƒe amebeble abe ale si amewo va nya Yane kple Yambre ƒe nu vɔ ̃ ene .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Ke , e ̀ nya tso ŋkule ́ le ɖe ŋunye me be nyemenye ame siawo tɔgbi o . E ̀ nya nu si dzi mexɔ se , ale si menɔa agbee kple nu si dim mele . E ̀ nya nye Kristo dzixɔse kple nye fukpekpewo . E ̀ nya nu tso ale si melɔ ̃ wo ̀ kple nye dzidodo ŋu .

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: E ̀ nya fukpekpe geɖe siwo va dzinye le gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe nyanyui la ta . E ̀ nya nu siwo kata ̃ wowɔm esi meyi Antioxia , Ikonio kple Listra ha ̃ , ke Aƒetɔ la ɖem tso wo me .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: E ̃ , ame siwo ɖo be yewoadze Kristo Yesu ŋu to agbenɔnɔ le mawuvɔvɔ ̃ me la , akpe fu le ame siwo le ́ fui la ƒe asi me .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple aʋatsonufialawo ƒe vɔɖivɔ ̃ ɖi anɔ sese ̃ m ɖe edzi wu , eye woanɔ ame geɖewo blem abe ale si Satana ble woawo ŋutɔ ha ̃ ene .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Ke ele na wo ̀ be nale ́ nu siwo wofia wo ̀ la dzixɔse me ɖe asi . E ̀ nya be nu siawo nye nyateƒe elabena e ̀ nya be yeate ŋu axɔ mi ́ ame siwo fia nu siawo wo ̀ la dzi ase .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: E ̀ nya ale si , esi nenye ɖevi sue la , wofia Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe la wo ̀ , nu siawo na nedze nunya be naxɔ Mawu ƒe amenuveve to Kristo Yesu dzixɔse me .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Mawu tsɔ eƒe nya la na mi ́ to eƒe Gbɔgbɔ si wɔ dɔ le amewo me la dzi . Eya ta Biblia nyo hena nufiafia tso nu siwo nye nyateƒe la ŋu kple ale si wo ̀ ana mi ́ adze si nu siwo nye nu vɔ ̃ le mi ́ aƒe agbenɔnɔ me . Edaa mi ́ ɖe mɔ dzɔdzɔe dzi eye wo ̀ kpena ɖe mi ́ a ŋu be mi ́ awɔ nu si nyo eye wo ̀ dze .

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: Eyae nye Mawu ƒe mɔ si dzraa mi ́ ɖo nyuie le go sia go me hena nyuiwɔwɔ na ame sia ame .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Eya ta mele gbe tem ɖe edzi na wo ̀ le Mawu kple Kristo Yesu , ame si adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame gbagbewo kple ame kukuwo gbe ɖeka ne eva do be yeaɖo yeƒe fiaɖuƒe la gɔme anyi la , ŋkume be ,

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: na ̃ ɖe gbeƒa ̃ Mawu ƒe nya la kple vevidodo ɣeawokata ̃ ɣi , ɣesiaɣi si na ̃ kpɔ mɔnu ko , vovo li o , vovo meli o . Fia mɔ nyuitɔwo eye naka mo na wo ̀ amewo ne ehia ̃ . Do ŋuse ̃ wo be woawɔ nu si dze eye natsɔ Mawu ƒe nya anyi wo kple dzigbɔɖi ɣesiaɣi .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Elabena ɣeyiɣi aɖe gbɔna esime amewo magaɖo to nyateƒe la o , ke boŋ woanɔ tsatsam anɔ nufiala siwo agblɔ nya siwo woawo ŋutɔ adi be yewoase la dim .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Womaɖo to nu si Biblia le fiafiam o , ke boŋ woadze woawo ŋutɔ ƒe susu tatrawo yome dzidzɔtɔe .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Nɔ te sesi ̃ e eye me ̀ gavɔ ̃ fukpekpe le Aƒetɔ la ta o . Kplɔ ame bubuwo vɛ na Kristo . Me ̀ gagbe nu sia nu si wo ̀ le na wo ̀ be nawɔ la wɔwɔ o .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Elabena nye la , wole trɔyem ƒo ɖi xoxo abe nunovɔsa ene eye nye ɣeyiɣi de na dzodzo .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Meʋli ̃ ʋiʋli ̃ nyui la , mewu duɖimekeke la nu eye mele ́ xɔse la me ɖe asi .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Ke azɔ la , wodzra dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe fiakuku ɖo ɖi nam esi Aƒetɔ , Ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la dzɔdzɔe la , anam le ŋkeke ma dzi , eye menye nye ɖeka koe o , ke boŋ ame siwo kata ̃ le mɔ kpɔm vevie na eƒe vava .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Do vevi be na ̃ va gbɔnye kaba ,

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: elabena Đema gble ̃ m ɖi hedzo yi Tesalonika elabena elɔ ̃ xexe sia me . Kresken ha ̃ dzo yi Galatia . Nenema ke Tito ha ̃ dzo yi Dalmatia .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Luka koe li kplim . Di Marko eye na ̃ kplɔe ɖe asi vɛ elabena ekpena ɖe ŋunye le nye dɔwɔwɔ me .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Medɔ Tikiko ha ̃ ɖe Efeso .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Ne e ̀ gbɔna la , tsɔ awu ʋlaya si megble ̃ ɖe Karpo gbɔ le Troa vɛ nam . Nenema kee nye agbale ̃ awo ha ̃ , vevietɔ la ̃ gbale ̃ tɔwo .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Aleksandro , akɔblinutula la wɔ nu vevi geɖem . Aƒetɔ la ahe to nɛ

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: ke kpɔ nyuie le eŋu elabena etsi tsitre ɖe nu sia nu si mi ́ egblɔ la ŋu .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Zi gba ̃ tɔ si wohem yi ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ la ŋkume la , ame aɖeke menɔ afi sia akpe ɖe ŋunye o , ame sia ame si dzo . Mele mɔ kpɔm be womabu fɔ wo ɖe nu sia ta o .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Ke Aƒetɔ la nɔ ŋunye eye wo ̀ na mɔkpɔkpɔm be magblɔ mawunya dzideƒotɔe na xexeame kata ̃ nase . Ekpe ɖe ŋunye ha ̃ be wometsɔm na dzatawo o .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: E ̃ , Aƒetɔ la aɖem ɣesiaɣi tso vɔ ̃ wo kata ̃ me eye woakplɔm ayi eƒe dziƒofiaɖuƒe la me . Ŋutikɔkɔe woana Mawu tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me . Amen .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Do gbe na Priskila kple Akwila kpakple ame siwo le Onisiforo ƒe aƒe me la nam .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erasto le Kɔrinto eye megble ̃ Trofimo , ame si dze dɔ la , ɖe Mileto .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Dze agbagba nava ɖo afi sia hafi vuvɔŋɔli naɖo . Eubulo , Pude , Lino , Klaudia kple ame bubuawo kata ̃ do gbe na wo ̀ .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Aƒetɔ la nanɔ anyi kple wo ̀ gbɔgbɔ . Mawu ƒe amenuveve nanɔ anyi kpli mi kata ̃ .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Paulo , Mawu ƒe dɔla kple Yesu Kristo ƒe apostolo na Mawu ƒe ame tiatiawo ƒe xɔse kple sidzedze nyateƒe si kplɔa ame yia mawusosroɖa gbɔe ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: xɔse kple sidzedze si ku ɖe mɔkpɔkpɔ na agbe mavɔ la ŋu , nu si Mawu ame si medaa alakpa o la do eƒe ŋugbe , hafi ɣeyiɣi mavɔwo dze egɔme ,

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: eye woɖe eƒe nya la ɖe go fia le eya ŋutɔ ƒe aza ̃ gbe la dzi to nyanyui la gbɔgblɔ si wo ̀ tsɔ de asi nam le Mawu , mi ́ a Đela la , ƒe gbeɖeɖe nu .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Mele agbale ̃ sia ŋlɔm na Tito , vinye vava ̃ tɔ le xɔse ɖeka si le mi ́ a si la nu . Amenuveve kple ŋutifafa si tso Mawu Fofo la kple Kristo Yesu mi ́ a Đela gbɔ la nanɔ kpli wo ̀ .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Nu si ta megble ̃ wo ̀ ɖe Kreta lae nye na ̃ ɖɔ nu siwo susɔ la ɖo eye na ̃ ɖo hamemega ̃ wo le du ɖe sia ɖe me abe ale si meɖoe na wo ̀ e ene .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Ele na hamemega ̃ be wo ̀ anye mokakamanɔŋutɔ , nyɔnu ɖeka ko srɔ ̃ , ŋutsu si ƒe viwo le ́ xɔse la me ɖe asi eye nya mele wo ŋu be wonye agla ̃ dzelawo kple tomaɖolawo o .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be wotsɔ Mawu ƒe dɔ de asi na hamemega ̃ ta la , ele nɛ be wo ̀ anye mokakamanɔŋutɔ , Manye dadala alo ame si doa dziku kabakaba o , manye aha tsu nola o , manye ame si wɔa nu gbodogbodo alo tia viɖe ƒoɖi yome o .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Ke boŋ wo ̀ anye amedzrowɔla , ame si lɔ ̃ a nu nyui , ɖokuidziɖula , nu dzɔdzɔe wɔla , ame si le kɔkɔe eye wo ̀ wɔa nu ɖe ɖoɖo nu .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Ele nɛ be wo ̀ ale ́ nyateƒenya la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e abe ale si wofiae ene ale be eya ha ̃ natsɔ nu dzɔdzɔe fiafia ade dzi ƒo na ame bubuwo eye wo ̀ atsi ɖeklemiɖelawo ƒe nya nu .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Elabena agla ̃ dzela geɖewo le afi ma , nya dzodzro gblɔlawo kple ameblelawo , vevietɔ ame siwo tso aʋatsotso ƒe kɔmama me .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Ele be woatsi woƒe nuwɔnawo nu elabena wole aƒekɔ blibowo dome gble ̃ m to nu siwo mele be woafia o la fiafia me eye wowɔa esia ɖe viɖe ƒoɖi ta .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nyagblɔɖilawo dometɔ ɖeka gblɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be , “ Kretatɔwo nye alakpadalawo ɖaa wonye la ̃ vɔ ̃ ɖiwo kple nu tsu ɖula kuviatɔwo ”

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Đaseɖiɖi sia le eteƒe eya ta ka mo na wo vevie ale be woade blibo le xɔse la me ,

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: eye womaɖo to Yudatɔwo ƒe gliwo alo aɖo to ame siwo gbe nu le nyateƒe la gbɔ ƒe sededewo o .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Ame siwo dza la , nu sia nu le dzadzɛ na wo , ke ame siwo me gbegble ̃ le eye womexɔ se o la , naneke mele dzadzɛ le wo gbɔ o . Le nyateƒe me la , woƒe susu kple dzitsinya kata ̃ me do viviti .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Wogblɔna be yewonya Mawu gake wogbea nu le egbɔ to woƒe nuwɔnawo me . Wonye ŋunyɔnuwo kple tomaɖolawo eye womedze na nu nyui aɖeke wɔwɔ o .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Ele na wo ̀ be na ̃ fia nu si nye nufiafia si de blibo .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Fia ame tsitsiwo be woafa tu woanye ame siwo dze na bubu , ɖokuidziɖulawo , ame siwo ƒe xɔse de blibo le lɔlɔ ̃ kple tenɔnɔ me .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Nenema ke fia nyɔnu tsitsiawo be woafa tu eye woabu ame le woƒe nuwɔna ɖe sia ɖe me . Womanye ame siwo nɔa tsatsam nɔa nya vlowo gblɔm tso amewo ŋu o , eye womanye aha tsu nolawo ha ̃ o .

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: Ele be nyɔnu tsitsi siawo nafia ɖetugbiwo ale si woafa tui eye woalɔ ̃ wo srɔ ̃ wo kple wo viwo .

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: Fia wo be woanye ɖokuidziɖulawo , ame dzadzɛwo , aƒemedɔwɔlawo , dɔmenyotɔwo kple ame siwo bɔbɔa wo ɖokui na woawo ŋutɔ srɔ ̃ wo be ame aɖeke magagblɔ nya tovo ɖe Mawu ƒe nya la ŋu o .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Nenema ke , do ŋuse ̃ ɖekakpuiwo be woanye ɖokuidziɖulawo .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Tsɔ ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖo kpɔɖeŋui na wo le nu sia nu me to nu si nyo la wɔwɔ me . Đe nuteƒewɔwɔ kple moveviɖoɖo fia le wo ̀ nufiafia me .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: hekpe ɖe esiawo ŋu la , wo ̀ nuƒoƒo neto mɔ ɖeka be womakpɔ kpɔtsɔtsɔ le eŋu o ale be ŋu nakpe ame siwo tsia tre ɖe ŋuwo ̀ , elabena nya vɔ ̃ aɖeke mele wo si woagblɔ tso mi ́ a ŋu o .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Fia kluviwo be woaɖo to woƒe aƒetɔwo le nu sia nu me , woadze agbagba awɔ nu adze wo ŋu eye womegaɖe nya nu na woƒe aƒetɔwo o .

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: Fia wo ha ̃ be womagafi woƒe aƒetɔwo o ke boŋ woaɖee afia be woate ŋu aka ɖe wo dzi blibo ɣesiaɣi ale be le mɔ ɖe sia ɖe nu la , woawɔ nufiafia tso Mawu , mi ́ aƒe Đela , ŋu wo ̀ adze ame ŋu .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Elabena Mawu ƒe amenuveve si hea ɖeɖe vanɛ la , do na amewo kata ̃ .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Efia mi ́ be mi ́ agblɔ “ Ao ” na mawumavɔmavɔ ̃ kple xexemenudzodzrowo eye mi ́ anɔ agbe le ɖokuidziɖuɖu , dzɔdzɔenyenye kple mawuvɔvɔ ̃ me , le fifi xexeame ,

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: esi mi ́ ele lalam na yayraŋkeke si mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm na , yayraŋkeke si dzi woaɖe mi ́ aƒe Mawu ga ̃ kple Đela Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe afia le .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Ame si tsɔ eɖokui na ɖe mi ́ a ta be yeaɖe mi ́ tso vɔ ̃ ɖinyenye kata ̃ me be wo ̀ akɔ mi ́ a ŋuti na eɖokui , ame siwo nye eya ŋutɔ tɔ , eye wole klalo be woawɔ nu si nyo .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Eya ta fia nu siawo . De dzi ƒo na wo ̀ amewo eye na ̃ ka mo kple ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ . Megana ame aɖeke nado vlo wo ̀ o .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Đo ŋku edzi na wo ̀ amewo be ele be woabu dziɖuɖua kple eƒe dɔnunɔlawo ; ele be woaɖo to wo eye woanɔ klalo na dɔ nyui sia dɔ nyui wɔwɔ ɣesiaɣi .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Mele be woagblɔ nya vɔ ̃ ɖe ame aɖeke ŋu loo alo awɔ dzre o , ke boŋ ele be woanye ame fafawo eye woabu ame sia ame .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ enye abunɛtɔwo kpɔ eye mi ́ egbe toɖoɖo . Ame bubuwo ble mi ́ eye mi ́ ezu kluviwo na dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo kple fie ̃ ŋufie ̃ ŋu vɔ ̃ ɖiwo . Havimalɔmalɔ ̃ kple ŋuʋaʋa ̃ xɔ mi ́ a me keŋ . Mi ́ ele ́ fu amewo eye woawo ha ̃ le ́ fu mi ́ .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Ke esi ɣeyiɣia de be Mawu , mi ́ a Đela ƒe amenuveve kple lɔlɔ ̃ nado la ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: eɖe mi ́ , menye esi mi ́ edze be woaɖe mi ́ ta o , ke boŋ le eƒe amenuveve kple nublanuikpɔkpɔ sɔgbɔ la ta . Ewɔ esia to ale si wo ̀ klɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ɖa kple ale si wo ̀ de Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe dzidzɔ yeye mi ́ a me la me .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Ekɔ eƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ɖe mi ́ a dzi eye wo ̀ na wo ̀ sɔ gbɔ le mi ́ a me . Ewɔ esiawo kata ̃ le nu si Yesu Kristo , mi ́ a Đela wɔ la ta ,

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: ale be woate ŋu atso afia na mi ́ le Mawu ƒe ŋkume , le eƒe dɔmenyo gbago la ta . Azɔ la , mi ́ ate ŋu akpɔ gome le agbe mavɔ si wonaa mi ́ la ƒe kesinɔnu la me . Mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm vevie na exɔxɔ .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Esia nye nyateƒenya si wogblɔ eye medi be na ̃ te gbe ɖe nu siawo dzi ale be ame siwo tsɔ woƒe xɔse de Mawu me la nakpɔ nyuie be wotsɔ wo ɖokuiwo de nu nyui wɔwɔ me blibo ; nu siawo nyo ŋutɔ eye wohea viɖe geɖe vanɛ na ame sia ame .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Me ̀ gade nu nyahehe siwo ku ɖe biabia siwo ŋu ŋuɖoɖo tututu aɖeke mele o kple mawunya ƒe akpa siwo ŋu ɖeklemiɖeɖe geɖe le la me o . Đe ɖokuiwo ̀ ɖa le nyahehe tso Yudatɔwo ƒe sewo dzi wɔwɔ ŋu me , elabena viɖe aɖeke mele nu sia tɔgbi ŋu o ; nu gbegble ̃ koe wo ̀ hena vanɛ .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Ne ame aɖe le mama hem va mia dome la , ele be miagbe nya nɛ zi gba ̃ tɔ kple zi evelia . Le esia megbe la , migatsɔ ɖeke le eƒe nya me o ,

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: elabena ame ma tɔgbi medaa asixɔxɔ vava ̃ tɔ ɖe nu nyui dzi o . Ele nu vɔ ̃ wɔm eye eya ŋutɔ nya nenema .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Mele eɖom be maɖo Artema alo Tikiko ɖe wo ̀ . Dze agbagba , ne wo dometɔ ɖeka va ɖo la , na ̃ do gom le Nikopoli kaba abe ale si nate ŋui ene , elabena meɖo be manɔ afi ma le vuvɔŋɔlia me .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Wɔ nu sia nu si na ̃ te ŋui la be na ̃ kpe ɖe Zena , senyala la , kple Apolo ŋu le woƒe mɔzɔzɔ me . Kpɔ egbɔ be woana nu sia nu si woahia ̃ la wo .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Fia mi ́ aƒe ameawo be woasrɔ ̃ ale si woatsɔ wo ɖokuiwo ade nyuiwɔwɔ me ale be woate ŋu akpɔ woƒe gbe sia gbe ƒe nuhiahia ̃ wo eye womanɔ agbe maɖevi o .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ le gbɔnye la do gbe na mi nyuie . Do gbe na ame siwo lɔ ̃ a mi ́ le xɔse la me . Amenuveve nanɔ kpli mi kata ̃ .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Paulo , Kristo Yesu ƒe gatɔ , kple mi ́ a nɔviŋutsu Timoteo gbɔ , na Filemon , mi ́ a xɔlɔ ̃ lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ kple hadɔwɔla

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: kple Apfia , mi ́ a nɔvinyɔnu , na Arkipo , mi ́ a nɔvi , Kristo ƒe asrafo kpakple hame si kpea ta le aƒewo ̀ me .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Amenuveve kple ŋutifafa tso Mawu mi ́ a Fofo kple Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gbɔ la woana mi .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Filemon lɔlɔ ̃ a , medaa akpe na Mawu ɣesiaɣi si mele gbe dom ɖa ɖe tawo ̀

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: elabena mese nu tso wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ kple xɔse si le Aƒetɔ Yesu me kpakple amekɔkɔeawo kata ̃ ŋu .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Nye gbedodoɖae nye be na ̃ tsɔ dzo ɖe wo ̀ xɔse la , mama ŋu , ale be na ̃ se nu nyui ɖe sia ɖe si le mi ́ a si le Kristo me la gɔme blibo .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ na dzidzɔ kple dzideƒo ga ̃ aɖem elabena wo ̀ , nɔviŋutsu , tsɔ dzidzɔ de ame kɔkɔeawo ƒe dziwo me .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Eya ta , togbɔ be dzideƒo le asinye le Kristo me be mate ŋu azi dziwo ̀ be na ̃ wɔ nu si dze be na ̃ wɔ ha ̃ la ,

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: medi boŋ be maɖe kuku na wo ̀ le lɔlɔ ̃ ta . Eya ŋuti nye Paulo , amega ̃ xoxo aɖe kple ame si va zu Kristo Yesu ƒe gatɔ

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: mele kuku ɖem na wo ̀ ɖe vinye Onesimo ta , ame si trɔ zu vinye esi menɔ kɔsɔkɔsɔ me le afii .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Tsa ̃ la ŋudɔwɔnu aɖeke menɔ eŋu na wo ̀ o , ke azɔ la etrɔ zu ŋudɔwɔnu na nye kpli wo ̀ siaa .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Mele etrɔm ɖo ɖe wo ̀ eye mele nye ŋutɔ nye dzi ha ̃ ɖom ɖa wo ̀ kplii .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Medi vevie be mana wo ̀ anɔ gbɔnye le afii , le esime mele gaxɔ me le nyanyui la gbɔgblɔ ta . Wo ̀ ha ̃ ato esia me ana kpekpeɖeŋum to edzi .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Ke nyemedi be mawɔ nenema ne melɔ ̃ ɖe edzi o . Nyemedi be nanyo dɔme nam to dzizizi me o , ke boŋ be wo ̀ ŋutɔ na ̃ di be yeave nunye .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Đewohi ̃ , anyo be nabu nya sia ŋu ale : Onesimo si dzo le gbɔwo ̀ ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe , ale be azɔ la , woazu tɔwo tegbee .

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Onesimo maganye kluvi ɖeɖe ko azɔ o , ke boŋ azu nu si kɔ sãa wu eye woanye nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ a , vevietɔ nam . Agazu ame vevi na wo ̀ ŋutɔ ha ̃ azɔ , elabena maganye subɔla ko o , ke boŋ anye nɔviwo ̀ le Kristo me ha ̃ .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Ne menye xɔ ̃ wo ̀ le nyateƒe me la , ekema xɔ Onesimo kple dzaadoname si tututu natsɔ axɔm nenye nyee gbɔna gbɔwo ̀ .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Ne ewɔ nu vevi aɖe wo ̀ alo wo ̀ fi wo ̀ nane la , ekema kpɔ mɔ na teƒeɖoɖo tso gbɔnye .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Maɖo eteƒe na wo ̀ . Nye , Paulo , meɖo kpe nya sia dzi na wo ̀ to nu sia ŋɔŋlɔ kple nye asi na wo ̀ me . Ke nyemakɔ nu le fe si nenyi le asinye la dzi o ! Nya lae nye be , wo ̀ luʋɔ la ŋutɔe nye fe si nenyi le asinye !

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: E ̃ , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ a , na wo ̀ nu sia wɔwɔ nam kple lɔlɔ ̃ nado dzidzɔ nam ekema nye dzi gbɔdzɔ la akafu Aƒetɔ la .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Meŋlɔ agbale ̃ sia na wo ̀ elabena meka ɖe edzi be awɔ nam wu ale si mebia gɔ ̃ ha ̃ !

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Meɖe kuku be nadi amedzroxɔ aɖe da ɖi nam , elabena mele mɔ kpɔm be Mawu ase miaƒe gbedodoɖa eye woana mava mia gbɔ kpuie .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Epafra , ame si le gaxɔ me kplim le gbeƒa ̃ ɖeɖe Kristo Yesu ta la , do gbe na mi .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Marko , Aristarko , Đema kple Luka , nye hadɔwɔlawo ha ̃ do gbe na mi .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe yayra nanɔ anyi kple miaƒe gbɔgbɔ la .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Le blema la Mawu ƒo nu na mi ́ a fofowo zi geɖe to mɔ vovovowo dzi to nyagblɔɖilawo dzi .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Ke le ŋkeke mlɔetɔ siawo me la eƒo nu na mi ́ to Via si wo ̀ tia be wo ̀ anye domenyila la dzi , ame si dzi ha ̃ woto wɔ xexeame .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Vi la kle ̃ na kple Mawu ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe enye ame si ɖe Mawu ƒe nɔnɔme tututu fia eye wo ̀ na agbe nuwo kata ̃ to eƒe ŋuse ̃ nya la me . Esi wo ̀ klɔ nu vɔ ̃ wo ɖa vɔ la , enɔ anyi ɖe Mawu ƒe nuɖusi me le dziƒo .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Ale wo ̀ kɔ sa ̃ a wu mawudɔlawo abe ale si ŋkɔ si wo ̀ tsɔ nyi domee la kɔ wu wo tɔ sa ̃ e ene .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Elabena mawudɔlawo dometɔ kae Mawu gblɔ na kpɔ be , “ Wo ̀ e nye vinye ; egbe mezu fofowo ̀ ? ” Alo wo ̀ gagblɔ na ɖe be , “ Manye fofoa eye eya ha ̃ anye vinye ? ”

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Eye esi Mawu dɔ via ŋgɔgbea ɖe xexeame la , egblɔ be , “ Ele be mawudɔlawo kata ̃ nasubɔe . ”

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Mawu ƒo nu tso eƒe dɔlawo ŋuti be , “ Ewɔ eƒe dɔlawo abe yaƒoƒowo ene eye eƒe subɔlawo abe dzoƒeaɖewo ene . ”

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Ke egblɔ le via ya ŋuti be , “ O , Mawu , wo ̀ fiazikpui anɔ anyi tegbetegbe eye dzɔdzɔnyenye anye wo ̀ fiaɖuƒe ƒe tsiamiti .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: E ̀ lɔ ̃ dzɔdzɔenyenye eye ne ̀ le ́ fu ŋutasese ̃ eya ta Mawu , wo ̀ Mawu la , tsɔ wo ̀ ɖo teƒe kɔkɔ wu nɔviwo ̀ wo kata ̃ to esia me be etsɔ dzidzɔ ƒe ami ʋeʋi ̃ la si na wo ̀ . ”

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Egagblɔ be , “ O Aƒetɔ , le gɔmedzedzea me la eɖo xexeame ƒe gɔmeɖokpe anyi , eye dziƒowo ha ̃ nye wo ̀ asinudɔwɔwɔ .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Woatsrɔ ̃ gake wo ̀ la anɔ anyi , wo kata ̃ woanyunyɔ abe awu ene .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: ” A ̀ ŋlɔ wo abe awu ʋlaya ene eye a ̃ ɖe wo ɖi abe awu si wodo la ene , ke wo ̀ ya la , a ̃ nɔ nanema , ma ̃ trɔ o , eye wo ̀ ƒewo ha ̃ mawu enu akpɔ gbeɖe o . ”

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Mawudɔla kae Mawu gblɔ na kpɔ be , “ Bɔbɔ nɔ anyi ɖe nye nuɖusime va se ɖe esime mawɔ wo ̀ futɔwo woazu afɔɖodzinu na wo ̀ ? ”

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Ekema nu kawoe mawudɔlawo nye ? Wo kata ̃ nye gbɔgbɔ siwo subɔa Mawu eye Mawu dɔa wo be woakpe ɖe ame siwo anyi ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ ƒe dome la ŋuti .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Esia ta ele na mi ́ be mi ́ aɖo to nyateƒenya siwo kata ̃ mi ́ ese la nyuie ne menye nenema o la mi ́ ate ɖa xaa tso nyateƒe la gbɔ .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Ne gbedeasi si mawudɔlawo gblɔ la nye nyateƒe eye edzidalawo kple ame siwo meɖo toe o la xɔ tohehe si wodze na la ,

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: ale ke mi ́ awo ya mi ́ awɔ asi le enu ne mi ́ egbe toɖoɖo ɖeɖenya ga ̃ sia ? Đeɖe sia si Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔ ɖe gbeƒa ̃ e zi gba ̃ tɔ la woɖo kpe edzi na mi ́ to ame siwo ɖo toe la dzi .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Mawu ŋutɔ ha ̃ ɖo kpe woƒe ɖaseɖiɖi dzi to dzesiwo , nukunuwo kple nukudɔ vovovowo dzi eye wo ̀ na Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la ƒe nunana amewo le ale si wo ̀ lɔ ̃ nu .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Mawu metsɔ mawudɔlawo ɖo dziɖulawoe na xexeme si ava va esi ŋuti mi ́ ele nu ƒom le o .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Ke ame aɖe gblɔ le Psalmowo ƒe agbale ̃ me be , “ Nu kae nye amegbetɔ be ne ́ bua eŋuti eye nu kae nye amegbetɔvi be nele ́ a be nɛ ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: E ̀ wɔ wo wobɔbɔ ɖe anyi vie wu mawudɔlawo , e ̀ tsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu ɖɔ fiakuku nɛ

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: eye ne ̀ tsɔ nu sia nu de eƒe afɔ te . ” Esi Mawu tsɔ nu sia nu de eƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te la , meɖe naneke le eme o . Gake fifi laa la medze abe nu sia nu le eƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te ene o .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Mi ́ ekpɔ Yesu , ame si wowɔ wo ̀ ɖiɖi vie wu mawudɔlawo , ke fifia la woɖɔ bubu kple ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe fiakuku nɛ elabena ekpe fu yi ɖe ku me ale be to Mawu ƒe amenuveve me wo ̀ axɔ ku ɖe ame sia ame nu .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Đe ko wo ̀ le eteƒe be , Mawu , ame si wɔ nuwo kata ̃ eye wo ̀ le ́ nuwo kata ̃ ɖe te la nawɔ Yesu blibo to fukpekpe me be wo ̀ akplɔ viŋutsu geɖewo vɛ woakpɔ gome le eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe me , elabena Yesue kplɔ wo yi ɖeɖe la gbɔe .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Ame si wɔa amewo kɔkɔe kple ame siwo wowɔ kɔkɔe la kata ̃ nye ƒome ɖeka me nɔlawo . Eya ta mekpe ŋu na Yesu be wo ̀ ayɔ wo be ye nɔviwo o .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Egblɔ be , “ Maɖe gbeƒa ̃ wo ̀ ŋkɔ na nɔvinyewo , madzi wo ̀ kafukafuhawo le ameha la ŋkume . ”

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Egagblɔ be , “ Maɖo dzi ɖe Mawu ŋu . ” Eye wogagblɔ be , “ Nye kple vi siwo Mawu nam la miele afii ” .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Esi ɖeviawo nye ŋutila ̃ kple ʋu ta la , eya ha ̃ kpɔ gome le woƒe amenyenye me ale be to eƒe ku me wo ̀ atsrɔ ̃ ame si si ku ƒe ŋuse ̃ le , ame si nye Satana ,

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: eye wo ̀ ɖe ga ame siwo zu kluviwo to vɔvɔ ̃ na ku me le woƒe agbemeŋkekewo kata ̃ me .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , menye mawudɔlawo ŋue wo ̀ kpe ɖo o , ke boŋ ekpe ɖe Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwo ŋu .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Le susu sia ta wo ̀ le be woawɔe wo ̀ anɔ abe nɔviawo ene le go sia go me ale be wo ̀ ava zu Osɔfoga ̃ , nublanuikpɔla kple nuteƒewɔla le Mawu ƒe dɔ me , eye be woaxe fe ɖe amewo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be eya ŋutɔ kpe fu to tetekpɔ me ta la , ate ŋu a kpe ɖe ame siwo tem kpɔ wole la ŋu .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Eya ta , nɔvinye kɔkɔewo , ame siwo kpɔ gome le dziƒo ƒe yɔyɔ la me , mida miaƒe susuwo ɖe Yesu , Apostolo kple Osɔfoga ̃ , ame si me mieʋu la dzi .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Ewɔ nuteƒe na Mawu , ame si tiae abe ale si Mose ha ̃ wɔ nuteƒe le nuwo kata ̃ me le Mawu ƒe aƒeme la ene .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Abe ale si ame si tso aƒe nyui aɖe xɔa kafukafu wu aƒe si wo ̀ tso ene la , nenema kee Yesu ha ̃ dze na bubu wu Mose .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Elabena aƒe ɖe sia ɖe la , ame aɖee tsoe gake Mawue nye nu sia nu wɔla .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Mose nye dɔla nuteƒewɔla le nuwo kata ̃ me le Mawu ƒe aƒeme , nu sia ɖi ɖase le nu si Mawu ava gblɔ emegbe la ŋuti .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Ke Kristo nye viŋutsu nuteƒewɔla ɖe Mawu ƒe aƒe dzi eye mi ́ awoe nye Mawu aƒe la , ne mi ́ ele ́ dzideƒo kple mɔkpɔkpɔ si me mi ́ eƒoa adegbe le la me ɖe asi .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Eya ta abe ale si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la gblɔe ene be , “ Egbe ne miese eƒe gbe la ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: migase ̃ miaƒe dziwo me abe ale si miewɔ le miaƒe agla ̃ dzedze me , le ɣeyiɣi si me mieto dodokpɔ me le gbedadaƒo la ene o .

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Afi ma mia fofowo dom kpɔ eye wotem kpɔ le , eye wokpɔ nu si mewɔ ƒe blaene .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Eya tae medo dziku ɖe dzidzime ma ŋu eye megblɔ be , ‘ Woƒe dziwo tra mɔ ɣesiaɣi eye womenya nye mɔwo o ! ’

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Eya ta le nye dziku me la meka atam gblɔ be , womage ɖe nye dzudzɔ la me gbeɖe o . ’ ” Nɔvinyewo , mikpɔ egbɔ be dzi si me nu vɔ ̃ le kple dzi maxɔse si trɔna le Mawu gbagbe la yome la , naganɔ mia dometɔ aɖeke si o .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Ke , mide dzi ƒo na mia nɔewo gbe sia gbe , zi ale si ɣeyiɣi li , ale be mi ́ a dometɔ aɖeke ƒe dzi maku atri to nu vɔ ̃ ƒe beble me o .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Đe mi ́ eva be mi ́ akpɔ gome le Kristo me , nenye be mi ́ ele ́ dzideƒo si le mi ́ a si le gɔmedzedzea me la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e ko .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Abe ale si mawunya gblɔe do ŋgɔ fifia ene be , “ Egbe ne miese eƒe gbe la migase ̃ miaƒe dziwo me abe ale si miewɔ le miaƒe agla ̃ dzedze me ene la o . ”

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Ame kawoe nye ame siwo se nya la eye wodze agla ̃ ? Đe menye woawoe nye ame siwo kata ̃ Mose kplɔ do goe tso Egipte lae oa ?

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Eye ame kawo ŋue wo ̀ do dziku ɖo hena ƒe blaene sɔŋ ? Đe menye ame siwo wɔ nu vɔ ̃ eye woƒe ŋutila ̃ kukuwo tsi gbea dzi lae oa ?

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Eye ame kawoe Mawu ka atam na be womage ɖe yeƒe dzudzɔ la me gbeɖe o ne menye ame siwo se ̃ to lae oa ?

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Ale mi ́ ekpɔe kɔtɛe be womete ŋu age ɖe dzudzɔ la me o le woƒe dzimaxɔse ta .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Eya ta esi eƒe dzudzɔmeyiyi ƒe ŋugbedodo gali ta la , mina mi ́ akpɔ nyuie be metsi mi ́ a dometɔ aɖeke ŋuti o .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Elabena wogblɔ nyanyui la na mi ́ abe alesi ke wogblɔe na woawo ha ̃ ene . Gake nya si wose la , meɖe vi na wo o elabena ame siwo see la mexɔe se o .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Azɔ , mi ́ ame siwo xɔe se la ge ɖe dzudzɔ ma me abe ale si Mawu ŋutɔ gblɔe ene be , “ Eya ta meka atam le nye dziku me be , womage ɖe nye dzudzɔƒe la me akpɔ o . ” Ke ha ̃ la ewu eƒe dɔ la nu tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea me ke .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Elabena eƒo nu tso ŋkeke adrea gbe ŋu le teƒe aɖe gblɔ be , “ Eye le ŋkeke adrelia dzi la Mawu dzudzɔ eɖokui tso eƒe dɔwɔnawo kata ̃ me . ”

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Le nya sia ke me la egagblɔ be “ Womage ɖe nye dzudzɔƒe la me gbeɖe o . ”

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Edze ƒa ̃ be ame aɖewo age ɖe dzudzɔ ma me godoo , gake ame siwo wogblɔ nyanyui la na do ŋgɔ la mete ŋu geɖe eme o le woƒe tosese ̃ ta .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Eya ta Mawu gaɖo ŋkeke bubu anyi si wo ̀ yɔ be “ Egbe . ” Ewɔ esia ɣeyiɣi geɖee megbe esi woƒo nu na David abe ale si mi ́ egblɔe va yi ene be , “ Egbe ne miese eƒe gbe la , migase ̃ miaƒe dziwo me o . ”

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Elabena nenye ɖe Yosua kplɔ wo yi dzudzɔ la mee la , anye ne Mawu magaƒo nu tso ŋkeke bubu aɖeke ŋu emegbe o .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Ekema dzudzɔ si woyɔna be Sabat dzudzɔ la li godoo na Mawu ƒe amewo .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Ame sia ame si ge ɖe Mawu ƒe dzudzɔ la , me la dzudzɔna tso eya ŋutɔ ƒe dɔwɔwɔwo me , abe ale si Mawu ha ̃ dzudzɔe ene .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Eya ta mina be mi ́ adze agbagba ɖe sia ɖe be mi ́ age ɖe dzudzɔ ma , me eye be ame aɖeke magatsi mɔta to tomaɖomaɖo me abe ŋgɔdoawo ene o .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Elabena Mawu ƒe nya la le agbe le dɔ wɔm . Eɖana wu hɛ nuevee ɖe sia ɖe , eƒona ɖe ame yina ɖe eme ke , hemaa luʋɔ kple gbɔgbɔ me , maa ƒunukpeƒewo kple ƒutomemiwo dome , eye wo ̀ drɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu tamesusuwo kple dzimedidiwo .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Naneke mele nuwɔwɔ blibo la me si le ɣaɣla ɖe Mawu o . Woklo nu le nu sia nu dzi eye wo ̀ le ƒeƒle le Mawu , ame si mi ́ ava na akɔntae la ƒe ŋkume .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Eya ta esi Osɔfoga ̃ , Mawu Vi Yesu , le mi ́ a , si , ame si yi dziƒo ta la , mina mi ́ ale ́ xɔse si me mi ́ eʋu la me ɖe asi sesi ̃ e .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Elabena menye Osɔfoga ̃ si mate ŋu ase veve kpli mi ́ le mi ́ aƒe gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔwo me lae le mi ́ a si o , ke boŋ Osɔfoga ̃ si le mi ́ a si la , wotee kpɔ le mɔ sia mɔ nu abe mi ́ awo ke ene , ɖe koe nu vɔ ̃ mele eya ŋu o .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Eya ta mi na mi ́ ate va Mawu ƒe amenuveve fiazikpui la gbɔ kple dzideƒo , be wo ̀ akpɔ nublanui na mi ́ eye wo ̀ ave mi ́ a nu akpe ɖe mi ́ a ŋu le mi ́ aƒe xaxaɣiwo .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Wotiaa Osɔfoga ̃ ɖe sia ɖe tso amegbetɔwo dome eye wodea dɔ asi nɛ be wo ̀ anɔ ŋgɔ na yewo le mawusubɔsubɔ ƒe nyawo me eye wo ̀ atsɔ nunanawo kple nu vɔ ̃ ŋuti vɔsawo aɖo Mawu ŋkume .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Osɔfoga ̃ sia tea ŋu gbɔa dzi ɖi na numanyala siwo le mɔ tram la esi eya ŋutɔ ha ̃ nye gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔtɔ le mɔ geɖewo nu .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Esia tae wo ̀ le be wo ̀ asa vɔ ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe nu vɔ ̃ kple ame bubuwo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta . Ame aɖeke metsɔa bubu sia dea eɖokui ŋuti o ; ele be Mawu nayɔe abe ale si wo ̀ yɔ Arɔn ene .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Eya ta Kristo ha ̃ metsɔ Osɔfoga ̃ ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe da ɖe eɖokui dzi o ke boŋ Mawu gblɔ nɛ be , “ Wo ̀ e nye vinyeŋutsu , egbe mezu Fofowo ̀ . ”

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Egagblɔ le teƒe bubu be , “ Enye Osɔfo tegbetegbe eye wo ̀ ɖoƒe sɔ kple Melkizedek tɔ ” .

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Esi Yesu nɔ agbe le anyigba dzi la , ewɔ gbedodoɖawo kple kukuɖeɖewo kple ɣli kpakple aɖatsi na eya ame si si ŋuse ̃ le be wo ̀ aɖee tso ku me eye wo ̀ ɖo toe le eƒe bubu kple ɖokuibɔbɔ ta .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Togbɔ be eyae nye Mawu vi ha ̃ la , esrɔ ̃ ɖokuibɔbɔ le fukpekpe siwo me wo ̀ to la ,

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: eye esi wowɔe blibo la , eva zu ɖeɖe mavɔ kpɔtsoƒe na ame siwo kata ̃ ɖoa toe .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Eye Mawu ɖoe be wo ̀ anye Osɔfoga ̃ abe Melkizedek ene .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Nya geɖewo li si wo ̀ le be mi ́ agblɔ le nu sia ŋu , gake esi mietea ŋu sea nu gɔme kabakaba o ta la esese ̃ na be mi ́ aɖe nya siawo me na mi .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Le nyateƒe me la , togbɔ be fifia ele be mianye nufialawo ha ̃ la , miegahia ̃ ame aɖe kokoko be wo ̀ agagbugbɔ afia mi gɔmedzenuwo tso Mawu ƒe nya ƒe nyateƒewo ŋu . Miehia ̃ notsi , ke menye nuɖuɖu sese ̃ o !

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Ame sia ame si ganoa notsi esi wo ̀ nye ɖevi ko ta la , mate ŋu ase nufiafia tso dzɔdzɔenyenye ŋuti gɔme o .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Ke nuɖuɖu sese ̃ nye ame tsitsiwo tɔ , ame siwo to eŋudɔwɔwɔ atraɖi me he wo ɖokuiwo be woate ŋu ade vovo nyui kple vɔ ̃ dome .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Eya ta mina mi ́ aɖe asi le gɔmedzenuwo fiafia tso Kristo ŋuti ŋu eye mi ́ aɖe zɔ ayi ɖe tsitsi ɖe edzi me . Migana mi ́ agbugbɔ gɔmeɖokpe aɖo na dzimetɔtrɔ tso nu siwo kplɔa ame yia kume la o , kple agbugbɔ gɔmeɖokpe agaɖo na xɔse le Mawu me ,

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: nufiafia tso mawutsideta ŋu , asidada ɖe ame dzi , ame kukuwo ƒe tsitretsitsi kple ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ mavɔ ŋuti o .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Esia mi ́ awɔ ne Mawu lɔ ̃ .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Ke ame siwo dze anyi la , ale ke woawɔ agbugbɔ wo va dzimetɔtrɔ me ? Wonye ame siwo nɔ Mawu ƒe kekeli me kpɔ . Woɖɔ dziƒo ƒe nunana kpɔ eye wokpɔ gome ha ̃ le Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la me ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: ame siawo ɖɔ Mawu ƒe nya la ƒe nyonyo kple ŋuse ̃ siwo le dzidzime si gbɔna la me ha ̃ kpɔ .

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: Ke wode megbe ! Be woagbugbɔ wo ava dzimetɔtrɔ mee la nye nu sese ̃ elabena to woƒe megbedede me , wogbugbɔ Mawu ƒe Vi la gale kakla ̃ m ɖe ati ŋuti , eye wole ŋukpe domii le gagla ̃ gbe .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Anyigba si noa tsi si dzana ɖe edzi zi geɖe eye wo ̀ wɔa nuku nyuie na agbledela siwo ŋlɔa anyigba la , xɔa yayra tso Mawu gbɔ .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: Ke ne anyigba la mie ŋuwo kple aŋɔkawo la , meganyo na naneke o eye ŋɔdzi li be ele fiƒode te . Mlɔeba la , woatɔ dzoe .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , togbɔ be mi ́ ele nu ƒom alea ha ̃ la , kaka ɖedzi le mi ́ a si be nya siawo meku ɖe mia ŋu o . Ke boŋ miaƒe ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ le ku nyuiwo tsem le miaƒe agbe me .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Mawu menye nuteƒemawɔla o , eya ta maŋlɔ dɔ nyui si mi ́ ewɔ nɛ kple lɔlɔ ̃ si mi ́ eɖe fiae be mi ́ ekpe ɖe eƒe amewo ŋu eye mi ́ egale nu siawo wɔm fifia la , be gbeɖe o .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Enye mi ́ aƒe didi be mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nale ́ nu siawo wɔwɔ me ɖe asi va se ɖe nuwuwu kple ŋkubia ale be miaƒe mɔkpɔkpɔ na de blibo .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Mi ́ edi be ame aɖeke nazu kuviatɔ o ke boŋ ame sia ame nasrɔ ̃ ame siwo to xɔse kple dzigbɔɖi me nyi nu si ŋugbe wodo na wo la ƒe dome ƒe kpɔɖeŋu .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Esi Mawu do ŋugbe na Abraham eye ame aɖeke meli lolo wui wo ̀ ayɔ aka atam o ta la , eta eya ŋutɔ ɖokui ,

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: hegblɔ bena , “ mayra wo ̀ godoo eye mana dzidzimevi geɖewo wo ̀ . ”

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Ale , esime Abraham gbɔ dzi ɖi blewuu la , ŋugbedodo sia va eme nɛ pɛpɛpɛ .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Ne ame aɖe be yeaka atam la , eyɔa ame bubu si ƒe ŋkɔ kple ŋuse ̃ kɔ wu eya ŋutɔ tɔ la ka atam lae heɖoa kpe nya si wo ̀ gblɔ la dzi eye wo ̀ tsia nyaʋiʋli ɖe sia ɖe nu .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye be Mawu di be yeana eme nakɔ nyuie na ŋugbedodo ƒe domenyilawo be nu si ƒe ŋugbe yedo matrɔ o ta la , eka atam tsɔ ɖo kpe eƒe ŋugbedodo la dzi .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Mawu wɔ esia ale be , to nu eve siwo metrɔna o , esiwo me Mawu mate ŋu aka aʋatso le gbeɖe o la dzi , mi ́ ame siwo si yi ɖaku ɖe mɔkpɔkpɔ si wona mi ́ la ŋu la nakpɔ dziɖeƒo ga ̃ aɖe .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Mɔkpɔkpɔ sia le mi ́ a si abe luʋɔ ƒe seke sese ̃ si maʋa akpɔ o la ene . Ete ŋu gena ɖe Kɔkɔeƒe le xɔmetsovɔ la godo

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: afi si Yesu ame si do ŋgɔ na mi ́ la ge ɖo ɖe mi ́ a nu . Eya va zu Osɔfoga ̃ abe Melkizedek ene tegbee .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Melkizedek sia enye Salem fia kple Osɔfoga ̃ na Mawu , dziƒoʋi ̃ tɔ la . Esi Abraham trɔ tso aʋagbedzi , afi si wo ̀ ɖu fia geɖewo dzi le , gbɔna la , Melkizedek va kpee eye wo ̀ yrae .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Le esia megbe la , Abraham ma nu siwo kata ̃ wotsɔ tso aʋagbedzi gbɔe la ɖe akpa ewo me eye wo ̀ tsɔ akpa ɖeka na Melkizedek . Melkizedek ƒe ŋkɔa gɔmee nye “ Dzɔdzɔenyenye , ƒe fia . Eye eya kee nye Ŋutifafa Fia , elabena du si me wo ̀ nye fia lee nye Salem si gɔmee nye “ Ŋutifafa . ”

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Fofo kple dada mele Melkizedek si o , eye nuŋlɔɖi aɖeke meli tso tɔgbuiawo ŋuti o . Dzigbe alo kugbe meli nɛ o ale eƒe agbe ɖe ko wo ̀ le abe Mawu Vi la tɔ ene , ame si nye Osɔfo tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Mibu ale si wo ̀ nye ga ̃ e la ŋuti kpɔ . Abraham , xɔsetɔwo fofo , gɔ ̃ ha ̃ tsɔ eƒe afunyinuwo ƒe ewolia nɛ !

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Azɔ la , se la bia tso Levi viwo ame siwo nye Osɔfowo la si be woaxɔ nu ewolia le woƒe dukɔmeviwo si , ame siwo nye wo nɔviwo , togbɔ be wo nɔviawo nye Abraham ƒe dzidzimeviwo ha ̃ .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Ke ŋutsu sia , Melkizedek , menye Levi ƒe dzidzimevi o , ke ha ̃ la , exɔ nu ewolia le Abraham si eye wo ̀ yra eya ame si xɔ Mawu ƒe ŋugbedodoawo

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: abe ale si ame sia ame nya ene la , zi geɖe la ame si naa yayra la kɔna wua ame si yram wo ̀ le .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Ame siwo nye Osɔfowo esi woxɔ nu ewolia la nye amegbetɔwo , ŋutila ̃ kple ʋu , si kuna . Ke hena Melkizedek ya la , wogblɔ le eŋuti be egale agbe .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Mi ́ ate ŋu agblɔ le Levi , ame si xɔ nu ewolia ŋuti gɔ ̃ ha ̃ be exe nu ewolia to Abraham dzi ,

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: elabena esi Melkizedek do go Abraham la , Levi nɔ tɔgbuia , Abraham , ƒe alime .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Elabena to Levi viwo ƒe Osɔfodɔwɔwɔ dzi , wona Se la Israelviwo . Azɔ la , nenye be Levi viwo ƒe Osɔfodɔwɔwɔ ɖe wo ̀ de blibo la , magahia ̃ be woatsɔ Osɔfo bubu vɛ o , ame si nye Osɔfo le Melkizedek ƒe ɖoɖo nu , ke menye le Arɔn ƒe ɖoɖo nu o .

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Elabena ne tɔtrɔ va Osɔfoɖuɖu ŋuti la , ele be tɔtrɔ nava Se la ha ̃ me .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Eya ame si ŋu wogblɔ nu siawo kata ̃ le la tso to bubu me eye ame aɖeke metso to ma me kpɔ subɔ abe Osɔfo ene le vɔsamlekpui la ŋgɔ o ,

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: elabena eme kɔ ƒa ̃ a be mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la dzɔ tso Yuda ƒe to la me , eye ku ɖe to ma ŋuti la , Mose megblɔ nya aɖeke ku ɖe woƒe Osɔfoɖuɖu ŋuti o .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Eye nu si mi ́ egblɔ la , me agakɔ ɖe edzi wu ne Osɔfo bubu abe Melkizedek ene va ɖo ,

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: ame si va zu Osɔfo , menye to ɖoɖo si wowɔ da ɖi , ku ɖe eƒe dzɔtsoƒe ŋuti o , ke boŋ ku ɖe ŋuse ̃ si le agbe si mekuna o la dzi .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Psalmoŋlɔla ɖe nu sia fia mi kɔtee esi wo ̀ gblɔ tso Kristo ŋuti bena , “ Wo ̀ e nye Osɔfo le Melkizedek ƒe ɖoƒe nu tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me . ”

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Wotsɔ ɖoɖo gba ̃ tɔ si wowɔ la da ɖe aga elabena egbɔdzɔ eye menyo na naneke o ,

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: elabena Mose ƒe Se la mate ŋu awɔ naneke wo ̀ ade blibo o , eye azɔ la , wohe mɔkpɔkpɔ yeye vɛ to esia dzi mi ́ ate ŋu ate ɖe Mawu ŋu kpokploe .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Mawu ƒe atamkaka kpe ɖe esiawo kata ̃ ŋu , ke ame bubuwo ya ɖua Osɔfo atamkakamanɔmee ,

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: ke Yesu ya ɖu Osɔfo to Mawu ƒe atamkaka me , elabena Mawu gblɔ nɛ bena , “ Aƒetɔ la ka atam eye matrɔ eƒe susu o , ‘ Wo ̀ la , Osɔfoe ne ̀ nye tegbetegbe . ’ ”

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Le atamkaka sia ta la , Yesu va zu nubabla si nyo wu sa ̃ a la ƒe kpeɖodzinu .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Vovototo bubu si le Osɔfo mawo kple Yesu domee nye be Osɔfo mawo sɔ gbɔ elabena woku eye womagate ŋu ayi woƒe dɔ dzi o

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: gake Yesu ya le agbe tegbetegbe . Seɖoƒe meli na eya ƒe Osɔfodɔ o .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Eya ta ŋuse ̃ le esi be wo ̀ aɖe ame siwo va Mawu gbɔ to eya amea dzi la blibo , elabena ele agbe tegbee le nya xɔm ɖe akɔ na wo .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Ekema Yesue nye Osɔfoga ̃ ma si kpɔa mi ́ aƒe hiahia ̃ wo gbɔ , ame si le kɔkɔe , kpɔtsɔtsɔ mele eŋu o , ame si le dzadzɛ , ame si woɖe ɖe aga tso nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo gbɔ eye wokɔe ɖe dzi gbɔ dziƒowo ŋui .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Mele abe Osɔfoga ̃ bubuwo ene o elabena mehia ̃ be wo ̀ asa vɔ gbe sia gbe , gba ̃ ɖe eya ŋutɔ ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta , eye evelia , ɖe ame bubuwo tɔ ta o . Esa vɔ ɖe woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta zi ɖeka hena ɣeyiɣiawo kata ̃ , esi wo ̀ tsɔ eɖokui hena .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Elabena Mose ƒe Se la tɔ asi ame siwo nye gbɔdzɔgbɔdzɔtɔwo la dzi be woanye Osɔfoga ̃ wo , ke Mawu ƒe atamkaka si va ɖe Sea yome la tɔ asi Via dzi , ame si wo ̀ wɔ wo ̀ de blibo tegbetegbe .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Nya siwo kata ̃ mi ́ egblɔ na mi la ƒe taƒonyae nye esi : bena Osɔfoga ̃ vava ̃ le mi ́ a si . Azɔ la ele dziƒo eye wo ̀ nɔ anyi ɖe bubuteƒe ga ̃ tɔ kekeake ,

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: eyae subɔna le gbedoxɔ vava ̃ tɔ si le dziƒo la me . Gbedoxɔ sia menye esi amegbetɔ tsɔ eƒe asi tui o , ke boŋ Aƒetɔ la ŋutɔe tui .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Esi wo ̀ nye Osɔfoga ̃ ɖe sia ɖe ƒe dɔ be woasa vɔ eye wo ̀ ana nuwo la , ele na Kristo ha ̃ be woana nane .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Nenye ɖe wo ̀ le anyigba dzi la , maɖu Osɔfo o elabena Osɔfowo li xoxo , ame siwo tsɔa nunanawo nana le Yudatɔwo ƒe se la nu .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Osɔfo siawo subɔna le Kɔkɔeƒe la , si nye esi le dziƒo la ƒe vɔvɔli ̃ . Esia tae , esi Mose be yeatu Agbadɔ le gbea dzi la , Mawu xlɔ ̃ nui be , “ Kpɔ egbɔ be na ̃ wɔ nu sia nu ɖe ɖoɖo si woɖe fia wo ̀ le toa dzi la nu . ”

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Ke Osɔfodɔ si wode asi na Yesu la , kɔ sa ̃ a wu wo tɔ eye abe ale si nubabla si ƒe avule ́ la wo ̀ nye la kɔ wu xoxotɔ sa ̃ a ene la , nenema kee woɖoe anyi ɖe ŋugbedodo siwo nyo wu tsa ̃ tɔwo la dzi .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Elabena nenye ɖe naneke megble ̃ le nubabla gbãtɔ ŋu o la , anye ne wometsɔ nubabla bubu ɖɔ lii o .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Ke Mawu ŋutɔ kpɔ vodada le eƒe dukɔ la ŋu eye wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Aƒetɔ la be , ŋkekewo li gbɔna esi dzi mabla nu yeye kple Israel kpakple Yuda ƒe aƒewo .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: Manɔ abe nu si mebla kple wo fofowo esi mele ́ woƒe alɔnu , kplɔ wo do goe le Egipte la ene o , elabena womewɔ nuteƒe le nu si mebla kpli wo la me o , eya ta nye ha ̃ metrɔ megbe de wo . Aƒetɔ lae gblɔe .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Azɔ la esiae nye nu si mabla kple Israel ƒe aƒe la , le ŋkeke siwo gbɔna la me . Aƒetɔ lae gblɔe . Matsɔ nye sewo ade woƒe susuwo me eye maŋlɔ wo ɖe woƒe dziwo ŋu . Manye woƒe Mawu eye woawo ha ̃ woanye nye dukɔ .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Ame aɖeke magafia nu ehavia alo afia nu nɔviaŋutsu agblɔ be , ‘ Dze si Aƒetɔ la ’ o , elabena wo kata ̃ woanyam tso ɖeviwo dzi va se ɖe tsitsiawo dzi .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Matsɔ woƒe nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔwɔwo ake wo eye nyemagaɖo ŋku woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo dzi o . ”

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Ke esi Mawu yɔ nubabla sia be “ Yeye ” la , ewɔ gba ̃ tɔ wo ̀ do xoxo eye nu si tsi , do xoxo la , nu ava yi kpuie .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Azɔ la , nubabla gba ̃ tɔ ɖo ɖoɖowo anyi na subɔsubɔ eye wotu anyigbadzi Kɔkɔeƒe ha ̃ .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Wotu Agbadɔ ; le Agbadɔ la ƒe xɔ gba ̃ tɔ me la , akaɖiti , kplɔ ̃ kple ŋkumeɖobolo nɔ anyi eye woyɔ teƒe sia be Kɔkɔeƒe .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Wotsɔ xɔmetsovɔ tso xɔ sia mee eye woyɔa teƒe si le xɔmetsovɔa megbe la be , Kɔkɔeƒewo ƒe Kɔkɔeƒe .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Nu siwo le xɔ sia mee nye Sikavɔsamlekpui kple aɖaka si woyɔna be Nubablaɖaka , wofa sika ɖe aɖaka sia ŋuti kpe ɖo . Le aɖaka sia me la , mi ́ akpɔ kpe eve siwo dzi woŋlɔ se ewoawo ɖo , eye sikakplu si me mana le la ha ̃ le aɖaka la me hekpe ɖe Arɔn ƒe atikplɔ si ƒo se la ŋuti .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Ŋutikɔkɔkɔe ƒe Kerubiwo nɔ Nubablaɖaka la tame eye wokeke woƒe aʋalawo ɖe teƒe si wotsɔa nu vɔ ̃ kena le . Ke mi ́ ate ŋu adzro nya siawo me ayi edzi fifia o .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Ne nu sia nu sɔ gbe vɔ la , Osɔfowo gena ɖe xɔ ŋgɔgbetɔ me ɖaa edzi edzi eye wowɔa mawusubɔsubɔdɔ .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Ke Osɔfoga ̃ ɖeka koe gena ɖe xɔ emetɔ me eye wo ̀ wɔa esia zi ɖeka ko le ƒe ɖeka me . Ne eyina la , megbea ʋu tsɔtsɔ ɖe asi o , ʋu si wo ̀ tsɔna saa vɔe , ɖe eya ŋutɔ kple dukɔ la ƒe nu vɔ ̃ siwo wowɔ le manyamanya me la ta .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe ɖee fia to esia dzi be womeklo nu le mɔ si yi Kɔkɔeƒe ƒe Kɔkɔeƒe la dzi haɖe o , zi ale si Agbadɔ gba ̃ tɔ la gale te nu ko .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Esiae nye nufiafia tso fifia ƒe ɣeyiɣiwo ŋuti esi le asi tɔm edzi be nunana kple vɔsa siwo wowɔna na Mawu la , mate ŋu aɖe vɔ ̃ ɖa le ame si le subɔsubɔ wɔm la ƒe susu me o .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Wonye nuɖuɖu , nunono kple ŋutikɔklɔ ƒe kɔnu vovovowo ko ƒe nya , esiwo nyegotadzesiwo ƒe ɖoɖowo , esiwo nɔ anyi va se ɖe esime ɖoɖo yeyea va .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Esi kristo va abe nu nyui siwo li xoxo ƒe Osɔfoga ̃ ene la , eto gbedoxɔ si lolo hede blibo wu la me , gbedoxɔ si wometsɔ asi tui o alo mi ́ agblɔ be menye nuwɔwɔ la ƒe akpa aɖe o .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Mege ɖe Kɔkɔeƒewo ƒe Kɔkɔeƒe la me to gbɔ ̃ wo kple nyiviwo ƒe ʋu me o , ke boŋ ege ɖe Kɔkɔeƒe ƒe Kɔkɔeƒe la me zi ɖeka hɔ ̃ hena ɣeyiɣiwo kata ̃ to eya ŋutɔ ƒe ʋu me , esia me wo ̀ to xɔ ɖeɖe mavɔ na mi ́ .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Nenye be gbɔ ̃ wo kple nyitsuwo ƒe ʋu kpakple nyiviwo ƒe afi si wohle ̃ ɖe ame siwo ŋuti mekɔ o la ŋu wɔnɛ be woƒe ŋuti kɔna le gotagome la ,

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: ekema geɖe wu Kristo , ame si to Gbɔgbɔ mavɔ la me tsɔ eɖokui na Mawu fɔɖiɖimanɔmee la , ƒe ʋu aklɔ mi ́ aƒe dzitsinyawo ŋuti tso nu siwo hea ku vɛ la me , ale be mi ́ ate ŋu asubɔ Mawu gbagbe la .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Le susu sia tae Kristo nye nubabla yeye la ƒe avule ́ la be ame siwo woyɔ la naxɔ domenyinyi mavɔ la ƒe ŋugbedodo . Azɔ la eku be wo ̀ azu fe xexeɖeta aɖe ame siwo wɔ nu vɔ ̃ le nubabla xoxoa te .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Afi si woŋlɔ domenyigbale ̃ da ɖi le la , ehi ̃ a be ame si ŋlɔ agbale ̃ sia naku hafi ,

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: elabena wowɔa domenyigbale ̃ a me nyawo ŋuti dɔ ne ame si ŋlɔe da ɖi la megava li o . Womewɔa domenyigbale ̃ me nyawo ŋuti dɔ ne ame si ŋlɔ agbale ̃ a la le agbe o .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Esia tae womewɔ nubabla gba ̃ tɔ me nyawo dzi ʋu manɔmee o .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Esi Mose ɖe gbeƒa ̃ se ɖe sia ɖe si le segbale ̃ a me na dukɔ la la , etsɔ nyiviwo ƒe ʋu , tsi , ɖetifufu dze ̃ kple ƒumekutsa eye wo ̀ tsɔe hle ̃ ʋu ɖe segbale ̃ kple dukɔ haho la ŋuti .

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: Tete wo ̀ gblɔ bena , “ Esia nye nubabla la ƒe ʋu , nubabla si Mawu de se na mi be miale ́ ɖe asi . ”

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Nenema ke wo ̀ hle ̃ ʋu ɖe agbadɔ la kple nu siwo kata ̃ ŋuti dɔ wowɔna le subɔsubɔ me la ŋuti .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Le nyateƒe me se la bia be woakɔ nu sia nu kloe ŋuti kple ʋu , eye newomekɔ ʋu ɖi o la nu vɔ ̃ tsɔtsɔke manɔ anyi o .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Eya ta ehi ̃ a kokoko be woakɔ nu siwo nye dziƒonuwo ƒe vɔvɔli ŋuti kple vɔsa siawo , gake woakɔ dziƒonuawo ŋutɔ ŋu kple vɔsa siwo de ŋgɔ wu esiawo .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Elabena Kristo meyi ɖe Kɔkɔeƒe si wowɔ kple asi la me esi nye dziƒotɔ ƒe vɔvɔli la me o , ke boŋ eyi ɖe dziƒotɔ la ŋutɔ me afi si wodo ɖe Mawu ŋkume le azɔ ɖe mi ́ a teƒe

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Nenema ke meyi ɖe dziƒo be wo ̀ atsɔ eɖokui ana zi geɖe abe ale si Osɔfoga ̃ la gena ɖe Kɔkɔeƒe ƒe Kɔkɔeƒe la ƒe sia ƒe kple ʋu si menye eya ŋutɔ tɔ o la ene o .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Ne ele alea la ele na Kristo be wo ̀ atsɔ eɖokui ana fukpekpe zi geɖe tso esi me ke woɖo xexea me gɔme anyi , gake azɔ la eva zi ɖeka hena ɣeyiɣiwo kata ̃ le ɣeyiɣi siawo ƒe nuwuwu be wo ̀ aɖe nu vɔ ̃ ɖa to eɖokui tsɔtsɔ savɔe me .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Abe ale si woɖoe na ame be wo ̀ aku zi ɖeka eye le esia megbe wo ̀ adze ŋgɔ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ ene la ,

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: nenema ke wotsɔ Kristo ha ̃ savɔe zi ɖeka be wo ̀ aɖe ame geɖewo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ ɖa eye agava zi evelia menye be wo ̀ agava ɖe nu vɔ ̃ ɖa o ke boŋ be wo ̀ ahe ɖeɖe vɛ na ame siwo kata ̃ le elalam .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Se la nye nu nyui siwo gbɔna la ƒe vɔvɔli ko eye menye nua ŋutɔwo o . Le susu sia ta la , vɔsa siwo wowɔna agbadre ƒe sia ƒe la , mate ŋu awɔ ame siwo va subɔnɛ la blibo gbeɖe o .
