text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Elabena Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkuwo le ame dzɔdzɔewo ŋu eye eƒe towo le te ɖe woƒe gbedodoɖa ŋu , ke Aƒetɔ la tsia tsitre ɖe ame siwo wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la ŋuti . ”

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Ame kae awɔ nu vevi mi ne mietsi dzi ɖe nu nyui wɔwɔ ŋu ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Ke ne miekpe fu le nu nyui wɔwɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ me la , woayra mi . “ Migavɔ ̃ nu si vɔ ̃ m wole o ; dzidzi ha ̃ megaƒo mi o . ”

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Ke le miaƒe dziwo me la , mina nɔƒe tɔxɛ Kristo abe Aƒetɔ kɔkɔe ene . Minɔ klalo ɣesiaɣi be miaɖo nya ŋu na ame sia ame si abia mi be miagblɔ nu si ta mɔkpɔkpɔ sia le mia si ɖo .

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: Ke miwɔ esia le ɖokuibɔbɔ kple bubu me , eye miaƒe dzitsinya me nakɔ keŋkeŋkeŋ , ale be ame siwo ƒoa nu vlo le mia ŋuti le agbe nyui si nɔm miele le Kristo me ta la , naɖu ŋukpe le woƒe ameŋugble ̃ nyawo ta .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Ne enye Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu la , enyo be woakpe fu le nu nyui wɔwɔ ta wu ɖe vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ta .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Elabena Kristo ku ɖe miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta zi ɖeka ame dzɔdzɔe , ɖe ame tovowo ta , be wo ̀ akplɔ mi ava Mawu gbɔe . Wowui le ŋutila ̃ me , ke wogbɔ agbee le Gbɔgbɔ me ,

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: to ame si dzi wo ̀ yi ɖagblɔ mawunya na gbɔgbɔ siwo le gaxɔ me ,

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: ame siwo se ̃ to le blema , le esime Mawu lala le dzigbɔɖi blibo me , le Noa ƒe ɣeyiɣiwo me , esi wo ̀ nɔ aɖakaʋua kpam . Ame ʋee aɖewo koe woɖe le tsiɖɔɖɔ la me , wo kata ̃ nɔ luʋɔ enyi .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Ke tsiɖɔɖɔ la nye mawutsideta si miexɔ hena ɖeɖekpɔkpɔ la ƒe dzesi eye menye ɖi kɔklɔ le ŋutigbale ̃ ŋue wo ̀ nye o , ke boŋ adzɔgbeɖeɖe be woatsɔ dzitsinya nyui atrɔ ɖe Mawu ŋui . Mawu sia ɖe mi to Yesu Kristo ƒe tsitretsitsi me ,

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: ame si yi ɖe dziƒo , ɖanɔ Mawu ƒe nuɖusime , eye mawudɔlawo , dziɖulawo kple ŋuse ̃ wo bɔbɔ wo ɖokui nɛ .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Eya ta , esi Kristo kpe fu le eƒe ŋutila ̃ me ta la , miawo ha ̃ mitsɔ nɔnɔme ma ke bla miaƒe aliwo dzii , elabena ame si kpe fu le eƒe ŋutila ̃ me la , kla ̃ ɖa tso nu vɔ ̃ gbɔ ,

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: elabena hena eƒe agbemeŋkeke mamlɛawo le anyigba dzi la , menɔa agbe le ŋutila ̃ ƒe nudzodzrowo nu o , ke boŋ ɖe Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu nu .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Tsa ̃ la , miegble ̃ ɣeyiɣi geɖe le nu siwo Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo wɔna la me , esiwo nye , ahi ̃ awɔwɔ , nudzodzro vɔ ̃ wo , ahatsunonowo , nuɖuɖu vivivo , aglotutu vɔ ̃ wo kple trɔ ̃ subɔsubɔ ŋunyɔtɔ .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Ewɔ moya na wo be miedo ɖi ɖe ŋunyɔnu ƒe tɔɖɔɖɔ sia me kpli wo o , eya ta woli kɔ dzudzu ɖe mia dzi gleglegle .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Ke ha ̃ la , ele na wo be woana akɔnta ame si le klalo be wo ̀ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu agbagbeawo kple kukuawo .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Susu sia tae wogblɔ nyanyui la na ame siwo ku va yi xoxo la ha ̃ , ale be , togbɔ be , le woƒe agbenɔnɔ le anyigbadzi me woto ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ si me amegbetɔ ɖe sia ɖe tona ha ̃ la , woate ŋu ava Mawu ƒe agbe la gbɔ le gbɔgbɔ me .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Nuwo kata ̃ ƒe nuwuwu ɖo vɔ . Eya ta minɔ mo xexi eye miɖu mia ɖokui dzi , ale be miate ŋu ado gbe ɖa .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Ƒo nuwo kata ̃ ta la , milɔ ̃ mia nɔewo vevie , elabena lɔlɔ ̃ tsyɔa nu vɔ ̃ ƒe agbɔsɔsɔ dzi .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Mixɔ mia nɔewo ɖe miaƒe aƒewo me liʋiliʋi ̃ lili ̃ manɔmee .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Mia dome ame sia ame natsɔ eƒe gbɔgbɔmenunana asubɔ ame bubuwoe , eye miama Mawu ƒe amenuveve la anukwaretɔe le mɔ vovovowo nu .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ne ame aɖe le nu ƒom la , neƒoe abe Mawu gbɔe nyawo tso ene . Ne ame aɖe le subɔsubɔm la , newɔe kple ŋuse ̃ si Mawu nɛ la kata ̃ ale be le nuwo kata ̃ me la woakafu Mawu to Yesu Kristo dzi . Eya tɔe nye ŋutikɔkɔe kple ŋuse ̃ tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me . Amen .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Nɔvi veviwo , migana fuwɔme ƒe dodokpɔ si me tom miele la nawɔ nuku na mi abe nane si medzɔ kpɔ o lae le mia dzi vam ene o .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: Ke mikpɔ dzidzɔ be mienye fukpekpe siwo me Kristo to la ƒe gomekpɔlawo , ale be miaƒe dzidzɔ nagba go ne woɖe eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe fia .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Ne wodzu mi le Kristo ƒe ŋkɔ ta la , woayra mi , elabena ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe Gbɔgbɔ sinye Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ la le mia dzi .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Ne miekpe fu la , migakpee abe hlɔ ̃ dola , fiafitɔ alo nu tovo wɔla aɖe loo , alo ame si dea nu ame bubuwo ƒe nya me la ene o .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Gake ne mia dometɔ aɖe akpe fu elabena enye kristotɔ la , ŋu megakpee o , ke boŋ neda akpe na Mawu be woyɔ ŋkɔ sia ɖe eŋu .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Elabena ɣeyiɣi de be ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ nadze egɔme tso Mawu ƒe ƒomea me ; ke ne edze gɔme tso mi ́ a dzi la , ekema ale ke woahanɔ na ame siwo meɖo to Mawu ƒe nyanyui la o ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Eye “ Nenye be bebli hafi dzɔdzɔetɔ akpɔ ɖeɖe la , ekema ale ke nɔge wo ̀ le na mawumavɔ ̃ lawo kple nu vɔ ̃ wɔlawo ? ”

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Eya ta , ame siwo kpea fu le Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu nu la , netsɔ wo ɖokui de asi na wo Wɔla nuteƒetɔ la eye woayi nyuiwɔwɔ dzi .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Nye , ame si nye hamemega ̃ , Kristo ƒe fukpekpewo ɖaseɖila kple ame si ha ̃ akpɔ gome le ŋutikɔkɔe si woaɖe fia la me la , le edom ɖe hamemega ̃ siwo le mia dome la gbɔ be ,

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: mianye Mawu ƒe ale ̃ ha si wotsɔ de miaƒe dzikpɔkpɔ te la ƒe kplɔlawo , mikpɔ wo ta , eye menye abe dɔdeasi ko ene o , ke boŋ kple dzidzɔ kpakple lɔlɔ ̃ nu nyui , abe ale si Mawu di tso mia si be miawɔe ene , menye kple ŋukekle ̃ ɖe ga ŋuti o , ke boŋ kple subɔsubɔ ƒe didi nyui ;

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: be miagaɖu tɔ ɖe hame si dzikpɔlawo woɖo mi la dzi o , ke boŋ mianye kpɔɖeŋu na ale ̃ ha la .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Ekema ne Ale ̃ kplɔlaga ̃ la ado la , miaxɔ ŋutikɔkɔefiakuku si ƒe kekle ̃ maklo akpɔ gbeɖe o .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Nenema ke mi ɖekakpuiwo , mibɔbɔ mia ɖokui na ame tsitsiwo . Mido ɖokuibɔbɔ abe awu ene na mia ɖokuiwo ale be miate ŋu asubɔ mia nɔewo , elabena , “ Mawu tsia tre ɖe dadalawo ŋu gake ekɔa eƒe amenuveve ɖe ɖokuibɔbɔlawo dzi . ”

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Eya ta , azɔ la mibɔbɔ mia ɖokuiwo ɖe Mawu ƒe asi sese ̃ la te , be ne ɣeyiɣi si woɖo la de la , wo ̀ akɔ mi ɖe dzi .

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: Mitsɔ miaƒe dzimaɖitsitsiwo kata ̃ da ɖe eya amea dzi , elabena eya amea le ́ a be na mi .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Miɖu mia ɖokuiwo dzi eye mianɔ ŋudzɔ . Miaƒe futɔ , Satana , le tsatsam abe dzata si le gbe tem , le nu dim ne wo ̀ avuvu la ene .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Minɔ te ɖe enu , minɔ tsitre sesi ̃ e le xɔse la me , elabena mienyae be mia nɔvi siwo le xexeame godoo la le fu mawo ke me tom .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Amenuveve kata ̃ ƒe Mawu la , ame si yɔ mi va eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe mavɔ la gbɔ le Kristo me , le fukpekpe sue aɖe ko megbe la , ŋutɔ aɖo mi te , ado ŋuse ̃ mi , ali ke mi eye wo ̀ aɖo mia gɔme anyi za ̃ .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Eya tɔ lanye ŋuse ̃ tso mavɔ me , yi mavɔ me . Amen .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Meŋlɔ nu kpui sia ɖo ɖe mi to nɔvi Sila , ame si mebu nɔvi nuteƒewɔla la ƒe kpekpeɖeŋu me , le ŋuse ̃ dom mi eye kple ɖaseɖiɖi be esiae nye Mawu ƒe amenuveve nyateƒe tɔ la . Minɔ te sesi ̃ e ɖe eme .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Mia nɔvi , sinye hame si le Babilonia , si wotia kpe ɖe mia ŋu la ɖo gbe na mi vevie , nenema ke vinye Marko ha ̃ do gbe na mi nyuie .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Mitsɔ lɔlɔ ̃ nugbugbɔ do gbe na mia nɔewo . Ŋutifafa na mi ame siwo kata ̃ le Kristo me .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: Simon Petro , Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔla kple apostolo , ŋlɔ na ame siwo to mi ́ aƒe Mawu kple Yesu Kristo ƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye me la ha ̃ xɔ xɔse si xɔ asi abe mi ́ a tɔ ene .

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Amenuveve kple ŋutifafa nanye mia tɔ le agbɔsɔsɔ blibo me to sidzedze Mawu kple Yesu mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la me .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Mawu ƒe ŋuse ̃ tsɔ nu sia nu si mi ́ ehi ̃ ana na agbe kple mawusosroɖa to mi ́ aƒe sidzedze eya amea me , ame si yɔ mi ́ to eya ŋutɔ ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe kple nyuiwɔwɔ me .

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: To esiawo me wo ̀ tsɔ eƒe nunana ga ̃ kple ŋugbedodo xɔasi na mi ́ , ale be to wo dzi mi ́ akpɔ gome le eƒe mawunyenye me eye mi ́ asi le gbegble ̃ si dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo he va xexeame la nu .

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: Le susu sia ta miɖe afɔ ɖe sia ɖe be miatsɔ nyuiwɔwɔ akpe ɖe miaƒe xɔse ŋu , sidzedze nakpe ɖe nyuiwɔwɔ ŋu ,

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: ɖokuidziɖuɖu nakpe ɖe sidzedzea ŋu , veviedodo nakpe ɖe ɖokuidziɖuɖu ŋu , mawumegbenɔnɔ nakpe ɖe veviedodo ŋu ;

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: dɔmenyonyo na havi nakpe ɖe mawumegbenɔnɔ ŋu eye lɔlɔ ̃ ha ̃ nakpe ɖe dɔmenyonyoa ŋu .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Elabena ne nɔnɔme siawo dzi ɖe edzi le mia me le agbɔsɔsɔ me la , woakpe ɖe mia ŋu be miaganye ŋutetemanɔŋutɔwo kple ame matsekuwo le miaƒe sidzedze mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo me o .

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: Ke ne nɔnɔme mawo mele ame aɖe me o la , enye ame si mekpɔa nu dea adzɔge o eye eƒe ŋkuwo gba ̃ eye wo ̀ ŋlɔ be , be woklɔ ye ŋu tso yeƒe tsa ̃ nu vɔ ̃ wo me .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Eya ta , nɔvinyewo , midze agbagba ɖe edzi wu tsa ̃ be miakpɔ kpeɖodzi na miaƒe yɔyɔ kple tiatia . Elabena ne miewɔ esiawo la , miada ƒu akpɔ o ,

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: eye miaxɔ dzadoname tɔxɛ le mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ kple Đela , Yesu Kristo ƒe fiaɖuƒe mavɔ la me .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Togbɔ be mienya nu siawo eye mieli ke le xɔse si su mia si fifia la me ha ̃ la , manɔ ŋku ɖom wo dzi na mi ɣesiaɣi .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Mesusu be zi ale si mele ŋutila ̃ ƒe agbadɔ sia me la enyo be manɔ ŋku ɖom nu dzi na mi ,

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: elabena menyae be , esusɔ vie maɖe agbadɔ sia ɖi , abe ale si mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo gblɔe nam kɔtee la ene .

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: Makpɔ egbɔ be , meɖe afɔ ɖe sia ɖe si mate ŋui be , ne meva dzo la , miaɖo ŋku nu siawo dzi ɣesiaɣi .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Menye gli siwo wokpa kple nunya la yome mi ́ edze esi mi ́ eƒo nu na mi tso mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe ŋuse ̃ kple eƒe vava ŋuti o , ke boŋ mi ́ enye eƒe ga ̃ nyenye ƒe atsyɔ si mi ́ ekpɔ kple ŋku la ƒe ɖasefowo .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Elabena exɔ bubu kple ŋutikɔkɔe tso Mawu , Fofo la gbɔ esi gbe aɖe ɖi tso eƒe Ga ̃ nyenye ƒe Ŋutikɔkɔe me , gblɔ bena , “ Ame siae nye Vinye si gbɔ nyemelɔ ̃ a nu le o , esi ŋu mekpɔa ŋudzedze le . ”

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: Mi ́ awo ŋutɔ mi ́ ese gbe sia esi wo ̀ ɖi tso dziƒo , esi mi ́ eli kpli le to kɔkɔe la dzi .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Ale mi ́ egakpɔ kpeɖodzi na nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe nyawo eya ta anye nu dzeame ne mieɖo to wo , elabena ele abe ale si kekeli kle ̃ na ɖe viviti mee ene , va se ɖe esime ŋkekea nava eye ŋukeɣletivi la nakle ̃ ɖe miaƒe dziwo me .

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: Gawu la , ele be miase egɔme be nyagblɔɖi aɖeke mele mawunya me , si va eme to nyagblɔɖila la ŋutɔ ƒe nyameɖeɖe me o .

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Elabena nyagblɔɖi ƒe dzɔtsoƒe metso amegbetɔ ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu me kpɔ o , ke boŋ ame xɔa gbe tso Mawu gbɔ abe ale si Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la kplɔ eya amea ene .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: Gake aʋatsonyagblɔɖilawo nɔ ameawo dome abe ale si aʋatsonufialawo anɔ miawo ha ̃ domee ene . Woahe nudadafiafiawo vɛ le adzame , woagbe nu gɔ ̃ ha ̃ le aƒetɔwo dzi Aƒetɔ si xɔ wo ƒle la gbɔ eye woahe gbegble ̃ ava woawo ŋutɔ ɖokui dzii kaba ŋutɔ .

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: Ame geɖewo adze woƒe ŋukpenanuwɔwɔwo yome eye woahe nyateƒe ƒe mɔ la ade nyahehe dzodzrowo me .

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: Nufiala siawo , le woƒe ŋukekle ̃ me atsɔ nya kpakpawo aɖe vi le mia ŋuti . Woƒe fɔbubu le ta dzi na wo tso blema ke eye woƒe gbegble ̃ medɔ alɔ ̃ o .

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Elabena ne Mawu mekpɔ nublanui na mawudɔlawo esi wowɔ nu vɔ ̃ o , ke boŋ eɖo wo ɖe dzomavɔ me , hede gawo ɖe ʋe globo do viviti me , be woanɔ afi ma va se ɖe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe ;

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: ne metsɔe ke blema xexemetɔwo o , ke boŋ wo ̀ na tsi ɖɔ hetsrɔ ̃ mawumavɔ ̃ la mawo , negbe dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe gbeƒa ̃ ɖela , Noa , kple ame adreawo koe wo ̀ ɖe ;

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: ne ebu fɔ Sodom kple Gomora duawo hena dzo fia wo wozu afi , eye wo ̀ tsɔ wo wɔ kpɔdzidzee na nu si adzɔ ɖe mawumavɔ ̃ lawo dzi ;

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: ne eɖe dzɔdzɔetɔ Lot , ame si semanɔsitɔ mawo ƒe agbe ƒaƒa ̃ nɔnɔ ti kɔ na ,

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: elabena esi ame dzɔdzɔe ma nɔ wo dome la , eƒe luʋɔ dzɔdzɔe la kpea fu gbe sia gbe ne ekpɔ eye wo ̀ se semanɔsigbe si nɔm ameawo le .

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: Ne ele alea la , ekema Aƒetɔ la nya ale si wo ̀ aɖe mawuvɔ ̃ lawo tso dodokpɔwo mee eye wo ̀ nya ale si wo ̀ ale ́ mawumavɔ ̃ lawoe , anɔ to hem na wo va se ɖe ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ŋkeke la dzi .

text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness , and despise government . Presumptuous are they , selfwilled , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities .
text2: Esia nye nyateƒe , vevietɔ na ame siwo dze nu vɔ ̃ ŋutila ̃ ƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo yome eye wodoa vlo kplɔlawo . Dzideƒo kple ɖokuiŋudzedze le ame siawo me ale gbegbe be , womevɔ ̃ na nya vlowo gbɔgblɔ ɖe dziƒo nuwo ŋu o .

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: Togbɔ be mawudɔlawo de ŋgɔ , he sese ̃ wu wo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la , wometsɔa ameŋugble ̃ nya tsoa nu gbagbe siawo nui le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkume o .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
text2: Gake ame siawo gblɔa busunya le nya siwo gɔme womese o la me . Wole abe la ̃ siwo si nunya mele o , nuwɔwɔ siwo wɔ nu ɖekematsɔlemetɔe kple la ̃ siwo wodzi ko be woale ́ wo eye woatsrɔ ̃ wo la ene . Eye abe la ̃ wo ene la , woawo ha ̃ atsrɔ ̃ .

text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness , as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time . Spots they are and blemishes , sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you ;
text2: Woaxe fe na wo kple nuveviwɔme , ɖe nu vevi si wowɔ amewo la ta . Woƒe susu le dzidzɔdoname ŋutie nye be woamu aha ŋdɔkutsu dzatsɛ , wonye ɖiƒoƒo kple kpɔtsɔtsɔ ga ̃ aɖe le miaƒe habɔbɔ la ŋu , elabena wotua aglo manyatalenuwo , evɔ la wonɔa anyi ɖe kplɔ ̃ ɖeka ŋu ɖua nu kpli mi .

text: Having eyes full of adultery , and that cannot cease from sin ; beguiling unstable souls : an heart they have exercised with covetous practices ; cursed children :
text2: Ahasiwɔwɔ xɔ ŋku dzi na wo eye womedzudzɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ gbeɖe o , wodɔna kple ame malikewo . Wobi ɖe ŋukekle ̃ me eye wonye dzidzime si dzi fiƒode le !

text: Which have forsaken the right way , and are gone astray , following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
text2: Wogble ̃ mɔ dzɔdzɔe la ɖi , hele ́ Beor vi , Balaam ƒe mɔ tsɔ , ame si lɔ ̃ vɔ ̃ ɖinyenye ƒe fetu .

text: But was rebuked for his iniquity : the dumb ass speaking with man ' s voice forbad the madness of the prophet .
text2: Ke tedzi , la ̃ maƒonu , tsɔ ame ƒe gbe ƒo nui nɛ , heka mo nɛ ɖe eƒe vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ ta , heɖo asi nyagblɔɖila la ƒe tsukunuwo wɔwɔ dzi .

text: These are wells without water , clouds that are carried with a tempest ; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever .
text2: Ŋutsu siawo le abe vudo siwo me tsi mele o kple afudodo si ahom lɔna ɖe nu la ene . Wodzra viviti tsiɖiɖiɖi ɖo ɖi na wo .

text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity , they allure through the lusts of the flesh , through much wantonness , those that were clean escaped from them who live in error .
text2: Elabena wotsɔa woƒe nu gblɔa nya dzodzro , siwo me dada le , wotsɔa nu vɔ ̃ ŋutila ̃ ƒe nudzodzro vɔ ̃ wo heblea ame siwo si le ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo nu fifi laa la nu .

text: While they promise them liberty , they themselves are the servants of corruption : for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he brought in bondage .
text2: Wodoa ablɔɖe ƒe ŋugbe na wo , esi woawo ŋutɔ nye kluviwo na anyidzedze , elabena ame nyea kluvi na nu sia nu si ɖu aƒetɔ ɖe eya amea dzi .

text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein , and overcome , the latter end is worse with them than the beginning .
text2: Nenye be wosi le gbegble ̃ si le xexeame nu , to sidzedze mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ kple Đela Yesu Kristo me , evɔ wogbugbɔ gabla wo ɖe numawo ke me , heɖu wo dzi la , woƒe nuwuwu avɔ ̃ ɖi wu ale si wonɔ le gɔmedzedzea me .

text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after they have known it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them .
text2: Anyo na wo be womanya dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe mɔ o , wu be woanyae eye woatrɔ megbe ade sedede kɔkɔe si wotsɔ de asi na wo .

text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb , The dog is turned to his own vomit again ; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire .
text2: Ame siawo la lododo siawo nye nyateƒe le wo ŋuti be , “ Avu trɔna gayia nu si wo ̀ dzɔ la gbɔ ” kple , “ Ha si wole tsi na la gayia eƒe ba bublu dzi ”

text: This second epistle , beloved , I now write unto you ; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance :
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , esia nye nye agbale ̃ evelia na mi . Meŋlɔ wo ame evea kata ̃ na mi be woanye ŋkuɖonudzi si ade dzo mia me be miaƒe tamesusuwo nanɔ blibo .

text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour :
text2: Medi be miaɖo ŋku nya siwo nyagblɔɖila kɔkɔewo gblɔ na mi va yi la dzi kple se si mi ́ a Aƒetɔ kple Đela de na mi to miaƒe apotolowo dzi .

text: Knowing this first , that there shall come in the last days scoffers , walking after their own lusts ,
text2: Gba ̃ la , ele be miase egɔme be , le ŋkeke mamlɛawo me la , fewuɖulawo ava , anɔ fewu ɖum eye woadze woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nudzodzro vɔ ̃ wo yome .

text: And saying , Where is the promise of his coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
text2: Woagblɔ bena , “ Afi kae eƒe ‘ vava ’ ƒe ŋugbedodo la le ? Elabena tso ɣeawoɣi ke mi ́ a fofowo ku la , nu sia nu le edzi yim abe ale si wo ̀ nɔ le gɔmedzedzea me ene . ”

text: For this they willingly are ignorant of , that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of the water and in the water :
text2: Ke woɖoe koŋ heŋlɔ be be , gbe aɖe gbe ʋi ̃ ke wotsɔ Mawu ƒe nya wɔ dziƒo eye wowɔ anyigba tso tsi me kple tsi .

text: Whereby the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
text2: To tsi sia ke dzi wotsrɔ ̃ xexeme si nɔ anyi ɣemaɣi le esi woxɔ beble dzi se ta .

text: But the heavens and the earth , which are now , by the same word are kept in store , reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men .
text2: To Mawu ƒe nya sia ke dzi wodzra fifi dziƒo kple anyigba ɖo na dzo , eye woɖoe da ɖi na ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ gbe la kple mawumavɔ ̃ lawo ƒe tsɔtsrɔ ̃ .

text: But , beloved , be not ignorant of this one thing , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
text2: Ke nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , migaŋlɔ nu ɖeka sia be o , ŋkeke ɖeka le Aƒetɔ la gbɔ le abe ƒe akpe ene eye nenema ke ƒe akpe le abe ŋkeke ɖeka ene .

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise , as some men count slackness ; but is longsuffering to us - ward , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
text2: Aƒetɔ la mele wɔwɔm blewublewu le eƒe ŋugbedodo la me abe ale si ame aɖewo se blewu gɔmee ene o . Egbɔ dzi ɖi na mi , elabena medi be ame aɖeke netsrɔ ̃ o , ke boŋ be amewo kata ̃ natrɔ dzime .

text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat , the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up .
text2: Ke Aƒetɔ ƒe ŋkeke la ava abe fiafitɔ ene . Dziƒowo nu ava yi kple gbeɖeɖe ga ̃ aɖe , woatsrɔ ̃ gɔmeɖonuwo kple dzo eye anyigba kple edzinuwo kata ̃ labi keŋkeŋkeŋ .

text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness ,
text2: Esi woatsrɔ ̃ nu sia nu alea la , ame ka ƒomeviwoe wo ̀ le be mianye ? Ele be mianɔ mawumegbe kple agbe kɔkɔe ,

text: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God , wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat ?
text2: esi miele mɔ kpɔm na Mawu ƒe ŋkeke la , hele du dom eƒe vava . Ŋkeke sia ƒe vava ana woatsrɔ ̃ dziƒowo kple dzo eye emenuwo alolo le dzoxɔxɔ la me .

text: Nevertheless we , according to his promise , look for new heavens and a new earth , wherein dwelleth righteousness .
text2: Ke le eƒe ŋugbedodo la nu , mi ́ ele mɔ kpɔm na dziƒo yeye kple anyigba yeye , afi si anye dzɔdzɔenyenye nɔƒe .

text: Wherefore , beloved , seeing that ye look for such things , be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace , without spot , and blameless .
text2: Eya ta , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , esi miele mɔ kpɔm na esia la , miɖe afɔ ɖe sia ɖe si miate ŋui la , be woakpɔ mi ɖi maƒomaƒoe , mokakamanɔŋutɔe eye mianɔ ŋutifafa me kplii .

text: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation ; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you ;
text2: Nenɔ susume na mi be , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ la ƒe dzigbɔɖi nye miaƒe ɖeɖe , abe ale si mi ́ a nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ Paulo ŋlɔ na mi kple nunya si Mawu nɛ la ene .

text: As also in all his epistles , speaking in them of these things ; in which are some things hard to be understood , which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest , as they do also the other scriptures , unto their own destruction .
text2: Eŋlɔ nu alea le eƒe agbale ̃ wo kata ̃ me eye wo ̀ ƒoa nu tso nu siawo kata ̃ ŋu . Nanewo le eƒe agbale ̃ awo me ƒe gɔmesese sese ̃ , esi ame manyanuwo kple ame malikewo blua afɔ na , abe ale si wowɔna na mawunya bubuwo ha ̃ ene , hena woawo ŋutɔ ƒe tsɔtsrɔ ̃ .

text: Ye therefore , beloved , seeing ye know these things before , beware lest ye also , being led away with the error of the wicked , fall from your own stedfastness .
text2: Eya ta nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ wo , esi mienya esia xoxo la , minɔ ŋudzɔ be ame gble ̃ kuwo ƒe nu tovo wɔwɔ magakplɔ mi adzoe , be miage le teƒe si mieli ke ɖo la o .

text: But grow in grace , and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . To him be glory both now and for ever . Amen .
text2: Ke mitsi le amenuveve kple sidzedze mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ kple Đela Yesu Kristo me . Eya ko tɔ lanye ŋutikɔkɔe tso fifia yi ɖe mavɔmavɔ me ! Amen .

text: That which was from the beginning , which we have heard , which we have seen with our eyes , which we have looked upon , and our hands have handled , of the Word of life ;
text2: Nu si li tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedze ke , nu si ŋkɔ mi ́ ese eye mi ́ ekpɔ . Nu si mi ́ ekpɔ kɔtee kple mi ́ aƒe ŋkuwo , eye mi ́ awo ŋutɔ mi ́ eka asi eŋu la , eya ƒe nya mi ́ ele gbeƒa ̃ ɖem na mi be , eyae nye Agbenya la .

text: ( For the life was manifested , and we have seen it , and bear witness , and shew unto you that eternal life , which was with the Father , and was manifested unto us ; )
text2: Agbe sia do , mi ́ ekpɔe , mi ́ eɖia ɖase le eŋuti eye mi ́ eɖea gbeƒa ̃ agbe mavɔ si le Fofoa gbɔ eye wo ̀ dze na mi ́ la na mi .

text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you , that ye also may have fellowship with us : and truly our fellowship is with the Father , and with his Son Jesus Christ .
text2: Mi ́ eɖea gbeƒa ̃ nu si mi ́ ekpɔ kple nu si mi ́ ese la , na mi bene miawo ha ̃ miado fome kpli mi ́ . Eye mi ́ aƒe ƒomedodo sia li kple Fofo la kple Via Yesu Kristo . "

text: And these things write we unto you , that your joy may be full .
text2: Mi ́ ele esia ŋlɔm ɖo ɖe mi be miaƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ nade blibo .

text: This then is the message which we have heard of him , and declare unto you , that God is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
text2: Azɔ la , esia nye gbedeasi si mi ́ ese tso egbɔ eye mi ́ ele gbeƒa ̃ ɖemi na mi be , “ Mawue nye kekeli eye viviti aɖeke mele eme kura o . ”

text: If we say that we have fellowship with him , and walk in darkness , we lie , and do not the truth :
text2: Ne mi ́ egblɔ be mi ́ ebɔa ha kplii gake mi ́ egale viviti me zɔm la , ekema mi ́ enye alakpatɔwo eye mi ́ ele nyateƒe la dzi wɔm o .

text: But if we walk in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship one with another , and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin .
text2: Ke ne mi ́ ezɔ le kekeli me abe ale si eya ha ̃ le , kekeli me ene la ekema mi ́ ebɔ ha kple mi ́ a nɔewo eye Yesu Kristo si nye Via , ƒe ʋu aklɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ ɖe sia ɖe ɖa le mi ́ a ŋuti .

text: If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
text2: Ne mi ́ egblɔ be nu vɔ ̃ mele mi ́ a ŋuti o la , ekema mi ́ ele mi ́ a ɖokuiwo blem eye nyateƒea mele mi ́ a me o .

text: If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
text2: Gake ne mi ́ eʋu mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me la ekema Mawu si nye nuteƒewɔla kple dzɔdzɔetɔ la atsɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ake mi ́ eye wo ̀ aklɔ madzɔmadzɔnyenye kata ̃ ɖa le mi ́ a ŋuti .

text: If we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
text2: Ne mi ́ ele gbɔgblɔm kokoko be mi ́ ewɔ nu vɔ ̃ o la ekema mi ́ edo eya amea alakpatɔe eye eƒe nya mexɔ aƒe ɖe mi ́ a me o .

text: My little children , these things write I unto you , that ye sin not . And if any man sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous :
text2: Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo mele esia ŋlɔm ɖo ɖe mi be miagawɔ nu vɔ ̃ o . Gake ne ame aɖe wɔ nu vɔ ̃ la , Yesu Kristo si nye Kɔkɔetɔ la , li na mi ́ eye aƒo nu aʋli mi ́ a ta le Fofo la gbɔ .

text: And he is the propitiation for our sins : and not for ours only , but also for the sins of the whole world .
text2: Eyae nye avule ́ vɔsa ɖe mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta , eye menye mi ́ awo ɖeɖe ko tɔ tae o , ke boŋ ɖe xexeame blibo la ƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ha ̃ tae .

text: And hereby we do know that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
text2: Ne mi ́ ewɔ ɖe eƒe sewo dzi la ekema kakaɖedzi le mi ́ a si be mi ́ enyae vava ̃ .

text: He that saith , I know him , and keepeth not his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
text2: Ame si agblɔ be “ Menyae , ” gake mewɔ ɖe eƒe sededewo dzi o la , ame ma nye alakpatɔ eye nyateƒe mele eme o .

text: But whoso keepeth his word , in him verily is the love of God perfected : hereby know we that we are in him .
text2: Gake ne ame aɖe wɔa eƒe nya dzi la , Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ de blibo le eya amea me vava ̃ . Eye aleae mi ́ awɔ anya be mi ́ ele eya amea me :

text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk , even as he walked .
text2: ame si gblɔ be yele eya amea me la , nanɔ agbe abe ale si Yesu ha ̃ nɔ agbee ene .

text: Brethren , I write no new commandment unto you , but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , nyemele se yeye aɖeke ŋlɔm na mi le agbale ̃ sia me o , ke boŋ , se xoxo ma si nɔ anyi tso gɔmedzedzea me la koe . Sedede xoxo siae nye gbedeasi si miese xoxo .

text: Again , a new commandment I write unto you , which thing is true in him and in you : because the darkness is past , and the true light now shineth .
text2: Ke ha ̃ la , mele se yeye aɖe ŋlɔm ɖo ɖe mi , si ƒe nyateƒe le dzedzem le miawo kple eya amea me xoxo , elabena viviti la le bubum eye kekeli vava ̃ la le kekle ̃ m xoxo .

text: He that saith he is in the light , and hateth his brother , is in darkness even until now .
text2: Ne ame aɖe agblɔ be yele kekeli la me gake wo ̀ le ́ a fu nɔvia la , ekema ame sia gale viviti me kokoko .

text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light , and there is none occasion of stumbling in him .
text2: Ame si lɔ ̃ a nɔvia la , ƒe agbenɔnɔ nye kekeli eye naneke mele eƒe agbe me si ana be woakli nu o .

text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness , and walketh in darkness , and knoweth not whither he goeth , because that darkness hath blinded his eyes .
text2: Gake ne ame aɖe le ́ fu nɔvia la , ekema ame sia le viviti me eye wo ̀ zɔna le viviti me menya afi si wo ̀ ɖo tae o elabena viviti la tsyɔ mo nɛ .

text: I write unto you , little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name ' s sake .
text2: Meŋlɔe na mi , vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , Elabena wotsɔ miaƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ke mi Le eƒe ŋkɔ la ta .

text: I write unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I write unto you , young men , because ye have overcome the wicked one . I write unto you , little children , because ye have known the Father .
text2: Meŋlɔe na mi , fofowo , Elabena mienya eya ame si Nɔ anyi tso gɔmedzedzea me ke . Meŋlɔe na mi , ɖekakpuiwo , Elabena mieɖu vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la dzi Meŋlɔe na mi , vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , Elabena mienya Fofo la .

text: I have written unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I have written unto you , young men , because ye are strong , and the word of God abideth in you , and ye have overcome the wicked one .
text2: Meŋlɔe na mi , fofowo , Elabena mienya eya ame si Nɔ anyi tso gɔmedzedzea me ke Meŋlɔe na mi , ɖekakpuiwo , Elabena miese ̃ ŋu , Mawu ƒe nya la le mia me Eye mieɖu vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la dzi .

text: Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
text2: Migalɔ ̃ xexeame kple nu siwo le eme la o . Ne ame aɖe lɔ ̃ xexeame la ekema melɔ ̃ a Fofo la o .

text: For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father , but is of the world .
text2: Elabena nu sia nu si le xexeame la metso Fofo la gbɔ o ke boŋ etso xexeame . Nu siawoe nye , amegbetɔ nu vɔ ̃ wɔla ƒe didi vivivowo , eƒe ŋkubiabia ̃ , kple amegbetɔ ƒe dada ɖe nu siwo le esi la dzi .

text: And the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever .
text2: Xexeame kple eƒe didiwo nu ava yi gake ame si wɔa Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu la nɔa agbe tegbee .

text: Little children , it is the last time : and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come , even now are there many antichrists ; whereby we know that it is the last time .
text2: Vi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mi ́ ege ɖe gaƒoƒo mamlɛtɔ me : eye abe ale si miese xoxo be Kristo ƒe futɔ la gbɔna vava ge ene la , fifi laa la , Kristo ƒe futɔ geɖewo va ɖo xoxo . Esiae na be mi ́ enya be gaƒoƒo alo ɣeyiɣi mamlɛtɔ ɖo .

text: They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would no doubt have continued with us : but they went out , that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us .
text2: Wodo go dzo le mi ́ a dome , gake le nyateƒe me la womenɔ mi ́ a dome le woƒe dziwo me o . Nenye mi ́ a dometɔ wonye vava ̃ la anye ne wotsi anyi , eye womedzo le mi ́ a gbɔ o . Woƒe dzodzo fia kɔtee be wo dometɔ aɖeke menɔ mi ́ a dzi o .

text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One , and ye know all things .
text2: Ke miawo la , Kɔkɔetɔ la ƒe amisisi le mia dzi eye mia dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nya nyateƒe la .

text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
text2: Nyemeŋlɔ ɖo ɖe mi esi mienya nyateƒe la ta o , ke boŋ be mienya nyateƒe la , elabena alakpa mate ŋu ado tso nyateƒe me o .

text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ ? He is antichrist , that denieth the Father and the Son .
text2: Ame kae nye aʋatsokala la ? Ame si gblɔ be menye Yesue nye Mesia alo ɖela la o lae . Ame sia enye Yesu ƒe futɔ la si gbea nu le Fofo la kple Vi la gbɔ .

text: Whosoever denieth the Son , the same hath not the Father : ( but ) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also .
text2: Ame si gbe nu le Vi la gbɔ la , menya Fofo la ha ̃ o ; ke ame si xɔ Vi la la , eya amea xɔ Fofo la ha ̃ .

text: Let that therefore abide in you , which ye have heard from the beginning . If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you , ye also shall continue in the Son , and in the Father .
text2: Ke miawo la , mikpɔ egbɔ be miele ́ nu si miese tso gɔmedzedzea me la ɖe asi . Ne miewɔ esia la ekema miayi dzi anɔ Vi la kple Fofo la me .

text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us , even eternal life .
text2: Eye nu si ƒe ŋugbe wo ̀ do na mi ́ la enye agbe mavɔ la .

text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you .
text2: Mele nu siawo ŋlɔm ɖo ɖe mi tso ame siwo le agbagba dzem be yewoahe mi ayi mɔtatra dzii la ŋu . "

text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you , and ye need not that any man teach you : but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things , and is truth , and is no lie , and even as it hath taught you , ye shall abide in him .
text2: Ke miawo la , amisisi si miexɔ tso egbɔ la , nɔa mia me eye megahi ̃ a be ame aɖeke nafia nu mi o , elabena eƒe amisisi la fiaa nu mi tso nuwo kata ̃ ŋuti eye esi amisisi sia nye nyateƒetɔ eye menye aʋatsotɔ o ta la , minɔ eya amea me , abe ale si wo ̀ fia mi ene .

text: And now , little children , abide in him ; that , when he shall appear , we may have confidence , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
text2: Azɔ la vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo minɔ agbe le eya amea me elabena kakaɖedzi anɔ mi ́ a si eye ŋu makpe mi ́ le eŋkume le eƒe vava ŋkekea dzi o .

text: If ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him .
text2: Ne mienyae be enye dzɔdzɔetɔ la akema ame sia ame si wɔa nu dzɔdzɔe la nye via . "

text: Behold , what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us , that we should be called the sons of God : therefore the world knoweth us not , because it knew him not .
text2: Mikpɔ ale si gbegbe Fofo la lɔ ̃ a mi ́ ɖa be woayɔ mi ́ be Mawu viwo . Nyateƒe , Mawu viwoe mi ́ enye . Nu si ta xexemetɔwo menya mi ́ o lae nye be womenya eya amea o .

text: Beloved , now are we the sons of God , and it doth not yet appear what we shall be : but we know that , when he shall appear , we shall be like him ; for we shall see him as he is .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ wo , fifia mi ́ enye Mawu viwo , ke mi ́ enya nu si mi ́ ava nye etsɔmegbe la haɖe o . Gake mi ́ enya be ne Kristo va la mi ́ anɔ abe eya amea ene elabena mi ́ akpɔe abe ale si wo ̀ le tututu ene .

text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
text2: Ame siwo kata ̃ le mɔkpɔkpɔ me alea la wɔa wo ɖokuiwo dzadze abe ale si eya ha ̃ le dzadze ene .

text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law : for sin is the transgression of the law .
text2: Ame sia ame si wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la da sea dzi , le nyateƒe me la , nu vɔ ̃ enye sedzimawɔmawɔ .

text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins ; and in him is no sin .
text2: Ke ele nyanya me na mi be ɖe wo ̀ va be yeatsɔ mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ayii . Nu vɔ ̃ aɖeke mele eya ŋutɔ ƒe agbe me o .

text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither known him .
text2: Ne ame aɖe le agbe le eya amea me la , amea meganɔa nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi atraɖii o . Ne ame aɖe ganɔa nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi edziedzi la , ekema ame sia mekpɔe o loo alo nyae o .

text: Little children , let no man deceive you : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
text2: Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , migana ame aɖeke nable mi ne miatra mɔ o . Ame si wɔa nu nyui la enye ame dzɔdzɔe abe ale si eya ha ̃ le dzɔdzɔe ene .

text: He that committeth sin is of the devil ; for the devil sinneth from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
text2: Ame si wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la nye Abosam ƒe ame elabena Abosam le nu vɔ ̃ wɔm tso gɔmedzedzea me ke . Nu si ta Mawu ƒe Vi la va enye be wo ̀ agble ̃ Abosam ƒe nuwɔwɔwo .

text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin ; for his seed remaineth in him : and he cannot sin , because he is born of God .
text2: Ame si wodzi le Mawu me la meganɔa nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi o , elabena Mawu ƒe kutsetse le eme . Mate ŋu awɔ nu vɔ ̃ o elabena wodzii tso Mawu me .

text: In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil : whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God , neither he that loveth not his brother .
text2: To esia me mi ́ edea vovototo Mawu viwo kple Abosam viwo dome . Ame si mewɔa nu si le eteƒe o la menye Mawu vi o . Nenema ke ame si melɔ ̃ a nɔvia o la menye Mawu vi o .

text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another .
text2: Esia enye gbedeasi si miese tso gɔmedzedzea , bena ele be mi ́ alɔ ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo . Miganɔ abe Kain ene o . Le esi wo ̀ nye Abosam ƒe ame ta la , ewu nɔvia . Nu ka ta wo ̀ wu nɔvia ? Elabena , eƒe wɔnawo vɔ ̃ ɖi , ke nɔvia ƒe wɔnawo le dzɔdzɔe .

text: Marvel not , my brethren , if the world hate you .
text2: Nɔvinyewo ne xexeame le ́ fu mi la megawɔ nuku na mi kura o .

text: We know that we have passed from death unto life , because we love the brethren . He that loveth not his brother abideth in death .
text2: Mi ́ enya be mi ́ eto ku me yi agbe me elabena mi ́ elɔ ̃ a mi ́ a nɔewo . Ame si melɔ ̃ a ame o la , gale ku ƒe asime .

text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
text2: Ame si ke le ́ a fu nɔvia la nye amewula eye ele nyanya me na mi be agbe mavɔ meli na amewula aɖeke o .

text: Hereby perceive we the love of God , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
text2: Ale si Yesu Kristo va ku ɖe mi ́ a ta la , ɖe nu si lɔlɔ ̃ nye la fia mi ́ . Eya ta ele be mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ atsɔ mi ́ aƒe agbe aɖo anyi na mi ́ a nɔviwo .

text: But whoso hath this world ' s good , and seeth his brother have need , and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him , how dwelleth the love of God in him ?
text2: Ne xexemenuwo le ame aɖe si fu ̃ u eye wo ̀ kpɔ nɔvia aɖe si nye hia ̃ tɔ eye mekpɔ nublanui nɛ o la ale ke woate ŋu akpɔ Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ le eme ?

text: My little children , let us not love in word , neither in tongue ; but in deed and in truth .
text2: Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo migana mi ́ alɔ ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo kple nya alo kple aɖe ɖeɖe ko o , ke boŋ kple nuwɔna eye le nyateƒe me .

text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our hearts before him .
text2: Ekema esia nye ale si mi ́ enyana be mi ́ enye nyateƒe la tɔ , kple ale si mi ́ eɖea dzi ɖi le eŋkume .

text: For if our heart condemn us , God is greater than our heart , and knoweth all things .
text2: Ɣesiaɣi si mi ́ aƒe dzitsinya bu fɔ mi ́ elabena Mawu lolo wu mi ́ aƒe dziwo eye wo ̀ nya nu sia nu .

text: Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , then have we confidence toward God .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , ne mi ́ aƒe dziwo mebu fɔ mi ́ o la , dzideƒo le mi ́ a si le Mawu ŋkume

text: And whatsoever we ask , we receive of him , because we keep his commandments , and do those things that are pleasing in his sight .
text2: eye nu sia nu si mi ́ abiae la mi ́ akpɔe elabena mi ́ ewɔ eƒe sewo dzi eye mi ́ ewɔ nu si dzea eŋu .

text: And this is his commandment , That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love one another , as he gave us commandment .
text2: Eƒe sedede nye esia bena mi ́ axɔ via Yesu Kristo dzi ase , eye mi ́ alɔ ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo abe ale si wo ̀ de se na mi ́ ene .

text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him , and he in him . And hereby we know that he abideth in us , by the Spirit which he hath given us .
text2: Ame siwo wɔa ɖe eƒe sewo dzi la nɔa agbe le eme eye eya ha ̃ nɔa wo me . Eye aleae mi ́ enyana be ele agbe le mi ́ a me : Mi ́ enyae to Gbɔgbɔ si wo ̀ na mi ́ la dzi .

text: Beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of God : because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo , migaxɔ gbɔgbɔ ɖe sia ɖe ko dzi se o , ke boŋ mido gbɔgbɔwo kpɔ be wotso Mawu gbɔ ha ̃ . Elabena aʋatsonyagblɔɖila geɖewo kaka ɖe xexeame .

text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God :
text2: Ale miatsɔ dze si Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔe nye si : Gbɔgbɔ ɖe sia ɖe si ɖe gbeƒa ̃ be Yesu Kristo va le ŋutila ̃ me la , tso Mawu gbɔ .

text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God : and this is that spirit of antichrist , whereof ye have heard that it should come ; and even now already is it in the world .
text2: Ke Gbɔgbɔ ɖe sia ɖe si meɖea gbeƒa ̃ Yesu Kristo o la metso Mawu gbɔ o . Esiae nye Kristo ƒe futɔ ƒe gbɔgbɔ si miese be egbɔna eye fifia gɔ ̃ ha ̃ la ele xexeame xoxo .

text: Ye are of God , little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you , than he that is in the world .
text2: Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , miawo ya la mienye Mawu viwo eye mieɖu aʋatsonyagblɔɖila siawo dzi ; elabena Gbɔgbɔ si le mia me la tri akɔ wu esi le xexeame .

text: They are of the world : therefore speak they of the world , and the world heareth them .
text2: Wotso xexeame , eya ta woƒoa nu le xexeame ƒe nugɔmesese nu , eye xexeame ɖoa to wo .

text: We are of God : he that knoweth God heareth us ; he that is not of God heareth not us . Hereby know we the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
text2: Mi ́ awo ya mi ́ etso Mawu gbɔ eye ame sia ame si nya Mawu la , ɖoa to mi ́ ; ke ame si metso Mawu gbɔ o la meɖoa to mi ́ o . Esiae na mi ́ edzea si Nyateƒegbɔgbɔ kple aʋatsogbɔgbɔ .

text: Beloved , let us love one another : for love is of God ; and every one that loveth is born of God , and knoweth God .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ wo , mina mi ́ alɔ ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo elabena Mawu gbɔe lɔlɔ ̃ tsona . Ame sia ame si lɔ ̃ a ame la wodzi tso Mawu me eye wo ̀ nya Mawu .

text: He that loveth not knoweth not God ; for God is love .
text2: Ame si melɔ ̃ a ame o la , menya Mawu o elabena Mawu nye lɔlɔ ̃ .

text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us , because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world , that we might live through him .
text2: Ale si Mawu ɖe eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ fia le mi ́ a dome lae nye ; eɖo via ɖeka hɔ ̃ ɔ ɖe xexeame be mi ́ anɔ agbe to eya amea me .

text: Herein is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
text2: Esia enye lɔlɔ ̃ vava ̃ , menye mi ́ awoe lɔ ̃ Mawu o , ke boŋ le eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ na mi ́ ta wo ̀ ɖo Via ɖa abe avule ́ vɔsa le mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo ta ene .

text: Beloved , if God so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔwo , le ale si Mawu lɔ ̃ mi ́ ta la ele be mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ alɔ ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo .

text: No man hath seen God at any time . If we love one another , God dwelleth in us , and his love is perfected in us .
text2: Ame aɖeke mekpɔ Mawu kpɔ o , ke ne mi ́ elɔ ̃ mi ́ a nɔewo la , Mawu ƒe Gbɔgbɔ le mi ́ a me eye eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ ade blibo le mi ́ a me .

text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him , and he in us , because he hath given us of his Spirit .
text2: Mi ́ enyae bena mi ́ ele agbe le eya amea me eye eya ha ̃ le mi ́ a me , elabena etsɔ eƒe Gbɔgbɔ de mi ́ a me .

text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
text2: Mi ́ ekpɔe eye mi ́ eɖi ɖase be Fofo la ɖo Via ɖa be wo ̀ anye xexeame ƒe Đela .

text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God dwelleth in him , and he in God .
text2: Ame sia ame si aɖe gbeƒa ̃ be Yesue nye Mawu Vi la la , Mawu le eya amea me eye eya ha ̃ le Mawu me .

text: Herein is our love made perfect , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment : because as he is , so are we in this world .
text2: Esi wo ̀ wɔ mi ́ aƒe lɔlɔ ̃ wo ̀ de blibo le mi ́ a dome ale be dzideƒo nanɔ mi ́ a si le ʋɔnudrɔ ̃ ŋkekea dzi , elabena mi ́ aƒe agbenɔnɔ le xexe sia me sɔ kple etɔ .

text: There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casteth out fear : because fear hath torment . He that feareth is not made perfect in love .
text2: Vɔ ̃ vɔ aɖeke menɔa lɔlɔ ̃ me o ke boŋ lɔlɔ ̃ vava ̃ tɔ nyaa vɔvɔ ̃ kata ̃ ɖa . Elabena vɔvɔ ̃ ku ɖe tohehe ŋu . Ame si vɔ ̃ na la ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ mede blibo o .

text: We love him , because he first loved us .
text2: Mi ́ elɔa mi ́ a nɔewo elabena Mawu tre mi ́ lɔlɔ ̃ .

text: If a man say , I love God , and hateth his brother , he is a liar : for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen , how can he love God whom he hath not seen ?
text2: Ne ame aɖe ƒo adegbe be , “ Melɔ ̃ Mawu , ” ke wo ̀ le ́ a fu nɔvia la , enye alakpatɔ elabena ame sia ame si melɔ ̃ a nɔvia , ame si kpɔm wo ̀ le o la , mate ŋu alɔ ̃ Mawu ame si mekpɔ o .

text: And this commandment have we from him , That he who loveth God love his brother also .
text2: Mawu ŋutɔ de se na mi ́ be , Ame si lɔ ̃ a Mawu la nelɔ ̃ nɔvia ha ̃ .

text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God : and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
text2: Ame sia ame si xɔe se be Yesue nye Kristo la la , wodzii tso Mawu me , eye ame sia ame si lɔ ̃ a Fofo la la , lɔ ̃ a Via ha ̃ .

text: By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God , and keep his commandments .
text2: Esiae nye ale si mi ́ enyana be mi ́ elɔ ̃ a Mawu Viwo ; to Mawu lɔ ̃ lɔ kple eƒe seawo dziwɔwɔ me .

text: For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
text2: Esiae nye lɔlɔ ̃ na Mawu ; be woawɔ eƒe seawo dzi eye eƒe sewo mesese ̃ o .

text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world : and this is the victory that overcometh the world , even our faith .
text2: Elabena ame si wodzi le Mawu me la , ɖu xexeame dzi . Mi ́ aƒe xɔsee nye nu si ɖu xexeame dzi .

text: Who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God ?
text2: Ame kae nye ame si ɖu xexeame dzi ? Ame si xɔe se be Yesue nye Mawu Vi , la koe .

text: This is he that came by water and blood , even Jesus Christ ; not by water only , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit that beareth witness , because the Spirit is truth .
text2: Yesu Kristo enye ame si va to tsi kple ʋu me . Meva to tsi me ɖeɖe ko o , ke boŋ to tsi kple ʋu me . Eye Gbɔgbɔ lae le ɖase ɖim le nu sia ŋu elabena Gbɔgbɔ lae nye nyateƒe la .

text: For there are three that bear record in heaven , the Father , the Word , and the Holy Ghost : and these three are one .
text2: Ame etɔ ̃ e le ɖase ɖim ,

text: And there are three that bear witness in earth , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and these three agree in one .
text2: woawoe nye Gbɔgbɔ la , Tsi la kple Ʋu la , eye wo kata ̃ ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi le ɖeka .

text: If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater : for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son .
text2: Mi ́ exɔa amegbetɔwo ƒe ɖaseɖiɖiwo , ke Mawu ƒe ɖase si wo ̀ ɖi le Via ŋu la de ŋgɔ sa ̃ a wu esiawo .

text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself : he that believeth not God hath made him a liar ; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son .
text2: Eya ta ame sia ame si xɔa Mawu Vi la dzi sena la , ɖia ɖase le eƒe dzi me . Eye ame si mexɔa Mawu dzi se o la ewɔ Mawu aʋatsokalae elabena mexɔ ɖase si Mawu ɖi le Via ŋu la dzi se o .

text: And this is the record , that God hath given to us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
text2: Nya lae nye si be Mawu na agbe mavɔ mi ́ eye agbe mavɔ sia le Via me .

text: He that hath the Son hath life ; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life .
text2: Ame si si Vi la le la agbe le esi ; eye ame si si Mawu Vi la mele o la agbe mele esi o .

text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God ; that ye may know that ye have eternal life , and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God .
text2: Mele nu siawo ŋlɔm ɖo ɖe mi ame siwo xɔ Mawu Vi la ƒe ŋkɔ dzi se la ale be mianya be agbe mavɔ le mia si .

text: And this is the confidence that we have in him , that , if we ask any thing according to his will , he heareth us :
text2: Kakaɖedzi sia le mi ́ a si le tete ɖe Mawu ŋu me be , ne mi ́ ebia nu si sɔ ɖe eƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nu dzi la eɖoa to mi ́ .

text: And if we know that he hear us , whatsoever we ask , we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him .
text2: Eye ne mi ́ enyae be eɖoa to mi le , nu sia nu si mi ́ ebia me la , mi ́ enyae be mi ́ aƒe asi su nu si mi ́ ebiae la dzi .

text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death , he shall ask , and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death . There is a sin unto death : I do not say that he shall pray for it .
text2: Ne ame aɖe kpɔ be ye nɔvi wɔ nu vɔ ̃ si ƒe fetu menye ku o la , nedo gbe ɖa ale be Mawu naxɔe ɖe agbe . Esia ku ɖe ame siwo ƒe nu vɔ ̃ mehea ku vanɛ o la ŋuti . Nu vɔ ̃ aɖe li si hea ame yina ku me , menye nu vɔ ̃ sia tɔgbe ƒe nya gblɔm mele o .

text: All unrighteousness is sin : and there is a sin not unto death .
text2: Nu gbegble ̃ wɔwɔ ɖe sia ɖe ƒomevi nye nu vɔ ̃ , gake nu vɔ ̃ aɖewo li siwo mehea ame yina ku mee o .

text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not ; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself , and that wicked one toucheth him not .
text2: Minyae kɔtee bena , ne wodzi ame aɖe tso Mawu me la , meganɔa nu vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi atraɖii o , Mawu Vi la ŋutɔ kpɔa eta be wo ̀ nɔna dedie eye Vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la metea ŋu kaa asi eŋu o .

text: And we know that we are of God , and the whole world lieth in wickedness .
text2: Mi ́ enyae be Mawu viwoe mi ́ enye eye be xexeame blibo la le vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la ƒe ŋuse ̃ te .

text: And we know that the Son of God is come , and hath given us an understanding , that we may know him that is true , and we are in him that is true , even in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and eternal life .
text2: Mi ́ enyae ha ̃ bena Mawu Vi la va eye wo ̀ na nugɔmesese mi ́ ale be mi ́ anya eya ame si nye nyateƒea . Mi ́ ele nyateƒea si nye Via Yesu Kristo la me . Eyae nye nyateƒe Mawu kple agbe mavɔ la .

text: Little children , keep yourselves from idols . Amen .
text2: Vinye lɔlɔ ̃ awo , miɖe mia ɖokuiwo ɖa le legbawo gbɔ .

text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children , whom I love in the truth ; and not I only , but also all they that have known the truth ;
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Hamemega ̃ tsitsitɔ gbɔ , na hamenyɔnu lɔlɔ ̃ a si nye ame tiatia tɔxɛ , ame si melɔ ̃ na vevie la kple viawo kata ̃ . Menye nye ɖekae o ke boŋ ame siwo kata ̃ dze si nyateƒe la ,

text: For the truth ' s sake , which dwelleth in us , and shall be with us for ever .
text2: le nyateƒe si le mi ́ a me eye wo ̀ anɔ mi ́ a me tegbee la ta .

text: Grace be with you , mercy , and peace , from God the Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
text2: Amenuveve , nublanuikpɔkpɔ kple ŋutifafa si tso Mawu Fofo la kple Yesu Kristo Fofo la ƒe Vi la gbɔ la nanɔ anyi kpli mi le nyateƒe kple lɔlɔ ̃ me .

text: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth , as we have received a commandment from the Father .
text2: Enye dzidzɔ ga ̃ aɖe nam be makpɔ be viwo ̀ aɖewo le agbe nɔm le nyateƒea me abe ale si Fofo la de se na mi ́ i ene .

text: And now I beseech thee , lady , not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee , but that which we had from the beginning , that we love one another .
text2: Eye azɔ la , nyɔnu lɔlɔ ̃ a , menye se bubu aɖekee mele dedem na mi o ke boŋ esi ko miese tso gɔmedzedzea me ke , mele biabiam be mialɔ ̃ mia nɔewo .

text: And this is love , that we walk after his commandments . This is the commandment , That , as ye have heard from the beginning , ye should walk in it .
text2: Lɔlɔ ̃ lae nye be mi ́ awɔ ɖe eƒe sededewo dzi . Abe ale si miese tso gɔmedzedzea me ene la , eƒe see nye be mi ́ anɔ agbe le lɔlɔ ̃ me .

text: For many deceivers are entered into the world , who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh . This is a deceiver and an antichrist .
text2: Ameblela geɖewo , ame siwo mexɔe se be Yesu Kristo va abe amegbetɔ ene le ŋutila ̃ me o la kaka ɖe xexeame . Ame siawo dometɔ ɖe sia ɖe nye ameblela kple Kristo ƒe futɔ la .

text: Look to yourselves , that we lose not those things which we have wrought , but that we receive a full reward .
text2: Mikpɔ nyuie be nu si ŋu miedze agbagba le la nagage le mia si o ke boŋ , miaxɔ fetu si de blibo .

text: Whosoever transgresseth , and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ , hath not God . He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ , he hath both the Father and the Son .
text2: Ame sia ame si afia nu si to vovo tso Kristo ƒe nufiafia gbɔ la , mele Mawu me o . Ke ame si le ́ Kristo ƒe nufiafia me ɖe asi la le agbe le Fofo la kple Vi la me .

text: If there come any unto you , and bring not this doctrine , receive him not into your house , neither bid him God speed :
text2: Ne ame aɖe va kple nufiafia si mesɔ ɖe Kristo tɔ dzi o la , migado woezɔ teti ha ̃ nɛ o eye migaxɔe ɖe miaƒe aƒe me kura o .

text: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds .
text2: Ame si xɔ ame sia la , sɔ kple eya amea le eƒe ŋutase ̃ nuwɔwɔwo me .

text: Having many things to write unto you , I would not write with paper and ink : but I trust to come unto you , and speak face to face , that our joy may be full .
text2: Nya geɖe li si madi be maŋlɔ na mi gake nyemaŋlɔe kple nuŋlɔti kple agbale ̃ o . Ke boŋ mele mɔ kpɔm be mava kpɔ mi ɖa eye mi ́ aɖo dze ŋkume kple ŋkume , ale be mi ́ aƒe dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ nade blibo .

text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee . Amen .
text2: Nɔviwo ̀ nyɔnu tiatia la ƒe viwo ha ̃ do gbe na wo ̀ nyuie .

text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius , whom I love in the truth .
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Hamemega ̃ tsitsi la gbɔ na xɔ ̃ nye Gayo , ame si melɔ ̃ na le nyateƒe me .

text: Beloved , I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health , even as thy soul prospereth .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ a , medo gbe ɖa be na ̃ nɔ la ̃ mesese ̃ me eye nu sia nu nadze edzi na wo ̀ nyuie abe ale si wo ̀ luʋɔ gɔ ̃ ha ̃ le dedie ene .

text: For I rejoiced greatly , when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee , even as thou walkest in the truth .
text2: Mekpɔ dzidzɔ ŋutɔ esi nɔvi aɖewo va ƒo nu tso ale si ne ̀ le ́ nyateƒea me ɖe asi goŋgoŋ eye ne ̀ le agbe nɔm le nyateƒe la nu la ŋu .

text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth .
text2: Naneke medoa dzidzɔ nam wu be , mase be vinyewo le agbe nɔm ɖe nyateƒe la nu o .

text: Beloved , thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren , and to strangers ;
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ a , e ̀ le nuteƒe wɔm le nu siwo ne ̀ le wɔwɔm na nɔviawo la me , togbɔ be wonye amedzrowo na wo ̀ ha ̃ .

text: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church : whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort , thou shalt do well :
text2: Woɖe gbeƒa ̃ na hamea kata ̃ le wo ̀ lɔlɔ ̃ si ne ̀ ɖe fia wo la ŋu . Anyo be na ̃ do mɔ wo le mɔ nyuitɔ si dze Mawu ŋu la nu .

text: Because that for his name ' s sake they went forth , taking nothing of the Gentiles .
text2: Elabena ŋkɔ la tae wodze mɔ hele tsatsam eye womexɔ kpekpeɖeŋu aɖeke tso Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo gbɔ o .

text: We therefore ought to receive such , that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth .
text2: Le esia ta ehia ̃ be miawɔ dɔmenyo na ame sia tɔgbewo ale be mi ́ kata ̃ mi ́ awɔ dɔ ado nyateƒea ɖe ŋgɔ .

text: I wrote unto the church : but Diotrephes , who loveth to have the preeminence among them , receiveth us not .
text2: Meŋlɔ agbale ̃ ɖo ɖe hamea , gake Diotrefo ame si tsɔ eɖokui wɔ ŋgɔgbenɔlae la , meɖo to nye nyawo o .

text: Wherefore , if I come , I will remember his deeds which he doeth , prating against us with malicious words : and not content therewith , neither doth he himself receive the brethren , and forbiddeth them that would , and casteth them out of the church .
text2: Eya ta ne meva la maɖe nu siwo kata ̃ wɔm wo ̀ le la ɖe go , vevietɔ ale si wo ̀ le mi ́ a ŋu gble ̃ m la ta . Hekpe ɖe esia ŋu la eɖea ame siwo dina be yewoaxɔ nɔviawo la le hame .

text: Beloved , follow not that which is evil , but that which is good . He that doeth good is of God : but he that doeth evil hath not seen God .
text2: Xɔ ̃ nye lɔlɔ ̃ tɔ , megakpɔ nu vloe wɔwɔ ƒe kpɔɖeŋu na ̃ wɔ o , ke boŋ srɔ ̃ nu nyui wɔwɔ . Ame sia ame si wɔ nu nyui la tso Mawu gbɔ . Ame si wɔa nu vɔ ̃ la mekpɔa Mawu o .

text: Demetrius hath good report of all men , and of the truth itself : yea , and we also bear record ; and ye know that our record is true .
text2: Ame sia ame ƒoa nu nyuie le Demetrio ŋu . Nyateƒea ŋutɔ ha ̃ gblɔa eƒe nya nyuie . Mi ́ awo ha ̃ mi ́ eɖi ɖase nyui le eŋu , eye wo ̀ ŋutɔ enyae be mi ́ aƒe ɖaseɖiɖi nye nyateƒe .

text: I had many things to write , but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee :
text2: Nya geɖe le asinye be maŋlɔ na wo ̀ gake nyemedi be maŋlɔe kple nuŋlɔti kple nuŋlɔtsi ɖeɖe ko o . Mele mɔ kpɔm be mi ́ ado go kpuie eye mi ́ aƒo nu ŋkume kple ŋkume . Ŋutifafa nanɔ anyi kpli wo ̀ . Nɔvi siwo kata ̃ le afi sia la do gbe na wo ̀ nyuie . Do gbe na nɔvi siwo le gbɔwo ̀ la na mi ́ ɖekaɖeka .

text: Jude , the servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to them that are sanctified by God the Father , and preserved in Jesus Christ , and called :
text2: Yuda , Yesu Kristo ƒe dɔla kple Yakobo nɔviŋutsu , ŋlɔ na ame siwo woyɔ , ame siwo Mawu Fofo la lɔ ̃ eye Kristo Yesu le ́ wo ɖe te .

text: Mercy unto you , and peace , and love , be multiplied .
text2: Amenuveve , ŋutifafa kple lɔlɔ ̃ nanye mia tɔ le agbɔsɔsɔ me .

text: Beloved , when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation , it was needful for me to write unto you , and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints .
text2: Nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , togbɔ be metsi dzi vevie be maŋlɔ nu na mi le ɖeɖe si ƒe gomekpɔlawo mi ́ enye la ŋuti ha ̃ la , edze ŋunye be maŋlɔ na mi , ado ŋuse ̃ mi be miaʋli ̃ xɔse si wotsɔ de asi na ame kɔkɔeawo zi ɖeka hena ɣeyiɣiawo kata ̃ la ta .

text: For there are certain men crept in unawares , who were before of old ordained to this condemnation , ungodly men , turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness , and denying the only Lord God , and our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mele esia gblɔm elabena ame aɖewo , ame siwo ƒe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ woŋlɔ da ɖi tso blema ke la va tra wo ɖokuiwo ɖe mia dome dzaa . Wonye mawumavɔ ̃ la , siwo trɔ mi ́ aƒe Mawu la ƒe amenuveve wo ̀ zu mɔɖeɖe na ŋunyɔnuwo wɔwɔ eye wogbe nu le Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe dziɖula ɖeka hɔ ̃ kple Aƒetɔ la gbɔ .

text: I will therefore put you in remembrance , though ye once knew this , how that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed them that believed not .
text2: Togbɔ be mienya esiawo kata ̃ xoxo ha ̃ la , medi be maɖo ŋku edzi na mi be Aƒetɔ la ɖe eƒe dukɔ tso Egipte nyigba dzi gake emegbe la , etsrɔ ̃ ame siwo mexɔ edzi se o .

text: And the angels which kept not their first estate , but left their own habitation , he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day .
text2: Ke mawudɔla siwo mele ́ woƒe bubuteƒe me ɖe asi o , ke boŋ wogble ̃ woawo ŋutɔ ƒe aƒe ɖi la , esiawoe wo ̀ de gae ɖe viviti me eye wotsɔ gakɔsɔkɔsɔ mavɔ de wo hena ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ le Ŋkekega ̃ la dzi .

text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha , and the cities about them in like manner , giving themselves over to fornication , and going after strange flesh , are set forth for an example , suffering the vengeance of eternal fire .
text2: Nenema ke , Sodom kple Gomora kpakple du siwo ƒoxla ̃ wo la tsɔ wo ɖokuiwo dzra na ŋutila ̃ meŋunyɔnuwo wɔwɔ kple agbe vlo nɔnɔ . Wonye ame siwo le fu kpem le dzo mavɔ ƒe tohehe me la ƒe kpɔɖeŋu .

text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh , despise dominion , and speak evil of dignities .
text2: Nenema ke drɔ ̃ ekula siawo ƒo ɖi woawo ŋutɔ ƒe ŋutila ̃ wo , wotsi tre ɖe dziɖulawo ŋu eye woƒoa nu vɔ ̃ le dziƒodɔlawo ŋu .

text: Yet Michael the archangel , when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses , durst not bring against him a railing accusation , but said , The Lord rebuke thee .
text2: Mawudɔlaga ̃ Maikel gɔ ̃ ha ̃ esi wo ̀ nɔ nya hem kple vɔ ̃ ɖitɔ la tso Mose ƒe ŋutila ̃ kukua ŋuti la , mete ŋu do dzi gblɔ nya vɔ ̃ aɖeke ɖe eŋuti o , ke ɖeko wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Aƒetɔ la aka mo na wo ̀ ! ”

text: But these speak evil of those things which they know not : but what they know naturally , as brute beasts , in those things they corrupt themselves .
text2: Gake ame siawo ya ƒoa nu kple dzugbe ɖe nu sia nu si gɔme womese o la ŋuti eye nu sia nu si gɔme wose to seselela ̃ me me abe la ̃ siwo mebua tame o ene la , nu siawo kee nye nu siwo gble ̃ a wo dome .

text: Woe unto them ! for they have gone in the way of Cain , and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward , and perished in the gainsaying of Core .
text2: Babaa na wo ! Woto Kain ƒe mɔ ; woti viɖe yome hege ɖe Balam ƒe vodada me eye wotsrɔ ̃ wo le Kora ƒe agla ̃ dzedze la me .

text: These are spots in your feasts of charity , when they feast with you , feeding themselves without fear : clouds they are without water , carried about of winds ; trees whose fruit withereth , without fruit , twice dead , plucked up by the roots ;
text2: Ame siawo nye ɖiƒonuwo le hamea ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ nuɖuƒewo . Woɖua nu kpli mi ŋumakpetɔe , wonye ale ̃ kplɔla siwo nyia woawo ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ko . Wole abe alili ̃ kpo siwo medzaa tsi o , eye ya lɔa wo ɖe nu ene . Wole abe kelemeti siwo metse ku o eye woho wo ƒo ɖi eye woku zi gbɔ zi eve la ene .

text: Raging waves of the sea , foaming out their own shame ; wandering stars , to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever .
text2: Wole abe ƒutsotsoe siwo dze agbo hele woawo ŋutɔ ƒe ŋukpefutukpɔwo ɖem ɖe go la ene , wole abe ɣletivi siwo le tsatsam , esiwo woɖo viviti tsiɖitsiɖi da ɖi na tegbetegbe la ene .

text: And Enoch also , the seventh from Adam , prophesied of these , saying , Behold , the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints ,
text2: Enɔk , ame si nye dzidzime adrelia tso Adam dzi la gblɔ nya ɖi ɖe ame siawo ŋu be , “ Kpɔ ɖa , Aƒetɔ la gbɔna kple eƒe dɔla kɔkɔe akpe akpewo ,

text: To execute judgment upon all , and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed , and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him .
text2: ne wo ̀ adrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame sia ame ne wo ̀ abu fɔ mawumavɔ ̃ lawo ɖe nu vɔ ̃ ɖi siwo kata ̃ wowɔ le woƒe mɔ vɔ ̃ wo dzi hekpe ɖe nya vlo siwo kata ̃ nu vɔ ̃ wɔla siawo gblɔ ɖe eya amea ŋuti ŋu la ta . ”

text: These are murmurers , complainers , walking after their own lusts ; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words , having men ' s persons in admiration because of advantage .
text2: Ame siawo nye liʋiliʋi ̃ li ̃ lawo kple ame siwo kpɔa vodada le nu sia nu ŋu . Wodzea woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nudzodzro vɔ ̃ wo yome woƒoa adegbe le woawo ŋutɔ ɖokuiwo ŋu eye wokafua amewo alakpatɔe hena woawo ŋutɔ ƒe nyui .

text: But , beloved , remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ke nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , miɖo ŋku nya siwo mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe apostolowo gblɔ da ɖi la dzi .

text: How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time , who should walk after their own ungodly lusts .
text2: Wogblɔ na mi be , “ Le ɣeyiɣi mamlɛawo me la , fewuɖulawo lava , ame siwo adze woawo ŋutɔ ƒe dzodzro vɔ ̃ wo yome . ”

text: These be they who separate themselves , sensual , having not the Spirit .
text2: Ame siawoe nye ame siwo dea mama mia dome , ame siwo dzea ŋutila ̃ ƒe nukpɔkpɔwo yome eye Gbɔgbɔ la mele wo me o .

text: But ye , beloved , building up yourselves on your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Ke miawo ya la , nɔvi lɔlɔ ̃ awo , mitu mia ɖokuiwo ɖo le miaƒe xɔse kɔkɔetɔ kekeake me eye mido gbe ɖa le Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la me .

text: Keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life .
text2: Mitsɔ mia ɖokuiwo de Mawu ƒe lɔlɔ ̃ la me esi miele mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ Yesu Kristo ƒe nublanuikpɔkpɔ lalam be wo ̀ akplɔ mi ayi agbe mavɔ la me .

text: And of some have compassion , making a difference :
text2: Mikpɔ nublanui na ame siwo le ɖi kem le wo ɖokuiwo me .

text: And others save with fear , pulling them out of the fire ; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh .
text2: Miɖe ame bubuwo tso dzo me eye mixɔ na wo . Mikpɔ nublanui na wo kple vɔvɔ ̃ . Mile ́ fu awu si ƒo ɖi to ŋutila ̃ ƒe ɖiƒoƒo me gɔ ̃ ha ̃ .

text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling , and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy ,
text2: Azɔ , eya ame si tea ŋu le ́ a mi ɖe asi be miagadze anyi o , be wo ̀ atsɔ mi aɖo eƒe ŋutikɔkɔefiazikpui la ŋgɔ kpɔtsɔtsɔmanɔŋui le dzidzɔ ga ̃ me , lae mede mi asi na

text: To the only wise God our Saviour , be glory and majesty , dominion and power , both now and ever . Amen .
text2: mi ́ aƒe Mawu ɖeka hɔ ̃ la , ame si nye mi ́ aƒe Đela la , eya ko tɔe nye ŋutikɔkɔe , fianyenye , ŋuse ̃ kple dziɖuɖu to Yesu Kristo , mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ , me le dzidzimewo kata ̃ me , tso fifia yi ɖase ɖe mavɔ me ! Amen .

text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ , which God gave unto him , to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass ; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John :
text2: Esia enye Yesu Kristo ƒe ɖeɖefia si Mawu nae be woaɖe fia eƒe dɔlawo tso nu si ava dzɔ kpuie la ŋuti . Edɔ eƒe mawudɔla ɖa be wo ̀ aɖe nu siawo afia Yohanes ame si nye eƒe dɔla .

text: Who bare record of the word of God , and of the testimony of Jesus Christ , and of all things that he saw .
text2: Yohanes ɖi ɖase le nu si wo kata ̃ wo ̀ kpɔ la ŋu , nu siwo nye Mawu ƒe nya kple Yesu Kristo ŋu ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi .

text: Blessed is he that readeth , and they that hear the words of this prophecy , and keep those things which are written therein : for the time is at hand .
text2: Woayra ame si xle ̃ nyagblɔɖi sia me nyawo , woayra ame siwo see eye wotsɔ emenyawo ɖe woƒe dzime elabena ɣeyiɣi la te tu aƒe .

text: John to the seven churches which are in Asia : Grace be unto you , and peace , from him which is , and which was , and which is to come ; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne ;
text2: Agbale ̃ sia tso Yohanes gbɔ na hame adre siwo le Asia nutome : amenuveve kple ŋutifafa si tso Mawu ame si nɔ anyi , eye wo ̀ li eye wo ̀ gale vava ge la gbɔ kple gbɔgbɔ adre siwo le eƒe fiazikpui la ŋgɔ ,

text: And from Jesus Christ , who is the faithful witness , and the first begotten of the dead , and the prince of the kings of the earth . Unto him that loved us , and washed us from our sins in his own blood ,
text2: kple Yesu Kristo , ame si nye ɖaseɖila anukwaretɔ , ame gba ̃ tɔ si fɔ tso ku me eye wo ̀ nye anyigbadzifiawo dziɖula la gbɔ na mi . Eya ame si lɔ ̃ mi ́ eye wo ̀ ɖe mi ́ tso mi ́ aƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me to eƒe ʋu me ,

text: And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father ; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: eya ame si wɔ mi ́ be mi ́ anye fiaɖuƒe kple Osɔfo siwo asubɔ eƒe Mawu kple Fofoa , eya tɔ nanye ŋutikɔkɔe kple ŋuse ̃ tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me ! Amen .

text: Behold , he cometh with clouds ; and every eye shall see him , and they also which pierced him : and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him . Even so , Amen .
text2: Kpɔ ɖa ! Egbɔna ; alili ̃ kpowo aƒo xla ̃ e eye ŋku ɖe sia ɖe akpɔe . E ̃ , ame siwo tɔ akplɔe gɔ ̃ ha ̃ akpɔe . Ne eva do la , dukɔwo afa avi kple ɣli le eya amea ta . E ̃ ! Amen ! Neva eme nenema !

text: I am Alpha and Omega , the beginning and the ending , saith the Lord , which is , and which was , and which is to come , the Almighty .
text2: “ Nyee nye A kple Z , gɔmedzedze kple nuwuwu ame si nɔ anyi , eli eye wo ̀ gale vava ge , ame si nye Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ . ” Aƒetɔ Mawue gblɔe .

text: I John , who also am your brother , and companion in tribulation , and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ , was in the isle that is called Patmos , for the word of God , and for the testimony of Jesus Christ .
text2: Nye , mia nɔvi Yohanes , ame si kpe fu kpli mi le Aƒetɔ la ta lae le agbale ̃ sia ŋlɔm na mi . Nye ha ̃ mekpɔ gome le dzidodo si Mawu nana la me eye miakpɔ gome le eƒe fiaɖuƒe la ha ̃ me ! Menɔ Patmo Ƒukpo dzi . Woɖe aboyom yi afi ma le ale si megblɔ Mawu ƒe nya kple nu si menya tso Yesu Kristo ŋuti la ta .

text: I was in the Spirit on the Lord ' s day , and heard behind me a great voice , as of a trumpet ,
text2: Esime menɔ gbɔgbɔ me le Aƒetɔ la ƒe ŋkekea dzi la , mese gbe sese ̃ aɖe le megbenye abe kpe ̃ ƒe ɖiɖi ene .

text: Saying , I am Alpha and Omega , the first and the last : and , What thou seest , write in a book , and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia ; unto Ephesus , and unto Smyrna , and unto Pergamos , and unto Thyatira , and unto Sardis , and unto Philadelphia , and unto Laodicea .
text2: Enɔ gbɔgblɔm bena , “ Nyee nye A kple Z , Gba ̃ tɔ kple Mlɔetɔ ” Emegbe mesee wo ̀ gagblɔ be , “ Ŋlɔ nu sia nu si nakpɔ la da ɖi eye naɖo agbale ̃ a ɖe hame adre siwo le Asia . Efeso , Smirna Pergamo , Tiatira , Sardes , Filadelfia kple Laodikea . ”

text: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me . And being turned , I saw seven golden candlesticks ;
text2: Esi metrɔ be makpɔ ame si nɔ nu ƒom la , kasia mekpɔ sikakaɖiti adre .

text: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man , clothed with a garment down to the foot , and girt about the paps with a golden girdle .
text2: Ame aɖe tsi tre ɖe wo dome , si ɖi Amegbetɔvi la . Edo awu ʋlaya aɖe eye wotsɔ sikalidziblanu aɖe bla akɔta .

text: His head and his hairs were white like wool , as white as snow ; and his eyes were as a flame of fire ;
text2: Eƒe taɖa fu tititi abe ale ̃ fu alo ɖetifu ene . Eƒe ŋkuwo le ɖaɖam abe dzoƒeaɖewo ene .

text: And his feet like unto fine brass , as if they burned in a furnace ; and his voice as the sound of many waters .
text2: Eƒe afɔwo bia ̃ he ̃ abe akɔbli si wode kpodzo me ene eye eƒe gbe le abe tɔsisi geɖewo ƒe howɔwɔ ene .

text: And he had in his right hand seven stars : and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword : and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength .
text2: Ele ́ ɣletivi adre ɖe nuɖusi eye yi ɖaɖe nuevee do go tso eƒe nu me . Eƒe mo le kekle ̃ m abe ɣekekle ̃ ene .

text: And when I saw him , I fell at his feet as dead . And he laid his right hand upon me , saying unto me , Fear not ; I am the first and the last :
