text2: Mawudɔla gba ̃ tɔ yi ɖatrɔ eƒe kplu kɔ ɖe anyigba dzi eye dɔvɔ ̃ la na be abi makumaku kple abi si naa wosea veve la , kaka ɖe ame siwo xɔ la ̃ wɔada ̃ la ƒe dzesi eye wosubɔ eƒe legba la dome .

text: And the second angel poured out his vial upon the sea ; and it became as the blood of a dead man : and every living soul died in the sea .
text2: Mawudɔla evelia trɔ eƒe kplu la kɔ ɖe atsiaƒu dzi eye wo ̀ trɔ zu ʋu , ʋu si le abe ame kuku tɔ ene eye nu gbagbe ɖe sia ɖe ku le atsiaƒu la me .

text: And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters ; and they became blood .
text2: Mawudɔla etɔ ̃ lia trɔ eƒe kplu la kɔ ɖe tɔsisiwo kple tsidzidziwo dzi eye woawo ha ̃ trɔ zu ʋu .

text: And I heard the angel of the waters say , Thou art righteous , O Lord , which art , and wast , and shalt be , because thou hast judged thus .
text2: Tete mese mawudɔla si kpɔa tsinyawo dzi la gblɔ bena , “ Wo ̀ la , wo ̀ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ siawo le eteƒe , Wo ̀ , kɔkɔetɔ si li fifia eye ne ̀ nɔ anyi kpɔ Wo ̀ afiatsotsowo le eteƒe .

text: For they have shed the blood of saints and prophets , and thou hast given them blood to drink ; for they are worthy .
text2: Elabena , wokɔ wo ̀ ame kɔkɔewo kple wo nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe ʋu ɖe anyi Eye ne ̀ kpe ʋu na wo be woano Abe ale si dze wo ene . ”

text: And I heard another out of the altar say , Even so , Lord God Almighty , true and righteous are thy judgments .
text2: Mese vɔsamlekpui la ɖo eŋu be , “ E ̃ , Aƒetɔ Mawu , Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ , wo ̀ ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ wo nye nyateƒe eye wole dzɔdzɔe . ”

text: And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun ; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire .
text2: Mawudɔla enelia trɔ eƒe kplu la ɖe ɣe dzi eye wona ŋuse ̃ ɣe la be wo ̀ atsɔ dzo ƒe ŋuse ̃ aɖu amewoe .

text: And men were scorched with great heat , and blasphemed the name of God , which hath power over these plagues : and they repented not to give him glory .
text2: Ɣe la ɖu wo vevie ale gbegbe be woƒo fi de Mawu ƒe ŋkɔ , ame si kpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe dɔvɔ ̃ siawo dzi . Ke wogbe be yewomatrɔ dzime atsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe anɛ o .

text: And the fifth angel poured out his vial upon the seat of the beast ; and his kingdom was full of darkness ; and they gnawed their tongues for pain ,
text2: Mawudɔla atɔ ̃ lia trɔ eƒe kplu la kɔ ɖe la ̃ wɔada ̃ la ƒe fiazikpui dzi eye viviti nye tsyɔ eƒe fiaɖuƒe la . Amewo ɖu aɖe le vevesese ta ,

text: And blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores , and repented not of their deeds .
text2: eye woƒo fi de Dziƒomawu la le woƒe vevesesewo kple abi siwo woxɔ la ta . Gake wogbe be yewomatrɔ le yewoƒe nuwɔnawo yome o .

text: And the sixth angel poured out his vial upon the great river Euphrates ; and the water thereof was dried up , that the way of the kings of the east might be prepared .
text2: Mawudɔla adelia trɔ eƒe kplu la kɔ ɖe Frat tɔsisi ga ̃ la dzi eye emetsi la kata ̃ mie , ne wo ̀ adzra mɔ ɖo na ɣedzeƒefiawo .

text: And I saw three unclean spirits like frogs come out of the mouth of the dragon , and out of the mouth of the beast , and out of the mouth of the false prophet .
text2: Tete mekpɔ gbɔgbɔ makɔmakɔ etɔ ̃ siwo ɖi akpɔkplɔwo . Wodo go tso ʋɔ driba la ƒe nu me kple la ̃ wɔada ̃ la ƒe nu me , kpakple aʋatsonyagblɔɖila la ƒe nu me .

text: For they are the spirits of devils , working miracles , which go forth unto the kings of the earth and of the whole world , to gather them to the battle of that great day of God Almighty .
text2: Wonye gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ , siwo le nukunuwo wɔm eye wodona yina ɖe xexemefiawo gbɔ ne woaƒo wo nu ƒu hena aʋawɔwɔ le Mawu Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la ƒe ŋkeke ga ̃ la dzi .

text: Behold , I come as a thief . Blessed is he that watcheth , and keepeth his garments , lest he walk naked , and they see his shame .
text2: “ Kpɔ ɖa , megbɔna abe fiafitɔ ene ! Woayra ame si le ŋudzɔ eye eƒe awuwo gale esi ale be masi adzo amamae eye wo ̀ aɖe eƒe ŋukpeƒe ɖe go o . ”

text: And he gathered them together into a place called in the Hebrew tongue Armageddon .
text2: Tete woƒo fiawo kata ̃ nu ƒu ɖe teƒe aɖe si woyɔna le Hebrigbe me be Armagedon .

text: And the seventh angel poured out his vial into the air ; and there came a great voice out of the temple of heaven , from the throne , saying , It is done .
text2: Mawudɔla adrelia tsɔ eƒe kplu la trɔ ɖe yame eye gbe ga ̃ aɖe ɖi tso gbedoxɔ la me kple fiazikpui la gbɔ nɔ gbɔgblɔm be , “ Wowu enu vɔ ! ”

text: And there were voices , and thunders , and lightnings ; and there was a great earthquake , such as was not since men were upon the earth , so mighty an earthquake , and so great .
text2: Tete dzi ke dzo , dzi ɖe gbe , sokpewo ge eye anyigba ʋuʋu ŋɔdzitɔe . Anyigba meʋuʋu kpɔ nenema tso ɣesiɣi wowɔ amegbetɔ ɖe anyigbadzi o , elabena anyigbaʋuʋu la nu se ̃ ŋutɔ .

text: And the great city was divided into three parts , and the cities of the nations fell : and great Babylon came in remembrance before God , to give unto her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath .
text2: Du ga ̃ la ma ɖe akpa etɔ ̃ me eye dukɔwo ƒe duwo mu dze anyi . Mawu ɖo ŋku Babilonia Ga ̃ la dzi eye wo ̀ tsɔ kplu si yɔ fu ̃ u kple eƒe dɔmedzoe heliheli ̃ ƒe wain la nɛ .

text: And every island fled away , and the mountains were not found .
text2: Ƒukpo ɖe sia ɖe si dzo , womegakpɔ towo gɔ ̃ ha ̃ o

text: And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven , every stone about the weight of a talent : and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail ; for the plague thereof was exceeding great .
text2: tsikpe ga ̃ aɖe dza tso dziƒo , eye tsikpe ɖeka ƒe kpekpeme anɔ kilogram blaade - vɔ - atɔ ̃ . Woge va dze amewo dzi le anyigba . Ameawo ƒo fi de Mawu le tsikpe ƒe dɔvɔ ̃ la ta elabena dɔvɔ ̃ la dzi ŋɔ ŋutɔ .

text: And there came one of the seven angels which had the seven vials , and talked with me , saying unto me , Come hither ; I will shew unto thee the judgment of the great whore that sitteth upon many waters :
text2: Mawudɔla adreawo dometɔ ɖeka , si le ́ kplu adreawo ɖe asi la , va gblɔ nam bena , “ Va , mafia tohehe si woatsɔ ana gbolo ga ̃ si nɔ anyi ɖe tsi geɖewo dzi la wo ̀ .

text: With whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication , and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication .
text2: Anyigbadzifiawo wɔ ahasi kplii eye anyigbadzitɔwo no eƒe ahasiwɔwɔ ƒe wain mu . ”

text: So he carried me away in the spirit into the wilderness : and I saw a woman sit upon a scarlet coloured beast , full of names of blasphemy , having seven heads and ten horns .
text2: Tete mawudɔla la kɔm le gbɔgbɔ me yi gbedzi , afi ma mekpɔ nyɔnu aɖe si nɔ anyi ɖe la ̃ he ̃ aɖe dzi esi ŋu busuŋkɔwo le . La ̃ la to ta adre kple dzo ewo .

text: And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour , and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls , having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication :
text2: Nyɔnu la do awu legbe si wotɔ kple avɔ blɔ kple avɔ dze ̃ , eye wo ̀ de sikakɔga kekle ̃ wo , kpexɔasidzonuwo kple dzonu bubuwo kɔ . Sikakplu si yɔ fu ̃ u kple ŋunyɔnuwo kple eƒe ahasiwɔwɔ ƒe ŋunyɔnu la le esi .

text: And upon her forehead was a name written , MYSTERY , BABYLON THE GREAT , THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH .
text2: Woŋlɔ ŋkɔ si nye nya ɣaɣla la ɖe eƒe ŋgonu , “ Babilonia Ga ̃ la , gbolowo kple anyigbadziŋunyɔnuwo dada . ”

text: And I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints , and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus : and when I saw her , I wondered with great admiration .
text2: Mekpɔ be nyɔnu la mu ame kɔkɔewo kple ame siwo ɖi ɖase le Yesu ŋuti la ƒe ʋu . Esi mekpɔe la , nye mo wɔ yaa .

text: And the angel said unto me , Wherefore didst thou marvel ? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman , and of the beast that carrieth her , which hath the seven heads and ten horns .
text2: Tete mawudɔla la biam be , “ Nu ka ŋuti wo ̀ mo wɔ yaa ɖo ? Maɖe nyɔnua kple la ̃ si dom wo ̀ le , la ̃ si to ta adre kple dzo ewo ƒe nu ɣaɣla me na wo ̀ .

text: The beast that thou sawest was , and is not ; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit , and go into perdition : and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder , whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world , when they behold the beast that was , and is not , and yet is .
text2: La ̃ si ne ̀ kpɔ la , nɔ anyi tsa ̃ , gake megali fifia o , eye ado go tso ʋe globo la me ayi eƒe tsɔtsrɔ ̃ la me . Anyigbadzitɔ siwo ƒe ŋkɔwo womeŋlɔ ɖe agbegbale ̃ a me tso xexeame ƒe gɔmedzedzea me o la ƒe mo awɔ yaa ne wokpɔ la ̃ la elabena enɔ anyi tsa ̃ ke megali fifia o , gake agatrɔ ava .

text: And here is the mind which hath wisdom . The seven heads are seven mountains , on which the woman sitteth .
text2: “ Nya sia hia ̃ na susu si me nunya le . Ta adreawo nye togbɛ adre siwo dzi nyɔnu la nɔ anyi ɖo . Woganye fia adrewo ha ̃ . Wo ame atɔ ̃ dze anyi , ɖeka li fifia eye ɖeka mekpɔ va haɖe o . Ke ne eva va la , anɔ anyi hena ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe ko .

text: And the beast that was , and is not , even he is the eighth , and is of the seven , and goeth into perdition .
text2: La ̃ si nɔ anyi kpɔ eye megali fifia o lae nye fia enyilia : Enye fia adreawo dometɔ ɖeka eye wo ̀ yina ɖe eƒe tsɔtsrɔ ̃ la me .

text: And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings , which have received no kingdom as yet ; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast .
text2: “ Dzo ewo siwo ne ̀ kpɔ la , nye fia ewo siwo si fiaɖuƒe mesu haɖe o , gake la , woana dziɖuɖuŋuse ̃ wo abe fiawo ene kpe ɖe la ̃ la ŋu hena gaƒoƒo ɖeka .

text: These have one mind , and shall give their power and strength unto the beast .
text2: Taɖodzinu ɖeka le wo si eye woatsɔ woƒe ŋuse ̃ kple dziɖuɖuŋuse ̃ ana la ̃ la .

text: These shall make war with the Lamb , and the Lamb shall overcome them : for he is Lord of lords , and King of kings : and they that are with him are called , and chosen , and faithful .
text2: Woawɔ aʋa kple Ale ̃ vi la gake Ale ̃ vi la aɖu wo dzi elabena eyae nye aƒetɔwo dzi Aƒetɔ kple fiawo dzi Fia la eye eƒe ame tiatiawo , ame siwo wo ̀ yɔ kple ame siwo dze eyome le anukware me la , anɔ egbɔ . ”

text: And he saith unto me , The waters which thou sawest , where the whore sitteth , are peoples , and multitudes , and nations , and tongues .
text2: Mawudɔla la yi edzi gblɔ nam be , “ Tsi siwo ne ̀ kpɔ esiwo dzi gbolo la nɔ anyi ɖo la nye amewo , amehawo , dukɔwo kple gbegbɔgblɔwo .

text: And the ten horns which thou sawest upon the beast , these shall hate the whore , and shall make her desolate and naked , and shall eat her flesh , and burn her with fire .
text2: La ̃ la kple eƒe dzo ewo siwo ne ̀ kpɔ la , ale ́ fu gbolo la , woahee va gbegble ̃ me eye woagble ̃ e ɖi amamae . Woaɖu eƒe la ̃ eye woatɔ dzoe ,

text: For God hath put in their hearts to fulfil his will , and to agree , and give their kingdom unto the beast , until the words of God shall be fulfilled .
text2: elabena Mawu tsɔe de woƒe dzime be woana eƒe tameɖoɖo nava eme ne woalɔ ̃ atsɔ woƒe ŋuse ̃ ana la ̃ la ne wo ̀ atsɔ aɖu dzii va se ɖe esime Mawu ƒe nyawo ava eme .

text: And the woman which thou sawest is that great city , which reigneth over the kings of the earth .
text2: Nyɔnu si ne ̀ kpɔ la eyae nye du ga ̃ si le anyigbadzifiawo dzi ɖum . ”

text: And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven , having great power ; and the earth was lightened with his glory .
text2: Le esia megbe la , mekpɔ mawudɔla bubu wo ̀ ɖi tso dziƒo gbɔna . Ŋuse ̃ ga ̃ aɖe nɔ esi eye eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe na anyigbadzi kle ̃ .

text: And he cried mightily with a strong voice , saying , Babylon the great is fallen , is fallen , and is become the habitation of devils , and the hold of every foul spirit , and a cage of every unclean and hateful bird .
text2: Edo ɣli kple gbe ga ̃ aɖe be , “ Womui ! Womu Babilonia Ga ̃ la ! Eva zu aƒe na gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ wo kple mɔ sese ̃ na gbɔgbɔ makɔmakɔwo kpakple xadza na xevi makɔmakɔwo kple xevi siwo womeɖuna o ,

text: For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication , and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her , and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich through the abundance of her delicacies .
text2: elabena dukɔwo kata ̃ no eƒe dɔmedzoe ƒe wain si nye eƒe gbolowɔwɔ . Anyigbadzifiawo wɔ ahasi kplii eye anyigbadzisitsala ga ̃ wo zu hotsuitɔ ga ̃ wo to eƒe kesinɔnu gbogboawo me . ”

text: And I heard another voice from heaven , saying , Come out of her , my people , that ye be not partakers of her sins , and that ye receive not of her plagues .
text2: Tete mese gbe bubu tso dziƒo le gbɔgblɔm be , “ Mido go le wo dome , nye amewo be miagakpɔ gome le woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo me o , be woƒe dɔvɔ ̃ wo dometɔ aɖeke nagava mia dzi o .

text: For her sins have reached unto heaven , and God hath remembered her iniquities .
text2: Elabena woƒe nu vɔ ̃ wo li kɔ yi ɖe dziƒo ke eye Mawu ɖo ŋku woƒe nu tovowo wɔwɔ dzi .

text: Reward her even as she rewarded you , and double unto her double according to her works : in the cup which she hath filled fill to her double .
text2: Wɔe nɛ abe ale si wo ̀ wɔ ene . Đo eteƒe nɛ zigbɔzi eve ɖe nu si wo ̀ wɔ la ta . Tɔtɔ eya ŋutɔ ƒe kplu eve ne na ̃ tsɔ anɛ .

text: How much she hath glorified herself , and lived deliciously , so much torment and sorrow give her : for she saith in her heart , I sit a queen , and am no widow , and shall see no sorrow .
text2: Egblɔ le eƒe dzime dadatɔe be , ‘ menɔ anyi abe nyɔnufia ene , nyemenye ahosi o eye nyemafa konyi akpɔ o . ’ Eya ta tsɔ fuwɔame kple vevesese nɛ wo ̀ asɔ gbɔ abe ale si wo ̀ tsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe kple kesinɔnuwo na eɖokui ene .

text: Therefore shall her plagues come in one day , death , and mourning , and famine ; and she shall be utterly burned with fire : for strong is the Lord God who judgeth her .
text2: Ale be le ŋkeke ɖeka me la , eƒe dɔvɔ ̃ wo ava ƒo ɖe edzi , esiwo nye ku , konyifafa kple dɔwuame . Dzo ava fiae keŋkeŋ elabena ŋuse ̃ tɔe nye Aƒetɔ Mawu , ame si drɔ ̃ ʋɔnui .

text: And the kings of the earth , who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her , shall bewail her , and lament for her , when they shall see the smoke of her burning ,
text2: “ Ne anyigbadzifia siwo wɔ ahasi kplii eye wokpɔ gome le eƒe kesinɔnuwo me kpɔ dzo si wotɔe ƒe dzudzɔ la , woafa avi eye woafa nɛ .

text: Standing afar off for the fear of her torment , saying , Alas , alas , that great city Babylon , that mighty city ! for in one hour is thy judgment come .
text2: Eƒe fuwɔame ado ŋɔdzi na wo ale gbegbe be woanɔ adzɔge ke anɔ avi fam kple ɣli be , ‘ Babaa ! O du ga ̃ , babaa na wo ̀ . O Babilonia , du si ŋu ŋuse ̃ le ! Le gaƒoƒo ɖeka me , wo ̀ tsɔtsrɔ ̃ va ɖo !

text: And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her ; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more :
text2: “ Anyigbadzisitsalawo afa avi eye woafa nɛ elabena ame aɖeke megale woƒe adzɔnuwo ƒlem o .

text: The merchandise of gold , and silver , and precious stones , and of pearls , and fine linen , and purple , and silk , and scarlet , and all thyine wood , and all manner vessels of ivory , and all manner vessels of most precious wood , and of brass , and iron , and marble ,
text2: Adzɔnu siawoe nye sika , klosalo , kpexɔasiwo , dzonuwo , aklala biɖibi - ɖiwo , ago , sedavɔ , avɔ dzi ̃ wo , sitronʋuƒo vovovowo , kple nu vovovo siwo wowɔ kple nyiɖu , ati xɔasiwo , akɔbli , gayibɔ kple kpexɔasiwo .

text: And cinnamon , and odours , and ointments , and frankincense , and wine , and oil , and fine flour , and wheat , and beasts , and sheep , and horses , and chariots , and slaves , and souls of men .
text2: Bubuawoe nye atikeʋeʋi ̃ , sina - mɔn , detsiƒonuʋeʋi ̃ wo , dzudzɔʋeʋi ̃ donuwo , kotoklobo , lifi , wain , amitimi , wɔ meme , mɔlu , nyiwo , ale ̃ wo , sɔwo kple woƒe tasiaɖamwo , kluviwo kple amewo ƒe luʋɔwo .

text: And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee , and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee , and thou shalt find them no more at all .
text2: “ Wo kata ̃ woagblɔ be , ‘ kutsetse si ne ̀ di vevie la do le asiwo ̀ me . Wo ̀ kesinɔnuwo kple wo ̀ atsyɔ ̃ ha ̃ tsrɔ ̃ ; womagatrɔ agbɔ gbeɖe o . ’

text: The merchants of these things , which were made rich by her , shall stand afar off for the fear of her torment , weeping and wailing ,
text2: Asitsala siwo dzra nu siawo eye wokpɔ woƒe kesinɔnuwo tso egbɔ la , atsi tre ɖe adzɔge ke le ŋɔdzi si le ́ wo le eƒe fuwɔame ta la ta . Woafa avi , afa konyi ,

text: And saying , Alas , alas , that great city , that was clothed in fine linen , and purple , and scarlet , and decked with gold , and precious stones , and pearls !
text2: eye woado ɣli be , ‘ Babaa ! O du ga ̃ si do aklala biɖibiɖi kple avɔ dzi ̃ kpakple avɔ blɔtɔ ƒe awulegbe eye ne ̀ de sikakɔwla si le dzo dam , kpexɔasidzonuwo kple dzonu ƒuƒuiwo , babaa na wo ̀ !

text: For in one hour so great riches is come to nought . And every shipmaster , and all the company in ships , and sailors , and as many as trade by sea , stood afar off ,
text2: Le gaƒoƒo ɖeka pɛ ko me la , wo ̀ kesinɔnu gbogbo siawo tsrɔ ̃ ! “ Azɔ la , kuɖɔɖola ɖe sia ɖe , ame siwo kata ̃ ɖoa tɔdziʋu , tɔdziʋukulawo , kple ame siwo kata ̃ kpɔa woƒe abolo tsoa ƒudzidɔwɔwɔ me la kata ̃ anɔ adzɔge .

text: And cried when they saw the smoke of her burning , saying , What city is like unto this great city !
text2: Ne wokpɔ dzo si wotɔe ƒe dzudzɔ le tutum la , woado ɣli be , ‘ Du aɖe nɔ anyi kpɔ abe du ga ̃ sia enea ? ’

text: And they cast dust on their heads , and cried , weeping and wailing , saying , Alas , alas , that great city , wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness ! for in one hour is she made desolate .
text2: Woalɔ ke akɔ ɖe tame , woafa avi eye woado konyifaɣli be , ‘ Babaa ! O du ga ̃ , afi si ame siwo kata ̃ si tɔdziʋu si nɔa ƒu dzi le la , kpɔ woƒe kesinɔnuwo le . Babaa na wo ̀ ! Le gaƒoƒo ɖeka pɛ ko me , wotsrɔ ̃ e keŋkeŋ .

text: Rejoice over her , thou heaven , and ye holy apostles and prophets ; for God hath avenged you on her .
text2: O dziƒo , dzɔ dzi le eya amea ta ! Mi ame kɔkɔewo , apostolowo kple nyagblɔɖilawo , mitso aseye ! Elabena Mawu drɔ ̃ ʋɔnui ɖe ale si wo ̀ wɔ fu mi la ta . ’ ”

text: And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone , and cast it into the sea , saying , Thus with violence shall that great city Babylon be thrown down , and shall be found no more at all .
text2: Tete mawudɔla triakɔ aɖe tsɔ kpe aɖe si ƒe lolome anɔ abe wɔtute ene la , ƒu gbe ɖe atsiaƒu me eye wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Aleae woatsɔ dziku kple ŋuse ̃ aƒu Babilonia , du ga ̃ la , anyii eye magafɔ gbeɖe o .

text: And the voice of harpers , and musicians , and of pipers , and trumpeters , shall be heard no more at all in thee ; and no craftsman , of whatsoever craft he be , shall be found any more in thee ; and the sound of a millstone shall be heard no more at all in thee ;
text2: Kasaŋkuƒolawo , hadzilawo , dzekulawo kple kpe ̃ kulawo la , womagase woƒe ŋkɔ le mewo ̀ akpɔ gbeɖe o . Nenema kee womagakpɔ asinudɔwɔla aɖeke tɔgbi le mewo ̀ akpɔ gbeɖe o . Womagase wɔtutewo ƒe wɔtutu le mewo ̀ akpɔ gbeɖe o .

text: And the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee ; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more at all in thee : for thy merchants were the great men of the earth ; for by thy sorceries were all nations deceived .
text2: Womagakpɔ akaɖi ƒe bibi le mewo ̀ akpɔ gbeɖe o . Nenema kee ŋugbetɔ kple ŋugbetɔsrɔ ̃ ƒe gbe magaɖi le mewo ̀ akpɔ gbeɖe o . Wo ̀ asitsalawoe nye ame xɔŋkɔwo le xexeame e ̀ tsɔ wo ̀ akunyawɔwɔ kplɔ dukɔwo kata ̃ trae .

text: And in her was found the blood of prophets , and of saints , and of all that were slain upon the earth .
text2: Wokpɔ nyagblɔɖilawo kple ame kɔkɔewo kpakple ame siwo kata ̃ wowu le anyigba dzi la ƒe ʋu le mewo ̀ ”

text: And after these things I heard a great voice of much people in heaven , saying , Alleluia ; Salvation , and glory , and honour , and power , unto the Lord our God :
text2: Le esia megbe la , mese nane si ɖi abe ameha ga ̃ aɖee le ɣli dom le dziƒo ene be “ Haleluya ! Đeɖe kple ŋutikɔkɔe kpakple ŋuse ̃ nye mi ́ aƒe Mawu la tɔ ,

text: For true and righteous are his judgments : for he hath judged the great whore , which did corrupt the earth with her fornication , and hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand .
text2: elabena eƒe ʋɔnudɔdrɔ ̃ wo nye nyateƒe eye wole dzɔdzɔe . Ebu fɔ gbolo ga ̃ la , ame si do gu anyigba to eƒe ahasiwɔwɔwo me . Ebia hlɔ ̃ ɖe eƒe dɔlawo ƒe ʋu ta . ”

text: And again they said , Alleluia . And her smoke rose up for ever and ever .
text2: Wogado ɣli ake be , “ Haleluya ! Eƒe dzotɔtɔ ƒe dzudzɔ le tutum le dzime yim tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me . ”

text: And the four and twenty elders and the four beasts fell down and worshipped God that sat on the throne , saying , Amen ; Alleluia .
text2: Amega ̃ xoxo blaeve - vɔ - eneawo kple Nu Gbagbe eneawo tsyɔ mo anyi eye wosubɔ Mawu , ame si nɔ anyi ɖe fiazikpui la dzi . Wodo ɣli be , “ Amen , Haleluya ! ”

text: And a voice came out of the throne , saying , Praise our God , all ye his servants , and ye that fear him , both small and great .
text2: Tete gbe aɖe ɖi tso fiazikpui la gbɔ le gbɔgblɔm bena , “ Mikafu mi ́ aƒe Mawu la , mi eƒe dɔlawo kata ̃ , mi ame siwo vɔ ̃ nɛ , ame gblɔewo kple ame deŋgɔwo siaa ! ”

text: And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude , and as the voice of many waters , and as the voice of mighty thunderings , saying , Alleluia : for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth .
text2: Tete mese nu si ɖi abe ameha ga ̃ aɖe ƒe gbe , abe tsi geɖewo ƒe sisi ƒe howɔwɔ alo dzi ƒe gbeɖeɖe sese ̃ aɖe ene be , “ Haleluya ! Elabena mi ́ aƒe Aƒetɔ , Mawu , Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ lae le dzi ɖum .

text: Let us be glad and rejoice , and give honour to him : for the marriage of the Lamb is come , and his wife hath made herself ready .
text2: Mina mi ́ adzɔ dzi , atso aseye eye mi ́ atsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe nɛ ! Elabena Ale ̃ vi la ƒe srɔ ̃ ɖeŋkekenyui la ɖo eye eƒe ŋugbetɔ la dzra eɖokui ɖo le klalo .

text: And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen , clean and white : for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints .
text2: Wotsɔ aklala biɖibiɖi ƒe awu si le dzo dam eye eŋuti kɔ la nɛ be wo ̀ ado . ” Aklala biɖibiɖi nye dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe dɔ siwo ame kɔkɔeawo wɔ la ƒe dzesi .

text: And he saith unto me , Write , Blessed are they which are called unto the marriage supper of the Lamb . And he saith unto me , These are the true sayings of God .
text2: Tete mawudɔla la gblɔ nam be , “ Ŋlɔ be , ‘ Woayra ame siwo wokpe va Ale ̃ vi la ƒe srɔ ̃ ɖeɖe ƒe fie ̃ nuɖuƒe ! ’ ” Egblɔ kpe ɖe eŋu be , “ Esiawoe nye Mawu ƒe nya vava ̃ wo . ”

text: And I fell at his feet to worship him . And he said unto me , See thou do it not : I am thy fellowservant , and of thy brethren that have the testimony of Jesus : worship God : for the testimony of Jesus is the spirit of prophecy .
text2: Esi wo ̀ gblɔ esiawo vɔ la medze anyi ɖe eƒe afɔnu be masubɔe . Gake egblɔ nam be , “ Me ̀ gawɔe o ! Nye ha ̃ menye dɔla abe wo ̀ ke ene . Kpe ɖe nɔviwo ̀ siwo le ́ Yesu ƒe ɖaseɖiɖime ɖe asi la ŋuti . Eya ta subɔ Mawu ! Elabena Yesu ƒe ɖaseɖiɖi nye nyagblɔɖi ƒe gbɔgbɔ . ”

text: And I saw heaven opened , and behold a white horse ; and he that sat upon him was called Faithful and True , and in righteousness he doth judge and make war .
text2: Mekpɔ dziƒo nu le ʋuʋu ɖi eye ame aɖe si le sɔ ɣi aɖe dzi la le nye ŋkume . Sɔdola la ƒe ŋkɔe nye Nuteƒewɔla kple Nyateƒetɔ . Edrɔ ̃ a ʋɔnu eye wo ̀ wɔa aʋa le dzɔdzɔenyenye me .

text: His eyes were as a flame of fire , and on his head were many crowns ; and he had a name written , that no man knew , but he himself .
text2: Eƒe ŋkuwo le abe dzokaxɔxɔwo ene eye fiakuku geɖewo nɔ eƒe ta . Woŋlɔ ŋkɔ aɖe ɖe eŋuti esi ame aɖeke menya o , negbe eya ŋutɔ ko .

text: And he was clothed with a vesture dipped in blood : and his name is called The Word of God .
text2: Edo awu ʋlaya si wonyrɔ ɖe ʋu me eye eƒe ŋkɔe nye Mawu ƒe nya .

text: And the armies which were in heaven followed him upon white horses , clothed in fine linen , white and clean .
text2: Dziƒoʋakɔwo nɔ eyome . Wonɔ sɔ ɣiwo dom eye wodo awu siwo wotɔ kple aklala biɖibiɖi , wofu tititi eye wo ŋuti kɔ .

text: And out of his mouth goeth a sharp sword , that with it he should smite the nations : and he shall rule them with a rod of iron : and he treadeth the winepress of the fierceness and wrath of Almighty God .
text2: Yi ɖaɖɛ aɖe do tso eƒe nu me esi wo ̀ atsɔ adza dukɔwo aƒo ɖii , aɖu wo dzi kple gatikplɔ . Efia wain le wainfiaƒe kple Mawu Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ la ƒe dziku heliheli ̃ .

text: And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written , KING OF KINGS , AND LORD OF LORDS .
text2: Woŋlɔ ŋkɔ sia ɖe eƒe awu ʋlaya kple eƒe ata ŋu be , ‘ FIAWO DZI FIA KPLE AƑETÅWO DZI AƑETÅ . ”

text: And I saw an angel standing in the sun ; and he cried with a loud voice , saying to all the fowls that fly in the midst of heaven , Come and gather yourselves together unto the supper of the great God ;
text2: Mekpɔ mawudɔla aɖe le tsitre ɖe ŋdɔgbe , ame si do ɣli kple gbe sese ̃ na xevi siwo kata ̃ le dzodzom le yame be , “ Miva , miƒo ƒu hena Mawu ƒe fie ̃ nuɖuɖu ƒe kplɔ ̃ ɖoɖo ga ̃ la ,

text: That ye may eat the flesh of kings , and the flesh of captains , and the flesh of mighty men , and the flesh of horses , and of them that sit on them , and the flesh of all men , both free and bond , both small and great .
text2: ale be miaɖu fiawo , aʋafiawo , kale ̃ tɔwo , sɔwo kple wo dolawo kpakple amewo kata ̃ ƒe la ̃ , ablɔɖeviwo kple kluviwo , ame gblɔewo kple ame deŋgɔwo siaa . ”

text: And I saw the beast , and the kings of the earth , and their armies , gathered together to make war against him that sat on the horse , and against his army .
text2: Tete mekpɔ la ̃ wɔada ̃ la kple anyigbadzifiawo kpakple woƒe aʋakɔwo , woƒo ƒu hena awawɔwɔ kple ame si le sɔ ɣi la dzi kpakple eƒe aʋakɔ .

text: And the beast was taken , and with him the false prophet that wrought miracles before him , with which he deceived them that had received the mark of the beast , and them that worshipped his image . These both were cast alive into a lake of fire burning with brimstone .
text2: Ke wole ́ la ̃ wɔada ̃ la kple aʋatsonyagblɔɖila la ame si wɔ nukunu geɖewo le eƒe ŋkɔ me . Etsɔ dzesi siawo ble ame siwo xɔ la ̃ wɔada ̃ la ƒe dzesi , ame siwo ha ̃ subɔ eƒe legba la . Wotsɔ wo kple eve la kata ̃ ƒu gbe ɖe aŋɔdzota si le bibim la me agbagbee .

text: And the remnant were slain with the sword of him that sat upon the horse , which sword proceeded out of his mouth : and all the fowls were filled with their flesh .
text2: Wowu wo dometɔ mamlɛawo kple yi si do go tso sɔdola la ƒe nu me eye dziƒoxeviwo va ɖu woƒe la ̃ eye woɖi ƒo .

text: And I saw an angel come down from heaven , having the key of the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand .
text2: Eye mekpɔ mawudɔla aɖe wo ̀ ɖi tso dziƒo gbɔna . Ʋe globo la ƒe safui kple gakɔsɔkɔsɔ ga ̃ aɖe nɔ esi .

text: And he laid hold on the dragon , that old serpent , which is the Devil , and Satan , and bound him a thousand years ,
text2: Ele ́ ʋɔ driba la , da xoxo ma , ame si nye gbɔgbɔ vɔ ̃ alo Satana eye wo ̀ blae hena ƒe akpe ɖeka .

text: And cast him into the bottomless pit , and shut him up , and set a seal upon him , that he should deceive the nations no more , till the thousand years should be fulfilled : and after that he must be loosed a little season .
text2: Etsɔe ƒu gbe ɖe Ʋe globo la me eye wo ̀ tui kple safui hetre enu be magable dukɔwo azɔ o va se ɖe esime ƒe akpe ɖeka la nawu enu . Le ema megbe la , woaɖe gae hena ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe .

text: And I saw thrones , and they sat upon them , and judgment was given unto them : and I saw the souls of them that were beheaded for the witness of Jesus , and for the word of God , and which had not worshipped the beast , neither his image , neither had received his mark upon their foreheads , or in their hands ; and they lived and reigned with Christ a thousand years .
text2: Mekpɔ fiazikpui aɖewo , siwo dzi ame siwo wona ŋuse ̃ e be woadrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu la nɔ , eye mekpɔ ame siwo nu wotso ta le , le woƒe ɖaseɖiɖi na Yesu kple Mawu ƒe nya la ta la ƒe luʋɔwo . Wogbɔ agbe eye woɖu fia kple Kristo hena ƒe akpe ɖeka .

text: But the rest of the dead lived not again until the thousand years were finished . This is the first resurrection .
text2: Ame kuku mamlɛawo megbɔ agbe o va se ɖe esime ƒe akpe ɖeka la wu enu . Esiae nye tsitretsitsi gba ̃ tɔ .

text: Blessed and holy is he that hath part in the first resurrection : on such the second death hath no power , but they shall be priests of God and of Christ , and shall reign with him a thousand years .
text2: Yayratɔwo kple ame kɔkɔewoe nye ame siwo kpɔ gome le tsitretsitsi gba ̃ tɔ me . Ku evelia mekpɔ ŋuse ̃ ɖe wo dzi o , ke woanye Osɔfowo na Mawu kple Kristo eye woaɖu dzi kplii hena ƒe akpe ɖeka .

text: And when the thousand years are expired , Satan shall be loosed out of his prison ,
text2: Ne ƒe akpe ɖeka la de la , woaɖe Satana tso eƒe gaxɔa me

text: And shall go out to deceive the nations which are in the four quarters of the earth , Gog and Magog , to gather them together to battle : the number of whom is as the sand of the sea .
text2: eye wo ̀ ado go ayi aɖable dukɔwo le xexeame ƒe dzogoe eneawo dzi , kple Gɔg kpakple Magɔg ne woaƒo amewo nu ƒu hena aʋawɔwɔ eye le xexle ̃ me la , wosɔ gbɔ abe ƒutake ene .

text: And they went up on the breadth of the earth , and compassed the camp of the saints about , and the beloved city : and fire came down from God out of heaven , and devoured them .
text2: Wozɔ to anyigba blibo la dzi heyi ɖaɖe to ɖe Mawu ƒe amewo ƒe asaɖa , du si wo ̀ lɔ ̃ na vevie . Ke dzo ge tso dziƒo va fia wo kata ̃ .

text: And the devil that deceived them was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone , where the beast and the false prophet are , and shall be tormented day and night for ever and ever .
text2: Wotsɔ Satana , ame si ble wo la ƒu gbe ɖe aŋɔdzota si le bibim la me , afi si wotsɔ la ̃ wɔada ̃ la kple aʋatsonyagblɔɖila la ha ̃ ƒu gbe ɖo . Woawɔ funyafunya wo za ̃ kple keli tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me .

text: And I saw a great white throne , and him that sat on it , from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away ; and there was found no place for them .
text2: Tete mekpɔ fiazikpui ɣi ga ̃ aɖe kple ame si bɔbɔ nɔ edzi . Anyigba kple dziŋgɔli ̃ si le eŋkume eye teƒe aɖeke meli na wo o .

text: And I saw the dead , small and great , stand before God ; and the books were opened : and another book was opened , which is the book of life : and the dead were judged out of those things which were written in the books , according to their works .
text2: Eye mekpɔ ame kukuwo , ame deŋgɔwo kple ame gblɔewo nɔ tsitre ɖe fiazikpui la ŋgɔ eye woʋu agbale ̃ wo . Woʋu agbale ̃ bubu si nye agbegbale ̃ la . Wodrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame kukuawo ɖe nu si wowɔ woŋlɔ ɖe agbale ̃ awo me la nu .

text: And the sea gave up the dead which were in it ; and death and hell delivered up the dead which were in them : and they were judged every man according to their works .
text2: Atsiaƒu tsɔ ame kuku siwo le eme la hena . Ku kple tsi ̃ eƒe ha ̃ ɖe woƒe ame kukuwo ɖe go eye wodrɔ ̃ ʋɔnu ame sia ame ɖe nu si wowɔ la nu .

text: And death and hell were cast into the lake of fire . This is the second death .
text2: Wotsɔ ku kple tsi ̃ eƒe ƒu gbe ɖe dzota la me . Dzota siae nye ku evelia .

text: And whosoever was not found written in the book of life was cast into the lake of fire .
text2: Ne womekpɔ ame aɖe ƒe ŋkɔ le agbegbale ̃ a me o la , wotsɔnɛ ƒua gbe ɖe dzota la me .

text: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth : for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away ; and there was no more sea .
text2: Eye mekpɔ dziƒo yeye kple anyigba yeye , elabena dziƒo gba ̃ tɔ kple anyigba gba ̃ tɔ nu va yi eye atsiaƒu aɖeke ha ̃ megali o .

text: And I John saw the holy city , new Jerusalem , coming down from God out of heaven , prepared as a bride adorned for her husband .
text2: Mekpɔ Du Kɔkɔe la , si nye Yerusalem yeye la , le ɖiɖim tso dziƒo tso Mawu gbɔ , eye woɖo atsyɔ ̃ nɛ abe ŋugbetɔ si wowɔ leke na hena srɔ ̃ a ene .

text: And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying , Behold , the tabernacle of God is with men , and he will dwell with them , and they shall be his people , and God himself shall be with them , and be their God .
text2: Tete mese gbe ga ̃ aɖe tso fiazikpui la gbɔ le gbɔgblɔm bena , “ Azɔ la , Mawu ƒe nɔƒe le amegbetɔwo dome , eye wo ̀ anɔ wo gbɔ . Woanye eƒe dukɔ , Mawu ŋutɔ anɔ wo gbɔ eye wo ̀ anye woƒe Mawu .

text: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes ; and there shall be no more death , neither sorrow , nor crying , neither shall there be any more pain : for the former things are passed away .
text2: Atutu aɖatsi sia aɖatsi ɖa le woƒe ŋkuwo dzi ; ku loo , alo konyifafa alo avifafa alo vevesese maganɔ anyi o , elabena nuɖoanyi xoxoawo nu va yi ”

text: And he that sat upon the throne said , Behold , I make all things new . And he said unto me , Write : for these words are true and faithful .
text2: Ame si nɔ anyi ɖe fiazikpui la dzi la gblɔ bena , “ Mele nuwo kata ̃ wɔm yeyee ! Tete wo ̀ gblɔ be , “ Ŋlɔ nu sia da ɖi , elabena nya siawo nye nya siwo dzi woaka ɖo eye wonye nyateƒenyawo ha ̃ . ”

text: And he said unto me , It is done . I am Alpha and Omega , the beginning and the end . I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely .
text2: Eyi edzi gblɔ nam be , “ Wowɔe vɔ . Nyee nye A kple Z , Gɔmedzedze kple Nuwuwu . Ame si tsikɔ le wuwum la , mana tsii wo ̀ ano tso agbetsivudo la me , femaxee .

text: He that overcometh shall inherit all things ; and I will be his God , and he shall be my son .
text2: Ame si ɖu dzi la anyi nu siawo kata ̃ ƒe dome , eye manye eƒe Mawu eye eya ha ̃ anye vinye .

text: But the fearful , and unbelieving , and the abominable , and murderers , and whoremongers , and sorcerers , and idolaters , and all liars , shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone : which is the second death .
text2: Gake vɔvɔ ̃ nɔtɔwo , dzimaxɔsetɔwo , ame vɔ ̃ ɖiwo , hlɔ ̃ dolawo , ahasiwɔlawo , akunyawɔlawo , Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo kple alakpatɔwo kata ̃ la , woƒe nɔƒe anye aŋɔdzota si le bibim ŋɔdzitɔe la me . Esiae nye ku evelia . ”

text: And there came unto me one of the seven angels which had the seven vials full of the seven last plagues , and talked with me , saying , Come hither , I will shew thee the bride , the Lamb ' s wife .
text2: Mawudɔla adre siwo le ́ kplu adre siwo me dɔvɔ ̃ adre mamlɛawo le la dometɔ ɖeka va gblɔ nam be , “ Va , ne mafia wo ̀ ŋugbetɔ la , esi nye Ale ̃ vi la srɔ ̃ . ”

text: And he carried me away in the spirit to a great and high mountain , and shewed me that great city , the holy Jerusalem , descending out of heaven from God ,
text2: Tete wo ̀ kɔm dzoe le Gbɔgbɔ la me , heyi ɖe to ga ̃ kɔkɔ aɖe dzi eye wo ̀ ɖe Du Kɔkɔe , Yerusalem , si le ɖiɖim tso dziƒo Mawu gbɔ la fiam .

text: Having the glory of God : and her light was like unto a stone most precious , even like a jasper stone , clear as crystal ;
text2: Ele kekle ̃ m kple Mawu ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe eye eƒe kekle ̃ le abe kpexɔasi aɖe , abe yapiskpe ene eye eme kɔ keŋkeŋkeŋ abe kristalokpe ene .

text: And had a wall great and high , and had twelve gates , and at the gates twelve angels , and names written thereon , which are the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel :
text2: Wotɔ kpɔ titri kɔkɔ aɖe ɖe eŋu , woɖe mɔnu wuieve siwo nu agbo le la ɖe glia me eye mawudɔla wuieve le agboawo nu . Woŋlɔ Israel ƒe to wuieveawo ƒe ŋkɔwo ɖe agboawo dzi .

text: On the east three gates ; on the north three gates ; on the south three gates ; and on the west three gates .
text2: Agbo etɔ ̃ le ɣedzeƒe , etɔ ̃ le dzigbeme , etɔ ̃ le anyigbeme eye etɔ ̃ le ɣetoɖoƒe .

text: And the wall of the city had twelve foundations , and in them the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb .
text2: Woɖo gɔmeɖokpe wuieve na dua ƒe gliwo eye woŋlɔ Ale ̃ vi la ƒe apostolo wuieveawo ƒe ŋkɔwo ɖe wo dzi .

text: And he that talked with me had a golden reed to measure the city , and the gates thereof , and the wall thereof .
text2: Mawudɔla si ƒo nu kplim la le ́ sikanu dzidzenu ɖe asi be yeadzidze du la , eƒe agbowo kple eƒe gliwo .

text: And the city lieth foursquare , and the length is as large as the breadth : and he measured the city with the reed , twelve thousand furlongs . The length and the breadth and the height of it are equal .
text2: Wotso du la ale be eƒe kekeme kple didime siaa sɔ . Edzidze du la eye wo ̀ kpɔ be eƒe didime , kekeme kple kɔkɔme kata ̃ nye dzidzeme ɖeka si nye kilometa akpe eve kple alafa eve .

text: And he measured the wall thereof , an hundred and forty and four cubits , according to the measure of a man , that is , of the angel .
text2: Edzidze gli la ƒe titrime , eye le amegbetɔ ƒe dzidzeka si mawudɔla la le ́ la nu la , titrime la le meta blaade - vɔ - atɔ ̃ .

text: And the building of the wall of it was of jasper : and the city was pure gold , like unto clear glass .
text2: Wotsɔ yapiskpexɔasi ɖo gli lae eye wotsɔ sika si me kɔ abe ahuhɔ ̃ e ene la tso du lae .

text: And the foundations of the wall of the city were garnished with all manner of precious stones . The first foundation was jasper ; the second , sapphire ; the third , a chalcedony ; the fourth , an emerald ;
text2: Wotsɔ kpexɔasi vovovowo ɖo atsyɔ ̃ na du la ƒe gɔmeɖokpee . Yapiskpe nye fli gba ̃ tɔ , wotsɔ safirekpe ɖo fli eveliae , fli etɔ ̃ lia nye kalkedonikpe , fli enelia nye emeraldkpe ,

text: The fifth , sardonyx ; the sixth , sardius ; the seventh , chrysolite ; the eighth , beryl ; the ninth , a topaz ; the tenth , a chrysoprasus ; the eleventh , a jacinth ; the twelfth , an amethyst .
text2: woɖo fli atɔ ̃ lia kple sardonixkpe , fli adelia nye karneliakpe , adrelia nye krisolitekpe , enyilia nye berilkpe , asiekelia nye topazkpe , ewoliae nye krisoprasekpe , wuiɖekɛliae nye yakintkpe eye wuieveliae nye ametistkpe .

text: And the twelve gates were twelve pearls ; every several gate was of one pearl : and the street of the city was pure gold , as it were transparent glass .
text2: Agbo wuieveawo nye kpexɔasi wuieve eye wowɔ agbo ɖe sia ɖe kple kpexɔasi ɖeka . Wowɔ du mɔ ga ̃ la kple sika akuakua eye eme dza abe ahuhɔ ̃ e ene .

text: And I saw no temple therein : for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple of it .
text2: Nyemekpɔ gbedoxɔ aɖeke le du la me o , elabena Aƒetɔ Mawu Ŋuse ̃ kata ̃ tɔ kple Ale ̃ vi lae nye eƒe gbedoxɔ .

text: And the city had no need of the sun , neither of the moon , to shine in it : for the glory of God did lighten it , and the Lamb is the light thereof .
text2: Du la mehia ̃ ɣe alo ɣleti be woanae kekeli o , elabena Mawu ƒe Ŋutikɔkɔe naa kekelii eye Ale ̃ vi lae nye eƒe akaɖi .

text: And the nations of them which are saved shall walk in the light of it : and the kings of the earth do bring their glory and honour into it .
text2: Dukɔwo azɔ le eƒe kekeli nu eye anyigbadzifiawo atsɔ woƒe atsyɔ ̃ age ɖe emee .

text: And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day : for there shall be no night there .
text2: Eƒe agbowo anɔ ʋuʋu ɖi ɖaa elabena za ̃ mado le afi ma o .

text: And they shall bring the glory and honour of the nations into it .
text2: Woatsɔ dukɔwo ƒe ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu ava emee .

text: And there shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth , neither whatsoever worketh abomination , or maketh a lie : but they which are written in the Lamb ' s book of life .
text2: Nu makɔmakɔ aɖeke mage ɖe eme gbeɖe o , nenema kee nye ŋukpenanuwɔlawo kple ameblelawo ha ̃ , ke ame siwo ƒe ŋkɔwo woŋlɔ ɖe Ale ̃ vi la ƒe agbegbale ̃ la me koe age ɖe eme .

text: And he shewed me a pure river of water of life , clear as crystal , proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb .
text2: Tete mawudɔla la fia agbetsitɔsisi lam eye eme kɔ keŋkeŋkeŋ abe kristalokpe ene , ele sisim tso Mawu ƒe fiazikpui la kple Ale ̃ vi la gbɔ ,

text: In the midst of the street of it , and on either side of the river , was there the tree of life , which bare twelve manner of fruits , and yielded her fruit every month : and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations .
text2: heva to dumɔ ga ̃ la titina . Agbeti la le tɔsisi la ƒe gowo kple eve dzi , etsea ku wuieve ɣleti ɖe sia ɖe eye eƒe aŋgbawo nye nu si ahe dɔyɔyɔ vɛ na dukɔwo .

text: And there shall be no more curse : but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it ; and his servants shall serve him :
text2: Fiƒode aɖeke maganɔ anyi azɔ o . Mawu kple Ale ̃ vi la ƒe fiazikpui anɔ du la me eye eƒe dɔlawo asubɔe .

text: And they shall see his face ; and his name shall be in their foreheads .
text2: Woakpɔ eƒe ŋkume eye eƒe ŋkɔ anɔ woƒe ŋgowo nu .

text: And there shall be no night there ; and they need no candle , neither light of the sun ; for the Lord God giveth them light : and they shall reign for ever and ever .
text2: Za ̃ maganɔ anyi o . Womahia ̃ akaɖi ƒe kekle ̃ alo ɣe ƒe kekle ̃ o , elabena Aƒetɔ Mawu ana akaɖi wo . Eye woaɖu fia tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me .

text: And he said unto me , These sayings are faithful and true : and the Lord God of the holy prophets sent his angel to shew unto his servants the things which must shortly be done .
text2: Mawudɔla la gblɔ nam be , “ Nya siawo nye nya siwo ŋu woaɖo dzi ɖo eye wonye nyateƒe . Aƒetɔ la , nyagblɔɖilawo ƒe gbɔgbɔ ƒe Mawu la , dɔ eƒe mawudɔla be wo ̀ afia eƒe dɔlawo nu siwo ava dzɔ kpuie . ”

text: Behold , I come quickly : blessed is he that keepeth the sayings of the prophecy of this book .
text2: “ Kpɔɖa , megbɔna kpuie ! Woayra ame si le ́ nyagblɔɖi siwo le agbale ̃ sia me la me ɖe asi . ”

text: And I John saw these things , and heard them . And when I had heard and seen , I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel which shewed me these things .
text2: Nye , Yohanes , nyee nye ame si se , hekpɔ nu siawo kata ̃ . Eye esi mese , hekpɔ nu siawo la , medze klo ɖe mawudɔla si ɖe nu siawo kata ̃ fiam la ƒe afɔnu be masubɔe .

text: Then saith he unto me , See thou do it not : for I am thy fellowservant , and of thy brethren the prophets , and of them which keep the sayings of this book : worship God .
text2: Ke egblɔ nam be , “ Me ̀ gawɔe o ! Nye ha ̃ dɔla ko menye abe wo ̀ ke ene kpe ɖe nɔviwo ̀ nyagblɔɖilawo ŋu kpakple ame siwo kata ̃ le ́ agba ̃ le sia me nyawo ɖe asi la ŋu . Eya ta subɔ Mawu ! ”

text: And he saith unto me , Seal not the sayings of the prophecy of this book : for the time is at hand .
text2: Tete wo ̀ gblɔ nam be , “ Me ̀ gatre nyagblɔɖi siwo le agbale ̃ sia me nu o , elabena ɣeyiɣi la te tu aƒe .

text: He that is unjust , let him be unjust still : and he which is filthy , let him be filthy still : and he that is righteous , let him be righteous still : and he that is holy , let him be holy still .
text2: Vɔ ̃ wɔla nenɔ vɔ ̃ wɔwɔ dzi , ame vɔ ̃ ɖi nenɔ nu vɔ ̃ ɖi wɔwɔ dzi , nyuiwɔla ha ̃ nenɔ nyuiwɔwɔ dzi eye ame si le kɔkɔe la , nenɔ kɔkɔenyenye dzi . ”

text: And , behold , I come quickly ; and my reward is with me , to give every man according as his work shall be .
text2: “ Kpɔɖa , megbɔna kpuie ! Nye fetu kpe ɖe ŋutinye , eye maxe fe na ame sia ame le nu si wo ̀ wɔ nu .

text: I am Alpha and Omega , the beginning and the end , the first and the last .
text2: Nyee nye A kple Z , Gba ̃ tɔ kple Mlɔetɔ , Gɔmedzedze kple Nuwuwu .

text: Blessed are they that do his commandments , that they may have right to the tree of life , and may enter in through the gates into the city .
text2: “ Woayra ame siwo nya woƒe awu ʋlayawo be woakpɔ mɔ ayi ɖe agbeti la gbɔ , eye be woato agboawo nu age ɖe du la me .

text: For without are dogs , and sorcerers , and whoremongers , and murderers , and idolaters , and whosoever loveth and maketh a lie .
text2: Ke avuwo , akunyawɔlawo , ahasiwɔlawo , hlɔ ̃ dolawo Trɔ ̃ subɔlawo kple ame siwo lɔ ̃ aʋatso eye wokanɛ ha ̃ la atsi agboa godo .

text: I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches . I am the root and the offspring of David , and the bright and morning star .
text2: Nye , Yesue dɔ nye mawudɔla be wo ̀ atsɔ ɖaseɖiɖi siawo na wo ̀ hena hameawo . Nyee nye Ke tso David me kple eƒe dzidzimevi . Nyee nye ŋukeɣletivi kekle ̃ la . ”

text: And the Spirit and the bride say , Come . And let him that heareth say , Come . And let him that is athirst come . And whosoever will , let him take the water of life freely .
text2: Gbɔgbɔ la kple ŋugbetɔ la gblɔ be , “ Va ! ” Eye ame siwo le esem la ha ̃ negblɔ be , “ Va ! ” Ne tsikɔ le ame aɖe wum la , neva noe faa eye ame sia ame si lɔ ̃ ko la nexɔ agbetsi wo ̀ ano .

text: For I testify unto every man that heareth the words of the prophecy of this book , If any man shall add unto these things , God shall add unto him the plagues that are written in this book :
text2: Mele nu xlɔ ̃ m ame sia ame si le agbale ̃ sia me nyagblɔɖiwo sem la be : Ne ame aɖe atsɔ nane akpe wo la , Mawu ana dɔvɔ ̃ siwo kata ̃ ƒe nya woŋlɔ ɖe agbale ̃ a me la nava edzi .

text: And if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy , God shall take away his part out of the book of life , and out of the holy city , and from the things which are written in this book .
text2: Eye ne ame aɖe aɖe nya aɖewo le nyagblɔɖigbale ̃ sia me la , Mawu mana wo ̀ akpɔ gome le agbeti la kple du kɔkɔe si ŋuti woƒo nu le le agbale ̃ sia me la me o .

text: He which testifieth these things saith , Surely I come quickly . Amen . Even so , come , Lord Jesus .
text2: Ame si le ɖase ɖim le nu siawo ŋuti la gblɔ bena , “ E ̃ , megbɔna kpuie ” Amen . Va , Aƒetɔ Yesu .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Aƒetɔ Yesu ƒe amenuveve nenɔ kple Mawu ƒe amewo . Amen .
